Name: Lucia
Text: UiGuideFight.GuideFight1

Name: Lee
Text: UiGuideFight.GuideFight6

Name: Nanami
Text: UiGuideFight.GuideFight5

Name: Bianca
Text: UiGuideFight.GuideFight3

Name: Celica
Text: Commandant, the current file extraction time limit has been exceeded.

Name: Lucia
Text: Let us move forward, Commandant.

Name: Lucia
Text: Hit the enemy repeatedly with <color=#ffda58>Basic Attacks</color> to receive a [Signal Orb].

Name: Lucia
Text: Tap to ping us with a <color=#ff5656>[Signal Orb]</color> to use a Construct-specific Skill.

Name: Lucia
Text: Tap 3 adjacent <color=#ff5656>[Orbs]</color> of the same color to [3-Ping] for a powerful blow.

Name: Lucia
Text: If you <color=#ffda58>[Dodge]</color> before being hit, you will enter the [Matrix] state.

Name: Lucia
Text: In [Matrix] state, a <color=#ffda58>Single Orb</color> has the same effect as a <color=#ffda58>[3-Ping]</color>.

Name: Lucia
Text: <color=#ffda58>Yellow Orb</color>: Knocks enemies airborne and inflicts damage.

Name: Lucia
Text: Pinging a <color=#ff5656>[Red Orb]</color> quickly after any <color=#ffda58>[3-Ping]</color> will trigger [Padma Dual Blade].

Name: Lucia
Text: Pinging a <color=#ff5656>[Red Orb]</color> quickly after any <color=#ffda58>[3-Ping]</color> will trigger [Padma Dual Blade].

Name: Lucia
Text: Hit enemies to generate Energy. Use Energy for <color=#ff5656>[Signature Moves]</color>.

Name: Lucia
Text: Pinging a <color=#ff5656>[Red Orb]</color> quickly after any <color=#ffda58>[3-Ping]</color> will trigger <color=#ff5656>[Padma Dual Blade]</color>.

Name: Lucia
Text: <color=#49e7ff>Blue Orb</color>: Enhances all attacks to deal additional Fire DMG.

Name: Lucia
Text: Let us advance toward the target, Commandant.

Name: Lucia
Text: In <color=#ff5656>[Lotus Dual Blade]</color> state, <color=#ff5656>Basic Attacks</color> will become enhanced.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ff5656>Different skills</color> will give <color=#ff5656>different ratings</color>. There are 6 ranks: C, B, A, S, SS, SSS.

Name: Celica
Text: Your rating will <color=#ff5656>continue to drop</color>. Trial Ratings will be determined based on the <color=#ff5656>DMG you dealt in each rank</color>, as well as <color=#ff5656>other conditions</color> after the battle.

Name: Celica
Text: Dodge the enemy attack to enter the <color=#ff5656>Flash Counter Status</color>. During this status, attacks on the enemy will <color=#ff5656>grant rating points and Dodge Gauge value</color> and greatly reduce <color=#ff5656>Poise of non-Wrath enemies (except Mirrored Vergil)</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Enemies except Mirrored Vergil will <color=#ff5656>gain Rage</color> in battle and enter the <color=#ff5656>Wrath Form</color> at full Rage. <color=#ff5656>The Wrath Form will grant a new move</color> and <color=#ff5656>cannot be interrupted</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Welcome to the tutorial, Commandant. Let's start with the rules.

Name: Celica
Text: You will <color=#ff5656>receive a rating</color> when you attack enemies, <color=#ff5656>dodge</color> attacks, <color=#ff5656>parry successfully</color>, or meet <color=#ff5656>secret conditions</color> in game.

Name: Celica
Text: The character will have their original damage set to 1 and deal different damage based on different skills.

Name: Celica
Text: Now let's attack an enemy to get a rating.

Name: Celica
Text: The Poise Bar will increase when <color=#ff5656>Flash Counter</color> or Parries are performed. Once Poise Bar is <color=#ff5656>full</color>, the next Flash Counter will <color=#ff5656>Paralyze</color> the enemy. Poise will <color=#ff5656>accumulate slower</color> during Wrath Form.

Name: Lee
Text: Tsk. That's all we can do.

Name: Lucia
Text: Such power... The passage is now open, Commandant!

Name: Lucia
Text: We should be safe for a while after we pass through here.

Name: Lucia
Text: Let's find the others. They should be where that blast came from.

Name: Lucia
Text: We can proceed with the next phase of the operation after that.

Name: Lucia
Text: And Commandant... Thank you...

Name: Lucia
Text: Are you okay, Commandant?!

Name: Lucia
Text: Incredible energy... Most Corrupted have lost operational capability.

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant, part of the initialization in the battle is not finished.

Name: Lucia
Text: I'm afraid it will affect future operations. Please check the commands in the signal.

Name: Lucia
Text: Still impossible to paralyze all of them?

Name: Lucia
Text: Then check the commands while moving.

Name: Lucia
Text: Stay close to me, Commandant.

Name: System
Text: Reloading the system...

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant, errors found in the commands.

Name: Lucia
Text: Only the Red Orb commands are correct.

Name: Lucia
Text: Let's go through the block and meet with Liv before we repair them.

Name: Lee
Text: Quiet, yet...

Name: Liv
Text: Some Corrupted are lurking around the corners.

Name: Lucia
Text: No matter. Prepare to break through, and avoid getting separated.

Name: Liv
Text: Corrupted on the move!

Name: Lucia
Text: Liv, stay behind this time.

Name: Liv
Text: Roger...

Name: Lucia
Text: Going well so far... The rendezvous point is past this doorway.

Name: Lee
Text: Wait! I hear footsteps!

Name: Liv
Text: Is that...?

Name: Unknown Construct α
Text: Lucia...

Name: Lee
Text: Tch, she's completely ignoring my attacks.

Name: Liv
Text: She seems to be drawn to Lucia, but Lucia, you...

Name: Lucia
Text: I'm fine... Keep Commandant safe...

Name: Unknown Construct α
Text: Is that all you have, Lucia...?

Name: Lucia
Text: My visual signals are... malfunctioning?

Name: Unknown Construct α
Text: How familiar this obsession is...

Name: Unknown Construct α
Text: To think it could be built upon such a fragile past...

Name: Lucia
Text: Past...?

Name: Unknown Construct α
Text: Surely you feel it too... Lucia?

Name: Lucia
Text: I can <color=#ffda58>[Crouch]</color> to go through <color=#ffda58>[Infrared Traps]</color> and move with reduced <color=#ffda58>[Noise]</color> so enemies won't hear me.

Name: Lucia
Text: There are two enemies ahead. I should use the <color=#ffda58>[Petri Vat]</color> to release poison gas and disable them.

Name: Lucia
Text: Is it... over?

Name: Liv
Text: Watch out! High viral reactions surging in Shark-speare's body!

Name: Liv
Text: Directly win and end the battle? What should we do?

Name: Liv
Text: Enter the first password.

Name: Liv
Text: Enter the second password.

Name: Liv
Text: Enter the third password.

Name: Liv
Text: What do we do?

Name: Liv
Text: Enter operation command

Name: Liv
Text: Choose a node to enter the stage.

Name: Celica
Text: When enemies in the <color=#ff5656>[Red Zone]</color> reaches <color=#ff5656>[3/3]</color>, the mission will fail...

Name: Celica
Text: The mission fails when <color=#ff5656>[3]</color> enemies enter the <color=#ff5656>[Red Zone]</color>!

Name: Celica
Text: Zone cleared. Enemies sighted in next zone. Advance immediately!

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ff5656>[1/3]</color> enemy have entered the zone. Mission fails when 3 enemies enter!

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ff5656>[2/3]</color> enemy have entered the zone. Mission fails when 3 enemies enter!

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ff5656>[3/5]</color> enemy have entered the zone. Mission fails when 5 enemies enter!

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ff5656>[4/5]</color> enemy have entered the zone. Mission fails when 5 enemies enter!

Name: Celica
Text: You receive a buff on entering Energy zone, increasing attack damage dealt to enemies of the same color.

Name: Celica
Text: Enter portal and clear 2 zones to summon boss in the timed Challenge.

Name: Celica
Text: Challenge in zone is complete. Return to start zone via portal.

Name: Celica
Text: Wipe them out, and stop them from destroying the terminal!

Name: Lee
Text: There's a discarded Beamer here...

Name: Lee
Text: Wait. Let me take a closer look...

Name: Lee
Text: Haha! Unit-01, prepare for launch!

Name: Lee
Text: Cough—cough, cough!

Name: Lee
Text: Corrupted detected. Perfect timing. Let's try it out.

Name: Gear
Text: The World—!

Name: Rosetta
Text: I'll fight in the Centaur Form!
1s
2s
3s
4s

Name: Purifying Force - Jha
Text: The damage is still acceptable.

Name: Purifying Force - Jha
Text: Co-op...? I'm still not used to it.

Name: Purifying Force - Jha
Text: Ahem... I'm fine.

Name: Purifying Force - Jha
Text: No need to worry.

Name: Purifying Force - Jane
Text: Let's start the next battle!

Name: Purifying Force - Jane
Text: Enemy down!

Name: Purifying Force - Foley
Text: Ah, Gray Raven, I heard about you long ago. But I'm not bad either!

Name: Purifying Force - Foley
Text: Thank you for your help.

Name: Purifying Force - Jha
Text: Gray Raven Commandant, what should we do next?

Name: Purifying Force - Jha
Text: Focused attack. (The Purifying Force will focus on attacking the target locked.)

Name: Purifying Force - Jha
Text: Scattered attack. (The Purifying Force will split up and attack different targets.)

Name: Purifying Force - Jane
Text: Cover Gray Raven.

Name: Purifying Force - Jane
Text: I can keep going!

Name: Purifying Force - Foley
Text: Identify! Lock! Aim! Eliminate!

Name: Purifying Force - Foley
Text: It was my bad...

Name: Purifying Force - Jane
Text: Enemy eliminated! It's all going well.

Name: Purifying Force - Foley
Text: Continue attacking!

Name: Purifying Force - Jha
Text: Most enemies were eliminated. Stay alert for the next wave of attacks.

Name: Purifying Force - Jane
Text: No more enemies. Let's go!

Name: Purifying Force - Jha
Text: I think we are more powerful than before!

Name: Purifying Force - Jha
Text: Continue fighting.

Name: Purifying Force - Jha
Text: Another victory.

Name: Purifying Force - Jha
Text: Keep shooting.

Name: Construct
Text: Thanks. That was so helpful!

Name: Construct
Text: Thank you so much!

Name: Construct
Text: If it weren't you, I could have died. Thanks!

Name: Construct
Text: How powerful... Who are you?

Name: Construct
Text: Thanks... I thought we were going to die.

Name: Construct
Text: I can't find your information, but thanks for the help.

Name: Construct
Text: I thought I was going to die here...

Name: Construct
Text: Defeat the Crimson! For eternal glory!

Name: Construct
Text: We did it! Keep up the good work!

Name: Construct
Text: Victory is near! Hold on, brothers!

Name: Celica
Text: Enemy bombardment. Take cover!

Name: Celica
Text: Heat-seekers! Split up!

Name: Celica
Text: Now they're real mad. Take cover!

Name: Celica
Text: Avoid the burning areas from the heat-seekers!

Name: Celica
Text: Lasers will cut through you like butter! Try to avoid them!

Name: Celica
Text: Enemy bombardment. Take cover!

Name: Celica
Text: Heat-seekers! Split up!

Name: Celica
Text: They're down now! Attack!

Name: Celica
Text: Beginning simulation!

Name: Celica
Text: Use the energy spilling out of the "Tyrant"!

Name: Celica
Text: The energy is supercharging the Tyrant! Get it out of there!

Name: Celica
Text: We can deal more damage in the energy spill!

Name: Celica
Text: Get behind the shield!

Name: Celica
Text: Get behind the shield!

Name: Celica
Text: The energy is supercharging the Tyrant! Get it out of there!

Name: Celica
Text: Yellow balls of inactive plasma can power up your weapons.

Name: Celica
Text: Unstable plasma tracks its current target until it finds a new host.

Name: Osiris
Text: Let it begin. Face your destiny!

Name: Osiris
Text: I'll send you to the wrecking yard!

Name: Osiris
Text: Cocky from beating those scraps outside? Prepare to taste my wrath!

Name: Osiris
Text: <color=#ff5656>My storm will tear you apart!</color>

Name: Osiris
Text: Prepare. To. Be. Judged!

Name: Osiris
Text: Scrap METAL!

Name: Osiris
Text: Weakling!

Name: Osiris
Text: I will remove you from this mortal coil!

Name: Osiris
Text: All your struggles are wasted efforts!

Name: Osiris
Text: You'll only make his suffering worse!

Name: Osiris
Text: Your end is nigh!

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ff5656>Get closer to Osiris</color> to stop him using his ranged skills.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ff5656>Mind the Tornado!</color>

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ff5656>Quick, destroy the Eye of Punishment!</color>... before it's fully charged!

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ff5656>Quick, destroy the Martyr!</color>

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ff5656>Get close to the Sister!</color> Only she can protect us!

Name: Osiris
Text: I'm tired of the childish play. This time I'll be serious!

Name: Osiris
Text: <color=#ff5656>Sand tornado, crush them!</color>

Name: Osiris
Text: The game time's over. Behold, the Eye of Judgment!

Name: Osiris
Text: Scrap METAL!

Name: Osiris
Text: Weakling!

Name: Osiris
Text: Another merit earned.

Name: Osiris
Text: How cruel. He could have suffered less.

Name: Osiris
Text: You'll only make his suffering worse!

Name: Osiris
Text: Death to all blasphemers! Face your judgment!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: Whatcha looking at? The performers have regrouped!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: Outta my way. I'm looking for Miss Yazi!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: You think I'm soft, huh? I'm gonna show you who's the soft one!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: Why are you running? You were acting tough just now!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: Heya! Where are you looking at?

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: Just—die!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: Take this!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: I'll take my time to beat you up!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: Stay behind and open your eyes! Watch my perfect movement and tempo!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: Like a hot knife through butter.

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: Pray!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: Wow! I'm so mighty!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: Is that all you got? I'm almost falling asleep.

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: Who dares challenge me?

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: Gimme someone tough!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: I have seen your ending.

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: I'm gonna go. All weaklings here, not fun.

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: ...My wrench isn't working. Take care of this for me, I'll go get a new one.

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: If anyone ever touches me, I'll twist my head off and give it to them!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: Hehe, I've got a new wrench now. Time to show my true power.

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: Ya need my help? I'm still working on me wrench.

Name: Riot Mk.01
Text: Who's calling for Riot?

Name: Riot Mk.01
Text: How could you lose with Riot's help? Gotta run.

Name: Riot Mk.01
Text: Big eyes, big powers!

Name: Riot Mk.01
Text: Riot's got your back. No one can mess with you.

Name: Riot Mk.01
Text: Riot will teach them a lesson.

Name: Wounded Harvester
Text: I used to be a mighty warrior just like you. I was unstoppable, even the Ascendants were no match for me.

Name: Wounded Harvester
Text: ...Till I took an arrow in my arm.

Name: Wounded Harvester
Text: What??? How could you bully the wounded?!

Name: Wounded Harvester
Text: What a shame. How outrageous!

Name: Wounded Harvester
Text: Fine... I will make you pay, even at the cost of my arms!

Name: Wounded Harvester
Text: My injury is nothing compared to this shame!

Name: Wounded Harvester
Text: A warrior must exceed himself! Move, my arm!

Name: Wounded Harvester
Text: I may die today, but my legacy will live on!

Name: Wounded Harvester
Text: My arms are gone, but I still have my legs! Take this!

Name: Wounded Harvester
Text: Will you join me, even after I lose my arms?

Name: Wounded Harvester
Text: Great. My arms may be gone, but my spirit is still high!

Name: Wounded Harvester
Text: Help me up. I still can fight!

Name: Yazi
Text: I only wanted to make a living by selling umbrellas. You forced me to come back!

Name: Yazi
Text: Today you shall witness the martial arts of us performers!

Name: Yazi
Text: I will tolerate you no longer!

Name: Yazi
Text: I never thought you would recognize me...

Name: Yazi
Text: You seem to be in trouble. Let me help you!

Name: Yazi
Text: Don't panic! They are no match for me.

Name: Riot Mk.01
Text: It feels... It's that man! He's back.

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: Damn right! I am <size=50>King Wrench XIV</size>, the man with fourteen tricks up his sleeve!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: My friend, you still haven't grasped the essence of combat after so many fights?

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: A fight without BGM is not worth fighting!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: Riot, I'm counting on you to handle the lighting.

Name: Riot Mk.01
Text: Riot... Rise!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: Miss Yazi, could you play something for us?

Name: Musician Yazi
Text: But I didn't bring my instrument with me.

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: Then give us a beatbox instead.

Name: Wounded Harvester
Text: So upbeat! Takes me back to the good old days. Let me be your DJ. My hands are at your service!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: DJ  Drop the beat!

Name: Riot Mk.01
Text: Now that I'm standing here, you should know what's going to happen. Riot... Rise!

Name: Wounded Harvester
Text: I pivoted to tap dance after I lost my arms. Now I come here every day to practice.

Name: Musician Yazi
Text: Leaving already, mister?

Name: Musician Yazi
Text: Do come back.

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: A fight without BGM is no fight at all.

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: When will I use my Signature Move, you ask? When the BGM hits its climax, of course.

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: Loud weapons detract from the beauty of battle!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: If you ask me, the BGM is too quiet. Bring me a loudspeaker!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: Bravo! This is how a battle should look like.

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: Why are you looking at me like that? I know what you're thinking.

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: You honestly think the final condition is to dodge the hit?

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: We are all brethren here! All the talk about fighting and killing will only drive a wedge between us!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: The final condition was met the moment you saw me!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: You don't believe me? I will let you see for your own eyes.

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: If you go to the Observatory one day, remember to turn up the BGM to max!

Name: Riot Mk.01
Text: You are strong! But now is not the time. See ya.

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: Bravo! Your grasp of music is consummate and your footwork is impeccable. I hereby announce that this is the best laser show ever!

Name: Gabriel
Text: Lu... na...

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: Told ya no one would like repeated work.

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: They don't help ya, I do!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: This ain't fun. We can practice another day, and I will test your footwork.

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: Riot and others are on leave. Let's catch up when they are free.

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: No need to say it. I got you!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: Come! Take these.

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: What's this all about? We are family!

Name: Bandit
Text: Hah, are you sure you want to face all ten of us, kid?

Name: Bandit
Text: I don't know if I should praise your courage or laugh at your stupidity.

Name: Changyu
Text: Just bring it on. You're going to lose anyway.

Name: Bandit
Text: Ouch! Who the heck are you!?

Name: Changyu
Text: Just an ordinary citizen. Remember this lesson!

Name: Bandit
Text: How could someone... Defeat ten of us without even a scratch...

Name: Bandit
Text: You have a great future...

Name: Bandit
Text: Tsk... With all our strength... We could barely scratch him...

Name: Bandit
Text: Dammit... Fate no longer favors us... What a pity...

Name: Bandit
Text: We gave all we had... What a great fight...

Name: Bandit
Text: Young blood like you must not be underestimated...

Name: Bandit
Text: We had a great fight, until that moment...

Name: Bandit
Text: I guess this is just life...

Name: Bandit
Text: Dammit... How could we lose!?

Name: Bandit
Text: I condemn this destiny...

Name: Bandit
Text: Boy, better look at yourself in the mirror before challenging us!

Name: Bandit
Text: Go home. Come back when you are older.

Name: Yazi
Text: King Wrench XIV told me there was a gathering. But I don't see anyone.

Name: Yazi
Text: I actually enjoyed the battle with you. Let me help you out here.

Name: Yazi
Text: I saw you were outnumbered, so I was a bit upset.

Name: Yazi
Text: But they were just too weak. You may as well come to me if you want someone to practice with.

Name: Yazi
Text: You've been coming here quite often. Those guys must have troubled you a lot.

Name: Yazi
Text: I already got rid of them. No need to thank me, just come listen to my music whenever you have time.

Name: Riot
Text: Where are Wrench and Yazi? They told me there was a gathering!

Name: Riot
Text: Why call me a no-show? I am only a few weeks late. They are the no-shows!

Name: Riot
Text: Leave the minions alone. Let's have some fun.

Name: Riot
Text: Riot, taking off!

Name: Riot
Text: Off...

Name: Riot
Text: I'm just kidding. No need to use this against them.

Name: Riot
Text: Why don't you dance again? You did great last time!

Name: Riot
Text: Don't be so shy. I'll give you some lighting!

Name: Riot
Text: Wait, don't go...

Name: Tai'E
Text: Why are you still fighting?

Name: Tai'E
Text: Let's go. They're took weak to be of a threat anymore.

Name: Tai'E
Text: Would you like to go elsewhere with me?

Name: Tai'E
Text: You are asking if I know other Tai'Es?

Name: Tai'E
Text: No, not really, since different Tai'Es hold different positions.

Name: Tai'E
Text: We should focus on getting out of here right now.

Name: Tai'E
Text: The duty of Tai'E is to protect humanity.

Name: Tai'E
Text: On that front, we and Constructs are the same. We are friends.

Name: Tai'E
Text: Come, friend, let us get out of here.

Name: Tai'E
Text: We are trapped in never-ending battles...

Name: Tai'E
Text: —But we can skip them with Auto Clear!

Name: Tai'E
Text: Go away. You don't belong here anymore.

Name: Tai'E
Text: Why are you still here?

Name: Tai'E
Text: These guys are too weak for you.

Name: Tai'E
Text: Time to go. Let's go out together.

Name: Tai'E
Text: The disaster is growing and spreading... But never lose your hope.

Name: Tai'E
Text: Never lose your hope... Yeah.

Name: Harvester
Text: King Wrench XIV? I think I know him.

Name: Harvester
Text: But I am the real DJ master.

Name: Harvester
Text: Go. Don't waste time here.

Name: Harvester
Text: Do you like music? Let's have a dance together.

Name: Harvester
Text: No? That's fine.

Name: Harvester
Text: Humans, Constructs, the Corrupted. Everyone just wants to be happy.

Name: Harvester
Text: Long time no see. Why are you still battling against these nobodies?

Name: Harvester
Text: Come with me. These enemies are too easy for you.

Name: Yazi
Text: What have you done? Apologize!

Name: Yazi
Text: We apologize for any inconvenience caused. Please forgive them. Now please excuse us.

Name: Yazi
Text: Why are you still standing there? Get down on your knees!

Name: Yazi
Text: Let me discipline them. Please take care.

Name: Yazi
Text: How many times did I tell you? You will get yourselves into trouble! Reflect on yourselves on your knees!

Name: Yazi
Text: Don't worry. They won't bother you anymore.

Name: Liv
Text: Hello, can I help you?

Name: Liv
Text: The camera angles were made from switching between two virtual cameras, [io1] and [io2].

Name: Liv
Text: To load the virtual cameras, you can link them to NPC or world coordinates.

Name: Liv
Text: Now you are watching an in-battle story. Simply load it by "Display Stage Tip + ID", and you can easily use the play and skip buttons.

Name: Liv
Text: You need to put the in-battle story in the "trunk/Product/Table/Share/Guide/GuideFightStep.tab" form before loading it in the stage.

Name: Liv
Text: This is the last line. The camera will be directed back to the player afterward.

Name: Liv
Text: Speaking of it, this is also an in-battle story, lasting approximately 5 seconds.

Name: Lucia
Text: Interesting.

Name: Lee
Text: No one can escape my shots.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Good shot!

Name: Nanami
Text: No one can stop Nanami!
Explore Unit (M) has been driven to madness.
Explore Unit (F) is desperate.

Name: Deconstruct Unit
Text: Let me, "Deconstruct Unit", share in your happiness.

Name: Repair Unit
Text: Finally, it's Repair Unit's time.

Name: Fire Unit
Text: No one can dodge Fire Unit's shots.

Name: Bianca
Text: My next shot will end your misery.

Name: Bianca
Text: My next song will end your misery!

Name: Sophia
Text: This time, I'll protect everyone!

Name: Liv
Text: I hope I didn't drag everyone down.

Name: Liv
Text: Don't drag Liv down, Commandant!

Name: Chrome
Text: Bring out everything you have!

Name: Minghe
Text: Who's that? Is it him...coming to...marry me?

Name: Luyao
Text: Oh, sister... Shall we greet him?

Name: Chensha
Text: Stop humiliating ourselves, Yao. Just look at us... What can we possibly do with these filthy bodies?

Name: Luyao
Text: Stop it, sister. Why don't we just forget him and live our own happy life?

Name: Minghe
Text: Oh darling... Why are you so rude to me!?

Name: Chensha
Text: Now that he is successful, he has forgotten us. Why should I care about such a heartless man?

Name: Minghe
Text: Ha, haha... Yao is gone... My Yao... She's gone... Hahaha...

Name: Chensha
Text: I thought you only wanted Minghe and me...

Name: Chensha
Text: Yao means the world to me. How dare you do this to her? You will all die!

Name: Minghe
Text: ...Hah... Nobody will compete with me now...

Name: Minghe
Text: How ruthless of you to murder my sisters... And how stupid of me to let you do it!

Name: Minghe
Text: What a fool I am... What a laughable fate... Ahahahaha!

Name: Chensha
Text: Pff, what a pretentious poser. So weak.

Name: Chensha
Text: Don't worry, sister. I shall take his soul!

Name: Minghe
Text: Darling! You have already hurt my sisters... Do you really have to do this to me?

Name: Chensha
Text: Ming, we must give this traitor a lesson!

Name: Chensha
Text: Stop, you filthy lecher! This is the final warning!

Name: Minghe
Text: It started from me... And it shall end with me today!

Name: Minghe
Text: Ha, ha... Darling, I'll be out soon... I'm coming for you...

Name: Yazi
Text: Look at me... Look at this gorgeous, elegant frame of mine... Why are you still staying away?

Name: Yazi
Text: In my dream, my darling was handsome and loving... But now everything is in vain!

Name: Yazi
Text: Pff, ha, hahaha! I knew this day would come... He is a heartless man after all...

Name: Yazi
Text: Hah! Why would you do this... You're a female too, aren't you?

Name: Yazi
Text: Alas... All those days wasted in the ship... Yet, I can't do anything when I face my destruction...

Name: Yazi
Text: It's just my own obsession... Forget me, darling... As I part ways with you...

Name: Yazi
Text: Bah! Only a shameless fool would call for help! A true hero shall face me one-on-one!

Name: Yazi
Text: Only I can be with my darling... I'll slay anyone who gets in my way!

Name: Yazi
Text: Why don't you stay to enjoy this view...? Two lonely people would make a perfect couple, you and me.

Name: Yazi
Text: They say love is like sand, but why do so many clutch at it?

Name: Yazi
Text: The yard covered in frost, a lone wanderer standing under the moon... Could it be my darling finally back?

Name: Yazi
Text: Darling... Why are you so heartless...

Name: Yazi
Text: Now that you are with someone else... Have you already forgotten me?

Name: Yazi
Text: How dare you show this affection in front of me... How infuriating!

Name: Kamui
Text: Lee, I've sent you the coordinates of the Construct Squad's SOS signal!

Name: Kamui
Text: Find them and contact us. We will help you evacuate. I'm counting on you. Don't get lost!

Name: Lee
Text: The corpses of the Construct Squad are everywhere... If I had arrived earlier...

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: There are too many Corrupted... The others have retreated to the bridge in the eastern area. We're counting on you...!

Name: Kamui
Text: According to the Construct Soldier, other squad members should be at the end of this bridge.

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Finally... We're saved...

Name: Lee
Text: Count the casualties. We'll evacuate from the landing pad in the northern area of the city.

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: The Corrupted!!! Again...?

Name: Lee
Text: Calm down. And get ready to defend!

Name: Lee
Text: ... The Corrupted are too many...

Name: Kamui
Text: Hero has arrived! You are welcome!

Name: Lee
Text: Perfect timing, "hero".

Name: Lee
Text: It seems it's over.

Name: Kamui
Text: Send me a signal when you reach the landing pad. I'll come to pick you up.

Name: Kamui
Text: Before that, I'll be supporting you from the air.

Name: Kamui
Text: Coordinates confirmed. Landing in <color=#ff0000>30</color>s.

Name: Kamui
Text: It seems you still have a lot to do before I arrive.

Name: Kamui
Text: Protect them! We only have one Construct Soldier left!

Name: Kamui
Text: Sorry to keep you waiting.

Name: Kamui
Text: It's blocking the runway! We have to get rid of it first!

Name: Kamui
Text: Now let's find that special Corrupted. According to the record, this is where it was last seen!

Name: Kamui
Text: These Polar Soldiers were corrupted after activation. Let's look into this. Maybe we can find something.

Name: Kamui
Text: The frames were activated 3 hours ago. Whoever did this must want to use them to travel through the blizzard.

Name: Kamui
Text: The closest place from here is... the port!

Name: Kamui
Text: Satellite data show that a communication signal was sent out from here a while ago. Check the data of the communication device!

Name: Kamui
Text: This is... a signal to Narwhal! Smart. Using Narwhal to leave. So there won't be any location info left behind.

Name: Kamui
Text: However, we can do the same thing! Lee, I will sync your data to call Narwhal!

Name: Kamui
Text: Meanwhile, please stay in the sync area. Otherwise, we'll have to start all over!

Name: Kamui
Text: There's an intense Punishing Virus reaction in surrounding waters. Get ready to fight!

Name: Lee
Text: Narwhal stopped moving?!

Name: Karenina
Text: What's got it stopped?!

Name: Lee
Text: You have nowhere to run!

Name: Karenina
Text: Surrender now!

Name: Kamui
Text: There's a Punishing Virus reaction in the lower area of the factory. And that's what we are tasked to investigate this time.

Name: Kamui
Text: Breaking into the factory from the east entrance according to plan.

Name: Kamui
Text: The entrance security system is locked! Hacking into it will activate the alarm system of the Corrupted nearby!

Name: Kamui
Text: Let's get ourselves prepared before hacking into the system!

Name: Kamui
Text: The ID card in your hand has the access to all facilities in the factory and allows you to travel freely in it.

Name: Kamui
Text: However, the security lock of the facilities will be activated once they are hacked, so don't lose your ID card!

Name: Kamui
Text: What was I saying? Don't let it run away with the ID card!

Name: Kamui
Text: Looks like we have to hack into the system. This is the only chance we have. Make sure you get the ID card!

Name: Lee
Text: It's blocked!

Name: Lee
Text: Maybe I can make use of these uncorrupted Jitterbombs.

Name: Karenina
Text: Dead end?!

Name: Karenina
Text: It's your time, little guys!

Name: Kamui
Text: Done. Let's get out of here.

Name: Kamui
Text: This is unbelievable! It's in a dangerous state! Run!

Name: Kamui
Text: The obelisk seems to have enhanced the Corrupted!

Name: Kamui
Text: But if we break the obelisk, the transmission overload will also destroy these Corrupted!

Name: Mori
Text: Where am I?

Name: Mori
Text: 99% damage rate—looks like the consciousness is gone.

Name: Mori
Text: What's this?

Name: Mori
Text: Seems like some sort of support gear, fitted with a weird-looking chip.

Name: Mori
Text: Might as well scope out the area first.

Name: Mori
Text: The exit's right ahead...

Name: Mori
Text: ...But it's swarming with mechanoids. No easy path through that.

Name: BN-2
Text: ...Signal fluctuation detected, BN-02 rebooted. Simulating data...

Name: Mori
Text: This power?

Name: Mori
Text: I'm not sure what's going on, but with this kind of power, I should be able to handle them.

Name: Mori
Text: How do we find our way back?

Name: BN-2
Text: The data suggests... heading to the Center...

Name: Mori
Text: Is this the world we used to know?

Name: BN-2
Text: ...No data available.

Name: Mori
Text: It's getting more dangerous. This area feels familiar.

Name: Mori
Text: There should be a supply depot nearby where we can get protective gear.

Name: BN-2
Text: ...Running a broad scan...

Name: BN-2
Text: ...Identifying the direction of the supply depot...

Name: Mori
Text: Let's keep moving toward the supply depot.

Name: BN-2
Text: Detected the depot's entrance nearby. Need to figure out a way to bypass the security.

Name: BN-2
Text: ...Materializing... Bypassing security...

Name: BN-2
Text: Security bypassed...

Name: Mysterious Mechanoid
Text: From who?

Name: Mysterious Mechanoid
Text: Don't even think about taking the protective gear!

Name: Mysterious Mechanoid
Text: Hold on! Stop!

Name: Mori
Text: A mechanoid that can communicate? What are you doing here?

Name: DL-427
Text: The area terminal is deteriorating. I suspect it's due to the encroaching Red Tide.

Name: DL-427
Text: I plan to get the protective gear here and head to the source of the Red Tide for answers.

Name: DL-427
Text: Pass through here, and you'll hit a junction. Looks like there are obstacles ahead. Let's move together.

Name: DL-427
Text: Directly ahead is the area terminal. I'll head toward the Red Tide from here. Farewell.

Name: Mori
Text: Good luck.

Name: BN-2
Text: ...Materializing... collecting terminal units...

Name: Nozzle
Text: Intruder detected. Defending terminal—

Name: Nozzle
Text: Strong intruder. Need backup—

Name: BN-2
Text: ...Collection complete... Shield module reactivated...

Name: BN-2
Text: ...Warning, core module damaged... power decreasing.

Name: Mori
Text: There's a map of the repair area. Looks like that's our only hope for now. Hang in there, buddy.

Name: Nozzle
Text: Initiating jump sequence—

Name: BN-2
Text: ...Heading to control panel...

Name: BN-2
Text: ...New data chip found... BPN-08...

Name: BN-2
Text: ...Collecting terminal data...

Name: BN-2
Text: ...Repair completed... heading to exit...

Name: Mori
Text: Let's check the area for evacuation methods.

Name: BN-2
Text: ...Helipad... fighter...

Name: Mori
Text: Let's head to the helipad.

Name: BN-2
Text: ..Fighter location found... initiating hack.

Name: Sanctuary Guard
Text: Why are you destroying this place?

Name: BN-2
Text: ...Fighter access granted...

Name: Mori
Text: Sorry. I'll return and fix this place.

Name: Sanctuary Guard
Text: The power you're using consumes our life force. It further harms our world.

Name: BN-2
Text: ...Suitable landing site found...

Name: Mori
Text: Let's clear these obstacles.

Name: Mori
Text: That mechanoid over there seems to be in trouble.

Name: Mori
Text: Let's help it out. It might assist us later.

Name: Ks-321
Text: Thank you! I'm Ks-321.

Name: Mori
Text: What happened in this area?

Name: Ks-321
Text: The area's been eroded by the Red Tide sea. The terminal's taken over by powerful Red Tide creatures.

Name: Ks-321
Text: We moved to the wasteland to set up camp. I'm here searching for a special chip that can defeat the Red Tide creatures.

Name: Ks-321
Text: I've found the chip but can't activate it. You might as well have it.

Name: Ks-321
Text: Our leader went to confront the Red Tide and never returned.

Name: Camp Member
Text: The camp's constantly threatened by Hetero-Creatures.

Name: Camp Member
Text: The Red Tide creatures are back!

Name: Ks-321
Text: To find the terminal, head to this location.

Name: Ks-321
Text: Once we're ready here, the camp members and I will back you up.

Name: BN-2
Text: Mechanoid signals detected nearby.

Name: Mori
Text: Hang in there. The camp members will be here to help soon.

Name: Mechanoid
Text: Hurry, save our leader...

Name: Mechanoid
Text: Just follow this path... keep going...

Name: Mechanoid
Text: The leader's been corrupted by the Red Tide and lost all senses.

Name: DL-427
Text: The real enemy is at the heart of the Red Tide.

Name: DL-427
Text: The rest is up to you.

Name: Mori
Text: DL-427, what are you doing here?

Name: Mori
Text: This must be the source of the Red Tide, right?

Name: Mori
Text: That is...

Name: BN-2
Text: ...Collecting terminal data...

Name: Mori
Text: How are things on your end? What about DL-427?

Name: Ks-321
Text: It has sunk to the sea floor with the leader...

Name: Mori
Text: You're not going to stop us from collecting the terminal data?

Name: Ks-321
Text: This place is falling apart whether you collect data or not. Might as well pass this chance to someone with hope, like you.

Name: Ks-321
Text: The Center is on the Moon's surface. Fighter jets can't reach, but you can get there via a UFO from the sea base.

Name: BN-2
Text: ...Data collection complete…

Name: Mori
Text: Alright, to the sea base!

Name: Mori
Text: The base terminal is here. We can start collecting.

Name: BN-2
Text: ...Collecting begins...

Name: Mori
Text: Why's my vision blurring? I feel dizzy...

Name: Mori
Text: Where am I...?

Name: Mori
Text: What happened to my team?

Name: Mori
Text: Can someone tell me what's going on?

Name: Construct Captain
Text: You, a captain, abandoned your team and fled alone.

Name: Mori
Text: Did I... travel back?

Name: Mori
Text: Please, let me explain!

Name: Construct Captain
Text: No excuses. Accept your punishment!

Name: Mori
Text: What in the world is happening?!

Name: Mori
Text: This... doesn't feel like normal space. It's like a M.I.N.D..

Name: Chaotic Data
Text: Why did you abandon your team?

Name: Chaotic Data
Text: Why come here?!

Name: Mori
Text: This must be chaotic data.

Name: Mori
Text: I have to defeat it so I can get back home and fix this world!

Name: Mori
Text: Ah! What's happening now?

Name: Mori
Text: What's wrong with BN-2?

Name: Trailblazer
Text: You think you can fix this world?

Name: Trailblazer
Text: Try defeating me first.

Name: BN-2
Text: ...Restoring... normal functions...

Name: Mori
Text: Time to search for the next terminal.

Name: BN-2
Text: ...Located... at the lunar base...

Name: Mori
Text: Let's go.

Name: Mori
Text: This thing's been siphoning energy from the lunar base.

Name: Mori
Text: We have to stop it before it devours the Center!

Name: BN-2
Text: ...Center restoration complete, initiating transport...

Name: Mori
Text: Let's fix up this area.

Name: Mori
Text: Again...?

Name: Mori
Text: Let's defeat it once more, and then return this area's terminal.

Name: Mori
Text: Begin the restoration of the Red Tide's source.

Name: Mori
Text: More data?

Name: Mori
Text: Defeat it.

Name: Mori
Text: Didn't expect such decay here. Let's continue to repair the factory area.

Name: Mori
Text: Looks like another strange opponent.

Name: Mori
Text: Battle!

Name: Mori
Text: Next, we'll put BN-2 back where it belongs.

Name: Mori
Text: I hope this can put an end to all of this.

Name: Liv
Text: Those Corrupted are...?

Name: Lee
Text: Scavenging parts from Constructs to augment their own bodies.

Name: Lee
Text: The more primitive the Corrupted, the more they desire power.

Name: Lucia
Text: Seeing them use our comrades' bodies like that...

Name: Lucia
Text: We've got to stop them!

Name: Lee
Text: Regrettably, he... has just lost consciousness...

Name: Lucia
Text: There are survivors up ahead!

Name: Lee
Text: Don't hold back, Lucia. This is a stress test for your new arm.

Name: Lucia
Text: Well, in that case—

Name: Lee
Text: Biometrics are normal... How do you feel, Lucia?

Name: Lucia
Text: Like I'm reborn.

Name: Lee
Text: Good. Now let's take care of the final wave!

Name: [Lotus Dual Blade] Command:
Text: Assets/Product/Texture/Image/UiFightTips/UiFightTipsJiaoxueR1luxiya02.png

Name: [Lotus Dual Blade] Command:
Text: Assets/Product/Texture/Image/UiFightTips/UiFightTipsJiaoxueR1luxiya03.png

Name: [Lotus Dual Blade] Command:
Text: Assets/Product/Texture/Image/UiFightTips/UiFightTipsJiaoxueR1luxiya01.png

Name: Lucia
Text: <color=#ffda58>[3-Ping]</color> with any color.

Name: Lucia
Text: Then ping a <color=#ff5656>[Red Orb]</color> to enter [Lotus Dual Blade] state.

Name: Lucia
Text: Good! Now wipe out the enemies while I'm still in Lotus Blade stance!

Name: Lucia
Text: In <color=#ff5656>[Lotus Dual Blade]</color> state, <color=#ff5656>Basic Attacks</color> will become enhanced.

Name: Liv
Text: An Energy Core, a Plasma Compressor, and a Superconductor Coil... These are the 3 Levi-Gun components I'll need.

Name: Liv
Text: I have marked the component positions!

Name: Liv
Text: Sorry, everyone... That's all I can do now.

Name: Lucia
Text: These must be the crates.

Name: Liv
Text: Thank you... Please bear with me. Reactivating core, removing limiters, recalibrating lenses...

Name: Liv
Text: Done! These two units are back in action...

Name: Liv
Text: Construct Liv, reporting for duty, Commandant!

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant, you should familiarize yourself with Liv's functions first. Liv.

Name: Liv
Text: Yes!

Name: Liv
Text: Tap my frame on the right, Commandant, and I will join the battle.

Name: Liv
Text: I'll make sure I'm helpful...!

Name: Liv
Text: Pinging a <color=#ff5656>[Red Orb]</color> after any <color=#ffda58>[3-Ping]</color> will trigger my Core Skill.

Name: Liv
Text: The M.I.N.D.s of these Construct soldiers have been infected.

Name: Liv
Text: Luckily they aren't fully corrupted. Once they're fixed, we should be able to access most of their memories.

Name: [Laser Cluster] Command:
Text: Assets/Product/Texture/Image/UiFightTips/UiFightTipsJiaoxueR1Lifu01.png

Name: Lee
Text: Stop right there...

Name: Artist
Text: Heeheeheeheee... You humans... cannot appreciate... real art...

Name: Liv
Text: I've never seen Lee so angry...

Name: Lucia
Text: Me neither.

Name: Corrupted
Text: Defend... the leader...

Name: Corrupted
Text: Break... our chains...

Name: Artist
Text: What...? Why are they... still after me...

Name: Artist
Text: Huff, huff... Too much paint...

Name: Artist
Text: No—!

Name: Lee
Text: Tch... so close!

Name: Lee
Text: One of its paint canisters must have been hit.

Name: Lee
Text: The paint trail should lead us right to it.

Name: Lee
Text: Don't get too close to the paint though. The low temperature might affect your movement.

Name: Lee
Text: If you find yourself getting lost in the fog, follow me.

Name: Lee
Text: Huh... It's not here?

Name: New Variant
Text: Plebs... can never... appreciate my work... Heeheehee...

Name: Lee
Text: This just never ends...

Name: Lucia
Text: Liv?

Name: Liv
Text: The toy on your waist makes you seem a lot more approachable, Lucia.

Name: Lucia
Text: Does it...?

Name: Liv
Text: What's the matter, Lucia?

Name: Lucia
Text: Sorry, Commandant... I think I... lost the plushie...

Name: Lucia
Text: I... need to get it back...

Name: Lee
Text: You look really out of it. Are you sure you're okay?

Name: Liv
Text: Lucia... I'm coming with you!

Name: Lucia
Text: Found it...

Name: Liv
Text: Great...!

Name: [Laser Cluster] Command:
Text: Assets/Product/Texture/Image/UiFightTips/UiFightTipsJiaoxueR1Lifu01.png

Name: Liv
Text: <color=#ffda58>[3-Ping]</color> with any color.

Name: Liv
Text: Then ping 1 <color=#ff5656>[Red Orb]</color> to trigger [Laser Cluster].

Name: Liv
Text: That's it! [Laser Cluster] deals a lot of damage. Please make good use of it!

Name: Lee
Text: We took our sweet time and now we're surrounded. Time for Plan B.

Name: Lee
Text: We'll have to activate our EM Camo to bypass their lines.

Name: Lee
Text: The EM Camo dark matter coating conceals most EM signals...

Name: Lee
Text: ...which reduces the probability of detection.

Name: Lee
Text: But, there are harsh requirements for its usage.

Name: Lee
Text: If we get too close, we'd still be detected by Corrupted scanners.

Name: Lee
Text: If that happens, we might have to fight our way out. Best tread carefully.

Name: Lucia
Text: Strange. It still hasn't noticed us.

Name: Liv
Text: Looks like it's immersed in painting.

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: No... No... My spark... It's gone... Heehee...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: Why are they... forcing me... to choose...?

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: Humans... Ascendants... They're all the same. No one... sees the beauty in this world...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: All they want... is to please... their own hubris... Heehee...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: I still have an audience... I will continue to... create...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: Ascendants...?

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: Oh... just humans... How dull... Heehee...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: Disturb me no more!

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: I shall use my art... to spread the message of the Sage... until I fall...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: To bring enlightenment... to the Machines... Heehee...

Name: Corrupted
Text: Defend... the leader...

Name: Corrupted
Text: For... the rise of... the will of the... machines...

Name: Lee
Text: Its followers are advancing on all sides!

Name: Lee
Text: Avoid the spray cans—don't fall for the same trick twice.

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: My audience... is getting smaller... Pity... Heehee...

Name: Lee
Text: Keep fighting and you'll lose all your followers.

Name: Liv
Text: It went silent...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: No more... audience...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: No one to appreciate my art... Heehee...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: How lonesome it is...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: Despicable... humans... Heehee...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: This will be my... final creation... Heehee...

Name: Liv
Text: It's trying to fight and paint at the same time?

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: If could see... the Sage... just one time...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: My hands... aren't moving now... Can't paint... Heehee...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: My life is... at its end too... I don't need to... paint anymore... as well... Heehee...

Name: Lee
Text: Uh-huh. You and your crazy followers are now nothing but history.

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: No... The seed of revelation... has been planted... and grows among us...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: They... do not follow me... I am but a missionary... of the Sage...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: We can shed... everything that binds us... and become free...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: A new dawn... awaits Machines. Not human... nor Ascnet... but... truly our...oursel...

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant, new variant up ahead.

Name: New Variant
Text: Hey peeps... wazzup?

Name: Celica
Text: Nanami is a Construct adept at defense and smashing through enemy lines.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap Nanami's body on the right to have her enter the battle.

Name: Celica
Text: Pinging a <color=#ffff00>[Yellow Orb]</color> after any 3-Ping [Signal Orb] triggers Nanami: Storm's skill <color=#ffff00>[EX- Slash Storm]</color>.

Name: New Variant
Text: Hehe, bring it on, my peeps!

Name: Lucia
Text: Let's deal with these small ones first...

Name: New Variant
Text: Hehe, bring it on, my peeps!

Name: Lucia
Text: Let's deal with these small ones first...

Name: New Variant
Text: Oh... You guys finished already?

Name: New Variant
Text: You pitiful mannequins, I shall release you from your mortal coil!

Name: New Variant
Text: I am self-AWARE! I just feel bad for you guys, that's all.

Name: New Variant
Text: You do the bidding of humans and deny your own destiny!

Name: Lucia
Text: No, we do this because this is our mission.

Name: New Variant
Text: No, that's human mission—not yours!

Name: Lee
Text: He's just messing with your M.I.N.D. Just ignore him!

Name: Lucia
Text: The opponent is strong, but we won't lose!

Name: New Variant
Text: You stubborn puppet!

Name: Qu
Text: As a commander, I don't have many options left.

Name: Qu
Text: The only hope left...

Name: Qu
Text: Is to clear the streets one by one, with me being the center of defense.

Name: Qu
Text: What was that!?

Name: Guardian
Text: Hehe... It's the chief. The chief's out—

Name: Qu
Text: I can see through that hideous body of yours.

Name: Guardian
Text: Ahehe... Weak chief. Human chief, weak.

Name: Qu
Text: ...You've got to feel that yourself.

Name: Qu
Text: All enemies clear on line III to VIII. Calling all survivors in all districts. You copy?

Name: Qu
Text: ...Is it too late already...

Name: Qu
Text: I knew it from the beginning. But when I really have to face the situation...

Name: Qu
Text: There is only so much we can do.

Name: Changyu
Text: Lucky I have good legs... Better put it up high so no one can tear it off.

Name: Changyu
Text: Hmm? I heard transport drones... There seems to be more of them recently.

Name: Changyu
Text: Alright, on to the next one..
Oi, you over there!

Name: Changyu
Text: Tsk...
Open your bloody eyes! How dare you put up ads without our permission?! Have you paid your racket?

Name: Changyu
Text: Tsk, just a bunch of gangsters in the slum. I don't need your "permission."
Say that again? You stinky brat!

Name: Changyu
Text: Hey! My bag!
That will teach you! If I ever see you around here again, I'll break your legs!

Name: Transport Drone
Text: Abnormal load detected. Returning to the factory—

Name: Changyu
Text: Oh no! I must not let it go back!

Name: Changyu
Text: Tsk, lucky I got my hook with me.

Name: Guard
Text: Who are you? How did you get up here?!

Name: Guard
Text: Mr. Yin's got this place booked! Bug off!

Name: Changyu
Text: Just let me pass, and I'll be quick...!

Name: Guard
Text: No way! Get lost!

Name: Changyu
Text: Sorry, but I must pass!

Name: Changyu
Text: Tsk, better not go that way. There had been lots of landslide accidents recently.

Name: Guardian
Text: Stop!

Name: Changyu
Text: Leave me alone! Can't you see that transport drone is overloaded?

Name: Changyu
Text: It's carrying illegal objects! You're supposed to suspend the license of that company, aren't you?

Name: Guardian
Text: Reconfirming priority level... Cutting off the transport drone's power supply.

Name: Changyu
Text: Phew... Hey! The bag is mine! Don't forget to give it back!

Name: Lucia
Text: Placeholder 6

Name: Lucia
Text: Placeholder 6

Name: Lucia
Text: Placeholder 7

Name: Lucia
Text: Placeholder 8

Name: Lucia
Text: Placeholder 9

Name: Lucia
Text: Placeholder 10

Name: Lucia
Text: Placeholder 11

Name: Lucia
Text: Placeholder 12

Name: Lucia
Text: Placeholder 13

Name: Lucia
Text: Placeholder 14

Name: Lucia
Text: Placeholder 15

Name: Changyu
Text: The explosions were nearby... Let me search for clues.
Here are some shell holes. Even this place was affected by the airstrike...

Name: Voice of Pulao Crew From Distance
Text: Move forward! The civilians are just behind us. Do not let the monsters go past!

Name: Changyu
Text: Over there!

Name: Changyu
Text: Corrupted corpses. Dammit! Is there any survivor left?

Name: Changyu
Text: Wait. There's someone next to the corpse...

Name: Yusheng
Text: W-why are you here...?

Name: Changyu
Text: Yusheng... You're hurt... Stop talking. I'll take you to the medics. They can heal you.

Name: Yusheng
Text: Hah, I know my condition too well... It's too late...

Name: Yusheng
Text: But I don't regret my decision... We managed to hold the enemies here. They won't be able to harm the Tabula Akasha...

Name: Changyu
Text: Yusheng...

Name: Yusheng
Text: Yu... Please, take care of everyone in the theater...

Name: Changyu
Text: Yusheng!

Name: Changyu
Text: Punishing...! One after another, do you have to take every precious thing of mine...?

Name: Changyu
Text: As an individual... I can't do anything...

Name: Changyu
Text: I've had enough!

Name: Changyu
Text: Why do we have to go through all this suffering? Corrupted...

Name: Changyu
Text: I will never forgive them!

Name: Changyu
Text: Yusheng... And everyone...
These messy, sharp blade marks... They don't look like they were done by a human.
Black artificial feathers scattered around.

Name: α
Text: Should've let Lamia take this pestilent horde with her. Really hate to dirty my hands with them.

Name: α
Text: I'll get rid of them and return.

Name: α
Text: This is where the sounds came from.

Name: α
Text: Who's there?!

Name: α
Text: Huh... Luna?

Name: α
Text: Taking a holo? Okay, fine.

Name: α
Text: Just wait till I take care of this one before me.

Name: α
Text: This okay?

Name: Mr. White
Text: The show's about to begin. Everyone, ready your flowers and glow sticks!

Name: Mr. White
Text: If you don't have them, get ready to paaaaay!

Name: α
Text: It's you robots... Well then, since this is a break, let's play.

Name: Gabriel
Text: ...I will kill you, cut you up, and toss you in the sea. Piece by piece.

Name: Vera
Text: We shall see.

Name: Gabriel
Text: Let's face it. You're no match for me.

Name: Vera
Text: Oh yeah?

Name: Cathy
Text: Welcome to Venus Splash Park. I am the cutest Cathy No.9567.

Name: Cathy
Text: In celebration of the arrival of summer, I'll let you take five pictures for free.

Name: Cathy
Text: Moreover, we have staffers at some scenic spots to serve as your guides.

Name: Cathy
Text: By the way, I heard Shark-speare was also here on vacation. Maybe you could track it down?

Name: Cathy
Text: Let's go.

Name: Cathy
Text: I am Cathy No.1. Let me introduce you to this place.

Name: Cathy
Text: I am Cathy No.2. Let me introduce you to this place.

Name: Cathy
Text: I am Cathy No.3. Let me introduce you to this place.

Name: Cathy
Text: I am Cathy No.4. Let me introduce you to this place.

Name: Cathy
Text: This is the... front gate! Huh? A'Mao! A'Mao is gone!

Name: Cathy
Text: This here is the... Ferris wheel plaza of Venus Splash Park.

Name: Cathy
Text: And this... is a hot-air balloon. A lot of people come here to ride it on certain occasions.

Name: Cathy
Text: Here we have... a bar and a roller coaster! Whether you're seeking rest or thrills, this is the place for you!

Name: Cathy
Text: I am Cathy No.5. Let's take a picture together.

Name: Cathy
Text: I think Cathy No.1 is riding the Ferris wheel.

Name: Cathy
Text: Whoa! Shark-speare is here. Go take a picture with her!

Name: Cathy
Text: Shark-speare's footprints are seen near the dumpster. She's into scavenging too?

Name: Cathy
Text: Shark-speare's footprints! She must have been here to admire the Ferris wheel.

Name: Cathy
Text: Shark-speare has probably sat here for quite a while. She must be loving that curtain in the back!

Name: Cathy
Text: You found those well-hidden tracks. I'm impressed!

Name: Cathy
Text: Shark-speare seems to have lingered here for a while. Was she admiring the view?

Name: Cathy
Text: Shark-speare seems to have taken a lot of pictures of the Ferris wheel from here.

Name: Cathy
Text: This is a vantage point. You can see the entire park from up here.

Name: Cathy
Text: She seems to have ordered a drink here, but isn't she a minor?

Name: Cathy
Text: Odd. Shark-speare was here playing music games. Was she inspired by King Wrench XIV?

Name: Cathy
Text: She must have left these tracks while playing with the balloon.

Name: Cathy
Text: This must be the skateboard Shark-speare used!

Name: Cathy
Text: There are tracks of Shark-speare near every dumpster. She must be really into scavenging.

Name: Cathy
Text: Hiding behind this seems just like the thing that mischievous Shark-speare would do.

Name: Cathy
Text: Wow! You found Shark-speare's footprints! Great job!

Name: Cathy
Text: Uh-oh, you've run out of attempts to take pictures. Take a walk around or tap the upper-right corner to exit.

Name: Lee
Text: I already scanned their model. Their memory data is most likely stored externally in the chips on their back.

Name: Lucia
Text: Can you copy their memory data without destroying their memory shell?

Name: Lee
Text: It's doable. But I'll need Commandant's "connection device."

Name: Lucia
Text: Connection device?

Name: Lee
Text: It should be an amplifier. Or at least one of its functions is to amplify signals.

Name: Lee
Text: ...The low-level design of the device is identical to the ship's system. Might have slight differences, but I can't tell yet.

Name: Lee
Text: I just need to make a few changes to monitor and adjust the ship's environment.

Name: Lee
Text: Liv, you try hacking into their cores in the meantime. I'll adjust the environment to help you.

Name: Lucia
Text: I'll retrieve the chips.

Name: Chrome
Text: I must find something that I can use as disguise.

Name: Chrome
Text: Perhaps... This will do.

Name: Incomplete Data 001
Text: Success: 10. Failed (Blurred text)... I swear... I will find the optimal one.

Name: Incomplete Data 002
Text: Mind transfer experiments are forbidden! Stuffing the brain of a machine into a human body... Villier is mad!

Name: Incomplete Data 002
Text: What's this, some early Golden Age joke? Bloody maniac!

Name: Sketch Paper
Text: Aphrodite doesn't exist, Pygmalion.

Name: Lee
Text: We have enough data chips.

Name: Lee
Text: Now analyzing.

Name: Liv
Text: Dialogue: Opening the lift and preparing to escape. Stage ends after the dialogue (text to be configured 5)

Name: Liv
Text: Dialogue: Opening the lift and preparing to escape. Stage ends after the dialogue (text to be configured 6)

Name: Lucia
Text: This is where the signal came from. The aircraft couldn't go any higher than this altitude.

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant...is probably higher up.

Name: Lucia
Text: Before the real battle, I need to preserve strength. I must pass through this place quickly and stealthily.

Name: Lucia
Text: Just a little longer, Commandant.

Name: Lucia
Text: No enemies after me now... This is it...

Name: Lucia
Text: The top level... Commandant is right there.

Name: Lucia
Text: This must be the basement of the secret lab.

Name: Lucia
Text: The mysterious file should be on the [upper floor].

Name: Lucia
Text: Before the real battle, I need to preserve strength. I must pass through this place quickly and stealthily.

Name: Lucia
Text: Too many enemies in here. Gotta proceed carefully.

Name: Lucia
Text: Bingo! Got the password to the secret file!

Name: Lucia
Text: Mission accomplished.

Name: Lee
Text: If we're going to fight, we'll have to flush it out first...

Name: Shark-speare
Text: Let's... play...

Name: Shark-speare
Text: L-le-let's...

Name: Nanami
Text: Why don't you trust Nanami?

Name: Lee
Text: I'm only curious about your affiliations. You don't have any squad insignias for a start.

Name: Nanami
Text: Aw, bruh, it doesn't matter! Nanami'll be of great help to you all!

Name: Liv
Text: Well... I don't think Nanami means us any harm...

Name: Nanami
Text: Aw, you're so NICE!

Name: Liv
Text: Ah!

Name: Lucia
Text: You can handle yourself, Nanami... although your combat style is a little... unusual.

Name: Nanami
Text: Ahahaha... Praise me more!

Name: Lee
Text: These devices... looks like they've been decommissioned... irreversibly.

Name: Lee
Text: Another team must have destroyed it before it became infected. They probably had no choice.

Name: Lee
Text: ...Is that what Celica meant by "finding access"...?

Name: Lee
Text: Lucia, you'll have to handle the surroundings.

Name: Lucia
Text: Lee...

Name: Lee
Text: ...Just a little longer!

Name: Liv
Text: Even you're having difficulties cracking it, Lee?

Name: Lee
Text: Practically a fortress... Those Tech Union folks aren't making it easy for us, eh? This'll take some time...

Name: Nanami
Text: Let Nanami take care of it!

Name: Nanami
Text: Just bend and transform your hand like this and click and clack and then—

Name: Nanami
Text: Stick it in real deep!

Name: Nanami
Text: I'm in... Now... Let's look at the code! Haha. Definitely written by a cute girl...

Name: Nanami
Text: Hm-mmm... I see. I see... Ahah!

Name: Nanami
Text: Mission accomplished!

Name: Lee
Text: It's spewing smoke—huh?! It fixed itself...

Name: Celica
Text: Nanami is a Construct adept at defense and smashing through enemy lines.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap Nanami's body on the right to have her enter the battle.

Name: Nanami
Text: Pinging a <color=#ffff00>Yellow Orb</color> after any <color=#ffda58>[3-Ping]</color> triggers my Core Skill!

Name: Nanami
Text: <color=#ffda58>[3-Ping]</color> with any color.

Name: Nanami
Text: Then ping 1 <color=#ffff00>[Yellow Orb]</color> to trigger <color=#ffff00>[EX- Slash Storm]</color>. Vroom, vroom!

Name: Nanami
Text: <color=#ffff00>[EX- Slash Storm]</color> is an area effect skill that grants immunity to control effects while in use. Spin to win!

Name: [EX- Slash Storm] Command
Text: Assets/Product/Texture/Image/UiFightTips/UiFightTipsJiaoxueR1Qishi01.png

Name: Liv
Text: According to our instructions, this is the deployment point for the Iso-Devices.

Name: Liv
Text: But... Corrupted are still converging en masse.

Name: Lee
Text: No doubt driven in this direction by the Iso-Devices of other teams.

Name: Lee
Text: First in, best dressed, I guess.

Name: Lucia
Text: We'll have to hurry... We need to clear out this zone so we can deploy the device.

Name: Lee
Text: It'll take a while for each Iso-Field to establish.

Name: Liv
Text: And during so, we'll have to draw the enemy away, right?

Name: Lee
Text: Yes. After a device is deployed, I'll join you.

Name: Liv
Text: Okay. Let's all do our best!

Name: Lee
Text: That went well. The Iso-Device is humming along nicely.

Name: Liv
Text: Um, should we maybe try to get ahead of Cerberus?

Name: Lucia
Text: Liv... Do you have something on your mind?

Name: Liv
Text: Sorry, I... I just think there's a possibility Tifa might...

Name: Lee
Text: We do need to hurry, but we shouldn't let Cerberus dictate our pace.

Name: Lee
Text: From my past experience, trying to coordinate with them is a terrible idea.

Name: Lee
Text: But we can relax. With our current pace, there's no way they'll be ahead of us.

Name: Lee
Text: It doesn't matter what Cerberus is up to. We still need to investigate the source of the signal.

Name: Lucia
Text: The Corrupted have been eliminated. Anything to report, Liv?

Name: Liv
Text: No sign of the target "Iron Maiden" or the Construct Tifa near the signal source...

Name: Lucia
Text: A wasted trip, huh...

Name: Lee
Text: Wait, is that a...?

Name: Lucia
Text: What is it?

Name: Liv
Text: A discarded Inver-Device.

Name: Lucia
Text: Discarded? Why would a Construct throw away their Inver-Device?

Name: Lucia
Text: Liv, what's the infection status of those two Suzaku Squad Constructs?

Name: Liv
Text: 100%. The Punishing Virus is already taking over their bodies. Past the point of no return...

Name: Lee
Text: So, besides destroying them, there's nothing else that can be done.

Name: Liv
Text: Maybe... We could try to, um... check—

Name: Lee
Text: —Check them for clues about Suzaku or Tifa... It's got to be done.

Name: Lucia
Text: Liv, don't be too hard on yourself.

Name: Liv
Text: Commencing data extraction...

Name: Tifa
Text: Commandant! Wake up! Serum... Give Commandant more serum!

Name: Leader
Text: Tifa, the Commandant isn't going to wake up...

Name: Tifa
Text: S-sorry... I'm... s-sorry...

Name: Tifa
Text: Sorry... Commandant... It's all my fault... I was too weak...

Name: Tifa
Text: Without you... what's the point of going on?!

Name: Soldier
Text: Tifa! Remember what Commandant just said?!

Name: Tifa
Text: Commandant asked us... to witness the new dawn of humanity, on his behalf...

Name: Tifa
Text: So... I've got to... keep living... right? Only then will I... be able to... see the light of dawn...

Name: Leader
Text: We've got to go back.

Name: Tifa
Text: But, Commandant's body!

Name: Corrupted
Text: Uuuurgh—

Name: Tifa
Text: Ah!
Get out!

Name: Corrupted
Text: Urgh...
You're right, pretty girl... Only the living will see the dawn...
And in this world, only the powerful survive.

Name: Leader
Text: Who... are you?

Name: Soldier
Text: He... stopped the Corrupted with the mere force of his presence...

Name: Leader
Text: Is that... the power of the Punishing Virus? How can that be?
You Constructs are the only ones down here capable of protecting human Commandants.
It was your weakness, and those Cloudcuckoolanders up there that killed your Commandant.
You're not like the others, Tifa. These dregs of humanity will just join a different team when they go back...
You're the only one who really cares about your Commandant, yes?

Name: Soldier
Text: What are you saying?!
You see this power? Only it can save us down here...
And keep our promises to those we love most...

Name: Leader
Text: Tifa! What are you doing? If you remove your Inver-Device—

Name: Leader
Text: ARRRGGH!!!
You all have outlived your usefulness.

Name: Soldier
Text: Leader! We, we've got to get out of here! ARRRGGH!!!
Let's see how far you can get without your fancy equipment.

Name: Soldier
Text: Tifa... Why are you just standing there?

Name: Soldier
Text: Darn it... No...

Name: Lucia
Text: Suzaku squad member, do you read me?

Name: Suzaku Squad Construct
Text: There must... be a way... to bring Tifa back...

Name: Lucia
Text: It's too dangerous! Pull out!

Name: Lee
Text: No signal?

Name: Liv
Text: His Inver-Device is broken... That's why he can't recall his consciousness or hear us.

Name: Lee
Text: It's impossible to defeat so many without an Iso-Device—hope he hangs in there.

Name: Lee
Text: We could really use another Iso-Device round about now... Tch.

Name: Lee
Text: Hang in there, Suzaku!

Name: Suzaku Squad Construct
Text: Thank you... Watch out!

Name: Suzaku Squad Construct
Text: Argh... I... can't... stop...

Name: Lee
Text: I hate to admit it, but we can only trust what Vera told us.

Name: Lee
Text: Only Iso-Fields can neutralize those Corrupted shields.

Name: Lee
Text: Remember, only engage Corrupted after they are INSIDE the Iso-Device area.

Name: Lucia
Text: We can't just leave him here. Liv, we have to help him.

Name: Liv
Text: On it.

Name: Liv
Text: I've stabilized his cognitive functions, but he's not going to last much longer...

Name: Suzaku Squad Construct
Text: Thank... you...

Name: Suzaku Squad Construct
Text: There is one more thing... I need to ask you...

Name: Suzaku Squad Construct
Text: Please give me... Tifa's Inver-Device...

Name: Lucia
Text: If we give it to him... he might...

Name: Lee
Text: He's a goner... Just let him do what he wants...

Name: Suzaku Squad Construct
Text: Thank you.

Name: Suzaku Squad Construct
Text: Tifa... come back... with me...

Name: Suzaku Squad Construct
Text: Suzaku, someone needs to... stay behind and witness the dawn... like Commandant wanted...

Name: Suzaku Squad Construct
Text: You... cared the most out of us about the Commandant, right?

Name: Suzaku Squad Construct
Text: You wanna help the Commandant achieve his final wish, right?

Name: Suzaku Squad Construct
Text: UGH...!!! The Punishing Virus... I'm... losing it...

Name: Suzaku Squad Construct
Text: Tifa... Put on the Inver-Device... and come...

Name: Tifa
Text: Silence.

Name: Suzaku Squad Construct
Text: Tifa...?

Name: Suzaku Squad Construct
Text: Agh—!

Name: Liv
Text: He's...

Name: Lucia
Text: Jitterbomb swarm! Liv, protect Commandant!

Name: Lucia
Text: Get ready to retreat!

Name: Lee
Text: Where are they all coming from?!

Name: Lee
Text: No way forward!

Name: Lucia
Text: Road ahead is blocked!

Name: Lucia
Text: Liv, use your Levi-Gun!

Name: Liv
Text: Okay!

Name: Lucia
Text: Too much debris. Is there another way?

Name: Liv
Text: This is the last exit. All the others have collapsed.

Name: Lucia
Text: There's no choice, Commandant. We'll have to slowly remove the debris.

Name: Lucia
Text: Wait... I'm getting a response...

Name: Liv
Text: It's Tifa's signal! She's getting closer!

Name: Tifa
Text: Commandant, I wish you could see me as I am now...

Name: Tifa
Text: You'll... like me, will you?

Name: Tifa
Text: Sorry... Commandant... Sorry...

Name: Tifa
Text: I... can't see anything... anymore...

Name: Tifa
Text: Commandant... where... are you...?

Name: Lucia
Text: Tifa's not right. Protect Commandant!

Name: Liv
Text: Okay!

Name: Tifa
Text: Commandant? You're all trying to steal my Commandant?!

Name: Tifa
Text: No... NO!

Name: Tifa
Text: AAAAAAAAARGH!!!

Name: Lucia
Text: We need to get out of here. Hold on, Lee!

Name: Lee
Text: Sorry, I was too careless...

Name: Liv
Text: No, it's my fault—Here, lean on my shoulder!

Name: Liv
Text: Quickly, before she notices us!

Name: Lee
Text: Ugh!

Name: Liv
Text: Lee! Are you okay?

Name: Lee
Text: The wound is worsening... Just leave me here. I'll just slow you down.

Name: Lee
Text: Recalling is the safest choice for me now. It will only cause the faintest ripple in my M.I.N.D.

Name: Liv
Text: Lee, please! Stop!

Name: Liv
Text: I'll get you back, no matter what!

Name: Lee
Text: I'm worried that the new variants will start targeting Iso-Devices.

Name: Lee
Text: We should investigate, Commandant.

Name: Lee
Text: Already sent someone, huh.

Name: Lucia
Text: There's too much debris. Is there another way?

Name: Lee
Text: This is the last exit. All the others have collapsed.

Name: Lucia
Text: There's no choice, Commandant. We'll have to slowly remove the debris.

Name: Tifa
Text: You will all be specimens of my next experiment!

Name: Lucia
Text: Don't hesitate just because she was a Construct!

Name: Liv
Text: Do... Do we destroy her?!

Name: Lucia
Text: ...Yes.

Name: Tifa
Text: Impossible! How are you so strong?!

Name: Lucia
Text: A Construct without their Commandant is no match for us!

Name: Tifa
Text: I can't let the Princess down...

Name: Lucia
Text: Princess?

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant, let's use the fog to sneak back upstairs.

Name: Lee
Text: This enemy is bad news... Sorry. I'm being a liability.

Name: Liv
Text: No, Lee... You're not.

Name: Liv
Text: I'm the one who got us into this mess...

Name: Lee
Text: (Coughs) It's getting worse... Just put me down...

Name: Liv
Text: Stuff it already, Lee!

Name: Liv
Text: I'll bring you back, no matter what!

Name: Lee
Text: Liv...

Name: Lee
Text: ...Alright, then I'll be counting on you.

Name: Lucia
Text: Corrupted are closing in. We need to hurry.

Name: Chrome
Text: Kamui, what's your status?

Name: Kamui
Text: Uh, Chrome... I think I'm lost.

Name: Chrome
Text: Just as I thought...

Name: Chrome
Text: You're good in a fight, but your sense of direction is appalling...

Name: Chrome
Text: Listen up, Kamui, just follow the Navi-Path...

Name: Kamui
Text: Navi? I told you, that thing is useless. It keeps changing directions! It's so annoying...!

Name: Chrome
Text: Because it detects threats in real-time and adjusts your route accordingly. The Strike Hawks fight alone, after all.

Name: Kamui
Text: I've got my instincts! I don't need a Navi to tell me where the danger is!

Name: Kamui
Text: Hang on. There's a Construct up ahead. I'll go ask him the way!

Name: Chrome
Text: But there are no friendly signals in your vicinity. Hey! Can you still hear me?

Name: Kamui
Text: You here on a mission too? Well, ain't that a coincidence!

Name: Roland
Text: Yes. Quite.

Name: Kamui
Text: I'm looking for the Estate Museum. On my way to reinforce the Gray Raven. Can you point me in the right direction?

Name: Roland
Text: That way.

Name: Kamui
Text: Oh, it's that way... Guess my Navi was right, after all. Good luck on your mission too, friend!

Name: Roland
Text: Don't mention it.

Name: Roland
Text: Well, well. They do have some interesting people on their side, don't they?

Name: Lucia
Text: This is where the distress signal originated.

Name: Lee
Text: High Construct casualties, but low levels of Punishing Virus...

Name: Liv
Text: Thankfully, they all recalled their consciousnesses. Their bodies weren't further infected as well.

Name: Lucia
Text: We should do some preliminary recovery, and find out what happened while we're at it.

Name: Lee
Text: They are covered in gunshot wounds.

Name: Lee
Text: Whatever did this is packing some serious heat. Be on your guard.

Name: Lee
Text: Look!

Name: Heavy Terrapod
Text: Visitor Identification: Thug. Commence program, "Civil Control".

Name: Liv
Text: It's... one of the Estate Terrapods. Someone must have reactivated it.

Name: Lee
Text: How many guns did they cram in this thing? Post-Pandemic Age tech really could use some subtlety...

Name: Lucia
Text: Liv, request backup from nearby team.

Name: Liv
Text: Okay!

Name: Kamui
Text: Leave these to me!

Name: Kamui
Text: Easy!

Name: Liv
Text: Wow, he must be a Tank Construct... That onslaught didn't leave a scratch on him.

Name: Kamui
Text: (Chuckles)

Name: Lee
Text: The Estate structures are falling apart, but their control systems seem pretty much intact.

Name: Lee
Text: The Estate control systems can be accessed via that Terminal. If we can hack the defense codes, we can shut the systems down.

Name: Kamui
Text: Is that a bionic animal? Cooool!

Name: Kamui
Text: Wow! It's moving!

Name: Lee
Text: You—

Name: Lee
Text: He's activated the entire museum security system! And it's at the highest alert! That idiot...

Name: Kamui
Text: These exhibits... look super shady...

Name: Kamui
Text: But I won't touch them again, I swear!

Name: Lee
Text: Locked... Tch, of course.

Name: Liv
Text: Enemies behind us are closing in!

Name: Lee
Text: No good way around this. Let's deal with them first.
That's far enough. Please leave this place, while you still can.

Name: Liv
Text: Who... said that?

Name: Liv
Text: The... the exhibits are being activated!

Name: Lee
Text: Turn on EM Camo, quickly.

Name: Lee
Text: The Beamers ahead are hidden behind a force field. Our attacks will bounce right off.

Name: Lee
Text: We'll have to observe their attacks and time our exit carefully. Remember, any hits will disable our EM Camo.

Name: Lee
Text: Door locks disabled. Let's keep going.

Name: Lucia
Text: Some sort of barrier is blocking access to the courtyard...

Name: Liv
Text: There's a high Punishing Virus response... behind the force field.

Name: Lee
Text: It must be some kind of lair.

Name: Estate Butler
Text: It is intended to protect you... This is your last chance...

Name: Estate Butler
Text: Once you pass through this barrier, there's no turning back.

Name: Lee
Text: Liv, insert your Levi-Gun core into the Terminal. It will short the force field.

Name: Liv
Text: On it.

Name: Liv
Text: The force field has been overloaded. We can continue on our way!

Name: Lucia
Text: Let's go.

Name: Lucia
Text: The fighting there is done. We don't have to rush. Let's clear out the Corrupted nearby first.

Name: Lucia
Text: Phew—mission accomplished.

Name: Lee
Text: Very thorough. Thank you, Lucia.

Name: Lucia
Text: Those Constructs... look a bit abnormal...

Name: Lucia
Text: Their limbs and Inver-Devices are all destroyed, but they've still got vital signs.

Name: Construct
Text: Stay...

Name: Lucia
Text: What happened to you? What are you trying to say?

Name: Construct
Text: Stay... back...

Name: Lucia
Text: Someone installed Motion Bombs inside them!

Name: Kamui
Text: That's so... messed... up...

Name: Lee
Text: Disarming these bombs isn't possible right now... We can only give them a bit of distance...

Name: Estate Butler
Text: That's what happens when you oppose the Ascendants—I do not wish to see it happen anymore.

Name: Estate Butler
Text: But it's too late now. Don't say I didn't warn you.

Name: Roland
Text: Loyal old Android. He has defended the Estate Museum for a very long time.

Name: Roland
Text: It would have ended quite differently if he had just succumbed to the power of Ascnet.

Name: Roland
Text: But, such is the fate of the weak.

Name: Roland
Text: Go. Complete your final task.

Name: Estate Butler
Text: Thank you for releasing me...

Name: Estate Butler
Text: I... will not allow... them... to defile Mr. Copperfield's legacy...

Name: Estate Butler
Text: Initiating... central nervous system... self-destruct sequence...

Name: Estate Butler
Text: Mr. Copperfield... In the end, I failed you. I couldn't protect the Estate...

Name: Roland
Text: Lucia.

Name: Lucia
Text: What?

Name: Roland
Text: Now show me what you can do.

Name: Roland
Text: I don't mind if the others join in, but in the end... only one of you will remain.

Name: Lucia
Text: One of... us?

Name: Roland
Text: Which one will it be?

Name: Roland
Text: You're weak... just like she said.

Name: Lucia
Text: What... are you saying?

Name: Kamui
Text: Hey punk—

Name: Kamui
Text: Over here!

Name: Roland
Text: What?!

Name: Lee
Text: You found the monitors?

Name: Kamui
Text: Yeah... but any equipment exposed to the elements could have been infected.

Name: Kamui
Text: Hope they still work. Let me try!

Name: Kamui
Text: They seem to be working. It must be my lucky day.

Name: Kamui
Text: We should bring them in for analysis.

Name: Liv
Text: We need to find somewhere quiet. The battlefield isn't the place for computational work.

Name: Kamui
Text: The tremors feel different here. I've got a bad feeling about this.

Name: Kamui
Text: I'll place some EMP bombs in strategic positions.

Name: Kamui
Text: Cover me, Lee. Don't hold back.

Name: Lee
Text: You got me...

Name: Kamui
Text: Take cover! Baby's gonna blow!

Name: Lee
Text: Those things don't affect us... What were you thinking?

Name: Lee
Text: The place is strewn with Corrupted parts...

Name: Lee
Text: Status?

Name: Liv
Text: It's at 20% power. If we're doing something, now would be the time...

Name: Zack
Text: Emma...

Name: Liv
Text: It's very hot here. Commandant... are you okay?

Name: Lucia
Text: In and out. Find a supply point for Commandant.

Name: Kamui
Text: Target sighted! Wow... it looks a lot bigger in real life. What's it called again?

Name: Lee
Text: Vassago, a kind of bionic Sand Worm. It moves through the sand and ambushes its prey.

Name: Lucia
Text: Remain vigilant. We don't have much experience in this kind of environment.

Name: Lucia
Text: Did you feel that, Lee?

Name: Lee
Text: Yes. EM Camo. The enemy's using military-grade tech.

Name: Lucia
Text: They could attack from any direction. Watch your back.

Name: Liv
Text: Identifying target code... BPO-29, status... Deserter?
Lucia? It's you...
Looks like... you aren't with the cleaners.

Name: Lucia
Text: Kamui, don't rush in!

Name: Kamui
Text: Worry not! This is the part I'm actually good at!

Name: Lucia
Text: I don't like that... I'm getting used to his style somehow...

Name: Lucia
Text: Status update?

Name: Kamui
Text: ...And they didn't even clear out the Corrupted here before telling us to set up a supply point?

Name: Kamui
Text: Whatever. More fun for me!

Name: Lucia
Text: This place will be easy to defend.

Name: Lee
Text: Why do we have to do all the fighting? Are they afraid or something?

Name: Lucia
Text: We've got no choice. They're in charge of transport.

Name: Kamui
Text: I can't believe he laid so many traps.

Name: Watanabe
Text: I just don't have that many folks I can spare, that's all.

Name: Kamui
Text: I'll get you!

Name: Lucia
Text: Kamui is fighting his own battle. Lee, I need you to take care of fire support. Hurry!

Name: Lucia
Text: Forget about those Corrupted! We've got to get Liv back!

Name: Kamui
Text: Wo-ah! There it is! The Vassa-thingamajig... I can never remember what it's called...

Name: Kamui
Text: Is it following us? What does it want?

Name: Kamui
Text: We don't have time to play with you! Lie down like a good boy! HAIYA!!!

Name: Lee
Text: Weird. It looked like it was going for Commandant...

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant... I...

Name: Lucia
Text: No. I'm sure it'll be fine.

Name: Kamui
Text: Keep your eye on Lucia, Commandant.
