Name: Kamui
Text: While I go shove a sock in Watanabe's mouth.

Name: Liv
Text: The Purifying Force... Constructs that kill Constructs…

Name: Lee
Text: Leave that for later. Let's mop up these wandering enemies first then take a rest.

Name: Watanabe
Text: If you don't believe me, go look at those tombstones.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Manhami, Analyzer, Katana specialist, Lazy dullard, November.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Kiryu, Attacker, Switch Axe specialist, Cuddle dragon, November.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Yayoi, Analyzer, Life Support specialist, Flowers for tomorrow, November.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Fresh meat for the grinder... You'll help fight, yes?

Name: Watanabe
Text: Surrender! I'm not going to kill any Constructs.

Name: Liv
Text: I refuse!

Name: Kamui
Text: Watanabe can take care of Liv for us.

Name: Kamui
Text: Maybe we should put some distance between us and the enemy, Commandant.

Name: Kamui
Text: I'll stop 'em. You get Lee out of here, Commandant!

Name: Lee
Text: We need to move fast. I just hope Kamui's map is accurate...

Name: Lucia
Text: Don't make too much noise. We don't want to alert the Forsaken. They're still holding Liv...

Name: Lucia
Text: This facility is probably rigged. Stay sharp...

Name: Lucia
Text: Lee? Kamui?!

Name: Lucia
Text: What is it?

Name: Lucia
Text: Gone...?

Name: Lucia
Text: Visual system errors? Disorder in the M.I.N.D.?

Name: Lucia
Text: The Corrupted signals have recovered. We'll have to fight... It won't hurt them, will it?

Name: Lee
Text: The next batch of projectors is in position.

Name: Lee
Text: Follow my mark.

Name: Lee
Text: Graviton detector imaging has commenced. The image is fuzzy, but will suffice.

Name: Lee
Text: But these Corrupted aren't projections.

Name: Lucia
Text: How did the Forsaken get through here with no Graviton Detectors?

Name: Lee
Text: I guess they know this place... Why else would they bring Liv here straight?

Name: Lee
Text: If we want the EMP to affect the maximum number of projectors, we need to find the best spot.

Name: Lucia
Text: There's Corrupted everywhere. I'll send a signal when the coast is clear.

Name: Lucia
Text: The Corrupted attacks are slowing...

Name: Lucia
Text: NOW!!!

Name: Lee
Text: Okay.

Name: Lucia
Text: You said to not let Kamui out of our sights. Is there something?

Name: Lee
Text: Well, seeing how we're on the dedicated Gray Raven channel...

Name: Lee
Text: I was just checking Kamui's Inver-Device...

Name: Lee
Text: It was running on high-load mode. And there are logs of him trying to turn off his GPS and Comms systems.

Name: Lucia
Text: Turning off his own...

Name: Lee
Text: He might have his own plans... but I think we definitely need to check in with him more.

Name: Lee
Text: Corrupted are shielding the projectors...

Name: Lee
Text: The one in the middle seems different. I think it must hold the secret to this place.

Name: Kamui
Text: Okay, here goes!

Name: Lucia
Text: Commencing capture of next target.

Name: Lee
Text: Kamui, don't damage its memory shell.

Name: Kamui
Text: Haha, as long as I don't hit him directly, he'll be fine...

Name: Lucia
Text: Done—over to you, Lee.

Name: Nanami
Text: Show Nanami the M.I.N.D. or you'll regret it—

Name: Nanami
Text: WA-POW!

Name: Lucia
Text: Such strength! Not even a scratch?!

Name: Nanami
Text: Pffft! This is boring!

Name: Nanami
Text: Nanami's had enough.

Name: Kamui
Text: This place looks quite oriental. It takes me back...

Name: Lee
Text: We're in Liv's M.I.N.D. She's already showing signs of the Punishing Virus.

Name: Lee
Text: Tch. That Watanabe... He best get ready for a beating after this...

Name: Lucia
Text: Liv!

Name: Lee
Text: Don't hold back, Lucia! We might not get another chance!

Name: Lucia
Text: (Deep breaths) Very well...

Name: Lucia
Text: Liv...

Name: Watanabe
Text: We're on top of Underground Refugee City 019. During the Post-Pandemic Age it was home to half a million refugees.

Name: Watanabe
Text: That's about one-third of Babylonia's current population. Of course, it all ended in tragedy.

Name: Liv
Text: Corpses are piled high at the exits... indicating the severity of the final crisis that erupted inside...

Name: Lee
Text: Our objective is the Ascendants. Let the archeologists take care of history.

Name: Lucia
Text: Wait. Something's climbing up under the elevator!

Name: Kamui
Text: Finally, some movement.

Name: Watanabe
Text: The door's open.

Name: Lucia
Text: We need to cross the walkway to keep moving down.

Name: Lucia
Text: Hurry. We don't want to get caught out on a bridge.

Name: Kamui
Text: Haha! Lucia knows her away around a battlefield!

Name: Liv
Text: Everyone, I've picked up... a familiar signal.

Name: Nanami
Text: Executing purification mission, target: Forsaken...

Name: Liv
Text: That Corrupted used to be... a giant omni-directional mobility firefighting device...

Name: Kamui
Text: So what you're saying is... it knows hydro-pump!

Name: Kamui
Text: Hey. Why have we got fewer Corrupted than the Forsaken? You been slacking off or something?

Name: Lee
Text: It's not a competition...

Name: Lee
Text: Snap out of it, Nanami. You helping or not?

Name: Nanami
Text: I'm waiting!

Name: Lee
Text: For what?

Name: Nanami
Text: The one behind you!

Name: Lucia
Text: We can deal with Kamui later. Our top priority is clearing the path ahead.

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant, hold your position at the center of the group until we pass.

Name: Lee
Text: That Strike Hawk deserted...

Name: Watanabe
Text: Then he's bound to come to "her" attention...

Name: Watanabe
Text: I know full well how that's like.

Name: Lee
Text: You seem pretty composed being a target...

Name: Lucia
Text: How come...

Name: Lee
Text: When there's still so many Corrupted... covert action is the only option.

Name: Watanabe
Text: The girl was right. The isolation doors are still working.

Name: Lucia
Text: Liv, close the door. I'll clear things up with Kamui... once the mission is complete.

Name: Lucia
Text: Door closed! Everyone, go and help Nanami.

Name: Watanabe
Text: I'll start laying out the detonators.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Gray Raven, you are responsible for clearing the Corrupted in this vicinity.

Name: Watanabe
Text: No! The road collapsed...

Name: Watanabe
Text: Kid, you go back first. Destroying the source of Corrupted is my task.

Name: Liv
Text: That voice... sounds so cold...

Name: Lee
Text: Capable of rational thought at such high virus levels... I wonder, are we looking at another Ascendant "masterpiece"?

Name: Lucia
Text: Her voice... sounds familiar... ugh...

Name: Liv
Text: Lucia, are you okay? Everyone... proceed with caution!

Name: Lucia
Text: Up in the sky a... friendly transporter... but we didn't call for backup.

Name: Lee
Text: If they're coming uninvited... then they must be the Purifying Force.

Name: Liv
Text: I've got Kamui's signal. He's not far!

Name: Lucia
Text: Kamui...

Name: Lucia
Text: Hurry! We cannot afford to waste time!

Name: Lucia
Text: Sorry, Bianca, Karenina. I can't let you go any further.

Name: Bianca
Text: It's okay. Let's settle this then.

Name: Corrupted
Text: I will not let you take them!

Name: Corrupted
Text: Everyone is precious to me!

Name: Lucia
Text: Rest in peace... Sister.

Name: Lucia
Text: Calm down, Luna!

Name: Luna
Text: I'm not listening to you!

Name: Liv
Text: Unidentified force on the radar!

Name: Watanabe
Text: So they're sending in Bianca's team...

Name: Nanami
Text: Ol' geezer, you know them?

Name: Watanabe
Text: You could say that. Fought with them before, even.

Name: Lee
Text: They must be quite formidable, then.

Name: Liv
Text: Even if they're the Purifying Force, I won't back down!

Name: Bianca
Text: Disobedience is a crime, Lucia.

Name: Lucia
Text: No... I'm the leader!

Name: Karenina
Text: Bianca, you said I'll get to fight Lucia!

Name: Kamui
Text: Your enemy is here!

Name: Bianca
Text: Scavengers are always looking for rare metals among the ruins.

Name: Bianca
Text: So where are they all now?

Name: Bianca
Text: And what is this drill rig doing here?

Name: Lucia
Text: They're going to bring the whole place down! Stop them!

Name: Lee
Text: The path splits up. There's no time...

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant can decide.

Name: Nanami
Text: So many Corrupted—but y'all can't stop Nanami!

Name: Nanami
Text: Commandant, Rohacchi is over there!

Name: Lee
Text: I've marked the optimal sites to place the Disruptor.

Name: Bianca
Text: No! There's no time. We need to get out of here before we're completely surrounded!

Name: Liv
Text: No, it's a signal transmitter!

Name: Bianca
Text: A trap... No doubt we have been exposed.

Name: Lucia
Text: Stay sharp... and hurry.

Name: Bianca
Text: Out of my way!

Name: Bianca
Text: Karenina... Don't be rash...

Name: Liv
Text: Is it because of Kamui...?

Name: Lee
Text: Shoot first and ask questions later.

Name: Lucia
Text: Find Commandant's Mind Beacon, before the M.I.N.D. overheats.

Name: Lucia
Text: Overheating in the M.I.N.D. is a manifestation of obsession in the Construct's memories...

Name: Lucia
Text: Eliminate Corrupted... Eliminate Punishing Virus...

Name: Lucia
Text: Sync complete... Auto-jumping to the position of next Mind Beacon.

Name: Lucia
Text: Mind Beacon sync complete... Is that... a frog plushie?

Name: Liv
Text: Hang in there, everyone!

Name: Liv
Text: Fire support incoming!

Name: Bianca
Text: Watanabe and I have Roland pinned down. Take down that huge Mech!

Name: Watanabe
Text: I'm having a major déjà vu.

Name: Bianca
Text: Show me what you can do now.

Name: Lucia
Text: You're not getting away this time!

Name: Roland
Text: Empty words from an empty mind.

Name: Roland
Text: Only fools underestimate an Ascendant...

Name: Roland
Text: ...That was unexpected.

Name: Liv
Text: Supply Crate has been delivered to target location.

Name: Lucia
Text: Protect the Supply Crate. Destroy any Corrupted that come near.

Name: Lucia
Text: The Dawn frame demonstrates greatly enhanced powers in combat.

Name: Lucia
Text: I'll do my best not to drag you into the firing line.

Name: Lucia
Text: Corrupted everywhere. Stay out of their scanner range.

Name: Nozzle
Text: Hehe, I'll grind you into paint!

Name: Roseblade
Text: Your wish is my command... Master.

Name: Roseblade
Text: I cannot... permit you... to continue.

Name: Liv
Text: ...It's not working. Lee's signal has completely vanished!

Name: Lucia
Text: Pursue the "Iron Maiden".

Name: Lucia
Text: Don't let her get away. If she does, we'll lose all contact with Lee.

Name: Liv
Text: Eliminate these Corrupted...

Name: Liv
Text: And find a way to limit Lee's attacks.

Name: Tifa
Text: How exciting, defeater of Roland! Hold nothing back!

Name: Lucia
Text: The Energy Pod is all red inside... There's no way to ascertain Kamui's current status.

Name: Lucia
Text: Our objective is to restrict Purifying Force mobility and protect Kamui.

Name: Lucia
Text: Avoid their vitals.

Name: Kamui
Text: I don't surrender to anyone! Not you or the Tenebrion!

Name: Kamui
Text: I'm already mentally prepared... I'll just have to defeat you!

Name: Camu
Text: Your help is here, huh...?

Name: Kamui
Text: Why... are you...?

Name: Lucia
Text: I said I'd help you.

Name: Camu
Text: Fools... It will make your M.I.N.D. overheat.

Name: Camu
Text: You'll be wide open to the Punishing Virus.

Name: Lucia
Text: Assuming you can beat us.

Name: Vera
Text: There must be an Ascendant behind this assault.

Name: Chrome
Text: What are you planning on doing?

Name: Vera
Text: Too many questions, Mr. Thirst. Well, you can have the floor here.

Name: Vera
Text: Ta-ta.

Name: Kamui
Text: Woah! What's going on with this shaking?

Name: Chrome
Text: The tremors are coming from... above?!

Name: Kamui
Text: Captain... Is it just me or is it getting more claustrophobic in here?

Name: Chrome
Text: A trap, huh...

Name: Kamui
Text: It's starting up again...!

Name: Chrome
Text: Concentrate! There are still enemies around!

Name: Kamui
Text: Oh, it's done squishing down on us. Ha-hah!

Name: Chrome
Text: No, it's... building up speed and accelerating!

Name: Kamui
Text: Capt.! It's gonna faaa-aa-aall!

Name: Chrome
Text: Don't just gape there! Run!

Name: Asimov
Text: Enough demonstration of the basic functions. Time for some real combat.

Name: Hassen
Text: Is that Roland the Ascendant?

Name: Asimov
Text: It's a model derived from all the battle reports so far. I expect a 20% difference in power compared with the real one.

Name: Hassen
Text: Facing an Ascendant in the very first fight, huh...

Name: Asimov
Text: It's a model derived from battle reports. I expect a 20% difference in power compared with the real one.

Name: Asimov
Text: I know this is cheating, but I'm going to set the frame at maximum energy.

Name: Asimov
Text: Now witness the power of our new frame.

Name: Hassen
Text: Never thought you could win...

Name: Asimov
Text: What do you think? Happy with the result?

Name: Kamui
Text: Capt., now that I got the time to look around, it's actually pretty cool in here...

Name: Chrome
Text: ...Spare that for later. Just move!

Name: Kamui
Text: Oh, by the way, I snagged this on our way out.

Name: Chrome
Text: Stow it away somewhere first. We might find it useful later.

Name: Kamui
Text: Dayum! I'd be a Kamui pancake if one of those dough rollers run me over!

Name: Chrome
Text: I see some platforms around the sides. Let's advance using them as temporary shelters.

Name: Kamui
Text: Hey Chrome, those are Kowloong Constructs, right? They are surrounded!

Name: Chrome
Text: Let's help them!

Name: Chrome
Text: Beware of the flames rising from the floor. Move quickly, but with caution.

Name: Phecda
Text: Never thought I'd be rescued by some Babylonians... But I won't take you as our allies just yet.

Name: Kamui
Text: We have all the time to fight after the war, but right now there are more important things to worry about!

Name: Chrome
Text: We should give them a copy of the ID just in case, given that Cerberus is nowhere to find.

Name: Gabriel
Text: Once again, there are many Corrupted outside craving for ascension, Roland.

Name: Roland
Text: If craving works... We wouldn't be wasting so much effort.

Name: Roland
Text: Just do the usual thing, Gabriel.

Name: Gabriel
Text: Wipe them all out...

Name: Roland
Text: Much cleaner now. Let's go.

Name: Gabriel
Text: Yeah. Miss Luna is waiting ahead.

Name: Sophia
Text: I'm here to help.

Name: Vera
Text: Just do what you train-dwellers do. We're striking back.

Name: Sophia
Text: What are you doing?

Name: Changyu
Text: Dunno what y'all are trying at. But hey, goodie, a triple.

Name: Vera
Text: Hah... Good boy, aren't you?

Name: Vera
Text: Mh-hm, putting this Strike-Hawk-delivered ID to good use.

Name: Vera
Text: Now we can stop these Corrupted from advancing!

Name: Roland
Text: Just a few cannon fodders. Don't be too full of yourselves, Babylonians.

Name: Vera
Text: Let's see who's full of themselves, Ascendant!

Name: Sophia
Text: I'll take care of the enemies at the rear!

Name: Changyu
Text: Alright! I think we can call it a day here.

Name: Sophia
Text: Ah... Cerberus went out, chasing after Roland.

Name: Changyu
Text: ...A real bunch of mad dogs, aren't they?!

Name: Jamilah
Text: Let us not worry about them. We should provide artillery support elsewhere.

Name: Changyu
Text: Now! Open fire!

Name: Vera
Text: Let's get the roly-poly going.

Name: Vera
Text: Darn it!!!

Name: Sophia
Text: I won't lose to you!

Name: Liv
Text: We have to fight an Ascendant, with Lucia fallen right behind us...

Name: Lee
Text: Commandant, I have a plan. But I'll need some time.

Name: Ayla
Text: Then we'll hold off Gabriel for a while. Commandant, we're counting on you!

Name: Gabriel
Text: How...

Name: Gabriel
Text: W-wait—!

Name: Ayla
Text: That's all we can do...

Name: Gabriel
Text: Pathetic. As I thought... The key lies in the other "sister."

Name: Gabriel
Text: Shrewd, aren't you. But no matter.

Name: Gabriel
Text: Naive.

Name: Ayla
Text: I haven't met Selena yet...!

Name: Ayla
Text: I can hear her voice!

Name: Ayla
Text: It's clear, and close...

Name: Ayla
Text: Finally, we can meet again, Selena...

Name: Ayla
Text: Just hang on for one more moment...

Name: Ayla
Text: Keep... keep singing...

Name: Ayla
Text: Those were...

Name: Ayla
Text: That tremor...

Name: Ayla
Text: The space station is... breaking up?

Name: Ayla
Text: It can't keep going like this. Not only Selena, but other troops will also...

Name: Ayla
Text: I have to come up with a solution...

Name: Ayla
Text: I should be able to access the control system by that.

Name: Ayla
Text: It seems pretty old-style...

Name: System
Text: Electromagnetic lock control module back online, insufficient authority to modify...

Name: Ayla
Text: Although I can't modify it directly, it should be good enough for now.

Name: Ayla
Text: Okay, next...

Name: Ayla
Text: Selena should be nearby...

Name: Korolev
Text: Intruders detected... Intruders detected...

Name: Korolev
Text: You must buy a sightseeing ticket first... Please buy your ticket at the ticket booth...

Name: Korolev
Text: Otherwise, a special procedure will be initiated...

Name: Ayla
Text: ...This is?

Name: Ayla
Text: That's pretty...

Name: Ayla
Text: Do you know where Selena is?

Name: Korolev
Text: Initiating enforcement procedure—

Name: Ayla
Text: Seems I don't have a choice...

Name: Ayla
Text: I have no time for this. Bring it on!

Name: Korolev
Text: Higher threat level detected—

Name: Korolev
Text: Abandoned current mission—

Name: Korolev
Text: Go to the location—gravity room.

Name: Ayla
Text: Ah... Ran off...

Name: Ayla
Text: But I can search around at last...

Name: Ayla
Text: (Searches and digs around)

Name: Ayla
Text: There's some logbooks stored in the terminal. They should be useful...

Name: Ayla
Text: Hostile signals?

Name: Ayla
Text: Alright, Selena, just wait a little longer. I'll be right back.

Name: Ayla
Text: The interference is too strong...

Name: Ayla
Text: After wiping out the enemies here, I have to find another terminal as a signal amplifier—

Name: Ayla
Text: In doing so, I can contact Gray Ravens...

Name: Ayla
Text: According to the topographic map, there should be a terminal ahead.

Name: Ayla
Text: Found it!

Name: Ayla
Text: But... that is not good.

Name: Ayla
Text: Those Heteromers are protecting the terminal. And there's a robot guard near it...

Name: Ayla
Text: I'd better not get close to those cubes...

Name: Ayla
Text: And that robot guard... seems to communicate with the terminal in certain ways...

Name: Ayla
Text: In short, I have to activate it!

Name: Ayla
Text: Activated the robot guard!

Name: Ayla
Text: Yeah, it works!

Name: Ayla
Text: It seems the Heteromers here could be easily deconstructed...

Name: Ayla
Text: Maybe they've lost too much energy because of Gray Raven.

Name: Ayla
Text: Let me see if the terminal still works.

Name: Ayla
Text: It is activated. Finally I can contact Gray Ravens.

Name: Burning Soldier
Text: My fire will not die!

Name: Frozen Soldier
Text: The freezing... has not stopped.

Name: Dark Soldier
Text: Let shadow consume you!

Name: Lightning Soldier
Text: I will inherit... the power of lightning.

Name: Soldier
Text: Captain! No—

Name: Gentleman
Text: Overdrive!

Name: Old Guy
Text: I know what you are going to say...

Name: Fish Merchant
Text: The World!

Name: Quiff
Text: Great DAZE!

Name: Fluffy
Text: Silver Experience!

Name: Luna
Text: Lucia, are they...

Name: Lucia
Text: Corrupted, a bit stronger than the ones you saw before.

Name: Lucia
Text: Luna, stay close.

Name: Luna
Text: Roger...

Name: Lucia
Text: Ha... Ha...

Name: Luna
Text: You've been fighting with them all this time...?

Name: Lucia
Text: Luna, try to focus. There's still a...

Name: Luna
Text: But you're already...

Name: Lucia
Text: Luna!

Name: Lucia
Text: Just wait for me...

Name: Lucia
Text: Don't do... anything stupid...

Name: Lucia
Text: I'll be right there... Just wait for me!

Name: The Other Lucia
Text: You seem to have already realized the abnormality...

Name: The Other Lucia
Text: Talk to "me" again... If you are determined to confront it.

Name: Lucia
Text: Yes.

Name: The Other Lucia
Text: As you wish...

Name: Lucia
Text: Luna... I'm sorry...

Name: Mother
Text: You can't go out like that all covered in dust. What will the recruiter say?

Name: Mother
Text: Go put that dress on, sort yourself out in front of the mirror, then come back out.

Name: Liv
Text: Not here... Probably in the closet.

Name: Liv
Text: Such a pretty dress...

Name: Liv
Text: Can I really just wear it...?

Name: Nanami
Text: Must... fight... then... find Mommy and Jane...

Name: Nanami
Text: I did it... but I'm drained...

Name: Nanami
Text: The Corrupted are attacking humans!

Name: Nanami
Text: Wait, why do the Corrupted and humans... all look the same... to me?

Name: Nanami
Text: No... Nanami... Pull yourself together! Look closer...

Name: Nanami
Text: There are two Corrupted!

Name: Guard A
Text: She's coming this way! She's been Corrupted!

Name: Nanami
Text: No, you're...

Name: Guard B
Text: Aim!

Name: Nanami
Text: No... Nanami needs to... get out of here...

Name: Lee
Text: Let's fix this quickly and go home.

Name: Lee
Text: Murray's birthday is coming up. Before that, maybe I can...

Name: Lee
Text: I can send the whole message using 0s and 1s.

Name: Lee
Text: Binary operations, being and nothingness, black and white, order without chaos.

Name: Lee
Text: Prepare to meet your maker. It will be sequential and instantaneous.

Name: Lee
Text: ...The final chip. Murray, your brother I might... have to wish you Happy Birthday ahead of time.

Name: Karenina
Text: Hope today's harvest is good.

Name: Karenina
Text: (Searches and digs around)

Name: Karenina
Text: Nothing at all... Ah! Those people, again!

Name: Karenina
Text: It says... Inver-Device... Beta version... I wonder what it's for...

Name: Karenina
Text: The thing inside looks real valuable though.

Name: Karenina
Text: There's an ID in the box... Huh? Why's it got grandpa's photo on it?

Name: Karenina
Text: Huh? Where's all that stuff I just found?

Name: Karenina
Text: Eek... It's getting late. I should head back...

Name: Karenina
Text: What's this? It looks like a remote control, for... this Robo Bug.

Name: Karenina
Text: It looks unstable, like it'd explode any minute... Let me try...

Name: Karenina
Text: Wow! It actually moved!

Name: Karenina
Text: That was a big explosion!

Name: Karenina
Text: I think it broke something... Hope no one was hurt...

Name: Watanabe
Text: The only person who can save you... is yourself. Got it.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Where you see scrap metal, I see trophies!

Name: Abnormal Corrupted
Text: ...than... my... son...

Name: Girl
Text: ...Father...?

Name: Bianca
Text: I will not allow anyone to get hurt!

Name: Bianca
Text: I will protect you all, until the end!

Name: Soldier
Text: Where'd they all go...?

Name: Watanabe
Text: The snow looks strange.

Name: Bianca
Text: This is something a priest would wear...

Name: Bianca
Text: ...Father Snow?

Name: Bianca
Text: No! The children!

Name: Kamui
Text: ...Who ARE you?
I'm the one who is going to save you.

Name: Kamui
Text: I... don't need saving.
That is not for you to decide.

Name: Nanami
Text: That's not surprising!

Name: Nanami
Text: Anyway, let's take a closer look...

Name: Nanami
Text: Hello! Can you hear me?

Name: Injured Construct
Text: Constructs from... Babylonia? They fooled you too, huh...? Watch out, behind you!

Name: Nanami
Text: Hold on while Nanami takes care of these guys. Be right back!

Name: Injured Construct
Text: Scavengers made this place... using the Corrupted. It's a Construct hunting ground...

Name: Injured Construct
Text: A girl hid me here and gave me this energy cell to keep me going...

Name: Nanami
Text: I knew it... Don't worry. I'll take it from here!

Name: Nanami
Text: So high Punishing levels! Did you come chasing after the traces of Construct remains, all the way from the surface?

Name: Nanami
Text: Hey! You there! It's not okay to destroy Nanami's favorite ruins and hurt Nanami's friends!

Name: Investigator Ryan
Text: Good timing. The energy cell will power me up for a while. I can help you!

Name: Investigator Ryan
Text: The hunting ground and the Scavengers... There's more to this than what meets the eye.

Name: Investigator Ryan
Text: It was human Scavengers that attacked me... but the girl who saved me was a human Scavenger too...

Name: Investigator Ryan
Text: Thanks to you guys I'll be able to make my report in person.

Name: Investigator Ryan
Text: I'll tell them everything, about the assault on the Fortress... You were amazing by the way!

Name: Nanami
Text: Ohoho! Of course, Nanami IS amazing! Oh... Amy, are you okay?

Name: Investigator Ryan
Text: The girl who saved me... Has she... passed out?

Name: Corrupted
Text: Power, POWER!!!

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Is that... a Construct? Thank goodness!

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: After we were shot down, the Corrupted rushed us. We can't hold out much longer!

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: You're here to help us, right?

Name: Corrupted
Text: Devour... Target Construct...

Name: Roland
Text: After these scum found Lucia... they were like hounds on a blood trail... And now they're even in my way...

Name: Roland
Text: Do you not know that this belongs to Miss Luna?

Name: Roland
Text: Stand back.

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Sorry, we're on a top-priority escort mission. Only team members can approach the client.

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Duty calls, friend. Move aside. We don't want any trouble.

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: What are you doing? Aren't you here to help us?

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Wait... This one's full of Punishing Virus! We've got contact!!!

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Thanks for the rescue!

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: You're an old model, but you're pretty good. Which team are you from?

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: When this is done, I can finally go back to Babylonia, outta this hell hole.

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: I know you saved us, but please don't interfere with our mission.

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Lucia is a hero to us. We must escort her back to Babylonia.

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: We don't know what the purpose of our mission is, but please cooperate. Don't approach Lucia.

Name: Roland
Text: I smell a rat.

Name: Roland
Text: Keep running, it'll make it more interesting, Lucia.

Name: Lucia
Text: I can't win in my current state... I've got to... get away...

Name: Lucia
Text: But... where can I go?

Name: Roland
Text: There you are.

Name: Roland
Text: I'm getting tired. Come back with me, there's a good girl. Miss Luna's waiting.

Name: Lucia
Text: Don't try to fool me!

Name: Roland
Text: Where are you going?

Name: Lucia
Text: Get away from me, you... Corrupted!

Name: Roland
Text: Hah hah... As expected of Miss Luna's...

Name: Roland
Text: So... you want to do it the hard way...

Name: Lucia
Text: Is that the sound of battle? I wonder what's going on.

Name: Lucia
Text: If I can just get through these Corrupted... I'll be able to get away...

Name: Lucia
Text: Finally... Am I free?

Name: Lucia
Text: But where should I go next...?

Name: Lucia
Text: Lu... na...
Tch, she's completely ignoring my attacks.
She seems to be drawn to Lucia, but Lucia, you...

Name: The Other Lucia
Text: I'm fine... Keep Commandant safe...

Name: Lucia
Text: Surely you feel it too... Lucia?

Name: Lucia
Text: Is that all you have, Lucia...?

Name: Lucia
Text: Enough of this nonsense!

Name: Human Soldier
Text: Wo-ah!

Name: Watanabe
Text: The Corrupted made it this far?!

Name: Watanabe
Text: We'll have to fight our way out!

Name: Cyril
Text: Pretty good, kid.

Name: Watanabe
Text: All Constructs can fight. Only some know how to fly.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Get on! Cyril, you go first!

Name: Watanabe
Text: I'll clear the runway!

Name: Watanabe
Text: Prepare for liftoff!

Name: Watanabe
Text: Cyril... It's not that I don't trust you...

Name: Watanabe
Text: But let's turn on the force field, just in case.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Let's see... should be the start button first...

Name: Watanabe
Text: Re-enter command, command code:\nContra\nConfirm again after entering the code.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Enemy in range. Enter combat mode!

Name: Watanabe
Text: Tsk! No time to get the force field up!

Name: Fighter Craft
Text: Captain! We got you!

Name: Cyril
Text: It's...

Name: Watanabe
Text: Backup!!

Name: Cyril
Text: Let's teach them some respect!

Name: Fighter Craft
Text: You'll never catch Captain Cyril!

Name: Fighter Craft
Text: Lay down suppressive fire!!!

Name: Fighter Craft
Text: We've been hit!

Name: Cyril
Text: Enough. Pull out.

Name: Fighter Craft
Text: Captain Cyril.

Name: Cyril
Text: You're no match for him.

Name: Fighter Craft
Text: Sorry, Captain...

Name: Cyril
Text: Watanabe, this is mine, as well as Bruce's fight against you!

Name: Cyril
Text: (Coughs) Guess us meat bags... can't keep up with Constructs in piloting...

Name: Cyril
Text: Too bad I already got the Stealth mode permissions for this unit!

Name: Ferdinand
Text: An island after the storm, a forlorn Prince, a song heard from afar.

Name: Ferdinand
Text: Welcome to my tale—the tale of Prince Ferdinand.

Name: Ferdinand
Text: Ah, what a desolate place this is? I, the proudest son of the King of Naples, find myself upon this foreign field!

Name: Ferdinand
Text: That damned and sudden tempest, frightening to behold, overturned a mighty galleon thirty decks in height!

Name: Ferdinand
Text: Uprooting the stout mast and shredding a hundred sturdy sails,

Name: Ferdinand
Text: I don't even know if my brilliant father, the blessed King of Naples, is alive or dead!

Name: Ferdinand
Text: What sin has been committed for beloved father and son to be so cruelly torn apart?

Name: Servant
Text: Your Majesty, I am sure your father will be safe.

Name: Servant
Text: Majesty, I fear the King has been shipwrecked on another island just as we have.

Name: Ferdinand
Text: Then what are we waiting for? Naples cannot last one day without its King, nor can I last one day without my beloved father!

Name: Ferdinand
Text: Pass me my sword! No treacherous wood nor wild beast can stand in my way!

Name: Servant & Servant
Text: Yes, Your Majesty. We will lay down our lives for you!

Name: Caliban
Text: Swine! This is a province of gods and fairies, not a place for worthless bags of skin like you!

Name: Ferdinand
Text: ...Am I imagining things? Don't tell me, my ears were drowned by the sea?

Name: Servant
Text: Majesty! This creature called you a swine!

Name: Servant
Text: Majesty! This creature called you a worthless bag of skin!

Name: Ferdinand
Text: Ingrates! Do I not treat you with kindness every day? How dare you insult me and blame it on someone else!

Name: Servant & Servant
Text: Mercy, Majesty!

Name: Caliban
Text: Look at these ugly mortals, covered in fair skin, but filled with dirty secrets!

Name: Caliban
Text: Alas... Only the magician's daughter can be said to be truly beautiful!

Name: Ferdinand
Text: Shallow monster! Not even fair maids are safe from your predation!

Name: Ferdinand
Text: Hahahaha, the battle has only served to stir my blood! Now to rid the world of another evil!

Name: Caliban
Text: ROOARR—!!! I shall smash you into pulp, pipsqueak!

Name: Ferdinand
Text: Ha, ha... Not bad for a weak monster.

Name: Caliban
Text: Look at the pipsqueak, waving his toothpick around like he's a real Knight.

Name: Servant & Servant
Text: Yes, Your Majesty! You can do it!
Stop!

Name: Caliban
Text: Hark, that voice, sweet as the blood of my quarry. A beautiful angel approaches!

Name: Miranda
Text: A fragrant island, a beautiful princess, guest of the storm.

Name: Miranda
Text: Welcome to my tale—the tale of Princess Miranda.

Name: Miranda
Text: The tempest has pass'd, the storm clouds have parted, sunshine spills upon the golden earth.

Name: Miranda
Text: Blessed Goddess! Your faithful servants sing your praises!

Name: Miranda
Text: Wait! Is that sound of fairies conversing upon the wind?

Name: Miranda
Text: Listen. The sounds of battle over yonder.

Name: Miranda
Text: Is that the voice Caliban I can hear! Oh no! I must go and see!

Name: Ferdinand
Text: Ha, ha... Not bad for a weak monster.

Name: Caliban
Text: Look at the pipsqueak, waving his toothpick around like he's a real Knight.

Name: Servant & Servant
Text: Yes, Your Majesty! You can do it!

Name: Miranda
Text: Stop!

Name: Miranda
Text: I called out without thinking... what shall I say next?

Name: Miranda
Text: Caliban is a powerful warrior! I never thought a mortal man would rival him!

Name: Miranda
Text: Oh! His countenance is so determined; his eyes are so deep!

Name: Miranda
Text: He is looking right at me! Be still my beating heart!

Name: Miranda
Text: It can't go on! Miranda, breathe deep! And speak in a steady voice—

Name: Miranda
Text: Stop this pointless fighting!

Name: King Alonso
Text: Prospero? What's going on?

Name: Prospero
Text: You traitor! Show yourself before your honorable king.

Name: Antonio
Text: Such filthy rumor. Does it come out of a demon's mouth?

Name: Prospero
Text: You are guilty of defying your king. It has been evidenced and no one could screen you anymore.

Name: Antonio
Text: Since you already found it out, only death upon you can spare my punishment!

Name: Abastian
Text: Let's not waste our time on this ignorant fool.

Name: Trinculo
Text: We'll just have to make them unable to talk.

Name: Antonio
Text: Ah! Don't touch me. I'm just a piece of rotten flesh!

Name: Ferdinand
Text: I'm here to declare, in the name of the god's divinity and justice, that the rebel has been defeated!

Name: Miranda
Text: Ferdinand! I know you are the one who has filled the space in my heart!

Name: Ferdinand
Text: Oh, Miranda, stay calm. We still have a long time for this.

Name: Caliban
Text: No! I... won't allow it! Miranda's heart belongs to me!

Name: Ferdinand
Text: Pathetic monster, your wish is meaningless.

Name: Ferdinand
Text: Miranda's heart already belongs to me. It is an unshakable truth.

Name: Miranda
Text: I can't hold myself together anymore...

Name: Miranda
Text: Caliban, I'm telling you I won't spend my life with you.

Name: Caliban
Text: Miranda... What a pitiful woman!

Name: Bianca
Text: Toby, what's wrong?

Name: Toby
Text: I don't have much time left... Can you do me a favor?

Name: Toby
Text: I heard the rumors, but I believe Bianca isn't that kind of person.

Name: Toby
Text: Please pick up that bow...

Name: Bianca
Text: Toby...

Name: Toby
Text: I can't remember what has happed. When I woke up, I've already found myself in this church.

Name: Toby
Text: It must've been God's will. At the last moment of my life... meet... ugh...

Name: Toby
Text: Meet... Ugh... Agh...

Name: Bianca
Text: Toby—Toby!

Name: Toby
Text: It's... too late... ARRRGGH!

Name: Bianca
Text: No...

Name: Bianca
Text: Sorry...

Name: Bianca
Text: Wh—What are you talking about?

Name: Toby
Text: Please... accept my bold request...

Name: Toby
Text: Kill me...

Name: Toby
Text: Thank... you... Bianca...

Name: Bianca
Text: Will this relieve Toby's pain...

Name: Bianca
Text: Sorry... for inflicting that kind of pain on you.

Name: Bianca
Text: I'll come with you soon, as a human, not someone else's weapon.

Name: Wen
Text: How disappointing.

Name: Wen
Text: Farewell.

Name: Sophia
Text: This time, I'll protect everyone!

Name: Sophia
Text: Last one. We're safe now.

Name: Sophia
Text: Why did I hear the boss tell me to run off?

Name: Sophia
Text: ...Now's not the time to think about this.

Name: Sophia
Text: Run... Where's everyone?

Name: Sophia
Text: A luxurious carriage...

Name: Sophia
Text: Jamilah doesn't deserve this.

Name: Sophia
Text: Jamilah, I found it.

Name: Sophia
Text: But those guards... We can't just leave them here.

Name: Guard
Text: You...

Name: Guard
Text: Just like the leader said...

Name: Chrome
Text: I should be able to hack into that device next to the gate and activate it...

Name: Chrome
Text: If only I can have more time...

Name: All
Text: Leader, the Corrupted are coming!

Name: Chrome
Text: I knew they would notice us...

Name: Chrome
Text: Everyone, deploy your weapons! Formation B5!

Name: Chrome
Text: But we'll only end up being surrounded if we defend here.

Name: Chrome
Text: (There's only one way to survive and become Smith.)

Name: Chrome
Text: I'm going to hack into the gate's control system. Enemies will come out from inside, and I'm counting on you to take care of them!

Name: All
Text: Roger!

Name: Skip the animation?
Text: <color=#ff6633>Move joystick up or down to</color> select, then tap the <color=#ff6633>Interact button</color> to confirm.\n<color=#ff6633>Skipping selection doesn't affect special events.</color>

Name: Chrome
Text: I can only let one of them defend one way. How should I assign them...

Name: Chrome
Text: First of all, let me examine their strengths again.

Name: Chrome
Text: This is Ace (Rank C), <color=#ff6633>the best</color> of the three. He has never let me down.

Name: Chrome
Text: This is Taro (Rank D). He's <color=#ff6633>quite good</color> and has completed many missions.

Name: Chrome
Text: And here's Dika (Rank E), a <color=#ff6633>rookie</color> on his very first mission. He's still got a lot more to learn.

Name: Chrome
Text: What about the enemies...

Name: Chrome
Text: There's no doubt that the enemies are <color=#ff6633>elites</color> and <color=#ff6633>stronger than us</color>.

Name: Chrome
Text: This one with a lance is <color=#ff6633>extremely dangerous</color>. He's a lot stronger than Ace (Rank C), even I can't guarantee that I will win.

Name: Chrome
Text: This one using arrows is <color=#ff6633>quite dangerous</color>. Taro (Rank D) is probably no match for him, but Ace (Rank C) should be able to stop him.

Name: Chrome
Text: This one with twin blades is <color=#ff6633>very mediocre</color>. He's better than Dika (Rank E), but weaker than Taro (Rank D).

Name: Chrome
Text: Based on the available information, my answer is...

Name: Chrome
Text: Must I sacrifice one of them?

Name: Chrome
Text: Time's running out. I must make a decision...

Name: Chrome
Text: Send Ace (Rank C) to...\n(<color=#ff6633>Move Joystick up or down</color> to select, then tap the <color=#ff6633>Interact button</color> to confirm selection).

Name: Chrome
Text: Send Taro (Rank D) to...\n(<color=#ff6633>Move Joystick up or down</color> to select, then tap the <color=#ff6633>Interact button</color> to confirm selection).

Name: Chrome
Text: Send Dika (Rank E) to...\n(<color=#ff6633>Move Joystick up or down</color> to select, then tap the <color=#ff6633>Interact button</color> to confirm selection).

Name: Chrome
Text: The decision is made. I need to do my part now.

Name: Chrome
Text: (Smith must pick up every useful piece to become the perfect monster.)

Name: Ace (Rank C)
Text: I am back!

Name: Ace (Rank C)
Text: Sorry... Leader...

Name: Ace (Rank C)
Text: No! I can't fall yet!

Name: Ace (Rank C)
Text: It's too powerful! There's no way I can win... But I'll never let you get close to Leader!

Name: Ace (Rank C)
Text: Die...with me!

Name: Taro (Rank D)
Text: Finally... I win...

Name: Taro (Rank D)
Text: Gargh! Why can't I win?

Name: Taro (Rank D)
Text: No! I can't fall yet!

Name: Taro (Rank D)
Text: It's too powerful! There's no way I can win... But I'll never let you get close to Leader!

Name: Taro (Rank D)
Text: Die...with me!

Name: Dika (Rank E)
Text: I must...go back to Leader!

Name: Dika (Rank E)
Text: I...couldn't do anything...

Name: Dika (Rank E)
Text: No! I can't fall yet!

Name: Dika (Rank E)
Text: It's too powerful! There's no way I can win... But I'll never let you get close to Leader!

Name: Dika (Rank E)
Text: Die...with me!

Name: Chrome
Text: I will not let my members die in vain...

Name: Chrome
Text: Ace (Rank C), Taro (Rank D), and Dika (Rank E). I will never forget you.

Name: Chrome
Text: Dika (Rank E). We will avenge you!

Name: Chrome
Text: Ace (Rank C), let's avenge Taro (Rank D) and Dika (Rank E)!

Name: Chrome
Text: Taro (Rank D), let's avenge Ace (Rank C) and Dika (Rank E)!

Name: Chrome
Text: Am I the only one left...

Name: Chrome
Text: All gathered up. This is the last fight!

Name: Chrome
Text: (Cough...)

Name: Ace (Rank C) & Taro (Rank D)
Text: Roger!

Name: Ace (Rank C)
Text: Roger!

Name: Taro (Rank D)
Text: Roger!

Name: Chrome
Text: This is what I really want... I want to be Chrome of Strike Hawk, not Smith!

Name: Chrome
Text: Kamui, I'm joining the battle. Wait for my order!

Name: Ace (Rank C) & Taro (Rank D)
Text: Great! It's Strike Hawk!

Name: Ace (Rank C)
Text: Thanks... I never thought I could meet Strike Hawk.

Name: Taro (Rank D)
Text: Strike Hawk... Let's fight together!

Name: Kamui
Text: Been waiting for you, Leader!

Name: Chrome
Text: Follow me!

Name: Ace (Rank C)
Text: I must not fall. I can't let Dika (Rank E) down...!

Name: Taro (Rank D)
Text: I will survive this. I must!

Name: Hiro
Text: Lucia, can you hear me?

Name: Lucia
Text: Copy. What's the situation over there?

Name: Hiro
Text: Don't worry about me. I noticed that you were trying to take Riot one-on-one. Just remember to watch out for his laser.

Name: Lucia
Text: Laser?

Name: Hiro
Text: You'll know when you see it. Anyway, take care, I'm gonna keep running.

Name: Lucia
Text: Okay.

Name: Lucia
Text: *Gasp*... Never thought this could be the laser he mentioned.

Name: Murol
Text: Nonetheless, the victory is ours. Commandant, we should ask Hiro to bring back the Corrupted.

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant?

Name: Lucia
Text: It's not over yet!

Name: Lucia
Text: Something just ran past...

Name: Lucia
Text: Is this inevitable?

Name: Lucia
Text: I knew I had to face you all to complete the synchronization of my M.I.N.D...

Name: Lucia
Text: Kamui, Chrome, Watanabe...

Name: Lucia
Text: Sorry, but I have to pass!

Name: Lucia
Text: The Purifying Force. Bianca, Karenina, and a few others in my memory.

Name: Lucia
Text: Whether we used to be enemies doesn't matter.

Name: Lucia
Text: Right now, you are my comrades.

Name: Lucia
Text: By the way, there's something I wanted to tell you long ago.

Name: Lucia
Text: Karenina, you're a lot better than me.

Name: Lucia
Text: Ayla, Sophia, Nanami. You are very interesting...

Name: Lucia
Text: I saw a lot in you, and learned a lot too.

Name: Lucia
Text: Now is the time to turn what I learned into my strength!

Name: Lucia
Text: Lee, you're always thinking, sometimes you think too much and miss the chance. Liv, you worry a lot and make yourself very tired.

Name: Lucia
Text: Two of you are just like me. We don't know how to express ourselves.

Name: Lucia
Text: What we had in common brought us together. That's why we are Gray Raven.

Name: Lucia
Text: Too bad I have to defeat you. I need to fly higher now!

Name: Lucia
Text: Right. These are your memories too. And that's exactly why—

Name: Lucia
Text: I want you to disappear from my M.I.N.D.!

Name: Lucia
Text: Right, Plume... You are the last obstacle.

Name: Lucia
Text: You are everything that I have ever accumulated. The things that I cherish the most...

Name: Lucia
Text: I really want to keep this memory if possible. I want it to always be mine.

Name: Lucia
Text: But I must give all I have for this battle.

Name: Lucia
Text: That's why... Lucia, you must disappear from this world, for the sake of Commandant!

Name: Vera
Text: Captain, pull back now!

Name: Squadron Leader
Text: Vera, I told you to stay at the rear. What are you doing here?

Name: Vera
Text: Not now! Get in the combat zone, quick!

Name: Squadron Leader
Text: Don't be silly. There's nothing for us there, nothing but danger!

Name: Vera
Text: That's not what I'm talking about... Damn it, am I disconnected?!

Name: Squadron Leader
Text: Wow, you just had to come, didn't you? Even after I specifically told you not to...

Name: Construct Member
Text: Boss, we've got company.

Name: Squadron Leader
Text: What?!

Name: Squadron Leader
Text: What's this?

Name: Vera
Text: The Corrupted are gathering up faster than I imagined... Dammit!

Name: Vera
Text: I can't handle this...

Name: Vera
Text: We can't stay here. More are coming.

Name: Vera
Text: Gotta get into the virus zone!

Name: Familiar Construct
Text: We bought enough time. Go, Vera, retreat with the citizens.

Name: Vera
Text: You're the ones who should retreat, not me... I've shed enough tears for you!

Name: Familiar Construct
Text: We lost. Give up, Vera.

Name: Vera
Text: How... How did it come to this?!

Name: Vera
Text: Huff... Huff...

Name: Familiar Construct
Text: Save your strength, Vera. More are on their way. We're goners now.

Name: Vera
Text: Shut up!

Name: Familiar Construct
Text: Vera... Thank you.

Name: Construct Soldier A
Text: Go help the others... I'm fine.

Name: Construct Soldier B
Text: This should buy us some time...

Name: Familiar Construct
Text: This... This is hopeless...

Name: Construct Soldier A
Text: I can't do this... anymore...

Name: Construct Soldier B
Text: Huff... Huff... I can't... breathe!

Name: Soldier
Text: Hey, Camu, where are you going?!

Name: Camu
Text: I'd rather work alone. You guys keep sticking together!

Name: Soldier
Text: Wait!

Name: Camu
Text: Master said I could become an advanced combatant, but I'm not sure about it.

Name: Camu
Text: And those aircraft are like surveillance cameras.

Name: Corrupted
Text: Urgh!!!

Name: Camu
Text: Right on time!

Name: Camu
Text: The Corrupted in the city have been surrounded as planned, right?

Name: Pilot
Text: Blow them up!

Name: Camu
Text: What?!

Name: Camu
Text: What's going on here?

Name: Soldier
Text: Cough...

Name: Camu
Text: Hey, where are you guys?!

Name: Soldier
Text: Run, Camu!

Name: Camu
Text: Shit! Shrapnel did a number on me. Gonna be a while before I recover from this!

Name: Camu
Text: I will not die here!

Name: Camu
Text: Let's divide and conquer! I'll take the lead!

Name: Soldier
Text: Understood!

Name: Mao Zhen
Text: Go to hell, you rotten pieces of Corrupted!

Name: Camu
Text: Master... no, uh, Mao Zhen!

Name: Camu
Text: Mao Zhen, I knew it was you!!!

Name: Mao Zhen
Text: Don't take it personally, Camu. I'm just carrying out orders.

Name: Mao Zhen
Text: (Camu... Do I still have a chance?)

Name: Camu
Text: Mao Zhen! Mao Zhen!!!

Name: Mao Zhen
Text: I told you to stay focused in battle.

Name: Camu
Text: Arghhh!!!

Name: Rosetta
Text: The bionics could be hiding in unexpected places.

Name: Rosetta
Text: I'll have to find and defeat them all.

Name: Rosetta
Text: So they can't hurt people who accidentally enter the forest.

Name: Rosetta
Text: Finally, all the lurking bionics have been defeated.

Name: Rosetta
Text: This area should be clear. Time to follow the footprints and keep moving.

Name: Rosetta
Text: I won't let you die, Grandpa. We will go home together!

Name: Rosetta
Text: I can barely move... But I can't stop here!

Name: Rosetta
Text: I know these bionics...

Name: Rosetta
Text: They must have been hiding here ever since I first met Lisa!

Name: Rosetta
Text: (If only I'd destroyed them all back then...)

Name: Pfaff
Text: Rosetta... Are you around...?

Name: Rosetta
Text: Grandpa! I'm here!

Name: Pfaff
Text: Do you know...? You were born with a blessing.

Name: Pfaff
Text: Coming to the world, you had already saved me, as well as your parents.

Name: Rosetta
Text: My... parents? You never told me...

Name: Pfaff
Text: They brought you to me out of a nightmare.

Name: Pfaff
Text: No matter what they did, you can take pride in them.

Name: Pfaff
Text: So never blame them or yourself. Do you understand? Cough...

Name: Rosetta
Text: I got it! Stop exerting yourself, Grandpa!

Name: Musashi VI
Text: {0110<color=#FF0000>0</color>011<color=#FF0000>0</color>111<color=#FF0000>00</color>1<color=#FF0000>0</color>011<color=#0000FF>000</color>01<color=#0000FF>0</color>11<color=#0000FF>00</color>10<color=#FFFF00>00</color>11<color=#FFFF00>0</color>11<color=#FFFF00>000</color>11<color=#FFFF00>0</color>0101} Activating command—enemies sighted. Eliminate them.

Name: Villier
Text: Take it easy. Just hit it a few times to paralyze it, so I can check who did this.

Name: Qu
Text: I'll try.

Name: Villier
Text: Good. Now it can't move.

Name: Villier
Text: Cra... Hmm...

Name: Yin
Text: Are you alone?

Name: Qu
Text: Yes.

Name: Yin
Text: I see. What a pity. You should have run away like that brat.

Name: Qu
Text: A ruler would never do that.

Name: Yin
Text: Haha, right, ruler. This country doesn't need two rulers.

Name: Yin
Text: Farewell, freak.

Name: Yin
Text: Useless idiots. I shall end it all.

Name: Changyu
Text: There seems to be more guards around... The auction must be starting soon.

Name: Changyu
Text: I must find Huainan before it starts.

Name: Uncle Fu
Text: Hey you, stop! Take your junks away!

Name: Changyu
Text: Um... Okay.

Name: Changyu
Text: Can this ID card open the doors in the cabin?

Name: Changyu
Text: Maybe I can use it later...

Name: Evil Merchant
Text: I... I remember you! You conned me last time, stupid brat!

Name: Evil Merchant
Text: Who was that... Huh? Where's my ID card?

Name: Evil Merchant
Text: W-with this one... Hehe... I can take all the confiscated goods that Kowloong Crew left in the warehouse... *Burp*

Name: Evil Merchant
Text: Whatcha looking at? Get lost! I'm enjoying me d-drinks!

Name: Huainan
Text: You shouldn't have come, Changyu.

Name: Changyu
Text: Say that to yourself!

Name: Huainan
Text: ...I have never doubted you.

Name: Huainan
Text: Take care of yourself.

Name: System Voice
Text: ...Record HNTI022858-1006

Name: System Voice
Text: ...Calling. Count 1006.
There's a night market on the deck. I can only sneak into this place while most guards are relocated.
I saw a woman on the way here. She was selling her organs just to not be thrown off the ship.
Her child was lying on the deck, dying. But she didn't even look at him.
All she did was to kneel and beg the merchant, asking for a tiny chance to extend her pathetic life.
Everyone on this ship has gone crazy. If anyone ever gets this message, please, send me a reply. I'm begging you.

Name: System Voice
Text: ...Record HNTI195607-1015
I found "him." Both the age and details match well.

Name: System Voice
Text: ...Record HNTI210843-1017
It's been a month since I last sent a message seeking help.
I was almost deceived by the illusion he brought. Pathetic. Miserable. I hate every single thing about this place.
Nobody can save anybody here.
Nobody can save me. No one. Only myself can.

Name: System Voice
Text: ...Record HNTI222208-1297
Am I getting crazy? Why? Why? Whywhywhywhywyywy

Name: System Voice
Text: Record HNTI032500-1298
This is my last message.
I won't change my mind again.

Name: Huainan
Text: Once you have suspicion, it will grow inside you.

Name: Huainan
Text: ...One day, you will understand that feeling.

Name: Huainan
Text: Changyu... Do not lose yourself anymore.

Name: Huainan
Text: Still... I cannot do it...

Name: Sister
Text: Luna... Kill them all for your sister!

Name: Luna
Text: For you...

Name: Luna
Text: Sis... Are you okay...? Sis...

Name: Sister
Text: Why is everything attacking me?!

Name: Sister
Text: Don't come to me... Go away!

Name: Sister
Text: What are you doing?! I'm hurt!

Name: Luna
Text: Sorry! Sis, are you okay?

Name: Sister
Text: How useless...

Name: Sister
Text: Whoa! Stop them! They're attacking me!

Name: Luna
Text: Leave Sis alone!

Name: Sister
Text: Is this... blood?! Is it my blood, or vital fluid? No...

Name: Luna
Text: Sis!

Name: Sister
Text: Help me... I don't want to die in a junkyard...

Name: Luna
Text: Ugh... Aaargh!

Name: Luna
Text: The power of the Ascension-Network is decreasing... Why?

Name: Luna
Text: She looks a bit different, but...

Name: Luna
Text: She is my sister! She's right there...

Name: Luna
Text: But who's next to her...?

Name: Luna
Text: Who are you... Why...?

Name: Channel Noise
Text: (Luna... She is too dangerous...)

Name: Luna
Text: The power of the Ascension-Network...is going haywire!

Name: Kamui
Text: This is the frontline. We have allies over there.

Name: Kamui
Text: There are just too many Corrupted here, as always.

Name: Kamui
Text: Out of my way. I don't have time to waste!

Name: Kamui
Text: Are you guys all right?

Name: Guarding Construct A
Text: Not too bad. You arrived just in time.

Name: Guarding Construct B
Text: Thanks.

Name: Kamui
Text: No problem. Let's finish them off together.

Name: Thompson
Text: Don't push yourself too far. Hide behind us Support Constructs whenever you spot danger.

Name: Wanshi
Text: Yeah...

Name: Guarding Construct A
Text: Sorry... I didn't expect there would be enemies with enhanced camouflage. They crossed our frontline defense.

Name: Thompson
Text: No worries. Thank you for holding the position.

Name: Thompson
Text: Wanshi, he needs some emergency maintenance. I'll cover you.

Name: Wanshi
Text: Understood.

Name: Guarding Construct A
Text: Thanks.

Name: Guarding Construct B
Text: Technician, Thompson. I'm counting on you two.

Name: Wanshi
Text: (Panting)

Name: Thompson
Text: Leave it to me, Wanshi. You take a break.

Name: Wanshi
Text: ...Yeah.

Name: Guarding Construct A
Text: Gargh, even these Corrupted have enhanced camouflage...

Name: Guarding Construct B
Text: Are our allies back from the frontline yet? We can't hold too long...

Name: Thompson
Text: Wanshi... Run in the opposite direction.

Name: Thompson
Text: Go to the frontline... Our main force is there...

Name: Wanshi
Text: Thompson! Guys!

Name: Construct A
Text: It's coming!

Name: Construct A
Text: Fall back...

Name: Construct B
Text: It's too dangerous here... You must go...

Name: Construct C
Text: Leave, now...

Name: Construct D
Text: I cannot fall... yet...

Name: Construct E
Text: This shard... is mankind's hope... I'm counting on... you...

Name: Selena
Text: I need to leave this place as soon as possible.

Name: Selena
Text: Must not let Korolev find me...

Name: Selena
Text: I must bring the shard back to Babylonia. Just a little longer...

Name: Selena
Text: I must stay strong, until the last moment.

Name: Selena
Text: Is this a terminal... to control the electronic lock?

Name: Selena
Text: (Operating)

Name: Selena
Text: Great, my computing power can open it.

Name: Selena
Text: (Operating)

Name: Selena
Text: The door is closed...

Name: Selena
Text: Safe at last...

Name: Korolev
Text: Korolev would like to issue a gentle reminder to children visiting the space station. Please follow the rules and regulations and listen to your guide.

Name: Korolev
Text: Children who fail to follow the instructions will be threated as invading germs.

Name: Korolev
Text: Next, I shall demonstrate...

Name: Korolev
Text: How an immune cell captures and destroys the invading germs!

Name: Selena
Text: I can't waste my time on these things.
Immune cell has found a germ.

Name: Chrome
Text: Squad Two is too depleted and needs to be able to withdraw quietly without too much engagement.

Name: Chrome
Text: The remaining Corrupted must be destroyed here before the reinforcements come.

Name: Chrome
Text: The threat in this area has been eliminated. Squad Two, report your evacuation status and location!

Name: Construct A
Text: ...Our... evac... task... disrupt...

Name: Construct A
Text: ...Implement...

Name: System Voice
Text: The communication signal is lost.

Name: Chrome
Text: Simulate their route based on terrain and the Corrupted distribution... Narrow down their coordinates.

Name: Chrome
Text: That way?!

Name: Chrome
Text: Only by moving to D7 can the King escape the dilemma of Fork by the White Queen.

Name: Chrome
Text: Even though this may put A8's Rook in danger.

Name: Chrome
Text: The Queen now at C4 has eliminated the possibility of Kingside Castling.

Name: Chrome
Text: He will definitely move a Pawn to F3 in response.

Name: Chrome
Text: Which is exactly what I need.

Name: Chrome
Text: The Knight at D4 will always be the threat of Checkmate Queen-side.

Name: Chrome
Text: Even if the white pieces hold the advantage, the black is not at a disadvantage.

Name: Chrome
Text: Look to the future while watching the present.

Name: Chrome
Text: We focus on different things, and on the chessboard, there is always one side who will see farther.

Name: Chrome
Text: They white really chose to move to D3, cutting the Checkmate.

Name: Chrome
Text: But now, the black Bishop has moved to E7, and the Rook at H8 is threating the Queen at A8.

Name: Chrome
Text: I couldn't beat my father at first because I was so determined to "become" Smith.

Name: Chrome
Text: But only by "outplaying" Smith could I really see the possibility of winning this game.

Name: Chrome
Text: Creating a new path by being "Chrome".

Name: Chrome
Text: Father... This is my choice.

Name: System
Text: Construct field test—Countdown—Begin.

Name: Corrupted
Text: Rargh—!

Name: Kurono Leader
Text: Don't blink... and watch your masterpiece work, Yarha.

Name: Kurono Leader
Text: Wonderful, wonderful... System, launch Musashi IX!

Name: Yarha
Text: What...?! No! That's a level-seven prototype! It's not calibrated—oh my god, you've launched it!

Name: Yarha
Text: I've got the test result—No. 21 has passed the highest level of the field test. We can stop the program now!

Name: Yarha
Text: No. 21! Stop attacking—Oh, no, she's out of control!

Name: Kurono Leader
Text: Dammit! Stop attacking now! Stay where you are! The security is coming!

Name: Kurono Leader
Text: NO! My Musashi! Activate the emergency protection system! Somebody grab the damn kid!

Name: Vera
Text: Damn it... I can't get through to headquarters either!

Name: Vera
Text: Enough is enough... Kurono...

Name: Vera
Text: Backup is on its way. No. 21, you retreat first!

Name: No. 21
Text: What will you do?

Name: Vera
Text: Daedalus uses the same defense system as Kurono. If we don't directly destroy those defenses, neither of us will get out.

Name: Vera
Text: So leave that to me... I'm a lot more experienced in dealing with Kurono than you.

Name: Vera
Text: All right, get out of my way!

Name: No. 21
Text: ...Understood.

Name: No. 21
Text: Comms channel... works now.

Name: Comms
Text: Bzzzz—

Name: No. 21
Text: This is No. 21, requesting backup. There are many enemies underground.

Name: Comms
Text: Bzzzz—Copy. We can't send reinforcements. Evacuate as soon as possible.

Name: No. 21
Text: You can't? Why...

Name: Comms
Text: Repeat…Bzzzz…Evacuate ASAP

Name: No. 21
Text: But, we're trapped!

Name: Comms
Text: Beep—

Name: No. 21
Text: ...You are still fighting.

Name: No. 21
Text: I can't leave you alone.

Name: Vera
Text: No. 21, didn't you hear me? Get out of here! That's an order!

Name: No. 21
Text: Roger...

Name: Vera
Text: No. 21, didn't you hear me? Get out of here! That's an order!

Name: No. 21
Text: An order? What does that mean?

Name: Vera
Text: Hmph... Playing dumb, right?

Name: Vera
Text: Don't you know my nick name? They call me "Death". Any Construct I team up with dies in the end. You want a challenge too?!

Name: No. 21
Text: Challenge? I'm good at challenge.

Name: Vera
Text: You are right... Your reputation is no better than mine.

Name: Vera
Text: You want to see who's crazier? I'm not going to lose.

Name: No. 21
Text: I'm ready!

Name: Vera
Text: Don't dilly-dally! Do you want you and me to die here?!

Name: Vera
Text: Are you deaf? I say, Get out!

Name: Vera
Text: There's something underneath...

Name: Vera
Text: This is the last area where soldiers haven't retreated yet.

Name: Vera
Text: Hey! Is there anyone here?!
Go... The Corrupted...

Name: Vera
Text: Grab your weapons. I do not permit you to give up yet!

Name: Soldier Tom
Text: I'm still alive...? What about the others? Captain... Carter... Eder...

Name: Captain Hiro
Text: I remember this spear... But why...

Name: Soldier Carter
Text: Is everyone... alright? Where's Eder...

Name: Captain Hiro
Text: Thank you... red-haired Construct... If it weren't for you...

Name: Vera
Text: Just cut the crap and retreat if you don't want to die.

Name: Soldier Tom
Text: But Captain, Eder...

Name: Soldier Carter
Text: Don't worry about him... He probably already recalled. Let's go.

Name: Soldier Eder
Text: I'm sorry... I wasn't brave enough to recall in the end...

Name: Vera
Text: Well, that timidness sometimes saves lives on the battlefield.

Name: Vera
Text: Now get and follow my banner's lead! We're breaking through!

Name: Roland
Text: What the heck is going on? If this is a part of the script, someone yell cut and run another take!

Name: Mandhasti
Text: Rrrgghh!

Name: Roland
Text: ...There's no time to complain. I have to run before I can get in contact with the director!

Name: Roland
Text: Gasp... H7M is not far ahead. And there's no mechanoid following me, too. That's a relief.

Name: Roland
Text: Mandy... is not here either. He was so close... and stopped a lot of mechanoids for me.

Name: Roland
Text: Could it be his way of protecting me?

Name: Roland
Text: What am I even thinking? Better get in contact with someone.

Name: Roland
Text: I... can move now. The infection of the virus has stopped.

Name: Roland
Text: Why? Is it because of that white one?

Name: Roland?
Text: Why don't you follow and ask? You have nowhere to go anyway.

Name: Roland
Text: I'm going to make a different ending this time.

Name: Roland
Text: I know this model...

Name: Roland
Text: Repair device K4X. They often used it to repair Mandy.

Name: Roland
Text: Ha, I wonder if it will spit out a sheriff...

Name: Roland
Text: ...If he is really inside, what will I see on his face?

Name: Roland
Text: Probably nothing. He will be broken beyond recognition just like those Constructs on the ground.

Name: Roland
Text: What a boring ending. Both for you and for me.

Name: Roland
Text: I can't just end here. I don't deserve to.

Name: Luna
Text: ...Enough.

Name: Luna
Text: Why do you keep following me?

Name: Luna
Text: ...Enough.

Name: Luna
Text: Why do you keep following me?

Name: Hayami
Text: Why are you the only one here? Where is everyone else?

Name: Medic
Text: The majority of the force has retreated...

Name: Hayami
Text: What...? They abandoned us?

Name: Medic
Text: No! We will never abandon you. Please go back to the area of defense with me. Someone must be waiting for us.

Name: Hayami
Text: All my teammates are dead... Thank you, but I have to get their name tags back. You go first.

Name: Hayami
Text: In case you see Flina and Kawahara... Tell them that I'm safe. And please take them back with you.

Name: Medic
Text: Alright, sure. I will come back for you later!

Name: Flina
Text: Am I gonna die here...? Ugh...

Name: Medic
Text: Don't say that, Flina. Hayami is waiting for you to get back!

Name: Flina
Text: Hayami... Hayami... Is she still alive?

Name: Medic
Text: She has already... retreated to safety. She made me promise to take you back. Let me treat your wounds. It'll be fast.

Name: Flina
Text: Thank you... I think I can move again...!

Name: Medic
Text: Let me treat your wound.

Name: Flina
Text: Ugh... No... Please leave me alone... This is no way I can get out of here.

Name: Medic
Text: Leg fracture... Please don't move. Let me immobilize the injured area first.

Name: Kawahara
Text: Thank you... Medic.

Name: Kawahara
Text: Are you gonna keep looking for other soldiers? Let me and Flina help you.

Name: Medic
Text: Leg fracture... Please don't move. Let me immobilize the injured area first.

Name: Kawahara
Text: Medic... There is no hope. Just give up on me.

Name: Kawahara
Text: In case you see Hayami... Please take her with you... I guess I don't have the chance to tell her that I love her...

Name: Cecil
Text: Although that guy didn't believe I can fight anymore, I think I'm still capable of killing several of the Corrupted!

Name: Medic
Text: That's right! It's too early to give up! Let me treat your wounds first.

Name: Cecil
Text: That guy was right... You can't possibly take us back on your own.

Name: Medic
Text: ...If you have already made up your mind, then I will get you later.

Name: Medic
Text: How reckless... But if Cecil decides to fight on, then I can't leave him there.

Name: Medic
Text: Thank you! Let me treat your wounds first.

Name: Medic
Text: I'm a medic of Squad 6. I'm here to take you back.

Name: Medic
Text: Why are you the only medic here? My comrade Cecil can't move. You can't possibly take us out of here on your own!

Name: Lieutenant
Text: My entire team is dead... Damn it! Die with me!

Name: Lieutenant
Text: They are still alive... Thank goodness. Don't stand there! Help me!

Name: Lieutenant
Text: Thank goodness! You are still alive! Haha, I knew it! Bill is not gonna die here! Let's go!

Name: Everyone
Text: Yes, sir!

Name: Everyone
Text: We're here!

Name: Medic
Text: There seems to be other wounded soldiers ahead...

Name: Cecil
Text: The Corrupted nearby are coming over...

Name: Lieutenant
Text: Go, medic. We can still move and cover you.

Name: Medic
Text: Guys... Okay! Take care of yourselves. I will take you to somewhere safe... I promise!

Name: Calliope's Voice
Text: Young Mistress... Why did you stop...? Please save me... Save those who were devoured by the Red Tide...

Name: Liv
Text: Is that Callie...? No... Callie would never say that...!

Name: Yelena's Voice
Text: What are you doing, medic? The death of the soldiers would be for nothing if you stop right now! How could you do this to them?

Name: Liv
Text: Officer wouldn't define their death as sacrifice for nothing...

Name: Mother's Voice
Text: Liv... For the good of humanity... You have to save them...

Name: Liv
Text: No matter who you are...

Name: Liv
Text: This is never the way to make everyone happy. Never. The commandant showed me a better solution than this...

Name: Liv
Text: And I can definitely do that...!

Name: Liv
Text: That is...

Name: Liv
Text: That is... me...

Name: Liv
Text: I... will never...

Name: Liv
Text: Lucia! Lucia is still fighting!

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Captain... Our battlefront damage rate has exceeded the limit! The Corrupted are coming over to siege us. We can't... We can't hold the front much longer!

Name: Construct Captain
Text: Don't panic, rookie. Don't let fear control you.

Name: Construct Captain
Text: A collective action of the Corrupted... According to records, there must be a corrupted signaling device that rallies them among them.

Name: Construct Captain
Text: Destroy that device so they won't be much of a threat to us.

Name: Construct Captain
Text: ...So, do you know what to do?

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Locate the corrupted signaling device with the radar detector and shoot them with precision...!

Name: Female Construct
Text: I disagree. We could reveal our own coordinates and attract the Corrupted here.

Name: Construct Captain
Text: So whoever finds that signaling Corrupted, immediately contact the others to launch a decapitation strike.

Name: Construct Captain
Text: This way, even if we fail, it will leave a way for those behind.

Name: Female Construct
Text: I object. The built-in radar detector in the frame is damaged. It's very hard to conduct a detection task of such high precision.

Name: Construct Captain
Text: Then use the high-precision radar in our tactical equipment instead. We have to find a higher location... There has to be a suitable location nearby.

Name: Female Construct
Text: ...Alright. I agree. Start searching the map... Got it. I've sent the coordinates to you.

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Wait! There is a signal tower several kilometers away from there. It will amplify the signals.

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: If we activate the radar near there, the Corrupted will be gathering even faster, which will leave us no time to retreat.

Name: Construct Captain
Text: Okay. We will keep that in mind.

Name: Female Construct
Text: The success of the operation is our only goal.

Name: Construct Captain
Text: Alright. Let's move. You go with the rookie. I go on my own. Any objections?

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: No!

Name: Female Construct
Text: Alright, let's go.

Name: Female Construct
Text: Who destroyed the corrupted signaling device?

Name: Female Construct
Text: Who's down?

Name: Soldier
Text: ～Oh, blood and blades.～

Name: Soldier
Text: ～An impressive battle it was, my brave comrades! But the fight is yet over, for our land is corrupted still, I'm afraid.～

Name: Soldier
Text: ～So stand! Stand! Behind you your homeland you shall guard and defend!～

Name: Soldier
Text: ～Stand! Stand! Skybound our home intends, stop us this bitter earth shan't!～

Name: Soldier
Text: ～Oh, blood and blades. One by one you've sent my friends away.～

Name: Soldier
Text: ～My dearest brother, a brave solder, scars-covered. Before my eyes he fell, the battlefield his blood colored.～

Name: Soldier
Text: ～Beside him, a noble officer, wounded and similar-fated...～

Name: Soldier
Text: ～...Crawling to the one first erased.～

Name: Soldier
Text: ～Above the blood-soaked man he lies, arms held, his lips pressing the scorched face.～

Name: Soldier
Text: ～"Slow down, dear spirit," was his plea. "Away we'll fly, if you would wait for me."～

Name: Soldier
Text: ～Weeper I am, there and then, crying for a love so sincere.～

Name: Soldier
Text: ～Oh, blood and blades. Hell has long been a most familiar place.～

Name: Soldier
Text: ～Lost count I have, the days since I first saw your slaughter some miles away.～

Name: Soldier
Text: ～Standing here, your tally I finally know—feet that no longer dance, faces that no longer kiss, arms that no longer hold.～

Name: Soldier
Text: ～My heart trembles, my fear and dread insurmountable.～

Name: Soldier
Text: ～If you would hear me, gods, bury my cowardice as you bury my friends.～

Name: Soldier
Text: ～Here I shall stay! My dying breath will guard this land!～

Name: Soldier
Text: ～Oh! Look! Do you see?～

Name: Soldier
Text: ～There, my comrades carried; there, the ship departs! Infinite is the love it holds, eternal will the dreamers last!～

Name: Soldier
Text: ～Away it sails! My hope it hails!～

Name: Soldier
Text: ～Farewell, my friends, my family...～

Name: Soldier
Text: ～Elysium-bound you will be, in the future days when you are free.～

Name: Security Captain
Text: Insufficient target miles detected. Will expel the target.

Name: Security Captain
Text: Resistance from target confirmed... Will expel the target by force.

Name: Yoyo
Text: I can't let them catch me... I haven't found dad and mom yet...

Name: Security Leader
Text: Target execution level increased. Security Leader will assist in the operation.

Name: Yoyo
Text: Ugh...

Name: Security Leader
Text: ...Commencing force execution.

Name: Pulao
Text: Ugh—

Name: Market Security
Text: Warning! Battle ahead! Warning! Battle ahead!

Name: Market Security
Text: Heading to the battle area! Heading to the battle area!

Name: Market Security
Text: Warning! High execution level target! Warning! High execution level target!

Name: Market Security
Text: Heading to the battle area! Heading to the battle area!

Name: Yazi
Text: Who is it...? Stop right there!
Lady Qu is in danger... Please trust me!

Name: Yazi
Text: Enough said!

Name: Yazi
Text: What happened...? Lady Qu!
Move! Before it's too late...!

Name: Yazi
Text: What do you know about this...?
I don't quite remember... But I have to stop Hanying!
Hanying... No!

Name: Sister
Text: You want a warm hug? Here, fall asleep in my arms...

Name: Sister
Text: God's love offers salvation.

Name: Sister
Text: Seeker of Light.

Name: Sister
Text: Tests of faith are often full of thorns.

Name: Sister
Text: Keep on going.

Name: Sister
Text: God loves all beings, saves all beings, abandons all beings...

Name: Sister
Text: Lord, have you abandoned me?

Name: Sister
Text: I give to you everything. My heart. My soul. My life.

Name: Sister
Text: What is love?

Name: Sister
Text: We are on Blessed Ground.

Name: Sister
Text: God bless.

Name: Sister
Text: Is this what God wants from me?

Name: Lucia
Text: Is that a Musashi IX in the middle?

Name: Camu
Text: You may hurt me. But my people will avenge me!

Name: Camu
Text: STAY BACK!!! AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH—

Name: Camu
Text: Let's fight!!!

Name: Camu
Text: Fourth line

Name: Lucia
Text: Press left to start, press right to view.

Name: Lucia
Text: Press the button to start a 10-second blitz. For 10 seconds, any damage taken will send you to the last save point.

Name: Lucia
Text: Press the button to view Trap frequency.

Name: Lucia
Text: Press the button to stop viewing.

Name: Celica
Text: Attention Commandants, this mission is a Stronghold assault.

Name: Celica
Text: The enemy has already deployed defenses along the route, but we only have partial enemy intel.

Name: Celica
Text: Therefore, choose your line-up carefully.

Name: Celica
Text: We have arrived at the enemy stronghold. Powerful enemies await.

Name: Celica
Text: Contact! Enemies appeared!

Name: Celica
Text: Today we're clearing this crowded Corrupted zone.

Name: Celica
Text: There are all kinds of Corrupted here and they come in huge numbers too. It's gonna be rough.

Name: Celica
Text: They're about to attack!

Name: Celica
Text: Clear Requirement: Kill a total of 100 enemies.

Name: Celica
Text: 10 enemies killed, 90 more to go.

Name: Celica
Text: 20 enemies killed, 80 more to go.

Name: Celica
Text: 30 enemies killed, 70 more to go.

Name: Celica
Text: 40 enemies killed, 60 more to go.

Name: Celica
Text: 50 enemies killed, 50 more to go.

Name: Celica
Text: 60 enemies killed, 40 more to go.

Name: Celica
Text: 70 enemies killed, 30 more to go.

Name: Celica
Text: 80 enemies killed, 20 more to go.

Name: Celica
Text: 90 enemies killed, 10 more to go.

Name: Celica
Text: All enemies have been killed. You did well today.

Name: Celica
Text: Training Mission: <color=#ff5656>Destroy all targets within the designated time</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Training Mission: <color=#ff5656>Destroy all targets. Give priority to marked Corrupted</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Training Mission: <color=#ff5656>Destroy all targets within the designated time</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ff5656>You have left the designated combat area</color>. Please return to the battlefield.

Name: Celica
Text: Hey, Commandant. There's some good news and some bad news.

Name: Celica
Text: The good news is, someone sponsored us a bunch of Cogs. We were running out.

Name: Celica
Text: The bad news is, we aren't the only ones after them.

Name: Celica
Text: We have to get our hands on these resources asap.

Name: Celica
Text: The new materials arrived today, but the transport team got sloppy and lost some along the way.

Name: Celica
Text: Could you go and salvage the missing materials for us?

Name: Celica
Text: Keep in mind, this area is not secure. Do your best to avoid all enemy contact.

Name: Celica
Text: Collect 5 crates and then extract. No need to take unnecessary risks! Good luck.

Name: Celica
Text: Materials collected 1/7.

Name: Celica
Text: Materials collected 2/7.

Name: Celica
Text: Materials collected 3/7.

Name: Celica
Text: Materials collected 4/7.

Name: Celica
Text: Materials collected 5/7. Target achieved.

Name: Celica
Text: Materials collected 6/7. Target exceeded.

Name: Celica
Text: Materials collected 7/7. All materials collected. Mission fully completed.

Name: Celica
Text: The enemy is systematically looting and destroying our materials!

Name: Celica
Text: 5 waves are expected. Be ready.

Name: Celica
Text: Objective: Protect materials and destroy all enemies.

Name: Celica
Text: This stage is currently being used for internal testing and is not an official stage.

Name: Kuroro
Text: A special snowball has appeared.

Name: Kuroro
Text: Someone just picked up lots of snowballs. Quick, hide!

Name: Kuroro
Text: Pick up items, cast skills and defeat players to earn points.

Name: Lee
Text: Gold dust falling from the sky... I was right. Some device is sending gold dust to high altitudes.

Name: Lucia
Text: Metallic dust is sometimes used to cause electrical interference. Those mechanoids seem unaffected by it though.

Name: Lee
Text: They must be the "Mechanoid Guards" Browning described.

Name: Lee
Text: Avoid or attack. I'm good with either. You decide, Commandant.

Name: Lucia
Text: These guards aren't easy to deal with. I sure hope Liv is okay...

Name: Lucia
Text: I dug them up and compared their chassis numbers. They're Goldfinch units.

Name: Lucia
Text: Where I found them, there were three immobilized guards. One of them could be the "culprit".

Name: Lucia
Text: We must find the "culprit" and get to the bottom of it.

Name: Lee
Text: Maybe their remains will hold some clues.

Name: Lee
Text: Whatever made these markings... has got to be the same type of Construct...

Name: Lucia
Text: Lee, turn him over... What's that on his back?

Name: Lee
Text: ...Yep. It's a Goldfinch Inducer.

Name: Browning
Text: It's well guarded for some place that's in the middle of nowhere...

Name: Browning
Text: Frontal assault is not our thing... Give them the slip, then pick off the weak.

Name: Browning
Text: An underground facility...

Name: Goldfinch Member
Text: Browning! Multiple contacts!

Name: Browning
Text: We aren't equipped for this.

Name: Browning
Text: Pull back to the bridge!

Name: Goldfinch Member
Text: Unknown force field detected. If we continue towards the bridge, we'll get shredded...

Name: Browning
Text: Cover me while I set up a terminal to lift the field!

Name: Browning
Text: There's one more, waiting in ambush... OPEN FIRE!!!

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant, this one's different. Normally I'd suggest pulling back...

Name: Lucia
Text: But we've got to stop it emitting that distress signal.

Name: Lucia
Text: They just keep coming! There's no time! Take it down, Commandant!

Name: Lucia
Text: Lee still hasn't found Liv... Sorry. I shouldn't have been distracted...

Name: Lucia
Text: The Construct models outside are no longer used in Babylonia.

Name: Lucia
Text: I've been observing closely. There's no guards beyond the hideout. Please stay here, Commandant...

Name: Lucia
Text: I'm going to copy their combat logs. Maybe we can get some intel...

Name: Unknown Construct
Text: Gold... Gold...

Name: Unknown Construct
Text: The Queen gives us... hope.

Name: Lucia
Text: The Queen...?

Name: Lee
Text: So the Mechanoid Guards were using these secret tunnels for rapid deployment.

Name: Lee
Text: The tunnels are covered in tin, blocking electrical signals of any forces moving through them.

Name: Iron Maiden
Text: Construct... are you a royal guard, or slave?

Name: Lee
Text: You sneak along behind me and never show yourself. I almost thought you were being shy.

Name: Iron Maiden
Text: I've decided. You must be a slave.

Name: Iron Maiden
Text: The Queen... needs me...

Name: Lee
Text: She has the ability to overpower me... so why is she running?

Name: Lee
Text: Fighting on constricted terrain eliminates the enemy's numerical advantage.

Name: Lee
Text: But it doesn't leave much space for evasion.

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant, Lee and I aren't in very good shape. For this battle, you'll need to access Construct operating systems.

Name: Lucia
Text: Lower performance could cause Dodge lag and other problems. I'd feel better if you had access.

Name: Lucia
Text: If you don't mind, Commandant...

Name: Iron Maiden
Text: My dream... is over...

Name: Browning
Text: I've got to reduce Construct energy consumption... to save energy...

Name: Liv
Text: Please stay by me when I fight.

Name: Liv
