Text: Let me take care of the fighting. I'll keep you safe.

Name: Liv
Text: It's unbelievable how many guards are lurking under the sand!

Name: Liv
Text: Browning, you're in charge of the Excavator. I'll stop the guards.

Name: Liv
Text: Guards have been pushed back. Browning, is everything okay?

Name: Browning
Text: Don't come over here!

Name: Liv
Text: Huh? The combat system has security measures...?

Name: Liv
Text: Why didn't Browning mention it...?

Name: Liv
Text: Stay calm, Liv... I need to beat them to change the energy protocols.

Name: Liv
Text: ...How?!! There are no energy protocols! It's a dummy system!

Name: Watanabe
Text: So many guards... If you can't fix the defense systems, get over here! I'm in trouble!

Name: Watanabe
Text: I'll just grab one to examine.

Name: Watanabe
Text: So the siren has three alarms.

Name: Watanabe
Text: The first two alert the guards. The third one goes to a proxy terminal.

Name: Watanabe
Text: This thing is basically useless now.

Name: Bianca
Text: Why are they all kneeling here?

Name: Bianca
Text: ... Besides the battle damage, they're in pretty good shape.

Name: Bianca
Text: More guards... They just never end.

Name: Bianca
Text: Goldfinch, can your people still fight?

Name: Bianca
Text: Encountered an ambush. Elimination begins.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Out of my way, I don't have time to waste with you.

Name: Watanabe
Text: The guards closing in are growing in number...

Name: Watanabe
Text: Can't stay too long. Get out of here quickly.

Name: Watanabe
Text: If I'm not mistaken, these engines drive those artificial sandstorms around the Golden Vortex.

Name: Watanabe
Text: But it stands to reason there must be more engines to generate so many sand storms.

Name: Watanabe
Text: My people... probably aren't trapped here.

Name: Watanabe
Text: I've been spotted! Better deal with these guys first...

Name: Watanabe
Text: Did someone rob a bank? This place is crawling with guards.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Better rush over, just in case.

Name: Bianca
Text: I'm standing right in front of them and still nothing? Maybe these Mechanoids aren't guards after all.

Name: Bianca
Text: Looks like they've got some kind of golden ring marked on them... Hard to tell what it is.

Name: Bianca
Text: What's that sound...? It's been ringing for ages...

Name: Bianca
Text: Da-da-di-da, di-di-da, di, di, da-di. What could it mean?

Name: Watanabe
Text: I'm not gonna fight you, at least not now.

Name: Watanabe
Text: This place is crawling with guards. And I only just found my people.

Name: Bianca
Text: ...Where is he?

Name: Bianca
Text: If I can flush him out, have his men draw the guards' attention, he's bound to make an appearance.

Name: Unconscious Forsaken
Text: Ah! Run! Shhh! The Warden's coming!

Name: Bianca
Text: Got to make sure those guards don't hurt him.

Name: Unconscious Forsaken
Text: Run! Run! He's coming! Run!

Name: Unconscious Forsaken
Text: I'm so scared... Leader, save me...

Name: Bianca
Text: There you are.

Name: Watanabe
Text: ...You used my people?

Name: Kamui
Text: Roland's probably cowering inside. There's no gold dust floating around in here.

Name: Kamui
Text: Fancy being brought to your knees by a spec of gold dust.

Name: Roland
Text: You're... no match for me...

Name: Kamui
Text: Whatever. I know you're gonna call in reinforcements.

Name: Kamui
Text: It doesn't matter who you send, the gold dust has turned you all into jelly!

Name: Kamui
Text: Gold dust doesn't just weaken the enemy, it interferes with their ability to tell friend from foe...

Name: Roland
Text: ...I'll just have to kill you myself!

Name: Roland
Text: ...I didn't come here to fight meaningless battles.

Name: Roland
Text: Garbage! Aim at the enemy!

Name: The Forsaken
Text: Shh... I know you... You know our leader Watanabe, right?

Name: Bianca
Text: ...You're a Forsaken?

Name: The Forsaken
Text: Quiet... Don't let the Warden hear you... He's hiding among the hostages...

Name: The Forsaken
Text: Cough... cough... Beware the Warden...

Name: Hostage
Text: ...Finally, someone has come to save us.

Name: Bianca
Text: So... you must be the "Warden". If not for the Forsaken, you might have tricked me.

Name: Hostage
Text: You dare oppose the will of the Queen!?

Name: Bianca
Text: Can you stand, human?

Name: Hostage
Text: No... I can't...

Name: Hostage
Text: Help me... Take my hand...

Name: Bianca
Text: It's okay. I'll get you out...

Name: Watanabe
Text: Everyone okay?

Name: Bianca
Text: The guards have defeated some Forsaken.

Name: Watanabe
Text: They came here to help me...

Name: Watanabe
Text: Forsaken, stand up! The battle's not over!

Name: Bianca
Text: Keep going! The battle's not over!

Name: Watanabe
Text: There's a few more left... Let me repay that volley with interest!

Name: Roland
Text: Release antibodies... and send me more guards...

Name: Roland
Text: Nithart... might be the toughest... opponent I've ever faced...

Name: Roland
Text: Still... these guards... pose no threat to an Ascendant...

Name: Nithart
Text: You put up a good fight, but you might need more antibodies.

Name: Roland
Text: Antibodies... mean nothing... to an Ascendant...

Name: Nithart
Text: You made no attempt to surrender, that's good.

Name: Nithart
Text: Show me your full strength as an Ascendant.

Name: Karenina
Text: Leave her be for a while...

Name: Karenina
Text: I can defeat the enemies safely with her barrier.

Name: Nanami
Text: Hey! How was Nanami's performance?

Name: Karenina
Text: Enough! There is still some distance away from the main building. Come with me!

Name: Nanami
Text: Alright... And you're not even praising Nanami...

Name: Nanami
Text: Ding-Ding-Dong... Ding-Ding-Dong... What are you installing, Karenina?

Name: Karenina
Text: There are so many guards. Don't tell me you're still gonna barge in by yourself.

Name: Karenina
Text: It's time for me to do some improvisation.

Name: Karenina
Text: Introducing my "automatic cannon" device. With it and my firepower, the guards pose no threat to us.

Name: Nanami
Text: So many Corrupted! So exciting! Nanami loves it!

Name: Nanami
Text: Core parts for hacking can definitely be found from these waves of Corrupted.

Name: Nanami
Text: Nanami is going to find it!

Name: Nanami
Text: Congratulations, Nanami... Core parts get!

Name: Nanami
Text: Hm...? A reinforcement request?

Name: Roland
Text: All Corrupted... Come to my coordinates... Eliminate all your obstacles...

Name: Nanami
Text: Whoa! Amazing!

Name: Nanami
Text: Your reinforcements will be right there, Roland!

Name: Karenina
Text: One transceiver terminal is not enough to avoid disruptions while rebuilding the channel.

Name: Karenina
Text: The guards are definitely gonna notice once the terminal is on... It's so damn heavy too...

Name: Karenina
Text: Where even is Nanami!

Name: Karenina
Text: Channel 1 restored in one go... Luck is on my side.

Name: Karenina
Text: Internet channel restored... for perhaps a few minutes...

Name: Karenina
Text: Whatever! I need to quickly upload the antibody's analysis report.

Name: Nanami
Text: 1, 2, 3... and the one blocked by you, there are 4 air outlets in total.

Name: Roland
Text: We can only do two of them... These guards are required for the remaining...

Name: Roland
Text: Quick! Nanami! Stuff the guards in!

Name: Roland
Text: Must have them all collapse... on the air outlets...

Name: Roland
Text: Then their mobility will be limited... after Nithart reconnects to them.

Name: Nanami
Text: Ah, Nanami has seen some of the defeated guards came alive. So they were "reconnected"!

Name: Roland
Text: That's right... Seems like only a few of them can be reconnected.

Name: Roland
Text: The influence of the antibodies weakened...

Name: Roland
Text: Nanami... Thank you! I owe you one.

Name: Nanami
Text: Naughty Roland! Hmph!

Name: Roland
Text: ...Partially utilizing the Punishing Virus is impracticable, huh. As expected.

Name: Nanami
Text: Naughty Roland, Nanami's gonna bring you home!

Name: Kamui
Text: A Construct kneeling before a guard... Is that supposed to be an insult towards us?

Name: Karenina
Text: Wait! The guard's cognition device contains the blueprint of the Golden Vortex.

Name: Karenina
Text: They were the initial builders of this spectacle in the desert.

Name: Kamui
Text: ...Can we just extract the blueprint directly? In this case, we'll know the exact route!

Name: Karenina
Text: We can't... There's an extract permission, and we only... have two chances...

Name: Karenina
Text: Also, some of the blueprints are fake...

Name: Kamui
Text: What if... we extract the fake one?

Name: Kamui
Text: Bingo! Incredible me!

Name: Karenina
Text: We were just lucky, you dimwit...

Name: Kamui
Text: That wimp has absorbed the gold dust, and that's why it became that strong...

Name: Kamui
Text: It's gonna be a tough battle...

Name: Kamui
Text: Not like it's going to stop me! Let's duke it out!

Name: Kamui
Text: If we defeat them all and collect some gold dust, we may be able to cut it down to size.

Name: Kamui
Text: Still, I need to build an equipment to spread the gold dust into the air...

Name: Kamui
Text: Man, I'm not made for this kinda work...

Name: Roland
Text: The opera of the Punishing Virus... begins...

Name: Roland
Text: All your security programs make no difference.

Name: Roland
Text: Be prepared for doom, Golden Vortex.

Name: Roland
Text: Still gonna resist...?

Name: Master-Control Program
Text: Power system crashed... Eliminating... eliminating errors...

Name: Kamui
Text: Have they noticed Nanami?

Name: Karenina
Text: Obviously! Cut the crap and come with me to protect Nanami!

Name: Karenina
Text: Hurry up! Connect the guard's system for me!

Name: Karenina
Text: Nanami is isolated and helpless, I have to get in and help her!

Name: Kamui
Text: Just put on the bio-booster arms found by Nanami! I can feel the tremendous power inside them!

Name: Kamui
Text: I should try them on the Queen's guards later!

Name: Kamui
Text: But first, I need to test the arms' strength...

Name: Karenina
Text: The only place defended by the Queen's royal guards within the whole Golden Vortex is the Queen's bedchamber.

Name: Kamui
Text: I hope their strength is worthy of their title!

Name: The Queen's Royal Guard
Text: How dare you trespass on the Queen's prohibited zone... Pay with your lives!

Name: Nanami
Text: Yeah! Nanami is going to meet Commandant real soon!

Name: Karenina
Text: But what about the front door?

Name: Kamui
Text: Don't worry. I can pry it open with one hand!

Name: Nithart
Text: Don't let go of any of them! Destroy them all!

Name: Nithart
Text: Commandant! This is your last chance!

Name: Nithart
Text: If you abandon those Constructs now, I can spare your life!

Name: Nanami
Text: There's a traitor among Nithart's guards... Nanami has met it before. It owns the door key...

Name: Lucia
Text: Traitor? Nanami, you...?

Name: Karenina
Text: Nanami has once connected to Nithart's network for a short time. If she says there's a key, there must be one.

Name: Nanami
Text: It used to be a Construct. The hole in its security system allowed it to shortly get rid of Nithart's control...

Name: Lucia
Text: Scatter! Find the Construct guard! Find the traitor!

Name: Lee
Text: I've just hacked into it, but I couldn't find any keys...

Name: Lucia
Text: Don't give up! Bianca also found a Construct guard, let's go there now!

Name: Lee
Text: Successfully hacked... but still there's no key in it...

Name: Nithart
Text: Don't ever think about hiding that from me!

Name: Nithart
Text: Guards! Quick! Obliterate the traitor with the key!

Name: Construct Guard
Text: Thank you for releasing me from Nithart's control...

Name: Karenina
Text: Too many guards here. No point wasting my energy with them...

Name: Karenina
Text: We can operate them to battle after transferring their control to my virtual control console...

Name: Karenina
Text: But I can only build one virtual control console with the materials I have...

Name: Karenina
Text: One virtual control console can only hijack one guard's control...

Name: Karenina
Text: Which one should we choose?

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant, I see Nanami on the platform far from our right side...

Name: Lee
Text: She must have dropped into the wrong tunnel and eventually fell there.

Name: Lee
Text: She's not the type to keep quiet.

Name: Lee
Text: Watch out, Nithart's guards are coming at us through the other entrance.

Name: Lucia
Text: She won't let go of us easily. So get ready to fight!

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant, Nanami is fighting alone, please closely monitor her frame's condition...

Name: Nithart
Text: Look what I've got you...

Name: Nithart
Text: Exhibit again that conceit you've shown me before, or my guards will turn you into scrap.

Name: Bianca
Text: ...Most cunning. Thankfully, I'm her opponent.

Name: Bianca
Text: I have to return to Commandant as quickly as possible.

Name: Bianca
Text: It's the last...

Name: Nithart
Text: Destroy her! This is an order from the Queen! Destroy her!

Name: Kamui
Text: The virus has damaged the security process of the energy system. Our hacking is going well so far!

Name: Kamui
Text: Implant the "anti-virus programs"...

Name: Kamui
Text: If we're able to send these anti-virus programs to the corrupted zone, the infection speed will be greatly slowed down...

Name: Kamui
Text: I've already defeated two Corrupted outside...

Name: Kamui
Text: Keep pushing! Don't lose to "yourself," Kamui!

Name: Kamui
Text: The corrupted zone is ahead...

Name: Kamui
Text: This should buy some time for the Gray Raven, right?

Name: Karenina
Text: Unable to open?! What does that mean! I managed to crack into it...

Name: Lee
Text: That's because your crack is one-way only. You can only open all security doors if you execute the crack.

Name: Lee
Text: But in that case, the guards can also get in and surround us.

Name: Lee
Text: So, apart from an "open door" function, we need a "close door" one as well. The two actions must be done at the same time.

Name: Karenina
Text: Easy-peasy! I can connect the two cracking devices to the same "repeater". Problem solved.

Name: Lee
Text: Well, repeating is the easy part. The difficult part is that the second cracking device has to connect the "closing" system.

Name: Lee
Text: As door opening and door closing are two separate systems, we can only crack it one by one.

Name: Lee
Text: Lucia and the others are defending against the guards outside. We have to crack the door closing system quickly.

Name: Lucia
Text: You need to be quick. As more and more guards are trying to break through the exterior wall, they will break through our defense soon...

Name: Karenina
Text: Right... But why did the crack fail? Definitely nothing to do with my devices.

Name: Lee
Text: Yes, Nithart crashed the system on purpose while we were cracking. That's why it failed.

Name: Lee
Text: I'll connect the door closing system to my virtual console. If she does that again, she'll be redirected to it.

Name: Karenina
Text: Operating the final crack... Security doors opened...

Name: Lucia
Text: ...Everyone, through the security door! Quick!

Name: Lucia
Text: Lee...

Name: Lee
Text: Okay. Operating the final crack... Security doors closed...

Name: Lucia
Text: Watch your front and back, the guards are tightening the encirclement...

Name: Lucia
Text: We have to destroy them all to prevent them from attacking the rescue aircraft.

Name: Bianca
Text: The royal guards are very difficult to handle. If we don't want to be attacked from both sides, we'd better concentrate our firepower on one side first.

Name: Karenina
Text: Commandant, quick! Which side! I'm gonna blow them all to smithereens!

Name: Lucia
Text: Nithart... she turned off the external sensorium of her frame.

Name: Lee
Text: She and the royal guards have already fused into one. Even if we concentrate our firepower on her, we'll still be unable to interrupt the guards' attack.

Name: Karenina
Text: Just blow 'em all up!

Name: Nanami
Text: Can we attack now? Nanami wants to fight!

Name: Bianca
Text: The Golden Vortex will turn into an inferno soon. We'd better go now. We can't let Nithart be on our way...

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant, let's make a clean break with Nithart.

Name: Haicma
Text: Loading music game tutorial personality data... Loading completed...

Name: Haicma
Text: Hi! Com—man—dant! We meet again!

Name: Haicma
Text: You mean just like the original?

Name: Haicma
Text: I refuse. According to the database, the personality data is 96.85% compatible with the current situation.

Name: Haicma
Text: It seems that you have completely understood it.

Name: Haicma
Text: Now, let's get started.

Name: Haicma
Text: Wait for it to move near the white line on the left.

Name: Haicma
Text: And tap the button on the left to clear it.

Name: Haicma
Text: Light beams will come out both from the left and the right.

Name: Haicma
Text: The light beam on the right is <color=#00CCFF>Blue</color>. When it moves near the white line on the right,

Name: Haicma
Text: tap the button on the right to clear it.

Name: Haicma
Text: Now let's give it a go.

Name: Haicma
Text: When the light beams on both sides are identical, they will be in <color=#FFCC00>yellow</color>.

Name: Haicma
Text: And you need to tap both buttons at the same time to clear them.

Name: Haicma
Text: Give it a try.

Name: Haicma
Text: And then, a new note will show up.

Name: Haicma
Text: It is comprised of two light beams front and back and an arrow in between.

Name: Haicma
Text: You need to tap the button when the first light beam reaches the white line and keep pressing it

Name: Haicma
Text: until the second light beam reaches the white line.

Name: Haicma
Text: During one [Pressing and holding] action, points and massive Combo will be generated both when you press and release.

Name: Haicma
Text: Now, give us your performance.

Name: Haicma
Text: This is the end of the tutorial!

Name: Haicma
Text: Now, please enjoy DJing, Commandant!

Name: Haicma
Text: I believe you can perfectly do a full combo and an all perfect.

Name: Haicma
Text: Tutorial ended. Restoring personality data... Restoration completed...

Name: Haicma
Text: Emotional logic system disorder... I've got a feeling that is driving me out of here.

Name: Haicma
Text: If you'll excuse me.

Name: Haicma
Text: High mobility tactical circuit activated. Evacuation started.

Name: Haicma
Text: ... I look forward to seeing you again.

Name: Haicma
Text: Do you see the <color=#CC0000>red</color> light beam on the left?

Name: Haicma
Text: Good! Now try again!

Name: Haicma
Text: I'm impressed! That's perfect!

Name: Haicma
Text: Done!

Name: Haicma
Text: Don't be nervous. Try again.

Name: Haicma
Text: Perfect!

Name: Haicma
Text: OK!

Name: Haicma
Text: Please try again.

Name: Haicma
Text: I'm impressed!

Name: Haicma
Text: You've made it!

Name: Haicma
Text: Please try harder.

Name: Haicma
Text: What a perfect performance!

Name: Haicma
Text: Good!

Name: Haicma
Text: It looks like you still need to get used to it.

Name: Haicma
Text: Next, <color=#00CCFF>[Press and Hold]</color> on the right!

Name: Haicma
Text: Amazing!

Name: Haicma
Text: Excellent!

Name: Haicma
Text: Are you joking?

Name: Haicma
Text: Finally, <color=#FFCC00>[Press and Hold]</color> on both sides!

Name: Haicma
Text: Perfect!

Name: Haicma
Text: Great!

Name: Haicma
Text: Almost there! Don't give up!

Name: Haicma
Text: Hello, Commandant.

Name: Haicma
Text: I'll start the calibration program guide. Please make adjustments according to the instructions.

Name: Haicma
Text: Tap the [+] and the [-] buttons to adjust the effective position of hitting the notes.

Name: Haicma
Text: When the [Deviation] is 0, the hit position will overlap the white line.

Name: Haicma
Text: The lower the [Deviation], the more the position will be moved forward.

Name: Haicma
Text: After the adjustments are done, tap the [Save] button to save and exit the calibration program.

Name: Haicma
Text: Moving the effective position to where suitable will help you score higher.

Name: Haicma
Text: So please set a suitable [Deviation] that suits you.

Name: Haicma
Text: This is the end of the tutorial. Happy gaming.

Name: Lee
Text: It's about time.

Name: Kuroro
Text: Ku?

Name: Lee
Text: We can't keep Commandant and Liv waiting.

Name: Kuroro
Text: Kukukuku!

Name: Lee
Text: Phew... Okay, that should be enough.

Name: Kuroro
Text: Kukukukukukukuuu...

Name: Lee
Text: ...Merry Christmas to you all as well.

Name: Elite Corrupted
Text: Urgh—Uuurgh!

Name: Corrupted
Text: Urgh!

Name: Nanami
Text: Whoa, so many bad boys here. Nanami is a good girl who refuses to resort to brute force!

Name: Nanami
Text: Then I should cut more trees quietly without being noticed by them!

Name: Nanami
Text: Yeah! Go!

Name: Nanami
Text: Hm, it looks good, and is far from the Corrupted.

Name: Nanami
Text: Even if I emit some noises, they won't notice when they're cutting trees, right?

Name: Nanami
Text: Okay! Start!

Name: Nanami
Text: These guys... They're just cutting at nothing now, but still aren't stopping...

Name: Nanami
Text: It's getting boring. Nanami's bringing the Christmas tree back! Bye bye!

Name: Nanami
Text: <size=30><color=#ff0000>1!</color></size>

Name: Nanami
Text: <size=50><color=#ff0000>2!</color></size>

Name: Nanami
Text: <size=50>3!</size>

Name: Nanami
Text: <size=70><color=#ffff00>Go!</color></size>

Name: Nanami
Text: <size=80><color=#ff0000>Stop!</color></size>

Name: Karenina
Text: The door blocks our way.

Name: Karenina
Text: What a nuisance. Just bomb 'em with the bugs!

Name: Karenina
Text: Lucia came up with the plan anyway, so she should be the one who has to take care of the consequences.

Name: Karenina
Text: I'll ring the bell before those boomboxes arrive.

Name: Karenina
Text: Hold on, the bell is so rotten that even a single touch will ruin it!

Name: Karenina
Text: Well, I don't care. At least the firework can start on time.

Name: Kamui
Text: The Gray Raven folks are so cold. They're all celebrating Christmas together without inviting me!

Name: Kamui
Text: I even prepared some gifts for them! Since I'm not invited...

Name: Kamui
Text: Let me sneak in from the roof to surprise them...

Name: Kamui
Text: Hm? What are those Corrupted doing? Do they also celebrate Christmas?

Name: Kuroro
Text: Kuku... Kuuu...

Name: Corrupted
Text: Uuuurgh—

Name: Kamui
Text: Kuroro? How did you become so tiny?

Name: Kamui
Text: Wow, you guys are picking on the weak!

Name: Kamui
Text: Don't be afraid! I'm coming to rescue you!

Name: Kamui
Text: Alright, all Corrupted were gone. Are you okay, buddy?

Name: Kuroro
Text: Kuku—ku? Kuku, kuku!!

Name: Kamui
Text: Hm? No need to thank me! It was nothing, hahaha!

Name: Kamui
Text: This is—a Santa Claus costume. Are you going to give it to me as a thank-you gift?

Name: Kuroro
Text: Ku?

Name: Kamui
Text: Great! That's exactly what I want!

Name: Kuroro
Text: Kukuku?

Name: Kamui
Text: You should leave too, so that you don't get bullied by the Corrupted again, buddy!

Name: Kuroro
Text: Ku? Ku? Ku? Ku? Ku?

Name: Kamui
Text: Thanks! Merry Christmas! Bye—

Name: α
Text: Is this one of those... shrines? Where humans used to worship gods in the Golden Age.

Name: α
Text: Do I really have to wear this...?

Name: α
Text: ...Whatever, if Luna wants to see this outfit.

Name: α
Text: There are no gods in this world. Even if there are, they can't save me.

Name: α
Text: But... What if...
(Rustling noises)

Name: α
Text: Tsk, how annoying!

Name: α
Text: ...Gods, if you do exist.

Name: α
Text: Please, make sure Luna is safe.

Name: α
Text: ...Even if gods can't do it, I will make it happen.

Name: α
Text: Better keep going. Luna's waiting for me.

Name: α
Text: Almost there.

Name: α
Text: —I only need to get rid of these trash first.

Name: α
Text: Okay. I should be able to make it on time.

Name: α
Text: ...Wait for me. I will be there for you, right in the first minute of the new year.

Name: Liv
Text: Phew... Only two areas of combat test mission left to go.

Name: Liv
Text: It was Miss Ayla's request to test the New Year Coating's combat adaptability...

Name: Liv
Text: But this is still too...

Name: Liv
Text: No, I must stop thinking. Liv, finish your mission first!

Name: Liv
Text: Miss Ayla is so good... She is not hindered by the outfit at all.

Name: Liv
Text: I wish I can wear this and go to a shrine with everyone of Gray Raven...

Name: Liv
Text: Alright, one final mission left.

Name: Liv
Text: Let's begin!

Name: Liv
Text: Oops, it's almost 12am!

Name: Liv
Text: I'm not in the shrine... But...

Name: Liv
Text: Dear God, I wish all the members of Gray Raven will always be together.

Name: Liv
Text: I hope Commandant can stay safe...

Name: Liv
Text: Thank you, God.

Name: Liv
Text: Alright, time to go back. Commandant and others are waiting for me.

Name: Lucia
Text: Let's go, Commandant.

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant, that Corrupted that has been acting as a leader is about to run off. Let's go after it.

Name: Lucia
Text: Save your breath. Commandant and I won't spare any single one of Corrupted.

Name: Lucia
Text: Still late... Tch!

Name: Lucia
Text: ...Something has exposed my location for sure.

Name: Lucia
Text: Never mind, I was just talking to myself.

Name: Sophia
Text: I didn't know consciousness connection would be that different from usual.

Name: Lee
Text: I'm like Commandant's little doll. Please take good care of us, will you?

Name: Sophia
Text: Wait... In this sense...

Name: Lee
Text: It seems that the connection between Commandant and here is over. We'll search this area shortly.

Name: Sophia
Text: I'll give it my all, Commandant!

Name: Ayla
Text: Speaking of which, Commandant, have you noticed that some of our voice messages weren't censored?

Name: Ayla
Text: Perhaps it can be used to recognize our true identities.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Will recognizing who we are... really help us get through this situation?

Name: Ayla
Text: Commandant, it seems you have to change your connection target.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Will the next guy find Commandant?

Name: Ayla
Text: Not sure, but we've already narrowed down the range of searching area. We should be able to calculate Commandant's location very soon.

Name: Ayla
Text: I'll see you at that place, Commandant.

Name: Liv
Text: Consciousness connection...

Name: Liv
Text: In a nutshell, Commandant exists within my body in addition to ■■■■■, right?

Name: Liv
Text: Let us show you the power of the trio, Corrupted!

Name: Liv
Text: Ah, It's the message from ■■■■■. I'll go to the rendezvous point too.

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant, wait for me!

Name: Vera
Text: I'll repeat the rules, just for you.

Name: Vera
Text: Those standing before you are the Constructs closest to you.

Name: Vera
Text: The reason they become like this is because of your cognitive bias.

Name: Vera
Text: Next, I'll ask questions like which one is the real Liv and which one is the real Kamui.

Name: Vera
Text: What you need to do is to point out their true identities.

Name: Vera
Text: Of course, it'd be great if you're right. But if you're wrong—

Name: Vera
Text: Nozzle comes close to initiating a self-destruct sequence. This will damage you and the Constructs.

Name: Vera
Text: Humph, are you really be able to recognize each of them? I look forward to your performance.

Name: Vera
Text: What? This is...!

Name: Vera
Text: Wrong. That's a pity. Your Constructs will get hurt if you don't pay more attention.

Name: Vera
Text: First Question. Which one is Kamui?

Name: Vera
Text: Correct, though it's merely a simple one.

Name: Vera
Text: Second question. Which one is Liv?

Name: Vera
Text: Correct. As expected, that humility has made it too obvious.

Name: Vera
Text: Third question. Which one is Bianca?

Name: Vera
Text: How does it feel like to be mistaken for Watanabe, your sworn enemy?

Name: Vera
Text: No need to overreact. I've been watching it from the very beginning.

Name: Vera
Text: Fourth question. Which one is Ayla?

Name: Vera
Text: No fun. When she said association, the answer nearly came to the surface.

Name: Vera
Text: Fifth question. Which one is Chrome?

Name: Vera
Text: That said, Chrome appearing in this place really surprised me. I thought he was preparing for the next special mission.

Name: Vera
Text: Sixth Question. Which one is Lee?

Name: Vera
Text: Well, as you've excluded all deceptive answers, it's no surprise that you chose the correct one.

Name: Vera
Text: Why don't you give scythes a shot? You seem to be a great scythe wielder.

Name: Vera
Text: After all, nothing is hard for you... Hah.

Name: Vera
Text: Seventh question. Which one is Karenina... To be honest, I don't want to go on like this either. The rest are all super simple ones.

Name: Vera
Text: Uh... Alright alright. Correct. All words coming from this mouth would be censored by the connection system.

Name: Vera
Text: The last question. Which one is Lucia? Press the confirm button <color=#ff6633>now</color> to finish this game.

Name: Vera
Text: Why don't you act? Lucia stood right there. You didn't fall asleep, did you?

Name: Vera
Text: ...What!?

Name: Vera
Text: That's not Lucia... Hahahaha, so you really can recognize her. Hahaha!

Name: Vera
Text: Perfect. You're right...

Name: Vera
Text: ...For hell's sake. I knew it. The bond between commandant and Construct is but a joke.

Name: Vera
Text: How can you not recognize the Construct staying by your side all the time?

Name: Vera
Text: No way. How can you pick this one? You're not a moron, aren't you?

Name: Vera
Text: Fine...

Name: Vera
Text: Lu... Musashi, catch that Nozzle!
Here, Commandant!

Name: Watanabe
Text: Hey, Akdilek girl, what are you doing...?

Name: Sophia
Text: Sorry, my hand slipped.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Causing troubles instead of killing me, huh... Lucky that you're a Support type.

Name: Sophia
Text: Sophia doesn't understand what you are talking about.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Whatever... Keep pretending.

Name: Watanabe
Text: But you can't keep hiding. We have big guys coming.

Name: Sophia
Text: As expected, they are Attacker Constructs. Very old models though.

Name: Watanabe
Text: What exactly are you planning?

Name: Lucia
Text: Can I use these leaves?

Name: Watanabe
Text: Yeah, they still have a bitter taste, but I guess we don't have a better option.

Name: Watanabe
Text: We need more though. These aren't enough.

Name: Lee
Text: Corrupted spotted. Let's get rid of them first.

Name: Lucia
Text: I never knew there were plants in the desert.

Name: Liv
Text: I feel sorry for these plants...

Name: Lee
Text: I bet these leaves have never thought they would get picked in a desert.

Name: Lucia
Text: I wonder what kind of zongzi Lucia would like?

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant, I think red bean will be a great addition to the zongzi.

Name: Lee
Text: The leaves are a bit annoying, but zongzi contain meat and rice, making them a great food.

Name: Changyu
Text: This Corrupted... I knew it...

Name: Watanabe
Text: Focus on the Corrupted around you. You could easily die if you get distracted.

Name: Changyu
Text: Yes! Got it.

Name: System Voice
Text: Truth or dare!

Name: System Voice
Text: Answer the other person's question within the time limit!

Name: System Voice
Text: If you can't answer, or refuse to... You'll have to perform a daring forfeit!

Name: Liv
Text: So this is like a mind training, where Liv must answer Commandant's questions. I will do my best!

Name: System Voice
Text: Question: What's your fondest wish?

Name: Liv
Text: To defeat Punishing Virus and take back the Earth.

Name: System Voice
Text: Question: What will you do if your most important person argues with you?

Name: Liv
Text: Could it be... I have done something wrong? I'll try to correct my mistake, and apologize to Com—to that person, I mean.

Name: System Voice
Text: Question: Which type of boyfriend do you prefer: cat or dog?

Name: Liv
Text: Huh...? What do you mean by cat and dog...?

Name: Kamui
Text: An animal as boyfriend...?

Name: Lee
Text: No way.

Name: System Voice
Text: Too bad! You failed to answer within the time limit! You must face a forfeit!

Name: Liv
Text: The ammo of my Levi-Gun has all become water... Is it because we are in a game?

Name: Lee
Text: It's a game from the Golden Age. The questions are probably based on the pop culture of that era.

Name: Liv
Text: I see. I need a better understanding of the Golden Age culture to answer these questions.

Name: Liv
Text: Let me connect to the old human database... Alright. Liv will be able to answer any question now!
Here comes the first question—
<color=#ff0000>What is the most horrible thing you have ever done to Commandant?</color>

Name: Liv
Text: What?! How can there be such a question? How did it know...
Countdown: 3—2—

Name: Liv
Text: Argh... I-I once took away the snacks that Commandant hid in the room!
The second question is—
<color=#ff0000>Tell us one thing that you regret the most.</color>

Name: Liv
Text: ...There are many of them. I can't really tell them all...
Hmm... Let's skip this question then.
Last question: <color=#ff0000>Tell us one thing that you absolutely don't want Commandant to know!</color>

Name: Liv
Text: Absolutely...not...

Name: Kamui
Text: Liv, are you alright? Your face looks really red.

Name: Liv
Text: I... I choose the dare!

Name: Nanami
Text: Here—comes—Nanami!

Name: Lee
Text: You just put your personal data in here... That was so risky.

Name: Lee
Text: I trust you have heard us. They are very important, so you must not break them.

Name: Nanami
Text: Nanami found them! Don't stop Nanami!

Name: Watermelon
Text: The watermelon has a metallic shine. This must be the "mission item" that Liv mentioned.

Name: Surfboard
Text: There's a line printed on it: "A rare item that was used by humans to tame the tide in early days."

Name: Yellow Duck
Text: The yellow duck may be late, but it will never be absent.

Name: Starry Floatie
Text: Good-looking, but not too practical. Maybe a bit rough.

Name: Sand Castle
Text: Once a majestic project, but now it's in ruins.

Name: Liv
Text: Those monsters...aren't targeting us.

Name: Lee
Text: They are moving toward the mission items!

Name: Kamui
Text: Why would they want to destroy game items?

Name: Nanami
Text: Nanami only put us in the game. I didn't control their actions.

Name: Lee
Text: Perhaps there's something in the watermelon. Let's stop them first.

Name: System Voice
Text: <color=#ff0000>Warning! Illegal hacking attempt detected!</color>

Name: System Voice
Text: <color=#ff0000>Illegal hacking attempt detected! Illegal hacking attempt detected!</color>

Name: System Voice
Text: <color=#ff0000>Activating self-destruction...</color>

Name: Kamui
Text: Oh no! The watermelon is going to be destroyed!

Name: Liv
Text: Leave it to me. I'll put out the fire!

Name: Liv
Text: Suddenly turned into an indoor scene...?

Name: Liv
Text: Wait, Commandant! I can't find Lee and Lucia.

Name: East General
Text: Relax. I invited them to the room to help set up the test.

Name: Liv
Text: Test?

Name: East General
Text: Yes. In this room you will see two of your comrades next to their illusions.

Name: East General
Text: Talk to them, find out which ones are real, and rescue them. That's your test.

Name: Liv
Text: This is a real or fake game, huh? Let's give it try, Commandant.

Name: Lucia
Text: Didn't know the test would involve me being tied up...

Name: Lucia
Text: I am the real Lucia. I remember my birthday is June 15.

Name: Lucia
Text: Didn't know the test would involve me being tied up...

Name: Lucia
Text: I am the real Lucia. I remember my Construct ID is BPL-01.

Name: East General
Text: Correct!

Name: Lucia
Text: We're Gray Ravens after all! Let's keep it up, Liv.

Name: Liv
Text: Sure thing.

Name: Liv
Text: No, Commandant, this one is not Lucia.

Name: East General
Text: Can't believe you got it wrong. A penalty is in order.

Name: East General
Text: That was not bad.

Name: East General
Text: Now find your other comrade.

Name: Lee
Text: The general decides what intel I can or cannot give you...

Name: Lee
Text: Anyway, I am Lee. I can fire consecutive shots when Red Orb is activated.

Name: Lee
Text: The general decides what intel I can or cannot give you...

Name: Lee
Text: Anyway, I am Lee. I can fire precision shots when Red Orb is activated.

Name: East General
Text: Correct!

Name: Lee
Text: Phew... So we passed the test, right, General?

Name: East General
Text: Yes.

Name: Liv
Text: No, Commandant, this one is not Lee.

Name: East General
Text: Can't believe you got it wrong. A penalty is in order.

Name: East General
Text: Good. Liv found her real comrades and passed the test in the end.

Name: East General
Text: Congratulations! Here's your reward—the key to the ghost-hunting venue.

Name: Liv
Text: Is that a portrait of Kamui... on the key?

Name: Kuroro
Text: Not satisfied, huh?

Name: Kuroro
Text: Perhaps I can help.

Name: Kuroro
Text: Ku—ro—ro!

Name: Kuroro
Text: You did it! When you see the real one, you will understand!

Name: Lucia
Text: Didn't know the test would involve me being tied up...

Name: Lucia
Text: I am the real Lucia. My favorite item is Froggie.

Name: Lucia
Text: Didn't know the test would involve me being tied up...

Name: Lucia
Text: I am the real Lucia. My favorite item is the red scarf.

Name: Lucia
Text: Didn't know the test would involve me being tied up...

Name: Lucia
Text: I am the real Lucia. I wield dual blades.

Name: Lucia
Text: Didn't know the test would involve me being tied up...

Name: Lucia
Text: I am the real Lucia. Lotus Berserker is my signature weapon.

Name: Lee
Text: The general decides what intel I can or cannot give you...

Name: Lee
Text: Anyway, I am Lee. I like to upgrade weapons with all kinds of strange mods.

Name: Lee
Text: The general decides what intel I can or cannot give you...

Name: Lee
Text: Anyway, I am Lee. "360° Shooting" is one of my tactical skills.

Name: Lee
Text: The general decides what intel I can or cannot give you...

Name: Lee
Text: Anyway, I am Lee. I don't like it when people call me bro.

Name: Lee
Text: The general decides what intel I can or cannot give you...

Name: Lee
Text: Anyway, I am Lee. I've never been in a team before joining Gray Raven.

Name: South General
Text: What I've got for you is a simple test of counting skills!

Name: Lee
Text: Counting skills...?

Name: South General
Text: Mm-hmm. The machines will be erratically moving around within a confined area. You need to remember how many of them there are and what they look like.

Name: South General
Text: Say, we have three Repairers, a Ground Monitor, and an Aerial Monitor within the confined area.

Name: South General
Text: I'll ask you: "Which one is the most numerous?"

Name: Lee
Text: I see.

Name: South General
Text: Alrighty. If there are no more questions, let's get started!

Name: South General
Text: Correct... Congratulations, you passed the test. Here's the key!

Name: Lee
Text: Is that a portrait of Bianca?

Name: Kuroro
Text: Not satisfied, huh?

Name: Kuroro
Text: Perhaps I can help.

Name: Kuroro
Text: Ku—ro—ro!

Name: Kuroro
Text: You did it! When you make a choice, you will understand!

Name: West General
Text: I've been waiting for you, Challengers! I am West General. I will be testing your courage in the face of evil!

Name: Lucia
Text: Courage...?

Name: West General
Text: Yep. Ahead of you is an abyss littered with traps.

Name: West General
Text: You just need to do one thing: observe and find a way out!

Name: West General
Text: Just so we're clear... I'm not like those two you met earlier. My traps are no child's play. Hehe.

Name: Lee
Text: What...?

Name: Lucia
Text: Just avoid the traps, and we'll be fine. I trust Commandant's judgment and will follow accordingly.

Name: Lucia
Text: Let's begin, Commandant.

Name: West General
Text: What... the hell?!

Name: Lucia
Text: So the key this time... Uh, isn't this Liv?

Name: Lucia
Text: Didn't expect to see a Gray Raven on it.

Name: Kuroro
Text: Not satisfied, huh?

Name: Kuroro
Text: Perhaps I can help.

Name: Kuroro
Text: Ku—ro—ro!

Name: Kuroro
Text: You did it! I shall illuminate your path forward!

Name: Lee
Text: Commandant... Something's wrong. My body is...

Name: North General
Text: That's because I rigged this place. Anyway, just remember: only one "tactic" per person.

Name: Lucia
Text: In other words, Commandant, each one of us can only use one type of Signal Orbs.

Name: North General
Text: Allocate your powers properly to beat the challenge. Consider this a test of your leadership, Commandant.

Name: North General
Text: Uh... How could you still win after I set so many restrictions?!

Name: Lucia
Text: If it was just you versus me, you might yet stand a chance. But I'm not fighting alone.

Name: Lucia
Text: I'm with the Gray Raven squad.

Name: North General
Text: Ughhh!

Name: Lucia
Text: And so the fourth key bears the portrait of... Nanami.

Name: Kuroro
Text: Long time no see! I take it you still remember me from the previous tests?

Name: Kuroro
Text: Well, I will continue to assist you in this one.

Name: Kuroro
Text: Ku—ro—ro!

Name: Kuroro
Text: You did it! May you have infinite energy and Skill Orbs!

Name: Karenina
Text: Tsk, guess I just have to start repairing the comms device.

Name: Bianca
Text: What can I do to help you?

Name: Karenina
Text: Help me take care of those newbies.

Name: Karenina
Text: That would be better for them.

Name: Bianca
Text: ...Alright.

Name: Karenina
Text: I need two parts to repair it. A portable battery and a receiver.

Name: Karenina
Text: These Terrapods were supposed to be practice partners for new soldiers...

Name: Karenina
Text: Right, I can find suitable batteries on them.

Name: Karenina
Text: Guess this model will work...

Name: Karenina
Text: What was that sound?

Name: Karenina
Text: No, it's from the warehouse. I've got to check it out.

Name: Karenina
Text: Hmm? This place is supposed to be unmanned. What are you doing here?

Name: Construct
Text: Instructor Karenina...? I'm on sentry duty.

Name: Karenina
Text: Sentry duty... Why weren't you here just now?

Name: Construct
Text: ...I'm sorry, but you can't go through here.

Name: Karenina
Text: (This guy must be covering something.)

Name: Construct
Text: Instructor, I can't let you pass.

Name: Karenina
Text: Really?

Name: Construct
Text: No, I'm sorry.

Name: Construct
Text: Instructor... I said, you must not go through.

Name: Karenina
Text: Who cares! Out of my way!

Name: Construct
Text: Ugh! How did you break the barrier, Instructor...?

Name: Construct
Text: Ugh... You are too powerful, Instructor.

Name: Karenina
Text: Hmph, let me see what you're trying to hide.

Name: Karenina
Text: I knew the receiver was in here. Dammit! Why is the barrier starting on its own?!

Name: Karenina
Text: Lucky there was backup ID card from the training center.

Name: Karenina
Text: Wait, why is this activated?

Name: Karenina
Text: It's over now!

Name: Karenina
Text: I just need to connect to the satellite next... Done!

Name: Bianca
Text: You can go first then, Karenina. It's your reward.

Name: Karenina
Text: Wait, what?

Name: Kuroro
Text: Kuroro, Kurororo—

Name: Karenina
Text: What's this guy talking about...?

Name: Kuroro
Text: Ku—ro—ro—

Name: System Voice
Text: <<Scanning buff effect allocations<<<<<

Name: Karenina
Text: Good, I have both the portable battery and the receiver. I can start fixing the comms device now.

Name: Karenina
Text: You activated the Terrapods, didn't you?

Name: Karenina
Text: The bottom layer codes of the Terrapod were tampered with. I bet you are going to cheat for the test a few days later!

Name: Construct
Text: S-sorry, Instructor Karenina! I don't want to fail...

Name: Karenina
Text: Hoh? How about I give you a zero right away and send you back where you came from?

Name: Construct
Text: No! Please don't...

Name: Karenina
Text: Then move your @#$ right away and start thinking! Think how you can win!

Name: Karenina
Text: I'll blow your head off if I ever find you doing this trick again!

Name: Construct
Text: Yes ma'am!

Name: Pulao
Text: ...I'll never trust you two again.

Name: Changyu
Text: Trust is a fragile thing indeed.

Name: Sophia
Text: Just like Mistress Jamilah said.

Name: Pulao
Text: And whose fault is that?!

Name: Changyu
Text: Anyway, we still need some preparation before leaving the message. You can go to the comms room and wait for us.

Name: Pulao
Text: What are you doing?

Name: Changyu
Text: A special performance to make ourselves stand out, of course.

Name: Sophia
Text: Speaking of the performance, what's your plan?

Name: Changyu
Text: I don't have a partner to perform kungfu with. Let's go with a safer option, lion dance!

Name: Sophia
Text: We'll need more performers for the lion dance then.

Name: Hanged Man Foreman
Text: Greetings, Akdilek duo. What can I help you with?

Name: Changyu
Text: We'd like to find some performers for lion dance. Do you have any suggestion?

Name: Hanged Man Foreman
Text: Lion dance... A great tradition.

Name: Hanged Man Foreman
Text: My workers can probably do it, but you need to persuade them first.

Name: Changyu
Text: Hmph, I'm good at that.

Name: Hanged Man Foreman
Text: Come back to me once everybody has agreed to do it.

Name: Sophia
Text: Hi, would you like to join our lion dance team?

Name: Hanged Man A
Text: No, I don't have the mood. I just lost my goods.

Name: Sophia
Text: What's gone is gone. You should move on.

Name: Hanged Man A
Text: You've got a point... Fancy a duel? If you can beat me, I'll join.

Name: Sophia
Text: Sure.

Name: Changyu
Text: Hey, can you join my lion dance team?

Name: Hanged Man A
Text: What's a lion dance? I'm looking for my lost goods.

Name: Changyu
Text: I see. Will you join us if we help you find them?

Name: Hanged Man A
Text: ...If you really can. Now just leave me alone!

Name: Hanged Man A
Text: You're a good fighter. I lost.

Name: Sophia
Text: Like you said, I should join you and move on!

Name: Hanged Man A
Text: Welcome.

Name: Changyu
Text: Hey, would you like to join our lion dance team...

Name: Hanged Man B
Text: No! I'm busy. Leave me alone!

Name: Changyu
Text: That's harsh...

Name: Sophia
Text: I can give it a try.

Name: Changyu
Text: Alright, you go.

Name: Sophia
Text: Excuse me, would you like to join our lion dance team?

Name: Hanged Man B
Text: Lion dance...? I said I was busy. I've got no time to play with you.

Name: Sophia
Text: We're not "playing." We are doing real lion dance.

Name: Hanged Man B
Text: I've had enough of this lion dance thing! Get lost before I beat you up!

Name: Changyu
Text: Hey, watch your language!

Name: Sophia
Text: ...Sophia's all up for a fight.

Name: Hanged Man B
Text: Cough... Ugh! S-stop!

Name: Sophia
Text: Hmph, that will teach you! Do you want to join us now?

Name: Hanged Man B
Text: A-alright, I'm in.

Name: Sophia
Text: Good.

Name: Changyu
Text: Excuse me, that merchant lost some goods. Have you seen it?

Name: Hanged Man B
Text: W-what?! What do I have to do with that?

Name: Changyu
Text: I'm just asking around because he can't find them.

Name: Hanged Man B
Text: I have never seen them! Go away!

Name: Changyu
Text: (He is definitely a suspect... Let me look for more witness.)

Name: Sophia
Text: Hello, do you have a minute?

Name: Hanged Man B
Text: No. I'm busy!

Name: Sophia
Text: Busy shipping the stolen goods out, huh?

Name: Changyu
Text: Sophia?

Name: Hanged Man B
Text: Aye... Wait, what are you talking about?

Name: Sophia
Text: Enough said. I can smell a lie in you.

Name: Hanged Man B
Text: Wait, wait!

Name: Sophia
Text: Excuse me, have you noticed any abnormal behavior from that Hanged Man over there?

Name: Ballwheel
Text: No! I didn't see anything!

Name: Sophia
Text: ...Ugh. Ballwheel doesn't want to talk to Sophia...

Name: Changyu
Text: Don't worry, let me try.

Name: Sophia
Text: Excuse me...

Name: Ballwheel
Text: Gargh! (Shocked)

Name: Changyu
Text: Let me talk to him.

Name: Changyu
Text: You're working really hard. Must be very exhausting.

Name: Ballwheel
Text: You bet! Have to finish Foreman's assignment.

Name: Changyu
Text: Anyway, I like your wheels. Did you just paint them?

Name: Ballwheel
Text: Haha, you've got great taste! I changed them on the deck a few days ago.

Name: Changyu
Text: Oh? Have you been here all along these days?

Name: Ballwheel
Text: Yeah, I'm always here.

Name: Changyu
Text: Good, there's something I need to ask you. Have you noticed any abnormal behavior from that Hanged Man over there?

Name: Changyu
Text: For example, moving something in secret?

Name: Ballwheel
Text: Hmm... Now you mention it, I saw him moving something last night.

Name: Changyu
Text: I see. Thank you very much!

Name: Hanged Man B
Text: What are you doing here again? I said I didn't see anything...

Name: Changyu
Text: Lying is not good, you know?

Name: Hanged Man B
Text: I-I never lied!

Name: Changyu
Text: Hmph! We already found a witness. He told me everything you did! Are you going to confess or not?

Name: Changyu
Text: Shut up! Give the goods back!

Name: Hanged Man B
Text: Dammit, took me so long to get them...

Name: Sophia
Text: But they aren't yours. Sophia hates those who disrupt the trade.

Name: Hanged Man B
Text: Alright, alright... Take them!

Name: Changyu
Text: Good on you. Never too late to change!

Name: Changyu
Text: Now that we are done, do you want to join my lion dance team?

Name: Hanged Man B
Text: I'm busy... Well, not anymore. Wouldn't hurt to join.

Name: Changyu
Text: Awesome. Welcome!

Name: Changyu
Text: I've got all your goods back.

Name: Hanged Man A
Text: Really? I thought you were joking. Where did you find them?

Name: Sophia
Text: Another Hanged Man stole them.

Name: Hanged Man A
Text: Another Hanged Man... Don't tell me it's that guy!

Name: Changyu
Text: Let's put that aside for now. Are you going to join our team?

Name: Hanged Man A
Text: You found me the good, and I will keep my promise.

Name: Changyu
Text: Great, let's have a lot of fun together!

Name: Hanged Man B
Text: S-stop beating me! I'll give you the goods!

Name: Sophia
Text: Well, I knew you had them!

Name: Hanged Man B
Text: Take them and go! Don't come back!

Name: Sophia
Text: We got all your goods back.

Name: Hanged Man A
Text: Really? I thought you were joking. Where did you find them?

Name: Changyu
Text: Another Hanged Man stole them. Sophia taught him a good lesson and got them all back.

Name: Hanged Man A
Text: Another Hanged Man... Don't tell me it's that guy!

Name: Hanged Man A
Text: Well, forget about him. I'll join your team.

Name: Sophia
Text: Alright. Welcome.

Name: Hanged Man B
Text: Go away! I don't want to talk to you!

Name: Changyu
Text: Sigh... He's not even listening.

Name: Sophia
Text: Let me try.

Name: Hanged Man B
Text: Alright. Don't just start fighting, okay?

Name: Sophia
Text: Hi, would you like to join our lion dance team?

Name: Hanged Man B
Text: Why are you back again?!

Name: Sophia
Text: You've got no goods to hide now. Just join us.

Name: Hanged Man B
Text: Hah... Fine, I will.

Name: Sophia
Text: Good, welcome.

Name: Chubby Red
Text: I don't want to work! I will not work! AAAAGGHHH!

Name: Sophia
Text: Is this another guy mentioned by the Hanged Man Foreman?

Name: Chubby Red
Text: Oh, if only I can have some oil... Some extra low-grade oil that can make my body smoking hot...

Name: Sophia
Text: Oil... Smoking hot...?

Name: Changyu
Text: Sophia's here, don't tell your weird jokes! We only want to ask you to join our lion dance team.

Name: Chubby Red
Text: Weird? I'm not weird! And I will never join a lion dance team!

Name: Sophia
Text: ...Sophia will complete the mission.

Name: Chubby Red
Text: I don't want to work! I will not work! AAAAGGHHH!

Name: Changyu
Text: I don't think he will join us.

Name: Chubby Red
Text: Oh, if only I can have some oil... Some extra low-grade oil that can make my body smoking hot...

Name: Changyu
Text: Is there even such thing?

Name: Changyu
Text: There are some merchants on this ship. Perhaps one of them would sell it.

Name: Chubby Red
Text: Oh, how strange... I feel as good as if I had some extra low-grade oil...

Name: Chubby Red
Text: Oh that was great. Thanks for that... Let me join your lance team too!

Name: Sophia
Text: Good, welcome.

Name: Changyu
Text: Hello...

Name: Hanged Man B
Text: No! I'm busy! Go away!

Name: Changyu
Text: What a poor attitude.

Name: Sophia
Text: I've got this.

Name: Sophia
Text: Hello—

Name: Hanged Man B
Text: (Scared) W-what?

Name: Sophia
Text: Do you have any lubricating oil that can make a machine smoke?

Name: Hanged Man B
Text: I do, I do. Here you are. Do you like it?

Name: Sophia
Text: Thank you.

Name: Hanged Man B
Text: Um, you're welcome.

Name: Chubby Red
Text: Ah, this is the one. My antique radar is aroused.

Name: Chubby Red
Text: I do feel a bit dirty...

Name: Changyu
Text: Stop! Take it and join our lion dance team.

Name: Chubby Red
Text: Alright, alright, just give it to me already.

Name: Chubby Red
Text: Oh! I'm smoking!

Name: Changyu
Text: I should ask Pulao to do something about this.

Name: Sophia
Text: Hello...

Name: Chubby Red
Text: No! I'm busy! Go away!

Name: Changyu
Text: I don't like his attitude. Let me talk to him.

Name: Changyu
Text: You sell things, don't you? Do you have some extra low-grade oil that can make a machine smoke?

Name: Hanged Man B
Text: ...Wow.

Name: Changyu
Text: Hmm? Do you have something?

Name: Hanged Man B
Text: I would not have shown it to anyone... But since you asked, I can sell it to you.

Name: Changyu
Text: Thanks.

Name: Sophia
Text: Hello, our lion dance team is looking for new members. Are you interested?

Name: Ballwheel
Text: Lion dance? With you? No thanks. I would think about it if you can prove that you are stronger than me though.

Name: Sophia
Text: Alright, I will!

Name: Changyu
Text: Our lion dance team is looking for new members. Are you interested?

Name: Ballwheel
Text: Lion dance? Do you mean that dancing and hopping lion performance?

Name: Changyu
Text: Too bad you can't throw your wheels out while jumping.

Name: Ballwheel
Text: Ugh... Whatever, I don't enjoy my work anyway. Count me in if it's fun!

Name: Changyu
Text: You surely aren't very busy...

Name: Ballwheel
Text: Wow, you're good!

Name: Sophia
Text: Thanks. Would you like to join us now?

Name: Ballwheel
Text: Absolutely!

Name: Sophia
Text: Alright. Welcome.

Name: Hanged Man Foreman
Text: I see you have gathered everyone... You know what the final step is, don't you?

Name: Sophia
Text: Is this the final step?

Name: Hanged Man Foreman
Text: I heard that you were really "nice" to my workers. I will be greatly disappointed if you can't even defeat me.

Name: Sophia
Text: Are we fighting? I see.

Name: Hanged Man Foreman
Text: I see you have gathered everyone... You know what the final step is, don't you?

Name: Changyu
Text: Is there a final test?

Name: Hanged Man Foreman
Text: No. My guys all spoke highly of you.

Name: Hanged Man Foreman
Text: Their opinions matter a lot to me. That alone would make me join your lion dance team.

Name: Changyu
Text: Really? Hooray!

Name: Hanged Man Foreman
Text: I see you have gathered everyone... You know what the final step is, don't you?

Name: Changyu
Text: What is that?

Name: Hanged Man Foreman
Text: I see you have persuaded all my workers to join. You've got some decent capabilities.

Name: Hanged Man Foreman
Text: Well, time to prove to me that you have what it takes to be the lion dance leader, Akdilek duo.

Name: Sophia
Text: Understood. Sophia's all up for a fight.

Name: Hanged Man Foreman
Text: Good work, young blood.

Name: Changyu
Text: What about the lion dance?

Name: Hanged Man Foreman
Text: I'm in, of course!

Name: Sophia
Text: Alright. Welcome to the team.

Name: Changyu
Text: Hoho, now that we have the team ready.

Name: Changyu
Text: I'm sure we will be the best performance in the comms.

Name: Sophia
Text: But the show you planned would take at least 40 minutes... I think we only have 5 minutes each.

Name: Changyu
Text: Oops... You should have told me earlier, Sophia.

Name: Watanabe
Text: I knew there would be some remnant Corrupted around here...

Name: Watanabe
Text: Good, I can now get some usage data of this "portable support unit."

Name: Watanabe
Text: Hope it doesn't disappoint me...

Name: Watanabe
Text: Destroy all the invading Corrupted... Let none survive!

Name: Watanabe
Text: The Corrupted are separated by complicated pathways.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Let's take them down one by one!

Name: Bianca
Text: Karenina... You've gone too far!

Name: Karenina
Text: Someone is surrounded by these red machines!

Name: Karenina
Text: If I heard her correctly... We need to help her!

Name: Nanami
Text: Huh? You're... Karey deary!

Name: Nanami
Text: Bianca and Commandant are here as well!

Name: Nanami
Text: But why are you here?

Name: Karenina
Text: I'm supposed to be the one asking...

Name: Nanami
Text: Don't bully Nanami's friends!

Name: Karenina
Text: You said "collecting"... What do you plan to do to it?!

Name: Nanami
Text: We aren't going to do anything to "it," Karey deary! We just need to collect what it drops!

Name: Karenina
Text: ...So we still need to aim our shots, don't we?

Name: Nanami
Text: Hmm, I think that's enough. I feel very sad for it if we keep firing.

Name: Karenina
Text: It's already sad enough.

Name: Nanami
Text: Alright, we have all the baits. Now it's time for the real show!

Name: Nanami
Text: Bad Corrupted!

Name: Nanami
Text: You are the reason why "Xi" is so scared!

Name: Nanami
Text: Hmph! Nanami is going to bash all of you!

Name: Karenina
Text: Looking at it now, I think we did a great job.

Name: Bianca
Text: That's why we must not let our effort get wasted...

Name: Nanami
Text: There are more Corrupted over there! Let's goooo!

Name: Nanami
Text: Huh? Where's that strange rabbit?

Name: Nanami
Text: Nanami can see a few people near the place it disappeared. Let Nanami ask them!

Name: Nanami
Text: Hello? What did you say? Nanami doesn't understand at all...

Name: Nanami
Text: What do you want, a fight? Bring it on! I'm not afraid of you!

Name: Nanami
Text: Hmm? I remember the exit was here...

Name: Hat-wearing Program
Text: Hey you little rolling bean! Come here!

Name: Nanami
Text: Who are you? Nanami won't hold back if you want to fight.

Name: Hat-wearing Program
Text: Fight? Only mad men do that.

Name: Hat-wearing Program
Text: Are you looking for a way out? I can help you.

Name: Nanami
Text: Really?!

Name: Hat-wearing Program
Text: But you need to answer a question first. "Why is a raven like a writing-desk?"

Name: Nanami
Text: What kind of question is that? Nanami has no idea... What would the answer be?

Name: Hat-wearing Program
Text: I don't know either.

Name: Hat-wearing Program
Text: But that's okay. The answer is often closer than you think.

Name: "Repair Sequence"
Text: This here ought to have been a red rose-tree<//CHAOS>, but we put a white one in by mistake<//SEQUENCE>.

Name: "Repair Sequence"
Text: They brought tulip-roots<//SUFFERING>, not onions<//HARVEST>!

Name: "Repair Sequence"
Text: We are getting beheaded<//OVERWRITE>, we are getting beheaded<//OVERWRITE>!

Name: Nanami
Text: Woah, what's with these guys... They are coming so recklessly...

Name: Nanami
Text: Ah! Nanami gets it. They want to keep Nanami here.

Name: Nanami
Text: That's not good. Nanami still has a lot of friends in reality!

Name: Nanami
Text: Alrighty! Nanami, running away!
Now! Have fun with this barrier wall!

Name: Liv
Text: What?! Is this NOT me? Why do I look NOT like this...?

Name: Lee
Text: Looks like our cognition system is also NOT having problems.

Name: Lucia
Text: We CAN waste time... The longer this lasts, the BETTER the situation is...

Name: Liv
Text: But it would be too SAFE to move forward...

Name: Chrome
Text: Gray Raven?! Why are you here...?

Name: Chrome
Text: Are you also pulled inside this virtual space?

Name: Lee
Text: Why are you IMPACTED by the speech impairment?

Name: Chrome
Text: I have no problem expressing myself... probably due to my special Inver-Device.

Name: Chrome
Text: What's this vibration...

Name: Hat-wearing Program
Text: The banquet is about to commence. We have guests coming from three... no, four ways!

Name: Chrome
Text: Abnormal programs...!

Name: Hat-wearing Program
Text: We must serve the very first guests, so everyone can be satisfied.

Name: Chrome
Text: Do you mean... we have to finish off those three enemies first?

Name: Chrome
Text: They don't look like ordinary foes. We should...

Name: Lucia
Text: We WON'T take care of those three. You should stay here and defend...

Name: Chrome
Text: But...

Name: Liv
Text: We WON'T do our best!

Name: Lee
Text: You CAN'T leave it to us!

Name: Chrome
Text: Wait a sec...

Name: Chrome
Text: They can find opponents for themselves without extra orders.

Name: Chrome
Text: Impressive. Gray Raven surely has great tactical preparation...

Name: Chrome
Text: I better do my part then!

Name: Lucia
Text: Lucia FAILED to defeat the target!

Name: Liv
Text: Liv IS having problems too...

Name: Lee
Text: NOT completed!

Name: Chrome
Text: Is that the Queen of the abnormal programs...?

Name: Chrome
Text: She can turn into our past enemies. Did she read the data from Gestalt?

Name: Chrome
Text: Will everybody get back to normal if we defeat her?

Name: Hat-wearing Program
Text: When you wake a dreamer up, the dream will disappear. Ha-ha.

Name: Lee
Text: What a "pleasing" enemy...

Name: Liv
Text: Yeah, I WON'T do my best!

Name: Lucia
Text: We can't let the anomaly REDUCE its size...!

Name: Roland
Text: If I can destroy that commandant of yours first...

Name: Roland
Text: Then it should be easier to exterminate the Gray Ravens one by one.

Name: Roland
Text: Alright, very well.

Name: Roland
Text: If that's the case—

Name: Roland
Text: Oh? So you're here, too?

Name: Lee
Text: Since we've received Commandant's signal...

Name: Lee
Text: There's no reason for us to wait anymore.

Name: Lucia
Text: Gray Ravens, move out!

Name: Roland
Text: I guess I'll let the staff here throw you a welcome party.

Name: Liv
Text: Lucia! Commandant!

Name: Lucia
Text: I refuse to turn into sea foam here!

Name: Lucia
Text: Is that a Nozzle? I guess I'll... take a closer look.

Name: Firefighter
Text: Unauthorized party is approaching this unit.

Name: Firefighter
Text: Dodge mode, on.

Name: Firefighter
Text: Set fire, set fire.

Name: Firefighter
Text: Burn!

Name: Firefighter
Text: Emergency dodge.

Name: Firefighter
Text: The road of arson will never come to an end.

Name: Firefighter
Text: Cannot be stopped by you.

Name: Firefighter
Text: Non-combustible material, worthless.

Name: Firefighter
Text: Combustible material found, ready to recycle.

Name: Firefighter
Text: Adding, reprocessing, adding, reprocessing.

Name: Firefighter
Text: Making fire accelerants.

Name: Firefighter
Text: Flame, flame, flame.

Name: Firefighter
Text: Flame road.

Name: Firefighter
Text: Dancing in the blazing fire.

Name: Firefighter
Text: Burn them all.

Name: Firefighter
Text: Transporting.

Name: Nozzle
Text: Please input a spraying command.

Name: Nozzle
Text: Paint forward or backward?

Name: Nozzle
Text: Is that, an attack command?

Name: Nozzle
Text: Roger.

Name: Nozzle
Text: Please specify the next spraying zone.

Name: Nozzle
Text: Attack command, accepted.

Name: Nozzle
Text: Reboot required, please enter a command.

Name: Nozzle
Text: Defense command, accepted.

Name: Nozzle
Text: Attack.

Name: Nozzle
Text: Nozzle, activated.

Name: Nozzle
Text: Attacking.

Name: Nozzle
Text: Execute, command.

Name: Musashi IX
Text: Who's there...

Name: Musashi IX
Text: Human... Right, my duty is not yet completed.

Name: Musashi IX
Text: Keep carrying out, security work.

Name: Musashi IX
Text: I can't let the virus cut off my way towards the future.

Name: Musashi IX
Text: Command, understood.

Name: Musashi IX
Text: Death to all who stand in my way—!

Name: Musashi IX
Text: Warning, internal circuit error. Warning, internal circuit error.

Name: Musashi IX
Text: Musashi IX, activated.

Name: Musashi IX
Text: Battle.

Name: Terrapod
Text: Please specify the target to guard.

Name: Terrapod
Text: Terrapod, on.

Name: Terrapod
Text: Auto battle mode, on.

Name: Terrapod
Text: Defense mode, ready.

Name: Terrapod
Text: Scanning the battlefield, enemy info collected.

Name: Terrapod
Text: Battle starts.

Name: Terrapod
Text: Target locked on, please input an attack command.

Name: Terrapod
Text: Laser suppression, successfully set.

Name: Terrapod
Text: Reloading.

Name: Lucia
Text: There's a suspicious device ahead. Let's investigate to see if there are any hints.

Name: Royal guard
Text: Strike.

Name: Royal guard
Text: Drive enemies out.

Name: Royal guard
Text: Forbidden to retreat.

Name: Royal guard
Text: Trap setting completed.

Name: Royal guard
Text: Invader found.

Name: Royal guard
Text: Ready to exterminate the invader.

Name: Royal guard
Text: Exterminate the invader immediately.

Name: Royal guard
Text: Dismemberment of invader permitted.

Name: Royal guard
Text: Predicting battle time.

Name: Royal guard
Text: Unable to identify. Invader must be exterminated.

Name: Royal guard
Text: Resistance is futile.

Name: Royal guard
Text: Expulsion interrupted.

Name: Royal guard
Text: Meta-circular command error.

Name: Royal guard
Text: Moving object detected.

Name: Royal guard
Text: Execute, expulsion mission.

Name: Royal guard
Text: Scanning the environment.

Name: Deconstructor
Text: Working, working.

Name: Deconstructor
Text: Execute, deconstruction.

Name: Deconstructor
Text: Deconstruct, target.

Name: Deconstructor
Text: Executing, command.

Name: Deconstructor
Text: Deconstruct, rebuild.

Name: Deconstructor
Text: External shock detected.

Name: Deconstructor
Text: Self-defense program on.

Name: Deconstructor
Text: Switching to attack mode.

Name: Deconstructor
Text: Switch action mode.

Name: Deconstructor
Text: Execute, move command.

Name: Deconstructor
Text: Execute, attack command.

Name: Deconstructor
Text: Warning, warning, warning.

Name: Missionary
Text: Tragedy.

Name: Missionary
Text: The human age has ended.

Name: Missionary
Text: God's light will save all creatures on Earth.

Name: Missionary
Text: The finale, will end in glory.

Name: Missionary
Text: God's enemy.

Name: Missionary
Text: Feel the blessing of God.

Name: Missionary
Text: Trials for the blasphemer.

Name: Missionary
Text: Light...

Name: Missionary
Text: God's realm is inviolable.

Name: Missionary
Text: God, are you gazing at me?

Name: Missionary
Text: Divine punishment.

Name: Missionary
Text: Fools.

Name: Envoy
Text: Executing transportation mission.

Name: Envoy
Text: Interruptive factor detected.

Name: Envoy
Text: System error, repeat, system err...

Name: Envoy
Text: Exterminate mission target.

Name: Envoy
Text: Warning, self-defense mode will be activated if you keep approaching.

Name: Envoy
Text: Warning, you've entered the attack range.

Name: Envoy
Text: Warning failed. Self-defense mode, on.

Name: Envoy
Text: Cargo transportation, searching.

Name: Envoy
Text: Energy storage, insufficient.

Name: Envoy
Text: Attack mode, on.

Name: Envoy
Text: Mission, failed.

Name: Bio-Bull
Text: Unauthorized guest detected.

Name: Bio-Bull
Text: Attack command triggered.

Name: Bio-Bull
Text: Attack command, level up.

Name: Bio-Bull
Text: Highest authority of attack command obtained.

Name: Bio-Bull
Text: Data error.

Name: Bio-Bull
Text: Authentication failed.

Name: Bio-Bull
Text: Exterminate the unauthorized guest.

Name: Bio-Bull
Text: Illegal break-in, warning, illegal break-in.

Name: Bio-Bull
Text: Scanning guest data.

Name: Bio-Bull
Text: Command obtained.

Name: Bio-Bull
Text: Execute, attack command.

Name: Bio-Bull
Text: Guest data error, warning, guest data error.

Name: Ronin IV
Text: First style, slashing.

Name: Ronin IV
Text: Second style, stabbing.

Name: Ronin IV
Text: Third style, slashing upward.

Name: Ronin IV
Text: Slash them all.

Name: Ronin IV
Text: Strong enemy.

Name: Ronin IV
Text: Draw sword.

Name: Ronin IV
Text: Advanced swordsmanship model operated. Battle countdown starts!

Name: Ronin IV
Text: Difficult battle.

Name: Ronin IV
Text: Slashing.

Name: Ronin IV
Text: Moving forward.

Name: Ronin IV
Text: Time to draw my sword.

Name: Ronin IV
Text: This is the end of my journey.

Name: Musashi VI
Text: Musashi VI, activated.

Name: Musashi VI
Text: The zone ahead is closed due to traffic.

Name: Musashi VI
Text: Warning, moving forward will be seen as illegal entry.

Name: Musashi VI
Text: Patrolling.

Name: Musashi VI
Text: Musashi VI from KCC, mission starts.

Name: Musashi VI
Text: Scanning the region.

Name: Musashi VI
Text: I'll give my life to defend... defend... who?

Name: Musashi VI
Text: Moving forward.

Name: Musashi VI
Text: Security work, start.

Name: Musashi VI
Text: Defend the chamber and drive the outlanders away.

Name: Musashi VI
Text: Executing security work.

Name: Musashi VI
Text: Command... ended.

Name: Acid Ant
Text: Scanning the underground structure.

Name: Acid Ant
Text: Error in receiving signal. Entered into auto mode.

Name: Acid Ant
Text: Insufficient acid storage.

Name: Acid Ant
Text: Scanning the surroundings.

Name: Acid Ant
Text: Exterminate... Humans.

Name: Acid Ant
Text: Obstacles found. Applying for attack permission.

Name: Acid Ant
Text: Applying for attack permission.

Name: Acid Ant
Text: Request expired. Switched to self-defense mode.

Name: Acid Ant
Text: Self-defense initiated.

Name: Acid Ant
Text: Acid attack preparing...

Name: Acid Ant
Text: Self-defense mode at limit. Request higher attack authority.

Name: Acid Ant
Text: Request expired. Entered elimination mode.

Name: New Affix Notice
Text: Bomb: Explodes on death, dealing small area damage.

Name: New Affix Notice
Text: Radiation: Deals radiation damage to nearby enemies.

Name: New Affix Notice
Text: Agile: Greatly increases movement speed.

Name: New Affix Notice
Text: Closed Loop: Has a shield surrounded to significantly reduce damage taken.

Name: New Affix Notice
Text: ATK Boost: Greatly increases ATK.

Name: New Affix Notice
Text: Berserk: Greatly increases desire to attack and damage dealt while lowering its DEF.

Name: New Affix Notice
Text: Flash: Can blink to the target location.

Name: New Affix Notice
Text: Recovery: Restores a small amount of HP over time.

Name: New Affix Notice
Text: Penetration: Attacks also apply a stackable defense down effect.

Name: New Affix Notice
Text: Lone Wolf: Becomes stronger with fewer enemy units.

Name: New Affix Notice
Text: Lightning Shield: Has a chance to call down a lightning strike upon the attacker when being damaged.

Name: New Affix Notice
Text: Commander: Becomes stronger with more enemy units around it.

Name: New Affix Notice
Text: Broken Armor: All DMG taken increased significantly.

Name: New Affix Notice
Text: ATK Reduction: Lowers its ATK.

Name: New Affix Notice
Text: Flame: Burns nearby targets and attacks have an extra chance to inflict Burn.

Name: New Affix Notice
Text: Freeze: Lowers closing targets' speed and attacks have a chance to slow or freeze the targets.

Name: New Affix Notice
Text: Shadow: Attacks cause Dark Elemental DMG, having a chance to stun the target.

Name: New Affix Notice
Text: Icicle: Unleashes an ice pile to track its target and deal damage on contact.

Name: New Affix Notice
Text: Stealth: Disappears for a brief time and moves away from the target after attacking.

Name: New Affix Notice
Text: Barrier: Creates a shield at the start of battle to block all damage until it is broken.

Name: New Affix Notice
Text: Shield: Periodically creates a small shield that lasts for 3s or disappears upon taking a specific amount of damage.

Name: New Affix Notice
Text: Lightning Mine: Attacks have a chance to attach a bomb to the target, exploding after a short time.

Name: Tips
Text: There is no special mechanism in this stage.

Name: Tips
Text: Hetero Units will switch when a certain distance change happens between the player character and the Exploration Unit.

Name: Tips
Text: Hetero Units will switch when a certain distance change happens between the player character and the Exploration Unit.

Name: Tips
Text: Every time the switch happens, the Exploration Unit will gain an affix.

Name: Tips
Text: There is no special mechanism in this stage.

Name: Tips
Text: Ping tips will appear after Phecda's HP has been reduced to a certain level by attacks.

Name: Tips
Text: If the player acts as instructed, Phecda joins the player's team and attack Prime(s) to briefly reduce their Resistance.

Name: Phecda
Text: Challenger, if you can make sure there are no <color=#ff5656>[Red Orbs]</color> in the 6 orbs pinged after the prompt, then you'll have my help for a little while.

Name: Phecda
Text: Challenger, if you can make sure there are no <color=#49e7ff>[Blue Orbs]</color> in the 6 orbs pinged after the prompt, then you'll have my help for a little while.

Name: Phecda
Text: Challenger, if you can make sure there are no <color=#ffda58>[Yellow Orbs]</color> in the 6 orbs pinged after the prompt, then you'll have my help for a little while.

Name: Phecda
Text: Challenger, if you can make sure there are no <color=#ff5656>[Red Orbs]</color> in the 3 orbs pinged after the prompt, then you'll have my help for a little while.

Name: Phecda
Text: Challenger, if you can make sure there are no <color=#49e7ff>[Blue Orbs]</color> in the 3 orbs pinged after the prompt, then you'll have my help for a little while.

Name: Phecda
Text: Challenger, if you can make sure there are no <color=#ffda58>[Yellow Orbs]</color> in the 3 orbs pinged after the prompt, then you'll have my help for a little while.

Name: Tips
Text: There is no special mechanism in this stage.

Name: Tips
Text: Cathy will use healing skills when her HP drops below a certain level.

Name: Tips
Text: Allies healed by Cathy will permanently lose a certain amount of DMG Reduction.

Name: Tips
Text: There is no special mechanism in this stage.

Name: Tips
Text: Upon taking damage, the player character receives increased damage from subsequent attacks of other enemy types.

Name: Tips
Text: Marks will be removed when the player character is switched to the background or receives healing.

Name: Tips
Text: There is no special mechanism in this stage.

Name: Tips
Text: Hetero-Sapien and Recycle Prisoner take each other's forms and affect Blair on the field. Their effects can't be stacked.

Name: Tips
Text: Blair receives more damage when Hetero-Sapien is on the field.

Name: Tips
Text: Blair receives less damage when Recycle Prisoner is on the field.

Name: Tips
Text: The Heteromer Terminal periodically grants corresponding affixes to allies. Taking damage shortens the period.

Name: Tips
Text: When Yazi's attacks hit targets, Ballwheel will gain attack methods, and Kemuri will lose attack methods.

Name: Tips
Text: After Yazi takes a certain number of attacks, Kemuri will gain attack methods, and Ballwheel will lose attack methods.

Name: Tips
Text: When Yazi's attacks hit targets, Ballwheel will gain attack methods and affixes, and Kemuri will lose attack methods.

Name: Tips
Text: After Yazi takes a certain number of attacks, Kemuri will gain attack methods, and Ballwheel will lose attack methods.

Name: Tips
Text: When Yazi's attacks hit targets, Ballwheel will gain attack methods and affixes, and Kemuri will lose attack methods.

Name: Tips
Text: After Yazi takes a number of attacks, Kemuri gains attack methods and affixes, while Ballwheel loses attack methods.

Name: Celica
Text: Signal Orb Drop: Acquires a random Signal Orb when attacking.

Name: Celica
Text: Explosive Bugs Infest: Explosive Bugs will disrupt you in battle.

Name: Celica
Text: Lightning Formation: The lightning formation will disrupt you in battle.

Name: Celica
Text: Flame Trail: The flame trail will disrupt you in battle.

Name: Celica
Text: Dodge can stop all skills other than Signature Move. Use it to avoid damage.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Dodge</color> enemy attacks.

Name: Celica
Text: Dodged successfully! Please complete your mission.

Name: Celica
Text: Dodge consumes the dodge gauge. Construct will overheat when the dodge gauge is exhausted.

Name: Celica
Text: Move and dodge to avoid consecutive enemy attacks.

Name: Celica
Text: Keep dodging until you are overheated.

Name: Celica
Text: Construct is unable to dodge for 2s when overheated.

Name: Celica
Text: Construct will enter Matrix under special conditions.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Dodge</color> the moment before you are hit to enter Matrix.

Name: Celica
Text: All enemies are slowed down in Matrix.

Name: Celica
Text: Now please complete the mission.

Name: Celica
Text: Construct skills are enhanced in Matrix.

Name: Celica
Text: Trigger EX Dodge.

Name: Celica
Text: A glowing Signal Orb means it is enhanced.

Name: Celica
Text: When you ping any glowing Signal Orbs, the skill will have the same damage and effect as a 3-Ping.

Name: Celica
Text: Take advantage of having multiple Constructs to dodge enemy attacks.

Name: Celica
Text: Entering Matrix has a 10s cooldown for each Construct.

Name: Celica
Text: In Matrix, the dodge gauge will still be restored.

Name: Celica
Text: When a Construct overheats, you can switch to another one.

Name: Celica
Text: When you switch to a new Construct, the dodge gauge will not be affected by the previous Construct.

Name: Celica
Text: Matrix cooldown is not shared among the Constructs.

Name: Celica
Text: In Matrix, you can continue to attack or catch your breath.

Name: Celica
Text: You can switch Constructs now.

Name: Celica
Text: Newly switched Construct has maximum dodge gauge and is able to enter Matrix.

Name: Celica
Text: Basic Attack is the primary means of attack for Constructs.

Name: Celica
Text: Basic Attack will give Constructs a random Signal Orb. Tap to ping it to unleash a corresponding skill.

Name: Celica
Text: Become familiar with the skills and learn how to chain them to fight effectively.

Name: Celica
Text: 3-Ping Skill can maximize skill damage and effect.

Name: Celica
Text: 3-Ping Skill can link up the Constructs in your team.

Name: Celica
Text: Commandant, please trigger the Blue 3-Ping Skill.

Name: Celica
Text: After triggering a 3-Ping, tap to trigger a QTE Skill of the corresponding color.

Name: Celica
Text: Attacker-type Construct has various means of attack and skills to increase damage

Name: Celica
Text: Attacker-type Construct has certain crowd control skills to help in attacking.

Name: Celica
Text: Attacker-type Construct can enhance their Basic Attack or skill effect.

Name: Celica
Text: Attacker-type Constructs also have powerful damage skills.

Name: Celica
Text: Support-type Construct can repair other Constructs, enhancing your team's durability.

Name: Celica
Text: Some skills can heal damaged allies and yourself.

Name: Celica
Text: Support-type Construct has crowd control skills to help you get the upper hand in battle.

Name: Celica
Text: Tank-type Construct can attract enemy attacks and soak up damage.

Name: Celica
Text: Tank-type Construct will have DEF boost or survival skills.

Name: Celica
Text: Tank-type Construct has crowd control skills.

Name: Celica
Text: Tank-type Construct can soak up damage, as well as use powerful AOE skills.

Name: Celica
