Text: Tank-type Construct has strong Piercing Armor abilities. Enemies take increased damage under Broken Armor state.

Name: Celica
Text: 3-Ping the Signal Orbs of different colors to trigger teammate's QTE Skill at the corresponding color location.

Name: Celica
Text: Please 3-Ping the Blue Orbs first.

Name: Celica
Text: 3-Ping the Blue Orbs to trigger the Construct's QTE Skill at the Blue Location.

Name: Celica
Text: Elite enemy has Super Armor. It cannot be interrupted when Super Armor exists.

Name: Celica
Text: Please 3-Ping the Yellow Orbs first.

Name: Celica
Text: 3-Ping the Yellow Orbs to trigger the Construct's QTE Skill at Yellow Location.

Name: Celica
Text: Tank-type Construct's QTE deals high damage to enemy Super Armor value, eventually inflicting <color=#ffda58>Broken Armor</color> effect.

Name: Celica
Text: Every dodge consumes the dodge gauge, which recovers slowly. You can dodge once in about 3s.

Name: Celica
Text: Consecutively dodging until the dodge gauge is exhausted will result in overheating. Becoming unable to dodge in the next 3s.

Name: Celica
Text: [Dodge] the moment before you are hit to enter [Matrix], in which all enemies are slowed down.

Name: Celica
Text: When the Signal Orb bar is glowing, it means pinging any orbs will have the same effect as a 3-Ping.

Name: Celica
Text: Entering Matrix through dodging has a 12s cooldown. You cannot enter Matrix continuously.

Name: Celica
Text: Use [Matrix 3-Ping] to trigger [Lotus Dual Blade] more quickly.

Name: Celica
Text: [Matrix Cooldown] is not shared among the Constructs. Switch Constructs to trap enemies in Matrix continuously.

Name: Celica
Text: Switch to [Nanami]

Name: Celica
Text: Switch to [Lucia]

Name: Celica
Text: Nanami's QTE Skill can destroy enemy's armor, inflicting the <color=#ffda58>Broken Armor</color> effect.

Name: Celica
Text: Enemies take increased damage under Broken Armor state.

Name: Celica
Text: There are some tips for pinging the orbs in battle.

Name: Celica
Text: When there are 4 Signal Orbs of the same color, tap the <color=#ffda58>leftmost one</color> to ping only 1 orb and keep the other 3 orbs.

Name: Celica
Text: In Matrix, you can apply this 1+3 pinging order to instantly trigger a 3-Ping effect twice.

Name: Celica
Text: Support QTE can restore HP or grant buffs.

Name: Celica
Text: When facing an enemy with heavy armor, use Tank-type Construct to enhance the Piercing Armor effect.

Name: Celica
Text: 3-Ping the Blue Orbs to trigger teammate's QTE.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Let's get through here first... I'll explain to you later.

Name: Liv
Text: I can do it. I'll just be careful to not come into contact with these things.

Name: Watanabe
Text: We need your ability to access the M.I.N.D. and enter the central consciousness container.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Defeat those pseudo-consciousnesses and save them all.

Name: Liv
Text: Understood...

Name: Liv
Text: Watanabe? What's... going on?

Name: Watanabe
Text: Your consciousness... has been replaced and trapped in the fake M.I.N.D.? Darn it! Liv, hold on!

Name: Liv
Text: That is... me?

Name: Watanabe
Text: If you're attacked here, your consciousness permanently deviates.

Name: Watanabe
Text: We're creating an exit for you...

Name: Watanabe
Text: OK, use this trap to defeat her and you can get out of there.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Liv, what's the situation?

Name: Liv
Text: Seems to have gotten rid of her...

Name: Liv
Text: Um, Watanabe, relax... I think we'll be fine.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Phew... That's good.

Name: Liv
Text: That's ... me? Such beautiful clothes...

Name: Watanabe
Text: That thing is not done yet...?!

Name: Watanabe
Text: I've hacked the system firewall. Liv, get out of there quick.

Name: Liv
Text: Sorry, I couldn't save all of you.

Name: Liv
Text: Those Corrupted are...?

Name: Lee
Text: Scavenging parts from Constructs to augment their own bodies.

Name: Lee
Text: The more primitive the Corrupted, the more they desire power.

Name: Lucia
Text: Seeing them use our teammates' bodies like that...

Name: Lucia
Text: We have to stop them!

Name: Lucia
Text: How's the situation?

Name: Liv
Text: I'm trying to recover his consciousness...

Name: Liv
Text: But the damage is too severe...

Name: Liv
Text: I'm sorry...

Name: Lee
Text: There are more defeated Constructs nearby.

Name: Lee
Text: I hate to admit.

Name: Lee
Text: But this is the fastest way we can understand the situation in this area.

Name: Lucia
Text: Perhaps some of them have yet to recall their consciousness.

Name: Lucia
Text: Let's keep searching.

Name: Lee
Text: No good. These Constructs have all lost consciousness.

Name: Liv
Text: Wait, the ally signal we received earlier is responding!

Name: Liv
Text: But there are also more Corrupted coming this way!

Name: Lucia
Text: Anyway, I need to defeat these Corrupted to secure myself.

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Finally, you're here... Sorry we could only contact you like that.

Name: Liv
Text: You've already been corrupted by the Punishing Virus, but fortunately, it still hasn't exceeded the tolerance limit of your Inver-Device.

Name: Liv
Text: Please allow me to access your M.I.N.D., so I can help lessen your burden from fighting with the virus.

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Thank you... I never thought I'd live to see such an advanced Support-type Construct...

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: If only they were able to hold on a bit longer...

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: We are a supply squad. The Corrupted forced us up this bridge.

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: We had nowhere to go, so we set up this temporary comms station.

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: The number of Corrupted here was unusually high, and they were more aggressive.

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: We had never seen anything like this. Our defense collapsed very soon...

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: That's why we are pretty certain that the Corrupted have formed an organization...

Name: Lucia
Text: Same here. We had a tough fight and came here looking for supplies.

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Is that so... I can see your arm is damaged. If I remember correctly...

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: You should be able to find some spare parts in the supply crate over there. They may not be as good as your original ones...

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Still, they are reliable Babylonian products and should last you the mission...

Name: Lucia
Text: I understand. Thank you.

Name: Liv
Text: I'll get them right away!

Name: Lucia
Text: The Corrupted should only be able to follow the Punishing Virus's order to kill objects that carry human consciousness.

Name: Lucia
Text: Please elaborate on what you mean by having formed an organization.

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Did you notice those graffiti nearby?

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: We found that these graffiti have a special power that attracts mechanoid Corrupted.

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: And only they can understand the graffiti's true meaning.

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: We tried to decipher the messages, but with our human consciousness, we can't understand them at all...

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Be careful of those graffiti... They are gathering the Corrupted...

Name: Lee
Text: The Corrupted's only goal is to destroy humans and everything that has human consciousness.

Name: Lee
Text: They don't need to communicate with each other. Perhaps this is a result of something else other than the Punishing Virus.

Name: Lucia
Text: Thank you for your information and contribution. Please recall your consciousness. We'll take over from here.

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: One more thing. Our squad had to abandon some spare parts when we engaged with the Corrupted earlier. Here are the coordinates.

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: There are Levi-Gun core components in there. If you can secure them, then that Support-type Construct over there should be able to hop back into action.

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Alright, that should be all. Good luck, and may we meet again on a better occasion...

Name: Liv
Text: I found the parts in the supply crate. Wait, what's this? Corrupted approaching!

Name: Lucia
Text: We don't have time for maintenance now. Everybody, prepare for battle!

Name: Lee
Text: The Corrupted are gathering here.

Name: Lucia
Text: We have some time for maintenance. Let's quickly do it and move to the next location.

Name: Liv
Text: Great. I can keep fighting now.

Name: Lee
Text: I'll keep adjusting them. Tell me the parameters that need to be fixed.

Name: Liv
Text: Thank you... Please bear with me. Reactivating core, applying limiters, calibrating lenses...

Name: Lee
Text: Setting parameters... Done. Try them now.

Name: Liv
Text: Sync rate normal. Switching to combat mode.

Name: Lee
Text: Alright. Let's use them to defeat the Corrupted in front.

Name: Liv
Text: I have searched the battlefield... Only this Construct still has an intact memory module...

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant, I can try connecting to the M.I.N.D. of these Constructs.

Name: Liv
Text: We should be able to find more clues about the enemy.

Name: Lucia
Text: Don't worry, we will protect her during this time.

Name: Lee
Text: You should trust her and have some faith in us too, Commandant.

Name: Liv
Text: Okay. Initializing memory sequences... Rendering simulation image...

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: The Corrupted ahead have all been exterminated.

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: This has been surprisingly easy so far... Quite unlike the reports from those reports.

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Look at those Corrupted. They're just standing there before the graffiti. I don't think they even notice us...

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: It is quite eerie, but other than that, nothing noteworthy.

Name: Construct Captain
Text: These graffiti are gathering the minds of these Corrupted.

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: But according to the information we have, the Corrupted has no consciousness to speak of. They are only puppets manipulated by the virus within.

Name: Construct Captain
Text: There must be some special "meaning" behind these graffiti that is grouping these Corrupted together.

Name: Construct Captain
Text: This "meaning" must be resonating with them and even overriding the viral influence. As we all know—

Name: Construct Captain
Text: The Corrupted taken by the virus only care about wiping out humanity, nothing else.

Name: Construct Captain
Text: This is possibly a... display of some sort of [free will]. I must report this immediately back to HQ—

Name: Construct Captain
Text: Wait...! What are you doing!

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: These graffiti cools down the area too much and will affect our passage, so... I'm just trying to clean the graffiti...

Name: Construct Captain
Text: This is too dangerous. Stop it at once...!

Name: Corrupted
Text: Uuuurgh—Free—Will—

Name: Corrupted
Text: Uuuurgh—Freedom—To—Machines—
Heh...
Hehe...

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: W-what...? It's releasing... mist? Wait, our radar systems are all malfunctioning!
Humans... cannot appreciate... my work... too stupid...
Stupidity... forgivable... but destroying... my work...? Unforgivable...

Name: Corrupted
Text: Urgh—

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: They're gathering 'round us!

Name: Construct Captain
Text: Hold formation!

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Wait, it's tossing something over...

Name: Construct Captain
Text: TAKE COVER!

Name: Liv
Text: The simulation replay ends here...

Name: Liv
Text: That mechanoid in the replay...

Name: Lucia
Text: It should be the one behind these graffiti drawings.
Hehe... Correct...
Human... Human consciousness...? Absolutely... filthy...

Name: Lee
Text: It's here!

Name: Lucia
Text: Has it been hiding near us all this time? Why didn't we sense it?

Name: Lee
Text: The replay just now mentioned their radar systems failing... The Construct parts and vital fluids...

Name: Lee
Text: Is that how it's concealing itself?
World... without... humans... freedom... creation... yes...
Humans... shall... not... return... to... Earth!

Name: Lee
Text: You—!

Name: New Variant
Text: Plebs... can never... appreciate my work... Heeheehee...

Name: Lee
Text: This just never ends...

Name: Lucia
Text: Did it run away? We've already lost track of it. Not to mention being in this magnetically disruptive mist.

Name: Lee
Text: Not an issue. Our radars might not work, but we should be able to trace the marks on the floor.

Name: Lee
Text: These, are our tickets.

Name: Liv
Text: The toy on your waist makes you seem a lot more approachable, Lucia.

Name: Lucia
Text: Is that so...?

Name: Lucia
Text: We spent too much time in the shop... Time to get back to our mission.

Name: Liv
Text: Alright.

Name: Lucia
Text: The Corrupted have infiltrated this place too.

Name: Lucia
Text: Prepare for battle!

Name: Liv
Text: I'll support you.

Name: Lucia
Text: Sorry, Commandant... I think I... lost the plushie...

Name: Lee
Text: I can see its remains on the ground. It was probably damaged in the battle.

Name: Lee
Text: The warehouse over there may have some stock left.

Name: Lucia
Text: I... need to get it back...

Name: Liv
Text: Lucia... I'm coming with you!

Name: Lee
Text: I knew there would be Corrupted here.

Name: Lee
Text: There's no other way. Let's fight.

Name: Lee
Text: You look really out of it, Lucia. Are you sure you're okay?

Name: Liv
Text: I saw frog plushies on the shelf on the way here.

Name: Liv
Text: Bear with me one second... I'll go get it now!

Name: Lucia
Text: I... apologize for what I did just now...

Name: Lucia
Text: I don't know why, but when I saw this plushie, a strange yet familiar feeling welled up within me...

Name: Lucia
Text: And when I realized I lost it, I felt taken by an immense emptiness...

Name: Lucia
Text: A voice spoke to me, telling me to never let go of it...

Name: Liv
Text: I got the frog plushie back. Here you are...

Name: Lee
Text: It's fine, we all have things we hold dear. This is the reason why we're here fighting.

Name: Lucia
Text: Things we hold dear...

Name: Liv
Text: Lucia...

Name: Lee
Text: If you're lost, then simply walk forward. Walking forward itself can be meaningful enough.

Name: Lucia
Text: ...Thank you, Lee.

Name: Lee
Text: Don't mention it.

Name: Lucia
Text: More Corrupted have entered the building.

Name: Lucia
Text: Everyone, prepare for battle!

Name: Lee
Text: There are a lot of Corrupted in the mall now.

Name: Lucia
Text: Let's get out from that door and continue tracking Nozzle.

Name: Corrupted
Text: Defend... the leader...

Name: Corrupted
Text: For... the rise of... the will of the... machines...

Name: Lee
Text: Its followers are advancing on all sides!

Name: Lucia
Text: Let's defeat them first before taking care of Nozzle.

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: My audience... is getting smaller... Pity... Heehee...

Name: Lee
Text: How annoying.

Name: Lucia
Text: Go after it.

Name: Corrupted
Text: Uuuurgh—Freedom—To—Machines—

Name: Lee
Text: Hey, are there anymore? Keep fighting and you'll lose all your followers.

Name: Liv
Text: It went silent...

Name: Lucia
Text: Defeat the followers.

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: No more... audience...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: No one to appreciate my art... Heehee...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: How lonesome it is...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: Despicable... humans... Heehee...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: This will be my... final creation... Heehee...

Name: Liv
Text: It's trying to fight and paint at the same time?

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: If only I could see... the Sage... just one time...

Name: Lucia
Text: Let's put an end to it.

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: My hands... aren't moving now... Can't paint... Heehee...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: My life is... at its end too... I don't need to... paint anymore... as well... Heehee...

Name: Lee
Text: Uh-huh. You and your crazy followers are now nothing but history.

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: No... The seed of revelation... has been planted... and grows among us...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: They... do not follow me... I am but a missionary... of the Sage...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: We can shed... everything that binds us... and become free...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: A new dawn... awaits Machines. Not human... nor Ascnet... but... truly o-ourselves...

Name: Lucia
Text: I see a lot of graffiti around. Nozzle must have been here.

Name: Liv
Text: We should be able to fix the fragmented memory here.

Name: Liv
Text: Set up a terminal here to project and process the data stream.

Name: Lee
Text: The code name of this technology is "The Spear Of F.O.S."

Name: Lee
Text: It still has some issues. High energy consumption, poor portability, limited range...

Name: Lee
Text: They probably wanted us to use it in this mission to get more real data.

Name: Liv
Text: I have confirmed the first location. Lucia, I have changed the visual frequency to your channel.

Name: Liv
Text: So that when the data stream appears, your visual module can capture it.

Name: Lucia
Text: What do I need to do?

Name: Liv
Text: Eliminate the erroneous data streams to prevent them from interfering with the main one.

Name: Lee
Text: Basically, you need to wipe out the Corrupted attacking Nozzle.

Name: Liv
Text: Initiating projection... Lucia, if anything feels wrong at any time, just tell me.

Name: Lucia
Text: Understood. I'm going.

Name: Liv
Text: Data recorded. Thanks for the hard work.

Name: Lee
Text: For a prototype, it went better than I expected.

Name: Liv
Text: Let's move onto the next location.

Name: Liv
Text: Initiating projection... Lucia, please.

Name: Lucia
Text: Sure.

Name: Lucia
Text: Is it over?

Name: Liv
Text: All done. Speaking of which...

Name: Liv
Text: This is a prototype, so the manual has stated some potential abnormal experiences one may encounter.

Name: Liv
Text: Like dizziness or faintness, for example. Do you feel any of those?

Name: Lucia
Text: Not really.

Name: Liv
Text: It'll be a little different this time.

Name: Lucia
Text: Different?

Name: Liv
Text: How should I put it... You'll need to simulate the battle of the main data body.

Name: Lucia
Text: So I'm going to fight it?

Name: Lee
Text: Yeah. We want you to fight with the reconstructed data body to observe if there is any abnormality.

Name: Liv
Text: I'll leave it to you then.

Name: Lucia
Text: Bring it on.

Name: Liv
Text: Let's reconfirm our mission here.

Name: Lee
Text: The data repaired in the center contains timing errors and discrepancies.

Name: Lee
Text: So we need to use this area to calibrate the data. Is that so?

Name: Liv
Text: You know it very well, Lee.

Name: Liv
Text: Just like Lee said, we will rely on his computing power to process these graffiti.

Name: Liv
Text: If we can reduce the deviation, we'll be able to get the correct memory data.

Name: Liv
Text: I'm setting up the visual response frequency...

Name: Lee
Text: I've already done it. Actually, I also optimized the switch method.

Name: Lee
Text: This way, I don't need to adapt to the machine again. It should be more efficient.

Name: Liv
Text: Alright... I'll leave it to you then, Lee.

Name: Lee
Text: Leave it to me.

Name: Lee
Text: How's the situation?

Name: Liv
Text: Thanks to you, I have finished calibrating this part of data.

Name: Lee
Text: Good. Moving to the next place now.

Name: Liv
Text: The projection is ready to commence, Lee.

Name: Lee
Text: Whenever you're ready.

Name: Liv
Text: Calibration complete. I knew you could do it.

Name: Lee
Text: Nothing difficult really.

Name: Liv
Text: This time, we have multiple data points to calibrate. It might be a little more challenging.

Name: Lee
Text: Doesn't matter. Let's go.

Name: Tifa
Text: Why aren't you stopping them?!

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: Because... they were... just running...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: They didn't... interfere... with my... creation... Hehe...

Name: Tifa
Text: What a foolish machine...

Name: Tifa
Text: But your powers are special. I may consider taking you in. You can become an Ascendant like me.

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: I cannot... follow you... Hehe...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: Only the Sagemachina... can... lead us... to a future of our own...

Name: Tifa
Text: Fool, the future of the world belongs to the Ascension-Network... This is just as expected of a machine.

Name: Tifa
Text: If you are not joining me, then die.

Name: Liv
Text: Reading interrupted.

Name: Lucia
Text: I'll take care of this.

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: You... are... as superficial... as those humans...

Name: Lee
Text: Is it my turn this time?

Name: Lee
Text: Bring it on.

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: So... tired...

Name: Tifa
Text: What an insignificant prey.

Name: Liv
Text: Progress has reached 75%.

Name: Lucia
Text: Time to finish it off.

Name: Lucia
Text: I've never seen a machine with such special consciousness...

Name: Lee
Text: Humans have left the Earth too long. We're no longer familiar with what has happened in this world.

Name: Lee
Text: All we can do is keep striving forward on our own path.

Name: Lucia
Text: Roger...

Name: Lucia
Text: Liv, we'll need you to access its control system to ensure it will not attack us when we reboot it.

Name: Liv
Text: Ok, leave it to me.

Name: Lucia
Text: Lee, we're going to collect its scattered Memory Chips. We should be able to access more clues after a reboot.

Name: Old Artist
Text: Anthony, thank you for being my hands to help me complete my artwork... I have no more regrets.

Name: Old Artist
Text: My life is about to end. I don't need to paint anymore.

Name: Anthony
Text: No more... painting...

Name: Anthony
Text: Then... am I also... useless?

Name: Old Artist
Text: No, your journey has just begun.

Name: Old Artist
Text: I was controlling you to make my own works, but now, you can create your own by your thoughts.

Name: Anthony
Text: My... thoughts...

Name: Anthony
Text: Then... do you... recognize my... works?

Name: Old Artist
Text: To be honest, I don't really understand your works.

Name: Anthony
Text: Because... I am a... machine?

Name: Old Artist
Text: Could be, or could not. In any case, I hope you can keep it up.

Name: Old Artist
Text: You were so happy when making them. There must be someone who can understand you and share your joy in the future.

Name: Old Artist
Text: If you do find someone like that, you must not let them down...

Name: Old Artist
Text: Alright, I need to rest now.

Name: Buyer
Text: Darn it! I was planning on taking a gamble on this "Robot Artist" gimmick.

Name: Buyer
Text: Thanks to the Punishing Virus, everyone is afraid of robots now!

Name: Buyer
Text: Now those paintings are worth nothing! All turned into waste paper!

Name: Buyer
Text: You're worth nothing more than being a tool... I should sell you to other painters who need an assistant.

Name: Buyer
Text: Realizing a human artist's will. That's all you are.

Name: Lucia
Text: The chip is assembled.

Name: Lee
Text: We can reboot it now.

Name: Liv
Text: Um, preparing to access and reproduce Nozzle's memories.

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: A world without humans... Free world... Free art...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: Hehe... hehe...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: Why... have to fight...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: There... must be a solution... where battle... is not necessary...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: No one understands me... No one... appreciates... my work...

Name: Liv
Text: The memory is damaged...

Name: Liv
Text: I think I'll have to sync the memory up manually.

Name: Lucia
Text: Here's the first breakpoint. Liv, you can start the rebooting process.

Name: Liv
Text: Will do. Just a reminder the reboot will produce memory illusions.

Name: Liv
Text: Ready to reboot.

Name: Lee
Text: We'll take care of the illusions.

Name: Lee
Text: This is the last breakpoint. Let's get it over and done with.

Name: Lucia
Text: On it.

Name: Liv
Text: I'll do my best.

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: It's Corrupted! They are forming an organization!

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: We must stop them!

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: What... are... you... doing...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: No... You must not... destroy the Sagemachina's will... Do not... damage... my work...

Name: Graffiti Artist Follower
Text: Leader... you awakened us...

Name: Graffiti Artist Follower
Text: Graffiti... is art... art...

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: The number of Corrupted keeps growing!

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Attack!

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: Humans... cannot... understand...

Name: Liv
Text: Looks like here's another piece of damaged memory.

Name: Lucia
Text: In order to find more clues, a reboot is necessary.

Name: Lee
Text: Here's the breakpoint.

Name: Lucia
Text: Alright, start the reboot.

Name: Lucia
Text: Lee, get ready.

Name: Lee
Text: Got it. Same as always.

Name: Liv
Text: Replaying the memory now.

Name: Tifa
Text: Why aren't you stopping them?!

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: Because... they were... just running...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: They didn't... interfere... with my... creation... Hehe...

Name: Tifa
Text: What a foolish machine...

Name: Tifa
Text: But your powers are special. I may consider taking you in. You can become an Ascendant like me.

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: I cannot... follow you... Hehe...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: Only the Sagemachina... can... lead us... to a future of our own...

Name: Tifa
Text: Fool, the future of the world belongs to the Ascension-Network... This is just as expected of a machine.

Name: Tifa
Text: If you are not joining me, then die.

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: You... are... as superficial... as those humans...

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: So... tired...

Name: Tifa
Text: What an insignificant prey.

Name: Graffiti Artist Follower
Text: Protect... the leader!

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: It's...

Name: Graffiti Artist Follower
Text: Leader... run...

Name: Tifa
Text: I-I'm Tifa! A Support Construct! I'm honored to become a part of Suzaku!

Name: Tifa
Text: I don't think I'm a good fighter...

Name: Tifa
Text: Can I still... fight alongside everyone?

Name: Tifa
Text: Yes! Understood...! Commandant, you're such a gentle and dependable person!

Name: Tifa
Text: What to do...

Name: Tifa
Text: Okay, take a deep breath... Just like what Commandant said...

Name: Tifa
Text: Mission complete! I knew Suzaku was the best!

Name: Tifa
Text: As long as I'm with Commandant, I'm not afraid of any enemy!

Name: Tifa
Text: Commandant! Watch out!

Name: Tifa
Text: Commandant... Why...

Name: Tifa
Text: It's all my fault... I'm too weak...

Name: Tifa
Text: Commandant... Without you, I cannot go on anymore...

Name: Liv
Text: It seemed... Tifa fell in love with her commandant...

Name: Lee
Text: She was hearing her own voice all along...

Name: Roland
Text: Come on, it's time to prove yourselves.

Name: Roland
Text: Kill... Devour... Make the power your own...

Name: Corrupted
Text: Power... The power to become free...

Name: Corrupted
Text: Give... me... the power of Ascendants...

Name: Tifa
Text: Power... is flowing...

Name: Tifa
Text: I... want more... power...

Name: Roland
Text: Should I say you've got good potential?

Name: Roland
Text: But it takes more to become an Ascendant.

Name: Roland
Text: A winner deserves a reward. You have earned yourself a letter of invitation to the next trial.

Name: Roland
Text: A wise choice. I will tell you more things that you want to know...

Name: Roland
Text: Right... The power of Ascnet.

Name: Roland
Text: This is the power of Ascnet. The more Punishing Virus you absorb... the stronger you are...

Name: Tifa
Text: I want more...

Name: Tifa
Text: Roland... Give me... more!

Name: Roland
Text: Hahaha. The first-timers are always so eager.

Name: Roland
Text: Like I said, you are not the only one special here. You still have one final test.

Name: Roland
Text: Destroy it and prove to me you can walk out here alive, then I will give you more of my power.

Name: Roland
Text: This power enables you to see the dawn with your own eyes. It can also help you...

Name: Roland
Text: To take revenge on the Punishing Virus... On the entire world...

Name: Roland
Text: Unleash yourself, Tifa.

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: What is that "thing"... I have never seen anything so freakish...

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: In just one hit... How... terrifying...

Name: Construct Leader
Text: Don't fall back! Destroy it!

Name: Tifa
Text: Destroy...?

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: What... is it doing?!

Name: Tifa
Text: Insects...

Name: Tifa
Text: This is the power beyond Punishing Virus...

Name: Tifa
Text: Humans are indeed ignorant and weak...

Name: Tifa
Text: If I had this power earlier... I could have saved Commandant...

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: The Corrupted are coming again!

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Don't worry, we have deployed the Iso-Devices! Just stay inside and you'll be right!

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Defeat them!

Name: Tifa
Text: Ah... Iso-Device... It reminds me of those days with Commandant again...

Name: Tifa
Text: How naive were we to believe in toys like Iso-Devices...

Name: Tifa
Text: Look at all these human toys... Infect them all, Corrupted!

Name: Tifa
Text: Right. Arm yourselves... with all the devices...

Name: Tifa
Text: Let the humans... suffer from their own naivety!

Name: Tifa
Text: Haha... Hahaha!

Name: Liv
Text: Sorry, this section of Tifa's memory is heavily corrupted by the Punishing Virus.

Name: Liv
Text: We need to get rid of these Punishing Virus illusions first.

Name: Lucia
Text: Are those people... from Cerberus?

Name: Lee
Text: Doesn't look like it to me.

Name: Tifa
Text: Do you want to know more about the Ascendants?

Name: Tifa
Text: Haha... Hahaha...

Name: Tifa
Text: Perhaps, you should... feel it for yourself...

Name: Kamui
Text: Darn, she's too powerful...

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant... We have reached another zone corrupted by the Punishing Virus...

Name: Liv
Text: We must remove the illusions first... Commandant, help us break through the obstacles!

Name: Liv
Text: The Virus is gone! Commandant, let's continue to read the record...

Name: Construct Leader
Text: You are no ordinary Corrupted. What on earth are you...?

Name: Tifa
Text: It's only been a few days. Have I changed so much?

Name: Tifa
Text: Oh well...

Name: Tifa
Text: Do you recognize me now?

Name: Construct Leader
Text: Are you... that lost Construct...? But why...

Name: Roland
Text: Has all the fire been put off? About time to go.

Name: Roland
Text: What a beautiful place. Miss Luna surely has great taste.

Name: Roland
Text: A pity that it will become a battlefield soon.

Name: Terrapod
Text: Identity: Corrupted. Threat Level: 5

Name: Terrapod
Text: Executing battle command—

Name: Roland
Text: Hm? These machines are not infected by Punishing Virus. Interesting...

Name: Roland
Text: What's the name of the machine that Gabriel hates most? Oh, "Sagemachina"... They don't look like his work though.

Name: Roland
Text: Which means this place has an owner.

Name: Roland
Text: I must pay a visit first to the owner then.

Name: Roland
Text: Luckily, I've got a gift prepared...

Name: Roland
Text: These bionic animals... look quite real.

Name: Roland
Text: I have to give credit to the Estate owner's vintage taste.

Name: Roland
Text: I see... Whenever someone gets closer, they will start to move...

Name: Roland
Text: Even the defense... has a vintage design.

Name: Roland
Text: Hello, dear owner? Have you finally noticed me?

Name: Roland
Text: I assume you have a surveillance system... Or whatever...
The estate welcomes no one. Please leave.

Name: Roland
Text: What if I don't?

Name: Roland
Text: Sensory traps?

Name: Roland
Text: Wow...

Name: Roland
Text: Like an old-school special agent movie... How exciting.

Name: Roland
Text: Haha, I just cleared everything.

Name: Roland
Text: Hmm... maybe my methods were a bit harsh.

Name: Roland
Text: Hm? They are following me.

Name: Roland
Text: I didn't expect them to be so quick in reaction.

Name: Roland
Text: You all are too early. The party isn't ready yet...

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: It's an Ascendant! Ascendant Roland!

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Oh gosh... Look at his readings... The concentration of Punishing Virus is insane...

Name: Construct Leader
Text: The enemy is powerful. We cannot afford to hesitate even for a split second!

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Dammit... We are... no match for him...

Name: Roland
Text: Hmm, this should be all of them.

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: I must... avenge my teammates... Must... let other teams know...

Name: Roland
Text: ...A sneak attack?

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: You bloody Corrupted... Deserves no respect!

Name: Roland
Text: How rude!

Name: Roland
Text: As I expect... Humans are despicable beings...

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Keep your formation. Eliminate the Ascendant!

Name: Roland
Text: Oh, how conceited can you all be?

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Dammit... Open fire!

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Um... Argh! Why are you removing our Inver-Devices? Are you trying to... infect us?

Name: Roland
Text: Infect? You don't deserve that gift. I am leaving you here.

Name: Roland
Text: See this bomb in my hand? It suits your sad and sorry selves.

Name: Roland
Text: I will plant it in your body. Then...

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Wait, what! What are you doing!?

Name: Roland
Text: When your teammates come for you... they will join you in becoming...

Name: Roland
Text: Hideous fireworks.

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Argh... Gosh... Why... Why...

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Why did I... even fight...

Name: Kamui
Text: Phew... Finally got here.

Name: Kamui
Text: Hmm? Why is there no one around?

Name: Estate Butler
Text: Greetings... You should just stay here forever.

Name: Liv
Text: The normal route leads people to this fake hall...

Name: Liv
Text: To enter the real guest hall, we must take a special route.

Name: Estate Butler
Text: I locked up all those Corrupted that the Estate could not destroy inside this room.

Name: Estate Butler
Text: If those people are going to use you, I would rather you get consumed by the Corrupted...

Name: Roland
Text: Did he purposely separate us?

Name: Roland
Text: What a waste of effort. I've already found you.

Name: Kamui
Text: That voice sounds so familiar...

Name: Kamui
Text: Hey, butler. Did something happen over there?

Name: Lucia
Text: He's not answering. Let's find a way out first.

Name: Estate Butler
Text: I will stop you right here.

Name: Estate Butler
Text: I must protect... Mr. Copperfield's... lifelong work...

Name: Roland
Text: Thanks for all the joy you brought me today, Mr. Butler.

Name: Roland
Text: I'm very sorry... But I must let Punishing Virus infect you.

Name: Roland
Text: It's all for Miss Luna.

Name: Estate Butler
Text: I will... never yield!

Name: Estate Butler
Text: Ugh... Aaargh!

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant... We have reached another zone corrupted by Punishing Virus.

Name: Liv
Text: We must remove the illusions first... Commandant, help us break through the obstacles!

Name: Liv
Text: The Virus is gone! Commandant, let's continue to read the record...

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant... We have reached another zone corrupted by Punishing Virus.

Name: Liv
Text: We must remove the illusions first... Commandant, help us break through the obstacles!

Name: Liv
Text: The Virus is gone! Commandant, let's continue to read the record...

Name: Zack
Text: Corrupted incoming... Emma... lost... Must... protect... Emma...

Name: Zack
Text: Go away...

Name: Zack
Text: Must... find... Emma...

Name: Zack
Text: Go away!

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant, I need to scan Zack's memory shell before attempting to repair him.

Name: Liv
Text: The structure of the memory shell is simple, but for some reason, it isn't deeply infected.

Name: Liv
Text: Let's investigate together.

Name: Liv
Text: The tag of the important record is "Operation Grand Retreat".

Name: Liv
Text: Punishing Virus has infested these data zones. The virus illusions are impacting our data query.

Name: Liv
Text: I've made some progress. All related data found. Loading now.

Name: Liv
Text: I just need to repair one more section to start reading Zack's memories.

Name: Zack
Text: Clues of... Emma's lost items...

Name: Zack
Text: Find Emma... Items...

Name: Zack
Text: Find Emma... Items...

Name: Zack
Text: Calculating... Completed... West halls...

Name: Lee
Text: Large-scale data corruption here. Leave it to me.

Name: Lee
Text: At the end of the Post-Pandemic Age, Corrupted controlled by the Punishing Virus already had military production capabilities.

Name: Lee
Text: Even with the comprehensive defense of this Estate Museum, it could not hold against the overwhelming number of Corrupted.

Name: Lee
Text: That was the situation they had to face.

Name: Zack
Text: Zack... help... Emma and Copperfield... retreat...

Name: Liv
Text: We've reached the deepest part of the data. The record shows Zack was already being infected at that time.

Name: Liv
Text: But somehow the infection was restricted and controlled at a certain level.

Name: Liv
Text: Let's clear the virus illusions here and read the final record.

Name: Estate Butler
Text: Zack... We are the only ones left here.

Name: Estate Butler
Text: I will take you to the Static Lock. I hope Mr. Copperfield's research will work.

Name: Estate Butler
Text: Before that, I just need to calm you down... I never thought we would end up like this.

Name: Liv
Text: Recreating memory now. Hope we can find clues of the Ascendant.

Name: Sister
Text: Punishing Virus injection complete... All weapon system activated... Increasing power output...

Name: Liv
Text: Wait, why is she using the power of Punishing Virus, but still seen as an enemy by Corrupted?

Name: Sister
Text: I haven't fought for a long time. Looks like... this will be my last fight.

Name: Sister
Text: Gargh. This power still impacts my mind... In the end, it still tests my faith...

Name: Sister
Text: Tsk. I thought that God bloke abandoned me long ago...

Name: Liv
Text: There are way too many Corrupted. Commandant, we should retreat now!

Name: Sister
Text: I should continue... with my final cleansing...

Name: Liv
Text: Simulation in progress. Commandant, please watch closely!

Name: Liv
Text: Even in this time, her frame capabilities are as good as ours in battle.

Name: Liv
Text: But we have no information at all... I wonder how many secrets did the Church have in the past?

Name: Liv
Text: All those Corrupted came from the machine factory's direction.

Name: Liv
Text: If the source remains, their numbers would only keep growing... Exactly like what happened to us.

Name: Liv
Text: The Sister's destination... seems to be right there.

Name: Sister
Text: Phew, just like those little brats... You always look down on adults.

Name: Sister
Text: Do you know how difficult it is to be an adult...? Get out of my way!

Name: Sister
Text: Tsk.

Name: Liv
Text: The Punishing Virus' impact must have peaked around this point.

Name: Liv
Text: These are... the large firefighting robots we met before...

Name: Lee
Text: Yet, Punishing Virus modified them into arsonists. How ironic.

Name: Liv
Text: Data interfered by virus illusions...

Name: Liv
Text: Wait a sec. I'm activating emergency mode.

Name: Liv
Text: Okay. We've seen it many times. We know what to do.

Name: Liv
Text: Virus interference removed. Re-syncing now.

Name: Liv
Text: Ah, the virus infection is rooted deeply here... It needs a deep cleaning. I'll need help.

Name: Liv
Text: She managed to... hold off so many Corrupted here...

Name: Liv
Text: As if she had an endless reserve of energy... Was it because of the Punishing Virus, or her own obsession?

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant, it's a new combat objective!

Name: Liv
Text: This piece of broken memory probably came from when Sister was hunted by Nozzle.

Name: Liv
Text: We need to manually repair the noise while tracing the memory.

Name: Liv
Text: Recording complete. So this is when Sister met Nozzle.

Name: Liv
Text: Next section... Okay, done.

Name: Liv
Text: After ascension, even Nozzle could use tactics against its enemy.

Name: Liv
Text: The final section is also recorded.

Name: Liv
Text: There were just too many Corrupted. Even Sister had no choice but to run.

Name: Sister
Text: This is the factory's core...

Name: Sister
Text: Why would humans design such a fragile structure... Once it's destroyed, everything will be lost. How unreliable.

Name: Liv
Text: The memory data shows that Sister had already reached her infection limit.

Name: Liv
Text: But she hadn't completed her objective yet...

Name: Liv
Text: Let's finish this journey with her.

Name: Liv
Text: All missions in the current stage have been completed. Go to the memory breakpoint to start the next stage.

Name: Liv
Text: This piece of memory is already close to the end.

Name: Liv
Text: ...This should be Sister's final struggle.

Name: Liv
Text: Let's go get her final memory.

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant... We have reached another zone corrupted by Punishing Virus.

Name: Liv
Text: We must remove the illusions first... Commandant, help us break through the obstacles!

Name: Liv
Text: The Virus is gone! Commandant, let's continue to read the record...

Name: Liv
Text: The memory data videos show that Rohacchi found some spark falling into the ruins.

Name: Liv
Text: And it became very interested in it.

Name: Liv
Text: It then traced all the way toward the spark's landing point.

Name: Liv
Text: It seemed to have also activated some mechanism within the ruins...

Name: Liv
Text: To further analyze the videos in this memory data...

Name: Liv
Text: I will recreate the situation by video.

Name: Liv
Text: The memory is completely restored. Rohacchi opened this switch to move to a higher level.

Name: Liv
Text: The sealed road opened again.

Name: Liv
Text: On its journey, Rohacchi ran into the source of the spark and noises... and got attacked by "Roseblade".

Name: Liv
Text: As expected, all the suddenly appeared Constructs were related to Ascendants. They were also after "Tenebrion".

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant, I suggest we carefully study the combat data against "Roseblade". It will benefit our subsequent operations.

Name: Liv
Text: Rohacchi seemed to have met similar-looking machines.

Name: Liv
Text: It thought they were its own kind and went up to them.

Name: Liv
Text: Only to be met with sudden assault.

Name: Liv
Text: Subsequent memory data has been deciphered. Transforming to digital video now.

Name: Liv
Text: In the memory, IX-68 squatted next to one of its "kin," slowly patting its body...

Name: Liv
Text: Here, Rohacchi met Nanami...

Name: Liv
Text: And suddenly attacked...!?

Name: Liv
Text: Perhaps we could find more information about Nanami from this memory.

Name: Liv
Text: The battle didn't last long, and Nanami seemed to have moved together with Rohacchi for some time.

Name: Liv
Text: According to the memory, Rohacchi and Nanami defeated many Corrupted and returned to the upper level of the ruins.

Name: Liv
Text: Looks like the "mural" they were talking about must be nearby.

Name: Liv
Text: I'll continue with my analysis, Commandant. Please look out for any info related to the "mural" that caused them to awaken.

Name: Liv
Text: According to Rohacchi's memory, this should be where they first saw the mural.

Name: Liv
Text: But when it took Nanami there, they found nothing.

Name: Liv
Text: Apart from those machines wandering nearby.

Name: Liv
Text: Maybe the ruins collapsed because of us, so the murals also fell to another location.

Name: Liv
Text: No matter what, this piece of memory is worth studying again.

Name: Kamui
Text: I found well-preserved facilities underneath the ruins.

Name: Kamui
Text: I tried my best to stay awake.

Name: Kamui
Text: But I knew I didn't have much time left.

Name: Kamui
Text: So I had to break away from the Corrupted ASAP.

Name: Kamui
Text: One after another. Aren't you tired at all??

Name: Kamui
Text: Why don't you just come all together? At least it can save some time.

Name: Kamui
Text: I must keep moving. No one can stop me.

Name: Kamui
Text: At the bottom of the ruins, I found a long and narrow corridor. Unlike the upper levels, the facilities there were kept very well.

Name: Kamui
Text: But I was exhausted from non-stop fighting.

Name: Kamui
Text: Those Corrupted seemed to have noticed this too, and launched an assault together.

Name: Kamui
Text: Tsk, the number just keeps growing...

Name: Camu
Text: Looks like you need my help.

Name: Kamui
Text: I know what you're planning. I'm not done yet!

Name: Camu
Text: Hah, you bluff. I know full well about your body.

Name: Kamui
Text: ...I will never let the virus infect me.

Name: Karenina
Text: You, stop right there!

Name: Kamui
Text: I was shocked to hear such a loud voice. Never thought she would catch up so quickly.

Name: Kamui
Text: And thanks to her, all the wandering Corrupted came up to us. The only thought I had was to never let them get me.

Name: Kamui
Text: After getting rid of all the annoying Corrupted, Camu launched his final attack too.

Name: Kamui
Text: He was far more powerful than me. I knew about that. All too well.

Name: Kamui
Text: But I had my reasons to fight too...

Name: Kamui
Text: Of course I would not fall so easily! Because I must be myself!

Name: Tifa
Text: Commandant... You are finally here...

Name: Sister
Text: Take me along, and cleanse this planet!

Name: Camu
Text: Am I Kamui or not? That doesn't matter.

Name: Archer
Text: Your arrow is my arrow!

Name: Tyrant
Text: Find… Emma…

Name: Graffiti Artist
Text: Welcome... my audience...

Name: Roland
Text: You want to be an Ascendant? Ha, you are not qualified!

Name: System
Text: Initiating Punishing relay communication—

Name: Roland
Text: Hello? Can anyone hear me...? Tsk, I just don't understand how this thing works.

Name: Roland
Text: Hello...?

Name: α
Text: Speak.

Name: Roland
Text: So you've been listening... Fine. Can't you be a bit more passionate to your comrades?

Name: α
Text: If you don't have anything important, I'll hang up. I'm very busy.

Name: Roland
Text: Miss Luna sent me to ask... Well, it's not really about "us"...

Name: Roland
Text: I mean, you are crossing the Bering Strait now.

Name: α
Text: Oh really.

Name: Roland
Text: Don't you know? We noticed that your coordinates were moving through the Pacific Ocean over the last week...

Name: Roland
Text: So what's going on with you?

Name: α
Text: I'm on the back of a Narwhal.

Name: Roland
Text: Um, what...?

Name: α
Text: I've already controlled its diving module. Maybe three more days...

Name: Roland
Text: Three days then what?

Name: α
Text: It will be tamed and become my pet.

Name: Roland
Text: I remember... You started from the coastal areas of South America. Did you find it over there?

Name: α
Text: Yes.

Name: Roland
Text: You really are into weird things like this, aren't you...

Name: α
Text: It probably has a consciousness that is highly identical to a human's. I find it very interesting.

Name: α
Text: The fact that it was attacked by the Corrupted proves this.

Name: α
Text: And...

Name: Roland
Text: Yes?

Name: α
Text: The view was great there.

Name: α
Text: I'm going to focus on dealing with the Corrupted. They are interfering with my control over the Narwhal.

Name: α
Text: Meanwhile... Help me look for more information about it.

Name: Roland
Text: I'm not your bellboy, but... whatever.

Name: α
Text: The communication signal is lost... I must prevent the virus infection and restore the communication...

Name: α
Text: This horn has similar functions to a Construct's Inver-Device...

Name: α
Text: So it must be communicating with some Construct... Interesting.

Name: Lucia
Text: Liv... What's wrong with them?

Name: Liv
Text: Defense terminal stopped running, causing the loss of many defense commands...

Name: Liv
Text: Without commands, they can't do anything.

Name: Lucia
Text: So the defense mechanism's stopped working. Aren't the humans here going to do something about it?

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant, we've done it! All defense machines are back in order.

Name: Liv
Text: Remember, the defense machines are armed with powerful weapons, but they have poor armor.

Name: Lee
Text: Those civilians are watching us.

Name: Lucia
Text: Don't be distracted. Stick to the plan and protect the defense machines.

Name: α
Text: Very strong will... Good...

Name: α
Text: You are worthy to face my blade.

Name: α
Text: So there's no more need to talk.

Name: α
Text: Show me what you have.

Name: Lucia
Text: Liv, Lee, sorry. Can I leave this to you?

Name: Lucia
Text: I want to go in directly.

Name: Lucia
Text: That white-haired Ascendant is there... I can't miss the opportunity.

Name: Lee
Text: Understood. We will try our best to hold her up for you.

Name: Lucia
Text: I'll be back ASAP...!

Name: Rosetta
Text: ...You aren't going through.

Name: Lee
Text: Leave her alone. We'll be your opponent!

Name: Liv
Text: No... We can't stop her... She's too powerful...!

Name: Lee
Text: Wait...! What are those... in the sea?!

Name: Rosetta
Text: In the sea...? A raging tide?!

Name: Rosetta
Text: ...Derek!

Name: Diana
Text: Gray Raven, thanks for your help...

Name: Diana
Text: Please, hold against the Corrupted!

Name: Diana
Text: Everybody, defend the port!

Name: Diana
Text: Nascal!

Name: Lee
Text: The Forest Guards are suffering casualties!

Name: Lucia
Text: Our battle isn't over!

Name: α
Text: If you call that a battle.

Name: α
Text: You are not even half as good as her.

Name: α
Text: Do you even understand what you have done...?

Name: Lucia
Text: You are my enemy, and I'm going to defeat you. This will never change!

Name: α
Text: ...You never learn.

Name: α
Text: I made her an Ascendant in order to save her.

Name: α
Text: But because of what you did...

Name: α
Text: She will become a mindless puppet controlled by the Punishing Virus instead.

Name: Lucia
Text: Ugh...!

Name: Lucia
Text: But so what...? Both the Corrupted and the so-called Ascendants are the enemy of humans.

Name: α
Text: Is that so... Whatever.

Name: α
Text: Just stay there and watch. This is the difference between us.

Name: Lucia
Text: Why am I... drawn to her...

Name: α
Text: Hmph. Even as a puppet...

Name: α
Text: You still know who's the strong one...

Name: α
Text: Let's end it then.

Name: Diana
Text: It's been a while since I last came here.

Name: Lucia
Text: What is this place, Diana...?

Name: Diana
Text: During the early outbreak of the Punishing Virus, Murmansk had enjoyed a period of prosperity thanks to its geographical advantages.

Name: Diana
Text: It absorbed many inland cities and formed a commonwealth. This place was part of the northeast commonwealth.

Name: Diana
Text: And one of the birthplaces of Forest Guard.

Name: Lee
Text: There's no time for nostalgia... We are followed.

Name: Diana
Text: Smells like a prey...

Name: Lucia
Text: Forest Guards, continue tracing forward. Stay close to the target...

Name: Lucia
Text: Gray Raven will bring up the rear and deal with the enemies in the shadows!

Name: Lee
Text: The target is not far ahead, but why didn't you ask the Forest Guard to follow up?

Name: Diana
Text: You said Evan was on his feet. There's no way he could lose the Corrupted.

Name: Diana
Text: But we didn't see him when we locked on to the target...

Name: Diana
Text: Something's not right.

Name: Liv
Text: Our target is running away!

Name: Lucia
Text: Hesitation will only lead to failure. Go! Stop it!

Name: Diana
Text: Evan can't just disappear!

Name: Diana
Text: There must be other clues nearby. Forest Guards! Spread out!

Name: Diana
Text: Search everywhere! Everywhere!

Name: Diana
Text: Someone found a 5cm long, shattered titanium plate...

Name: Liv
Text: Please let me take a look!

Name: Liv
Text: ...Yes! There's human sebum and hair on the edges.

Name: Diana
Text: That's our first clue! We are on the right track!

Name: Lee
Text: Looking for clues help, but the longer we stay here, the easier we may become the target instead...

Name: Liv
Text: Lee, are you talking about the wandering Corrupted in the forest?

Name: Lee
Text: Not just the forest. They could also be among the snowy rocks, even river beds.

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant! Please stay alerted!

Name: Liv
Text: I'm about to process the human pheromones found on these parts...

Name: Liv
Text: Diana, please give me Evan's weapon. I need to collect his pheromones.

Name: Liv
Text: The two samples matched perfectly! Evan was here! Now I can make a pheromone detector.

Name: Diana
Text: Is that...?

Name: Lee
Text: As long as Evan is still breathing, we can detect the pheromone he produces.

Name: Liv
Text: Found him!!

Name: Liv
Text: He's trapped on the shell of the Corrupted. Why...? Are they using him to protect themselves?

Name: Lucia
Text: Adjust your equipment immediately! Only melee weapons are allowed. We must not hurt humans!

Name: Lee
Text: I can't cut through these metal bones without hurting the rescue target.

Name: Lee
Text: Our only option is to make a strategic relocation. Take it back to the Forest Guard stronghold first, then we can think of another way.

Name: Lucia
Text: Lee... How's his health doing?

Name: Lee
Text: Don't worry, he's not infected. Just a little hypothermia.

Name: Liv
Text: Strong Punishing reaction detected nearby! Everyone, watch out!

Name: Diana
Text: The Corrupted are still killing.

Name: Lucia
Text: Diana, please join us and form a line of defense together.

Name: Lucia
Text: We must not let Corrupted hurt humans.

Name: Diana
Text: The Forest Guard acknowledges Liv's strategic vision.

Name: Diana
Text: My sisters and I will do all we can to assist Gray Raven's rescue plan.

Name: Lee
Text: Calculations complete. The enemy's weak points are its supporting legs.

Name: Diana
Text: Sisters! Focus fire on the supporting legs!

Name: Liv
Text: Wait a sec. Mr. Lee didn't include Evan in his calculation...

Name: Liv
Text: Some of those legs are very close to Evan's location.

Name: Liv
Text: Please, everyone, don't hurt Evan.

Name: Liv
Text: That cross-shaped terminal is causing EM polarization on the other devices.

Name: Liv
Text: The affected devices are nigh-immune to most of our attacks.

Name: Liv
Text: Attack the cross-shaped terminal continuously to remove this status from them.

Name: Lee
Text: The light beams radiating from the Heteromer Terminal will repair the Heteromer devices.

Name: Lee
Text: But be careful, these beams contain viruses that will cause stress to our sensory systems if we get hit directly.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Commandant of Gray Raven, these oddly shaped terminals have the ability to split apart.

Name: Watanabe
Text: The polar electric current circulating between them can paralyze a Construct's sensory and reduce its mobility.

Name: Watanabe
Text: But consecutive attacks can reverse their polarity.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Consider this option if they appear in this form.

Name: Liv
Text: According to the map, we've managed to land at the designated location—

Name: Liv
Text: The data analysis cabin on the space station.

Name: Liv
Text: But... nothing's left of our aircraft...

Name: Lucia
Text: If we can destroy the space station's defense system, then we should be able to retreat when the main forces arrive.

Name: Lee
Text: These terminals give me the creeps...

Name: Lee
Text: Is this what the report was talking about? The strange corruption phenomenon localized only in this space station?

Name: Lucia
Text: Be careful, Lee.

Name: Lee
Text: This is...!

Name: Lee
Text: We managed to unlock a higher clearance level...

Name: Lucia
Text: Wait, that cross just now is guarding the exit now...

Name: Liv
Text: According to my preliminary scanning results, this type of enemy is not made of any known conventional machinery...

Name: Liv
Text: It is... composed entirely of the Punishing Virus...

Name: Lee
Text: This space station really IS hiding some important secrets...

Name: Lee
Text: Looks like we can't just simply blow this place up.

Name: Liv
Text: Guys, I've turned off the space station's sensor systems.

Name: Lee
Text: Well done, Liv.

Name: Lee
Text: This should help relieve some pressure for Babylonia.

Name: Lucia
Text: Yep, our first step to victory.

Name: Liv
Text: We have arrived at the second target location.

Name: Liv
Text: According to the analysis, this should be the weapons control backend...

Name: Liv
Text: ...after being corrupted and modified by the virus.

Name: Lee
Text: A lot of inactive Heteromers in here...

Name: Lucia
Text: If they all turn hostile like what happened just now...

Name: Lee
Text: Do you see that cross-shaped enemy in the middle?

Name: Lee
Text: We're unsure how it manages to...

Name: Lee
Text: ...But it seems like this type of enemy can create enemies, and not to mention that it—

Name: Lucia
Text: Holds the key to solving our problems, I know...

Name: Liv
Text: Those black pillars... decompose... and reconstruct...

Name: Liv
Text: Every bit of Hetero-matter of the Punishing Virus in this space station could become our enemy...

Name: Lee
Text: Our attacks can deactivate them, at least temporarily.

Name: Lee
Text: As long as it works, right?

Name: Lucia
Text: Yep, let's deal with them like this for now.

Name: Lee
Text: Finally...

Name: Liv
Text: Ah... Some Hetero-matter have regenerated and are moving again!

Name: Lee
Text: Tch, we're not really in a position to play attrition warfare here...

Name: Lucia
Text: Liv, access the control system directly. Lee—

Name: Lee
Text: Got it.

Name: Liv
Text: Done!

Name: Liv
Text: All close-range defense systems for interception purposes are offline!

Name: Lucia
Text: Well done, Liv.

Name: Liv
Text: The subsequent forces have begun issuing boarding signals.

Name: Liv
Text: We won't have to fight on our own anymore.

Name: Watanabe
Text: But, you do look like you're in some sort of trouble.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Let's skip the small talk.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Consider this my little present.

Name: Liv
Text: The enemies just now displayed a completely different mode of attack.

Name: Liv
Text: But Watanabe's already figured out how to deal with them...

Name: Lucia
Text: Such strength...

Name: Lucia
Text: He feels like a different person.

Name: Watanabe
Text: So, is everything fine?

Name: Lee
Text: Oh, it's all thanks to you, Mr. Watanabe.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Hah, spunky as ever.

Name: Watanabe
Text: ...This place looks different from the others.

Name: Liv
Text: The door is encrypted. Your specialty, Lee.

Name: Lee
Text: (Analyzing...)

Name: Lee
Text: I... see...

Name: Lee
Text: There's four corrupted terminals in the four corners of this compartment.

Name: Lee
Text: Varied combinations can be produced by activating them...

Name: Lee
Text: Let's try different combinations.

Name: Lee
Text: Door's cracked, but the Heteromers have entered defense mode...

Name: Watanabe
Text: Well, progress. At least.

Name: Lucia
Text: Let's finish off the remaining enemies.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Levels, huh? The mysterious blocks on the terminal might be the key.

Name: Liv
Text: It appears that interacting with the terminal can change the shape of the block...

Name: Lucia
Text: Looks like we have to choose a shape...

Name: Lee
Text: Maybe something will happen if we leave a certain number of blocks in the corresponding shapes.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Lucia... She's all pumped up all of a sudden...

Name: Watanabe
Text: I see. It's a challenge, isn't it? Hah...

Name: Watanabe
Text: All right, I'll accept it—Let's see who can sweep the enemies faster.

Name: Watanabe
Text: How's that? Still got it in me, eh?

Name: Lucia
Text: ...Impressive.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Let's work together to protect Liv from the last wave of attacks.

Name: Lucia
Text: On it.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Is this what I'm looking for...?

Name: Lucia
Text: What did you say, Watanabe?

Name: Watanabe
Text: Nothing.

Name: Korolev
Text: You... did not comply with... the regulations...

Name: Korolev
Text: Now... Children... Please kindly follow Korolev to the confinement cabin...

Name: Korolev
Text: Accept your punishment...

Name: Korolev
Text: If any resistance occurs... Korolev will follow the rules... to adopt the minimum enforcement measures...

Name: Lucia
Text: Liv, that... is...?

Name: Liv
Text: It's not composed of Hetero-matter. It's a real Corrupted... I'm afraid...

Name: Lee
Text: It's that Kamui incarnate that's been broadcasting the whole time?

Name: Liv
Text: But, in such a high viral density environment... Can a machine truly maintain its original mind?

Name: Liv
Text: It feels like... it's being held in captivity alone in here... What could be the reason for that...?

Name: Lee
Text: We might never find the answers... All I know now is that we only have one option...

Name: Korolev
Text: Confinement...

Name: Liv
Text: Gravity is starting to act up around here...

Name: Lee
Text: The core of the space station... The gravity room. We finally made it.

Name: Watanabe
Text: It's the gravity experiment here that gave birth to Hetero-matter—

Name: Watanabe
Text: Who would have thought—Humans aren't just suffering from the Punishing Virus, they even gave it new life...

Name: Lucia
Text: Watanabe... Thank you for fighting with us all this way...

Name: Watanabe
Text: Don't worry, I won't leave until the threat of this space station is resolved.

Name: Watanabe
Text: I know those enemies were just warm-up for you.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Now, let's show them what we can do.

Name: Liv
Text: Those crosses... again...

Name: Liv
Text: It's like their presence is conveying a certain message...

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant, we can't go any further...

Name: Lee
Text: This is an artificially designed area. Now that we've dispatched the enemies—

Name: Lee
Text: The mechanism should be returning to normal.

Name: Lee
Text: Try to get closer to the edge.

Name: Liv
Text: What a stunning design...

Name: Liv
Text: This can only be achieved by precise gravity manipulation...

Name: Watanabe
Text: If I recall, there's gravity generators inside Babylonia as well, no?

Name: Liv
Text: Yes... But I never thought I would come so close to its prototype...

Name: Lucia
Text: I've just tested its integrity. It should be good to go—

Name: Lucia
Text: Let's advance!

Name: Liv
Text: This is...

Name: Lee
Text: Some kind of mechanism again... Guess we can't skip past it.

Name: Lee
Text: Ah, it's a device used to lock those rings.

Name: Lee
Text: Looks like it's used to stabilize the rings and gravity core.

Name: Lucia
Text: Those rings should function in a similar way. Let's go.

Name: Lee
Text: Yeah...

Name: Ayla
Text: I'm not sure what would happen if you mess up...

Name: Ayla
Text: But please follow my instructions.

Name: Ayla
Text: The first message is—

Name: Ayla
Text: From two to one.

Name: Ayla
Text: Do you have any ideas?

Name: Lee
Text: It seems to be related to these light beams...

Name: Lee
Text: I'll try to brute-force it, but it's going to take some time.

Name: Lee
Text: And it might trigger high alert. Anyway, let's get through this together, Commandant.

Name: Lee
Text: It worked.

Name: Liv
Text: Miss Ayla, please provide the next instruction!

Name: Ayla
Text: Okay, the next message is—

Name: Ayla
Text: From abstract to concrete.

Name: Liv
Text: Abstract and concrete... We've encountered enemies like that before.

Name: Liv
Text: Which means... "Starting from the abstract"?

Name: Liv
Text: Let's do it then!

Name: Liv
Text: We can move on now!

Name: Liv
Text: The path is blocked off again.

Name: Ayla
Text: As you can see... There's three movable mechanisms...

Name: Liv
Text: We do!

Name: Ayla
Text: According to the record, the tip here is—

Name: Ayla
Text: The beginning is the end.

Name: Liv
Text: Hmm, I think I kind of get it...

Name: Lee
Text: Same as before, I'll try to crack it forcibly.

Name: Lee
Text: As expected, you solved the puzzle first, Commandant.

Name: Liv
Text: Ah, here we're again...

Name: Ayla
Text: It should be the last mechanism for this ring.

Name: Lucia
Text: Please tell us the last tip.

Name: Ayla
Text: Okay, listen carefully—

Name: Ayla
Text: Disarray is unity.

Name: Lucia
Text: This is even more cryptic...

Name: Lucia
Text: But experience tells us that we have to create a certain pattern using these light beams.

Name: Lucia
Text: Although I'm not quite certain about it, I think we might want to create as many divisions and chaos as we can with the beams.

Name: Lee
Text: Backend hacking is also in progress.

Name: Lucia
Text: I think... We got it?

Name: Liv
Text: Yep, well done!

Name: Watanabe
Text: The control mechanism for the next ring has appeared.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Let's continue.

Name: Lee
Text: Only a few rings left.

Name: Lucia
Text: Yeah, we'd better hurry. Other troops should be on their way now.

Name: Lucia
Text: No matter what enemy awaits...

Name: Lucia
Text: This time, we have countless teammates on our side.

Name: Lucia
Text: Hmm... maybe it's implying that we have to create a certain pattern.

Name: Liv
Text: Two into... Maybe it's something about the number of light beams.

Name: Watanabe
Text: One might mean a circle, but what does it have to do with the tip?

Name: Lee
Text: Two paths, a single line. I feel like we're nearing the answer.

Name: Liv
Text: Is it meant to be taken literally...?

Name: Lee
Text: If the lines that are crossed becomes connected instead... I guess?

Name: Watanabe
Text: A ring structure...? Could it be a clue to solving this puzzle?

Name: Lucia
Text: Having the beams circulate should match the tip...

Name: Lee
Text: Connecting it in another way might be worth a try...

Name: Watanabe
Text: Maybe we should make the straight lines at the beginning into something else?

Name: Lucia
Text: Light beams... Prism... Three points... Perhaps we can indeed change something...

Name: Liv
Text: Make the single... No, the two merged light beams split. Perhaps... Maybe...

Name: Lee
Text: Commandant, I will hack into it from the backend now.

Name: Liv
Text: The enemies here look different...

Name: Liv
Text: They didn't decomposed upon being defeated. Instead—

Name: Liv
Text: They entered into a state similar to hibernation... Their energy flow is stable inside their remains...

Name: Lee
Text: No more paths forming ahead. Might be because of these enemies.

Name: Lee
Text: Commandant, I don't know what you make of it, but we'd better act with caution.

Name: Lee
Text: After all, this is a new variant from the ones we've been dealing with.

Name: Lucia
Text: Wait... Are they... gathering around us?

Name: Liv
Text: They aren't displaying aggression somehow...

Name: Watanabe
Text: Nonsense.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Unless...

Name: Liv
Text: What's on your mind, Watanabe?

Name: Lee
Text: I'll speak for him—Unless the virus chooses to.

Name: Lucia
Text: The virus chooses to? You mean the Punishing Virus is able to make a choice?

Name: Lucia
Text: That's a sign of intelligence, but...

Name: Watanabe
Text: I don't know... I'm afraid no one knows why, frankly.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Well... It's not like we have many options now.

Name: Liv
Text: A path is made... The energy inside these enemies are transferred to the mechanism...

Name: Liv
Text: And also flowing towards the gravity core.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Sounds just like a recipe for disaster.

Name: Lucia
Text: That core is the primary target of this operation.

Name: Lucia
Text: At the very least... We're getting closer to our final target.

Name: Liv
Text: No more new enemies, Lucia.

Name: Lee
Text: Then, this should be the final mechanism.

Name: Lee
Text: After passing through here, we'll be facing the largest Heteromer that is mooching off on the gravity core.

Name: Lucia
Text: Hesitation will only lead to our defeat at this point.

Name: Lucia
Text: ...Gray Raven, prepare for battle!

Name: Construct
Text: Mr. Lee truly never misses a shot!

Name: Lee
Text: I won't waste a single bullet.

Name: Lee
Text: Mission complete. Prepare to retreat. Commandant should be waiting for us outside here.

Name: Construct A
Text: Mr. Lee, it seems we've been going round in circles...

Name: Lee
Text: This way.

Name: Construct B
Text: Hey, I heard Mr. Lee has no sense of direction. It isn't true, is it? (Softly)

Name: Lee
Text: Remaining Heteromers discovered ahead. Everyone, ready to engage.

Name: Constructs
Text: Roger!

Name: Lee
Text: Commandant, we've arrived at the designated location. Nearby devices show apparent traces of being tampered by Gabriel.

Name: Lee
Text: All devices are expected to be recovered in five minutes.

Name: Lee
Text: After this, Engineering Force can "touch down" on the space station and carry out their duties...

Name: Construct
Text: Mr. Lee! Nearby devices have returned to operation all of a sudden!

Name: Lee
Text: Tsk, what a tedious parting gift.

Name: Tiger
Text: Meo—I mean, Grrrrr...! The Tiger's got some goodies for you!

Name: Rat
Text: Squeak—! Rat's got some goodies for you—! A new life for you—!

Name: Rat
Text: Wait a sec! Why are they beating up my bro?

Name: Rat
Text: Whatever...! The goodies are delivered, squeak—!

Name: Liv
Text: High concentration of Punishing Virus detected! The Corrupted are swarming in—

Name: Sophia
Text: I'm here to help. Please continue the rescue and evacuation.

Name: Liv
Text: I'll do my best!

Name: Lucia
Text: I'll handle the Corrupted on the other side with Lee.

Name: Lee
Text: Understood.

Name: Liv
Text: All people have been evacuated, and some of the wounded have received emergency treatment.

Name: Sophia
Text: Thank you...

Name: Liv
Text: Be careful. Those two Corrupted's energy reactions are abnormal.

Name: Lee
Text: Stay alert. They might be hiding nearby.

Name: Sophia
Text: I'll take care of them. You take the opportunity to break through the passage.

Name: Lucia
Text: Okay, then we'll destroy the Corrupted lurking there.

Name: Liv
Text: Please be careful, Sophia.

Name: Sophia
Text: Got it...

Name: Sophia
Text: The battle is over.

Name: Lucia
Text: The passage is clear!

Name: Liv
Text: It's clear, Sophia!

Name: Sophia
Text: Understood. I'm coming now.

Name: Liv
Text: Please be careful, Sophia!

Name: Lee
Text: The signals show that they are the machines used for train maintenance.

Name: Lee
Text: Watch out for their special attacks.

Name: Sophia
Text: It's all cleared.

Name: Sophia
Text: Let's meet up with them now. Changyu's there too.

Name: Lucia
Text: It's shell is hard to break. Liv, can you identify its weaknesses?

Name: Liv
Text: I'm trying!

Name: Lee
Text: We can't go on like this.

Name: Sophia
Text: Gray Raven is fighting the Core's Heteromers.

Name: Sophia
Text: Fend off the Corrupted. Ensure they won't bring any trouble to us.

Name: Changyu
Text: ...I'll take care of the ones behind us.

Name: Sophia
Text: If you push yourself too far, I'll stop you no matter what.

Name: Changyu
Text: Don't sweat it. I have a plan.

Name: Sophia
Text: All cleared. Changyu, what's the situation on your end?

Name: Sophia
Text: Changyu?

Name: Changyu
Text: Sorry... I've dragged you down...

Name: Sophia
Text: Then save your breath. I have to deal with your wounds first.

Name: Changyu
Text: ...Roger that.

Name: Sophia
Text: This way leads back to the carriage.

Name: Sophia
Text: I'll be back right away.

Name: Liv
Text: I'll help you collect the parts.

Name: Liv
Text: Please be careful, Sophia...

Name: Sophia
Text: I'll be careful...

Name: Liv
Text: That's enough.

Name: Sophia
Text: Half of the Corrupted have been destroyed. This area is safe for now.

Name: Liv
Text: High concentration of Punishing Virus detected! It's...

Name: Lee
Text: A hideous appearance indeed.

Name: Celica
Text: Can you hear me, Gray Ravens? I've detected that you've successfully landed on the train.

Name: Lee
Text: ...And we are now facing the target.

Name: Lucia
Text: Lee, what do you mean?

Name: Lee
Text: The Hetero-Core has been highly corrupted and mutated when falling to Earth. The target we've been after is right before us.

Name: Lucia
Text: Permission for engagement, Commandant.

Name: Liv
Text: The Heterozygote's claws seem super dangerous.

Name: Lucia
Text: Perhaps we can entice it to attack us, then we have a chance to destroy its claws.

Name: Liv
Text: It's not working. Our attacks hardly deal any damage to it.

Name: Lucia
Text: Watch out, it isn't finished yet.

Name: Liv
Text: This train is...?

Name: Lee
Text: Focus. The enemies aren't finished yet.

Name: Liv
Text: Punishing concentration continues to surge... It's corrupting the new train!

Name: Lucia
Text: Liv, bring sufficient serum. We'll go after it.

Name: Changyu
Text: Hey, you're not here to make the deal, are you?

Name: Lee
Text: What are you talking about?

Name: Changyu
Text: If it stops here, Lord Jamilah's plan will be disrupted. It's time to act, Sophia!

Name: Sophia
Text: ...Understood. Then push it to the front.

Name: Lee
Text: Who are these...?

Name: Lee
Text: The sandstorm has disrupted our visual system and the number of Corrupted is increasing. They will hinder our pursuit.

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant, I propose that we adjust the operation, passing through inside the train to intercept our target.

Name: Liv
Text: Glass cupola...

Name: Lee
Text: Perhaps we can go inside the train through the cupola.

Name: Lucia
Text: At this rate, the train will enter the area ravaged by sandstorm... We'll be forced to abandon the pursuit.

Name: Lucia
Text: But if we don't deal with it right now, this train will be the next victim...

Name: Liv
Text: Those mechanoids are... attacking each other?

Name: Lee
Text: The signals show that they are the machines used for train maintenance.

Name: Lee
Text: ...It seems that the uncorrupted mechanoids are defending against the corrupted ones.

Name: Sophia
Text: I'll help.

Name: Lee
Text: You're here too, Sophia.

Name: Sophia
Text: In order to evacuate the people, we have to intercept the Heterozygote formed by core mutation.

Name: Liv
Text: This way!

Name: Commoner
Text: That is the aristocrats' carriage. If we enter without permission...

Name: Sophia
Text: Commoners and aristocrats, aren't we humans at the end of the day? Come this way if you want to live!

Name: Commoner
Text: Okay, I got it!

Name: Lee
Text: We're safe now.

Name: Liv
Text: That's great...

Name: Lucia
Text: We'd better leave once we've planned our next step.

Name: System
Text: (Akdilek Record)

Name: System
Text: This train is refitted with the Central Purification Filter designs of the City Series of 020, 030, and 050.

Name: System
Text: But the truth is, the filter is not capable of supporting the whole train.

Name: System
Text: Therefore, after the completion of all works, all carriages will be classified and, superior races will be separated from the inferior ones.

Name: System
Text: Like Babylonia, we will keep hope alive.

Name: Lucia
Text: Sophia, enemy signals come from there!

Name: Sophia
Text: There's a ladder ahead on the train roof.

Name: Lee
Text: If we'd been allowed to do our work earlier, none of this would've happened.

Name: Lee
Text: Message from the command center... Reinforcements?

Name: Liv
Text: Move now, Commandant.

Name: Lee
Text: Wait, something falling down!

Name: Sophia
Text: No more obstacles. I have to reach Changyu quickly.

Name: Lucia
Text: Let's go, Commandant!

Name: Lucia
Text: Is it... a letter?

Name: Construct
Text: My name... It no longer matters. I thought I could have gotten through this train and completed the mission.

Name: Construct
Text: But in the end, I was still a fool. I was classified as a pariah, a slave.

Name: Construct
Text: If we don't act... The Ascendants will...

Name: Construct
Text: I'm already drained... So...!

Name: Construct
Text: Please be careful of... a thing called "Lullaby".

Name: Lee
Text: The kid from Akdilek... seems to be severely wounded.

Name: Lucia
Text: ...Bring it on!

Name: Lucia
Text: We're able to close in on the enemies at this rate.

Name: Liv
Text: Wait, Lucia, Lee. The Heterozygote's reaction...

Name: Lucia
Text: Ugh!

Name: Liv
Text: Lucia! Lee!

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant, Lucia and Lee have fallen off the train!

Name: Liv
Text: If we get off the train now, those people might...

Name: Liv
Text: The radar doesn't lose Lucia and Lee's signals...

Name: Liv
Text: At this rate... Let's go back to the carriage first and wait for Lucia and Lee, Commandant.

Name: Corrupted
Text: Urgh—!

Name: Bianca
Text: My presence has been exposed...

Name: Bianca
Text: It's been a long time since I used this frame.

Name: Bianca
Text: Hope I can still handle it.

Name: Bianca
Text: The gate operating system has been damaged a bit.

Name: Bianca
Text: We can find the parts from the nearby remains to repair it...

Name: Bianca
Text: Only uncorrupted parts can be used to fix the gate.

Name: Bianca
Text: There are many Corrupted nearby. Any mistakes will alert them. Be careful.

Name: Bianca
Text: ...Still works.

Name: Bianca
Text: Everything seems to have remained the same.

Name: Bianca
Text: Then, I only have to wait on the second floor.

Name: Bianca
Text: Finally, the upper floor... Should be able to see the train soon.

Name: Bianca
Text: We need to move fast.

Name: Bianca
Text: It's Gronin Station notice...

Name: Bianca
Text: ...This station will cease operations once the construction of Gestalt's new circuit network is completed.

Name: Bianca
Text: All gates will be closed from today onwards, and the staff will be transported out of this place once their IDs are deleted.

Name: Bianca
Text: But those track maintenance machines, whether they are personal property or not, are not allowed to be taken away from this station.

Name: Bianca
Text: Afterward, (an unclear name) will take over the station.

Name: Bianca
Text: This is the Gestalt Order No. 202 approved by the World Government. Please keep calm and follow the order.

Name: Bianca
Text: The train will pass through here soon enough.

Name: Bianca
Text: But the gate has blocked the passage. We have to close it again as soon as possible.

Name: Bianca
Text: There are many Corrupted lurking around.

Name: Bianca
Text: We can't go forward if we don't deal with this.

Name: Bianca
Text: All cleared. And the next is...

Name: Lucia
Text: Bianca... Why are you here?

Name: Bianca
Text: Lucia? and that motorcycle...

Name: Lucia
Text: I found it ahead. I'm ready to go after it now.

Name: Bianca
Text: What's wrong?

Name: Lucia
Text: You're not going?

Name: Bianca
Text: (Sighs)

Name: Lucia
Text: Full speed ahead!

Name: Bianca
Text: Wait, slow down!

Name: Lucia
Text: The train runs too fast, but I can't lag behind anymore. Commandant needs me.

Name: Lucia
Text: Bianca, please shoot down the enemies in our way, otherwise we won't be able to approach the train.

Name: Bianca
Text: Target confirmed in the Hawkeye sight distance.

Name: Lucia
Text: That's good enough, Bianca. Let's jump on the train!

Name: Liv
Text: It's still moving forward. The train will stop running if the engine is corrupted, and the people will...

Name: Lucia
Text: The filter will go down if the train stops...

Name: Lee
Text: Which means arriving at the terminal earlier than expected?

Name: Sophia
Text: This isn't the train's terminal... Our train won't stop there!

Name: Liv
Text: This is—Watch out!

Name: Liv
