Text: It's just like in the space station. A faint energy activity still remains within that burnt frame!

Name: Lucia
Text: Same move again? But this time...

Name: Chrome
Text: The visual designs match with the style of "Kowloong". Could it be...

Name: Kamui
Text: That's our guy! Hey, stop running!

Name: Chrome
Text: Don't be reckless, Kamui!

Name: Kamui
Text: Leader!

Name: Chrome
Text: I'll take the lead. Watch my back!

Name: Chrome
Text: ...Tsk.

Name: Chrome
Text: It shouldn't have much energy left. Should still be nearby.

Name: Chrome
Text: The Corrupted are attracted by the commotion of combat...

Name: Chrome
Text: They even have more helpers...

Name: Chrome
Text: Were they already hidden nearby under camouflage?

Name: Chrome
Text: Gotcha!

Name: Kamui
Text: Leader, are you alright?!

Name: Chrome
Text: It ran away.

Name: Kamui
Text: Ran away?

Name: Chrome
Text: Don't worry. I've got its info recorded.

Name: Chrome
Text: No matter where it goes, we'll be able to track it.

Name: Commandant
Text: A connection is made to a virtual M.I.N.D. of one of the guards outside.

Name: Commandant
Text: The virtual M.I.N.D. of mechanoid is more akin to a simulation of reality.

Name: Commandant
Text: Perhaps the passcode to the cabin door can be found in its memory data.

Name: Ballwheel IV
Text: Thinking circuits... Abnormal...

Name: M.I.N.D. Data 004
Text: Area under attack... Intruders are... From... Side E...

Name: Commandant
Text: Lucia, Liv, Lee. Wait for me.

Name: M.I.N.D. Data 001
Text: Type IV... Rolling out. Type I, disobeyed orders, dismantled.

Name: M.I.N.D. Data 002
Text: Cutting, isn't, performing. Want, voice, device. Want, singing.

Name: M.I.N.D. Data 003
Text: Protect, the, goods. Why, not, a, performance mission?

Name: Mysterious Voice
Text: The traps have an attack interval. Maybe you can find an opportunity to go through.

Name: Mysterious Voice
Text: The virtual M.I.N.D. is still part of the M.I.N.D., so there may be some overflowing data.

Name: Mysterious Voice
Text: Once attacked, you'll need some time to regenerate.

Name: Mysterious Voice
Text: If you find a trap impossible to pass, try destroying it with attacks.

Name: Lee
Text: So this place isn't unguarded after all. Look at those performer-bots...

Name: Lucia
Text: They're coming for us.

Name: Lucia
Text: Seems like they don't want to disturb the people in the night market.

Name: Lee
Text: They may have been ordered to ensure the market is running normally.

Name: Lee
Text: They want to direct us away from the market. Great, exactly what we want.

Name: Liv
Text: No infection detected. They're just normal mechanoids...

Name: Commandant
Text: Don't damage their core modules. Do it cleanly, then we get off the ship.

Name: Lee
Text: Okay.

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant, please give your orders.

Name: All
Text: (Cheering)

Name: Lee
Text: The people thought we were putting on a show...

Name: Lucia
Text: Now that Commandant is back, let's get off the ship first.

Name: Lee
Text: ...They found us already. How fast.

Name: Lucia
Text: Let's run.

Name: Lee
Text: Now they're waiting ahead of us?

Name: Lucia
Text: We don't have time. We'll have to force through them...
At least let me finish!
Stop these people.

Name: Hanged Man
Text: —Item 01, please come on stage.

Name: Cheering
Text: YEEEAAAAHH—!

Name: Cheering
Text: Marvelous! This is so beautiful!

Name: Booing
Text: What a poser!

Name: Hanged Man
Text: O—Gorgeous lady—

Name: Hanged Man
Text: —Go to the surrounding stages—If you wish to win—

Name: Hanged Man
Text: Show us your strength—Good luck—

Name: Yazi
Text: I have underestimated your strength.

Name: Yazi
Text: Now, I shall conduct the final test on behalf of Leader.

Name: Chrome
Text: ...They are the puppets from the performance troupe.

Name: Chrome
Text: But there's probably more to them.

Name: Chrome
Text: Targets eliminated.

Name: Chrome
Text: Do help keep "Yazi" at bay when I get close to the stage...

Name: Chrome
Text: That person on the observation deck...

Name: Chrome
Text: As I expected, there are puppets with attack modules installed amongst the performing puppets.

Name: Yazi
Text: Do not get any closer.

Name: Yazi
Text: Master's wish will soon be realized.

Name: Yazi
Text: You're not going to interrupt...

Name: Liv
Text: Lucia, you can't move yet...

Name: Lucia
Text: I'm fine... Let me fight.

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant, please trust me.

Name: Qu
Text: Almost there.

Name: Qu
Text: Out of my way, Gray Raven!

Name: Qu
Text: If that's the case... I shall take control over this M.I.N.D.

Name: Qu
Text: Huaxu... Give me your power now!

Name: Chrome
Text: What are they talking about...?

Name: Chrome
Text: But right now I have something more important to do...

Name: Robotic Voice
Text: ...Please be seated... The following names...

Name: Robotic Voice
Text: Will be... activated... by the Kowloong Crew...

Name: Robotic Voice
Text: ...The trade fair shall commence once the goods are ready...

Name: Chrome
Text: What's going on...?

Name: Chrome
Text: The space is shifting...

Name: Construct Guard
Text: Support here yet...?

Name: Construct Leader
Text: Divide yourselves into two teams. One'll set up the defenses while the other engages the enemies!

Name: Construct Guard
Text: More Corrupted incoming!

Name: Construct Guard
Text: Just us, against that entire horde?!

Name: Construct Leader
Text: As long as we are together, there's nothing to fear. Hold your line!

Name: Bridget
Text: Yes... We have arrived at the defense point of the civilian district.

Name: Bridget
Text: The situation isn't looking good... The Corrupted have already... Dammit! (Hangs off)

Name: Bridget
Text: Hold your line! Watch the surroundings!

Name: Construct Leader
Text: Are you the Support Force...?

Name: Bridget
Text: Yes. I'm Bridget, one of the squad leaders of the SF. Sorry, didn't expect them to come so fast.

Name: Construct Leader
Text: I'm the leader of the vanguard squad E... Thanks for your assistance!

Name: Bridget
Text: Let's get through this together!

Name: Construct Leader
Text: Jitterbombs detected. Fire!

Name: Construct Leader
Text: Jitterbombs are coming at us. Use special bullets against them!

Name: Phecda
Text: All intruders must be exterminated.

Name: Bridget
Text: These bastards! They are attacking anyone that's not one of them!

Name: Construct Leader
Text: Your assistance is much appreciated! We managed to suffer only minimum losses.

Name: Construct Leader
Text: We can defend this place a bit longer after some rest.

Name: Bridget
Text: But don't push yourselves too hard.

Name: Construct Leader
Text: Your assistance is much appreciated! We suffered some losses, but we'll be fine.

Name: Construct Leader
Text: We can still fight.

Name: Bridget
Text: The Corrupted will keep coming.

Name: Bridget
Text: I'll get you more reinforcements ASAP.

Name: Construct Leader
Text: That will be great.

Name: Bridget
Text: I'll take the wounded away for now.

Name: Bridget
Text: No way... They have all died...

Name: Bridget
Text: I couldn't even save one of them...

Name: Reinforcement
Text: Boss, the other side's also...

Name: Bridget
Text: Try to retrieve as many frames as possible. There must be something we can do.

Name: Bridget
Text: Let's retreat for now!

Name: Reinforcement
Text: Roger!

Name: α
Text: Lucia, I thought you'd grow under that Commandant.

Name: Lucia
Text: I did.

Name: α
Text: ...But not enough, Lucia!

Name: Lee
Text: My shots aren't connecting with her... Wait, could she be?!

Name: Lucia
Text: Ugh...

Name: α
Text: You take on my face. You take on my blade. You take on my voice. Yet you still speak words I've long since left behind.

Name: α
Text: You had your chance.

Name: Liv
Text: Lucia!

Name: α
Text: Now die.

Name: Liv
Text: Incoming Corrupted detected! Wait, no, they're Heteromers!

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant, we have lots of Heteromers coming in!

Name: α
Text: Lamia's work? Sloppy as always...

Name: α
Text: I'll fall back for now...

Name: Liv
Text: The Heteromers are coming!

Name: Construct Leader
Text: We got this!

Name: Construct Guard
Text: Just focus on the enemies in front of you, folks.

Name: α
Text: Very well then. Both the Corrupted and the Constructs are gone.

Name: α
Text: Nothing stands in our way now.

Name: α
Text: Don't let me down again, Lucia.

Name: Forsaken Member
Text: ...Mr. Watanabe.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Stay vigilant. These Heteromer Cubes are all potential threats.

Name: Watanabe
Text: If I'm right, there must be quite a few Corrupted around here... linked to these cubes.

Name: Watanabe
Text: They must be the remains of that gravity core... They're adapting to Earth's environment.

Name: Lee
Text: What is this place?

Name: Liv
Text: How gorgeous and well-kept.

Name: Ayla
Text: Looks like we've come to a dead end... Shall we turn back?

Name: Lucia
Text: No, you face not a dead end.

Name: Lee
Text: Yazi... Why are you here?

Name: Lucia
Text: No, I am not Yazi.

Name: Liv
Text: What do you mean? Who are you then?

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: Going back will take your precious time. So if you are after the Ascendants—

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: Answer my questions, and you may pass. Of course, you are also welcome to break through with force.

Name: Ayla
Text: Um... Do you know her?

Name: Liv
Text: S-sort of...? (Dry laughter)

Name: Lee
Text: So she's controlling the passage here. Alright.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: Are you ready? Let's begin...

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: The first question is...

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: Here comes the second question...

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: And the third question is...

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: Light and shadow are one and the same. Where the light flourishes, the shadow also prospers.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: In the courtyard there is an abundance of light, in the shadows the answer hides.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: Show me the "Lightless Veranda" should you seek the truth.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: That is all. Do take your time.

Name: Ayla
Text: What does "lightless" mean...? It's so bright everywhere.

Name: Liv
Text: No. There is one place without light.

Name: Lee
Text: Commandant, please make your decision.

Name: Ayla
Text: Compared with the other verandas...

Name: Ayla
Text: This one isn't any different...

Name: Lee
Text: Not quite... Just look up...

Name: Ayla
Text: Oh...! I see...!

Name: Liv
Text: This is what differs this veranda from the others.

Name: Ayla
Text: I see... The light isn't on...

Name: Ayla
Text: Is that what "lightless" meant?

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: Wind flows through the void, traveling to and fro in the courtyard.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: But anchored is your answer, untouched it is by ebbs and flows.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: Should you desire the truth, locate the "Chamber of Windrest".

Name: Lee
Text: She said "windrest"... Hmm...

Name: Ayla
Text: Ah, I got it! The wind must stop somewhere!

Name: Ayla
Text: Commandant, we just have to find a place without wind.

Name: Ayla
Text: I can't put it into words, but...

Name: Ayla
Text: I have a feeling that this is the place.

Name: Liv
Text: Hmm... Looking up close, the wind here is a lot weaker.

Name: Liv
Text: See, the painting is barely moving.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: Causes criss-crosses with effect. That which touches this land not, therein your answer lies.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: You will find your answer in the "Pavilion of Difference".

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: That which exists here not shall lead you to the pavilion.

Name: Ayla
Text: Did she mention "difference"?

Name: Liv
Text: There are three shades of different machines. Looks like we need to find the correct answer from them...

Name: Lee
Text: One of them is different from the others. Commandant, it's very obvious, don't you think?

Name: Lee
Text: I knew it...

Name: Lee
Text: One of the illusions is different from the rest.

Name: Ayla
Text: Different? What do you mean...

Name: Liv
Text: This Heteromer unit is only seen in Asslam. It doesn't exist in this city.

Name: Liv
Text: That's the "difference" she was talking about.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: Very well. Would you like a compliment?

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: Defeat the "answer" to complete my challenge.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: Very well. Not many can spot the difference.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: Next, you only need to defeat the "answer".

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: A splendid display. I have underestimated you.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: Go. The "answer" is right ahead.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: A pity. You did not understand my message.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: My my. Are you uncultured, or purely daft?

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: Are you still lost? Yet truth is one and only.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: It's a shame. Though your determination does pique my interest.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: Very well... We shall consider this done.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: You have passed my first test.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: In front of you is the guardian of the courtyard.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: Defeat it to prove your strength.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: A less than satisfactory performance, but, you pass.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: Make your way through. Qu is at the top of the tower.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: How unexpected. Truly amazing. Should we have a chat, good people from Babylonia?

Name: Lee
Text: Who are you? I don't feel any hostility from you.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: I am hostile, though perhaps not as much as the others. I'm a member of the Kowloong Crew, after all.

Name: Liv
Text: Kowloong Crew... What's your relationship with those on the Nighter...?

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: They replicated our system. On the Nighter, they have nine members.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: But right here in Kowloong, we have nine crews.

Name: Ayla
Text: So... Nine special departments in the city?

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: You can say that. Plus, not all of us are involved in such reckless warfare.

Name: Lee
Text: So, not everyone's supporting Qu?

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: She's only a vessel of the will of the majority. And she knows that.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: Anyway, consider this a little nice gesture. I shall waste no more of your time.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: The door is now open. Qu is at the top of the tower. You can go ahead.

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: (First Gabriel, and now Gray Raven.)

Name: Yazi (?)
Text: (I'm afraid this planet isn't going your way, Qu.)

Name: α
Text: Automatons from Murmansk? Modded to withstand the virus?

Name: α
Text: I thought you'd bring something to wow me, but... Whatever.

Name: Rosetta
Text: All arctic machines, take on a defensive formation!

Name: α
Text: Hah, finally, something new...

Name: α
Text: Not coming by yourself? Heh. Guess I'll play with your little pets first.

Name: α
Text: Let's see how long your little toys can keep up.

Name: Rosetta
Text: Fierce as always... But you won't get past me!

Name: Luna
Text: Something isn't right here, sister.

Name: α
Text: ...Buying time, aren't you, Rosetta?

Name: Rosetta
Text: Took you long enough to figure that out.

Name: Rosetta
Text: I won't let you pass...!

Name: Kamui
Text: Come back here!

Name: Chrome
Text: What's happening? Kamui.

Name: Kamui
Text: A few weird mechanoids were carrying something and sneaking around. They ran off the second they saw me!

Name: Kamui
Text: Then I was intercepted by Musashi IX!

Name: Chrome
Text: Musashi IX...? Why is it here?

Name: Chrome
Text: I've never seen this mechanoid. No corruption signal detected... Kamui, what's your status?

Name: Kamui
Text: Tch, we lost sight of it!

Name: Chrome
Text: Kamui, send the image data of that strange mechanoid you met to me.

Name: Kamui
Text: You got it!

Name: Kamui
Text: What's that noise... I'll go check!

Name: Chrome
Text: Come back! I need to upload the image data to the system terminal for further analysis...

Name: Kamui
Text: There you are!

Name: Chrome
Text: Stay there and wait for me. Don't do anything rash.

Name: Kamui
Text: Leader! Leader! I'm here!

Name: Kamui
Text: Huh... This is...?

Name: Liv
Text: The connection seems to be going well...

Name: Lee
Text: Hope it stays that way...

Name: Lucia
Text: Wait, what's this...

Name: Lee
Text: Dammit, it's a defensive data tide!

Name: Lucia
Text: No matter what went through, we'll have to go through this if we want to find it.

Name: Lucia
Text: Phew... It's finally gone.

Name: Lee
Text: The signal trails back to the main elevator... We'll have to go back and keep searching...

Name: Bianca
Text: Luckily I've made it in time...

Name: Bianca
Text: If those Defense Programs activated the alarm, we'll be facing a lot more of them.

Name: Lucia
Text: Bianca! Why are you...

Name: Bianca
Text: It's a long story. I have my mission too.

Name: Bianca
Text: But now that we're heading the same way, let's stick together.

Name: Bianca
Text: There are some Defense Programs patrolling this area... Let's get rid of them before they raise the alarm.

Name: Lucia
Text: Are they trying to protect something?

Name: Bianca
Text: From their patrol pattern, I don't see anything worth our attention. Maybe we'll find some clues in this area.

Name: Lucia
Text: Let's search around then.

Name: Bianca
Text: No luck here. We'll have to...

Name: Lee
Text: Are you really "Bianca"?

Name: Liv
Text: This virtual space feels so real... Even the guide looks exactly like what we have in Babylonia.

Name: Liv
Text: Ah, look, Lucia! That's the shop I told you the other day!

Name: Lucia
Text: That boutique you mentioned? Let's go together after this mission.

Name: Lee
Text: Error: Illegal intrusion by external data entities detected.

Name: Lucia
Text: Is that us?

Name: Lee
Text: No. We came using Babylonia's link.

Name: Lee
Text: Could it be...?

Name: Lucia
Text: What?

Name: Lee
Text: Nothing. I don't have enough evidence yet.

Name: Lucia
Text: "Today's special: synthetic latte with hazelnut syrup—buy two get one free!"

Name: Liv
Text: A cafe...?

Name: Lee
Text: What's the point of investigating a place like this...

Name: Bianca
Text: Hmm? What's up?

Name: Bianca
Text: Leave the ground floor to me. You can search the upper one.

Name: Bianca
Text: Hmm? What's up?

Name: Lucia
Text: Is this a... security barrier?

Name: Lee
Text: Watch out! There's more from behind!

Name: Defense Program
Text: Threat detected in the area. Activating extermination mode.

Name: Lucia
Text: No!

Name: Bianca
Text: Move back!

Name: Liv
Text: What's this?!

Name: Lucia
Text: I got you.

Name: Bianca
Text: Target hostile. Engaging defense mode.

Name: Lee
Text: Dammit. She's hijacked the Defense Programs.

Name: Lucia
Text: We just have to get rid of them then.

Name: Lee
Text: ...She's even hijacked the security barrier module.

Name: Liv
Text: The port to deactivate it is on the other side... We can't do anything from here.

Name: Lucia
Text: ...We have to find another way.

Name: Defense Program
Text: More threats detected in the area. Activating extermination mode.

Name: Lee
Text: That "Bianca" has made too many bridging attempts. All Defense Programs in the region are now alerted.

Name: Lee
Text: We can't get away without fighting.

Name: Defense Program
Text: More threats detected in the area. Activating extermination mode.

Name: Liv
Text: Her last signal... is just up ahead!

Name: Lee
Text: ...Guess we have to go through them.

Name: Lee
Text: A hidden channel, as I thought.

Name: Liv
Text: According to my scan, the destination of her bridging connection... is right there.

Name: Lee
Text: The billboards look a bit strange... Is that also a result of bridging?

Name: Liv
Text: Indeed. I can probably estimate her jump locations and routes using that.

Name: Guide
Text: In N.E. 2130, Dominik the Great Hero submitted a proposal as the Chief Technology Officer of the Science Council.

Name: Guide
Text: One after another, global organizations signed the "Earth Book" protocol and connected to "Gestalt", a public service system.

Name: Guide
Text: For the first time ever, humankind was able to unite completely under the most urgent global topic: space colonization.

Name: Lee
Text: Dominik...

Name: Liv
Text: Where would he be now...? Is he still alive?

Name: Lucia
Text: I don't know. He is still marked as "missing in action" in the database.

Name: Lucia
Text: There's a stone monument in front of the parliament. I feel like it carries many stories.

Name: Lee
Text: I read about it. It's the Monument of Unity.

Name: Lee
Text: The shattered pieces represent people separated by borders. They now rejoin one another to form a complete cube named "World"...

Name: Lee
Text: ...That's what the book said.

Name: Liv
Text: Lee really knows a lot.

Name: Lee
Text: ...The history books about the Golden Age were placed in a very obvious section in the library, that's all.

Name: Lucia
Text: The parliament building is huge... There are no undamaged buildings of this scale on the surface anymore.

Name: Liv
Text: If we can take back the Earth, there will be buildings like this.

Name: Liv
Text: I'm sure Karenina would love to build something bigger than it.

Name: Lucia
Text: ...Yeah.

Name: Lee
Text: The culprit is right behind this door...

Name: Huaxu
Text: Calculation result: A battle with you is inevitable.

Name: Huaxu
Text: You cannot interrupt Huaxu's plan.

Name: Huaxu
Text: Operation... disrupted... Unable to recover connection... with the root server...

Name: Huaxu
Text: R-r-r-reconnecting... F-f-failed...

Name: Lucia
Text: Too many Corrupted here. We can't avoid a fight if we want to set up the security terminal.

Name: Lucia
Text: We will make sure Lee is safe. I'll leave the rest to you.

Name: Lee
Text: I got this.

Name: Bridget
Text: I suggest installing a backup security terminal.

Name: Bridget
Text: Better safe than sorry.

Name: Lucia
Text: This is the last area to investigate.

Name: Liv
Text: Hope we can find a clue...

Name: Liv
Text: Something's wrong with this Corrupted.

Name: Lee
Text: Let's knock it out first!

Name: Murol
Text: The rest have been drawn off. We've just got this Riot left, right?

Name: Lucia
Text: Affirmative. Take down the Riot model before Hiro comes back, then sweep and clear all Corrupted elements.

Name: Xun
Text: Five-by-five! Let's go, Murol!

Name: Murol
Text: Go right, I'll go left!

Name: Xun
Text: Got it! What a naughty thing.

Name: Murol
Text: Hurry and finish it off, Lucia.

Name: Murol
Text: We can't move while holding it here. The enemy can easily target us!

Name: Former Commandant
Text: Lucia, strike the final blow.

Name: Lucia
Text: Understood.

Name: Murol
Text: Hold up, how is this thing still moving?!

Name: Xun
Text: Must be the Punishing Virus.

Name: Xun
Text: Records indicate that the virus has rewritten and repaired its hosts before.

Name: Lucia
Text: Which also means that our attacks are working. Keep up the good work.

Name: Lucia
Text: ...I'll send you to your end!

Name: Lucia
Text: Who's there?! Murol! Xun!!

Name: Xun
Text: My Inver-Device... Dammit, Riot is going to... break free...

Name: Murol
Text: Be careful... facing Riot alone...

Name: Lucia
Text: I see... All I remembered was the electronic shackle on Riot had somehow disappeared.

Name: Lucia
Text: I didn't know I was the only one left.

Name: Lucia
Text: But that's okay. I will take on it by myself, just like what I did last time!

Name: Liv
Text: No, Lucia. You have us now!

Name: Lee
Text: Can't maximize the efficiency if you fight alone while there are teammates around.

Name: Lucia
Text: Thank you...

Name: Lucia
Text: I don't have to fight alone anymore.

Name: Lucia
Text: Nothing can break Gray Raven apart!

Name: Kamui
Text: They said it requires more investigation, but will the Red Tide really be in such places?

Name: Kamui
Text: At any rate, there are only scorched earth and ashes left.

Name: Wanshi
Text: But it is true that high concentrations of Punishing Virus can be detected occasionally.

Name: Wanshi
Text: I'll set up the detection device while you go and check the situation below.

Name: Wanshi
Text: Let me know if you find anything.

Name: Kamui
Text: Isn't this the core strike zone of the Longinus Arsenal?

Name: Kamui
Text: Why are there Hetero-Creatures here?!

Name: Wanshi
Text: It seems that the previous detection was not a false positive.

Name: Wanshi
Text: There are some things hidden nearby.

Name: Kamui
Text: These Hetero-Creatures are frailer than before.

Name: Wanshi
Text: Ah, so you've taken care of them as well...

Name: Wanshi
Text: The same is true for upper floor. Some Hetero-Creatures here and there, but it's easily taken are of.

Name: Wanshi
Text: I guess it may be because the Red Tide is declining.

Name: Wanshi
Text: High levels of Punishing Virus can also be detected in the boxes nearby.

Name: Wanshi
Text: Although it may be residue, just to be safe...

Name: Kamui
Text: Let's break them all open and check!

Name: Wanshi
Text: Yes, that's right.

Name: Kamui
Text: Wanna bet and see who finds more hidden Hetero-Creatures?

Name: Wanshi
Text: Why would I do something like that…

Name: Wanshi
Text: But I'll come to your aid if you're in trouble.

Name: Kamui
Text: Deal!

Name: Kamui
Text: Wait, that sounded from above.

Name: Kamui
Text: Is there a new batch Hetero-Creatures?

Name: Kamui
Text: Let's go check it out!

Name: Kamui
Text: Ugh, there's more!

Name: Wanshi
Text: They don't seem to have been lurking here all the time.

Name: Wanshi
Text: Maybe they came from somewhere else?

Name: Kamui
Text: Not too many enemies left, let's get it over with.

Name: Kamui
Text: What are these?!

Name: Wanshi
Text: A new variety.

Name: Wanshi
Text: There's not a lot of them. Maybe they got separated or only they survived?

Name: Kamui
Text: This area has been cleared.

Name: Wanshi
Text: Well, the Punishing concentration was also detected to be abnormal.

Name: Kamui
Text: OK, let's call Capt over.

Name: Kamui
Text: This area has been cleared.

Name: Kamui
Text: Wanshi, how's it going over there?

Name: Kamui
Text: Hmm? Are you still dealing with those detection device?

Name: Kamui
Text: Let's go and check on him!

Name: Kamui
Text: Wanshi! I did it!

Name: Wanshi
Text: I see. I'll come over to help.

Name: Kamui
Text: All the boxes are checked!

Name: Wanshi
Text: There's not too many, you can handle it yourself.

Name: Wanshi
Text: I'll continue to install the detection device, so I'll leave the guarding to you.

Name: Kamui
Text: Mission cleared! Looks like we finished at the same time!

Name: Wanshi
Text: The Hetero-Creatures haven't given up attacking yet, let's move together.

Name: Wanshi
Text: I knew there were still some here.

Name: Wanshi
Text: Looks like I was right.

Name: Wanshi
Text: It's weak, and the Longinus Arsenal did a toll on it.

Name: Wanshi
Text: These Hetero-Creatures have mastered many skills only seen in animals and insects, such as hiding.

Name: Wanshi
Text: Only residue left here.

Name: Wanshi
Text: Punishing concentration also has the possibility of false positives.

Name: Wanshi
Text: No news is good news.

Name: Wanshi
Text: ...There's nothing inside.

Name: Kamui
Text: There really are Hetero-Creatures hiding here!

Name: Kamui
Text: What exactly did you do to avoid the Longinus Arsenal?

Name: Kamui
Text: I found another one!

Name: Kamui
Text: Did you just come out and hide here?

Name: Kamui
Text: Nothing!

Name: Kamui
Text: Is it a good news that no Hetero-Creatures have been found?

Name: Kamui
Text: How's everything going over there, Wanshi?

Name: Camu
Text: I just came up from below.

Name: Camu
Text: The Red Tide over there is not enough to flood the whole underground waterway.

Name: Camu
Text: But you don't need so many Red Tides to kill Constructs.

Name: Camu
Text: Get out of here. Even if it isn't flooded, the concentration of Punishing here is high enough to make us Corrupted.

Name: Chrome
Text: There are intercepted Hetero-Creatures everywhere.

Name: Camu
Text: Fall back while fighting.

Name: Camu
Text: You are... not only injured, but also Corrupted.

Name: Camu
Text: I wish Wanshi were here.

Name: Camu
Text: Damn, there's not even time for repairs.

Name: Chrome
Text: The concentration of Punishing is still rising.

Name: Camu
Text: You better stay away from me, too, or you'll get worse.

Name: Camu
Text: There you go again.

Name: Chrome
Text: Looks like a switch connecting the gate.

Name: Camu
Text: If the Red Tide wants to pass, this kind of thing can't stop it.

Name: Chrome
Text: It is enough to buy us some time.

Name: Chrome
Text: The concentration of Punishing behind us is very high, so there's no need to turn back.

Name: Camu
Text: Tsk... I thought you were so severely Corrupted that you couldn't tell the direction.

Name: Chrome
Text: It looks like a passage behind the door, but it's locked.

Name: Camu
Text: Nothing a bit of violence can't solve.

Name: Chrome
Text: No, this place has been in disrepair for a long time, and damage may cause it to collapse.

Name: Chrome
Text: But this lock is very old, and it can be opened if we have the key.

Name: Camu
Text: Well, let's look for it then.

Name: Chrome
Text: The door opened.

Name: Camu
Text: Looks like a shortcut.

Name: Chrome
Text: I got the key, it should open the door from earlier.

Name: Chrome
Text: We're very close to the upper floor.

Name: Chrome
Text: The Red Tide is about to flood here.

Name: Chrome
Text: Hurry up, go up the ladder to the upper floor.

Name: Camu
Text: No, you go first.

Name: Camu
Text: Don't you hear that? A mass of Hetero-Creatures are coming.

Name: Camu
Text: One of us should be left behind to take care of it.

Name: Camu
Text: If these get through, none of us will be able to get out.

Name: Chrome
Text: Camu...

Name: Chrome
Text: Take care, meet us soon!

Name: Chrome
Text: This valve seems to be used to divert water channels. What should I do?

Name: Chrome
Text: It seems to be a locked door to a shortcut. What should I do?

Name: Chrome
Text: I found a dusty key, what should I do?

Name: Chrome
Text: The equipment over there seems to be used to divert the waterway. What should I do?

Name: Vera
Text: Blocking the red tide, while looking for her. That's what we are here to do.

Name: Noctis
Text: It seems you are the closest to the control room!

Name: Noctis
Text: If you want a clue, knock on the old console over there.

Name: No. 21
Text: I think we should deal with the Red Tide first.

Name: No. 21
Text: But when the valve is blocked, these Hetero-Creatures will get mad.

Name: Vera
Text: The valve is right here. Get rid of it first.

Name: Vera
Text: The Red Tide leaked? Did they come from other unblocked places?

Name: Vera
Text: Although the current Inver-Device has been enhanced, it is still fatal to be drenched by it.

Name: Vera
Text: I need something to stop it.

Name: Vera
Text: Let's pass like this first.

Name: Vera
Text: But... what's the sound?

Name: Vera
Text: It's nothing new.

Name: No. 21
Text: Some Hetero-Creatures are heading toward you.

Name: Vera
Text: How troublesome.

Name: No. 21
Text: ...Hello, hello, are you still alive?
Aahhhhh!

Name: Vera
Text: What's going on?

Name: No. 21
Text: I found a Construct entangled by Hetero-Creatures.

Name: No. 21
Text: It's alive.

Name: Vera
Text: Well, they're safe now so just leave them there.

Name: Vera
Text: It's not that we can't manage, but we have to go to the control room first.

Name: Vera
Text: I'm here.

Name: Noctis
Text: I hope you can find clues on that rusty machine, bless you!

Name: Vera
Text: Shut up.

Name: Vera
Text: ...Endless troubles.

Name: No. 21
Text: I'm trying to seal off the Red Tide leaks and install the Polyfurnace.

Name: Vera
Text: OK, I'll go back and screw on those valves.

Name: No. 21
Text: The flow rate is reduced, Capt. Go on next valve.

Name: Vera
Text: It seems that there is no information here except trouble.

Name: Vera
Text: What's going on at your side?

Name: Noctis
Text: Not much different! Let's check once more and then go back. I don't want to be swallowed up by trouble.

Name: Vera
Text: There are more floors here. You can't leave until all of them are carefully checked.

Name: Noctis
Text: Huh? Why?!

Name: Vera
Text: What about No. 21?

Name: No. 21
Text: I'm still trying to seal off the Red Tide leaks and install the Polyfurnace.

Name: Vera
Text: Finish our original tasks and then meet at the exit.

Name: Vera
Text: The valve in the piston area can be opened first. What should I do?

Name: System Voice
Text: All communication to Kamui and Wanshi of Strike Hawk have been disconnected.

Name: System Voice
Text: All connections to the Gray Raven Commandant have been disconnected.

Name: Chrome
Text: ...Sign of the deviation... of M.I.N.D...

Name: Chrome
Text: ...Need to... return...

Name: Chrome
Text: No, those three fighting the Agent require Commandant's help more than I do, not to mention that...

Name: Chrome
Text: ...I must hold on for now.

Name: Chrome
Text: I can control...

Name: Chrome
Text: ...They... are still waiting for me.

Name: Hetero-Hive Mother
Text: ... Hush now, little baby...

Name: Chrome
Text: Is it singing?

Name: Hetero-Hive Mother
Text: ...Kana... My Kana...

Name: Hetero-Hive Mother
Text: Mom will always, always love you...

Name: Chrome
Text: What was that...

Name: Cinderelik
Text: ... Don't hurt my mom...

Name: Chrome
Text: Is she really your mother?

Name: Cinderelik
Text: Yes... She has my mom's human data.

Name: Cinderelik
Text: Although the data are incomplete...

Name: Chrome
Text: Human Data? I remembered it's a tech in Golden Age.

Name: Cinderelik
Text: Yes, it's an AI generated from one's data.

Name: Cinderelik
Text: People use it to... remember the dead.

Name: Chrome
Text: What's your purpose? Do you believe this will bring her back to life?

Name: Chrome
Text: Even if you "made" it, it is not your original mother.

Name: Cinderelik
Text: But that's enough.

Name: Cinderelik
Text: I have been... looking for her...

Name: Chrome
Text: What you are looking for is just a collection of the concept of "Mother".

Name: Cinderelik
Text: But that's enough... Please... Don't take her away...

Name: Chrome
Text: ...I'm sorry.

Name: Chrome
Text: I also have a position that I must protect.

Name: Vera
Text: Get out of my way!

Name: Vera
Text: We're almost at the top, come on!

Name: Sophia
Text: We are not far from Gray Raven.

Name: Sophia
Text: Protect the supplies.

Name: Escort Team Constructs
Text: Understood.

Name: Changyu
Text: Hey, I'm back. There are Corrupted and Hetero-Creatures ahead.

Name: Changyu
Text: Like what Lucia and the others said, there will be a tough fight ahead.

Name: Sophia
Text: They are here.

Name: Changyu
Text: Tsk. Can't believe they made it here so fast.

Name: Sophia
Text: Prepare for battle!

Name: Changyu
Text: Sophia, like what we agreed upon, please provide us support.

Name: Sophia
Text: Got it.

Name: Changyu
Text: Are you still able to fight, Sophia?

Name: Sophia
Text: I'm still okay to provide some support, but you are severely damaged.

Name: Changyu
Text: Doesn't matter. We have you, don't we?

Name: Changyu
Text: According to the plan, the next escort team members should be here.

Name: New Escort Team Members
Text: Officers.

Name: Changyu
Text: I'm tired of this! Sophia, I'm counting on your support.

Name: Sophia
Text: No!

Name: Changyu
Text: Hey! Are you alright, Sophia?

Name: Sophia
Text: I'm alright. Thank you.

Name: Changyu
Text: Tsk. What on earth are Lucia and the others fighting?

Name: Changyu
Text: We have to support them.

Name: Changyu
Text: So that is the so-called "boss"?

Name: Sophia
Text: Looks like something from the church.

Name: Sophia
Text: It seems the Corrupted reaction has completely disappeared.

Name: Changyu
Text: Time to contact...

Name: Sophia
Text: Changyu!

Name: Chrome
Text: Sophia? Changyu! Finally got through.

Name: Changyu
Text: I've got a big guy here. Would you lend me a hand?

Name: Chrome
Text: I'll be right there.

Name: System
Text: (Communication is down)

Name: Chrome
Text: They will be in great danger if they get surrounded by the Corrupted. There's not much time left.

Name: Chrome
Text: Okay. The coordinates of their last communication are here... Hope I can still make it!

Name: Chrome
Text: That's...!

Name: Sophia
Text: Changyu!

Name: Sophia
Text: I won't let you hurt my comrade again.

Name: Sophia
Text: You've been the one who fights the enemies.

Name: Sophia
Text: Now it's your turn to have some rest.

Name: Chrome
Text: Sophia! Changyu!

Name: Chrome
Text: I'll take care of the enemies. Sophia, take Changyu to somewhere safe.

Name: Sophia
Text: Roger!

Name: Chrome
Text: Sophia, how is Changyu doing?

Name: Sophia
Text: He has been severely infected. I'm treating it for him.

Name: Chrome
Text: We have to move.

Name: Chrome
Text: There are Corrupted coming over from the upper level.

Name: Chrome
Text: Find a way to meet with the escort team at the entrance.

Name: Sophia
Text: Yeah, let's go.

Name: Sophia
Text: The escort team got disconnected. They are under grave attack.

Name: Chrome
Text: Do they need our support?

Name: Sophia
Text: According to the last report... It's too late.

Name: Changyu
Text: Huh... Lucia already warned us about this...

Name: Changyu
Text: But we still underestimated our enemies...

Name: Chrome
Text: Let's treat Changyu here.

Name: Chrome
Text: I'll protect you.

Name: Sophia
Text: This is not the perfect setting, but let's fix you here, Changyu.

Name: Chrome
Text: Alright. Let's meet up with Lee and Lucia.

Name: Chrome
Text: They are still defending against the enemies from the other side.

Name: Changyu
Text: Let's go... Hm? Wait!

Name: Sophia
Text: Aahhhhh!

Name: Chrome
Text: Hm? What's going on?

Name: Chrome
Text: Roger. Heading to Changyu and Sophia.

Name: Chrome
Text: I'll leave the area behind the church to you guys.

Name: Chrome
Text: Okay. I'll meet up with them and come back.

Name: Chrome
Text: Talk to you later.

Name: Lucia
Text: Chrome is heading over there.

Name: Lee
Text: Okay. Let's set up defense devices here.

Name: Lee
Text: Otherwise, there will be more enemies.

Name: Lee
Text: Watch out!

Name: Lee
Text: Lucia! Get away from there!

Name: Lee
Text: There are still monsters coming over.

Name: Lucia
Text: Find a chance to meet up with Chrome and the others.

Name: Lee
Text: There are many coming from the top of the clock tower on the church.

Name: Lee
Text: It would be worse if we can't set up the defense devices.

Name: Lucia
Text: The situation is under control.

Name: Lee
Text: Go meet Chrome.

Name: Lucia
Text: Okay. Let's finish the enemies on the path!
Kamui... Wanshi... Camu... Father... And...

Name: Lee
Text: Chrome?

Name: Lucia
Text: What's going on over there?

Name: Lee
Text: Tsk. Silence.

Name: Lucia
Text: We have to meet him ASAP!

Name: Lee
Text: Wait, the defense devices ahead were broken. We have to repair them, otherwise we will be surrounded by the enemies.

Name: Lucia
Text: I'll fight the enemies for Lee to fix the devices.

Name: Lucia
Text: Is it done?

Name: Lee
Text: Yes. But the enemies are moving too fast.

Name: Lee
Text: We need someone to look after these devices.

Name: Lee
Text: Go meet up with Chrome. I'll stay here.

Name: Lucia
Text: Are you sure you can handle it yourself?

Name: Lee
Text: If we lose this area...

Name: Lee
Text: We'll be exposed to the enemies' attacks with no defense.

Name: Lee
Text: I'll leave the rest to you.

Name: Lucia
Text: Got it. We're all going to survive this.

Name: Lucia
Text: The enemies are slowing down.

Name: Lucia
Text: Still not done yet?

Name: Lee
Text: No. The enemies are moving too fast.

Name: Lee
Text: We need someone to look after these devices.

Name: Lee
Text: Go meet up with Chrome. I'll stay here.

Name: Lucia
Text: Are you sure you can handle it yourself?

Name: Lee
Text: If we lose this area...

Name: Lee
Text: We'll be exposed to the enemies' attacks with no defense.

Name: Lee
Text: I'll leave the rest to you.

Name: Lucia
Text: Got it. We're all going to survive this.

Name: Lucia
Text: I will not give up even it this is the last wail of the Gray Raven!

Name: Lucia
Text: We are surrounded again...

Name: Lucia
Text: Our comrades are not far from us.

Name: Lucia
Text: ...We have to make it until we meet up with them!

Name: Lucia
Text: I won't stop fighting even if the evernight devours me...!

Name: Lucia
Text: No matter how many enemies are there...

Name: Lucia
Text: No matter how many times I fall...

Name: Lucia
Text: No matter how desperate the situation is...

Text: According to the existing log query, there are eyewitness accounts.

Name: Memo Fragment 1
Text: (I often had to go over the mountains when I served in the outpost. <color=#ff7f00>The twin brothers</color> were always there with me.)

Name: Memo Fragment 2
Text: (Even now, I still keep them next to my <color=#ff7f00>sleeping cabin</color>. They are the proof that I was once a soldier.)

Name: Memo Fragment 3
Text: (I bought a cookbook. Shouldn't be too hard to learn <color=#ff7f00>three dishes</color> in three months, right?)

Name: Memo Fragment 4
Text: (I should search the <color=#ff7f00>bookshelf</color> during work breaks. Maybe one day I'll become a chef like Merry...)

Name: Memo Fragment 5
Text: (My daughter and wife are going out today. I just remember that I have a <color=#ff7f00>family photo</color> here.)

Name: Memo Fragment 6
Text: (We took it 3 years ago on Mt. Morotori. I've been keeping it up above the <color=#ff7f00>balcony</color>. My daughter's smile can cure all my wounds.)

Name: Memo Fragment 7
Text: (Since I signed for the navigator test, I must study hard for it. I always have problem remembering the <color=#ff7f00>Big Four Principles</color> though.)

Name: Memo Fragment 8
Text: (Anyway, I'm ready. First, let me revise once every day using the <color=#ff7f00>hand-held terminal</color>.)

Name: Memo Fragment 9
Text: (Oreco is full of <color=#ff7f00>straight lines</color>. No way I'll lose to West on this!)

Name: Memo Fragment 10
Text: (Let me prove that the <color=#ff7f00>Dodge Van</color> will rule Oreco!)

Name: Rosetta
Text: While you were using the terminal, we scanned all the nearby objects that could be related.

Name: Rosetta
Text: I have marked some potential areas of concern.

Name: Rosetta
Text: Go to those places, and you may find clues that lead to the next step.

Name: Rosetta
Text: Commandant, it's up to you to decide.

Name: Rosetta
Text: The memo mentioned "twin brothers."

Name: Rosetta
Text: It must be pointing at the snow boots in the sleeping cabin.

Name: Rosetta
Text: The "three dishes" mentioned in the memo can be found in one of the books.

Name: Rosetta
Text: It's pointing at the bookshelf to the southeast of the lab.

Name: Rosetta
Text: The keyword is "family photo." If that photo is nearby, it should be fairly easy to find.

Name: Rosetta
Text: The tips are now displayed.

Name: Rosetta
Text: The "Big Four Principles" can be found in a hand-held terminal.

Name: Rosetta
Text: There are many terminals here, but the correct one has already been marked.

Name: Rosetta
Text: The memo mentioned "straight lines" and other similar terms. It should be related to vehicles.

Name: Rosetta
Text: This is probably it.

Name: Rosetta
Text: Based on the tip, this password is related to a card game called "five-card stud."

Name: Rosetta
Text: Try again. Be cautious.

Name: Rosetta
Text: Give it a try once you have enough passwords.

Name: Rosetta
Text: Hmm, this should work.

Name: Rosetta
Text: If my guess is right, this should unlock it.

Name: Rosetta
Text: Something is wrong with this password.

Name: Rosetta
Text: I reserve my opinion on this password combination.

Name: Diana
Text: This hole leads directly to the underground...

Name: Rosetta
Text: Let's just keep moving.

Name: Rosetta
Text: Commandant, there's something not far ahead.

Name: Diana
Text: It's the bionics! Brace yourself for battle!

Name: Bionic Machine
Text: ROAR!!!

Name: Diana
Text: It's a dead end...

Name: Rosetta
Text: Atiel isn't here either.

Name: Rosetta
Text: But she must have been here. Let's check the nearby terminals.

Name: Rosetta
Text: Maybe we can find a new way.

Name: Diana
Text: What even is going on with this place...

Name: Rosetta
Text: There's no point to overthink. Commandant, let's keep going.

Name: Rosetta
Text: Just follow the tip if you can't figure out the password.

Name: Tip
Text: You found an abandoned note.

Name: Tip
Text: Someone scribbled "Two pairs=2+2+1"

Name: Tip
Text: You found an abandoned note.

Name: Tip
Text: Someone scribbled "Three of a kind=3+1+1"

Name: Tip
Text: You found an abandoned note.

Name: Tip
Text: Someone scribbled "Full house=3+2"

Name: Tip
Text: You found an abandoned note.

Name: Tip
Text: Someone scribbled "Four of a kind=4+1"

Name: Tip
Text: You found an abandoned note.

Name: Tip
Text: Someone scribbled "Straight Flush=5"

Name: Rosetta
Text: Commandant, we are quite far down.

Name: Rosetta
Text: There are also more cyborgs...

Name: Rosetta
Text: Better take caution from now on.

Name: Rosetta
Text: I'll handle the combat, Commandant.

Name: Rosetta
Text: ...I knew there would be Corrupted.

Name: Rosetta
Text: This place is probably already...

Name: Rosetta
Text: Within this door... We should find Amberia.

Name: System
Text: Virtual avatar - Rosetta: M.I.N.D. contamination increasing.
The Punishing Virus... How terrifying.
But can it be more terrifying than my illness?
I'm Atiel. Nice to meet you!
I promise I will work hard. So don't leave me alone, please!
It's all because of the ARU.
If only they didn't exist...
I can't open my eyes or speak to others, but I can hear them.
Can we be cured?
I tried so hard, but it still didn't work out.
Go away! I didn't want to leave you behind. I think of you every day.
No!
Why is everyone so small? What happened to me?
I can't feel my body anymore.
What am I... I'm a... weapon? No, NO!

Name: Rosetta (?)
Text: This voice... Derek?!

Name: Rosetta (?)
Text: Where am I going... Ah, right... I must fight.

Name: Rosetta (?)
Text: This feeling... And I can see you right next to me.

Name: Rosetta (?)
Text: I see. The real me must be fighting outside.

Name: Rosetta (?)
Text: Well, I shall step aside then. Let us bring victory home.

Name: Rosetta (?)
Text: Commandant.

Name: Amberia (Atiel)
Text: ...I will destroy you two. I will live on.

Name: Rosetta
Text: Atiel...

Name: Rosetta
Text: The pipes are compressing the energy and pumping it to Amberia!

Name: Rosetta
Text: Commandant, let's destroy the energy tanks first!

Name: Bionic Machine
Text: ROAR!!!

Name: Rosetta
Text: This warehouse not only stores energy, but also bionics...

Name: Rosetta
Text: Ngh... She's awake...?

Name: Amberia (Atiel)
Text: Wait, no... I am Ati... Amberia...!

Name: Amberia (Atiel)
Text: AAAAAAAAARGH!

Name: Rosetta
Text: What's this...?

Name: Amberia (Atiel)
Text: It matters not if the integration halts!

Name: Amberia (Atiel)
Text: I'll destroy the ARU. I'll get to live!

Name: Rosetta
Text: ...Commandant and I shall end this nightmare of the ARU.

Name: Rosetta
Text: (Is it impossible to put an end to this long-lasting hatred...?)

Name: Rosetta
Text: (But I believe in you...)

Name: Rosetta
Text: (I'll have to do my part too...)

Name: Researcher
Text: Commander Nikola, you really think it's a good idea to deploy so many enemies so quickly?

Name: Nikola
Text: I didn't go to all this trouble just to get a normal Construct.

Name: Nikola
Text: Rosetta, now you should understand why Babylonia agreed to send help.

Name: Rosetta
Text: Yeah, I do.

Name: Researcher
Text: Simulation over... The result is better than expected.

Name: Rosetta
Text: Then I have nothing to worry about. Time to prepare for my journey home.

Name: Challenge 1
Text: Solve the puzzle to move the prism laser together

Name: Challenge 2
Text: Boss fight: Defeat α

Name: Challenge 3
Text: Choose whether to become the leader of Gray Raven or not. Left: Yes; Right: No

Name: Challenge 4
Text: Defeat the incoming monsters

Name: Challenge 5
Text: Avoid the monster's search and get the doll

Name: Intro
Text: Interact with the NPC to start a challenge, then defeat the Boss (entering from Watanabe) to complete it.

Name: Intro
Text: You can get Memory Keys from other NPC challenges, which can be used to open the chest near the spawn point.
Musashi IX is disintegrating!
[The King's Diary #49]
I was attacked by some strange mechanoids while clearing the roof.
I would so like to complain to Cosmos Industries, if only the network is working.
Anyway, better bring a gun when cleaning the cabin in future.
[The King's Diary #1369]
Over a year passed, but I couldn't contact any coast guards at all. Instead, I received an auto-play evacuation warning from the World Government.
It was talking about some "Punishing Virus"? Well, those greedy bastards deserved it.
I'm not going anywhere. Better off playing my games. There's enough food to last me for another life.
[The King's Diary #23]
I don't know what happened... But the guys from the World Government seemed to be gone.
Hmph! Lucky I left some secret doors when building this.
Now I'll shut all the exits. You're never coming in again!
[The King's Diary #641]
I got bored with all the computer games, so I put on a diving suit to check out the optical cable.
The cable looked fine. It must be the server then.
Let me try to start the shortwave radio in the broadcast room. Maybe I can get the coast guards here.
My computer died today when I was playing games. No matter how many times I smashed it, it just wouldn't start.
I lost count of the days. When I got up, I almost forgot I had legs.
I wonder how things are going on the shore? Who knows how many more days I can last?
[ThE k1nG's Di4rY  #*Y&G(&B]
I saw Father at the jetty today, but he had long gone...
Whatever. Can't be helped.
Let me finish the food, then I'll grab a gun to check things out. Damn, this one's rotten. And this one too.

Name: Polar Soldier
Text: A jump to the sky turns into a polar impact!

Name: Lucia
Text: Has my power satisfied you?

Name: Kamui
Text: Ahah, I feel the power pouring in!

Name: Yazi
Text: How could this be...

Name: Lucia
Text: Now isn't the time to be emotional. Let's leave!

Name: Lucia
Text: Our enemies are Construct squadrons. Don't lose your focus!

Name: Kamui
Text: More of them are coming up ahead!

Name: Chrome
Text: We can't let them surround us. Hurry!

Name: Lucia
Text: There's too many of them...

Name: Liv
Text: More enemies, above!

Name: Chrome
Text: Everyone, watch yourselves!

Name: Chrome
Text: Wait... They've dropped their pursuit?

Name: Lee
Text: Whatever, let's just get out of here!

Name: Lucia
Text: We need to get to the meeting point!

Name: Lee
Text: That seems to be one of the entrances that the Corrupted used...

Name: Liv
Text: You're badly wounded... How do you feel?

Name: Construct
Text: No problem at all. I just need a break.

Name: Construct
Text: You keep going where you need to be.

Name: Construct
Text: Don't worry about me. You must go.

Name: Lucia
Text: What's this...?

Name: Lee
Text: Looks like some first-aid tool Kowloong left here. Might come in handy.

Name: Construct
Text: Um, that's...?

Name: Lucia
Text: We found it downstairs. Do you feel better now?

Name: Construct
Text: Saw through my little guise, huh... Thanks, Gray Ravens.

Name: Construct
Text: There are more enemies up ahead. Let me help you.

Name: Lee
Text: They're really putting on the heat.

Name: Lucia
Text: We must get there as soon as possible.

Name: Chrome
Text: Kamui, we have to save them!

Name: Kamui
Text: I know!

Name: Lamia
Text: I won't stop you from helping them. Hehe...

Name: Lamia
Text: How nice, Babylonian camaraderie.

Name: Kamui
Text: Damn you!

Name: Chrome
Text: Kamui, wait!!

Name: Lamia
Text: Catch me.

Name: Construct
Text: I can walk by myself... You should go after your teammates.

Name: Chrome
Text: This is...

Name: Chrome
Text: The level of Punishing Virus in this frame is already...

Name: Chrome
Text: We are too late...

Name: Construct
Text: Argh... Gargh!!!

Name: Lamia
Text: Oopsies... You took too long.

Name: Kamui
Text: Darn it!!!

Name: Chrome
Text: Wait, Kamui!

Name: Chrome
Text: Sorry... You will not be forgotten.

Name: Kamui
Text: I won't let you run away!

Name: Lamia
Text: ...Here, a freshly infected Prime model. All for you...

Name: Chrome
Text: Is that a guard of Kowloong?

Name: Kamui
Text: You're the only one left, Ascendant!

Name: Lamia
Text: Not quite. Your little friends are still with me.

Name: Kamui
Text: What!?

Name: Lamia
Text: I have quite the party of Babylonia Constructs here. Whether they live or die...

Name: Lamia
Text: Will depend on you...

Name: Construct
Text: Don't worry about us. Keep attacking!

Name: Kamui
Text: No way!

Name: Lamia
Text: What nice people you are... Turn yourselves over then, and they get to live. Don't worry... I keep my promises.

Name: Lamia
Text: After all, even Roland is giving you special attention... Hehe...

Name: Chrome
Text: Let's move the explosives there and detonate it. Kamui, I'll cover you.

Name: Kamui
Text: Alright. Let's get it all done before Lucia arrives!

Name: Kamui
Text: Wait, there are Corrupted coming!

Name: Chrome
Text: All Corrupted cleared. Let's get started, Kamui.

Name: Kamui
Text: Roger that, Capt.!

Name: Kamui
Text: Those must be the explosives the guards mentioned. I'll go...

Name: Chrome
Text: No, you stay here. I'll go get them.

Name: Kamui
Text: Okay, I'll go check out places to detonate it then!

Name: Chrome
Text: This should be enough. Did you find a good spot, Kamui?

Name: Kamui
Text: All good to go. I'll get the fireworks started!

Name: Chrome
Text: Then I'll take care of the Corrupted coming from behind.

Name: Chrome
Text: The explosives should have worked.

Name: Kamui
Text: ...No, it wasn't enough! The hole is too small!

Name: Chrome
Text: What!?

Name: Kamui
Text: Capt., where are the explosives?

Name: Chrome
Text: I found the authority key to this area. Looks like we can hack into the system and detonate the wall.

Name: Kamui
Text: Hehe, let's quickly finish off these Corrupted then. We can let the system handle the detonation!

Name: Diana
Text: Send all the machines!

Name: α
Text: ...I won't let you lay a finger on Luna.

Name: Diana
Text: We are being outnumbered...

Name: α
Text: Come on stage, princess.

Name: Diana
Text: If that's the case...

Name: Rosetta
Text: No. I'll be your dance partner.
Giant Spider is in great trauma
The desperate Giant Spider suddenly becomes frenzied

Name: World Government High-frequency Communication Record
Text: This is "Broken Blade" calling "Overlord". We have received a red message in the public high-frequency channel. Can you verify? I repeat, can you verify?

Name: World Government High-frequency Communication Record
Text: This is "Broken Blade" calling "Overlord". If we don't hear any reply within an hour...

Name: World Government High-frequency Communication Record
Text: We will engage emergency plan DX-339-1 and activate the plan, code name "Armageddon B".

Name: World Government High-frequency Communication Record
Text: ...If the HQ is already destroyed, God bless you. We will avenge you.
World Government Local Direct Communication Record
We lost the signal of the vanguard! What's going on!?
It's an EMP bomb! Wait, no...!

Name: World Government Local Surveillance Recording
Text: Hill completed the mission with flying colors.

Name: World Government Local Surveillance Recording
Text: He has proven himself worthy of receiving the "evolution".

Name: World Government Local Surveillance Recording
Text: —Identifying audio signal: completed—

Name: World Government Local Surveillance Recording
Text: The human voice has been confirmed. It's Enzo Mantano, code name "Loki". He's on the World Government's Level IV wanted list.
World Government Surface Council Meeting Record
Coulson! Why are you holding AC336 and AC337 orbit teams on the ground?

Name: Coulson
Text: Shut up! I can't let them take off unless you take back that "Ghost" over the Pacific!
That's a classified mission. I have nothing to report to you!

Name: Coulson
Text: Nonsense. My sources show the missiles fired at the launch field came from your "Ghost"!
World Government Surface Council Meeting Record
At this point, aborting Ghost's mission may lead to even worse consequences...

Name: Coulson
Text: Any other "Mister" unhappy with Project Acadia?
At this point in time, they won't be showing it on their faces.

Name: Coulson
Text: ...Either way, we can't afford any more mistakes.
Temporary Meeting Voice Recording

Name: Nikola
Text: ...I saw the report. If we continue the status quo with caution...

Name: Nikola
Text: <color=#ffda58>60%</color>? I need the list of confirmed supplies and personnel.

Name: Nikola
Text: Can Punishing Resistance cause so much damage on their own?

Name: Nikola
Text: I understand. Forward it to the council.

Name: Nozzle
Text: You think this is over? My backup is on the way. You're doomed.

Name: Nozzle
Text: Pah, too weak. I'll let the others take care of the rest.

Name: Nozzle
Text: How perceptive! You saw through everything. Alright, I'm backing off.

Name: Nozzle
Text: How could I... fail?! No matter. I've still got one last trick up my sleeve.

Name: Celica
Text: Commandant. The factory has been taken over by the Corrupted. We must fight them off.

Name: Celica
Text: HQ is hacking into the factory... and has gained clearance.

Name: Celica
Text: Commandant, HQ has requested the deployment of the special vehicle Polar Soldier. Please get an authorized ID card first.

Name: Corrupted
Text: Warning... Invasion detected.

Name: Celica
Text: Commandant, the Corrupted has set up four lines of defense. Break them!

Name: Celica
Text: Commandant, we've breached the first line of defense.

Name: Celica
Text: Polar Soldier setup complete. Deploying now...

Name: Roland
Text: Stay here. I'll deal with you later.

Name: Lucia
Text: What do you want?

Name: Roland
Text: Patience please. I'll close this off for now. Why don't you try and pass through the front gate first?

Name: Cathy 6337
Text: Cathy 6337. Open the front gate! Open the front gate!

Name: Cathy 6337
Text: Authorization... failed?

Name: Cathy 6337
Text: Eh? Cathy... Cathy... has no pass!

Name: Liv
Text: Pass?

Name: Cathy 6337
Text: Could have lost it... while being attacked by a rogue comrade.

Name: Cathy 6337
Text: Need to... find the pass. Scaling the front gate... is dangerous.

Name: Lee
Text: Then let's split up and start looking for the pass. The rest of you, go take care of the Corrupted brought by Roland.

Name: Lee
Text: Tch, Corrupted hiding in the rubble, huh?

Name: Lee
Text: Is this the pass...? Let's take it back and have that robot take a look.

Name: Cathy 6337
Text: Thank you! Thank you! Cathy 6337 will open the front gate... and let the guests through.

Name: Cathy 6337
Text: From the rubble... a rogue comrade jumped out... and attacked Cathy. Could have... dropped the pass there.

Name: Lee
Text: No sign of it on the rubble... If it has fallen through a crack, we'll have to <color=#FF0000>break up</color> the rubble before continuing our search.

Name: Lucia
Text: That building in the distance must be Venus Splash Park, right?

Name: Liv
Text: It's so quiet in here... I'm starting to understand why they chose this place.

Name: Lee
Text: ...Too quiet. Even the... Hold on, I hear fighting from the distance.
Abandoned... good-for-nothings! Useless... pieces of trash!

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant, the mechanoids... are fighting amongst themselves! Punishing infection detected in the attackers!

Name: Lee
Text: The robot lying on the ground looks different from the others... Let's have a closer look.

Name: Liv
Text: This robot shows no signs of infection even though it was attacked by the Corrupted...

Name: Liv
Text: Could still be activated if we replace the broken parts.

Name: Liv
Text: Perhaps we could make do with the parts from the Corrupted parts. Let's search around.

Name: Liv
Text: These look functional! But we need more. Gotta keep looking.

Name: Lee
Text: These should do. Let's try to fix up the broken mechanoid.
Beep... Beep...
Hello! Hello! I am Cathy 6337! The star employee of Venus Splash Park!

Name: Cathy 6337
Text: Yes... yes! Cathy 6337 offers services such as park tours, finding lost objects and persons, and so on.

Name: Cathy 6337
Text: Follow me... for a tour... of Venus Splash Park.

Name: Celica
Text: Commandant, use Polar Soldier's dash ability to break roadblocks.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>[Note]</color> The mission fails if Polar Soldier gets destroyed.

Name: Roland
Text: Hmm? Another naughty one trespasses in here?

Name: Roland
Text: Very well then, let the game begin—

Name: Roland
Text: Nice work. Let's move on to the next puzzle—

Name: Roland
Text: There's only one here, that stands out from the rest—

Name: Roland
Text: Aw, that's a shame.

Name: Roland
Text: You need to have your eyes checked.

Name: Roland
Text: Too bad. Still wrong. But I admire your persistence.

Name: Roland
Text: Keep walking. The final challenge lies ahead—

Name: Roland
Text: Well, that wasn't so hard, was it?

Name: Roland
Text: Keep walking. The final challenge lies ahead—

Name: Roland
Text: And finally, let me test your skills once more.
Beware the monster's backfire effect

Name: Forsaken A
Text: Deploy B19 defense formation.

Name: Forsaken B
Text: Roger.

Name: Watanabe
Text: NOW!

Name: Roland
Text: Let me see. Let's start by adjusting the passage.

Name: Roland
Text: Rats who have wandered into the cage should not be running around.

Name: Roland
Text: Okay. That should leave only one path for our rat.

Name: Mr. White
Text: Trespassers on the park must be dispelled!

Name: Roland
Text: Oh, almost forgot about you little guys.

Name: Roland
Text: Come and accept my modification.

Name: Roland
Text: Modification complete. And now...

Name: Roland
Text: The view should be nice over there. Come on, little rat. Don't make me wait too long.

Name: Roland
Text: The door is closed.

Name: Roland
Text: The entrance here is blocked.

Name: Camu
Text: Monster's HP is visible to players.

Name: Camu
Text: And most of the things that don't have HP are not destructible...?

Name: Camu
Text: There's so little you can do in this game.

Name: Zanzibaron
Text: I see you made it past my minions. Time to show you my true power!

Name: Vera
Text: Talking tough, huh?

Name: Karenina
Text: Final strike!

Name: Zanzibaron
Text: Ughhh!!!

Name: Villager
Text: Don't let the hero near the village. Attack!

Name: Lucia
Text: There's no other way. Fight!

Name: Villager
Text: Uh... Why stop fighting...?

Name: Lucia
Text: Because we have no beef with you. We're just passing by.

Name: Villager
Text: Really?

Name: Lee
Text: No point in us lying.

Name: Demon
Text: Hiiisss...!

Name: Villager
Text: What...? Where did the demons come from?!

Name: Lucia
Text: Get behind us!

Name: Lee
Text: It's not safe here... Lucia.

Name: Lucia
Text: Right. Since we're heading down this road anyway, why don't we escort you back?

Name: Villager
Text: Thank you...

Name: Villager
Text: The child is just up ahead. I'm counting on you, please!

Name: Kamui
Text: Okay, let's do this!

Name: Lee
Text: Target rescued. Are you alright?

Name: Child
Text: It hurt a lot, but I'm okay now... Oh, you're all wearing the same strange clothes as that person.

Name: Lee
Text: That person...?

Name: Child
Text: Yes, a lady. I approached her to take a closer look, only to get surrounded by demons.

Name: Lee
Text: That "lady" could be Liv.

Name: Lucia
Text: Do you know which way she went?

Name: Child
Text: This way.

Name: Lucia
Text: Okay, let's go find her!

Name: Villager
Text: Ugh... goddamn hero.

Name: Vera
Text: That's enough teaching for one day. Let's keep moving.

Name: King
Text: Guards, build me another defense line!

Name: Kamui
Text: The guards just keep coming like summoned beasts. What's worse, some of them don't have HP over their heads!

Name: Kamui
Text: Is there no way to defeat them...?

Name: Granton
Text: I am Granton the demon General. No one will take the treasure on my watch!

Name: Camu
Text: You done?

Name: Granton
Text: Uh...

Name: Kamui
Text: Demons ahead, everyone!

Name: Lucia
Text: Let's fight them off. We can't afford to be stopped here.

Name: Kamui
Text: Why do you keep staring at the teammate screen, Karenina?

Name: Karenina
Text: I'm not staring, you idiot!

Name: Kamui
Text: Hm?

Name: Lucia
Text: The road keeps forking. Which way do we take?

Name: Karenina
Text: How about we split up? Whoever finds the exit first contacts the others.

Name: Lucia
Text: No, let's go this way, Commandant. I think the exit is right ahead.

Name: Kamui
Text: On an irrelevant note, we're now a team of six counting Karenina!

Name: Karenina
Text: So you're saying I'm only here with you on a temporary basis!

Name: Lee
Text: Whatever. Let's just focus on the enemies!

Name: Kamui
Text: Commandant, enemies are popping up!

Name: Lee
Text: That's because you stepped on a trap!

Name: Kamui
Text: And so did Karenina!

Name: Karenina
Text: ...Leave me out of it.
Hero, come and fight!

Name: Golden Jegan
Text: Uh...

Name: Kamui
Text: Hmph, that's taken care of.

Name: Golden Jegan
Text: Damn it.
Help me! Quick!

Name: Liv
Text: Gotta get there quickly.
Saved at last...

Name: Liv
Text: Even if it's Camu I'm up against... I will not give in!

Name: Camu
Text: Hmph.

Name: Camu
Text: Medics, if you want to help, follow me.

Name: Liv
Text: What...?

Name: Camu
Text: The rest go and attack that demon king. I've got the saintess.

Name: Guard
Text: Understood!

Name: Liv
Text: Run, demon king!

Name: Lucia
Text: The demon king is being surrounded by the soldiers. Defeat the soldiers and save him.

Name: Lucia
Text: We saved the demon king.

Name: Demon King
Text: Every time I show up, I end up crying for help... I feel more like a princess than a demon king.

Name: Karenina
Text: Give me the treasure!

Name: Lucia
Text: Okay... I will cooperate.

Name: Karenina
Text: I don't need your cooperation!

Name: Kamui
Text: Commandant, Karenina ran into the enemy horde.

Name: King
Text: Good. Now is the time to catch the hero with the treasure.

Name: Kamui
Text: Karenina!

Name: Demon King
Text: Cut the crap and tell me what you know about the treasure.

Name: Lee
Text: Vera and Camu made the fake treasure... Only they would do something like that.

Name: Demon King
Text: But didn't they side with the king in order to win?

Name: Lee
Text: I don't know what happened exactly, but Karenina decided to play along.

Name: Lee
Text: She gave one treasure to the king and kept the other.

Name: Lee
Text: So it doesn't matter if the king got the fake treasure, because the real treasure has been collected in full at the city gate.

Name: Demon King
Text: Wow... That's...

Name: Lucia
Text: The plan may have worked, but the treasure is still somewhere inside the castle. We must get to it as quickly as we can.

Name: King
Text: Damn it... Don't think you can defeat me just because my HP becomes visible!

Name: Camu
Text: Didn't expect to anyway.

Name: Camu
Text: Medics, if you can still move, get to work and forge me the real treasure!

Name: Liv
Text: Yeah... Yeah!

Name: King
Text: What?!

Name: Liv
Text: The treasure is complete!

Name: Demon King
Text: The light... This is the real treasure. I'm sure of it!

Name: King
Text: Why is there a fifth treasure? Did you lie to me, heroes?

Name: King
Text: Let me show you the power of a furious king!

Name: King
Text: Is this... the end of my ambition...?

Name: Camu
Text: Disappear from my sight at once!

Name: Camu
Text: Vera, are you not joining me...?

Name: Vera
Text: You can handle it by yourself, right?

Name: Camu
Text: Hmph...

Name: Vera
Text: Lost?

Name: Lucia
Text: Camu, Vera, please join our team.

Name: Lucia
Text: ...Is this the final opponent?

Name: Demon King
Text: I believe you can defeat me, heroes.

Name: Demon King
Text: Uh... Good. It's over.

Name: Demon King
Text: Congratulations.

Name: Liv
Text: Gotta catch up to Camu...

Name: Lee
Text: Nowhere to go, but into the park.

Name: Lucia
Text: What's that wheel... in the distance?

Name: Liv
Text: A Ferris wheel, I think. I saw it in a magazine once.

Name: Lee
Text: Looks to me just like a ring-shaped elevator.

Name: Liv
Text: There are Roland's trails here. Headed that way...

Name: Lee
Text: A "hot-air balloon"?

Name: Lee
Text: What is such a primitive transport doing here?

Name: Liv
Text: They say Golden Age people like vintage things that let them live in the past.

Name: Lucia
Text: Roland might have used it.

Name: Chrome
Text: Kamui would be thrilled to see this gamer's paradise.

Name: Chrome
Text: Huh? Why do I have the feeling that someone just touched some of the consoles here?

Name: Chrome
Text: Player ID: NNM? 9,999,990 points? This game...

Name: Mr. White 7259
Text: Calm down, brothers. I will lead the charge.

Name: Mr. White 7259
Text: Geez!

Name: Martini 2442
Text: Hey, you over there.

Name: Martini 2442
Text: If you need my service, get me some wine from the bar.

Name: Martini 2442
Text: Martini... thirsty.

Name: Martini 2442
Text: Angry! Angry! Martini... angry!

Name: Martini 2442
Text: Come out! Assen! Howar! Jack!

Name: Martini 2442
Text: Good wine... Delicious.

Name: Martini 2442
Text: Martini... at... your service.

Name: Martini
Text: For the treasure of Venus Splash Park—

Name: Mr. White 21999
Text: For taking Caribbean as our own—

Name: Mr. White 14096
Text: We shall rise against those annoying superheroes—

Name: Martini
Text: Good guest! Your only way out of this is to defeat us fair and square!

Name: Lee
Text: Why is there a watermelon at the doorstep?

Name: Liv
Text: According to the database, that appears to be a park mascot that failed to make the cut.

Name: Lucia
Text: What is a "mascot"?

Name: Lee
Text: It might take a while to explain that to Lucia...

Name: Camu
Text: Tch... A fork in the road...

Name: Camu
Text: Tried to contact the others... but no response.

Name: Camu
Text: Looks like I'll have to go with my instincts.

Name: Camu
Text: The terminal in the middle seems to be flickering.

Name: Camu
Text: ...I'll go check it out.

Name: Camu
Text: What's this...?

Name: Camu
Text: A button, a switch, and a panel...

Name: Camu
Text: ...Found you.

Name: Camu
Text: What's that... in the middle?

Name: Camu
Text: It seems to lead somewhere.

Name: Camu
Text: Ugh! Damn it all to hell!

Name: Camu
Text: Guess I'll just have to find a way up and outta this place!

Name: Camu
Text: What's this...?

Name: Camu
Text: No idea what this thing's for, but I sure hope it stops this freaking alarm!

Name: System
Text: Activating power supply facilities in sequence...

Name: Camu
Text: ...Guess I'll just have to keep moving on!

Name: Noctis
Text: Anyhoo, I'll be pinning the target's possible locations on the radar. You just follow it.

Name: Noctis
Text: Radar's reading should be fine... I think? Well, just follow it!

Name: Vera
Text: Point me in the wrong direction, and you'll pay when the mission's over.

Name: Noctis
Text: Yeah, yeah, I gotcha! Just follow the radar!

Name: Camu
Text: ...I made it out.

Name: Cathy 6337
Text: A guest. A guest.

Name: Cathy 6337
Text: Please follow me, dear guest—

Name: Camu
Text: The coordinates they sent back suggest they're headed for the Ferris wheel.

Name: Camu
Text: Using that thing over there will be the quickest.

Name: Camu
Text: Signs of fighting everywhere...

Name: Camu
Text: Gotta hurry and meet up with them.

Name: Cathy 6337
Text: Ahhh! Baddie! Baddie!

Name: Rosetta
Text: This place is collapsing. Commandant, let's get out of here.

Name: Rosetta
Text: Pay attention to the falling icicles while you're moving...

Name: Rosetta
Text: The path ahead is going to collapse... Better get through before it completely falls!

Name: Rosetta
Text: A dead end...? No...

Name: Rosetta
Text: Commandant, that ice wall seems to be weaker than the others. Maybe you can ram it with your mech...

Name: Rosetta
Text: Nothing...? How?

Name: Rosetta
Text: The wall on the other side has come down... You must have triggered a secret exit.

Name: Rosetta
Text: No choice. Let's go.

Name: Rosetta
Text: Now! Jump, Commandant!

Name: Rosetta
Text: There's light ahead. We just have to get there!

Name: Rosetta
Text: Commandant!

Name: Rosetta
Text: This is a dead end. We have to go to the right.

Name: Rosetta
Text: I'll repair the Polar Soldier for you.

Name: Corrupted
Text: Urgh!!!

Name: Nanami
Text: They are all out!

Name: Martin
Text: Nanami, I'm here to help. Where did all these Corrupted come from?

Name: Nanami
Text: I don't know, but they must be hiding here for a while. Let's help the survivors first!

Name: Bionic Machine
Text: Thank you... But who are you...

Name: Nanami
Text: You must be exhausted... Take a good rest.

Name: Bionic Machine
Text: Why are there Corrupted in the base...

Name: Nanami
Text: You can think about that later. I have lifted the control on you. Hurry, run to the back.

Name: Bionic Machine
Text: Ah... Okay.

Name: Nanami
Text: You are no longer controlled.

Name: Bionic Machine
Text: Not controlled... What have you done!

Name: Nanami
Text: Huh?

Name: Martin
Text: Watch out, Nanami!

Name: Nanami
Text: I thought this place was free of Corrupted. Okay then, let's use our combo, Sleipnir!

Name: Martin
Text: ...Sleipnir? You aren't referring to me, aren't you?

Name: Corrupted
Text: Urgh!!!

Name: Nanami
Text: What are these machines...?

Name: Bionic Machine
Text: Damn those Corrupted... We'll help you!

Name: Martin
Text: There aren't any Corrupted left, Nanami.

Name: Nanami
Text: Yeah, I think we are safe. Good work, Sleipnir!

Name: Martin
Text: Stop giving me weird names already!

Name: Martin
Text: Right ahead, Nanami!

Name: Bionic Machine
Text: ROAR!!!

Name: Nanami
Text: Wow, so many machine animals!

Name: Martin
Text: They are the guards hiding outside the base. Nanami...

Name: Nanami
Text: Hoho, don't worry. Leave it all to Sword Master Nanami. I will hit them with the blunt side of my weapon!

Name: Martin
Text: I don't see a "blunt" side on your weapon...

Name: Bionic Machine
Text: Dammit... What's with this Construct...?

Name: Martin
Text: You actually knocked everyone out.

Name: Nanami
Text: Alright, surrender now and I'll spare your butt. Stop fighting against humans!

Name: Bionic Machine
Text: I will never betray Amberia!

Name: Bionic Machine
Text: ROAR!!!

Name: Martin
Text: New enemies incoming, Nanami!

Name: Martin
Text: Huh? Is that an alarm!?

Name: Bionic Machine
Text: ROAR!!!

Name: Nanami
Text: Oops, I shouldn't have run around... But Nanami will not lose!

Name: Bionic Machine
Text: ROAR—

Name: Nanami
Text: What's that sound...

Name: Martin
Text: It's the full attack... Amberia just sent all the bionics to attack the human base.

Name: Nanami
Text: What!?

Name: Martin
Text: Ugh! Outta my way!

Name: Corrupted
Text: Urgh!

Name: Lamia
Text: Wow... I have never seen someone running like that...

Name: Nanami
Text: I see. The Ascendants are behind this!

Name: Lamia
Text: Oopsie. Guess you found me out...

Name: Nanami
Text: That's enough. I don't want to talk to bad guys like you!

Name: Nanami
Text: Prepare to count up your sins!

Name: Lamia
Text: Tch!

Name: Martin
Text: Leave this to me, Nanami. You go take care of the culprit!

Name: Lamia
Text: Tsk, what a bunch of rebellious clowns...

Name: Nanami
Text: Why did you let the Corrupted do that? What's your purpose, Ascendant?

Name: Lamia
Text: ...I don't know about others, but this is essential entertainment for me.

Name: Nanami
Text: You're the only one left.

Name: Lamia
Text: I'm not going to fight you, weirdo.

Name: Nanami
Text: Look at your butt! You're the weird one!

Name: Nanami
Text: Is that an explosion?

Name: Lamia
Text: Tsk... Don't tell me you got beaten by just two of them! Some "perfect" Construct you are!

Name: Nanami
Text: Huh? Wait! Argh, she ran so fast!

Name: Martin
Text: Are you really going to help?

Name: Nanami
Text: Nanami never breaks a promise. Anyway, don't stop, Martin!

Name: Nanami
Text: Prepare to FAIYAAAA!

Name: Martin
Text: W-wait! Let me perform some repairs first!

Name: Nanami
Text: Okay...

Name: Martin
Text: Here they come again.

Name: Nanami
Text: Leave it to Nanami!

Name: Martin
Text: Alright, done!

Name: Nanami
Text: Hoho, Nanami's neo armstrong cannon is complete!

Name: Martin
Text: Don't give it some weird name!

Name: Nanami
Text: Anyway, let's blow 'em all to pieces!

Name: Martin
Text: Sigh...

Name: Nanami
Text: All clear. Only the aircraft left now!

Name: Nanami
Text: I'll pray for you, so turn into stardust!

Name: Martin
Text: Use the <color=#FF0000>joystick</color> to aim, then tap the <color=#FF0000>basic attack button</color> to launch the laser cannon!

Name: Martin
Text: Tap the <color=#FF0000>basic attack button</color> to launch the laser cannon.

Name: Lucia
Text: Defeat them and we can get rewards from Pulao!

Name: Lucia
Text: Mission accomplished.

Name: Pulao
Text: No! Not yet!

Name: Liv
Text: Powerful mechanical puppets coming our way!

Name: Lee
Text: Thought we only needed to defeat those on the stage.

Name: Pulao
Text: It was on the stage the whole time! You just didn't notice!

Name: System
Text: Please dodge the attack

Name: Service Bot
Text: Please... try...

Name: Karenina
Text: Ugh, cut me some slack!

Name: Bionic Machine
Text: ROAR!!!

Name: Rosetta
Text: Bionics... Something is wrong with this "tide."

Name: Rosetta
Text: Commandant, familiarize yourself with my frame and defeat the enemies.

Name: Rosetta
Text: It's over for now.

Name: Rosetta
Text: Commandant, let's leave this place.

Name: System
Text: <color=#FF0000>Tap and hold the basic attack button</color> to use the EM cannon.

Name: System
Text: Red Orb: Launches three shock waves to the front.

Name: System
Text: Blue Orb: Hurls the shield forward and pulls the enemy close.

Name: System
Text: Yellow Orb: Charges forward with her weapon.

Name: System
Text: After using the Signature Move, Rosetta flies into the air and launches a powerful blast cannon toward the enemies on the ground.

Name: Rosetta
Text: I'll take over. You go back.

Name: Fisher
Text: Um... It's the Forest Guard.

Name: Rosetta
Text: Commandant, the energy devices are all turned on. Let's turn them off first so they don't explode.

Name: Diana
Text: Why is there combat here? I even told the fishers to not act rashly...

Name: Diana
Text: ...Rosetta?

Name: Rosetta
Text: Diana? Great timing. Let's drive away the bionics together.

Name: Rosetta
Text: This is the last one... Now...

Name: Rosetta
Text: No more explosions to worry about. Finally, prepare to face my full power, bionics!

Name: Rosetta
Text: Have we taken this area back? But...

Name: Rosetta
Text: Why did the bionics escape with the energy tanks...?

Name: Simon
Text: Come back, Atiel. Leave the front to the Forest Guards.

Name: Atiel
Text: But...

Name: Rosetta
Text: Commandant, let's charge.

Name: Diana
Text: All the enemies are eliminated...

Name: Simon
Text: This is my first time seeing humanoid-hybrids up close... Such power.

Name: Bionic Machine
Text: We... are not... going to stop.

Name: Simon
Text: The bionics are talking...?

Name: Bionic Machine
Text: Amberia, will, break away...

Name: System
Text: Use Dodge to slide under the obstacle.

Name: System
Text: Use Jump to go over the obstacle.

Name: System
Text: Use Attack to destroy the bionic.

Name: Atiel
Text: Can we just leave it to the Forest Guards? Should we also go inside to secure the code?

Name: Simon
