Text: Before that, we must make sure that we won't be surrounded by the enemies...

Name: Simon
Text: Boss, the roadblock device is just nearby. Let's find it.

Name: Simon
Text: Oh, it's pretty easy to set up...

Name: Atiel
Text: Wait, Simon! Don't touch it!

Name: Simon
Text: What...!?

Name: Simon
Text: The devices are all activated.

Name: Simon
Text: Rest is in the Forest Guard's hands...

Name: Bionic Machine
Text: ROAR!

Name: Rosetta
Text: Your path ends here. Diana, let's stop them!

Name: Diana
Text: Roger!

Name: Atiel
Text: Looks like it's a success. Let's go inside the research building now!

Name: Simon
Text: Wait up, Atiel...

Name: Atiel
Text: Time's money! We need to find out what the code is ASAP!

Name: Diana
Text: Evan, are you okay?

Name: Evan
Text: I'm alright. But the recording, I tried so hard to catch it on tape...

Name: Diana
Text: We'll get it back.

Name: Diana
Text: Commandant, Rosetta is already ahead. Let's follow her.

Name: Rosetta
Text: Out of my way, bionics!

Name: Bionic Machine
Text: ROAR!!!

Name: Fisher
Text: Them bios be goin' at it full force, aye!

Name: Staessen
Text: Set up the defense immediately. Everyone, get your weapons ready.

Name: Staessen
Text: Hey you, boss guy, take the Forest Guards and go after that Babylonian traitor! Dammit!

Name: Staessen
Text: Some reinforcement she is... What even is she trying to do?

Name: Rosetta
Text: It's probably something to do with... Amberia.

Name: Diana
Text: Rosetta, we're here!

Name: Rosetta
Text: I went ahead of them again...

Name: Bionic Machine
Text: ROAR!!!

Name: Rosetta
Text: More bionics are coming... Commandant, Diana, we need to gather and break through.

Name: Simon
Text: You are going after Atiel, aren't you? She...

Name: Simon
Text: I'll manage the other Constructs, but you need to take care of Atiel and Amberia!

Name: Diana
Text: The trap just sent Rosetta and others to the lower level.

Name: Diana
Text: We need to get down there.

Name: Diana
Text: This might help...

Name: Bionic Machine
Text: ROAR!

Name: Diana
Text: ...Or not.

Name: Diana
Text: We are just wasting time here fighting...

Name: Rosetta
Text: Diana? Are you alright?

Name: Diana
Text: It's Rosetta's voice... Rosetta!

Name: Riot Mk.01
Text: Who's giving me a scratch? Someone get this bug away!

Name: Shark-speare
Text: Commandant! Commandant! Commandant! Brother! Brother!

Name: Amberia (Atiel)
Text: Another one has come to die.

Name: Amberia (Atiel)
Text: Prepare to face your death!

Name: Amberia (Atiel)
Text: Prepare to face your death!

Name: Amberia (Atiel)
Text: Prepare to face your death!

Name: Amberia (Atiel)
Text: Damn it...

Name: Amberia (Atiel)
Text: I will crush you!

Name: System
Text: All enemies now have <color=#FF0000>Black Hole</color>. Use Elemental Reaction to remove it as soon as possible!

Name: System
Text: All enemies now have <color=#FF0000>Black Hole</color> and <color=#FF0000>Radiation</color>. Use Elemental Reaction to remove them as soon as possible!

Name: System
Text: All enemies now have <color=#FF0000>Black Hole</color>, <color=#FF0000>Radiation</color>, <color=#FF0000>Recovery</color>and . Use Elemental Reaction to remove them as soon as possible!

Name: Luna
Text: Sis, please help me...

Name: System
Text: All enemies now have powerful <color=#FF0000>Black Hole</color>. Use Elemental Reaction to remove it as soon as possible!

Name: System
Text: All enemies now have powerful <color=#FF0000>Black Hole</color> and <color=#FF0000>Radiation</color>. Use Elemental Reaction to remove them as soon as possible!

Name: Unknown Construct α
Text: Damn it...

Name: Celica
Text: The enemy's Super Armor is reduced to 0. It has become vulnerable!

Name: Celica
Text: Now we have learned about the all-new <color=#ff5656>combat support unit</color>, let's try it out!

Name: Gangster
Text: Ima teach you a lesson today!

Name: Changyu
Text: That's my line!

Name: Gangster B
Text: Look, he was carrying this.

Name: Changyu
Text: Get your hands off my thing! Come fight me, I dare you!

Name: Gangster A
Text: Who cares. We just wanna bring you pain! Take it away and smash it!

Name: Gangster
Text: Don't push me! Get up there first! He's coming at us.

Name: Changyu
Text: Stop!

Name: Gangster A
Text: Hmph, you've got fast legs. But we ain't gonna stop.

Name: Gangster A
Text: Beat him up and smash his belongings. Show no mercy!

Name: Gangsters
Text: Hell yeah!

Name: Gangster A
Text: Ouch... You little brat...

Name: Changyu
Text: Anyone still got a problem?!

Name: Gangsters
Text: (Painful moaning)

Name: Changyu
Text: You're lucky that my props didn't break.

Name: Changyu
Text: To get up to the platform, tap to change the hook's destination.

Name: Changyu
Text: I must get the props back first. They didn't run this way.

Name: Changyu
Text: They're running toward the platform. I must hurry and take my things back.

Name: HBG3
Text: You stay here. I will take care of the enemy with HNB1.

Name: Little Girl
Text: Okay. Take care, you two...!

Name: HBG3
Text: The Kowloong human army has deployed their defense there. Stay out of the alert circle.

Name: HNB1
Text: Just get rid of the alarms!

Name: HNB1
Text: Oh no, the alarm is triggered. The Corrupted are coming!

Name: HBG3
Text: Prepare for battle!

Name: HBG3
Text: We can't just simply destroy the alarm. Gathering information<<<Analyzing landscape<<<Creating strategy

Name: HBG3
Text: I did a scan. The control room of the alarm system is located on the level below.

Name: HBG3
Text: Suggested best strategy: You go downstairs to hack into the control room while I watch your back here.

Name: HNB1
Text: Pulao HN-B1 Ready to connect. Authorizing...

Name: HBG3
Text: The alarm system has been shut down.

Name: HBG3
Text: ...Is this also a consequence of your human emotion simulation module?

Name: HNB1
Text: I just didn't hear you properly. I swear!

Name: HBG3
Text: Now that the alarm is triggered, we have no choice but to fight. Try to avoid direct contact with them.

Name: HBG3
Text: Protect the human.

Name: HNB1
Text: You don't need to remind me!

Name: System
Text: Warning. Abnormal invasion detected—

Name: System
Text: Activating self-check program...

Name: System
Text: Failed to initiate self-check program.

Name: HBG3
Text: HNB1, I have been infected.

Name: HBG3
Text: We talked about the possibility last night.

Name: HBG3
Text: Search around. There should be some supplies nearby.

Name: HNB1
Text: What did you want to say just now?

Name: HBG3
Text: I saw multiple terminated mechanoids and androids in the underground tunnel while you went searching for food.

Name: HBG3
Text: Mechanoids are the main enemy of this war. There is no way humans will just sit and watch us getting infected.

Name: HNB1
Text: I saw the same scene. I cannot describe my feelings.

Name: HBG3
Text: I don't understand. We machines only need to follow orders.

Name: HBG3
Text: Abnormal mechanoids detected! Preparing to engage.

Name: HNB1
Text: They just keep coming... What were you saying?

Name: HBG3
Text: I have a request.

Name: HBG3
Text: I want you to execute me immediately if I show signs of the infection.

Name: HNB1
Text: Execute...?

Name: HBG3
Text: The duty of Tai'E is to protect humans. I will not turn into your enemy.

Name: HNB1
Text: But I...

Name: HNB1
Text: I will fulfil the duty of Tai'E.

Name: HNB1
Text: The defense left by the human army should buy some time for me...

Name: Little Girl
Text: Watch out—

Name: HNB1
Text: Dammit... They have breached the obstacles...!

Name: HNB1
Text: Don't worry!

Name: System
Text: Warning—Warning—System compromised. Connect to a power source immediately for self-check<<<

Name: System
Text: Failed to launch self-check. Hibernating<<<

Name: HNB1
Text: I... will not... fall...

Name: Little Girl
Text: *Crying*—

Name: HNB1
Text: Don't-cry-I-am-here-to-protect-you.

Name: HNB1
Text: I will fulfil the duty of Tai'E.

Name: Qu
Text: Push forward. I'll open a way.

Name: Resident
Text: Hold on there. Lady Qu and Kowloong Crew are coming for us.

Name: Qu
Text: Chi Ling, rescue the residents first.

Name: Chi Ling
Text: Roger.

Name: Pulao Crew
Text: All the residents in the outer city have been evacuated, Lady Qu.

Name: Qu
Text: Let the outer defense pull back. Move inside the city gate.

Name: Chi Ling
Text: Watch out!

Name: Qu
Text: Stay calm. Keep firing! Maintain your defense!

Name: Pulao Crew
Text: Understood!

Name: Pulao Crew
Text: Lady Qu!

Name: Qu
Text: Enemy main force has arrived. I want all Armies to launch saturation attack.

Name: Pulao Crew A
Text: Lady Qu, some Corrupted are attacking our flank!

Name: Chi Ling
Text: Tch... They must be using anti-radar camouflage. We can't let them get so close.

Name: Qu
Text: All corps, focus fire and suppress the enemy vanguard.

Name: Qu
Text: I'll eliminate anyone that crosses the field!

Name: Qu
Text: None shall pass my spear. Dragon flurry!

Name: Guide
Text: Gain 4 Signal Orbs synced with "Huiyu", then tap the Signature button again later to cast a powerful Signature Move.

Name: Guide
Text: Core Passive (Concentrated Will): Enter Concentrated Will for a few seconds after clearing any 6 Signal Orbs. Skills are enhanced while Core Passive is triggered.

Name: Guide
Text: Clear 3 more Orbs to trigger the Core Passive.

Name: Guide
Text: Now you have entered the Concentrated Will mode. All skills are enhanced while it lasts!

Name: Qu
Text: Moyuan... I didn't expect us to be reunited like this.

Name: Moyuan
Text: Go... Go home...

Name: Moyuan
Text: Corrupted... Danger... I must... Warn everybody...

Name: Qu
Text: Moyuan... Moyuan?!

Name: Moyuan
Text: Who's there...

Name: Moyuan
Text: Let it all... end...

Name: Qu
Text: I'm sorry...

Name: Moyuan
Text: Thank you, Lady Qu!

Name: Moyuan
Text: Nothing... Can stop me...

Name: Moyuan
Text: I must... I want to... Go... Back...

Name: Qu
Text: Moyuan!

Name: Qu
Text: It's too late...

Name: Qu
Text: Rest in peace, Moyuan... But I must...

Name: Qu
Text: Danhao, I need an update on the situation. Do you copy?

Name: System
Text: ————(Electrical noise)

Name: Qu
Text: Dammit, we must take turn to fall back. Make sure the defense facility is functioning properly.

Name: Chi Ling
Text: Roger.

Name: Qu
Text: Reboot completed. 2 more remaining in this area.

Name: Qu
Text: Chi Ling, take the 1st and 3rd Army to the East City District. I'll leave the defense facility there to you.

Name: Chi Ling
Text: Got it.

Name: Qu
Text: I want the 5th Army stay right here to hold your ground. Everyone else, follow me.

Name: Pulao Crew
Text: Understood!

Name: Qu
Text: Has anyone seen Danhao...?

Name: Pulao Crew Soldier
Text: No, not here...

Name: Qu
Text: Phew... The 2nd Army, search for the wounded and cover the 5th Army.

Name: Pulao Crew Soldier
Text: Roger.

Name: Pulao Crew
Text: Lady Qu, the enemies are coming back.

Name: Qu
Text: Activate the ballistae. Protect the defense facility!

Name: Pulao Crew
Text: Roger!

Name: Qu
Text: Good, we have taken back the defense facility here. The 4th Army stays to clean up the battlefield. The 6th Army, follow me to the East City District.

Name: Pulao Crew
Text: Understood!

Name: Staessen
Text: ...Why?

Name: Luna
Text: Do you mean why I killed him, or why I want to kill you? It's all for the same reason.

Name: Second Mate
Text: Sorry, but I don't want him to die right now. He still has a lot to explain.

Name: Staessen
Text: Go... There's still time...

Name: Second Mate
Text: Don't get me wrong. You did a lot of terrible things...

Name: Second Mate
Text: But... You are still the ARU's Captain.

Name: Staessen
Text: But I don't need you... To sacrifice for me...

Name: Staessen
Text: ...May he rest in peace.

Name: Luna
Text: You're the only one left.

Name: Staessen
Text: ...You're right.

Name: Lucia
Text: The mechanoids are in chaos...

Name: Lee
Text: Are the mechanoids out of control after the leader units disappeared?

Name: Liv
Text: Listen! I hear something from deep inside the building!

Name: Lucia
Text: Let's search the source of the sound!

Name: Lee
Text: Could it be that fallen mechanoid?

Name: Lee
Text: Probably not... Its core is already a mess.

Name: Lucia
Text: Let's keep going.

Name: Liv
Text: The sound comes from further inside.

Name: Lee
Text: Tsk... More mechanoids to welcome us.

Name: Lucia
Text: Why are the collapsed mechanoids suddenly standing up?

Name: Lee
Text: Maybe they've sensed us and were forced to activate their combat functions...

Name: Liv
Text: There is something moving in the room ahead. The sound probably came from there.

Name: Lee
Text: There were lots of fallen mechanoids on the way here. I have a bad feeling about this...

Name: Liv
Text: Is this... a library?

Name: Lee
Text: Take caution. I've detected a moving mechanoid in the corner.
What. Are. You. You. You. Doing?!

Name: System
Text: Tip 17

Name: System
Text: Tip 18

Name: System
Text: Tip 19

Name: System
Text: Tip 20

Name: Lee
Text: This looks like the underground city's parliament building, or something similar.

Name: Lee
Text: The area behind us has mostly collapsed... We have to keep going.

Name: Archive Terminal
Text: School Archive — 9999/10

Name: Director
Text: What the heck are you planning?

Name: Director
Text: Yesterday alone, there were two explosions right outside the parliament. I can't cover this for you anymore.

Name: Man
Text: ...I didn't expect you to do that either.

Name: Woman
Text: It's time to lay our cards on the table.

Name: Director
Text: ...Come with me.

Name: Archive Terminal
Text: School Archive — 10009/10

Name: Old Man
Text: This is madness!

Name: Man
Text: Sir, you have been away from the real world for too long. The people you picked, no matter how noble they used to be...

Name: Man
Text: They are still humans. They have emotions... And they are prone to conflicts and competitions.

Name: Woman
Text: We are doing our best to control them, but there's something we just cannot contain.

Name: Man
Text: Sir, only humans can inherit the memetics of mankind. We must determine the true form of mankind!

Name: Old Man
Text: ...Is that it? Is that why you have been fighting all along?

Name: Archive Terminal
Text: School Archive — 12447/10

Name: Man
Text: That was some nice talk in front of the Chairman. Have you really thought about "controlling" your people?

Name: Woman
Text: Weren't you also saying the same thing? You even forced him to make a decision.

Name: Man
Text: But you are right. We can't keep wearing ourselves down.

Name: Woman
Text: Yeah. Something has to be done.

Name: Archive Terminal
Text: School Archive — 17513/10

Name: Old Man
Text: How ridiculous. I spent so long handpicking you all, yet you've ended up in factions regardless.

Name: Old Man
Text: Finding a "champion" who can control the post-apocalyptic Earth by making machines fight each other...

Name: Old Man
Text: Are humans supposed to hibernate until the machines have a result?

Name: Old Man
Text: Ludicrous... What an absurd plan coming from the leaders of our School!

Name: Director
Text: I hate to say this, but given the situation, this is probably the only way.

Name: Archive Terminal
Text: School Archive — 19299/10

Name: Man
Text: Is the Chairman really going to give the go ahead?

Name: Director
Text: Does he have a choice? Look at what happened on the surface.

Name: Director
Text: Even if the disaster ends, we will still be the only humans he can have an influence on.

Name: Woman
Text: What a plan. A war between machines of equal numbers and strength, determined only through self-evolution?

Name: Man
Text: ...There aren't many of us left. At least this is better than wasting lives in meaningless infighting.

Name: Askr
Text: To. End everything. Must find. "The Strip of Truth".

Name: Askr
Text: It's. A place. I know. Where.

Name: Askr
Text: But. Embla. Has problem. Cannot. Get there.

Name: Liv
Text: Let me take a look.

Name: Liv
Text: I've made some emergency repairs on Embla's action module. This should help her move for now.

Name: Liv
Text: But she won't be able to fight unless I replace the entire module.

Name: Lee
Text: I remember there are some fallen mechanoids outside... We can probably make use of them.

Name: Lee
Text: More mechanoids are moving again?

Name: Mechanoid
Text: Purpose is meaningless now. Activating indiscriminate attack mode.

Name: Lucia
Text: Askr, Embla, stay back. We will take down the mechanoids!

Name: Lee
Text: The damaged mechanoids are moving again... Will this keep happening as we move forward?

Name: Liv
Text: I see another fallen mechanoid over there... Looks like its action module is still intact.

Name: Lucia
Text: Start the repairs, Liv.

Name: Liv
Text: Alright.

Name: Lee
Text: Wait! More motion signals nearby!

Name: System
Text: Tip 17

Name: System
Text: Tip 18

Name: System
Text: Tip 19

Name: System
Text: Tip 20

Name: Archive Terminal
Text: School Archive — 15003/10

Name: Manager
Text: Sir, all the artworks and historical sources in our possession have been transferred to the safehouse as you ordered.

Name: Manager
Text: But Chairman... Are you sure about this?

Name: Old Man
Text: Do it.

Name: Manager
Text: Alright.

Name: Archive Terminal
Text: School Archive — 19445/10

Name: Old Man
Text: Forgive me.

Name: Old Man
Text: For I am about to betray mankind.

Name: Old Man
Text: But this is what we must do.

Name: Old Man
Text: Everything we do is to make the memetics created by humans continue to exist.

Name: Archive Terminal
Text: School Archive — 19345/10

Name: Director
Text: You were looking for me?

Name: Old Man
Text: Yes. There's something I... need to talk to you about.

Name: Director
Text: What is it?

Name: Old Man
Text: I'd like to borrow your life.

Name: Liv
Text: Multiple motion signals detected!

Name: Lucia
Text: Watch out! More damaged mechanoids are moving again!

Name: Askr
Text: I. Can move. Can fight!

Name: Embla
Text: Askr! Askr!

Name: Liv
Text: Askr's signals are getting extremely weak... We need to intervene immediately!

Name: Askr
Text: Embla... P-protect...

Name: Liv
Text: There are tracks everywhere... But I think I know which one belong to Embla.

Name: Liv
Text: ...It's right ahead.

Name: Lee
Text: There are mechanoids around... It won't be an easy trip.

Name: Lucia
Text: Is it just me? I don't see mechanoids with colors anymore.

Name: Liv
Text: ...I've found the next sign.

Name: Liv
Text: There it is.

Name: Liv
Text: Something's... blinking... and glowing...

Name: Lee
Text: Is it a... firefly? I've never seen a real one before.

Name: Lucia
Text: The firefly is flying to the cave where Embla's tracks lead... Could there be something inside?

Name: Lee
Text: Let me see... This is the base of a mechanoid's AI module, with something attached to it. It looks like the core's outer shell.

Name: Liv
Text: This module seems to belong to Askr... But the attachment is in Embla's color...

Name: Lucia
Text: Which means Embla has put some parts of Askr here along with her own parts...

Name: Liv
Text: Did she use them to make some sort of device?

Name: Lee
Text: Possibly. Let me try to activate it.

Name: Lucia
Text: ...It's lighting up.

Name: Liv
Text: ...Reminds me of the "eternal flame" mentioned in the database.

Name: Lucia
Text: Something else seems to be lit up as well.

Name: Lee
Text: Embla stayed here shortly before moving to the plaza outside.

Name: Lee
Text: I just scanned this area with my terrain radar...

Name: Lee
Text: There is a huge cavern underneath the ring... Almost as big as the city above.

Name: Lucia
Text: If Embla was heading out, she must have somehow gone down from the plaza.

Name: Lee
Text: Makes sense. Let's go back.

Name: Sapien Record 01
Text: We will wait for the result inside the cryogenic chamber.

Name: Sapien Record 02
Text: Hidden path ahead. Try &(po — Vann

Name: Sapien Record 03
Text: Don't trust what Vann said.

Name: Sapien Record 04
Text: Wish I can see the blue sky again when I wake up.

Name: Sapien Record 05
Text: I want to be a scientist after I wake up — Jhin

Name: Sapien Record 06
Text: There's something behind you.

Name: Liv
Text: The traces stop here, but Embla is not around.

Name: Lee
Text: The gap of this ring looks a little different. Could it be some sort of elevator-like device?

Name: Lucia
Text: Let's stay here and give it a try then.

Name: Lee
Text: We need to get rid of the mechanoids first.

Name: Lucia
Text: ...Better be careful.

Name: Liv
Text: I've found connection signals in the center of the ring. Looks like something will happen if we can stay until its preparation is complete.

Name: Lucia
Text: ...Multiple motion signals detected nearby!

Name: Lee
Text: Are they coming to stop us...?

Name: Lucia
Text: Either way, we will have to get rid of them first.

Name: System
Text: Tip 10

Name: System
Text: Tip 11

Name: System
Text: Tip 12

Name: System
Text: Tip 13

Name: System
Text: Tip 14

Name: System
Text: Tip 15

Name: System
Text: Tip 16

Name: System
Text: Tip 17

Name: System
Text: Tip 18

Name: System
Text: Tip 19

Name: System
Text: Tip 20

Name: Liv
Text: Watch out! The illuminated circles... are releasing high-voltage electric shock!

Name: Lee
Text: Even Constructs would break under that voltage.

Name: Lucia
Text: Let's move to the center while avoiding these areas.

Name: Lee
Text: The signal is interrupted. We need to stay in the center as much as we can.

Name: Lee
Text: I think it's ready now. Finish off the remaining mechanoids.

Name: Machiavelli
Text: "War"... cannot... continue...

Name: Machiavelli
Text: I... have failed... Father...

Name: Machiavelli
Text: *Emergency exit is now open. You may leave the facility at your convenience.*

Name: System
Text: Tip 4

Name: System
Text: Tip 5

Name: System
Text: Tip 6

Name: System
Text: Tip 7

Name: System
Text: Tip 8

Name: System
Text: Tip 9

Name: System
Text: Tip 10

Name: Michael
Text: Michael... wants a game.

Name: Michael
Text: Killing! Is good for health!

Name: Michael
Text: Don't run! Let Big Michael give you a hug!

Name: Michael
Text: I will return...!

Name: Michael
Text: Take this! Michurricane!

Name: Michael
Text: Some blades here! Some blades there! Blades, blades, blades!

Name: Michael
Text: —The sweet torturing is about to begin!

Name: Michael
Text: I once met a guy with a chainsaw installed on his hand. He taught me this move!

Name: Michael
Text: Do you wanna die for a while, or forever?

Name: Michael
Text: Big Michael says hello!

Name: Michael
Text: —The sweet torturing is about to begin!

Name: Michael
Text: Killing! Is good for health!

Name: Lee
Text: Prepare for battle!

Name: Lucia
Text: Wait a second... These Corrupted look strange.

Name: Lee
Text: They're surrounding the throne... as if they're performing a ritual. What are they doing?

Name: Lee
Text: Attempting to capture information about the throne with Spear of F.O.S. for analysis.

Name: Spear of F.O.S.
Text: Capture successful. Filtering valid information—

Name: Lee
Text: Meanwhile, let's keep moving.

Name: Lee
Text: We need to cross the platform to move further inside.

Name: Lucia
Text: I see Constructs... from Babylonia...

Name: Lee
Text: ...Let's retrieve their memory shells to find out what happened.

Name: Lee
Text: Now we should have sufficient data to recreate the projection.

Name: Liv
Text: I wonder what they had been through and seen...

Name: Liv
Text: Watch out, they've noticed us!

Name: Lee
Text: Never thought we could really recover the access history of the control panel...

Name: Murray
Text: I managed to visualize the control panel's past usage. Did it help?

Name: Lee
Text: It did. Good job.

Name: Lucia
Text: That's a projection of... Roland?

Name: Roland
Text: Hmph... I'm about to find out your secret.

Name: Roland
Text: Luna... I'm afraid that...

Name: Lucia
Text: Follow him!

Name: Roland
Text: Biological data that originated from the Punishing Virus? That doesn't seem like Luna's work. Could it be...?

Name: Lee
Text: The road is blocked...

Name: Murray
Text: I got this.

Name: Murray
Text: The blockade all seem to be created using the same method. It's surprisingly easy to crack.

Name: Lee
Text: It's probably a direct adaptation of the blockade program set by the people who built this place. Must be some very old coding.

Name: Liv
Text: Over there...! It's Gabriel!

Name: Gabriel
Text: The Ascension-Network is the only way out...

Name: Gabriel
Text: Grow, for the host of absolute power.

Name: Gabriel
Text: Have you been following me?

Name: Roland
Text: Will you believe me if I say I'm just passing by?

Name: Gabriel
Text: Obviously not.

Name: Roland
Text: You've been working on some new toy recently, right? Can I take a look?

Name: Gabriel
Text: ...Enough said.

Name: Gabriel
Text: Prove your loyalty to the Ascension-Network first.

Name: Roland
Text: Wait, wait! Why are you attacking me already?!
Intruder detected. Activating defense protocol—

Name: Roland
Text: Well, it's time for you...

Name: Roland
Text: ...To show me how much you have grown.

Name: Roland
Text: Is that all? Don't disappoint your old friend.

Name: Roland
Text: (Chuckles) Not bad.

Name: Roland
Text: Hmm, I see... It's about time.

Name: Gabriel
Text: I have prepared a little trial for you. Please, prove your loyalty to the Ascension-Network.

Name: Luna
Text: Gabriel... You'll pay for your foolishness.

Name: Gabriel
Text: Please.

Name: Luna
Text: ...What lowly creations.

Name: Luna
Text: ...Is that all you got?

Name: Gabriel
Text: Magnificent. No wonder the Ascension-Network chose you as the agent.

Name: Gabriel
Text: This overwhelming power of yours... Show me more of it.

Name: Luna
Text: If this is all you have...

Name: Gabriel
Text: I would like to be your opponent, if I may.

Name: Tutorial
Text: Time for some battle revision.

Name: Tutorial
Text: First, use <color=#FF0000>3-Ping</color> to accumulate Annihilation Pts.

Name: Tutorial
Text: When you have sufficient Annihilation Pts, press and hold <color=#FF0000>Basic Attack</color> to enter the <color=#FF0000>Annihilation State</color>.

Name: Tutorial
Text: Now crush these insects!

Name: Tutorial
Text: Under the Annihilation State, you can use special <color=#FF0000>Annihilation Orbs</color>, as well as enhanced Basic Attacks which will cost Annihilation Pts.

Name: Tutorial
Text: After every <color=#FF0000>3-Ping</color>, the next Orb pinged is regarded as a <color=#FF0000>3-Ping</color>.

Name: Lucia
Text: Alpha has chosen to do it this way...

Name: Lucia
Text: Probably because she still has some regrets.

Name: α
Text: Even after becoming an Ascendant, I was still searching for them.

Name: α
Text: But... The promised recall was but a lie.

Name: Lucia
Text: Murol and Xun...

Name: α
Text: The Gray Ravens you believe in would end up just like them...

Name: Ravenge
Text: Why can't you just die?

Name: Hiro
Text: Lucia... Go. You can make it on your own...

Name: α
Text: Even if you can move on from your memories, things like this will happen again.

Name: Luna?
Text: Lucia? Are you also going to leave me?

Name: Lucia
Text: Luna.

Name: Lucia
Text: My promise to you won't change even after I leave this place.

Name: Lucia
Text: Please, give me a little more time. I will find a way.

Name: Lucia
Text: A way to really hold those hands of yours.

Name: Lucia
Text: ...Are you "me" before the divergence point? Why are you here?

Name: Lucia
Text: Because you have completely accepted me.

Name: Lucia
Text: Come, "me" in the future. Let me lend you a hand.

Name: Lucia
Text: This is your reward for facing your past.

Name: Lucia
Text: Sorry, Luna. I know you are only an illusion of the M.I.N.D.

Name: Lucia
Text: I must go. I can't change anything staying here.

Name: Luna?
Text: Lucia... Don't...

Name: Luna
Text: Even if I have to resort to violence...

Name: Luna
Text: I must keep you here...

Name: Lucia
Text: ...Are you "me" before the divergence point? Why are you here?

Name: Lucia
Text: Because you have completely accepted me.

Name: Lucia
Text: Come, "me" in the future. Let me lend you a hand.

Name: Lucia
Text: This is your reward for facing your past.

Name: Lucia
Text: No, this time... I still choose to protect you.

Name: Luna
Text: Lucia... Don't go...

Name: Lucia
Text: According to the coordinates, the entrance should be nearby...

Name: Lee
Text: Be careful, there are Corrupted nearyby.

Name: Lucia
Text: This place doesn't look like any industrial or residential area. Why would there be Corrupted...?

Name: Lee
Text: No idea, but we better get rid of them if we want to explore this place.

Name: Lee
Text: Strange mechanoids.

Name: Mechanoid
Text: Defect, defect.

Name: Lucia
Text: Were those Corrupted coming after them?

Name: Lee
Text: Hmm? There's something nearby.

Name: Lee
Text: Better search with caution.

Name: Lee
Text: Better search with caution.

Name: Lucia
Text: Phew...

Name: Lucia
Text: Let's keep moving and find where the mechanoids came from.

Name: Lucia
Text: If those strange mechanoids came from the facility, we should be able to find the entrance by going back the same route.

Name: Lee
Text: All I see are rubbles and debris...

Name: Liv
Text: There are sounds and motion signals... from the cave's entrance!

Name: Lucia
Text: Over there?

Name: Liv
Text: How strange that they kept mumbling something about "defect"...

Name: Lucia
Text: Let move toward where they came from.

Name: Lucia
Text: Is that a... door?

Name: Lee
Text: Looks like so.

Name: Lee
Text: There is a huge area behind the door.

Name: Lucia
Text: ...So this may probably be the entrance to the facility.

Name: Lucia
Text: Let's keep going then.

Name: Unknown
Text: Tap to use POD Skill: Sword

Name: Lucia
Text: The gate ahead... is locked.

Name: Lee
Text: ...How come there are Jitterbombs around?

Name: Liv
Text: Maybe they came from the surface and accidentally ended up here?

Name: Lucia
Text: A closed gate... Jitterbombs... I have a plan.

Name: Lucia
Text: What if we lure the Jitterbombs to the gate and detonate them...?

Name: Lee
Text: Tsk, too close...

Name: Liv
Text: Good, we can take the Jitterbomb all the way to the gate.

Name: Lee
Text: Almost there. Bring another Jitterbomb and do it again.

Name: Liv
Text: These Jitterbombs seem to be moving in a pattern.

Name: Liv
Text: If that's the case, I can try to make a bait from those remains...

Name: Liv
Text: Great, Commandant, I have successfully lured a Jitterbomb toward the gate.

Name: Lucia
Text: Never thought there would be such a huge city underground...

Name: Liv
Text: But isn't that the sky above us?

Name: Lee
Text: Most likely an artificial sky to provide lighting and comfort.

Name: Controller
Text: Don't stay too long. Remember, you have a mission.

Name: Lucia
Text: You're right. We should be able to enter the city via the gate ahead. Let's go.

Name: Lee
Text: Unlike the mechanoids who claimed to be "defects"... These ones are red.

Name: Liv
Text: And they were not calling themselves "defects" anymore.

Name: Lucia
Text: Let's keep moving. This is probably the right direction.

Name: Red Mechanoid
Text: Destroy! Destroy! Only our faction! Can rule the world!

Name: Blue Mechanoid
Text: Destroy! Destroy! Only our faction! Can rule the world!

Name: Lee
Text: Red mechanoids.

Name: Liv
Text: And blue mechanoids... They are fighting each other.

Name: Lee
Text: If they're fighting, we better stay away.

Name: Lee
Text: Let's refrain from unnecessary fights.

Name: Lucia
Text: Hold on.

Name: Lucia
Text: There's something strange about them...

Name: Liv
Text: Both the red and blue mechanoids... are coming our way!

Name: Lee
Text: Are those mechanoids... attacking another identical mechanoid locked up in a cage?

Name: Lucia
Text: Not quite. That mechanoid isn't red or blue.

Name: Lee
Text: If both the red and blue mechanoids are attacking it, it probably is in a similar situation as us.

Name: Lucia
Text: It's possible. Let's rescue it first.

Name: Lee
Text: Tsk, this cage is pretty hard to break.

Name: Lucia
Text: Watch out, the other mechanoids are coming close!

Name: Lee
Text: ...Give me a break!

Name: Liv
Text: Please don't move. I'll open the cage right away!

Name: Authorization AI
Text: Data record... Authorization ID—Z002003

Name: Authorization AI
Text: School Archive, 1/10.

Name: Old Man
Text: Ladies and gentlemen, today we gather here in order to pursue the destiny of mankind.

Name: Old Man
Text: Zero-point energy, a technology that has never been fully tested and verified, is about to be used on the core components of space colonization.

Name: Old Man
Text: That is a decision beyond mankind... Or, I should say, mankind has expanded beyond its own capabilities.

Name: Old Man
Text: Which means... the only outcome is annihilation.

Name: Authorization AI
Text: School Archive, 3/10.

Name: Woman
Text: How can you make such an important decision sound so inconsequential?!

Name: Old Man
Text: I see... Is this a difficult decision to you all?

Name: Director
Text: ...It's still the first item on the agenda, and they're all gone.

Name: Old Man
Text: One day they will understand the weight of this decision... and why it is necessary.

Name: Lee
Text: Be careful, there's a fight going on in the area ahead.

Name: Lucia
Text: Are they the mechanoids we saw?

Name: Lee
Text: Let's take a look. There isn't any other way if we want to investigate this area further.

Name: Liv
Text: The red and blue forces were fighting, but once they saw us...

Name: Lee
Text: They started attacking us together.

Name: Lucia
Text: ...Looks like both the red and blue mechanoids have a similar defense mechanism. Do they see us as a mutual enemy?

Name: Lee
Text: ...Fighting each other while automatically excluding outsiders simultaneously?

Name: Lee
Text: That's worth looking into. Let's keep going and see if there are more similar mechanoids further down the way.

Name: Mechanoid
Text: You. Who are... Y09p[Different. Individual.

Name: Lee
Text: Why did those mechanoids attack you?

Name: Mechanoid
Text: I m-m-m a. Defect. No. Faction. Comrade.

Name: Lucia
Text: Did they attack you because you were not a "comrade"?

Name: Mechanoid
Text: In this "Naraka". Either comrade. Either enemy. Defects and outsiders. Eliminated first.

Name: Lucia
Text: Watch out, the other mechanoids are coming close!

Name: Lee
Text: ...Give me a break!

Name: Luna
Text: I must say, your fortitude has surprised me... But this will not be the end.

Name: Luna
Text: Show me what power means to you, Gabriel.

Name: Gabriel
Text: I am extremely honored to witness your absolute power again.

Name: Gabriel
Text: Miss Luna, this is only the beginning...

Name: Liv
Text: How can we stop a monster of this size...

Name: Lee
Text: Focus on the weak points. The giant body makes them more exposed.

Name: Lucia
Text: Proceed with caution. Don't get hit!

Name: Lee
Text: I have marked the weak points with the Spear of F.O.S. If only we can disable the Polyphage's arms...

Name: Lee
Text: All we need is a couple of minutes to have a shot at getting to the core.

Name: Liv
Text: I will provide support from the rear. You can depend on me!

Name: Lucia
Text: The way forward is clear. Let's go!

Name: Lucia
Text: I was betrayed, but no matter how painful the wounds were, I have decided to always look forward.

Name: Lucia
Text: I will embrace the future with Gray Raven, with Commandant, and everyone in Babylonia.

Name: Lucia
Text: Luna, I want to share my stories with you. Even if there's only darkness ahead of us, I'd like to believe in that tiny spark of hope.

Name: Lucia
Text: ...Because it's a treasure given by those that are important to me, and nothing could replace it.

Name: Lucia
Text: I will cut down anything or anyone that gets in my way!

Name: Lucia
Text: When everything is over... I will gently pat your head like I used to.

Name: Lucia
Text: Sorry, Liv... Lee... But I have made up my mind.

Name: Lucia
Text: I won't let go of those hands again. Those hands who reach out for my help from darkness.

Name: Lucia
Text: Wait, what's this...

Name: Lucia
Text: The contamination rate of Punishing Virus is falling... A new M.I.N.D. connection?

Name: Lucia
Text: This signal... Luna?

Name: Lucia
Text: But connecting with an Ascendant will put too much stress on Commandant. What if...

Name: Lucia
Text: No... I believe in Commandant's decision.

Name: Lucia
Text: I will buy you time before the connection is established... Trust me.

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant and everyone will be in danger...!

Name: Lucia
Text: I must not... Let this monster reach the surface.

Name: Lucia
Text: I will destroy you right here before I get to Commandant and everyone else!

Name: Lucia
Text: I will never give up!

Name: Lucia
Text: Just... a little longer... Not yet...

Name: Lucia
Text: Ugh...

Name: Luna
Text: Connect to Luna?

Name: Celica
Text: Basic Attack: Launches multiple hits with orbs and spikes.

Name: Celica
Text: The Basic Attack combo will be varied if you <color=#ee7d7c>quickly follow up with a Basic Attack after a successful dodge</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>After dodging</color>, <color=#ee7d7c>immediately attack</color> to cast the 3rd hit of Basic Attack directly.

Name: Celica
Text: Red Orb: Launches spheres forward to bombard the enemy for Physical DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: Blue Orb: Casts a virus network that moves with the target or self for 3s, dealing multiple hits of Physical DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: Yellow Orb: Channels energy flow underground to cast up to 4 piercing attacks at the target's location, dealing Physical DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: Signature Move: Alters the gravity within a large area forward, dealing massive Dark DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: Red Orb <color=#ee7d7c>3-Ping</color>: Hurls the spheres floating behind Luna forward, randomly attacking targets and dealing Dark DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: After a 3-Ping, <color=#ee7d7c>any Orb pinged</color> will also be regarded as a 3-Ping.

Name: Celica
Text: Now the <color=#ffda58>Annihilation Pts</color> are full, <color=#ee7d7c>press and hold the Attack button</color> to enter the <color=#ffda58>Annihilation State</color> and deal Dark DMG to nearby targets.

Name: Celica
Text: Under the <color=#ffda58>Annihilation State</color>, Luna gains new Basic Attack combos.

Name: Celica
Text: Every <color=#ee7d7c>Basic Attack</color> will get you <color=#ee7d7c>1</color> point. Once there are <color=#ee7d7c>4</color> points, special Red Orbs are activated. Tap the activated special Red Orb to cast <color=#ffda58>Shattered Crown</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap unactivated Red Orbs to cast <color=#ffda58>Singularity</color> and get <color=#ee7d7c>1</color> point. Cast <color=#ffda58>Shattered Crown</color> again to leave the <color=#ffda58>Annihilation State</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Blue Orb <color=#ee7d7c>3-Ping</color>: Casts a virus network that moves with the target or self for 3s, dealing multiple hits of Dark DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: Yellow Orb <color=#ee7d7c>3-Ping</color>: Launches up to 3 piercing attacks in front of the target, dealing Dark DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Press and hold the Attack button</color> to enter the <color=#ffda58>Annihilation State</color>, then cast Basic Attacks or <color=#ffda58>Singularity</color> 4 times to activate special Red Orb, the <color=#ffda58>Shattered Crown</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Press and hold the Attack button</color> to enter the <color=#ffda58>Annihilation State</color>. Under this mode, you can accumulate points by casting Basic Attacks and special Red Orbs, then unleash high burst damage.

Name: Celica
Text: Blue Orb <color=#ee7d7c>3-Ping</color> can also trigger Luna's QTE Skill while she is in the blue slot.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Tap</color> to cast Luna's QTE Skill.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Tap</color> Luna to cast her Entrance Skill

Name: Celica
Text: When Luna enters the battle, she will cast <color=#ee7d7c>Blue Orb 3-Ping</color> to trigger her Core Passive, so any <color=#ee7d7c>Orb pinged next</color> will be regarded as a 3-Ping.

Name: Celica
Text: After every 3-Ping, she gains <color=#ee7d7c>15</color> Annihilation Pts, up to <color=#ee7d7c>60</color>. <color=#ee7d7c>The skill damage of 3-Ping is also converted into Dark DMG</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: After a 3-Ping, <color=#ee7d7c>any Orb pinged</color> will also be regarded as a 3-Ping.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Press and hold the Attack button</color> to enter the <color=#ffda58>Annihilation State</color>. While Luna is in <color=#ffda58>Annihilation State</color>, she gains up to <color=#ee7d7c>4</color> <color=#ffda58>Annihilation Orbs</color> based on her current <color=#ffda58>Annihilation Pts</color> at the bottom of the screen.

Name: Celica
Text: Casting <color=#ffda58>Annihilation Orb</color> under the <color=#ffda58>Annihilation State</color> will summon <color=#ee7d7c>4</color> spikes at the target's location, dealing <color=#ee7d7c>Dark DMG</color> while earning <color=#ee7d7c>10</color> <color=#ffda58>energy</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Under the <color=#ffda58>Annihilation State</color>, Luna's Basic Attack enters <color=#ee7d7c>combo</color> mode, dealing massive <color=#ee7d7c>Dark DMG</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Under the <color=#ffda58>Annihilation State</color>, Luna gains a new dash attack when she <color=#ee7d7c>attacks after a successful dodge</color>, dealing <color=#ee7d7c>Dark DMG</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Under the <color=#ffda58>Annihilation State</color>, every Basic Attack costs <color=#ee7d7c>5</color> <color=#ffda58>Annihilation Pts</color>. Luna will leave the <color=#ffda58>Annihilation State</color> when her <color=#ffda58>Annihilation Pts</color> are reduced to <color=#ee7d7c>0</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>After dodging</color>, <color=#ee7d7c>immediately attack</color> to cast the 3rd hit of Basic Attack directly.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Any 3-Ping</color> will summon a <color=#ffda58>POD</color> to launch missiles at the enemy being attacked.

Name: Celica
Text: Once summoned, the <color=#ffda58>POD</color> will automatically launch missiles to attack the enemy and add <color=#ffda58>POD: Shield</color> to the character.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Any 3-Ping</color> will grant you a high amount of <color=#ffda58>POD: Shield</color>. Note that the <color=#ffda58>capacity</color> of <color=#ffda58>POD: Shield</color> is different from the normal shield of other Constructs.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Berserk Mode</color> will consume a certain percentage of <color=#ffda58>HP</color> every second, and will consume <color=#ffda58>POD: Shield</color> first if <color=#ffda58>POD: Shield</color> is active.

Name: Celica
Text: Free practice

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>POD: Shield</color> can stack up to <color=#ffda58>30%</color> of <color=#ffda58>max HP</color>. Once <color=#ffda58>this shield</color> is fully charged, you can <color=#ee7d7c>cast the Signature Move</color> to enter <color=#ffda58>Berserk Mode</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: When <color=#ffda58>POD: Shield is fully charged</color>, you can immediately <color=#ee7d7c>use Signature Move</color> to enter Berserk Mode.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Berserk Mode</color> will consume <color=#ffda58>POD: Shield</color> first, then consume <color=#ffda58>HP</color> once Shield is exhausted. Once HP drops to <color=#ffda58>60%</color>, Berserk Mode will end automatically.

Name: Celica
Text: End <color=#ffda58>transformation</color> anytime by <color=#ee7d7c>tapping the Signature Move button</color> during <color=#ffda58>Berserk Mode</color>. You become <color=#ffda58>vulnerable</color> and cannot transform again for <color=#ffda58>10s</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Attacking enemies within 4s after a <color=#ee7d7c>Red 3-Ping</color> to initiate <color=#ffda58>Pursuit Stance</color>, dealing damage while knocking down enemies in a small area.

Name: Celica
Text: Perform <color=#ee7d7c>any 3-Ping</color> after a <color=#ee7d7c>Yellow 3-Ping</color> to gain <color=#ffda58>240</color> <color=#ffda58>Stability</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: The <color=#ffda58>240</color> <color=#ffda58>Stability</color> gained from <color=#ee7d7c>any 3-Ping</color> allows the character to enter <color=#ffda58>Battle Stance</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: In <color=#ffda58>Battle Stance</color>, every <color=#ee7d7c>Basic Attack</color> made wil also launch an additional Swordwave.

Name: Celica
Text: In <color=#ffda58>Battle Stance</color>, making a <color=#ee7d7c>Red 2-Ping</color> will gain <color=#ffda58>1</color> stack of Data Correction for 8s, granting Physical DMG Bonus.

Name: Celica
Text: Making a <color=#ee7d7c>Red 3-Ping</color> in <color=#ffda58>Battle Stance</color> will get you <color=#ffda58>2</color> stacks of Data Correction.

Name: Celica
Text: Making a <color=#ee7d7c>Red 1-Ping</color> in <color=#ffda58>Battle Stance</color> will renew the duration of Data Correction.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Use 80 energy</color> to charge and launch multiple attacks. The <color=#ffda58>Signature Move</color> does not consume <color=#ffda58>Stability</color> and will renew the duration of <color=#ffda58>Data Correction</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Free practice

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Data Correction</color> lasts 8s and stacks up to 3 times. Every time a new stack is gained, the duration will be renewed.

Name: Celica
Text: Any <color=#ee7d7c>Red Ping</color> or <color=#ee7d7c>Yellow Ping</color> made in <color=#ffda58>Battle Stance</color> will also launch Swordwave attacks.

Name: Celica
Text: After <color=#ee7d7c>any 3-Ping</color>, if <color=#ffda58>Overclock Energy</color> is greater or equal to <color=#ffda58>50</color>, <color=#ffda58>50</color> <color=#ffda58>Overclock Energy</color> will be consumed to create an <color=#ffda58>Overclock Indicator</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Using the <color=#ffda58>Overclock Indicator</color> will ping all the normal Orbs of the same color.

Name: Celica
Text: The <color=#ffda58>Overclock Indicator</color> will deal increased damage based on the <color=#ffda58>number of same-colored Orbs</color> pinged. When more than <color=#ffda58>2</color> Orbs are pinged, the excess Orbs will be refunded as <color=#ffda58>random Orbs</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Use the <color=#ffda58>Signature Move</color> to hack into the enemy's controller, and deal massive Physical DMG based on the hacking result.

Name: Celica
Text: Free practice

Name: Celica
Text: 9S starts with <color=#ffda58>100</color> <color=#ffda58>Overclock Energy</color> and gains <color=#ffda58>20</color> every second. When <color=#ffda58>Overclock Energy</color> is below <color=#ffda58>50</color>, <color=#ee7d7c>3-Ping</color> will not fill the <color=#ffda58>Overclock Indicator</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Use Attack</color> to thrust forward multiple times, dealing Physical DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Ping Red Orbs</color> to thrust forward multiple times, dealing Physical DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Ping Blue Orbs</color> to summon a <color=#ffda58>POD</color> that creates a gravity field in front, pulling enemies caught inside while dealing Physical DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Ping Yellow Orbs</color> to swipe forward multiple times, dealing Physical DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>While moving, hold the Dodge button to</color> begin <color=#ffda58>sliding</color>. While <color=#ffda58>sliding</color>, multiple enemies will be dragged along, and A2 will gain <color=#ffda58>POD: Shield</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Launch multiple attacks</color> forward with the light weapon, dealing Physical DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Ping Red Orbs</color> to unleash a series of light and heavy attacks, gaining <color=#ffda58>Super Armor</color> while dealing Physical DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Ping Blue Orbs</color> to summon a POD that creates a mirage, gaining <color=#ffda58>Super Armor</color> while dealing Physical DMG to nearby enemies.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Ping Yellow Orbs</color> to gain <color=#ffda58>Super Armor</color> while dealing Physical DMG. Casting this skill will drag the enemies along and those that are directly hit will become Weakened, losing ATK.

Name: Celica
Text: After <color=#ee7d7c>dodging</color> an attack, <color=#ee7d7c>moving</color> the character will make her start <color=#ffda58>Sprinting</color>. While <color=#ffda58>Sprinting</color>, her attacks become <color=#ffda58>Sprint Attacks</color> that charge forward at the enemy while dealing Physical DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Use Attack</color> to launch forward multiple attacks, dealing Physical DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Ping Red Orbs</color> to summon a <color=#ffda58>POD</color> that launches laser attacks, dealing Physical DMG to frontal enemies in a straight line.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Ping Blue Orbs</color> to summon a <color=#ffda58>POD</color> to unleash a circular electric wave forward, damaging the enemy it touches while healing the allies it touches.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Ping Yellow Orbs</color> to summon a <color=#ffda58>POD</color> that creates a circular area in front, slowing the enemies caught inside while dealing Physical DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: After <color=#ee7d7c>dodging</color> an attack, <color=#ee7d7c>moving</color> the character will make her start <color=#ffda58>Sprinting</color>. While <color=#ffda58>Sprinting</color>, her attacks become <color=#ffda58>Sprint Attacks</color> that charge forward at the enemy while dealing Physical DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Blue 3-Ping</color> can trigger the QTE skill of A2 (in blue slot).

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Tap</color> to trigger A2's QTE skill to thrust multiple times. The effect of this skill is enhanced when teamed up with 2B and 9S.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Tap</color> to switch to A2, then make a <color=#ffda58>Blue 3-Ping</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: After A2 enters the game, cast a <color=#ffda58>Blue 3-Ping</color> and summon a <color=#ffda58>POD</color> to gain <color=#ffda58>POD: Shield</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Blue 3-Ping</color> can trigger the QTE skill of 2B (in blue slot).

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Tap</color> to trigger 2B's QTE skill to slash a large area. The effect of this skill is enhanced when teamed up with A2 and 9S.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Tap</color> to switch to 2B, then make a <color=#ffda58>Yellow 3-Ping</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: After 2B enters the game, cast a <color=#ffda58>Yellow 3-Ping</color>, then make <color=#ee7d7c>any 3-Ping</color> to quickly enter the <color=#ffda58>Battle Stance</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Blue 3-Ping</color> can trigger the QTE skill of 9S (in blue slot).

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Tap</color> to trigger 9S's QTE skill to heal teammates. The effect of this skill is enhanced when teamed up with A2 and 2B.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Tap</color> to switch to 9S. Upon entering battle, 9S will cast an <color=#ffda58>Overclock Indicator</color>, but the <color=#ffda58>Overclock Indicator</color> will not ping any normal Orbs of any color.

Name: Celica
Text: Upon entering battle, 9S will cast an <color=#ffda58>Overclock Indicator</color>, but will not ping any normal Orbs of any color.

Name: Celica
Text: The frequency of <color=#ee7d7c>Basic Attacks</color> become faster in Berserk Mode.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Pinging any Orbs</color> in Berserk Mode will launch additional Lightning Attacks at the target, dealing Lightning DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Making any 3-Ping</color> will generate a <color=#ffda58>Triad</color>. The next <color=#ee7d7c>Orb pinged</color> will trigger <color=#ffda58>Chord</color> effect and generate <color=#ffda58>Tune</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: When <color=#ffda58>Triad</color> is active, the <color=#ffda58>Chord Indicator</color> below will display the color of <color=#ee7d7c>the previous 3-Ping</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Ping the Orb</color> again to trigger <color=#ffda58>Chord</color> effect and generate <color=#ffda58>Tune</color> based on the number of Orbs pinged.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>After a 3-Ping, ping</color> <color=#ffda58>same-colored Orbs</color> to apply <color=#ffda58>Concerto</color> on the enemy, reducing their Extra DMG Bonus while dealing Lightning DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: Pinging <color=#ffda58>Orbs of the same color</color> as the <color=#ffda58>Triad</color> will apply <color=#ffda58>Concerto</color> on the enemy.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>After a 3-Ping, ping</color> <color=#ffda58>Orbs of a different color</color> to apply <color=#ffda58>Solo</color> on self, increasing Extra DMG Bonus for a short duration.

Name: Celica
Text: Pinging <color=#ffda58>Orbs of a different color</color> from the <color=#ffda58>Triad</color> will apply <color=#ffda58>Solo</color> on self.

Name: Celica
Text: When activating Chaotic M.I.N.D., Selena gains <color=#ffda58>Staccato</color> based on the amount of <color=#ffda58>Tune</color>. Use <color=#ee7d7c>Basic Attack</color> or <color=#ee7d7c>ping Orbs</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Staccato</color>, dealing Lightning DMG to nearby enemies.

Name: Celica
Text: When Selena has <color=#ffda58>Tune</color>, she can consume <color=#ffda58>60</color> energy to activate Chaotic M.I.N.D. to gain increased movement speed and Extra DMG Reduction, and renew the duration of <color=#ffda58>Solo</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: After <color=#ee7d7c>any 3-Ping</color>, <color=#ee7d7c>press and hold the Basic Attack button</color> to enter <color=#ffda58>Tactical Stance</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Press and hold the Basic Attack button</color> to enter <color=#ffda58>Tactical Stance</color>, shooting the enemy continuously.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Release the Basic Attack button</color> to fire a <color=#ffda58>Blooming Shot</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Follow the <color=#ffda58>guide</color> to enter <color=#ffda58>Tactical Stance</color> and trigger <color=#ffda58>Blooming Shot</color> again.

Name: Celica
Text: When the enemy's attack <color=#ffda58>is about to hit</color> Wanshi, <color=#ee7d7c>release the Basic Attack button</color> to make a backstep that <color=#ffda58>dodges the enemy attack</color>. After a successful dodge, the <color=#ffda58>Blooming Shot</color> will be enhanced.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Release the Basic Attack button</color> now to make a backstep <color=#ffda58>to dodge the enemy attack</color>, and fire the enhanced <color=#ffda58>Blooming Shot</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Use Attack</color> to launch forward multiple attacks, dealing Physical DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Ping Red Orb</color> to deal Physical DMG to the enemy. 3-Ping converts to <color=#ffda58>Ice DMG</color>, can consume <color=#ffda58>50% of the Glorious Shield</color> to add DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Ping Blue Orb</color> to <color=#ffda58>slash</color> the enemy and deal Physical DMG. 3-Ping converts to <color=#ffda58>Ice DMG</color>, can consume <color=#ffda58>50% of the Glorious Shield</color> to add DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Ping Yellow Orb</color> to <color=#ffda58>gather enemies</color> and deal Physical DMG. 3-Ping converts to <color=#ffda58>Ice DMG</color>, consuming <color=#ffda58>50% of the Glorious Shield</color> to add DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: Cast <color=#ffda58>Signature Move</color> to summon Permanent Freezing! <color=#ffda58>Freeze</color> enemies in a large area and deal <color=#ffda58>Ice DMG</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: The <color=#ffda58>left energy bar</color> at the bottom of the screen displays the <color=#ffda58>Glorious Shield Amount</color> of Chrome.

Name: Celica
Text: When the Shield amount is greater than <color=#ffda58>50%</color>, using 3-Ping will <color=#ee7d7c>consume 50% of Shield Amount</color>, increasing <color=#ffda58>Ice DMG</color> and gaining <color=#ffda58>Condensed Frost</color> state for a short while.

Name: Celica
Text: Skill is enhanced when it is casted by <color=#ee7d7c>consuming</color> the <color=#ffda58>Glorious Shield</color>. In <color=#ffda58>Condensed Frost</color> state, Chrome can <color=#ffda58>invalidate attack</color> and make the attacker <color=#ffda58>Slow</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: The <color=#ffda58>right energy bar</color> at the bottom shows the state of Core Energy, which automatically regenerates over <color=#ffda58>time</color>. When filled, <color=#ee7d7c>press and hold the Attack button</color> to enter the <color=#ffda58>Frost Spirit</color> mode.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Press and hold the Attack button</color> to enter <color=#ffda58>Frost Spirit</color> mode, <color=#ee7d7c>collating Signal Orbs</color> and continuously deal <color=#ffda58>Ice DMG</color> to enemies nearby, while reducing the <color=#ffda58>Ice Resistance</color> of enemies.

Name: Celica
Text: In <color=#ffda58>Frost Spirit</color> mode, the Basic Attack becomes the three-strike attack <color=#ffda58>Frost Strike</color>, dealing <color=#ffda58>Ice DMG</color> by attacking and gaining the <color=#ffda58>Condensed Frost</color> effect for a short while.

Name: Celica
Text: In <color=#ffda58>Frost Spirit</color> mode, <color=#ee7d7c>3-Ping</color> increases Ice DMG and is accompanied with <color=#ffda58>Condensed Frost</color> effect <color=#ffda58>without Shield cost</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: When the enemy attacks <color=#ffda58>Chrome: Glory </color>who is in <color=#ffda58>Condensed Frost</color> mode, he can <color=#ee7d7c>invalidate this attack</color> and <color=#ee7d7c>Slow</color> the attacker.

Name: Celica
Text: Gain <color=#ffda58>Condensed Frost</color> effect for any <color=#ee7d7c>attack or 3-Ping</color> to <color=#ee7d7c>defend against the enemies</color>.

Name: Celica

Text: <color=#ffda58>Red Orb 3-Ping</color> and <color=#ffda58>tap Basic Attack</color> during <color=#ffda58>Fire Thunder Form</color> to cast Blazing Spark and receive <color=#ffda58>Aura Value</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Yellow Orb 3-Ping</color> and <color=#ffda58>multi-tap Basic Attack</color> during <color=#ffda58>Fire Thunder Form</color> to cast Double Arcflash and receive <color=#ffda58>Aura Value</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: When <color=#ffda58>Aura Value</color> is full during <color=#ffda58>Fire Thunder Form</color>, <color=#ffda58>press and hold Basic Attack</color> to cast Aura Blast. Summon <color=#ffda58>Corvus</color> to launch a joint attack.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Bramble Angler</color>'s active skill requires charging by <color=#ee7d7c>pinging any 6 Basic Signal Orbs</color>. It can be charged up to <color=#ee7d7c>2 times</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Each <color=#ffda58>basic Signal Orb</color> can accumulate <color=#ee7d7c>1</color> Energy. <color=#ee7d7c>[Glowbait Hunt]</color> can be cast with <color=#ffda58>6</color> Energy.

Name: Celica
Text: Upon casting, <color=#ffda58>Bramble Angler will charge towards the target, gathering surrounding enemies and dealing damage</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Upon casting, <color=#ffda58>Bramble Angler will leap into the air, fire a laser at the target, and then launch a missile to deal damage</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Ping orbs to accumulate <color=#ffda58>Starlight Points</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: After pressing and holding the Yellow Orb and casting <color=#ffda58>Inferno Cyclone</color>, releasing the Yellow Orb to cast <color=#ffda58>Blazing Rift</color> summons Bramble Angler to assist in the attack.

Name: Celica
Text: There is another way to trigger Bramble Angler's <color=#ffda58>Luminous Tornado</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Ping orbs to accumulate <color=#ffda58>Starlight Points</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap the Yellow Orb to transform into the <color=#ffda58>Shield Axe</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: While pressing and holding Basic Attack to cast <color=#ffda58>Meteoric Doom</color>, Bramble Angler is summoned to assist in the attack.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Diamaton</color> requires <color=#ee7d7c>pinging 6 basic Signal Orbs</color> to accumulate energy to cast its Active Skills, which <color=#ee7d7c>can be charged twice</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Each <color=#ffda58>basic Signal Orb</color> can accumulate <color=#ee7d7c>1</color> Energy. <color=#ee7d7c>[Shooting Comet]</color> can be cast with <color=#ffda58>6</color> Energy.

Name: Celica
Text: After casting, <color=#ffda58>Diamaton will crash into the target to deal DMG</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Upon casting, <color=#ffda58>Diamaton will pull in nearby enemies and slam down, dealing DMG</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap Signature to enter <color=#ffda58>Dominator Form</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Repeatedly tapping Dodge After consecutive Red 3-Pings casts <color=#ffda58>Phantom Annihilation</color> and summons Diamaton for a joint attack.

Name: Celica
Text: Each <color=#ffda58>basic Signal Orb</color> can accumulate <color=#ee7d7c>1</color> Energy. <color=#ee7d7c>[Old Dance]</color> can be cast with <color=#ffda58>6</color> Energy.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Billie</color> requires <color=#ee7d7c>pinging 6 basic Signal Orbs</color> to accumulate energy to cast its Active Skills, which <color=#ee7d7c>can be charged twice</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Upon casting, <color=#ffda58>Billie will leap up and fire at the target to deal damage.</color>

Name: Celica
Text: Upon casting, <color=#ffda58>Billie will pull in nearby enemy units and deal damage.</color>

Name: Celica
Text: Tap Signature to enter <color=#ffda58>Crazy Gamble</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Enter <color=#ffda58>Crazy Gamble</color> again.

Name: Celica
Text: The first <color=#ffda58>Night Embrace</color> cast after Crazy Gamble has started will summon Billie to launch a joint attack.

Name: Celica
Text: The first <color=#ffda58>Shadow's Guile</color> cast after Crazy Gamble has started will summon Billie to launch a joint attack.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap Signature again to cast <color=#ffda58>Dreamfall Showdown</color>

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Snow Waltz</color> requires <color=#ee7d7c>pinging 6 basic Signal Orbs</color> to accumulate energy to cast its active skills, which <color=#ee7d7c>can be charged twice</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: After casting, <color=#ffda58>Snow Waltz will slash the target to deal DMG</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: After casting, <color=#ffda58>Snow Waltz will shoot blades to the surroundings and retrieve them, pulling in nearby enemy units and dealing damage.</color>

Name: Celica
Text: Tap Signature to <color=#ffda58>enter the Flow State</color>

Name: Celica
Text: In the Flow State, ping <color=#ffda58>Concerto Orb</color> to earn <color=#ffda58>Melody Points</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: With <color=#ffda58>60 Melody Points</color>, press and hold Dodge to cast <color=#ffda58>Melodic Outburst</color> and then summon Snow Waltz to launch a joint attack.

Name: Celica
Text: Each <color=#ffda58>basic Signal Orb</color> can accumulate <color=#ee7d7c>1</color> Energy. <color=#ee7d7c>[Valiant March]</color> can be cast with <color=#ffda58>6</color> Energy.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Mirage Blades</color> require <color=#ee7d7c>pinging any 6 basic Signal Orbs</color> to accumulate energy to cast their Active Skills, which <color=#ee7d7c>can be charged twice</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Each <color=#ffda58>basic Signal Orb</color> can accumulate <color=#ee7d7c>1</color> Energy. Netherworld Arm skill can be cast with <color=#ee7d7c>6</color> Energy.

Name: Celica
Text: When Netherworld Arm is charged, <color=#ffda58>move the joystick and tap</color> Netherworld Arm to cast <color=#ffda58>Blistering Blades</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: When Netherworld Arm is charged, <color=#ffda58>tap Netherworld Arm without moving the joystick</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Heavy Rain Blades</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Switch to <color=#ffda58>Yamato</color> and cast skills to accumulate <color=#ffda58>DT</color>

Name: Celica
Text: At full <color=#ffda58>SDT</color>, tap Signature to enter the <color=#ffda58>SDT</color> Form.

Name: Celica
Text: <size=26><color=#ffda58>Entering the battlefield for the first time</color> and casting <color=#ffda58>Judgment Cut End</color> will have one joint attack ready in the <color=#ffda58>SDT Form</color>. Then, press and hold Basic Attack to cast <color=#ffda58>Judgment Cut End</color> to summon Mirage Blades to launch a joint attack.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: <size=26>In addition, when you have a <color=#ffda58>joint attack</color> ready, casting <color=#ffda58>Million Stab/Yamato Combo/Uppercut/Beowulf Combo</color> will trigger Mirage Blades' joint attack</size>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Cavaliere</color> require <color=#ee7d7c>pinging any 6 basic Signal Orbs</color> to accumulate energy to cast its Active Skills, which <color=#ee7d7c>can be charged twice</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Each <color=#ffda58>basic Signal Orb</color> can accumulate <color=#ee7d7c>1</color> Energy. <color=#ffda58>[Cavaliere - Full Throttle]</color> can be cast with <color=#ee7d7c>6</color> Energy.

Name: Celica
Text: After casting, <color=#ffda58>deals damage once with Cavaliere - Full Throttle</color>

Name: Celica
Text: After casting, <color=#ffda58>deals damage once with Cavaliere - Air Spin</color>

Name: Celica
Text: <size=24>When Dante carries Cavaliere, tap the <color=#ffda58>uncharged</color> Netherworld Arm button for the first time to cast <color=#ffda58>Cavaliere - Redline</color>. Tap Netherworld Arm continuously or tap Basic Attack to cast <color=#ffda58>Cavaliere - Aerial Combo</color></size>.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap Netherworld Arm during <color=#ffda58>Cavaliere - Redline</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Cavaliere - Aerial Slash</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: During <color=#ffda58>Cavaliere - Aerial Slash</color>, continuously<color=#ffda58>tap Basic Attack</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Cavaliere - Aerial Combo</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Wrathfang</color> requires <color=#ee7d7c>pinging 6 basic Signal Orbs</color> to accumulate energy to cast its active skills, which <color=#ee7d7c>can be charged twice</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Each <color=#ffda58>basic Signal Orb</color> can accumulate <color=#ee7d7c>1</color> Energy. <color=#ee7d7c>[Phantom Pursuit]</color> can be cast with <color=#ffda58>6</color> Energy.

Name: Celica
Text: After casting, <color=#ffda58>Wrathfang will fire laser at the target to deal damage</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Upon casting, <color=#ffda58>Wrathfang will attack the target with the lightblade in its mouth, pulling in nearby enemies and dealing damage</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap Signature to enter <color=#ffda58>Last Blaze</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Making a <color=#ffda58>Red 3-Ping</color> in the <color=#ffda58>Last Blaze status</color> will accumulate <color=#ffda58>Rekindled Doom</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: When <color=#ffda58>Rekindled Doom</color> is full, <color=#ffda58>press and hold Basic Attack</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Hellfire Crucible</color> and summon <color=#ffda58>Wrathfang</color> to launch a joint attack.

Name: Celica
Text: When Netherworld Arm is charged, <color=#ffda58>move the joystick and press and hold</color> Netherworld Arm to cast <color=#ffda58>Storm Blades</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: After casting <color=#ffda58>Storm Blades</color>, <color=#ffda58>tap Netherworld Arm again</color> to unleash Storm Blades.

Name: Celica
Text: When Netherworld Arm is charged, <color=#ffda58>press and hold Netherworld Arm without moving the joystick</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Spiral Blades</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: After casting <color=#ffda58>Spiral Blades</color>, <color=#ffda58>tap Netherworld Arm again</color> to unleash Spiral Blades.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Noctiluca</color> requires <color=#ee7d7c>pinging any 6 basic Signal Orbs</color> to accumulate energy to cast its Active Skills, which <color=#ee7d7c>can be charged twice</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Each <color=#ffda58>basic Signal Orb</color> can accumulate <color=#ee7d7c>1</color> energy. <color=#ffda58>[Piercing Stings]</color> can be cast with <color=#ee7d7c>6</color> energy.

Name: Celica
Text: After casting, <color=#ffda58>Noctiluca will fling needles at the enemy, dealing DMG 11 times</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: After casting, <color=#ffda58>Noctiluca will perform a ramming attack, hitting enemies along the path and dealing DMG</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Ping orbs to accumulate <color=#ffda58>Commandment</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Press and hold <color=#ffda58>Blue Orb</color> until <color=#ffda58>Devouring Sky - Collapsing Twilight</color> is cast and Noctiluca is summoned for a joint attack, dealing Dark DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: Bianca can also summon Noctiluca for a joint attack in <color=#ffda58>Radiance Form</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Ping orbs to accumulate <color=#ffda58>Commandment</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Press and hold <color=#ffda58>Blue Orb</color> until <color=#ffda58>Shattering Sky - Collapsing Radiance</color> is cast and Noctiluca is summoned for a joint attack, dealing Raydiance DMG.

Name: Bianca
Text: Now, let's learn about the <color=#ffda58>Raydiance</color> effect.

Name: Bianca
Text: When <color=#ffda58>Effect: Raydiance</color> is equipped, characters with relevant effects can accumulate <color=#ffda58>Raydiance Value</color> for the team. The <color=#ffda58>Raydiance Value</color> is displayed here.

Name: Bianca
Text: When Bianca is in <color=#ffda58>Radiance Form</color>, Yellow 3-Pings will accumulate <color=#ffda58>Commandment</color> and <color=#ffda58>Raydiance Value</color>.

Name: Bianca
Text: Press and hold Blue Orb to cast <color=#ffda58>Sword Dance</color>. Keep holding Blue Orb to cast <color=#ffda58>Shattering Sky - Collapsing Radiance</color> and accumulate <color=#ffda58>Raydiance Value</color> during so.

Name: Bianca
Text: When the <color=#ffda58>Raydiance Gauge</color> is full, tap Signature to cast <color=#ffda58>Ember Extinction</color> and enter <color=#ffda58>Radiant Baptism</color> Form immediately, gaining 10 stacks of <color=#ffda58>Radiant Crown</color> and dealing <color=#ffda58>Raydiance DMG</color>.

Name: Bianca
Text: When the team activates <color=#ffda58>the Radiant Baptism Form, corresponding characters can consume<color=#ffda58> Radiant Crown to enhance certain skills.

Name: Bianca
Text: When Bianca is in <color=#ffda58>Radiance Form</color>, Yellow 3-Pings will accumulate <color=#ffda58>Commandment</color>.

Name: Bianca
Text: <size=29>Pinging Blue Orb now will consume <color=#ffda58>Radiant Crown</color> stacks and deal extra <color=#ffda58>Raydiance DMG</color>. Keep holding Blue Orb to cast <color=#ffda58>Shattering Sky - Collapsing Radiance</color>, dealing <color=#ffda58>Raydiance DMG</color>.</size>

Name: Bianca
Text: Consuming <color=#ffda58>Radiant Crown</color> stacks will grant <color=#ffda58>Prayer</color>, increasing the DMG of the next <color=#ffda58>Signature Move</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Scaled Rampart</color> requires <color=#ee7d7c>pinging any 6 basic signal orbs</color> to accumulate energy to cast its active skills, which <color=#ee7d7c>can be charged twice</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Each <color=#ffda58>basic Signal Orb</color> can accumulate <color=#ee7d7c>1</color> Energy. <color=#ee7d7c>[Bone Resonance]</color> can be cast with <color=#ffda58>6</color> Energy.

Name: Celica
Text: After casting, <color=#ffda58>Scaled Rampart splits into two shield pieces and performs consecutive slashes, dealing multi-hit DMG</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: After casting, <color=#ffda58>Scaled Rampart transforms into a shield that pulls enemies and can block one attack within a short period of time. A successful block triggers a fan-shaped counterattack.</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Cast Signature to enter <color=#ffda58>Execution</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: While in <color=#ffda58>Execution Mode</color>, pinging Red Orbs grants <color=#ffda58>Purge Value</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: When you have <color=#ffda58>Purge Value</color>, hold Yellow Orbs to cast <color=#ffda58>Thunder Surge</color>, summon <color=#ffda58>Scaled Rampart</color> for coordinated attacks, and increase subsequent Signature DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: Scaled Rampart has another joint attack mode.

Name: Celica
Text: Cast Signature to enter <color=#ffda58>Execution</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: While in <color=#ffda58>Execution Mode</color>, tap Yellow Orbs to cast <color=#ffda58>Heavy Edge</color> and clear Red Orbs. When clearing <color=#ffda58>9 or more</color> Red Orbs in a single instance, gain <color=#ffda58>Sin Mark</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: When you have <color=#ffda58>Sin Mark</color>, tap Yellow Orbs to cast <color=#ffda58>Piercing Judgment</color>, summon <color=#ffda58>Scaled Rampart</color> for coordinated attacks, and increase subsequent Signature DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Levvi</color> requires <color=#ee7d7c>pinging any 6 basic signal orbs </color> to accumulate energy to cast its Active Skills, which <color=#ee7d7c>can be charged twice</color>

Name: Celica
Text: Each <color=#ffda58>basic Signal Orb</color> can accumulate <color=#ee7d7c>1</color> Energy. <color=#ffda58>[Lightning Breath]</color> can be cast with <color=#ee7d7c>6</color> Energy.

Name: Celica
Text: After casting, <color=#ffda58>Levvi releases Lightning Orbs that deal DMG 5 times when hitting targets</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: After casting, <color=#ffda58>Levvi will dive toward the target location and explode on impact, dealing DMG 3 times</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Cast Signature to enter <color=#ffda58>Dream Dive</color>

Name: Celica
Text: Ping Blue Orbs to gain Mirror Blade Orbs.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Press and hold Dodge</color> to consume Mirror Blade Orbs and cast <color=#ffda58>Thousand Rays</color>, summoning Levvi to launch a joint attack.

Name: Celica
Text: Levvi has another joint attack mode.

Name: Celica
Text: During Dream Dive, ping 4 Mirror Blade Orbs in a row to summon Levvi for joint attacks.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Use Attack</color> to launch forward multiple attacks, dealing Physical DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Ping a Red Orb</color> to deal Physical DMG. Deal <color=#ffda58>Lightning DMG</color> instead when unleashing a 3-Ping.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Ping a Blue Orb</color> to deal Physical DMG. Deal <color=#ffda58>Lightning DMG</color> instead when unleashing a 3-Ping.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Ping a Yellow Orb</color> to deal Physical DMG. Deal <color=#ffda58>Lightning DMG</color> instead when unleashing a 3-Ping.

Name: Celica
Text: Cast a lance by casting <color=#ffda58>Signature Move</color> to deal <color=#ffda58>Lightning DMG</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Cast <color=#ffda58>Spear Lunge</color> by unleashing Basic Attack after <color=#ffda58>any 3-Ping</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Cast <color=#ffda58>Spear Lunge</color> by unleashing Basic Attack after a <color=#ffda58>Red Orb 3-Ping</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Cast <color=#ffda58>Spear Lunge</color> by unleashing Basic Attack after a <color=#ffda58>Blue Orb 3-Ping</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Cast <color=#ffda58>Spear Lunge</color> by unleashing Basic Attack after a <color=#ffda58>Yellow Orb 3-Ping</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: This is the stacks of <color=#ffda58>Electric Charge</color>. When there is at least 1 stack, press and hold Basic Attack to unleash <color=#ffda58>Lightning Fall</color> and reset stacking.

Name: Celica
Text: First, unleash a 3-Ping to activate Vera: Garnet's <color=#ffda58>QTE Skill</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Vera: Garnet's QTE Skill will leave behind a <color=#ffda58>Victorious War Flag</color> for 8s, continuously dealing DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Tap</color> to change to Vera: Garnet.

Name: Celica
Text: When Vera: Garnet is upgraded to <color=#ffda58>SSS+ rank</color>, Lightning Fall will come with a <color=#ffda58>Shield</color> equal to 20% of max HP and increase the Lightning DMG dealt.

Name: Celica
Text: When Vera: Garnet is upgraded to <color=#ffda58>SS rank</color>, <color=#ffda58>Lightning Fall</color> can be used right after casting <color=#ffda58>Signature Move - Shining Piercer</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Press and hold Basic Attack to unleash <color=#ffda58>Lightning Fall</color>. (The more <color=#ffda58>Electric Charge</color> is stacked, the higher the DMG.)

Name: Celica
Text: Use Basic Attack twice, then tap White Signal Orb to use combo 1 - <color=#ffda58>Frenzied Dance</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Use Basic Attack 3 times, then tap White Signal Orb to use combo 2 - <color=#ffda58>Dazzling Blade</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Use Basic Attack 4 times, then tap White Signal Orb to use combo 3 - <color=#ffda58>Quenched Chain</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Combos can generate <color=#ffda58>Deception Points</color>. Roland's Signal Orbs all need to consume Deception Points.

Name: Celica
Text: When Roland has sufficient <color=#ffda58>Deception Points</color>, quickly tap the Signal Orb to launch a second hit.

Name: Celica
Text: Now try the Blue Orb combo.

Name: Celica
Text: The combo button can be tapped before the last attacking action completes.

Name: Celica
Text: Roland's Signature Move grants him <color=#ffda58>Trickery Points</color> to enhance Basic Attacks and Signal Orb skills at the cost of Trickery Points.

Name: Celica
Text: Once Roland equips his <color=#ffda58>unique weapon "Durendal"</color>, he can use White Signal Orb to unleash combo 2 - <color=#ffda58>Dazzling Blade</color> after dodging an incoming damage.

Name: Celica
Text: After an Extreme Dodge, Roland can use any orb <color=#ffda58>without cost</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Gain 1 bonus <color=#ffda58>Incinerating Orb</color> after Signature Move

Name: Celica
Text: 罗兰·戏炎提升到SS阶时，极限闪避后可以<color=#ffda58>无消耗</color>使用三次信号球

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Use Attack</color> to launch forward multiple attacks, dealing Physical DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: Ping Red Orb(s) to deal Physical DMG. Liv: Empyrea will deal <color=#ffda58>Fire DMG</color> instead upon a 3-Ping.

Name: Celica
Text: Ping Blue Orb(s) to deal area damage and an <color=#ffda58>Imprison</color> effect based on the number of orb(s) pinged. Liv: Empyrea will deal <color=#ffda58>Fire DMG</color> instead upon a 3-Ping.

Name: Celica
Text: Ping Yellow Orb(s) to deal Physical DMG and make Liv: Empyrea <color=#ee7d7c>dash in the direction of the joystick</color>. Liv: Empyrea will deal <color=#ffda58>Fire DMG</color> instead upon a 3-Ping.

Name: Celica
Text: Liv: Empyrea's Core Passive requires Prayer to trigger

Name: Celica
Text: Accumulate Prayer from basic attacks and pings

Name: Celica
Text: Upon full Prayer, fast double tap the <color=#ee7d7c>Dodge</color> button to enter <color=#ee7d7c>Prayer</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Insert an orb of a different color in Prayer form to use Chaos Oath.

Name: Celica
Text: Inserting an orb of a different color will pull and deal damage to enemies and deal slight damage to Liv: Empyrea. Perform an Extreme Dodge to dodge the damage to Liv: Empyrea and enter Matrix.

Name: Celica
Text: Perform a Signature Move and restore Prayer to full to insert Signal Orb(s) of any color 3 times.

Name: Celica
