Text: Upon full Prayer, fast double tap the <color=#ee7d7c>Dodge</color> button to enter <color=#ee7d7c>Prayer</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: The number of Prayer amplification stacks is displayed here. The higher the number, the more damage Liv: Empyrea will deal.

Name: Celica
Text: Perform a Signature Move to gain full Chant Energy and restore 1 Signal Orb every second. Fast double tap the <color=#ee7d7c>Dodge</color> button to enter <color=#ee7d7c>Hyper-Chant</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Can insert Signal Orbs 3 times at most. The more Hyper-Chant stacks (up to 12 stacks), the more damage Liv: Empyrea can deal.

Name: Celica
Text: Perform a 3-Ping first to trigger Liv: Empyrea's <color=#ffda58>QTE Skill</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Liv: Empyrea's QTE Skill will deal <color=#ffda58>Fire DMG</color> and provide <color=#ffda58>healing</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: When Empyrea carries <color=#ee7d7c>Elizabeth</color> 4-Piece Set, team members' 3-Pings can stack up <color=#ee7d7c>White Fire</color>. Then, switch to Empyrea to deal burst damage.

Name: Celica
Text: 丽芙·极昼达到SS阶时，极限闪避附赠4层增幅的祷告（优先选择已有信号球的颜色）

Name: Celica
Text: Accumulate Prayer from basic attacks and pings

Name: Celica
Text: Can insert Signal Orb(s) twice at most when in Prayer form with each time inserting a 1-Ping/2-Ping/3-Ping to grant Core Passive 1-stack/2-stack/4-stack damage amplification.

Name: Celica
Text: Perform a Signature Move and restore Prayer to full to insert Signal Orb(s) of any color 3 times.

Name: Celica
Text: Insert Signal Orb(s) to trigger Prayer Ripples to imprison and deal damage to enemies and heal allies.

Name: Celica
Text: Press and hold the joystick to move around after any 3-Ping to cast <color=#ee7d7c>Meteor Staccato</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Casting the Signature Move will grant 5 <color=#ee7d7c>Shooting Stars</color>. Shooting Star + moving the joystick will cast <color=#ee7d7c>Meteor Staccato</color>. The Signature Move will leave behind a phantom upon finish, healing nearby units over time.

Name: Celica
Text: Try to cast <color=#ee7d7c>Meteor Staccato</color> 5 times during the Signature Move.

Name: Celica
Text: To boost Selena: Capriccio's damage output up to the maximum, you can use her with Tenebrion and use the Tank frame's attacks to reduce the targets' <color=#ee7d7c>Extra DMG Reduction</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: SS阶暗能进入<color=#ffda58>暗影状态</color>后可以削减更多暗属性抗性

Name: Celica
Text: Change to <color=#ee7d7c>Selena: Capriccio</color> and enter the battlefield.

Name: Celica
Text: Accumulate Signature Energy with 3-Pings.

Name: Celica
Text: Accumulate Signature Energy with 3-Pings to cast the Signature Move.

Name: Celica
Text: Selena: Capriccio's QTE triggered during a Ping can <color=#ffda58>heal</color> the characters on the field and deal damage.

Name: Celica
Text: When dealing damage, use Tenebrion's QTE to <color=#ffda58>reduce Dark Resistance</color> and deal damage.

Name: Celica
Text: Kamui: Tenebrion will gain additional Energy via 3-Pings.

Name: Celica
Text: When the Energy is enough, the <color=#ffda58>Dark Form</color> will be triggered. All skill forms will change and Super Armor will be granted.

Name: Celica
Text: The <color=#ffda58>Dark Form</color> will consume a certain amount of Energy every second and will be removed when all Energy is consumed.

Name: Celica
Text: Luminance's Blue Orbs will mark all enemies. When attacking a marked enemy, Luminance has a 20% chance to trigger <color=#ffda58>Light Penalty</color> and deal Physical DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: Try to trigger <color=#ffda58>Light Penalty</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Light Penalty</color> will inflict 1 stack of mark every time it is triggered. Upon causing a 3-Ping or triggering <color=#ffda58>Light Penalty</color> 5 times, Luminance will restore HP for allies around her.

Name: Celica
Text: Luminance's Yellow Orbs will increase Basic Attack phases and damage. Attack marked enemies will be more likely to trigger <color=#ffda58>Light Penalty</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: The Signature Move will create an Energy Area, granting allies 75% Extra DMG Reduction and casting <color=#ffda58>Light Penalty</color> to random enemies within range.

Name: Celica
Text: Upon causing any 3-Ping, Lee: Entropy can follow it up with a Red Orb to fire barrage continuously and deal Physical DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: The <color=#ffda58>Signature Move</color> will also summon Ranged Energy Cannon fire support.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Fast tap Basic Attack</color> to launch Energy Cannon attacks.

Name: Celica
Text: Karenina: Ember will gain Thermal Energy from dealing <color=#ffda58>3-Pings</color> and <color=#ffda58>casting Signature Moves</color>. She will gain a Fire DMG Bonus upon 50% Thermal Energy.

Name: Celica
Text: Accumulate <color=#ffda58>Thermal Energy</color> via 3-Pings to above 50%.

Name: Celica
Text: Thermal Energy will start to decrease once it goes beyond 50%, so please keep it above a certain level.

Name: Celica
Text: The <color=#ffda58>Signature Move</color> will shoot laser beams at the ground and leave burning paths.

Name: Celica
Text: Nanami: Pulse will gain a <color=#ffda58>Shield</color> and deal DMG from Blue Orb 3-Pings. She will have Super Armor when the Shield is active.

Name: Celica
Text: Use the <color=#ffda58>Signature Move</color> to dash toward the target, dealing Fire DMG to enemies on the path and entering the Overclock Mode: Basic Attacks deal Fire DMG instead and reduce the target's Fire Resistance by 15%.

Name: Celica
Text: Follow up a Blue Orb 3-Ping with any 3-Ping to enter the <color=#ffda58>Blade Will</color> mode, turn Signal Orbs into Sword Orbs, and gain 2 Sword Orbs.

Name: Celica
Text: Clear the Swordwave Orbs and deal massive Physical DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: Use the <color=#ffda58>Signature Move</color> to slash and attack the enemy in front.

Name: Celica
Text: Follow up a Red Orb 3-Ping with any Blue Orb 3-Ping to enter the <color=#ffda58>targeted</color> mode.

Name: Celica
Text: Launch Basic Attacks to shoot lightning arrows and deal Lightning DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: Use the <color=#ffda58>Signature Move</color> to shoot arrows to the air and trigger a lightning strike. And then, after a short delay, another lightning strike will be triggered.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Lucia: Plume</color> can restore Energy and accumulate <color=#ffda58>Signature Points</color> via 3-Pings. (Each 3-Ping in Normal Form grants only up to 2 points.)

Name: Celica
Text: You can switch from the Normal Form to the <color=#ffda58>Arctic Form</color> at any time. Signal Orbs will be rearranged upon full Energy.

Name: Celica
Text: The Arctic Form consumes Energy over time. Lucia will deal more Ice DMG before the Energy runs out.

Name: Celica
Text: Lucia can also accumulate <color=#ffda58>Signature Points</color> via 3-Pings in the Arctic Form. <color=#ffda58>Signature Points</color> are capped at 4.

Name: Celica
Text: Lucia can cast Signature - Halcyonic Blossoms in the Arctic Form with more than 1 <color=#ffda58>Signature Point</color>. The more <color=#ffda58>Signature Points</color>, the higher the damage.

Name: Celica
Text: Camu: Crocotta can <color=#ffda58>stacks up Madness</color> via any 3-Ping in the normal mode.

Name: Celica
Text: Accumulate 3 stacks of <color=#ffda58>Madness</color> via 3-Pings. When <color=#ffda58>Madness</color> is fully stacked, deal another 3-Ping to gain 8 additional Signature Energy.

Name: Celica
Text: Use the Signature Move to enter the <color=#ffda58>Berserk Mode</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: The <color=#ffda58>Berserk Mode</color> will grant Dark Energy, which will diminish over time. It will also be consumed to mitigate the damage received.

Name: Celica
Text: Special Signal Orbs are used in the <color=#ffda58>Berserk Mode</color>. And Signal Orb pings will be calculated as 3-Pings and the Signal Orbs pinged will be restored in 2s.

Name: Celica
Text: Rosetta can have up to 3 <color=#ffda58>Energy Spheres</color>. Any 3-Ping will consume 1 <color=#ffda58>Energy Sphere</color> to enhance skills and grant DMG Bonus.

Name: Celica
Text: Any 3-Ping will consume 1 <color=#ffda58>Energy Sphere</color> to enhance skills and grant DMG Bonus.

Name: Celica
Text: Upon using up all <color=#ffda58>Energy Spheres</color>, Rosetta will enter the Full Burst form, and the charged attack will change to <color=#ffda58>Wide-Area Electromagnetic Cannon</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Press and hold Basic Attack and upon fully charged, cast <color=#ffda58>Wide-Area Electromagnetic Cannon</color>. And Rosetta will restore 3 Energy Spheres 8s later.

Name: Celica
Text: The <color=#ffda58>Signature Move</color> will consume up to 2 Energy Spheres. Rosetta will gain DMG Bonus based on the number of Energy Sphere(s) consumed.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Qu: Pavo</color> accumulates <color=#ffda58>Sync Rate</color> via pings. Signal Orbs will be enhanced upon full Sync Rate.

Name: Celica
Text: Gain <color=#ffda58>Sync Rate</color> via pings. Signal Orbs will be enhanced upon full Sync Rate.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Enhanced Orbs</color> can only be pinged individually. Each time an Enhanced Orb is cleared, the 3-Ping equivalent skill will be cast along with the Concentrated Will effect. Pinging an Enhanced Orb will consume Sync Rate, and Qu cannot gain Energy from it.

Name: Celica
Text: Upon clearing the Enhanced Orbs, Qu will enter the Concentration Mode and lose Sync Rate over time.

Name: Celica
Text: Use the Signature Move to summon <color=#ffda58>Huiyu</color> and cast the Combo Skill. And then <color=#ffda58>Huiyu</color> will keep attacking the target. Qu will not be able to cast the Signature Move when <color=#ffda58>Huiyu</color> is on the field.

Name: Celica
Text: The Signature Move will also grant 60 Sync Rate and make Qu enter the Concentration Mode.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Billie</color> requires <color=#ee7d7c>pinging 6 basic Signal Orbs</color> to accumulate energy to cast its Active Skills, which <color=#ee7d7c>can be charged twice</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Pulao: Dragontoll</color> needs to accumulate Energy to cast the Signature Move and throw Dragon Axe.

Name: Celica
Text: Use the Signature Move <color=#ffda58>Spirit Blade: Dragon Throw</color> to throw Dragon Axe.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Pulao: Dragontoll</color> will catch Dragon Axe and throw it again and will be invincible during the process.

Name: Celica
Text: Catch Dragon Axe with any ping, trigger the <color=#ffda58>Dragon Force Combo</color>, and then follow up with Basic Attacks.

Name: Celica
Text: Accumulate <color=#ffda58>Dragon Force</color> with Basic Attacks/pings. And then cast the Dragon Force Combo by consuming <color=#ffda58>Dragon Force</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: With Dragon Axe on the field and enough Energy, press and hold the Signature button to cast the <color=#ffda58>Spirit Blade: Falling Stars</color> and deal area DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: First, trigger <color=#ee7d7c>Pulao: Dragontoll's</color> <color=#ffda58>QTE Skill</color> with a 3-Ping.

Name: Celica
Text: When Dragon Axe is not on the field, <color=#ee7d7c>Pulao: Dragontoll</color>'s QTE will <color=#ffda58>summon Dragon Axe</color> to deal DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: 曲·雀翎释放必杀时，SS阶以上的<color=#ee7d7c>蒲牢·华钟</color>可以获得一定的<color=#ffda58>必杀能量</color>和<color=#ffda58>龙劲点数</color>

Name: Celica
Text: Upon entering the field, <color=#ee7d7c>Pulao: Dragontoll</color> will throw Dragon Axe without the cost of Energy. Upon max Signature Energy, she will directly cast <color=#ffda58>Spirit Blade: Falling Stars</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Accumulate Signature Energy, and when the Signature button lights up, press and hold the button to cast <color=#ffda58>Spirit Blade: Falling Stars</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: When Pulao equips the exclusive 4-Piece Memory Set, she can remove her own Hit status by summoning back Dragon Axe.

Name: Celica
Text: If Pulao fails to catch Dragon Axe, it will spin around the field. Tap the Signature button at any time to <color=#ffda58>summon back Dragon Axe</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: When <color=#ee7d7c>Pulao: Dragontoll</color> reaches the S+ rank, she will create <color=#ffda58>Dragon Cloudspring</color> after casting <color=#ffda58>Spirit Blade: Falling Stars</color> that grants Kowloong units Critical DMG Bonus and Physical DMG Bonus.

Name: Celica
Text: Attack to reduce the enemy's <color=#FF821C>Finisher Gauge</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: The <color=#FF821C>Finisher Gauge</color> is the orange bar under the HP bar. The more DMG a <color=#ffda58>Uniframe</color> deals, the more Finisher Gauge value will be reduced.

Name: Celica
Text: Reduce the <color=#FF821C>Finisher Gauge</color> value to 0.

Name: Celica
Text: When the <color=#FF821C>Finisher Gauge</color> is empty, the Uniframe will finish the enemy. <color=#ffda58>Get close to the enemy</color> and tap Basic Attack to finish them.

Name: Celica
Text: Get close to the enemy to finish them.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap <color=#ffda58>Basic Attack</color> next to the enemy to finish them.

Name: Celica
Text: When the enemy casts an All-out Attack, a blue cross warning will appear. If the Uniframe successfully responds to the attack with a <color=#ee7d7c>Speed Attack</color>, the enemy's Finisher Gauge value will be reduced.

Name: Celica
Text: Before an All-out Attack hits its target, <color=#ffda58>hold</color> the Dodge button to cast a <color=#ee7d7c>Speed Attack</color>. (Holding the Dodge button will reduce the Dodge Gauge value.)

Name: Celica
Text: Launch any attack to <color=#ee7d7c>parry</color> the enemy's attack when applicable. And if you succeed, the enemy's Finisher Gauge value will be reduced.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Cast Attack</color> to launch multiple strikes forward, dealing Fire DMG. Upon hitting an enemy, press and hold Attack to cast continuous attacks with <color=#ee7d7c>Chainsaw</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Yellow Orb pings</color> will fire Quantum Compression Shots, which will explode and deal Fire DMG upon hitting the target. <color=#ee7d7c>3-Pings</color> will increase the damage multiplier.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Blue Orb pings</color> will fire missiles to deal Fire DMG. 3-Pings will fire <color=#ffda58>additional missiles</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Red Orb pings</color> will deal Fire DMG. 3-Pings will <color=#ffda58>restore additional Signature Energy</color> and <color=#ffda58>pull enemies</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Dodge</color> and <color=#ffda58>move the joystick</color> to enter the <color=#ffda58>Slide Mode</color>. You can also enter the Slide Mode by moving the joystick upon a Yellow or Blue Orb 3-Ping.

Name: Celica
Text: The <color=#ffda58>Slide Mode</color> will consume Dodge value over time and increase the Signal Orb cast speed.

Name: Celica
Text: Pings and Basic Attacks in the normal mode will grant Energy. You can cast <color=#ffda58>Blade Flash</color> when Energy is full.

Name: Celica
Text: Casting Signature Move activates <color=#ffda58>"Rumbling" Mode</color>, during which orbs cannot be pinged, and pressing and holding Basic Attack activates <color=#ffda58>"Bzzz" Mode</color> and casts <color=#ffda58>Ironsoul Slice</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: You will trigger different follow-up attacks based on the <color=#ffda58>timing</color> of you releasing your finger when casting "Ironsoul Slice". Press and hold until the <color=#ffda58>middle of the gauge</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>"Oops! Missed it!"</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Press and hold until the right sect of the gauge to cast <color=#ffda58>"Perfect!"</color>. But if you release after the cap is reached, you will cast <color=#ffda58>"Oops! Missed it!"</color> instead.

Name: Celica
Text: Accumulate Pressure via Ironsoul Slice. <color=#ffda58>After 200</color> Pressure, press and hold Basic Attack until <color=#ffda58>the cap is reached</color> to trigger <color=#ffda58>Burning Blow</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Ironsoul Slice will also restore <color=#ffda58>Signature Energy</color>. When Signature Energy is full, you can cast <color=#ffda58>Gigabyte Star Strike</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: First, trigger <color=#ee7d7c>Nanami: Starfarer's</color> <color=#ffda58>QTE Skill</color> with a 3-Ping.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Starfarer's</color> QTE will <color=#ffda58>summon Power to hammer the ground</color>. When equipped with her <color=#ee7d7c>exclusive Memory Unimate</color>, Starfarer will also reduce the enemy's <color=#ee7d7c>Fire Resistance</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: When <color=#ee7d7c>Nanami: Starfarer</color> is equipped with <color=#ee7d7c>6★ Exclusive Weapon Implosion</color>, her <color=#ffda58>Signature Energy</color> will be restored by her teammates' <color=#ee7d7c>3-Pings</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: With the Energy accumulated from her teammates' 3-Pings, <color=#ee7d7c>Nanami: Starfarer</color> can perform her Signature Move much faster after being deployed on the field.

Name: Celica
Text: Fast accumulate Signature Energy via <color=#ee7d7c>3-Pings and Basic Attacks</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Blade Flash</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: After <color=#ee7d7c>Nanami: Starfarer</color> reaches her SSS-Rank, pressing and holding until the limit is reached when Starfarer is in the <color=#ee7d7c>"Rumbling" Mode</color> will automatically trigger <color=#ee7d7c>Perfect!</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Ping Yellow Orb(s)</color> to deal Physical DMG and dash forward. 3-Pings will deal <color=#ffda58>Ice DMG</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Ping Blue Orb(s)</color> to slash and deal Physical DMG and then jump back, swipe with frost and ice, and deals Ice DMG. Slashes triggered by 3-Pings will deal <color=#ffda58>Ice DMG</color> instead.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Ping Red Orb(s)</color> to spin, deal Physical DMG, and pull nearby enemies. 3-Pings will deal <color=#ffda58>Ice DMG</color> instead.

Name: Celica
Text: Accumulate Energy to trigger <color=#ffda58>Haicma: Starveil's</color> Signature Move <color=#ffda58>Frost-Treated Blade</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Press and hold Dodge to cast <color=#ffda58>Huntress' Command</color> <color=#ffda58>by consuming Dodge Gauge value</color>. When Huntress' Command is active, <color=#ffda58>Dodge Gauge value cannot be restored.</color>

Name: Celica
Text: In this process, <color=#ffda58>pressing and holding Dodge</color> will gradually accumulate <color=#ffda58>Bitterfrost Level</color>, and <color=#ffda58>getting hit will reduce Bitterfrost Level</color> and Dodge Gauge to perform Flash, distancing Haicma from enemies.

Name: Celica
Text: When Bitterfrost Level is <color=#ffda58>fully charged</color>, release to cast <color=#ffda58>Bitter Frost</color> to slash targets in a big area. Give it a go and cast <color=#ffda58>Bitter Frost</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: When the <color=#ffda58>Signature Move is active</color>, all damage dealt will be converted into <color=#ffda58>Ice DMG</color>, and the <color=#ffda58>Froststream Level on the left of the Signature button</color> will be charged.

Name: Celica
Text: Based on the Froststream Level <color=#ffda58>charged</color>, cast the Signature <color=#ffda58>Quench</color> to deal damage and send the enemy into the <color=#ffda58>Frozen Status</color> for a certain amount of time.

Name: Celica
Text: First, perform a Blue Orb 3-Ping to trigger Haicma: Starveil's QTE Skill <color=#ffda58>Rimefall</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: When casting her QTE Skill, <color=#ffda58>Starveil</color> will <color=#ffda58>descend from above and create a Frost Terrain</color> to deal Ice DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: 隐星达到<color=#ffda58>SSS</color>品质时，<color=#ffda58>每次</color>切换入场均可获得<color=#ffda58>30点必杀能量</color>

Name: Celica
Text: Gain Energy from Pings and Basic Attacks, and take advantage of bonus Energy granted by character entering the field to cast the Signature Move much faster.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>造成伤害</color>可为必杀按钮旁的<color=#ffda58>霜流进程充能</color>；角色达到<color=#ffda58>SS</color>品质，霜流进程会<color=#ffda58>缓慢自动充能</color>

Name: Celica
Text: <size=24>Equip <color=#ffda58>6★ Exclusive Weapon Galatea</color> to <color=#ffda58>charge the Core Passive at double speed</color>. Equipping the 6-Piece Set of <color=#ffda58>Isabel</color> can <color=#ffda58>double Core Passive Bitter Frost damage</color> against <color=#ffda58>Frozen enemies</color>.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: 角色达到<color=#ffda58>SSS+</color>品质时，<color=#ffda58>触发超算</color>也会<color=#ffda58>封冻所有敌人</color>

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Lucia: Dawn</color> has a total of 3 different Leap Skills.

Name: Celica
Text: The Leap Skill <color=#ffda58>Vortex Flurry</color> enhances Dawn's <color=#ffda58>Red Orb skill</color> [Lotus - Flurry]. <color=#ffda58>Activating this skill</color> will also increase the Extra DMG Bonus of 3-Pings.

Name: Celica
Text: After <color=#ffda58>Vortex Flurry</color> reaches <color=#ffda58>Lv.9</color>, Red Orb 3-Pings will additionally have the <color=#ffda58>pull</color> effect.

Name: Celica
Text: When <color=#ffda58>Vortex Flurry</color> reaches <color=#ffda58>Lv.18</color>, <color=#ffda58>holding Basic Attack</color> after a 3-Ping will perform [Iaido - Deadly Slash].

Name: Celica
Text: The skill <color=#ffda58>Thunder Kill Realm</color> enhances Dawn's <color=#ffda58>Core Passive</color> [Lotus - Lightning Dance]. <color=#ffda58>Activating this skill</color> will also increase the lightning's Extra DMG Bonus.

Name: Celica
Text: Pinging <color=#ffda58>Yellow Orbs</color> and <color=#ffda58>Blue Orbs</color> can mark enemies. When <color=#ffda58>Thunder Kill Realm</color> reaches <color=#ffda58>Lv.9</color>, it will increase the chance of Lightning Lure (which will become <color=#ffda58>100%</color> with 3 marks).

Name: Celica
Text: The skill <color=#ffda58>Glow Lotus Blade</color> enhances Dawn's <color=#ffda58>Signature Move</color> [Lotus Blade]. <color=#ffda58>Activating this skill</color> will further increase all DMG dealt after casting the Signature Move.

Name: Celica
Text: When <color=#ffda58>Glow Lotus Blade</color> reaches <color=#ffda58>Lv.9</color>, Signature Energy will be automatically restored after <color=#ffda58>casting the Signature Move</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: When <color=#ffda58>Glow Lotus Blade</color> reaches <color=#ffda58>Lv.18</color>, <color=#ffda58>Lotus Blade's energy</color> will not reduce even when Dawn is on standby.

Name: Celica
Text: Lotus Blade's energy <color=#ffda58>will not reduce</color> when Dawn is switched back.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Lee: Palefire</color> has 3 Leap Skills, among which <color=#ffda58>Bipolar Expansion</color> enhances the <color=#ffda58>Yellow Orb skill</color> [Infernal Shot] and the <color=#ffda58>Blue Orb skill</color> [Magnetic Shot].

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Bipolar Expansion</color> increases the Yellow Orb skill's Explosion DMG and inflicts <color=#ffda58>Burn</color> on enemies for continuous DMG (applicable to the DMG Bonus of <color=#ffda58>Wolf Fang</color> and from character's rank-up).

Name: Celica
Text: When <color=#ffda58>Bipolar Expansion</color> reaches <color=#ffda58>Lv.9</color>, pinging <color=#ffda58>Blue Orbs</color> can extend the enemy's <color=#ffda58>Burn</color> duration.

Name: Celica
Text: When <color=#ffda58>Bipolar Expansion</color> reaches <color=#ffda58>Lv.18</color>, the <color=#ffda58>Yellow Orb skill</color> will deal <color=#ffda58>100%</color> more DMG to enemies with <color=#ffda58>Burn</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: The Leap Skill <color=#ffda58>Center Axis Relock</color> enhances Palefire's <color=#ffda58>Core Passive</color> [Controlling Bullet]. With <color=#ffda58>this skill activated</color>, Palefire will enter <color=#ffda58>Blasting Mode</color> after [Controlling Bullet] is triggered.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Blasting Mode</color> lasts 5s, during which Palefire will move faster and <color=#ffda58>convert all his DMG dealt into Fire DMG</color> with greater destructive power.

Name: Celica
Text: While in <color=#ffda58>Blasting Mode</color>, pinging Yellow Orbs or Blue Orbs can <color=#ffda58>dodge</color> sideways to avoid incoming attacks and slightly increase Blasting Mode's duration.

Name: Celica
Text: When <color=#ffda58>Center Axis Relock</color> reaches <color=#ffda58>Lv.9</color>, each shot will grant <color=#ffda58>1 Energy</color> and <color=#ffda58>pinging orbs will generate double Energy</color> in <color=#ffda58>Blasting Mode</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: When <color=#ffda58>Center Axis Relock</color> reaches <color=#ffda58>Lv.18</color>, Evasive Shot can be cast in <color=#ffda58>Blasting Mode</color> by consuming <color=#ffda58>double Dodge Gauge</color>. <color=#ffda58>Successful dodge will return half of the Dodge Gauge consumed.</color>

Name: Celica
Text: The skill <color=#ffda58>Flaming Cyclone</color> enhances Palefire's <color=#ffda58>Signature Move</color> [360° Shooting]. <color=#ffda58>Activating this skill</color> will <color=#ffda58>convert its DMG into Fire DMG</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: When <color=#ffda58>Flaming Cyclone</color> reaches <color=#ffda58>Lv.9</color>, performing the Signature Move will also <color=#ffda58>pull in the enemies continuously</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: When <color=#ffda58>Flaming Cyclone</color> reaches <color=#ffda58>Lv.18</color>, performing the Signature Move in <color=#ffda58>Blasting Mode</color> will increase its DMG by <color=#ffda58>40%</color> and inflict <color=#ffda58>Burn</color> on the enemies.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Luminance</color> has a total of 3 Leap Skills that can enhance her <color=#ffda58>Core Passive</color>, <color=#ffda58>Signature Move</color>, and <color=#ffda58>QTE</color>. These Leap Skills will even gain <color=#ffda58>additional effects</color> when <color=#ffda58>the character is ranked up</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Sacred Chain</color> enhances Luminance's <color=#ffda58>Core Passive</color> [Goddess Connection System]. <color=#ffda58>With this skill activated</color>, <color=#ffda58>3-Pings</color> will also trigger the <color=#ffda58>Light Penalty</color> effect.

Name: Celica
Text: Every time <color=#ffda58>Light Penalty</color> is triggered to deal Physical DMG, the count will increase by 1. Triggering it <color=#ffda58>5 times</color> will restore nearby allies' HP.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Sacred Chain</color> will enhance <color=#ffda58>every 5th</color> Light Penalty into <color=#ffda58>Divine Penalty</color>, which can deal up to 400% Light Penalty DMG based on the Leap Skill's level.

Name: Celica
Text: <size=24>When <color=#ffda58>Sacred Chain</color> reaches <color=#ffda58>Lv.9</color>, <color=#ffda58>attacking enemies marked by the Blue Orb skill</color> will have a <color=#ffda58>50%</color> (instead of 20%) chance to trigger Light Penalty, and healing will also grant the targets <color=#ffda58>Ultralimit Torque</color>.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: When <color=#ffda58>Sacred Chain</color> reaches <color=#ffda58>Lv.18</color>, each <color=#ffda58>Divine Penalty</color> will give the next deployed character <color=#ffda58>15% CRIT Rate</color> for 10s (can be stacked up to <color=#ffda58>5 times</color>).

Name: Celica
Text: <size=24>若<color=#ffda58>圣域链路</color>达到<color=#ffda58>18级</color>，再使<color=#ffda58>治疗效果</color>提升被治疗目标<color=#ffda58>20%暴击伤害</color>；角色品质达到<color=#ffda58>SSS</color>，再使自身首次入场时获得100必杀能量</size>

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Divine Rage Field</color> enhances Luminance's <color=#ffda58>Signature Move</color> [Arcadia Gate].

Name: Celica
Text: When <color=#ffda58>Divine Rage Field</color> reaches <color=#ffda58>Lv.9</color>, performing the Signature Move will <color=#ffda58>continuously pull the enemies</color> and increase Divine Penalty's Base DMG by 10%.

Name: Celica
Text: When <color=#ffda58>Divine Rage Field</color> reaches <color=#ffda58>Lv.18</color>, Luminance gains <color=#ffda58>40 Energy</color> whenever she is deployed and <color=#ffda58>is able to be switched to other characters while her Signature Move is active</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <size=24>还会强化<color=#ffda58>SSS+</color>被动<color=#ffda58>意识鼓舞</color>：使得释放必杀后提供<color=#ffda58>15秒</color>的15%全伤害加成（原为5秒），<color=#ffda58>并对后台角色生效</color>；再使<color=#ffda58>神罚伤害提升25%</color></size>

Name: Celica
Text: When <color=#ffda58>Sacred Chain</color> reaches <color=#ffda58>Lv.18</color>, each <color=#ffda58>Divine/Light Penalty</color> will give the next deployed character <color=#ffda58>15%/5% (up to <color=#ffda58>75%</color>) CRIT Rate</color> for 10s.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>超限力矩</color>：<color=#ffda58>获得10%物理伤害加成</color>，持续8秒；技能达到18级且角色品质达到<color=#ffda58>SS</color>，加成提升至<color=#ffda58>20%</color>

Name: Celica
Text: When <color=#ffda58>Spiritual Prayer Dance</color> reaches Lv.9, QTE healing triggers additional <color=#ffda58>Light Penalty</color> that deals Core Passive DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: When <color=#ffda58>Spiritual Prayer Dance</color> reaches Lv.18, <color=#ffda58>Luminance</color> gains 12 <color=#ffda58>Signature Energy</color> from her QTE healing.

Name: Celica
Text: 若角色品质达到<color=#ffda58>SS</color>，再使<color=#ffda58>超限力矩</color>的物理伤害加成提升至<color=#ffda58>20%</color>

Name: Celica
Text: Luminance can provide <color=#ffda58>a great boost</color> for the next deployed character's <color=#ffda58>Physical DMG output</color> by <color=#ffda58>repeatedly triggering Light Penalty and Divine Penalty with her Signature Move and Signal Orb skills</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <size=27><color=#ffda58>After the skill is activated</color>, <color=#ffda58>pinging orbs</color> when the Signature Move is active can trigger <color=#ffda58>Light Penalty 1 to 3 times</color> based on the number of orbs pinged, and Light Penalty deals 30% more DMG.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: Luminance's <color=#ffda58>Spiritual Prayer Dance</color> can enhance her QTE's healing amount and grant <color=#ffda58>Ultralimit Torque</color> to the targets healed.

Name: Celica
Text: [Shining Wings] Skill Effect: Lv.9 — Casts QTE to pull enemies. Lv.18 — Casts QTE to restore Signature Energy.

Name: Celica
Text: [Eradication of Sins] Skill Effect: Lv.9 — Rigor gains 10 Signature Energy every upon entering the battlefield.

Name: Celica
Text: [Eradication of Sins] Skill Effect Lv.1 — Casts Signature to activate QTEs that are not in cooldown

Name: Celica
Text: [Eradication of Sins] <size=22>Skill Effect Lv.18 — Upon casting Signature, <color=#ffda58>press and hold Basic Attack</color> to charge and cast Low/Mid-power/Wide-area Electromagnetic Cannon based on the charge time and whether your character is in the Full Burst Form or not. Your character is invincible during casting the skill.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: [Raging Surge] Skill Effect <size=28>Lv.9 — The Wide-area Electromagnetic Cannon has Electromagnetic Storm that can pull enemies around here to the linear attack range before firing any shots.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: Rigor's Leap will enhance her common mechanism with [Shining Wings], her Signature Move with [Eradication of Sins], and her Core Passive with [Raging Surge].

Name: Celica
Text: First, trigger <color=#ffda58>Rosetta: Rigor</color> <color=#ffda58>QTE Skill</color> with a 3-Ping.

Name: Celica
Text: [Raging Surge] Skill Effect <size=20>Lv.18 — The Electromagnetic Cannon restores extra Signature Energy. After using the <color=#ffda58>Wide-area Electromagnetic Cannon</color>, enters the Overloaded status and continuously spends Electricity for 4s, during which all enhancement effects that consume Energy will be triggered.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Tap the Basic Attack button</color> to perform a 5-hit combo forward and deal Dark DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Ping Red Orbs</color> to dash forward and sweep the enemies, dealing wide area Dark DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Ping Blue Orbs</color> to fire a gravity shot forward with the cannon form, dealing Dark DMG and pulling the enemies in a straight line.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Ping Yellow Orbs</color> to fire a gravity shot against the ground to deal Dark DMG, pull nearby enemies and slow down their movement for a short time, and gain a small amount of Shield.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Chain Blast</color>: When performing the <color=#ffda58>Yellow Orb</color> and <color=#ffda58>Blue Orb</color> skills, ping <color=#ffda58>Yellow or Blue Orbs</color> quickly to continue attacking.

Name: Celica
Text: Pinging orbs repeatedly after pinging Blue Orbs can trigger <color=#ffda58>Scire's Blue Orb skill Meteor Track</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Pinging orbs repeatedly after pinging Yellow Orb can trigger <color=#ffda58>Scire's Yellow Orb skill Gravity Beacon</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <size=27><color=#ffda58>Karenina: Scire's</color> Signature Move <color=#ffda58>Starshatter Horizon</color> can deal massive DMG to the enemies. <color=#ffda58>The stage timer will stop during the Signature Move's animation.</color></size>

Name: Celica
Text: When <color=#ffda58>Scire</color> has a set of 3-Ping Orbs, holding Basic Attack will start charging and <color=#ffda58>automatically trigger</color> 3-Pings to <color=#ffda58>perform Leap Attack</color>. Scire gains Super Armor and high DMG Reduction when charging up.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>20 Anti-gravity Energy</color> will generate for <color=#ee7d7c>each set of 3-Ping Orbs consumed</color> (can store up to 40 Anti-gravity Energy).

Name: Celica
Text: <size=24>When <color=#ffda58>Scire</color> has a set of 3-Ping Orbs, holding Basic Attack will start charging and <color=#ffda58>automatically consume</color> the 3-Ping Orbs to <color=#ffda58>unleash Leap Attack</color>. With Scire's exclusive Memory <color=#ffda58>Boone</color> equipped, Leap Attack and Radiant Whirlwind will deal even more significant damage!</size>

Name: Celica
Text: When Scire has additional 3-Ping Orbs, charging by holding Basic Attack can <color=#ffda58>automatically consume</color> up to 2 sets of 3-Ping Orbs to <color=#ffda58>unleash an even more powerful Leap Attack</color>. These pings are considered to be 3-Pings.

Name: Celica
Text: <size=24>After leaping up into the air with <color=#ffda58>Leap Attack</color>, <color=#ffda58>tapping Basic Attack repeatedly</color> will perform Radiant Whirlwind, with which Kinetic Energy can be accumulated gradually. Upon <color=#ffda58>landing</color>, Scire can <color=#ffda58>leap into the air again with Gravity Overload</color> by consuming 20 Anti-gravity Energy.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: After performing <color=#ffda58>Leap Attack</color> to leap up into the air, <color=#ffda58>Airborne Spin</color> can still be cast by <color=#ffda58>consuming double Dodge Gauge</color>. Scire will even restore <color=#ffda58>20 Anti-gravity Energy</color> for every 10s!

Name: Celica
Text: <size=24>After entering <color=#ffda58>Matrix</color>, if Scire has 3-Ping Orbs, Leap Attack can be charged by <color=#ffda58>triggering Matrix's enhanced orb effect</color> (which is considered to consume a set of 3-Ping Orbs) instead of manually pinging orbs.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: After leaping into the air with <color=#ffda58>Leap Attack</color>, the Signature Move <color=#ffda58>Starshatter Horizon</color> can be cast in the Anti-gravity status (Anti-gravity Energy will be empty afterwards).

Name: Celica
Text: First off, trigger <color=#ffda58>Karenina: Scire's QTE Skill</color> with a 3-Ping.

Name: Celica
Text: <size=27><color=#ffda58>Scire's</color> QTE is <color=#ffda58>smash the ground to deal Dark DMG</color> and reduce the enemy's <color=#ffda58>Dark Resistance</color> with the Chain Fusion effect. If Scire is equipped with the 6★ Weapon <color=#ffda58>Illuminare</color>, the <color=#ffda58>Resistance Reduction effect will increase by another 10%</color>.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>卡列尼娜·辉晓</color>达到SSS3品质后，其他角色<color=#ffda58>释放必杀</color>会使辉晓获得1组3消球

Name: Celica
Text: <size=24>切换<color=#ffda58>卡列尼娜·辉晓</color>入场后，可通过队友必杀提供的信号球加速释放核心被动；角色品质达到<color=#ffda58>SSS+</color>，每次角色入场时再获取一组3消球</size>

Name: Celica
Text: <size=24><color=#ffda58>卡列尼娜·辉晓</color>达到SS品质且有一组3消后，长按普攻进入蓄力状态会<color=#ffda58>重排信号球</color>，且<color=#ffda58>造成任意伤害</color>会施加<color=#ffda58>连锁聚变</color>效果；<color=#ffda58>暗寂闪光</color>还会提升<color=#ffda58>20%跃升击伤害</color></size>

Name: Celica
Text: <size=24><color=#ffda58>卡列尼娜·辉晓</color>达到SS3、SSS3品质，各自允许跃升击蓄力时<color=#ffda58>额外融入一组信号球</color>；浮空释放<color=#ffda58>辉耀旋击</color>时，<color=#ffda58>暗寂闪光</color>会持续提供必杀能量</size>

Name: Celica
Text: <size=24><color=#ffda58>卡列尼娜·辉晓</color>达到SSS品质，额外提供<color=#ffda58>5%</color>抗性削减，且<color=#ffda58>浮空状态下</color>暗属性伤害提升<color=#ffda58>10%</color>；品质达到SSS6，辉耀旋击动能将自动增加，并提升<color=#ffda58>30%</color>辉耀旋击伤害</size>

Name: Celica
Text: <size=24><color=#ffda58>卡列尼娜·辉晓</color>达到SS3品质，必杀会生成持续<color=#ffda58>15秒</color>的力场，力场对进入其中的怪物造成最多<color=#ffda58>1次</color>伤害，并施加持续10秒的<color=#ffda58>连锁聚变</color>效果</size>

Name: Celica
Text: <size=24><color=#ffda58>卡列尼娜·辉晓</color>装备专属意识时，<color=#ffda58>反重力状态下</color>释放<color=#ffda58>必杀</color>将依据动能值额外造成伤害，最多<color=#ffda58>提升200%</color>；达到SSS+品质，必杀额外伤害加成提升<color=#ffda58>40%</color></size>

Name: Celica
Text: A <color=#ffda58>Blue 3-Ping</color> will trigger an enemy-pulling effect.

Name: Celica
Text: Upon a <color=#ffda58>Blue 3-Ping</color>, <color=#ffda58>Shadow Blade's</color> Extra DMG Bonus increases by <color=#ffda58>20%</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Satellite Blade Lv.1 Effect: While in <color=#ffda58>Enhanced Shadow</color> Form, Astral will restore 100 Dodge Gauge when Trailblade hits the target.

Name: Celica
Text: <size=24>Collapsed Origin Lv.9: During Signature Move, the Core Passive timer will be paused and Signature Move Base DMG increases by <color=#ffda58>10%</color>. Lv. 18: When performing Signature Move in Enhanced Shadow Form, each attack will deal an additional <color=#ffda58>150%</color> Dark DMG.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: <size=27><color=#ffda58>Astral</color> has 3 Leap Skills to enhance his Blue Orb skill <color=#ffda58>(Meteor Reverberation)</color>, Core Passive <color=#ffda58>(Satellite Blade)</color>, and Signature Move <color=#ffda58>(Collapsed Origin)</color>.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: <size=27>Astral's <color=#ffda58>Meteor Reverberation</color> enhances his Blue Orb skill's effect. Astral will pull in enemies upon a Blue 3-Ping. Pinging Blue Orbs can also extend the duration of Enhanced Shadow Form.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: Astral's <color=#ffda58>Satellite Blade</color> enhances his Core Passive by adding the <color=#ffda58>Shadow Blade</color> and <color=#ffda58>Dark Blade</color> effects.

Name: Celica
Text: Astral's <color=#ffda58>Collapsed Origin</color> enhances his Signature Move's effect. When performing Signature Move, his Core Passive's duration will cease reducing and additional Dark DMG will be dealt.

Name: Celica
Text: <size=21>Satellite Blade Lv.18 Effect: While in Enhanced Shadow Form, <color=#ffda58>holding Basic Attack</color> after dodging or pinging Red Orbs will trigger Dark Blade that deals Dark DMG based on the number of Shadow Blades on the target hit. When this damage reaches the 6th hit, the duration of Enhanced Shadow Form extends by <color=#ffda58>2s</color> and each hit will deal more DMG.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: When <color=#ffda58>Blue Orbs are pinged</color>, Enhanced Shadow Form will be extended by <color=#ffda58>1</color>s.

Name: Celica
Text: Satellite Blade Lv.1 Effect: While in <color=#ffda58>Enhanced Shadow</color> Form, Trailblade will leave 2 <color=#ffda58>Shadow Blades</color> on hit, each dealing Dark DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ee7d7c>Tap Basic Attack</color> to deal Physical DMG with a 5-hit attack.

Name: Celica
Text: <size=27>When <color=#ffda58>Red Orbs are pinged</color>, Arca will rapidly charge forward while performing a spinning attack to deal Physical DMG. If it's a <color=#ffda58>3-Ping</color>, a Combo Strike will be triggered to perform a cross slash that deals Lightning DMG instead.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: <size=20><color=#ffda58>Upon a Blue Orb Ping</color>, carves a path with the Rev Blade on the ground to trigger a burst of Energy, leaving multiple plasma torrents on the path. <color=#ffda58>Upon a Blue Orb 3-Ping</color>, a branch skill will be triggered. Astral will leap up and thrust the sword into the ground while landing and convert damage into Lightning DMG.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: <size=27>When <color=#ffda58>Yellow Orbs are pinged</color>, Arca will leap backward and fling a magnetic storm generator to deal Physical DMG. If it's a <color=#ffda58>3-Ping</color>, a Combo Strike will be triggered to perform a charged slash that deals Lightning DMG instead.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Stop tapping Basic Attack</color> or <color=#ffda58>keep tapping it for a period of time</color> after a 3-Ping, and Arca will automatically unleash his Gear-Break Combo.

Name: Celica
Text: Arca has 3 chargeable gauges. From top to bottom, <color=#ffda58>Gear Level</color>, <color=#ffda58>Rising Energy</color>, and <color=#ffda58>Rotational Speed</color>. I will now explain how <color=#ffda58>Rising Energy</color> works.

Name: Celica
Text: <size=27>Upon any 3-Ping, <color=#ffda58>tapping Basic Attack</color> can charge Rising Energy. The more Rising Energy Arca has, the more DMG his Combo Strike will deal. <color=#ffda58>Rising Energy will be cleared</color> after triggering a Combo Strike.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: <size=33>When Gear Level is <color=#ffda58>below 3</color>, every time a Combo Strike is triggered, the Rising Energy charged will be <color=#ffda58>converted</color> into Rotational Speed. If the Rising Energy charged before triggering the next Combo Strike is <color=#ffda58>greater</color> than Rotational Speed, Gear Level goes up by 1.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: <size=27>Upon a 3-Ping, <color=#ffda58>tapping Basic Attack</color> can charge Rising Energy. If the Rising Energy charged is <color=#ffda58>greater</color> than Rotational Speed, triggering a Combo Strike will charge up Rotational Speed and increase Gear Level.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: When at <color=#ffda58>Gear Lv.3</color>, triggering a Combo Strike will <color=#ffda58>reset</color> Rotational Speed and Gear Level to deal massive DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: When <color=#ffda58>Signature Move is tapped</color>, Arca will advance swiftly and come to an abrupt halt, unleashing all the energy in Rev Blade to perform a powerful strike that deals Lightning DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: Upon a Red Orb <color=#ffda58>1-Ping or 2-Ping</color>, launches two piercing attacks and deals Physical DMG to the target.

Name: Celica
Text: Upon a Red Orb <color=#ffda58>3-Ping</color>, launches five piercing attacks and deals Physical DMG to the target.

Name: Celica
Text: <size=24><color=#ffda58>Upon a Blue Orb ping</color>, launches a spinning slash that deals Physical DMG to the target and briefly pulls enemies within range, then throws the Swordstaff out to generate a sword shadow that continuously spins and slashes nearby enemies, dealing Physical DMG.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Upon a Yellow Orb ping</color>, dashes forward to launch a horizontal slash and an upward thrust that knocks the enemy into the air, dealing Physical DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: In <color=#ffda58>Staff Form</color>, keep tapping Basic Attack to launch a 5-hit attack with the Swordstaff.

Name: Celica
Text: <size=38>Upon entering <color=#ffda58>Staff Form</color>, a set of Afterglow Orbs will be generated above the Signal Orb Bar. <color=#ee7d7c>Adjacent Afterglow Orbs of the same color can be consumed</color> when Luminous Realm is active.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: <size=38>Stigmata is unable to trigger Matrix via dodge. While in <color=#ffda58>Staff Form</color>, <color=#ffda58>holding Dodge</color> will trigger Simulated Matrix instead to activate Luminous Realm for 4s with 12s cooldown.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: <size=33><color=#ffda58>After entering Luminous Realm</color>, when Signal Orbs are pinged, the <color=#ee7d7c>adjacent Afterglow Orbs of the same color</color> will also be consumed and <color=#ffda58>Afterglow Points</color> will be granted.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Press and hold Dodge</color> to trigger Luminous Realm, during which pinging orbs will generate Afterglow Points.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>When Stigmata's Signature Move is active</color>, all Afterglow Points accumulated via her Core Passive will be consumed for the Afterglow Enhancement effect, and her Basic Attack will inflict the <color=#ffda58>Afterglow Shadow</color> effect.

Name: Celica
Text: <size=25><color=#ffda58>Tap Signature</color> to activate <color=#ffda58>Sword Form</color>, during which all attacks stack up <color=#ffda58>Stigmata Will</color> and Stigmata has <color=#ffda58>Super Armor</color>. While Afterglow Enhancement is active, Basic Attacks inflict the <color=#ffda58>Afterglow Shadow</color> effect and deal additional Physical DMG.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: <size=27>In <color=#ffda58>Sword Form</color>, Resolution will be triggered with the <color=#ffda58>4th hit of the Basic Attack</color>. <color=#ffda58>Press and hold Basic Attack</color> to launch an upward thrust attack. Keep pressing and holding Basic Attack to follow up with a 3-hit <color=#ffda58>Sword Dance</color>.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: In <color=#ffda58>Sword Form</color>, <color=#ffda58>a successful dodge</color> will also trigger Resolution.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Press and hold Basic Attack</color> to launch an upward thrust attack. And then keep pressing and holding Basic Attack to follow up with a 3-hit <color=#ffda58>Sword Dance</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Dodge</color> the enemy's attack first.

Name: Celica
Text: In <color=#ffda58>Sword Form</color>, at full Signature Energy, <color=#ffda58>tap Signature</color> to spend all Stigmata Will and cast Illuminated Abyss, during which Time Lag Calculation will also be triggered.

Name: Vanessa
Text: When <color=#ffda58>Red Orbs are pinged</color>, Bambinata will step forward and hurl a large number of threads to deal DMG to enemies within a small area.

Name: Vanessa
Text: When <color=#ffda58>Blue Orbs are pinged</color>, Bambinata will leap into the air and perform 2 spinning attacks to deal DMG.

Name: Vanessa
Text: When <color=#ffda58>Yellow Orbs are pinged</color>, Bambinata will swiftly glide toward the enemy and slash them to deal DMG.

Name: Vanessa
Text: Bambinata is able to deal a chain of Physical DMG with kicks and thread attacks.

Name: Celica
Text: I'll be the one in charge of your M.I.N.D. Connection like usual, Commandant.

Name: Vanessa
Text: What's with this face? I'm naturally the one who knows Bambinata better than anyone else.

Name: Vanessa
Text: Ready or not, it's time to start.

Name: Vanessa
Text: Bambinata gains Jete Points from <color=#ffda58>pinging orbs</color>. <color=#ffda58>Press and hold Basic Attack</color> to control Bambinata with Jete Points.

Name: Vanessa
Text: Pinging orbs grants <color=#ffda58>40/80/160</color> Jete Points (up to <color=#ffda58>160</color>).

Name: Vanessa
Text: By <color=#ffda58>holding Basic Attack</color>, when Bambinata is <color=#ff0000>attacked</color>, she will <color=#ffda58>automatically dodge</color> the attack with all Jete Points.

Name: Vanessa
Text: When dodging, pinging orbs will trigger <color=#ffda58>more Follow-Up DMG</color> (<color=#ffda58>Amnesia</color> will be additionally activated upon a <color=#ffda58>3-Ping</color>).

Name: Vanessa
Text: <size=33>By <color=#ffda58>holding and releasing Basic Attack</color>, Bambinata will be pulled into the air consuming <color=#ffda58>all Jete Points</color>, after which pinging orbs will trigger Follow-Up Attacks (Amnesia will be activated upon a <color=#ffda58>3-Ping</color>).</size>

Name: Vanessa
Text: I never thought there'd be a day when even Chief needed an instructor.

Name: Vanessa
Text: When Strings On Me is active, if Bambinata <color=#ffda58>successfully dodges attacks</color> by holding and releasing Basic Attack, pinging orbs can trigger <color=#ffda58>more Follow-Up DMG</color>.

Name: Vanessa
Text: The colors of the Signal Orbs Bambinata can get are shown above the Energy bar. If all are grayed out, no orbs will be generated. This can be recovered by performing Signature Move.

Name: Vanessa
Text: <size=25>Tap the Signature button and Bambinata will perform enhanced Signature based on the number of orb colors she has forgotten. Signature Move also <color=#ffda58>returns</color> forgotten Signal Orbs with recovered colors. It will deal additional Ice DMG <color=#ffda58>If all colors are forgotten</color>.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Pinging Red Orbs</color> will make Lee slide and shoot. A 3-Ping will trigger additional backstep shots. The sliding action can also dodge incoming attacks.

Name: Celica
Text: <size=27><color=#ffda58>Pinging Yellow Orbs</color> allows Lee to glide to the enemy's back while unleashing a rain of shots. An additional turnaround kick will be triggered upon a 3-Ping. This glide has the same effect as dodging.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Pinging Blue Orbs</color> will make Lee throw the firearm case at the enemy and unleash a blast after catching it back in mid-air, dealing Fire DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: Lee: Hyperreal can use the submachine gun and firearm case to launch a 5-hit attack.

Name: Celica
Text: <size=30>This is the Hypermatrix Gauge. It will automatically recover. The red and yellow marks on the top left of the gauge represent the colors of the 3-Ping Orbs pinged <color=#ffda58>outside Hypermatrix</color>.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: Up to <color=#ffda58>3</color> sets of 3-Ping Orbs pinged <color=#ffda58>outside Hypermatrix</color> will be recorded. They can be reobtained <color=#ff0000>within Hypermatrix</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <size=30>When the cooldown of Hypermatrix ends (Hypermatrix Gauge is full), <color=#ffda58>press and hold Basic Attack</color> to activate Hypermatrix and replace all Blue Orbs with Red or Yellow Orbs.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: <size=29>Tap Basic Attack within <color=#ffda58>Hypermatrix</color> to deal Fire DMG, pull enemies in and <color=#ffda58>restore the recorded Signal Orbs</color>.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: <size=29>In <color=#ffda58>Hypermatrix</color>, Red Orbs are enhanced: <color=#ffda58>Red Orb 3-Pings</color> will make Lee smash the ground and summon his alternative selves to shoot and cause an explosion, generating <color=#ffda58>1 Sight Point</color>.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: <size=29>In <color=#ffda58>Hypermatrix</color>, Yellow Orbs are enhanced: <color=#ffda58>Yellow Orb 3-Pings</color> will summon multiple alternative selves to fire rapid shots, generating <color=#ffda58>1 Sight Point</color>.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: <size=35>Any 3-Ping made in <color=#ffda58>Hypermatrix</color> will generate 1 Sight Point, up to 4.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: <size=29>In <color=#ffda58>Hypermatrix</color>, <color=#ffda58>press and hold Basic Attack</color> to consume 1 Sight Point to deal AOE Fire DMG and <color=#ffda58>extend</color> the duration of Hypermatrix.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: First, enter Hypermatrix. Press and hold Basic Attack after a Blue Orb 3-Ping to trigger it.

Name: Celica
Text: In <color=#ffda58>Hypermatrix</color>, <color=#ffda58>tapping Signature Move will consume all Sight Points</color> and leave Hypermatrix, dealing massive DMG based on the number of Sight Points consumed.

Name: Celica
Text: Outside <color=#ff0000>Hypermatrix</color>, <color=#ffda58>tapping Signature Move</color> will consume <color=#ffda58>90</color> Signature Energy to deal Fire DMG to targets in a large area.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Tap Basic Attack</color> to swing the Beam Gunlance continuously to strike the target multiple times.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Ping Red Orbs</color> to slide around the target and deal Ice DMG to the targets encircled.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Ping Yellow Orbs</color> to fire "Yellow Paint" forward, dealing Ice DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Ping Blue Orbs</color> to splash "Blue Paint" forward, dealing Ice DMG to targets in the range.

Name: Celica
Text: The left side of the energy bar is the Main Color that is filled up <color=#ffda58>by default</color>, while the right side shows the Secondary Color that is currently unfilled. Making a <color=#ffda58>3-Ping</color> will fill the Secondary Color with <color=#ffda58>the same color as the orbs pinged</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <size=27>When the Main Color and Secondary Color are <color=#ffda58>different</color>, <color=#ffda58>press and hold Basic Attack</color> to cast Color Mix: Clash of Concepts that increases Ayla's Extra DMG and clears the Secondary Color. <color=#ffda58>The Main Color remains unaffected.</color></size>

Name: Celica
Text: <size=25>When the Main Color and Secondary Color are <color=#ffda58>the same</color>, <color=#ffda58>press and hold Basic Attack</color> to cast Pure Color: Theme Emphasis that increases Ayla's Ice DMG Bonus and clears the Secondary Color. <color=#ffda58>The Main Color also changes.</color></size>

Name: Celica
Text: After casting Pure Color: Theme Emphasis or Color Mix: Clash of Concepts, Ayla will store 1 "Backup Paint" that has the same color as the Main Color, up to 3.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Tap Signature</color> to consume 80 Signature Energy and activate <color=#ffda58>the Painter's Realm</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <size=24>When Ayla pings an orb within <color=#ffda58>the Painter's Realm</color>, she will ride the Beam Gunlance and draw a colorful trail, damaging the target hit and <color=#ffda58>consuming 1 Backup Paint to gain a set of 3-Ping Orbs of the same color.</color></size>

Name: Celica
Text: Within <color=#ffda58>the Painter's Realm</color>, each <color=#ffda58>3-Ping</color> will increase the DMG of <color=#ffda58>Signature - Finishing Touch</color> by 20%, up to 5 times.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Tap Signature</color> to cast Signature - Finishing Touch.

Name: Celica
Text: <size=28>Casting the signature at <color=#ff0000>maximum Overclock Points</color> will make Vera enter the <color=#ff0000>Darkness Form</color> and create a <color=#ff0000>Night Field</color>.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: <size=28>In the <color=#ff0000>Darkness Form</color>, <color=#ff0000>press and hold Basic Attack to </color>convert all orbs into Darkness Orbs. <color=#ff0000>Tap a Darkness Orb</color> to cast Dark Night Slash, up to 4 times.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: <size=28><color=#ff0000>After casting 4 hits of Dark Night Slash</color>, <color=#ff0000>tap Signature to </color>unleash Dark Night's End and leave the Darkness Form.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: <size=28>First, use a <color=#ff0000>Blue Orb 3-Ping</color> to mark the enemy. When Night Field or Dark Field is present, Core Attacks/Dark Night Slashes will trigger explosions and healing when they <color=#ff0000>hit a marked target</color>.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: <size=35>After <color=#ff0000>Rozen is switched out</color>, she will continue to cast Core Attacks to enemies inside the Night Field/Dark Field periodically. The Infernal Scorchmarks on enemies will also trigger explosions and healing.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: <size=28>Rozen's Leap will enhance her Blue Orbs with <color=#ffda58>[Scorching Peril]</color>, her Signature Move with <color=#ffda58>[Void of Darkness]</color>, and her Core Passive with <color=#ffda58>[Illusive Disruption]</color>.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: <size=28>After leaving the Darkness Form, the remaining Darkness Orbs will be converted into up to 3 Blue Orbs. Use a Blue Orb 3-Ping to mark the enemy.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: First, accumulate Energy to cast <color=#ffda58>Weave: Splashing Thunder</color>. This will switch Crimson Weave's weapon to <color=#ffda58>the odachi</color>).

Name: Celica
Text: After the <color=#ffda58>4th hit</color> of Basic Attack, <color=#ffda58>pause for a moment</color>. When the blade <color=#ffda58>flashes</color>, tap Basic Attack repeatedly to unleash <color=#ffda58>swordwaves</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: After pinging Signal Orbs, wait till the blade flashes and then tap Basic Attack repeatedly to unleash swordwaves.

Name: Celica
Text: After <color=#ffda58>tapping Dodge</color>, wait until the sword <color=#ffda58>flashes</color> and then tap Basic Attack repeatedly to unleash <color=#ffda58>swordwaves</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: With <size=28><color=#ffda58>the odachi</color> in <color=#ff0000>Selfless Stance</color>, <color=#ffda58>press and hold Basic Attack</color> to cast Unquenchable Flare and spend all Aphotic Points to increase <color=#ffda58>the DMG of Thunderous Bash</color>, a downward slash.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: While <color=#ffda58>holding the odachi</color>, spend <color=#ffda58>70</color> Energy to cast <color=#ffda58>Weave: Karmic Inferno</color> and switch to <color=#ffda58>the kodachi</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Crimson Weave will use <color=#ffda58>the kodachi </color> to launch a 5-hit Basic Attack.

Name: Celica
Text: Crimson Weave can accumulate up to <color=#ffda58>120</color> Blade Aura through <color=#ffda58>Pings or Sundered Delusion (performed by pressing and holding Dodge)</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: While <color=#ffda58>holding the kodachi</color>, Crimson Weave can only use <color=#ffda58>Blue Orb</color> skills. Ping Blue Orbs to quickly slash at enemies.

Name: Celica
Text: Casting Resolute Blow at <color=#ffda58>full Blade Aura</color> will grant <color=#ffda58>25</color>Energy and empty all Blade Aura.

Name: Celica
Text: Consume <color=#ffda58>20</color> Energy to deal Lightning DMG in a wide area and <color=#ffda58>switch to the odachi</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: While <color=#ffda58>holding the odachi</color>, Crimson Weave can only use <color=#ffda58>Red and Yellow Orb</color> skills. Use her Red Orb skill to charge at enemies and cut them down.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Ping Yellow Orbs</color> to unleash a succession of broad sweeping slashes at enemies.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Aphotic Points</color> can be gained by <color=#ffda58>pinging Orbs, unleashing swordwaves, or launching Resolute Blow at full Blade Aura</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <size=33><color=#ffda58>Press and hold Dodge</color> to continuously gain Blade Aura. <color=#ffda58>Release Dodge</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Resolute Blow</color>. If cast at <color=#ffda58>full Blade Aura</color>, it activates <color=#ff0000>Selfless Stance</color>.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Tap Basic Attack</color> consecutively to make Hanying swing her fan and dance, launching multiple hits against the enemy.

Name: Celica
Text: Red Orb 3-Ping: Hanying swings her fan to deal AOE DMG to frontal enemies.

Name: Celica
Text: Yellow Orb 3-Ping: Hanying swings multiple fans to attack the enemies.

Name: Celica
Text: <size=30>Blue Orb 3-Ping: Hanying leaps into the air and spins, dealing DMG to the surrounding enemies while <color=#ffda58>restoring the HP</color> of nearby allies and <color=#ffda58>increasing their Physical DMG</color>.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: After triggering <color=#ffda58>Any 3-Ping</color>, Hanying will gain <color=#ffda58>1 Dancer Point</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Tap Dodge</color> to enter the <color=#ffda58>Dancer Stance</color> with 1 Dancer Point.

Name: Celica
Text: Hanying can have up to 4 Dancer Points. The current number of points is displayed around the Dodge button.

Name: Celica
Text: Triggering Basic Attacks in <color=#ffda58>Dancer Stance</color> will rearrange Signal Orbs in order.

Name: Celica
Text: <size=30>In <color=#ffda58>Dancer Stance</color>, all the orbs are converted into <color=#ffda58>Dance Orbs</color> of the corresponding colors. Tap them to trigger the corresponding effects of the color orbs and deal increased DMG based on the Dancer Points consumed.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: First make multiple 3-Pings to save up Dancer Points and perform Choreography to stack up bonus DMG, then tap Signature to deal DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: The current number of <color=#ffda58>Emerald Flow stacks gained from Choreography</color> is displayed here. After every <color=#ffda58>4</color>Choreographies, Hanying leaves behind a healing zone that also grants bonus Physical DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: By repeatedly <color=#ffda58>tapping Basic Attack</color>, No. 21 will quickly swing her claws to strike the target multiple times.

Name: Celica
Text: Upon a Red Orb 3-Ping, No. 21 will charge forward and swing her claws, pulling enemies in range and dealing Lightning DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: Upon a Yellow Orb 3-Ping, No. 21 will slide forward and thrust up, dealing Lightning DMG to the target.

Name: Celica
Text: Upon a Blue Orb 3-Ping, No. 21 will thrust forward and deal Lightning DMG to the target.

Name: Celica
Text: After casting a 3-Ping Skill, No. 21 will enter the <color=#ffda58>Predator Stance</color>. Tap Basic Attack during this period to cast <color=#ffda58>Forceful Pounce</color> to deal Lightning DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: While casting <color=#ffda58>Forceful Pounce</color>, No. 21 will gain <color=#ffda58>Wolfspirit Points</color> and restore HP to allies within range.

Name: Celica
Text: While No. 21 is in the <color=#ffda58>Predator Stance</color>, a <color=#ffda58>purple mark</color> will appear temporarily. Tap the Basic Attack at this time to cast <color=#ffda58>Dead-on Pounce</color> and gain more <color=#ffda58>Wolfspirit Points</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: No. 21 can activate a <color=#ffda58>Deceleration Field</color> with two consecutive 3-Pings. The <color=#ffda58>purple mark</color>'s duration will also be extended till the end of the <color=#ffda58>Deceleration Field</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: At maximum <color=#ffda58>Wolfspirit Points</color>, press and hold Basic Attack to enter <color=#ffda58>Wolfspirit Form</color>, then keep tapping Basic Attack to unleash consecutive attacks while restoring HP.

Name: Celica
Text: Make two 3-Pings to activate the <color=#ffda58>Deceleration Field</color> and trigger <color=#ffda58>Dead-on Pounce</color>, then make another 3-Ping to trigger <color=#ffda58>Dead-on Pounce</color> to fully charge the <color=#ffda58>Wolfspirit Points</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Casting <color=#ffda58>Sawblade Storm</color> also pulls in nearby enemies and now allows movement while performing this skill.

Name: Celica
Text: Signature Points Recorded

Name: Celica
Text: When Signature Point is greater than 1, tap Signature continuously to cast <color=#ffda58>Charging Phoenix</color>, dealing bonus Fire DMG based on the number of Signature Points.

Name: Celica
Text: When Nanami: Pulse is in Overclocking State after casting <color=#ffda58>Signature - Pulse</color>, her Basic Attacks no longer generate Signal Orbs. Based on the number of Signature Points cast, Nanami: Pulse gains an equal amount (up to 3) of <color=#ffda58>Pulse Energy</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Press and hold Basic Attack to consume all <color=#ffda58>Pulse Energy</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Fire Whirl</color>, dealing Fire DMG based on the <color=#ffda58>Pulse Energy</color> consumed.

Name: Celica
Text: Next, I will show you No. 21's complete damage output cycle.

Name: Celica
Text: Press and hold Basic Attack to enter <color=#ffda58>Wolfspirit Form</color>, then attack continuously to gain <color=#ffda58>Critical Arclight</color>. Casting <color=#ffda58>Signature</color> will consume all <color=#ffda58>Critical Arclight</color> to deal increased DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Tap Basic Attack</color> consecutively to make Noctis strike the target multiple times, dealing Lightning DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: Upon a Red Orb 3-Ping, Noctis dashes in and throws a punch to knock the target into mid-air, dealing Lightning DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: Upon a Yellow Orb 3-Ping, Noctis leaps up and thrusts forward before striking down, dealing Lightning DMG to the target in front.

Name: Celica
Text: Upon a Blue Orb 3-Ping, Noctis kicks forward twice, dealing Lightning DMG to the target in front.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap Dodge to make Noctis enter a defense stance. When performing a precise dodge, Noctis will trigger <color=#ffda58>Perfect Arm Block</color> to counterattack.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap Dodge to trigger <color=#ffda58>Arm Block</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Press and hold Basic Attack for Noctis to start <color=#ffda58>charging</color>. Releasing Basic Attack will hit the enemy in front with a powerful punch, dealing Lightning DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: Noctis gains Energy continuously while <color=#ffda58>charging</color>. When Energy is full, cast Signature to damage the target and enter <color=#ffda58>Thunder Burst Form</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: After Noctis enters <color=#ffda58>Thunder Burst Form</color>, you can check <color=#ffda58>its duration</color> here.

Name: Celica
Text: While in <color=#ffda58>Thunder Burst Form</color>, press and hold Basic Attack after a 3-Ping to trigger a follow-up and reset the duration of <color=#ffda58>Thunder Burst Form</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: While in <color=#ffda58>Thunder Burst Form</color>, press and hold Basic Attack after pinging an <color=#ffda58>Overload Orb</color> to unleash <color=#ffda58>Thunderclap Strike</color> and gain 1 <color=#ffda58>Engine Point</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: The <color=#ffda58>Overload Orb</color> will be converted into a <color=#ffda58>Blast Orb</color> 2.5s later. Press and hold Basic Attack after pinging a <color=#ffda58>Blast Orb</color> to unleash <color=#ffda58>Thunderclap Strike</color> and gain 1 <color=#ffda58>Engine Point</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Next, I will show you Noctis' complete damage output cycle.

Name: Celica
Text: While in <color=#ffda58>Thunder Burst Form</color>, ping Overload Orbs consecutively to gain <color=#ffda58>Engine Points</color>, and cast Signature Move at 3 <color=#ffda58>Engine Points</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Each <color=#ffda58>3-Ping</color> cast will generate 1 stack of <color=#ffda58>Sword Heart</color>, stacking up to 2 times.

Name: Celica
Text: When there is at least 1 stack of <color=#ffda58>Sword Heart</color>, press and hold Basic Attack to consume 1 stack of <color=#ffda58>Sword Heart</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Reverse Flash</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: While in <color=#ffda58>Blade Will State</color>, press and hold Basic Attack to consume 1 stack of <color=#ffda58>Sword Heart</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Reverse Flash</color>. Release Basic Attack when the red glow appears to consume <color=#ffda58>Sword Heart</color> and cast <color=#ffda58>Sheathing Slash</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: While in <color=#ffda58>Blade Will State</color>, press and hold Basic Attack after tapping Signature Move to consume 2 stacks of <color=#ffda58>Sword Heart</color> and continuously consume <color=#ffda58>Blade Will Orbs</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Wave Blast</color> during the Signature Move.

Name: Celica
Text: In the <color=#ffda58>Thunder Burst Form</color>, the rightmost single orb will be converted into an <color=#ffda58>Overload Orb</color>. Pinging an <color=#ffda58>Overload Orb</color> will ping an additional single orb.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Press and hold Basic Attack</color> to charge and gain Energy, then cast Signature to enter <color=#ffda58>Thunder Burst Form</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Cast <color=#ffda58>Thunderclap Strike</color> to gain <color=#ffda58>Engine Point</color>. <color=#ffda58>Engine Points</color> will boost the DMG of <color=#ffda58>Magnetic Blast</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Tap Basic Attack continuously</color>: Echo rapidly fires arrows at the target, dealing Physical DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: Red Orb 3-Ping: Echo shoots an arrow forward, dealing Physical DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: Yellow Orb 3-Ping: Echo leaps up and turns around, shooting arrows at the enemy in mid-air and dealing Physical DMG while gaining Super Armor.

Name: Celica
Text: Blue Orb 3-Ping: Echo crouches down to shoot multiple arrows upward, dealing Physical DMG to targets in a small area ahead.

Name: Celica
Text: Press and hold Basic Attack: Echo enters <color=#ffda58>Tactical Cipher</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Upon entering <color=#ffda58>Tactical Cipher</color>, Echo starts charging, during which Signal Orbs are temporarily replaced by <color=#ffda58>Cipher Orbs</color>. When a <color=#ffda58>Cipher Orb</color> is pinged, <color=#ffda58>Cecily</color> will unleash a swordwave to damage the enemy.

Name: Celica
Text: When <color=#ffda58>fully charged</color>, Echo will <color=#ffda58>activate Judgment Zone</color>. Allies within <color=#ffda58>Judgment Zone</color> will be healed.

Name: Celica
Text: When Echo is <color=#ffda58>inside Judgment Zone</color>, tapping Dodge will trigger <color=#ffda58>Swift Archery</color>, dealing Physical DMG to the enemy.

Name: Celica
Text: When Echo is within Judgment Zone, she gains <color=#ffda58>Splendor Points</color> from each ping.

Name: Celica
Text: At max <color=#ffda58>Splendor Points</color>, pinging a Signal Orb that matches the color of <color=#ffda58>Cipher Orb</color> inside <color=#ffda58>Judgment Zone</color> will trigger <color=#ffda58>Imprisoning Co-Strike</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Next, I will show you Echo's complete damage output cycle.

Name: Celica
Text: After casting <color=#FF6347>Signature - Celestial Edge</color>, Echo and <color=#FF6347>Cecily</color> will attack at the same time, and Echo will gain <color=#ffda58>Soul Shatter Mark</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: When <color=#ffda58>Soul Shatter Mark</color> is present, after casting <color=#ffda58>Imprisoning Co-Strike</color>, Echo can consume <color=#ffda58>Soul Shatter Mark</color> inside Judgment Zone to unleash <color=#ffda58>Soulbreaking Co-Strike</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Press and hold Basic Attack to enter <color=#ffda58>Tactical Cipher</color>. Ping <color=#ffda58>Cipher Orbs</color> consecutively to continue charging and <color=#ffda58>activate Judgment Zone</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Make 3 consecutive 3-Pings <color=#ffda58>in Judgment Zone</color> to accumulate <color=#ffda58>maximum Splendor Points</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>At max Splendor Points, consume <color=#ffda58>Soul Shatter Mark</color></color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Soulbreaking Co-Strike</color>, then cast <color=#ffda58>Signature - Celestial Edge</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: When Lamia is in <color=#ffda58>Primary Form</color>, she can launch melee attacks and ranged water elemental attacks with her halberd, dealing <color=#ffda58>Dark DMG</color> to the target.

Name: Celica
Text: When Lamia is in <color=#ffda58>Primary Form</color>, she can only cast <color=#ffda58>Yellow or Blue Orb</color> skills. Upon <color=#ffda58>Yellow Orb 3-Pings</color>, she will unleash slashes, dealing Dark DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: When Lamia is in <color=#ffda58>Primary Form</color>, upon <color=#ffda58>Blue Orb 3-Pings</color>, she will unleash multiple strikes toward the target location, dealing Dark DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: After <color=#ffda58>casting Elegy of Atlantis</color>, Lamia will deal Dark DMG to the target and then enter <color=#ffda58>Dark Tide Form</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: When Lamia is in <color=#ffda58>Dark Tide Form</color>, she can launch fierce melee attacks with her Halberd Blade, dealing <color=#ffda58>Dark DMG</color> to the target.

Name: Celica
Text: When Lamia is in <color=#ffda58>Dark Tide Form</color>, she can only cast <color=#ffda58>Blue or Red Orb</color> skills. Upon Blue Orb 3-Pings, she will unleash multiple strikes toward the enemy, dealing <color=#ffda58>Dark DMG</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: When Lamia is in <color=#ffda58>Dark Tide Form</color>, upon Red Orb 3-Pings, she will unleash multiple strikes toward the enemy with her trident, dealing <color=#ffda58>Dark DMG</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: In <color=#ffda58>Primary Form</color>, pinging Signal Orbs will grant <color=#ffda58>Fathomless Points</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: In <color=#ffda58>Primary Form</color>, she will gain a <color=#ffda58>Torrent Orb</color> for every <color=#ffda58>30</color> <color=#ffda58>Fathomless Points</color> she has.

Name: Celica
Text: When pinging <color=#ffda58>Torrent Orb</color>, Lamia will cast <color=#ffda58>Crushing Wave</color>, dealing Dark DMG to the enemy, and turn the weather into <color=#ffda58>Downpour</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: When two <color=#ffda58>Torrent Orbs</color> are present, they will merge into a <color=#ffda58>Tidal Orb</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: When pinging <color=#ffda58>Tidal Orb</color>, Lamia will cast <color=#ffda58>Suffocating Tide</color>, pulling nearby enemies to her and dealing Dark DMG, and turn the weather into <color=#ffda58>Storm</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: After casting Signature - <color=#ffda58>Elegy of Atlantis</color>, Lamia will enter <color=#ffda58>Dark Tide Form</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: In <color=#ffda58>Dark Tide Form</color>, pinging Signal Orbs will grant <color=#ffda58>Fathomless Points</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: After pinging 3 Signal Orbs, Lamia will enter <color=#ffda58>Tidal Form</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: In <color=#ffda58>Tidal Form</color>, casting Basic Attacks will <color=#ffda58>grant her Extra DMG Bonus</color>, after which she will leave <color=#ffda58>Tidal Form</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: In <color=#ffda58>Dark Tide Form</color>, pinging Signal Orbs will grant <color=#ffda58>Fathomless Points</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: In <color=#ffda58>Dark Tide Form</color>, she will gain a <color=#ffda58>Torrent Orb</color> for every <color=#ffda58>30</color> <color=#ffda58>Fathomless Points</color> she has.

Name: Celica
Text: When <color=#ffda58>Fathomless Points</color> are full, she needs to cast Special Orbs to reset her <color=#ffda58>Fathomless Points</color> before gaining Special Orbs again.

Name: Celica
Text: When <color=#ffda58>Fathomless Points</color> are full, she needs to cast Special Orbs to reset her <color=#ffda58>Fathomless Points</color> before gaining Special Orbs again.

Name: Celica
Text: In <color=#ffda58>Dark Tide Form</color>, by pinging a <color=#ffda58>Torrent Orb</color> Lamia will cast <color=#ffda58>Crushing Torrent</color>, slashing to create powerful airflows and dealing Dark DMG to the enemy.

Name: Celica
Text: When two <color=#ffda58>Torrent Orbs</color> are present, they will merge into a <color=#ffda58>Tidal Orb</color>. By pinging a <color=#ffda58>Tidal Orb</color>, Lamia will cast <color=#ffda58>Tidal Vortex</color>, dealing Dark DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: When she gains a <color=#ffda58>Torrent Orb</color> with a <color=#ffda58>Tidal Orb</color> present, the <color=#ffda58>Tidal Orb</color> will be enhanced and turned into a <color=#ffda58>Riptide Orb</color> with its damage increased.

Name: Celica
Text: In <color=#ffda58>Dark Tide Form</color>, by pinging Signal Orbs Lamia will gain <color=#ffda58>Abyssal Points</color>. Pinging Special Orbs will grant her <color=#ffda58>Ocean's Scar</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: With <color=#ffda58>Ocean's Scar</color> present, by pressing and holding Basic Attack Lamia will cast <color=#ffda58>Abyssal Currents</color>, consuming all <color=#ffda58>Abyssal Points</color> to deal damage.

Name: Celica
Text: After casting Signature in <color=#ffda58>Dark Tide Form</color>, Lamia will deal Dark DMG to the target and then enter <color=#ffda58>Primary Form</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Next, I will show you Lamia's complete damage output cycle.

Name: Celica
Text: After casting Signature - <color=#ffda58>Elegy of Atlantis</color>, Lamia will enter <color=#ffda58>Dark Tide Form</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: In <color=#ffda58>Dark Tide Form</color>, 3-Ping Signal Orbs to accumulate <color=#ffda58>Fathomless Points</color> and gain <color=#ffda58>Riptide Orb</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: After gaining <color=#ffda58>Ocean's Scar</color> by pinging a <color=#ffda58>Riptide Orb</color>, press and hold Basic Attack to cast <color=#ffda58>Abyssal Currents</color>, then cast Signature - <color=#ffda58>Elegy of Atlantis</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: After casting Signature in <color=#ffda58>Dark Tide Form</color>, Lamia will deal Dark DMG to the target and then enter <color=#ffda58>Primary Form</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER attacks the target with her Bladed Cannon, <color=#ffda58>dealing Fire DMG</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Yellow Orb 3-Ping: BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER <color=#ffda58>charges toward the target and bombards the area in front</color>, dealing Fire DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: Red Orb 3-Ping: BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER quickly <color=#ffda58>slashes forward multiple times</color>, dealing Fire DMG in a large area.

Name: Celica
Text: BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER unleashes a powerful thrust toward the target and enters <color=#ffda58>Azure Awakening</color>, increasing Fire DMG. <color=#ffda58>Azure Awakening</color> lasts 10s.

Name: Celica
Text: In <color=#ffda58>Azure Awakening</color>, BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER charges the Rock Cannon and automatically consumes all <color=#ffda58>Entangled Hearts</color> to fire a powerful blast toward the target and deals Fire DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER attacks the target with her Bladed Cannon, <color=#ffda58>dealing Fire DMG</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER gains <color=#ffda58>Blazing Heart</color> when dealing the 4th and 5th hits of her Basic Attack.

Name: Celica
Text: Press and hold Basic Attack to consume <color=#ffda58>Blazing Heart</color>, quickly slashing the target before leaping into the air to fire the cannon. Release Basic Attack when she lands to <color=#ffda58>cast Photon Cannon</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: During a Red/Yellow 3-Ping, <color=#ffda58>ping Red/Yellow Orbs again to interrupt and recast the skill</color>. Gains Blue Orbs equal to the number of orbs pinged after the follow-up skills.

Name: Celica
Text: BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER can cast <color=#ffda58>Photon Strike</color> when she has <color=#ffda58>Blazing Heart</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Basic Attacks and Red/Yellow 3-Pings will <color=#ffda58>accumulate Blast Energy</color>. When <color=#ffda58>Blast Energy is full</color>, Red/Yellow 3-Pings deal increased follow-up DMG but depletes the Blast Energy.

Name: Celica
Text: Upon a Yellow 3-Ping, automatically follows up with <color=#ffda58>Starry Bayonet</color>, dealing Extra Fire DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: Next, I will show you BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER's complete damage output cycle.

Name: Celica
Text: BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER casts <color=#ffda58>Signature - Burst Drive</color> and enters <color=#ffda58>Azure Awakening</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: In <color=#ffda58>Azure Awakening</color>, Fire DMG increases. <color=#ffda58>Continuous 3-Pings will grant Entangled Heart</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Consume all <color=#ffda58>Entangled Hearts and Signature Energy</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Signature - Ethereal Star</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Upon a Red 3-Ping, automatically follows up with <color=#ffda58>Flare Strike</color>, dealing Extra Fire DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: Base DMG of <color=#ffda58>Lightning Flash</color> increases.

Name: Celica
Text: Enters the <color=#ffda58>Sniping Form</color> upon performing a Yellow Orb ping after a Red Orb 3-Ping.

Name: Celica
