Text: Base DMG of the lightning arrows fired in <color=#ffda58>Sniping Form</color> increases. Firing <color=#ffda58>6 lightning arrows</color> to launch <color=#ffda58>Reverberating Flash</color> and deals DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: After firing 3 lightning arrows in <color=#ffda58>Sniping Form</color>, press and hold Basic Attack to launch Terminating Arrows to <color=#ffda58>exit Sniping Form</color>. Firing fully-charged Terminating Arrows will launch <color=#ffda58>Reverberating Flash</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Base DMG of <color=#ffda58>Signature - Ire of Lightning</color> increases.

Name: Celica
Text: Watanabe unleashes a combination of attacks with Trailblade and shotgun, <color=#ffda58>dealing Physical DMG</color> to the enemy.

Name: Celica
Text: Watanabe spins and slashes continuously, pulling in nearby enemy units and dealing Fire DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: Watanabe kicks the enemy away, then spins and slashes to deal Fire DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: Watanabe releases the Core Energy to activate <color=#ffda58>Assault Mode</color>, dealing Fire DMG to the enemy and reducing their Fire Resistance.

Name: Celica
Text: Upon a Red Orb 3-Ping, Watanabe leaps into the air using a grappling hook, then slashes the enemy to deal Fire DMG and gain Shield.

Name: Celica
Text: Watanabe dashes across enemy units and attacks them. After the attack, he forms a <color=#ffda58>Firepower Bulwark</color> that deals continuous DMG, then activates <color=#ffda58>Patrol Mode</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Under <color=#ffda58>Patrol Mode</color>, Watanabe can only cast Yellow or Blue Orbs, and his Basic Attacks only generate Yellow or Blue Orbs.

Name: Celica
Text: After any 3-Ping, Watanabe gains <color=#ffda58>1 Shotshell</color>, up to <color=#ffda58>3</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: If <color=#ffda58>Shotshell</color> is available when Watanabe performs a Basic Attack, he consumes 1 <color=#ffda58>Shotshell</color> to shoot at the target and gain 1 <color=#ffda58>Blaze Orb</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: After entering <color=#ffda58>Assault Mode</color>, Watanabe can only cast Red and <color=#ffda58>Blaze Orbs</color>, and his Basic Attacks only generate Red Orbs.

Name: Celica
Text: If Watanabe casts Red Orb precisely at the moment of an incoming attack, he will <color=#ffda58>Parry</color> the attack. If Matrix is not on cooldown when Parry is triggered, he will enter Matrix and gain 1 <color=#ffda58>Blaze Orb</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Upon pinging a <color=#ffda58>Blaze Orb</color>, Watanabe swings the blade to unleash fire and gains <color=#ffda58>Thermal Superconductivity</color>. <color=#ffda58>Thermal Superconductivity</color> increases his <color=#ffda58>Signature</color>'s Base DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: Watanabe dashes across enemy units and attacks them. After the attack, he forms a <color=#ffda58>Firepower Bulwark</color> that deals continuous DMG, then activates <color=#ffda58>Patrol Mode</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Next, I will show you Watanabe's damage output cycle for your reference.

Name: Celica
Text: Perform 3-Pings consecutively to grant Watanabe Shotshell and Signature Energy.

Name: Celica
Text: At max Signature Energy, Watanabe can release the Core Energy to activate <color=#ffda58>Assault Mode</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Perform a 3-Ping again to grant Watanabe 3 Shotshells.

Name: Celica
Text: Consume all <color=#ffda58>Shotshells</color> to shoot at the target and gain <color=#ffda58>Blaze Orb</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Watanabe pulls in enemies. Performing Basic Attack, Red Orb skill or Blaze Orb skill in the duration immediately triggers <color=#ffda58>Parry</color> and grants him <color=#ffda58>Blaze Orb</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: When Watanabe has <color=#ffda58>3</color> Shotshells available, press and hold Basic Attack. He will use the grappling hook to glide around and descend from above, consuming <color=#ffda58>3</color> Shotshells.

Name: Celica
Text: First, let Watanabe release the Core Energy to activate <color=#ffda58>Assault Mode</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Qu strikes the enemy with her Longsword, dealing <color=#ffda58>Ice</color> DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: Yellow Orb 3-Ping: Qu leaps and spins, striking the surrounding targets and dealing Ice DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: Blue Orb 3-Ping: Qu kicks the target, then leaps backward and unleashes a swordwave, dealing Ice DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: Red Orb 3-Ping: Qu thrusts toward the target and deals Ice DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: Qu starts <color=#ffda58>Enthronement</color>, dealing Ice DMG to the enemy continuously. Upon completion of <color=#ffda58>Enthronement, Qu gathers the Will of Kowloong</color>, dealing Ice DMG to the enemy.

Name: Celica
Text: During the action of 3-Ping, Qu can ping any Signal Orb to <color=#ffda58>summon Huiyu to attack the target</color>. She will then activate <color=#ffda58>Into the Fray</color>, gaining one <color=#ffda58>Inscription</color> and one Signal Orb.

Name: Celica
Text: While Qu activates <color=#ffda58>Into the Fray</color>, ping 3-Ping Orbs consecutively to gain max Inscription.

Name: Celica
Text: Any 3-Ping made during <color=#ffda58>Into the Fray</color> can grant <color=#ffda58>Inscription</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: While Qu activates <color=#ffda58>Into the Fray</color>, if <color=#ffda58>Inscription</color> is not full, press and hold Basic Attack to dash toward the target and attack it, dealing Ice DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: Cast 3-Pings to gain 3 <color=#ffda58>Inscription</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: While Qu activates <color=#ffda58>Into the Fray</color>, if <color=#ffda58>Inscription</color> is full, press and hold Basic Attack to exit Into the Fray and <color=#ffda58>convert Inscription into Glyphs</color>, pulling in enemy units while dealing DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: Next, I'll show you how to use <color=#ffda58>Will Bearer</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Ping Orbs to activate <color=#ffda58>Into the Fray</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: While Qu activates Into the Fray, <color=#ffda58>enter Matrix actively</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Will Bearer</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: First, <color=#ffda58>dodge</color> an enemy attack to enter Matrix, then <color=#ffda58>press and hold Dodge</color> to exit <color=#ffda58>Into the Fray</color> and cast Will Bearer.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Press and hold Dodge</color> to immediately exit <color=#ffda58>Into the Fray</color>, pull in enemy units, and summon Huiyu to attack the target continuously.

Name: Celica
Text: After casting Signature, Qu starts <color=#ffda58>Enthronement</color> and <color=#ffda58>converts Glyphs into 3-Ping Orbs</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: 3-Pings made during <color=#ffda58>Enthronement</color> will grant <color=#ffda58>Soul Ripple</color>. <color=#ffda58>Soul Ripple</color> will increase the Base DMG of <color=#ffda58>Sovereign's Presence</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Next, I will show you Qu's complete damage output cycle.

Name: Celica
Text: Ping Orbs to activate <color=#ffda58>Into the Fray</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: While Qu activates <color=#ffda58>Into the Fray</color>, make 3-Pings to gain max <color=#ffda58>Inscription</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>At max Inscription</color>, press and hold Basic Attack to <color=#ffda58>exit Into the Fray and convert Inscription into Glyphs</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Cast Signature to start <color=#ffda58>Enthronement</color>. 3-Pings made during <color=#ffda58>Enthronement</color> will grant <color=#ffda58>Soul Ripple</color> that increases the DMG of <color=#ffda58>Sovereign's Presence</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Cast 3-Pings to gain 3 <color=#ffda58>Inscription</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Pinging</color> before the Red/Yellow 3-Ping Skill ends to attach a <color=#ffda58>lightning bolt</color> to the last Red/Yellow Orb hit.

Name: Celica
Text: Base DMG of <color=#ffda58>Lightning Fall with max stacks</color> increases.

Name: Celica
Text: While casting <color=#ffda58>Signature - Shining Piercer</color>, Vera: Garnet can ping an extra set of 3-Ping Orbs to end the skill early and cast <color=#ffda58>Blazing Spear</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Teddy uses the Grizzly Paw to deal <color=#ffda58>Dark DMG</color> to her enemies.

Name: Celica
Text: Upon a Yellow 3-Ping, Teddy will swing the Grizzly Paws and Grizzly Stomp to attack the target, dealing <color=#ffda58>Dark DMG</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: In <color=#ffda58>Analysis Mode</color>, Teddy can only obtain Blue Orbs. Upon a Blue 3-Ping, Teddy will use the Grizzly Paws to attack the target, dealing <color=#ffda58>Dark DMG</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Upon a Red 3-Ping, Teddy will swing the Grizzly Paws and Grizzly Stomp to attack the target, dealing <color=#ffda58>Dark DMG</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Teddy unleashes all her computing power and enters <color=#ffda58>Analysis Mode</color>, dealing Dark DMG to her enemies. Staying in Analysis Mode consumes Signature Energy.

Name: Celica
Text: Teddy exits Analysis Mode when you <color=#ffda58>press and hold Signature Move</color> or when she is <color=#ffda58>out of Signature Energy</color>, casting <color=#ffda58>Chordal Dissonance</color> and dealing Dark DMG to the enemy.

Name: Celica
Text: Teddy triggers Ping Combo upon consecutive pings, dealing <color=#ffda58>Dark DMG</color> to the enemy.

Name: Celica
Text: Each orb pinged grants Teddy 1 <color=#ffda58>Computing Point</color>, max 9 <color=#ffda58>Computing Points</color> in total.

Name: Celica
Text: Teddy gains 1 <color=#ffda58>Stress Orb</color> after obtaining 9 Computing Points. Pinging the Stress Orb will deal DMG to the enemy and recover <color=#ffda58>Signature Energy</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: When there are at least 3 Computing Points, press and hold Basic Attack to perform <color=#ffda58>Coupling</color> on the target, dealing DMG to the enemy and restoring <color=#ffda58>HP</color> and <color=#ffda58>Signature Energy</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Next, I will show you Teddy's complete damage output cycle.

Name: Celica
Text: Perform any 3-Ping to amass <color=#ffda58>Computing Points</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: With full Computing Points, ping the <color=#ffda58>Stress Orb</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: With full Computing Points, press and hold Basic Attack to perform <color=#ffda58>Coupling</color> on the target.

Name: Celica
Text: Press and hold Signature to enter <color=#ffda58>Analysis Mode</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Amass <color=#ffda58>Computing Points</color> with Blue 3-Pings.

Name: Celica
Text: With full Computing Points, ping the <color=#ffda58>Stress Orb</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: With full Computing Points, press and hold Basic Attack to perform <color=#ffda58>Coupling</color> on the target.

Name: Celica
Text: Press and hold Signature to cast the Phase 2 Signature and exit <color=#ffda58>Analysis Mode</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Luna alternates between the Chakram and the Wingblade to slash the enemy, dealing <color=#ffda58>Nihil DMG</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Luna leaps up and hurls the Chakram at the enemy, dealing <color=#ffda58>Nihil DMG</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Luna crushes spacial dimensions to enter <color=#ffda58>Main Sequence</color>, dealing <color=#ffda58>Nihil DMG</color> while triggering <color=#ffda58>Time Lag Calculation</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Luna dashes in and leaps up to launch a spin attack at the enemy, dealing <color=#ffda58>Nihil DMG</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Luna wields the Wingblade to attack the enemy, dealing <color=#ffda58>Nihil DMG</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Luna condenses consciousness to implode and obliterate space, dealing <color=#ffda58>Nihil DMG</color>, exiting <color=#ffda58>Main Sequence/Finality</color>, and triggering <color=#ffda58>Time Lag Calculation</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Press and hold Basic Attack to activate <color=#ffda58>Reaping Moon</color>, and cast <color=#ffda58>Shattering Moon</color> at <color=#ffda58>max Crescent Points</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: After <color=#ffda58>pinging orbs</color> or activating <color=#ffda58>Reaping Moon</color>, Luna can gain <color=#ffda58>Crescent Points</color> continuously. Cast Shattering Moon at max Crescent Points to activate <color=#ffda58>Eclipse Stance</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap Signature to enter <color=#ffda58>Main Sequence</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: After entering <color=#ffda58>Main Sequence</color> and activating <color=#ffda58>Eclipse Stance</color>, press and hold Basic Attack to cast <color=#ffda58>Incipient Retribution</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap Signature to cast <color=#ffda58>Lunar Downfall</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Next, I will show you Oblivion's complete damage output cycle.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap Signature to enter <color=#ffda58>Main Sequence</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Press and hold Basic Attack to activate <color=#ffda58>Reaping Moon</color>. At <color=#ffda58>max Crescent Points</color>, release Basic Attack to cast Shattering Moon and activate <color=#ffda58>Eclipse Stance</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Press and hold Basic Attack to consume <color=#ffda58>Eclipse Stance</color> and cast <color=#ffda58>Incipient Retribution</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap Signature to cast <color=#ffda58>Lunar Downfall</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Luna also has another damage output cycle.

Name: Celica
Text: Next, I will show you Oblivion's another damage output cycle.

Name: Celica
Text: Press and hold Signature to enter <color=#ffda58>Finality</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: After Luna enters <color=#ffda58>Finality</color>, she can activate <color=#ffda58>Eclipse Stance</color>. Press and hold Basic Attack in <color=#ffda58>Finality</color> to consume Eclipse Stance and cast <color=#ffda58>Final Retribution</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: In <color=#ffda58>Finality</color>, only <color=#ffda58>Finality Orbs</color> can be pinged. Ping Finality Orbs to cast <color=#ffda58>Void Dissipation</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap Signature to cast <color=#ffda58>Lunar Downfall</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: After Luna: Oblivion enters <color=#ffda58>Main Sequence/Finality</color>, her Base DMG Efficiency to <color=#ffda58>Equilibrium Field</color> increases by 100%.

Name: Celica
Text: Make Yellow Orb 3-Pings to accumulate <color=#ffda58>Crescent Points</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Keep making 3-Pings to accumulate <color=#ffda58>Crescent Points</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Performs consecutive attacks on the target with the tonfas, dealing <color=#ffda58>Fire DMG</color>. The last hit of this attack generates <color=#ffda58>3 Red Orbs</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Press and hold Red Orb to charge and perform a shield bash, dealing <color=#ffda58>Fire DMG</color> while <color=#ffda58>reducing the target's Fire Resistance</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Hurls the Energy Shield</color>, which continues to pull in enemies as it travels, dealing <color=#ffda58>Fire DMG</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Summons the Energy Shield back</color> and deals <color=#ffda58>Fire DMG</color> to enemies on its path.

Name: Celica
Text: With at least <color=#ffda58>8 Blue Orbs</color>, press and hold Blue Orb to <color=#ffda58>consume all Blue Orbs available</color> to deal Fire DMG while inflicting <color=#ffda58>Combustible Charges</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap Yellow Orb to perform combo attacks. The last hit can <color=#ffda58>convert all Red Orbs into Blue Orbs</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Thrusts the tonfas into the ground to trigger a firestorm, dealing Fire DMG and converting <color=#ffda58>Combustible</color> into <color=#ffda58>Ignition</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap Blue Orb to <color=#ffda58>hurl the Energy Shield</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap Blue Orb to <color=#ffda58>summon the Energy Shield back</color> and use <color=#ffda58>Dodge to block</color> the Energy Shield. Successful blocks restore <color=#ffda58>Fortification Points</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: A successful <color=#ffda58>precise block</color> restores 150 Fortification Points. Bridget: Ardeo can have up to 300 Fortification Points.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap Blue Orb to <color=#ffda58>summon the Energy Shield back</color>. During this time, <color=#ffda58>tap Red Orb to precisely counter</color> the incoming Energy Shield. A successful counter converts <color=#ffda58>Fortification Points</color> into <color=#ffda58>Flash Points</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Flash Points</color> increase Bridget's <color=#ffda58>Signature DMG</color>. She can have up to 300 Flash Points.

Name: Celica
Text: Next, I will show you Ardeo's complete damage output cycle.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap Blue Orb to hurl the Energy Shield.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Summon the Energy Shield back</color> and use <color=#ffda58>Dodge to block</color> the Energy Shield to restore Fortification Points.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Summon the Energy Shield back</color> and perform <color=#ffda58>Red Orb Counter</color> on the Energy Shield to convert Fortification Points into Flash Points.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Summon the Energy Shield back</color> and perform <color=#ffda58>Red Orb Counter</color> on the Energy Shield to reach maximum Flash Points.

Name: Celica
Text: Consume <color=#ffda58>Flash Points</color> to increase Signature DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: Ardeo also has another damage output cycle.

Name: Celica
Text: Next, I will show you Ardeo's another damage output cycle.

Name: Celica
Text: Perform Yellow Orb combos to <color=#ffda58>convert Red Orbs into Blue Orbs</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: With at least <color=#ffda58>8 Blue Orbs</color>, press and hold Blue Orb to inflict <color=#ffda58>Combustible Charges</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Each Blue Orb inflicts <color=#ffda58>1 stack of Combustible</color>, stacking up to <color=#ffda58>20 times</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Perform Signature to convert <color=#ffda58>Combustible</color> into <color=#ffda58>Ignition</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Ignition lasts <color=#ffda58>10s</color>. Units with Ignition take <color=#ffda58>Ignition DMG</color> every second.

Name: Bridget
Text: Now, I will talk about the Ignition mechanism.

Name: Bridget
Text: <color=#ffda58>Ignition</color> has a special damage output process that requires Bridget to have enough <color=#ffda58>Blue Orbs</color>.

Name: Bridget
Text: When there aren't enough Blue Orbs, perform <color=#ffda58>Yellow Orb combos</color> to convert Red Orbs to Blue Orbs.

Name: Bridget
Text: When having Red Orbs, perform Yellow Orb combos to <color=#ffda58>convert Red Orbs to Blue Orbs</color>.

Name: Bridget
Text: With at least <color=#ffda58>8 Blue Orbs</color>, press and hold Blue Orb to ping all of them and inflict <color=#ffda58>Combustible Charges</color> on the enemy.

Name: Bridget
Text: Each Blue Orb inflicts <color=#ffda58>certain stacks of Combustible</color>, stacking up to <color=#ffda58>20 times</color>.

Name: Bridget
Text: Perform Signature to convert <color=#ffda58>Combustible</color> into <color=#ffda58>Ignition</color>.

Name: Bridget
Text: Ignition lasts <color=#ffda58>10s</color>. Units with Ignition take <color=#ffda58>Ignition DMG</color> every second.

Name: Karenina
Text: Now, I will talk about the Plasma Beam mechanism.

Name: Karenina
Text: <color=#ffda58>Plasma Beam's</color> full effects can only be triggered when both Scire's <color=#ffda58>Leap Skills</color>—<color=#ffda58>Faint Light</color> and <color=#ffda58>Vision Edge</color>—reach <color=#ffda58>Lv.9</color>.

Name: Karenina
Text: The <color=#ffda58>Plasma Beam</color> effect is triggered by <color=#ffda58>Red Orb</color> pings. Ping Red Orb to enter the Preparation status, during which time you can perform any ping to cast <color=#ffda58>Comet Combo</color>.

Name: Karenina
Text: <color=#ffda58>Comet Combos</color> can accumulate <color=#ffda58>Electric Charge</color>.

Name: Karenina
Text: <size=30>When <color=#ffda58>Electric Charge</color> is full, <color=#ffda58>press and hold Basic Attack</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Shattering Strike</color>, open a <color=#ffda58>Lightning Resistance</color>-reducing Dissociation Electric Field, and activate the <color=#ffda58>Electric Storm Flash</color> status.</size>

Name: Karenina
Text: In the <color=#ffda58>Electric Storm Flash</color> status, character with the Plasma Beam Effect will keep launching Lightning Strikes at nearby enemies and deal <color=#ffda58>Plasma Beam DMG</color>.

Name: Karenina
Text: In the <color=#ffda58>Electric Storm Flash</color> status, certain skills of the character with the Plasma Beam Effect have bonus effects. <color=#ffda58>Scire's</color> Signature will also deal high <color=#ffda58>Plasma Beam DMG</color>.

Name: Karenina
Text: <color=#ffda58>Electric Storm Flash</color> status lasts <color=#ffda58>10s</color>, during which time, you will not be able to gain <color=#ffda58>Electric Charge</color>. You will accumulate <color=#ffda58>Electric Charge</color> after exiting the status.

Name: Hanying
Text: Solacetune only has Red and Yellow Orbs in ordinary mode and consumes White Orbs above when performing pings.

Name: Hanying
Text: Ping any <color=#ffda58>6</color> orbs to obtain a special <color=#ffda58>Harmonic Orb</color>. Ping the Harmonic Orb to quickly gain Signature Energy and cast <color=#ffda58>Phase 1 Signature</color>.

Name: Hanying
Text: Cast <color=#ffda58>Phase 1 Signature</color> to enter the <color=#ffda58>Attacker Mode</color>, turn all Signal Orbs into <color=#ffda58>Blue Orbs</color>, and increase <color=#ffda58>Sharp Reserve acquisition efficiency</color>.

Name: Hanying
Text: <color=#ffda58>Sharp Reserve</color> is displayed here. The number in the bottom right corner indicates the <color=#ffda58>Ultima Slashes available</color>.

Name: Hanying
Text: When <color=#ffda58>Ultima Slash</color> is available to trigger, tapping <color=#ffda58>Signature</color> will cast <color=#ffda58>Jade Bloom</color> and unleash <color=#ffda58>Ultima Slash</color>.

Name: Hanying
Text: <color=#ffda58>Jade Bloom</color> consumes 30 <color=#ffda58>Sonority</color> Energy. Musical Note Energy can be acquired from pings and Basic Attacks.

Name: Hanying
Text: Cast <color=#ffda58>Jade Bloom</color> with full <color=#ffda58>Musical Note</color> Energy. And then, your Basic Attacks will trigger an Ultima Slash and restore Signal Orbs. Do this repetitively to quickly trigger <color=#ffda58>Ultima Slashes</color> in a row.

Name: Hanying
Text: All the <color=#ffda58>Ultima Slashes</color> you cast will be recorded <color=#ffda58>for collaboration</color> with other members' skills.

Name: Luna
Text: Now, I will talk about the Disruption mechanism.

Name: Luna
Text: Some enemies have an <color=#ffda58>Equilibrium Field</color>. It's a special <color=#ffda58>Shield</color> that is displayed as a purple gauge above the enemy's HP.

Name: Luna
Text: Cast <color=#ffda58>Phase 1 Signature</color> to increase the <color=#ffda58>efficiency of dealing damage</color> to Equilibrium Field in the <color=#ffda58>Main Sequence/Finality</color> status.

Name: Luna
Text: <color=#ffda58>Efficiency of dealing damage</color> to Equilibrium Field in the <color=#ffda58>Main Sequence/Finality</color> status increases.

Name: Luna
Text: <color=#ffda58>Phase 2 Signature</color> causes high damage and also has the <color=#ffda58>damage efficiency</color> boost effect against the Equilibrium Field.

Name: Teddy
Text: Now switch to Teddy: Decryptor.

Name: Teddy
Text: Decryptor's pings will grant <color=#ffda58>Computing Points</color>.

Name: Teddy
Text: <color=#ffda58>Computing Points</color> are displayed here. You can have 9 Computing Points maximum.

Name: Teddy
Text: When having <color=#ffda58>9 Computing Points</color>, press and hold Basic Attack to cast <color=#ffda58>Coupling - High Frequency</color> and open an <color=#ffda58>Integer Overflow Field</color> to increase the <color=#ffda58>damage efficiency</color> against the Equilibrium Field.

Name: Celica
Text: Solacetune attacks the target with a blend of music and dance, dealing <color=#ffda58>Physical DMG</color> and gaining <color=#ffda58>Sonority</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Solacetune can only obtain <color=#ffda58>Red and Yellow Orbs</color> in the Chord Mode. Tap Yellow Orb to spend at least <color=#ffda58>1 White Orb</color> to deal Physical DMG and gain <color=#ffda58>Sonority</color> and <color=#ffda58>Sharp Reserve</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap Red Orb to spend only <color=#ffda58>1 White Orb</color> to deal Physical DMG and gain <color=#ffda58>Sonority</color> and <color=#ffda58>Sharp Reserve</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Solacetune draws the hairpin to enter <color=#ffda58>Attacker Mode</color> and launch a surprise attack, dealing <color=#ffda58>Physical DMG</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Solacetune will only receive <color=#ffda58>Blue Orbs</color> in Attacker Mode. Tap Blue Orb to thrust the target repetitively, dealing Physical DMG and gaining <color=#ffda58>Sonority</color> and <color=#ffda58>Sharp Reserve</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: In <color=#ffda58>Attacker Mode</color>, tap Signature to <color=#ffda58>spend Sonority</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Jade Bloom</color>, dealing Physical DMG. This will trigger an <color=#ffda58>Ultima Slash</color> on hit.

Name: Celica
Text: After consecutive dashes, Solacetune will deliver a finishing blow, dealing <color=#ffda58>Physical DMG</color> and triggering Time Lag Calculation.

Name: Celica
Text: After pinging <color=#ffda58>6 White Orbs</color>, Solacetune will gain a <color=#ffda58>Harmonic Orb</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Ping the Harmonic Orb to open the <color=#ffda58>Lunartone Field</color>. When the Lunartone Field is on the battlefield, it will <color=#ffda58>weaken</color> enemies within its range and <color=#ffda58>enhance</color> your allies.

Name: Celica
Text: Cast Signature and enter the <color=#ffda58>Attacker Mode</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Solacetune gains <color=#ffda58>Sonority</color> from <color=#ffda58>Basic Attacks</color> and <color=#ffda58>skills</color>. In Attacker Mode, tap Signature to spend <color=#ffda58>Sonority</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Jade Bloom</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap Signature to cast <color=#ffda58>Jade Bloom</color>. When cast with full <color=#ffda58>Sonority</color>, it will trigger <color=#ffda58>Ethereal Symphony</color> once.

Name: Celica
Text: Press and hold Signature to deliver a finishing blow.

Name: Celica
Text: Next, I will show you Solacetune's complete damage output cycle.

Name: Celica
Text: In Chord Mode, cast <color=#ffda58>Red Orb 6 times</color> to gain a <color=#ffda58>Harmonic Orb</color>. Ping the <color=#ffda58>Harmonic Orb</color> to start Phase 1 Signature and enter the <color=#ffda58>Attacker Mode</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: When Solacetune is in the <color=#ffda58>Attacker Mode</color>, <color=#ffda58>ping Blue Orbs</color> to restore <color=#ffda58>Sonority</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Cast Signature and enter the <color=#ffda58>Attacker Mode</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: In the Attacker Mode, <color=#ffda58>ping Blue Orbs</color> to restore <color=#ffda58>Sonority</color>. <color=#ffda58>Tap Signature</color> continuously to turn <color=#ffda58>Sonority</color> into Signature Energy and cast Phase 2 Signature.

Name: Celica
Text: Press and hold Signature to deliver a finishing blow.

Name: Celica
Text: Commandant, Scire's Leap is completed. Let's learn about her new abilities.

Name: Celica
Text: Ping orb to cast a <color=#ffda58>Comet Combo</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Comet Combos</color> can accumulate <color=#ffda58>Electric Charge</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>When Electric Charge</color> is full, <color=#ffda58>Shattering Strike</color> will open a <color=#ffda58>Lightning Resistance</color>-reducing <color=#ffda58>Dissociation Electric Field</color> and activate <color=#ffda58>Electric Storm Flash</color> for the team.

Name: Celica
Text: In the <color=#ffda58>Electric Storm Flash</color> status, character with the <color=#ffda58>Plasma Beam Effect</color> will keep launching Lightning Strikes at nearby enemies.

Name: Celica
Text: In the <color=#ffda58>Electric Storm Flash</color> status, certain skills of the character with the <color=#ffda58>Plasma Beam Effect</color> have bonus effects. Scire's Signature will also deal <color=#ffda58>high Plasma Beam DMG</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Electric Storm Flash</color> status lasts <color=#ffda58>10s</color>, during which time, you will not be able to gain <color=#ffda58>Electric Charge</color>. You will accumulate <color=#ffda58>Electric Charge</color> after exiting the status.

Name: Celica
Text: Press and hold Basic Attack to launch a <color=#ffda58>Leap Attack</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Press and hold Basic Attack to cast <color=#ffda58>Shattering Strike</color>. Enter 3-Ping during the <color=#ffda58>Charging Phase</color> after the character lands to increase <color=#ffda58>the damage during the Discharge Phase</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap Signature to cast <color=#ffda58>Starshatter Horizon</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Next, I will show you Scire's second damage output cycle.

Name: Celica
Text: Lucid Dreamer launches consecutive attacks with his revolver to deal <color=#ffda58>Ice DMG</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Steps back and throws a tactical grenade, dealing <color=#ffda58>Ice DMG</color> and gaining <color=#ffda58>Calibration</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Consecutive Blue Pings</color> summon a drone to detonate the grenade and grant <color=#ffda58>Calibration</color>. If within the <color=#ffda58>explosion radius</color>, <color=#ffda58>Lucid Dreamer</color> will also take DMG from the <color=#ffda58>explosion</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Charges forward to deal <color=#ffda58>Ice DMG</color> with the revolver, also gaining <color=#ffda58>Calibration</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Leaps back and strikes forward upon consecutive <color=#ffda58>Yellow Pings</color>, dealing <color=#ffda58>Ice DMG</color> and gaining <color=#ffda58>Calibration</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Tapping Red Orb</color> after <color=#ffda58>Blue Pings</color> detonates the tactical grenade, dealing <color=#ffda58>Ice DMG</color> and gaining <color=#ffda58>Calibration</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Tapping Red Orb</color> after <color=#ffda58>Yellow Pings</color> launches point-blank shots or covering fire, dealing <color=#ffda58>Ice DMG</color> and gaining <color=#ffda58>Calibration</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: When <color=#ffda58>Frosty Barrage or Snow Storm</color> is inactive, <color=#ffda58>tapping Signature</color> gathers enemies and fires enhanced bullets, dealing <color=#ffda58>Ice DMG</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Press and hold Red Orb</color> to start charging. <color=#ffda58>Releasing it</color> when <color=#ffda58>Calibration is full</color> activates <color=#ffda58>Quiet Calibration Mode</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Lucid Dreamer's certain skills grant <color=#ffda58>Calibration</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Lucid Dreamer enters the field with a full <color=#ffda58>Cylinder</color>. <color=#ffda58>Condensation Projectile</color> is available to weaken enemies in <color=#ffda58>Calibration Mode</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: In Calibration Mode, <color=#ffda58>tapping Red Orb</color> consumes <color=#ffda58>Condensation Projectile</color> to shoot. Tapping Red Orb again with an <color=#ffda58>empty Cylinder</color> will throw out the <color=#ffda58>Backup Revolver</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Tapping Red Orb again with an <color=#ffda58>empty Cylinder</color> will throw out the <color=#ffda58>Backup Revolver</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Tapping <color=#ffda58>Red Orb or Dodge</color> triggers <color=#ffda58>Gun Swap</color> with the <color=#ffda58>Backup Revolver</color> and fully loads the <color=#ffda58>Cylinder</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: For every <color=#ffda58>Condensation Projectile</color> consumed, 1 <color=#ffda58>Correction Projectile</color> will be granted. Casting <color=#ffda58>Signature - Destructive Wave</color> consumes all Correction Projectiles to <color=#ffda58>increase DMG</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: When Frosty Barrage and Snow Storm are inactive, casting <color=#ffda58>Signature - Superlink Flight</color> will pull enemies and fire enhanced bullets.

Name: Celica
Text: Press and hold Red Orb to start charging. Releasing it when <color=#ffda58>Calibration is full</color> activates <color=#ffda58>Quiet Calibration Mode</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: In Calibration Mode, <color=#ffda58>pressing and holding Basic Attack</color> can continuously consume <color=#ffda58>Condensation Projectiles</color> to shoot.

Name: Celica
Text: In Calibration Mode, <color=#ffda58>pressing and holding Basic Attack</color> can continuously consume <color=#ffda58>Condensation Projectiles</color> to shoot. When <color=#ffda58>flying</color>, tapping Red Orb triggers <color=#ffda58>Snow Storm</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Tapping Red Orb</color> again with an <color=#ffda58>empty Cylinder</color> will throw out the <color=#ffda58>Backup Revolver</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: After tapping Red Orb to throw out the <color=#ffda58>Backup Revolver</color>, tapping <color=#ffda58>Dodge or Red Orb</color> again triggers <color=#ffda58>Gun Swap</color> with the Backup Revolver and <color=#ffda58>fully loads the Cylinder</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: When <color=#ffda58>Frosty Barrage or Snow Storm</color> is active, tapping Signature will consume all <color=#ffda58>Correction Projectiles</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Signature - Destructive Wave</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Next, I will show you Lucid Dreamer's complete damage output cycle.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Pressing and holding Red Orb</color> activates <color=#ffda58>Calibration Mode</color>. After tapping <color=#ffda58>Red Orb</color> for continuous fire, <color=#ffda58>Gun Swap</color> will be triggered to switch to the Backup Revolver.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Tapping Red Orb</color> again after <color=#ffda58>a successful Gun Swap</color> triggers continuous fire, and <color=#ffda58>Signature</color> will be performed when the <color=#ffda58>Cylinder empties</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Next, I will show you Lucid Dreamer's second damage output cycle.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Pressing and holding Red Orb</color> activates <color=#ffda58>Calibration Mode</color>. After <color=#ffda58>pressing and holding Basic Attack</color> to empty the Cylinder, <color=#ffda58>tapping Red Orb</color> will trigger follow-up skills and <color=#ffda58>Gun Swap</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Press and hold Basic Attack</color> to <color=#ffda58>unleash Signature</color>.

Name: Wanshi
Text: Now, I will talk about the Glaciation mechanism.

Name: Wanshi
Text: Lucid Dreamer's <color=#ffda58>skills</color> accumulate <color=#ffda58>Glaciation</color>. Once it is full, Arctic Ice will be triggered and grant 1 <color=#ffda58>Arctic Ice Layer</color>.

Name: Wanshi
Text: <color=#ffda58>Arctic Ice Layer</color> is displayed here. It can accumulate up to <color=#ffda58>10</color> layers.

Name: Wanshi
Text: After pressing and holding Dodge to activate <color=#ffda58>Calibration Mode</color>, <color=#ffda58>pressing and holding Basic Attack</color> or <color=#ffda58>tapping Red Orb</color> will consume Condensation Projectile for Energy.

Name: Wanshi
Text: Casting <color=#ffda58>Signature</color> when Energy is full consumes all <color=#ffda58>Arctic Ice Layers</color> to activate <color=#ffda58>Ice Spikes</color>.

Name: Wanshi
Text: <color=#ffda58>Ice Spikes</color> briefly freezes enemies, and each <color=#ffda58>Arctic Ice Layer</color> adds <color=#ffda58>1s</color> to the duration of Ice Spikes.

Name: Wanshi
Text: During <color=#ffda58>Ice Spikes</color>, any skill that deal <color=#ffda58>Glaciation DMG</color> can trigger <color=#ffda58>Ice Accumulation</color> and accumulate <color=#ffda58>Congelation</color>.

Name: Wanshi
Text: <color=#ffda58>Press and hold Dodge</color> to enter Calibration mode. While in this mode, pressing<color=#ffda58> and holding Basic Attack</color> will deal Glaciation DMG and inflict <color=#ffda58>Ice Accumulation</color>.

Name: Wanshi
Text: When <color=#ffda58>Ice Spikes</color> end, consumes <color=#ffda58>Congelation</color> to trigger <color=#ffda58>Ice Burst</color>. <color=#ffda58>Congelation</color> will increase the Glaciation DMG dealt by <color=#ffda58>Ice Burst</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Next, I will teach you how to swap weapons. Entering <color=#ffda58>Focus</color> makes the <color=#ffda58>Backup Revolver</color> available. Swapping to it refreshes the duration of the <color=#ffda58>Calibration state</color> and fully loads the <color=#ffda58>Cylinder</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Let's talk about another weapon swap method for Lucid Dreamer.

Name: Celica
Text: Here is how Lucid Dreamer recovers Condensation Projectiles.

Name: Celica
Text: While in <color=#ffda58>non-Calibration Mode</color>, <color=#ffda58>tapping Red Orb after Dodge</color> summons a drone to attack enemies and gain 3 Condensation Projectiles.

Name: Celica
Text: Next, I will show you the output flow for Lucid Dreamer's <color=#ffda58>effects</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Pressing and holding Dodge</color> activates <color=#ffda58>Frigid Calibration Mode</color>. After <color=#ffda58>tapping Red Orb</color> for continuous fire, grants Glaciation or Arctic Ice Layer and triggers <color=#ffda58>Gun Swap</color> to switch to the Backup Revolver.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Tapping Red Orb</color> again after <color=#ffda58>a successful Gun Swap</color> triggers continuous fire. When the <color=#ffda58>Cylinder is empty</color>, casting <color=#ffda58>Signature</color> consumes <color=#ffda58>Arctic Ice Layers</color> to generate <color=#ffda58>Ice Spikes</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: I'm going to show you the second output flow for Lucid Dreamer's <color=#ffda58>effects</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Long pressing Dodge</color> activates <color=#ffda58>Calibration mode</color>. After <color=#ffda58>pressing Basic Attack</color> to empty the Cylinder, <color=#ffda58>tapping Red Orbs</color> will trigger follow-up skills and throw out the Standby Revolver for <color=#ffda58>Gun Swap</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: After <color=#ffda58>Gun Swap</color>, <color=#ffda58>Press and hold Basic Attack</color> to <color=#ffda58>unleash Signature</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Ping <color=#ffda58>any Orbs</color> to accumulate Calibration.

Name: Celica
Text: Pyroath will continuously recover <color=#ffda58>Quench Value</color> and receive bonus <color=#ffda58>Quench Value</color> upon every <color=#ffda58>Ping</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Red or Yellow Orb</color> Ping will grant <color=#ffda58>Quench Value</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: When <color=#ffda58>Quench Value</color> is full, press and hold Signature to enter <color=#ffda58>Fire Thunder Form</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Pyroath will recover <color=#ffda58>Aura Value</color> when she casts <color=#ffda58>Flare Combo</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Red Orb 3-Ping and tap Basic Attack during <color=#ffda58>Fire Thunder Form</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Flare Combo</color> and receive <color=#ffda58>Aura Value</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Yellow Orb 3-Ping and multi-tap Basic Attack during <color=#ffda58>Fire Thunder Form</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Flare Combo</color> and receive <color=#ffda58>Aura Value</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: When <color=#ffda58>Aura Value</color> is full, press and hold Basic Attack to cast <color=#ffda58>Aura Blast</color>, and gain <color=#ffda58>Aura Mark</color>. <color=#ffda58>Aura Mark</color> can increase <color=#ffda58>Signature</color> DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: During <color=#ffda58>Fire Thunder Form</color>, press and hold Signature to cast <color=#ffda58>Signature - Crowd Slash</color> and refresh the duration of <color=#ffda58>Fire Thunder Form</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Enter <color=#ffda58>Floating mode</color> by tapping Signature during <color=#ffda58>Fire Thunder Form</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: During <color=#ffda58>Floating mode</color>, press and hold Basic Attack to consume <color=#ffda58>Aura Value</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Aura Dance</color> and recover Signature Energy.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap Signature during <color=#ffda58>Floating mode</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Signature - Eclipse Daybreak</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Next, I will show you Pyroath's complete damage output cycle.

Name: Celica
Text: Press and hold Signature to activate <color=#ffda58>Fire Thunder Form</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Ping to fill Basic Attack with <color=#ffda58>Aura Value</color> and press and hold Basic Attack to cast <color=#ffda58>Aura Blast</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap Signature to enter <color=#ffda58>Floating mode</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Press and hold Basic Attack to get full Signature Energy before tapping Signature to enter <color=#ffda58>Signature - Eclipse Daybreak</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Next, I will show you Pyroath's effect output cycle.

Name: Celica
Text: Pyroath's effect practice will trigger <color=#ffda58>Plasma Beam Effect</color>. <color=#ffda58>Electric Charge</color> will be shown here.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap <color=#ffda58>Blue Orb</color> again after the <color=#ffda58>5th hit of Pyroath's Basic Attack</color> to receive <color=#ffda58>Electric Charge</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: When <color=#ffda58>Electric Charge</color> is full, press and hold Blue Orb to activate <color=#ffda58>Electric Storm Flash</color>. You can also activate <color=#ffda58>Electric Storm Flash</color> when you enter <color=#ffda58>Fire Thunder Form</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Ping <color=#ffda58>Plasma Orbs</color> to receive <color=#ffda58>Aura Value</color> and deal Plasma Beam DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: During <color=#ffda58>Electric Storm Flash</color>, some skills will deal Plasma Beam DMG instead and gain a DMG boost.

Name: Celica
Text: Next, I will show you Pyroath's 2nd <color=#ffda58>Effect</color> output cycle.

Name: Celica
Text: Press and hold Signature to enter <color=#ffda58>Fire Thunder Form</color> before pressing and holding Blue Orb to activate <color=#ffda58>Electric Storm Flash</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Ping <color=#ffda58>Plasma Orbs</color> to receive <color=#ffda58>Aura Value</color> and deal Plasma Beam DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: Press and hold Basic Attack to recover Signature Energy before tapping Signature to enter <color=#ffda58>Floating mode</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Press and hold Basic Attack to cast <color=#ffda58>Aura Dance</color> to recover Signature Energy before tapping Signature to cast Signature - <color=#ffda58>Eclipse Daybreak</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Commandant, Stigmata's Leap is completed. Let's learn about her new abilities.

Name: Celica
Text: Press and hold Dodge to enter <color=#ffda58>Luminous Realm</color>

Name: Celica
Text: Land an attack using <color=#ffda58>Core Skills</color> or <color=#ffda58>Ping</color> while in Luminous Realm to receive <color=#ffda58>Sharp Reserve</color>. Receive bonus <color=#ffda58>Sharp Reserve</color> when <color=#ffda58>Hanying: Solacetune</color> is also in the team.

Name: Celica
Text: Cast <color=#ffda58>Signature</color> to enter <color=#ffda58>Sword Form</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Tap Basic Attack</color> again right after the <color=#ffda58>5th hit of Basic Attack</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Dispersed Radiance</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Stigmata Will</color> will transform into </color>Shadowglow Mark<color=#ffda58> when <color=#ffda58>Dispersed Radiance</color> is cast. This will increase the DMG of <color=#ffda58>Ultima Slashes</color> unleashed during <color=#ffda58>Dispersed Radiance</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: When <color=#ffda58>Dispersed Radiance</color> hits an enemy, <color=#ffda58>Sharp Reserve</color> will be consumed to trigger <color=#ffda58>Ultima Slash</color> and grant 1 <color=#ffda58>Ultima</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Casting <color=#ffda58>Illuminated Abyss</color> will unleash <color=#ffda58>Shattered Darkness</color> once, dealing <color=#ffda58>Ultima Slash</color> DMG. Consume <color=#ffda58>Ultima</color> and <color=#ffda58>Shadowglow Mark</color> to increase Gloombreak DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: Cast <color=#ffda58>Signature</color> to enter <color=#ffda58>Sword Form</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Unleash the <color=#ffda58>5th hit of Basic Attack</color> by <color=#ffda58>dodging</color> when you have <color=#ffda58>Resolution</color> and is in <color=#ffda58>Sword Form</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Perform <color=#ffda58>multiple Basic Attacks</color> after <color=#ffda58>dodging</color> to unleash Sword Dance. Follow up by <color=#ffda58>tapping Signature</color> again to cast Phase 2 Signature.

Name: Celica
Text: Accumulate <color=#ffda58>Aura Value</color> by using Basic Attacks during <color=#ffda58>Floating mode</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Accumulate <color=#ffda58>Aura Value</color> by using Basic Attacks during <color=#ffda58>Floating mode</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Gain <color=#ffda58>Sharp Reserve</color> by pinging consecutively during <color=#ffda58>Luminous Realm</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Yata can be strengthened through <color=#ffda58>Focus</color>. Pinging Red/Yellow Orbs grants <color=#ffda58>Focus</color> and increases <color=#ffda58>Realm</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Basic Attacks can only obtain <color=#ffda58>Red</color> or <color=#ffda58>Yellow</color> Orbs. Pinging <color=#ffda58>Red/Yellow Orbs</color> deals Lightning DMG and grants <color=#ffda58>Focus</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Basic Attacks can only obtain <color=#ffda58>Red</color> or <color=#ffda58>Yellow</color> Orbs. Pinging <color=#ffda58>Red/Yellow Orbs</color> deals Lightning DMG and grants <color=#ffda58>Focus</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Upon gaining <color=#ffda58>Focus</color> to increase <color=#ffda58>Realm</color>, obtain an additional <color=#ffda58>Esoteric Orb</color>. Using an Esoteric Orb grants <color=#ffda58>Spirit</color> and <color=#ffda58>Illumination</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Upon gaining <color=#ffda58>Focus</color> to increase <color=#ffda58>Realm</color>, obtain an additional <color=#ffda58>Esoteric Orb</color>. Using an Esoteric Orb grants <color=#ffda58>Spirit</color> and <color=#ffda58>Illumination</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: While under the effect of <color=#ffda58>Illumination</color>, press and hold Basic Attack to cast <color=#ffda58>Night Raid</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Casting an <color=#ffda58>Esoteric Orb</color> grants <color=#ffda58>Spirit</color>. <color=#ffda58>Spirit</color> can amplify the damage of <color=#ffda58>Signature - Skyward Flash</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Perform a <color=#ffda58>Block</color> by <color=#ffda58>tapping Dodge</color> without a direction. Successfully <color=#ffda58>blocking</color> and then <color=#ffda58> tapping Basic Attack</color> will cast Mirror Return as counterattack.

Name: Celica
Text: Successfully <color=#ffda58>blocking</color> and then tapping Basic Attack will initiate a <color=#ffda58>counterattack</color>. If the block triggers the <color=#ffda58>Matrix</color>, the counterattack will additionally <color=#ffda58>restore a set of orbs</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Next, I will show you Yata's complete damage output cycle.

Name: Celica
Text: Pinging <color=#ffda58>Red/Yellow Orbs</color> grants <color=#ffda58>Focus</color> and increases <color=#ffda58>Realm</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: After tapping an <color=#ffda58>Esoteric Orb</color>, press and hold Basic Attack to cast <color=#ffda58>Night Raid</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Pinging <color=#ffda58>Red/Yellow Orbs</color> increases <color=#ffda58>Realm</color> and grants an <color=#ffda58>Esoteric Orb</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Pinging an <color=#ffda58>Esoteric Orb</color> grants amplified <color=#ffda58>Spirit</color> Signature and casts <color=#ffda58>Signature - Skyward Flash</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Next, I will show you Yata's effect output cycle.

Name: Celica
Text: Yata's effect process can trigger the <color=#ffda58>Glaciation Effect</color>, indicated by the <color=#ffda58>Glaciation Gauge</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Pinging <color=#ffda58>Red/Yellow Orbs</color> increases <color=#ffda58>Realm</color>, casts an <color=#ffda58>Esoteric Orb</color> and grants <color=#ffda58>Illumination</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: While under the effect of <color=#ffda58>Illumination</color>, <color=#ffda58>continuously press and hold Basic Attack</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Night Raid</color> and continuously build up <color=#ffda58>Arctic Ice Layers</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Pinging <color=#ffda58>Red/Yellow Orbs</color> increases <color=#ffda58>Realm</color> and grants an <color=#ffda58>Esoteric Orb</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Press and hold the Blue Orb</color> to condense <color=#ffda58>Ice Spikes</color> based on the current <color=#ffda58>Arctic Ice Layers</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: While <color=#ffda58>Ice Spikes</color> are active, some of Yata's skills will deal <color=#ffda58>Glaciation DMG</color>. Attempting to cast the Signature will also deal Glaciation DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: Next, let's walk through the complete gameplay for Yata.

Name: Celica
Text: <size=30>Ping orbs to increase <color=#ffda58>Realm</color>, then ping Blue Orbs to gain <color=#ffda58>Illumination</color> and cast <color=#ffda58>Night Raid</color>, consuming <color=#ffda58>Illumination</color>. Repeat the process of pinging to increase <color=#ffda58>Realm</color>, and ping Blue Orbs to gain <color=#ffda58>Spirit</color> to amplify Signature</size>.

Name: Celica
Text: Next, let's walk through the complete effect gameplay for Yata.

Name: Celica
Text: <size=30>Ping orbs to increase <color=#ffda58>Realm</color>, then ping Blue Orbs to gain <color=#ffda58>Illumination</color>. <color=#ffda58>Press and hold Basic Attack</color> to build up <color=#ffda58>Arctic Ice Layers</color>, then ping more orbs and <color=#ffda58> press and hold the Blue Orb</color> to condense <color=#ffda58>Ice Spikes</color> and cast Signature</size>.

Name: Celica
Text: Pinging an Esoteric Orb grants <color=#ffda58>Illumination</color>, which amplifies the damage of <color=#ffda58>Night Raid</color>.

Name: Alpha
Text: Darkflow mechanism tutorial ongoing.

Name: Alpha
Text: When the team has the <color=#ffda58>Darkflow Effect</color>, related characters can accumulate <color=#ffda58>Darkflow Reserve</color> for the team.

Name: Alpha
Text: Ping three Blue Orbs to accumulate <color=#ffda58>Darkflow Reserve</color>.

Name: Alpha
Text: Characters with the Darkflow Effect will gain a <color=#ffda58>Darkflow Aura</color> based on the current <color=#ffda58>Darkflow stacks</color>, dealing continuous Darkflow DMG to enemies and reducing their HP recovery.

Name: Alpha
Text: Casting Swordwave accumulates <color=#ffda58>Darkflow Reserve</color>.

Name: Alpha
Text: Press and hold Dodge to reach <color=#ffda58>full Blade Aura</color> and cast <color=#ffda58>Resolute Blow</color>.

Name: Alpha
Text: When the Darkflow stacks reach the <color=#ffda58>threshold</color>, the <color=#ffda58>Aura upgrades</color>, increasing its area of effect and dealing massive Darkflow DMG to enemies within the area.

Name: Alpha
Text: When the team has the <color=#ffda58>Darkflow Effect</color>, related characters can deal Extra DMG by using <color=#ffda58>Darkflow stacks</color>.

Name: Alpha
Text: Enter Odachi when casting Signature Move.

Name: Alpha
Text: <size=30>When casting <color=#ffda58>Leaping Thrust</color>, all Signal Orbs will be converted to Shadow Strike Orbs. <color=#ffda58>Immediately clearing Shadow Strike Orbs</color> will trigger <color=#ffda58>Shadow Strike</color>, dealing <color=#ffda58>Darkflow DMG</color> in the process.</size>

Name: Alpha
Text: <size=30>After fully casting <color=#ffda58>Shadow Strike 6 times</color>, the next Phase 2 Signature will deal <color=#ffda58>Darkflow DMG</color>, clear all <color=#ffda58>Darkflow stacks</color>, and deal additional <color=#ffda58>Darkflow DMG</color>.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: Commandant, Crimson Weavea's Leap is completed. Let's learn about her new abilities.

Name: Celica
Text: In Kodachi mode, all Signal Orbs will automatically convert to <color=#ffda58>Blue Orbs</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Crimson Weave gains an extra 9 Signature Energy upon entering, allowing for an immediate Signature activation.

Name: Celica
Text: Crimson Weave gains an extra <color=#ffda58>9 Signature Energy</color> upon entering, allowing for an immediate <color=#ffda58>Signature activation</color> and entering Odachi mode.

Name: Celica
Text: 3-Ping <color=#ffda58>builds up Blade Aura</color>. If Blade Aura hits max upon casting <color=#ffda58>Sundered Delusion</color> within 3s after pinging, <color=#ffda58>Resolute Blow</color> will be automatically and quickly cast.

Name: Celica
Text: If Blade Aura hits max upon casting <color=#ffda58>Sundered Delusion</color> within 3s after pinging, <color=#ffda58>Resolute Blow</color> will be automatically and quickly cast.

Name: Celica
Text: When casting <color=#ffda58>Leaping Thrust</color> by pressing and holding Basic Attack, <color=#ffda58>release Basic Attack</color> to cast Thunderous Bash.

Name: Celica
Text: The <color=#ffda58>Aphotic Points</color> consumed by Thunderous Bash also increases Phase 2 Signature DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: Next, I will show you Crimson Weave's second damage output cycle.

Name: Celica
Text: While in Kodachi mode, using certain skills can gain <color=#ffda58>Darkflow Reserve</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: 3-Ping Blue Orb once

Name: Celica
Text: After dodging, <color=#ffda58>continuously tap Basic Attack</color> to cast Swordwave.

Name: Celica
Text: Press and hold Dodge to reach <color=#ffda58>full Blade Aura</color> and cast <color=#ffda58>Resolute Blow</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Enter Odachi when casting Signature Move.

Name: Celica
Text: When casting <color=#ffda58>Leaping Thrust</color>, <color=#ffda58>Shadow Strike Orbs will be immediately cleared</color>, triggering <color=#ffda58>Shadow Strike</color> and dealing <color=#ffda58>Darkflow DMG</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <size=30>After fully casting <color=#ffda58>Shadow Strike 6 times</color>, the next Phase 2 Signature will deal <color=#ffda58>Darkflow DMG</color>, clear all <color=#ffda58>Darkflow stacks</color>, and deal additional <color=#ffda58>Darkflow DMG</color>.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: Crimson Weave has another way to cast <color=#ffda58>Shadow Strike</color>. Switch the control method in the <color=#ffda58>Leap Skill Interface</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: While in <color=#ffda58>Selfless Stance</color>, <color=#ffda58>continuously press and hold Basic Attack</color> to automatically ping Shadow Strike Orbs and cast <color=#ffda58>Shadow Strike</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap a Red Orb to enter the <color=#ffda58>Red Orb Combo</color>. Tap a Red Orb again to cast <color=#ffda58>Red Orb Combo 2</color> and gain <color=#ffda58>Starlight Points</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap a Blue Orb to enter the <color=#ffda58>Blue Orb Combo</color>. Tap a Blue Orb again to cast <color=#ffda58>Blue Orb Combo 2</color> and gain <color=#ffda58>Starlight Points</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <size=30>When casting the <color=#ffda58>first phase of Red/Blue Orb</color>, the enemy will be marked with <color=#ffda58>Thunderflare Mark</color>. Casting the <color=#ffda58>first phase of Red/Blue Orb</color> again will trigger a shockwave and grant the <color=#ffda58>Rockridge Stance</color> upon blocking.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: Casting the second phase of the Red/Blue Orb Combo grants <color=#ffda58>Starlight Points</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: With <color=#ffda58>Sword Shield</color> in hand and having at least 50 <color=#ffda58>Starlight Points</color>, tapping the Yellow Orb transforms the weapon into a <color=#ffda58>Shield Axe</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: With <color=#ffda58>Shield Axe</color> in hand, launching Basic Attacks converts <color=#ffda58>Starlight Points</color> into <color=#ffda58>Overload</color> and deals Lightning DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: When <color=#ffda58>Overload</color> or <color=#ffda58>Starlight Points</color> reaches 100 or more, pressing and holding Basic Attack casts <color=#ffda58>Meteoric Doom</color>, dealing massive Lightning DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: With <color=#ffda58>Shield Axe</color> in hand, tapping Signature Move casts <color=#ffda58>Signature - Starshard Slash</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Overload</color> is displayed here.

Name: Celica
Text: <size=30>While pressing and holding the Yellow Orb with at least <color=#ffda58>50 Starlight Points</color>, the Shield Axe can be combined to deal <color=#ffda58>Ignition DMG</color> to enemies and apply <color=#ffda58>Combustible Charge</color>.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: With <color=#ffda58>Sword Shield</color> in hand, tapping Signature Move casts <color=#ffda58>Signature - Cosmic Starstrike</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Next, I will show you Startrail's complete damage output cycle.

Name: Celica
Text: Cast the Red Orb Combo 2 twice to accumulate 100 <color=#ffda58>Starlight Points</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap the Yellow Orb to transform into the <color=#ffda58>Shield Axe</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: While in Shield Axe mode, continuously launch Basic Attacks to consume <color=#ffda58>Starlight Points</color> and gain <color=#ffda58>Overload</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Press and hold Basic Attack to consume all <color=#ffda58>Overload</color> and cast <color=#ffda58>Meteoric Doom</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap Signature to cast <color=#ffda58>Signature - Starshard Slash</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Next, I will show you Startrail's effect output cycle.

Name: Celica
Text: Casting <color=#ffda58>Inferno Cyclone</color> accumulates <color=#ffda58>Combustible Charge</color>. <color=#ffda58>Combustible Charge</color> and <color=#ffda58>Ignition Stacks</color> are displayed here.

Name: Celica
Text: Cast the Red Orb Combo 2 twice to accumulate <color=#ffda58>Starlight Points</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Tapping the Yellow Orb and casting <color=#ffda58>Inferno Cyclone</color> consumes at least <color=#ffda58>50</color> Starlight Points, accumulates <color=#ffda58>Combustible Charge</color>, and grants the <color=#ffda58>Blazing Mark</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: With <color=#ffda58>Sword Shield</color> in hand and possessing the <color=#ffda58>Blazing Mark</color>, tapping Signature casts <color=#ffda58>Signature - Cosmic Starstrike: Burn</color>, activating the <color=#ffda58>Ignition Effect</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: When Parhelion is in the <color=#ffda58>Wanderer Form</color>, only <color=#ffda58>Blue Orbs</color> will be generated. Pinging Blue Orbs twice triggers <color=#ffda58>Blue Orb Combo</color> and grants <color=#ffda58>Collapse Points</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: After casting the <color=#ffda58>Blue Orb</color> Skill, <color=#ffda58>holding Dodge</color> unleashes <color=#ffda58>Cosmic Afterglow</color> and grants <color=#ffda58>Collapse Points</color> based on the consumed Blue Orbs.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap Yellow Orb to cast <color=#ffda58>Forbidden Realm</color>. When equipped with the four-piece <color=#ffda58>Sothoth</color> set, additional <color=#ffda58>Phantom Points</color> are granted.

Name: Celica
Text: Tapping Signature casts <color=#ffda58>Signature - Prime Entity</color> and enters the <color=#ffda58>Dominator Form</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Consumes <color=#ffda58>Phantom Points</color> in <color=#ffda58>Dominator Form</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Phantom Annihilation</color> without consuming Dodge Gauge.

Name: Celica
Text: Dodge repeatedly to cast <color=#ffda58>Phantom Annihilation</color>. The <color=#ffda58>5th hit of Phantom Annihilation</color> grants <color=#ffda58>Collapse Mark</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: While in <color=#ffda58>Dominator Form</color> with a <color=#ffda58>Collapse Mark</color>, holding Dodge casts <color=#ffda58>Dimensional Collapse</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <size=30>When Parhelion is in <color=#ffda58>Dominator Form</color>, only <color=#ffda58>Red Orbs</color> will be generated. Pinging Red Orbs twice casts <color=#ffda58>Red Orb Combo</color> and the <color=#ffda58>4th hit of Phantom Annihilation</color>.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: Press and hold Dodge to cast <color=#ffda58>Dimensional Collapse</color> again to grant Signature Energy.

Name: Celica
Text: Tapping Signature casts <color=#ffda58>Signature - Silent Punishment</color> and exits <color=#ffda58>Dominator Form</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Next, I will show you Parhelion's complete damage output cycle.

Name: Celica
Text: After casting <color=#ffda58>Blue Orb Combo</color>, <color=#ffda58>press and hold Dodge</color> to cast Cosmic Afterglow and gain Collapse Points.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Tap Yellow Orb</color> to activate Forbidden Realm, then <color=#ffda58>cast Signature</color> to enter Dominator Form.

Name: Celica
Text: Cast the <color=#ffda58>5th hit of Phantom Annihilation</color> with <color=#ffda58>Consecutive Dodges</color> and gain <color=#ffda58>Collapse Mark</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Press and hold Dodge</color> to consume <color=#ffda58>Collapse Mark</color> and cast Dimensional Collapse.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap Red Orbs to replenish Signature Energy.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap Signature to cast <color=#ffda58>Signature - Silent Punishment</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: When Ishmael: Parhelion is in <color=#ffda58>Dominator Form</color>, her Base DMG Efficiency to <color=#ffda58>Equilibrium Field</color> will increase by 100%.

Name: Celica
Text: Next, let's walk through the complete cycle for Parhelion.

Name: Celica
Text: After releasing <color=#ffda58>Blue Orb Combo</color>, <color=#ffda58>press and hold Dodge</color> to cast Cosmic Afterglow, then <color=#ffda58>activate Forbidden Realm</color> and <color=#ffda58>tap Signature</color> to enter Dominator Form.

Name: Celica
Text: <size=30>Cast the <color=#ffda58>5th hit</color> of Phantom Annihilation with <color=#ffda58>Consecutive Dodges</color>, then <color=#ffda58>press and hold Dodge</color> to cast Dimensional Collapse. Once Energy is fully restored with 3-Ping, <color=#ffda58>cast Signature</color> Silent Punishment.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: After fully restoring Energy with <color=#ffda58>Red Orb 3-Ping</color>, <color=#ffda58>cast Signature</color> Silent Punishment.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Tap Blue Orb</color> to enter a Turning Combo. During the process, <color=#ffda58>tap Blue Orb</color> again to cast Chassé, gaining Yellow Orb(s) and Signature Energy.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Tap Signature</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Nighttime Encounter</color> and enter Crazy Gamble, gaining bonus Yellow Orb(s).

Name: Celica
Text: Ping Red Orb after a 3-Ping to enhance Card Rank and gain Signature Energy.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Tap Signature</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Dreamfall Showdown</color> and exit Crazy Gamble.

Name: Celica
Text: When you have <color=#ffda58>at least 3 Yellow Orbs</color>, press and hold Basic Attack to cast Night Embrace.

Name: Celica
Text: Tapping Yellow Orb will enhance Red Orbs. Tap Red Orb to deal massive Dark DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: Press and hold Basic Attack to gain the <color=#ffda58>Joker's Mark</color>. Keep pressing to spend Yellow Orbs to gain <color=#ffda58>Electric Charge</color> and Signature Energy.

Name: Celica
Text: Upon entering Crazy Gamble, you will draw 5 Hole Cards, and Yellow Orbs will be placed in the Orb Gauge.

Name: Celica
Text: During Crazy Gamble, pring Yellow Orbs to gain Red Orbs here.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap Signature again to cast <color=#ffda58>Dreamfall Showdown</color> and deal more damage based on Card Rank.

Name: Celica
Text: Lilith also comes with Plasma Beam related attacks.

Name: Celica
Text: Night Embrace can enhance Card Rank.

Name: Celica
Text: Card Rank will be enhanced based on Yellow Orbs consumed by <color=#ffda58>Night Embrace</color>. <color=#ffda58>Dreamfall Showdown</color> will deal more damage based on Card Rank.

Name: Celica
Text: At Max <color=#ffda58>Electric Charge</color>, casting <color=#ffda58>Dreamfall Showdown</color> will activate <color=#ffda58>Electric Storm Flash</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Tap Red Orb</color> to enter <color=#ffda58>Slurring</color> Combo. During the combo, <color=#ffda58>tap Red Orb</color> again to cast <color=#ffda58>Harmonics</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Tap Yellow Orb</color> to enter <color=#ffda58>Bow Chop</color> Combo. During the combo, <color=#ffda58>tap Yellow Orb</color> again to cast <color=#ffda58>Staccato</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Perform a 3-Ping</color> to obtain <color=#ffda58>Musical Note(s)</color>. Max 3 <color=#ffda58>Musical Notes</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Perform a Red Orb 3-Ping to gain 1 <color=#ffda58>Musical Note</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Press and Hold Basic Attack to trigger <color=#ffda58>Matrix</color> if it is not on cooldown. In Matrix, <color=#ffda58>tap Blue Orb</color> to cast Rhythmic Piercing.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Tap Signature</color> to cast Rainy Prelude and enter the <color=#ffda58>Flow State</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: When Selena is in the <color=#ffda58>Flow State</color>, 6 of the Signal Orbs will be converted to <color=#ffda58>Concerto Orbs</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap <color=#ffda58>Concerto Orb</color> to gain <color=#ffda58>Melody Point(s)</color>, Musical Note(s), Variation Point(s), and Signature Energy.

Name: Celica
Text: At <color=#ffda58>Max Melody Points</color>, <color=#ffda58>press and hold Dodge</color> to cast Melodic Outburst.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Press and hold Dodge</color> to cast Melodic Outburst.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Tap Signature</color> to cast Majestic Interlude and exit the <color=#ffda58>Flow State</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: When <color=#ffda58>Sinbreaker's Arrow</color> is cast for the first time, Echo will gain additional 16 Signature Energy and 60 Splendor Points.

Name: Celica
Text: Now is the tutorial for post-Leap <color=#ffda58>physical process</color>. Press and hold Basic Attack to enter <color=#ffda58>Tactical Cipher</color>. Ping Cipher Orbs to keep charging.

Name: Celica
Text: Press and hold Basic Attack to enter <color=#ffda58>Tactical Cipher</color>. Ping Cipher Orbs to keep charging.

Name: Celica
Text: Perform 1 Signal Orb 3-Ping to accumulate <color=#ffda58>Splendor Points</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Max <color=#ffda58>Splendor Points</color> reached.

Name: Celica
Text: Ping one Signal Orb of the <color=#ffda58>color same</color> to the Cipher Orbs to cast <color=#ffda58>Imprisoning Co-Strike</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Perform 1 Signal Orb 3-Ping again to restore Echo's Signature Energy.

Name: Celica
Text: Now Signature Energy is full. Tap Signature to cast <color=#ffda58>Celestial Edge</color> and gain the <color=#ffda58>Soul Shatter Mark</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: When you have the <color=#ffda58>Soul Shatter Mark</color>, ping one Signal Orb of the <color=#ffda58>color same</color> to the Cipher Orbs to cast <color=#ffda58>Soulbreaking Co-Strike</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: After Leap, Echo will deal <color=#ffda58>Glaciation DMG</color> and enhance <color=#ffda58>Effect: Glaciation</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Press and hold Dodge to expand a <color=#ffda58>Congelation Zone</color>. Tap Dodge to cast <color=#ffda58>Swift Archery</color> and <color=#ffda58>Freezing Rain</color>, restoring Signature Energy and Splendor Points and entering Cipher Orb(s).

Name: Celica
Text: When the <color=#ffda58>Splendor Points are full</color> in the Congelation Zone, press and hold Basic Attack to cast <color=#ffda58>Frosty Sorrow Co-Strike</color> and restore Signature Energy.

Name: Celica
Text: <size=33>Frosty Sorrow Co-Strike will <color=#ffda58>consume all Cipher Orbs, a maximum equal number of Signal Orbs</color>, and the <color=#ffda58>Soul Shatter Mark</color> (if available) to enhance <color=#ffda58>Effect: Glaciation</color> accordingly.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: Now Signature Energy is full. Tapping Signature to cast <color=#ffda58>Celestial Edge</color> in Congelation Zone will deal Glaciation DMG and activate the Congelation Mark instead.

Name: Celica
Text: When the <color=#ffda58>Congelation Mark</color> is activated, Echo will provide <color=#ffda58>Ice</color> DMG boost and <color=#ffda58>Glaciation</color> DMG boost instead.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Tap Red Orb</color> to enter <color=#ffda58>Slurring</color> Combo. During the combo, <color=#ffda58>tap Red Orb</color> again to cast <color=#ffda58>Harmonics</color> and gain 2 <color=#ffda58>Musical Notes</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Basic Attacks</color> can accumulate <color=#ffda58>Glaciation Value</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: With <color=#ffda58>10 Arctic Ice Layers</color>, press and hold Signature to generate <color=#ffda58>Ice Spikes</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Press and hold Signature</color> to generate <color=#ffda58>Ice Spikes</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: When there are <color=#ffda58>Ice Spikes</color>, some of Selena's skills will deal <color=#ffda58>Glaciation DMG</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Casting <color=#ffda58>Signature</color> again will end <color=#ffda58>Ice Spikes</color> and cast <color=#ffda58>Ice Burst</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Tap Signature</color> to cast Majestic Interlude and exit the <color=#ffda58>Flow State</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: By default, Vergil enters the battlefield wielding <color=#ffda58>Yamato</color>. If Vergil is not wielding the weapon you want, tap the corresponding Signal Orb to switch to it.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap Blue Orb to switch to <color=#ffda58>Mirage Edge</color>. Tap again to cast <color=#ffda58>Drive</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap Red Orb to switch back to <color=#ffda58>Yamato</color>. Devil Soul can be pinged with any weapon.

Name: Celica
Text: In regular form, you can gain SDT by pinging the Devil Soul with any weapon or launching a combo strike.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap Red Orb to cast <color=#ffda58>Void Slash</color>, ping the Devil Soul, and gain SDT.

Name: Celica
Text: At full SDT, tap Signature to activate <color=#ffda58>SDT Form</color>. You will lose SDT over time in this form.

Name: Celica
Text: At full SDT, tap Signature to activate <color=#ffda58>SDT Form</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Specific attacks in the SDT Form will grant <color=#ffda58>JCE Points</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Take <color=#ffda58>Yamato</color> as an example. Tap Basic Attack to make Vergil cast <color=#ffda58>Yamato Combo</color> at the cost of the Devil Soul and gain JCE Points.

Name: Celica
Text: At full Signature Energy, tap Signature to cast <color=#ffda58>Judgment Cut End</color> and exit the SDT Form.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap <color=#ffda58>Yellow Orb</color> to switch to <color=#ffda58>Beowulf</color>. Tap Yellow Orb again to attack with Beowulf.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap <color=#ffda58>Yellow Orb</color>, then press and hold Basic Attack to cast <color=#ffda58>Rising Sun</color>, gaining SDT again and making the next <color=#ffda58>Judgment Cut End</color> deal Physical DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Press and hold Jump</color> until the SDT Bar blinks, then release to cast <color=#ffda58>Enhanced Dragon Breaker 2</color> and restore Signature Energy and JCE Points.

Name: Celica
Text: Now let's get familiar with Vergil's <color=#ffda58>basic controls</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Now let's get familiar with Vergil's <color=#ffda58>Physical Practice</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Press and hold Jump</color> until the DT Bar blinks, then release to cast <color=#ffda58>Dragon Breaker 2</color> and restore Signature Energy and JCE Points.

Name: Celica
Text: Now, let's learn about <color=#ffda58>Yamato's</color> Effect Practice.

Name: Celica
Text: Yamato has <color=#ffda58>two</color> Effect Practices.

Name: Celica
Text: <size=29>Sequence 1: While equipped with the <color=#ffda58>Ultima Slash</color> effect, <color=#ffda58>press and hold Basic Attack</color> to consume 3 Truewill and cast an <color=#ffda58>enhanced Judgment Cut</color>, dealing higher damage and restoring <color=#ffda58>JCE Points</color>.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: Practice 2: Tap Basic Attack to cast <color=#ffda58>Yamato Combo</color> and restore Signature Energy and JCE Points.

Name: Celica
Text: Now Signature Energy is full. Tap Signature to cast <color=#ffda58>Judgment Cut End</color>, consuming the remaining Truewill to deal damage.

Name: Celica
Text: Next up is the tutorial of the <color=#ffda58>Mirage Edge's</color> Effect Practice. Tap Blue Orb to switch to <color=#ffda58>Mirage Edge</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Perform a Devil Soul 3-Ping to accumulate SDT.

Name: Celica
Text: When having Effect: <color=#ffda58>Ultima Slash</color>, tap Blue Orb, then <color=#ffda58>press and hold Basic Attack before releasing</color> during the end lag of the skill to cast <color=#ffda58>Over Drive</color> and restore Sharp Reserve.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Tap Basic Attack</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Mirage Edge Combo</color>. Each hit triggers Effect and restores Signature Energy and JCE Points.

Name: Celica
Text: The Signature Energy is full. Tap Signature to cast <color=#ffda58>Judgment Cut End</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Press and hold Yellow Orb</color> to leap backward and enter Charge Stance, then spray a barrage of bullets upon release, dealing Dark DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Press and hold Blue Orb</color> to enter Charge Stance while wielding the gunsword to fire continuously, then step back upon release, dealing Dark DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Tap Signature</color> to enter the <color=#ffda58>Panoptic Segmentation</color> Mode.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Press and hold Red Orb</color> to enter Charge Stance. If Absurdum Points are <color=#ffda58>fully charged</color>, release Red Orb, then <color=#ffda58>tap/press and hold Basic Attack</color> to unleash a slash.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Press and hold Red Orb</color> to enter Charge Stance. If Absurdum Points are <color=#ffda58>not fully charged</color>, release Red Orb, then <color=#ffda58>tap/press and hold Basic Attack</color> to unleash a slash, dealing <color=#ffda58>Ignition</color> DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Tap Signature</color> to plunge down and strike the target, exiting the <color=#ffda58>Panoptic Segmentation</color> Mode.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Press and hold Basic Attack</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Real Impact</color> and gain Judgement Points and Combustible Charge.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Press and hold Yellow Orb</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Red Hot Night - Charge</color> and gain DT, automatically pinging Signal Orbs. <color=#ffda58>Release Yellow Orb</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Red Hot Night - Burst</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Press and hold Signature</color> to cast different Signature Moves based on the amount of Judgement Points.

Name: Celica
Text: When there are <color=#ffda58>800 or fewer</color> Judgement Points, <color=#ffda58>press and hold Signature</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>SDT - Sin Inferno</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: When Judgement Points are <color=#ffda58>above 800</color>, <color=#ffda58>press and hold Signature</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>SDT - Final Judgement</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Tap Signature</color> to enter the <color=#ffda58>SDT Form</color> and fill the SDT Gauge to the maximum.

Name: Celica
Text: Cast Signal Orb Skills in the <color=#ffda58>SDT Form</color> to convert <color=#ffda58>SDT</color> to <color=#ffda58>Judgement Points</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Press and hold Red Orb</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>SDT - Sin Stinger</color> to consume SDT to pull in nearby targets and gain Judgement Points.

Name: Celica
Text: <size=29>When SDT is full, <color=#ffda58>tap Yellow Orb</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>SDT - Demolition</color>, pulling in targets in a large area, consuming all SDT to gain Judgement Points.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Press and hold Blue Orb</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>SDT - The Luce</color>, consuming SDT to gain Judgement Points.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Tap Signature</color> to cast different Signature Moves based on the current Judgement Points and exit the SDT Form.

Name: Celica
Text: You can <color=#ffda58>press and hold Red/Blue Orb</color> or <color=#ffda58>press Yellow Orb</color> when SDT is full to consume all DT. In this tutorial, we will use <color=#ffda58>pressing and holding Red Orb</color> as example.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Press and hold Red Orb</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>SDT - Sin Stinger</color> and consume all <color=#ffda58>SDT</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Now let's get familiar with Dante's <color=#ffda58>basic controls</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: By default, Dante enters the battlefield wielding <color=#ffda58>Devil Sword Dante</color>. If Dante is not holding the weapon you want, tap the corresponding Signal Orb to switch to it.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap <color=#ffda58>Red Orb</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Stinger</color>. Tap <color=#ffda58>Red Orb</color> again to cast the <color=#ffda58>Million Stab</color> combo.

Name: Celica
Text: At full DT, <color=#ffda58>press and hold Basic Attack</color> to convert them to Judgment Points.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Press and hold Basic Attack</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Dance Macabre</color> and gain Judgement Points.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Tap Blue Orb</color> to switch to Balrog, then <color=#ffda58>tap Blue Orb</color> again to cast <color=#ffda58>Heavy Jolt</color>. Tap <color=#ffda58>Blue Orb</color> once more to cast the <color=#ffda58>Fly Dragon</color> combo.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Perform Blue Orb 3-Pings</color> and swipe enemies. Each Blue Orb 3-Ping will grant <color=#ffda58>2</color> Yellow Orbs.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Press and hold Basic Attack</color> until half or fully charged to cast Shadowhunt Tremor.

Name: Celica
Text: During Untamed Impulse, <color=#ffda58>press and hold Basic Attack</color> until fully charged to accumulate Signature Energy and <color=#ffda58>heal</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Tap Signature</color> to cast Tempered in Midnight, remove all Yellow Orbs, gain Red Orbs, and enter Last Blaze.

Name: Celica
Text: Vera will be granted <color=#ffda58>Absolute Pyre</color> that increases Base DMG based on the number of Yellow Orbs removed by <color=#ffda58>Tempered in Midnight</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Remove Red Orbs</color> to gain <color=#ffda58>Rekindled Doom</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Tap Red Orb</color> to enter <color=#ffda58>Rising Flames</color> Combo. During the combo, <color=#ffda58>tap Red Orb</color> again to cast <color=#ffda58>Searing Current</color>, during which time gain <color=#ffda58>Rekindled Doom</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: During Last Blaze, <color=#ffda58>press and hold Basic Attack</color> to spend Rekindled Doom and cast Hellfire Crucible, Razor Whirlwind, or Rending Ravage.

Name: Celica
