Text: During Last Blaze, <color=#ffda58>tap Signature</color> to cast Scorched in Void and enter Untamed Impulse, triggering Time Lag Calculation and leaving behind <color=#ffda58>Evernight Flame</color> that heals ally units.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Press and hold Signature</color> to remove all Yellow Orbs, gain Red Orbs, enter Last Blaze, and gain <color=#ffda58>200 Darkflow Reserve</color> and <color=#ffda58>Penal Immersion</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Tap Signature</color> to remove all Yellow Orbs, gain Red Orbs, and enter Last Blaze.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Press and hold Signature</color> to remove all Yellow Orbs, gain Red Orbs, enter Last Blaze, and gain <color=#ffda58>200 Darkflow Reserve</color> and <color=#ffda58>Penal Immersion</color>. With Penal Immersion, Vera: Geiravor will deal <color=#ffda58>Darkflow DMG</color> through some skills.

Name: Celica
Text: During Last Blaze, <color=#ffda58>tap Signature</color> to cast Scorched in Void and enter Untamed Impulse, triggering Time Lag Calculation and <color=#ffda58>removing Penal Immersion</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Casting Hellfire Crucible, Razor Whirlwind, and Rending Ravage when having <color=#ffda58>Penal Immersion</color> will grant <color=#ffda58>200, 400, 1000 Darkflow Reserve</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Tap Red Orb</color> when having Penal Immersion. Vera gains <color=#ffda58>200 Darkflow Reserve</color> for each Red Orb consumed. Meanwhile, gains <color=#ffda58>Rekindled Doom</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: When both DT and Devil Arm Energy are full, cast <color=#ffda58>Dance Macabre</color> to consume all DT and Devil Arm Energy to gain <color=#ffda58>Devilsword Mark</color> and become enhanced.

Name: Celica
Text: When both DT and Devil Arm Energy are full, cast <color=#ffda58>Real Impact</color> to consume all DT and Devil Arm Energy to gain <color=#ffda58>Ignition Mark</color> and become enhanced.

Name: Celica
Text: You can <color=#ffda58>press and hold Red/Blue Orb</color> or <color=#ffda58>press Yellow Orb</color> when SDT is full to consume all DT and gain <color=#ffda58>Combustible Charge</color>. In this tutorial, we will use <color=#ffda58>pressing and holding Red Orb</color> as example.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Press and hold Red Orb</color> to deal <color=#ffda58>Ignition</color> DMG and apply <color=#ffda58>Combustible Charge</color> at the cost of all <color=#ffda58>SDT</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <size=29><color=#ffda58>Tap Signature</color> to cast Signature based on the current Judgement Points, dealing <color=#ffda58>Ignition DMG</color>, converting <color=#ffda58>Combustible</color> into <color=#ffda58>Ignition</color> of equal stacks, and exiting the SDT Form.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: In <color=#ffda58>Twilight Form</color>, <color=#ffda58>tap Red Orb</color> consecutively to cast <color=#ffda58>Thorned Waves</color> Combo, <color=#ffda58>Chained Lashes</color> Combo, and <color=#ffda58>Repeat Sinner</color> Combo.

Name: Celica
Text: The Matrix <color=#ffda58>cannot be triggered by successfully dodging attacks</color> when Bianca: Crepuscule is in <color=#ffda58>Twilight Form</color>. However, <color=#ffda58>pressing and holding Dodge</color> will make her activate <color=#ffda58>Abyssal Domain</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: During <color=#ffda58>Abyssal Domain</color>, enter Red Orbs 3 times to gain <color=#ffda58>Abyssal Value</color> and increase <color=#ffda58>Abyssal - Twilight Fall's</color> damage.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Pressing and holding Dodge</color> allows Bianca to perform a <color=#ffda58>Matrix Simulation</color>, activating the Abyssal Domain. When the Abyssal Domain ends, casts <color=#ffda58>Abyssal - Twilight Fall</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Tap Red Orb</color> consecutively to perform combo, while gaining <color=#ffda58>Commandment</color> and <color=#ffda58>Prayer</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: At Max <color=#ffda58>Commandment</color>, hold <color=#ffda58>Blue Orb</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Whip Dance</color>. At Max <color=#ffda58>Severed Sea stacks</color>, <color=#ffda58>tap/press and hold Blue Orb</color> again to cast <color=#ffda58>Devouring Sky</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Hold Blue Orb</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Whip Dance</color> and gain Severed Sea stacks. Then, <color=#ffda58>tap/press and hold Blue Orb</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Devouring Sky</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Severed Sea stacks</color> are full. Tap or press and hold to cast <color=#ffda58>Severed Sea - Devouring Sky</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Tap/Press and hold Blue Orb</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Severed Sea - Devouring Sky</color>, gaining Signature Energy and <color=#ffda58>Prayer</color>. Bianca: Crepuscule becomes invincible but is unable to cast Signature Move during so.

Name: Celica
Text: Consuming <color=#ffda58>Prayer stacks</color> increases the DMG of the Signature Move.

Name: Celica
Text: In <color=#ffda58>Twilight Form</color>, tap Signature to cast <color=#ffda58>Shadow Strangle</color>, triggering Time Lag Calculation, gaining a Signal Orb, and dealing Dark DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Tap/Press and hold the Core Passive Bar</color> to switch Bianca's form, changing Bianca from <color=#ffda58>Twilight Form</color> to <color=#ffda58>Radiance Form</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Switch Bianca's <color=#ffda58>Twilight Form</color> into <color=#ffda58>Radiance Form</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: In <color=#ffda58>Radiance Form</color>, <color=#ffda58>tap Yellow Orbs</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Dawnbreak</color> combos. During combos, <color=#ffda58>tap Yellow Orbs</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Lightwalker</color> combos, gaining <color=#ffda58>Commandment</color> and <color=#ffda58>Raydiance Storage Value</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: At Max <color=#ffda58>Commandment</color>, hold <color=#ffda58>Blue Orb</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Sword Dance</color>. At Max <color=#ffda58>Severed Sea stacks</color>, <color=#ffda58>tap or press and hold Blue Orb</color> again to cast <color=#ffda58>Shattering Sky</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Hold Blue Orb</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Sword Dance</color> and gain <color=#ffda58>Severed Sea stacks</color>. Then, <color=#ffda58>tap/press and hold Blue Orb</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Shattering Sky</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Severed Sea stacks</color> are full. Tap or press and hold to cast <color=#ffda58>Severed Sea - Shattering Sky</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Tap/Press and hold Blue Orb</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Shattering Sky</color>, dealing <color=#ffda58>Raydiance DMG</color> and gaining Signature Energy, Prayer, and <color=#ffda58>Raydiance Value</color>. Bianca: Crepuscule becomes invincible but is unable to cast Signature Move during so.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Tap Signature</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Ember Extinction</color>, dealing <color=#ffda58>Raydiance DMG</color>, triggering Time Lag Calculation, and gaining a Signal Orb.

Name: Celica
Text: When the <color=#ffda58>Raydiance effect is activated</color>, <color=#ffda58>Blue Orb</color> skills can be enhanced by spending <color=#ffda58>Raydiance stacks</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Gain Signature Move DMG increase based on <color=#ffda58>Prayer stacks</color>. Casting <color=#ffda58>Ember Extinction</color> can activate <color=#ffda58>Raydiance Effect</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Commandant, <color=#ffda58>Epitaph</color>'s Leap is completed. Let's learn about his new abilities.

Name: Celica
Text: Ping orbs to accumulate <color=#ffda58>Signature Energy</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Press and hold Signature to activate <color=#ffda58>Corvus Covenant</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <size=27><color=#ffda58>Tap Basic Attack</color> to cast Flaming Bombardment and gain Blaze Orbs. <color=#ffda58>Press and hold Dodge</color> to pull targets in, then tap <color=#ffda58>Blaze Orbs</color> to <color=#ffda58>Parry</color>. Cast <color=#ffda58>Thermal Erosion</color> consecutively to deal Darkflow DMG</size>.

Name: Celica
Text: While <color=#ffda58>Corvus Covenant</color> is active, <color=#ffda58>Thermal Erosion</color> generates 200 more <color=#ffda58>Darkflow Reserve</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: While <color=#ffda58>Corvus Covenant</color> is active, <color=#ffda58>Signature - Explosive Purge</color> deals Darkflow DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: While in Silent Consent, <color=#ffda58>ping Yellow Orbs</color> to cast Spiral Bind, dealing Physical DMG and gaining Cutting Edge.

Name: Celica
Text: While in Silent Consent, <color=#ffda58>ping Blue Orbs</color> to cast Silk Snare, dealing Physical DMG, pulling in enemies, and gaining Cutting Edge.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Press and hold Dodge</color> to generate Cutting Edge. While doing so, auto-ping two sets of 3-ping Signal Orbs to grant Extra DMG for Purgatory Shear.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Press and hold Dodge</color> to activate Disentangle. Release Dodge to cast Purgatory Shear and gain Sharp Reserve and Signature Energy.

Name: Celica
Text: While in Silent Consent, <color=#ffda58>tap Signature</color> to activate Rampant Disaster, which grants infinite Red Orbs.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Ping Reb Orbs</color> and perform Reb Orb combo to gain Devouring Etch, which increases the DMG of Severing Bite.

Name: Celica
Text: While Rampant Disaster is active, <color=#ffda58>tap Signature</color> to cast Severing Bite, which consumes all Devouring Etch stacks and ends Rampant Disaster.

Name: Celica
Text: While Rampant Disaster is active, <color=#ffda58>press and hold Signature</color> to auto-ping orbs, then cast Severing Bite to deal Ultima Slash DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Press and hold Basic Attack</color> to consume all current <color=#ffda58>Cutting Edge</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Focused Rending</color> and gain Signature Energy and Sharp Reserve.

Name: Celica
Text: <size=27><color=#ffda58>Press and hold Dodge</color> to activate Disentangle, auto-ping two sets of 3-ping Signal Orbs, and gain <color=#ffda58>Cutting Edge</color>. Release Dodge to cast Purgatory Shear and gain Signature Energy.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: <size=27><color=#ffda58>Press and hold Dodge</color> to activate Disentangle, auto-ping two sets of 3-ping Signal Orbs, and gain <color=#ffda58>Cutting Edge</color>. Release Dodge to cast Purgatory Shear and gain Signature Energy and <color=#ffda58>Sharp Reserve</color>.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: At this time, <color=#ffda58>press and hold Signature</color> to auto-ping Signal Orbs, gain <color=#ffda58>Shattered Silk</color>, and deal <color=#ffda58>Ultima Slash</color> DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: During Adjudication, <color=#ffda58>tap Blue Orb</color> to enter <color=#ffda58>Coiling Horn</color> Combo. <color=#ffda58>Tap Blue Orb</color> again to enter <color=#ffda58>Bone Lock</color> Combo, gaining <color=#ffda58>Chaos Value</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: During Adjudication, <color=#ffda58>when Chaos Value reaches 100</color>, tap Yellow Orb to cast <color=#ffda58>Severing Domain</color>, slamming into the ground and dealing Physical DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: During Adjudication, <color=#ffda58>tap or press and hold Signature</color> to enter Execution, gaining 9 Red Orbs and dealing DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: While airborne during Execution, <color=#ffda58>press and hold Dodge</color> or <color=#ffda58>tap Dodge</color> without moving the joystick to cast <color=#ffda58>Blazing Star</color>, recovering one Red Orb each time.

Name: Celica
Text: While airborne during Execution, <color=#ffda58>tap Red Orb</color> to consecutively cast <color=#ffda58>Lateral Restraint, Piercing Thorn, and Flamefall</color> Combos, gaining <color=#ffda58>Purge Value</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: While grounded during Execution, <color=#ffda58>tap Red Orb</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Rampant March</color> and gain <color=#ffda58>Purge Value</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: While grounded during Execution, <color=#ffda58>tap Basic Attack</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Unified Order</color>. During the 2nd hit of the Basic Attack, leaps into the air and gains <color=#ffda58>Purge Value</color> in the process.

Name: Celica
Text: <size=27>While airborne during Execution, <color=#ffda58>tap Yellow Orb</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Heavy Edge</color>, slashing toward the ground and clearing Red Orbs. While grounded, <color=#ffda58>tap Yellow Orb</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Piercing Judgment</color>. Both grant <color=#ffda58>Signature Energy</color>.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: During Execution, <color=#ffda58>press and hold Yellow Orb</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Torrential Blast</color>, <color=#ffda58>consuming Purge Value</color> to deal DMG and heal.

Name: Celica
Text: <size=27>During Execution, <color=#ffda58>tap Signature</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Ruinous Ember</color>, triggering Time Lag Calculation to exit Execution and enter <color=#ffda58>Adjudication</color>, leaving behind <color=#ffda58>Vital Void</color> that restores allies' HP.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: During Adjudication, <color=#ffda58>tap Signature</color> to enter Execution, gaining 9 Red Orbs and dealing <color=#ffda58>Physical DMG</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Now, let's learn about the second Combat Practice. During Adjudication, <color=#ffda58>tap Signature</color> to enter Execution.

Name: Celica
Text: During Adjudication, <color=#ffda58>press and hold Signature</color> to enter Execution, gaining 9 Red Orbs and dealing <color=#ffda58>Ignition DMG</color>. This can apply <color=#ffda58>Searing Sight</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Now, let's learn about the second Effect Practice. During Adjudication, <color=#ffda58>press and hold Signature</color> to enter Execution.

Name: Celica
Text: When <color=#ffda58>Purge Value</color> is ≥1, <color=#ffda58>press and hold Yellow Orb</color> to continuously consume <color=#ffda58>Purge Value</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <size=28>While in midair, <color=#ffda58>tapping Yellow Orbs</color> pings <color=#ffda58>Red Orbs</color>. Pinging 9 or more Red Orbs grants <color=#ffda58>Sin Mark</color>.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Sin Mark</color> can enhance <color=#ffda58>Piercing Judgment</color> cast by tapping Yellow Orb while grounded. After casting Piercing Judgment, <color=#ffda58>removes this mark</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>3-Ping Yellow Orbs</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Reddened Naught</color>, gaining <color=#ffda58>Crescent Points and Eclipse Points</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Press and hold Signature</color> to enter <color=#ffda58>Finality</color>. This triggers Time Lag Calculation, granting <color=#ffda58>Eclipse Points</color>, maxing out Crescent Points, and activating <color=#ffda58>Eclipse Stance</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: After entering <color=#ffda58>Finality</color>, <color=#ffda58>press and hold Basic Attack</color> to enter <color=#ffda58>Reaping Moon</color>, gathering surrounding enemies and gaining <color=#ffda58>Crescent Points</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Tap Signature</color>. The first <color=#ffda58>Lunar Downfall</color> cast after entering the battlefield restores Signal Orbs.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Press and hold Dodge</color> until Energy is full to cast <color=#ffda58>Shattering Moon</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Tap Signature</color> to enter <color=#ffda58>Main Sequence</color>, triggering Time Lag Calculation.

Name: Celica
Text: During <color=#ffda58>3-Pings</color>, can <color=#ffda58>additionally eliminate</color> 3-Ping Orbs to deal Extra DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: After entering <color=#ffda58>Main Sequence</color>, <color=#ffda58>press and hold Basic Attack</color> to enter <color=#ffda58>Reaping Moon</color>, gathering surrounding enemies and gaining <color=#ffda58>Crescent Points</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Ping Red Orbs</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Veil Pierce</color>, gaining <color=#ffda58>Flying Blades</color>. Can ping Red Orbs again during this time.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Ping Yellow Orbs</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Scattered Delusion</color>, gaining <color=#ffda58>Flying Blades</color>. Can ping Yellow Orbs again during this time.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Tap Dodge</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Chain Light</color>, calling down <color=#ffda58>Flash Thunder</color>. If Flying Blades exist, additionally calls down Swift Thunder.

Name: Celica
Text: When having <color=#ffda58>4 Flying Blades</color>, <color=#ffda58>press and hold Dodge</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Heavenly Flash</color> and gain Signature Energy.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Tap Signature</color> to enter <color=#ffda58>Dream Dive</color>, converting Red and Yellow Orbs into equal amounts of <color=#ffda58>Blue Orbs</color>, clearing Flying Blades, and triggering Time Lag Calculation.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Tap Signature</color> to enter <color=#ffda58>Dream Dive</color>, consuming <color=#ffda58>Darkflow stacks</color> to deal Darkflow DMG and enter Darkcross Form.

Name: Celica
Text: When <color=#ffda58>tapping Signature</color> to cast Dream Dive with <color=#ffda58>10 Darkflow stacks</color>, prioritizes consuming Darkflow stacks and deals Darkflow DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Ping Blue Orb</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Phantom Lock</color>. During this period, ping Blue Orb again to cast <color=#ffda58>Phantom Break</color> and gain <color=#ffda58>White Orbs</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <size=27><color=#ffda58>Tap Mirror Blade Orb</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Mirror Flight</color>. This consumes White Orbs and grants <color=#ffda58>Flow Points</color>, Delicate Heart, and Signature Energy. When in Darkcross Form, deals Darkflow DMG instead.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: <size=27><color=#ffda58>Press and hold Basic Attack</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Startled Dream</color>. While it's active, continue <color=#ffda58>pressing and holding Basic Attack</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Light Seeker</color>, gaining Delicate Heart and Signature Energy.</size> Both Startled Dream and Light Seeker consume <color=#ffda58>Flow Points</color>

Name: Celica
Text: <size=27>During Dream Dive, <color=#ffda58>tap Signature</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Mirrored Renewal</color>, converting Blue Orbs and Mirror Blade Orbs into equal amounts of Red and Yellow Orbs, consuming all <color=#ffda58>Delicate Heart</color> stacks and enhancing this Signature's effect.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: <size=27>While in Darkcross Form, <color=#ffda58>tap Signature</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Mirrored Renewal</color>, dealing <color=#ffda58>Darkflow DMG</color>. When having <color=#ffda58>12 Delicate Heart stacks</color>, deals additional Darkflow DMG and gains Darkflow Reserve.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: During Dream Dive, <color=#ffda58>press and hold Dodge</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Stacked Light</color>, quickly pinging orbs to gain Signature Energy. Can only be cast once during Dream Dive.

Name: Celica
Text: Stage complete! Go to the Interaction Point to exit the Tutorial stage.

Name: Celica
Text: <size=27><color=#ffda58>Tap Mirror Blade Orb</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Mirror Flight</color>, gaining <color=#ffda58>Flow Points</color>, Delicate Heart, and Signature Energy. When in Darkcross Form, deals <color=#ffda58>Darkflow DMG</color> instead.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: Tap Signature to cast <color=#ffda58>Lunar Downfall</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Ping Red and Yellow Orbs to gain <color=#ffda58>Flying Blades</color>. When having 4 <color=#ffda58>Flying Blades</color>, press and hold Dodge to cast <color=#ffda58>Heavenly Flash</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Ping <color=#ffda58>White Orbs</color> to gain <color=#ffda58>Flow Points</color>. When having <color=#ffda58>Flow Points</color>, press and hold Basic Attack during Dream Dive to cast <color=#ffda58>Dawn Dream</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: When casting <color=#ffda58>Mirror Flight</color>, <color=#ffda58>Dawn Dream</color>, or <color=#ffda58>Thousand Rays</color>, accumulates <color=#ffda58>Delicate Heart</color>. <color=#ffda58>Delicate Heart</color> increases the DMG of <color=#ffda58>Signature - Mirrored Renewal</color>.

Name: Vera
Text: Familiarize yourself with the basic moves of Cerberus members first.

Name: Vera
Text: Go to the control panel and select a character.

Name: Vera
Text: Whose combat style would you like to learn?

Name: Vera
Text: Looks like we already know each other well enough.

Name: Vera
Text: Looks like we already know each other well enough.

Name: Vera
Text: Looks like we already know each other well enough.

Name: Vera
Text: Stop wasting time. Who do you want to train with?

Name: Vera
Text: Key technique to master: Core Passive - <color=#ffda58>Lightning Fall</color>

Name: Vera
Text: After a 3-Ping, tap Basic Attack to trigger <color=#ffda58>Spear Lunge</color> and get 1 stack of <color=#ffda58>Electric Charge</color>.

Name: Vera
Text: 3-Ping Follow-Up and <color=#ffda58>Signature</color> can both generate stacks of <color=#ffda58>Electric Charge</color>. <color=#ffda58>Lightning Fall</color> can be cast when Electric Charges are present.

Name: Vera
Text: <color=#ffda58>Press and hold Basic Attack</color> to cast Lightning Fall.

Name: Vera
Text: If Phoenix is equipped and upgraded to SS-Rank, <color=#ffda58>casting Signature Move</color> will immediately trigger <color=#ffda58>Lightning Fall</color>.

Name: No. 21
Text: Key technique to master: Core Passive - <color=#ffda58>Wolfish Twilight</color>

Name: No. 21
Text: After a 3-Ping, ping orbs to activate <color=#ffda58>Deceleration Field</color> and increase Follow-Up DMG. Cast Basic Attacks while the <color=#ffda58>purple mark</color> is active to trigger <color=#ffda58>Dead-on Pounce</color>.

Name: No. 21
Text: No.21 gains Wolfspirit Points from <color=#ffda58>Forceful Pounce</color>. <color=#ffda58>Dead-on Pounce</color> generates even more Wolfspirit Points.

Name: No. 21
Text: At max Wolfspirit Points, press and hold Basic Attack to cast <color=#ffda58>Growling Wolfspirit</color> to gain Energy and heal ally's HP.

Name: No. 21
Text: <color=#ffda58>Signature</color> can deal high DMG and trigger Time Lag Calculation.

Name: Noctis
Text: Key technique to master: Core Passive - <color=#ffda58>Blast Orb</color>

Name: Noctis
Text: Press and hold Basic Attack to gain Signature Energy over time. Once <color=#ffda58>Energy is full</color>, cast Signature to enter <color=#ffda58>Thunder Burst Form</color>.

Name: Noctis
Text: In the <color=#ffda58>Thunder Burst Form</color>, <color=#ffda58>a single orb</color> will be converted into an <color=#ffda58>Overload Orb</color>. The <color=#ffda58>Overload Orb</color> will be placed first by default.

Name: Noctis
Text: The <color=#ffda58>Overload Orb</color> will be converted into a <color=#ffda58>Blast Orb</color> after some time, which can be cast at no additional cost. Otherwise, an <color=#ffda58>additional</color> single orb will be pinged when pinging an Overload Orb.

Name: Noctis
Text: After pinging <color=#ffda58>Overload Orbs</color> and <color=#ffda58>Blast Orbs</color>, press and hold Basic Attack to cast <color=#ffda58>Thunderclap Strike</color> and gain Engine Points. Engine Points can increase Noctis' Signature DMG.

Name: Vera
Text: Temporary Story

Name: Vera
Text: ...I'll do it first.

Name: Vera
Text: Ping a set of orbs first.

Name: Vera
Text: <color=#ffda58>Pinging orbs</color> and <color=#ffda58>Basic Attacks</color> can both generate <color=#ffda58>Synergy Energy</color>, which is displayed on the <color=#ffda58>Synergy Bar</color> below the button.

Name: Vera
Text: When <color=#ffda58>Synergy Energy</color> is full, simply cast a <color=#ffda58>Signature</color> to activate the <color=#ffda58>Synergy Strike</color>.

Name: Vera
Text: <color=#ffda58>Synergy Strike</color> can switch between characters regardless of the switch cooldown. The selected character will stay in battle and provide bonuses. For example, I can <color=#ffda58>break the target's Super Armor</color> faster.

Name: No. 21
Text: <color=#ffda58>Core Passive</color> can also activate <color=#ffda58>Synergy Strike</color>. When it's triggered while casting <color=#ffda58>Growling Wolfspirit</color>, I will enter a <color=#ffda58>Synergy Time</color> with slow motion.

Name: No. 21
Text: I can <color=#ffda58>restore HP</color>. Idiot Noctis does nothing... Um, he can <color=#ffda58>pull enemies in</color>.

Name: Noctis
Text: I can trigger <color=#ffda58>Synergy Strike</color> after casting Signature Move. Feel free to switch standby characters based on the battle situation.

Name: Construct
Text: You think you can just bail after messing with us? Looks like you little pups really need a proper lesson.

Name: Construct
Text: You better recognize your place! Brothers, let's rough 'em up!

Name: Vera
Text: Lowly scums. Do you really think you can challenge Cerberus?

Name: Vera
Text: Work with each other from now on. Do you understand?

Name: No. 21
Text: Working with Noctis... Tch.

Name: Noctis
Text: Do you think I want to do that?

Name: Vera
Text: At max <color=#ffda58>Synergy Energy</color>, I can cast <color=#ffda58>Lightning Fall</color> to activate <color=#ffda58>Synergy Strike</color>.

Name: No. 21
Text: After casting <color=#ffda58>Sky-ripping Arcflash</color>, I will enter a <color=#ffda58>Synergy Time</color> with slow motion.

Name: Hanged Man
Text: This is my place. None shall escape without paying a toll!

Name: Hanged Man
Text: What's that look on your faces?! Go get them!

Name: Vera
Text: Now try to cast <color=#ffda58>Synergy Attack</color> with all three members together.

Name: Vera
Text: First, trigger a <color=#ffda58>Synergy Strike</color>.

Name: No. 21
Text: Each <color=#ffda58>Synergy Strike</color> will accumulate <color=#ffda58>20</color> Energy.

Name: No. 21
Text: We have no time to delay. Send them to hell right away.

Name: No. 21
Text: <color=#ffda58>The Synergy Attack used by all three members</color> will deal massive DMG. Make use of it whenever it's ready.

Name: No. 21
Text: The Energy Limit is <color=#ffda58>99</color>. Once it is full, you can send the enemies to hell with one single tap.

Name: Vera
Text: <color=#ffda58>Synergy Strike</color> can switch between characters regardless of the switch cooldown. The selected character will stay in battle and provide bonuses. For example, I can <color=#ffda58>break the target's Super Armor</color> faster.

Name: No. 21
Text: We have no time to delay. Send them to hell right away.

Name: Vera
Text: First trigger <color=#ffda58>Synergy Strike</color> once.\nVera needs to <color=#ffda58>press and hold Basic Attack</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Lightning Fall</color>.\nOthers <color=#ffda58>cast Ultimate</color>.

Name: Vera
Text: Seems like you want to know me better.

Name: Vera
Text: Looks like we still have a long way to go.

Name: No. 21
Text: Commandant has chosen me.

Name: No. 21
Text: Looks like training is not needed this time.

Name: No. 21
Text: Looks like training is not needed this time.

Name: No. 21
Text: Looks like training is not needed this time.

Name: No. 21
Text: We need more training together.

Name: Noctis
Text: Yo, wanna spar with me?

Name: Noctis
Text: I'll take it as a no.

Name: Noctis
Text: I'll take it as a no.

Name: Noctis
Text: I'll take it as a no.

Name: Noctis
Text: Well, sparring is still necessary, right?

Name: Vera
Text: First, familiarize yourself with the basic moves of Cerberus members.

Name: Vera
Text: Go to the control panel and select a character.

Name: No. 21
Text: First, familiarize yourself with the basic moves of Cerberus members.

Name: No. 21
Text: Go to the control panel and select a character.

Name: Noctis
Text: First, familiarize yourself with the basic moves of Cerberus members.

Name: Noctis
Text: Go to the control panel and select a character.

Name: Vera
Text: Triggering <color=#ffda58>Synergy Strike</color> generates <color=#ffda58>20</color> Energy each time.

Name: Vera
Text: Now, send them to hell!

Name: Vera
Text: The Energy cap is <color=#ffda58>99</color>. At max Energy, we can send the enemy to hell.

Name: Vera
Text: <color=#ffda58>The team's Synergy Attack</color> will deal massive damage. Better make the most of it whenever it's ready.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Press and hold Basic Attack</color>, then perform a <color=#ffda58>Blue 3-Ping</color> to make a sweeping attack and gather Signature Energy.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Tap Signature</color> to convert all Yellow Orbs into Red Orbs and enter Last Blaze.

Name: Celica
Text: Perform one <color=#ffda58>Red Orb 3-Ping</color> to <color=#ffda58>fully restore Rekindled Doom</color> and gain Energy.

Name: Celica
Text: During Last Blaze, <color=#ffda58>press and hold Basic Attack</color> for the third time to cast <color=#ffda58>Rending Ravage</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: After Hypertune, Vera's <color=#ffda58>Absolute Pyre ATK boost duration</color> is greatly extended, allowing the rotation to continue.

Name: Celica
Text: Continue using Red Orbs to gain <color=#ffda58>Rekindled Doom</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Press and hold Basic Attack</color> again until the third time to cast <color=#ffda58>Rending Ravage</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Finally, <color=#ffda58>tap Signature</color> to end the rotation.

Name: Celica
Text: Perform two <color=#ffda58>Blue 3-Pings</color> before <color=#ffda58>pressing and holding Basic Attack</color>, making a sweeping attack and gathering Signature Energy.

Name: Celica
Text: After unlocking Hypertune II, gain <color=#ffda58>massive Extra DMG</color> whenever you <color=#ffda58>press and hold Basic Attack</color> during Last Blaze, up to 6 stacks.

Name: Celica
Text: After unlocking Hypertune III, <color=#ffda58>successful Blocks</color> during Last Blaze fully restore Rekindled Doom, and you restore 1 Blue Orb whenever you <color=#ffda58>Press and hold Basic Attack</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: In this modification, <color=#ffda58>Blue Orb DMG</color> greatly increases based on <color=#ffda58>the number of Musical Notes spent</color>. It's recommended to gain as many Musical Notes as possible during combat.

Name: Celica
Text: Please perform two 3-Pings to <color=#ffda58>gain Musical Notes</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Press and Hold Basic Attack to trigger Matrix if it is not on cooldown and consume <color=#ffda58>Musical Notes</color>. In Matrix, <color=#ffda58>tap Blue Orb</color> to cast Rhythmic Piercing.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Tap Signature</color> to cast Rainy Prelude and enter the <color=#ffda58>Flow State</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: After Selena reaches the SS-Rank, casting <color=#ffda58>Signature - Rainy Prelude</color> grants 60 Melody Points instantly. <color=#ffda58>Pressing and holding Dodge</color> immediately afterward will cast Melodic Outburst.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap <color=#ffda58>Concerto Orb</color> to gain <color=#ffda58>Melody Point(s)</color>, Musical Note(s), Variation Point(s), and Signature Energy.

Name: Celica
Text: Press and hold Dodge to cast Melodic Outburst before Flow State ends.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Tap Signature</color> to cast Majestic Interlude and exit the <color=#ffda58>Flow State</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: After unlocking Hypertune II, whenever you gain <color=#ffda58>Musical Notes</color>, you will gain 1 additional Musical Note and restore Signature Energy.

Name: Celica
Text: After unlocking Hypertune III, <color=#ffda58>using Blue Orbs</color> greatly increases your Extra DMG based on the number of Musical Notes consumed.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Tap Blue Orb</color> to enter a Turning Combo. During the process, <color=#ffda58>tap Blue Orb</color> again to cast Chasse, gaining Yellow Orb(s) and Signature Energy.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Tap Signature</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Nighttime Encounter</color> and enter Crazy Gamble, gaining bonus Yellow Orb(s).

Name: Celica
Text: Perform three Yellow Orb 3-Pings and <color=#ffda58>Dodge</color> to enhance Red Orbs, then <color=#ffda58>immediately cast</color> the enhanced Red Orbs.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Tap Signature</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Dreamfall Showdown</color> and exit Crazy Gamble.

Name: Celica
Text: After unlocking Hypertune II, casting Signature - Nighttime Encounter <color=#ffda58>after Dodging</color> enhances Card Rank once.

Name: Celica
Text: After unlocking Hypertune III, casting Signature - Dreamfall Showdown at <color=#ffda58>SS Card Rank</color> grants 3 additional Signal Orbs.

Name: Liv
Text: The surface layer of the mechanoid's AI consists of their identity and faction... The info is not encrypted.

Name: Celica
Text: This cast of Hypertune will greatly enhance <color=#ffda58>Red Orb 3-Pings</color> by summoning extra <color=#ffda58>damaging Whirlpools</color>. It's recommended to 3-Ping Red Orbs during combat.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Tap Red Orb</color> consecutively to perform combo, while gaining <color=#ffda58>Commandment</color> and <color=#ffda58>Prayer</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Tap/Press and hold Blue Orb</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Severed Sea - Devouring Sky</color>, gaining Signature Energy and <color=#ffda58>Prayer</color>. Bianca: Crepuscule becomes invincible but is unable to cast Signature Move during so.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap Signature to cast <color=#ffda58>Shadow Strangle</color>, which triggers Time Lag Calculation, grants a Signal Orb and deals Dark DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: After unlocking Hypertune II, each <color=#ffda58>Red Orb 3-Ping</color> will cause <color=#ffda58>Whip Dance</color> to summon 1 additional Whirlpool.

Name: Celica
Text: After unlocking Hypertune III, Shadow Strangle gains additional damage instances and restores Signal Orbs based on <color=#ffda58>additional Whirlpools summoned</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap a Red Orb to enter the <color=#ffda58>Red Orb Combo</color>. Tap a Red Orb again to cast <color=#ffda58>Red Orb Combo 2</color> and gain <color=#ffda58>Starlight Points</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: This Hypertune will <color=#ffda58>clear</color> existing Starlight Points when releasing Yellow Orbs early, dealing <color=#ffda58>Extra DMG</color> and inflicting <color=#ffda58>Combustible stacks</color> based on the amount cleared.

Name: Celica
Text: Hold a Yellow Orb to cast <color=#ffda58>Inferno Wheel</color>, then <color=#ffda58>release immediately</color>, consuming all Starlight Points to deal DMG and gain Combustible Charge.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap Signature to activate <color=#ffda58>Ignition Effect</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Please use <color=#ffda58>Red Orb Combo</color> again to accumulate <color=#ffda58>Starlight Points</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: After unlocking Hypertune II, <color=#ffda58>Starlight Point</color> acquisition efficiency doubles.

Name: Celica
Text: After unlocking Hypertune III, when Basic Attacks deal DMG to <color=#ffda58>enemies affected by Ignition</color>, restore Signal Orbs.

Name: Celica
Text: This Hypertune allows you to <color=#ffda58>ping Signal Orbs</color> when casting <color=#ffda58>Rippling Shadows</color> to perform <color=#ffda58>extra attacks</color> and restore Sonority.

Name: Celica
Text: Press and hold Basic Attack to use <color=#ffda58>Rippling Shadows</color>, consuming <color=#ffda58>White Orbs</color> to deal Physical DMG and gain <color=#ffda58>Sonority</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Ping Harmonic Orbs to <color=#ffda58>weaken</color> enemies and <color=#ffda58>enhance</color> allies.

Name: Celica
Text: Cast Signature to enter <color=#ffda58>Berserk Mode</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: In Berserk Mode, tap Signature to consume <color=#ffda58>Sonority</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: When Solacetune is in the <color=#ffda58>Berserk Mode</color>, <color=#ffda58>ping Blue Orbs</color> to restore <color=#ffda58>Sonority</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap Signature to consume Sonority to attack.

Name: Celica
Text: Press and hold Signature to deliver a finishing blow.

Name: Celica
Text: After unlocking Hypertune II, <color=#ffda58>Harmonic Orbs</color> require fewer White Orbs to activate.

Name: Celica
Text: After unlocking Hypertune III, casting <color=#ffda58>Signature</color> restores Signal Orbs.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Press and hold Yellow Orb</color> to leap backward and enter Charge Stance, then spray a barrage of bullets upon release, dealing Dark DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Tap Signature</color> to enter the <color=#ffda58>Panoptic Segmentation</color> Mode.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Press and hold Red Orb</color> to enter Charge Stance. When <color=#ffda58>not fully charged</color>, release Red Orb to cast <color=#ffda58>Kindled Blaze</color> and accumulate <color=#ffda58>Combustible</color> stacks on enemies.

Name: Celica
Text: This Hypertune will increase the <color=#ffda58>Combustible stacks</color> accumulated by Red Orbs. Using <color=#ffda58>Red Orb Combos twice</color> will max out Combustible stacks.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Press and hold Red Orb</color> again. When <color=#ffda58>not fully charged</color>, release Red Orb, then <color=#ffda58>tap/press and hold Basic Attack</color> to unleash a slash, dealing <color=#ffda58>Ignition</color> DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Tap Signature</color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Tectonic Revolt</color>, removing Ignition stacks from enemies and dealing massive DMG before exiting <color=#ffda58>Panoptic Segmentation</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: After unlocking Hypertune II, <color=#ffda58>Signature Energy</color> acquisition efficiency increases when not in Panoptic Segmentation Mode.

Name: Celica
Text: After unlocking Hypertune III, casting <color=#ffda58>Tectonic Revolt</color> restores Signal Orbs if 20 Ignition stacks are removed.

Name: Lucia
Text: Which means if we make some simple modification...

Name: Liv
Text: Yes, we can pretend to be "them."

Name: Mechanoid
Text: Faction. Above. Everything.

Name: Mechanoid
Text: Code? Code. Everybody. Knows.

Name: Mechanoid
Text: I. Only. Remember. The last part.

Name: Mechanoid
Text: ..."Will."

Name: Mechanoid
Text: Why. Talk. To me?

Name: Mechanoid
Text: Code? Never used.

Name: Mechanoid
Text: Not meeting leader. No need.

Name: Mechanoid
Text: "Sapien". Something.

Name: Mechanoid
Text: Saffron pill. Saffron pill?

Name: Mechanoid
Text: Code?

Name: Mechanoid
Text: Someone. Said. "Saffron pill."

Name: Mechanoid
Text: Or. Maybe. Something else?

Name: Mechanoid
Text: Code. Remember.

Name: Mechanoid
Text: Code. Remember.

Name: Mechanoid
Text: Code. Remember.

Name: Mechanoid
Text: Code. Remember.

Name: Mechanoid
Text: Saffron...

Name: Mechanoid
Text: Saffron. Is food.

Name: Mechanoid
Text: Food. Not. Mechanoid.

Name: Mechanoid
Text: I. Dreamed of. Saffron. Yesterday.

Name: Mechanoid
Text: Can I. Eat it. Or not?

Name: Mechanoid
Text: Leader. Ahead. No access.

Name: Mechanoid
Text: Need. Voice input. Code.

Name: Lucia
Text: Voice input?

Name: Mechanoid
Text: Stop. Deceiver. From entering.

Name: Liv
Text: Is this code known by only a special few?

Name: Mechanoid
Text: No. Everyone. Knows it.

Name: Liv
Text: I see. Let's ask the other mechanoids. Maybe there will be a clue.

Name: Mechanoid
Text: Code. Confirmed. You can go.

Name: Mechanoid
Text: Incorrect. Code? You. Are deceiver!

Name: Liv
Text: No, we're not...

Name: Mechanoid
Text: Defect! Defect! Kill. The defect!

Name: Liv
Text: What's going on? The door behind... just closed!

Name: Mechanoid
Text: How did. They. Find us?

Name: Mechanoid
Text: Defect! Defect! Kill. The defect!

Name: Mechanoid
Text: I. Must not. Fall!

Name: Mechanoid
Text: Must. Never let. "Red". Win.

Name: Liv
Text: I hear a sound... from afar!

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant, we got it!

Name: Lee
Text: Understood! We will move over right away!

Name: Lucia
Text: Copy. Let's find a rendezvous point!

Name: Lucia
Text: If we break through by force, the situation may become even more difficult.

Name: Lucia
Text: Let's search around and see if there is anything for "identity requisition" and carefully prepare a strategy.

Name: Archive Terminal
Text: School Archive — 103/10

Name: Man
Text: Thanks to you, the construction of the city is going really well.

Name: Woman
Text: We would never have worked so hard if the world above didn't destroy itself.

Name: Man
Text: Yeah... Who would have thought the "apocalypse" that the Chairman talked about would come so soon.

Name: Woman
Text: That only makes his decision more correct.

Name: Archive Terminal
Text: School Archive — 4577/10

Name: Engineer
Text: Have you noticed? The leaders were acting a little weird recently.

Name: Advisor
Text: I heard the news from the surface was cut off. They must be wondering if the people above are all dead?

Name: Engineer
Text: Who cares? We're pretty safe here thanks to the Director's designs.

Name: Advisor
Text: But we didn't establish the School just to survive underground.

Name: Archive Terminal
Text: School Archive — 7633/10

Name: Man
Text: I don't think we still need a single system to manage all of us after we return to the surface.

Name: Man
Text: The World Government was an example of what not to do.

Name: Woman
Text: That will leave the world in hopeless anarchy. Is that what you want?

Name: Man
Text: You need to wake up. There may be no humans left up there. We can create any form of society to our liking.

Name: Woman
Text: Are you kidding? Look at our number and resources. Only a centralized authority can keep mankind alive!

Name: Archive Terminal
Text: School Archive — 8010/10

Name: Director
Text: ...Is it inevitable that we fight among ourselves?

Name: Man
Text: Please keep this away from the Chairman. We will try to stay low-key.

Name: Woman
Text: The Chairman is the only person to hold the School together. If he goes down, neither of our factions can last.

Name: Director
Text: ...I see.

Name: Director
Text: Please, keep this from festering into a conflict that involves firearms.

Name: Mechanoid
Text: Something to do with "will"?

Name: Mechanoid
Text: Conclusion: "Sapien". Something.

Name: Lucia
Text: Almost all the mechanoids here are "blue" now. The "leader" should be further inside.

Name: Liv
Text: Even if we only count the patrolling ones, there are way too many mechanoids here...

Name: Lee
Text: I hear someone fighting outside.

Name: Lee
Text: It's not far. Let's go.

Name: Lee
Text: The red mechanoids are overwhelming their opponents here.

Name: Lee
Text: Is this the center of the "Red" side?

Name: Lee
Text: We have to defeat the "leader" to find out what exactly happened underground, I guess?

Name: Lee
Text: Watch out! The mechanoids are shooting energy balls!

Name: Mechanoid
Text: How dare. You. Come so far.

Name: Mechanoid
Text: I. Must not. Fall!

Name: Mechanoid
Text: Must. Never let. "Blue". Win.

Name: Mechanoid
Text: "Our half" of. Father. Will return. To surface!

Name: Lee
Text: ...I have no idea what it is talking about.

Name: Lee
Text: But it's definitely not out friend. Let's beat it first.

Name: Lee
Text: I hear a sound... from afar!

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant, we got it!

Name: Lee
Text: Understood! We will move over right away!

Name: Authorization AI
Text: Data record... Authorization ID—Z002003

Name: Authorization AI
Text: School Archive, 6/10.

Name: Old Man
Text: ...Ahem.

Name: Old Man
Text: I'm broadcasting this speech to the world.

Name: Old Man
Text: We are "Sapien".

Name: Old Man
Text: In the name of "Sapien", we shall cut our ties with this world...

Name: Authorization AI
Text: School Archive, 7/10.

Name: Director
Text: What a fantastic "declaration" the Chairman had made.

Name: Man
Text: Having boarded this "ark" of the school, we will become the Earth's last hope.

Name: Woman
Text: Chairman, what shall we do next?

Name: Old Man
Text: ...We have always had one and only one purpose: to find a way to perpetuate the existence of mankind through memetics.
Reserved for the animation of the Boss' 2nd phase transformation

Name: Luna
Text: Kneel before the absolute power, you foolish and fake creation.

Name: Lucia: Lotus
Text: We are victorious. Thanks for your help, Commandant.

Name: Lucia: Dawn
Text: We are victorious. Thanks for your help, Commandant.

Name: Lucia: Plume
Text: We are victorious. Thanks for your help, Commandant.

Name: Lucia: Lotus
Text: Right... There was no turning back from that moment onward.

Name: Lucia: Dawn
Text: Right... There was no turning back from that moment onward.

Name: Lucia: Plume
Text: Right... There was no turning back from that moment onward.

Name: α
Text: Right... There was no turning back from that moment onward.

Name: Lee: Palefire
Text: Our victory is inevitable.

Name: Lucia: Lotus
Text: Gray Raven will cut through all obstacles like a blade.

Name: Lee: Palefire
Text: Our victory is inevitable.

Name: Lucia: Dawn
Text: Gray Raven will cut through all obstacles like a blade.

Name: Lee: Palefire
Text: Our victory is inevitable.

Name: Lucia: Plume
Text: Gray Raven will cut through all obstacles like a blade.

Name: Lee: Entropy
Text: Our victory is inevitable.

Name: Lucia: Lotus
Text: Gray Raven will cut through all obstacles like a blade.

Name: Lee: Entropy
Text: Our victory is inevitable.

Name: Lucia: Dawn
Text: Gray Raven will cut through all obstacles like a blade.

Name: Lee: Entropy
Text: Our victory is inevitable.

Name: Lucia: Plume
Text: Gray Raven will cut through all obstacles like a blade.
Hmph, you're making great progress. Looks like I have to adjust my strategy for the sake of Miss Luna's inner wish.

Name: α
Text: Is that all...?

Name: Lee
Text: I have arrived at the 42nd Street. Moving toward the 35th Street now.

Name: Liv
Text: Wow, that's fast.

Name: Lee
Text: Better make this quick.

Name: Lee
Text: This is almost going too well.

Name: Lee
Text: A data terminal...? Looks like it's still functional.

Name: Lee
Text: Good. I couldn't get more info about this city from outside, hope the internal terminal can tell me more about it.

Name: Lee
Text: Let me see what's so special about this city.

Name: Lee
Text: ...A strange way of encryption. Still, it's no match for me.

Name: Liv
Text: Lee, you have stayed in the same place for too long. The Corrupted nearby are coming at you.

Name: Lee
Text: Tsk, I almost finished.

Name: Commandant
Text: Liv, we'll hold it back.

Name: Liv
Text: Understood. Preparing ranged support.

Name: Liv
Text: Lee, are you alright?

Name: Lee
Text: It's okay. I found a way to decipher it, but I need some time.

Name: Lucia
Text: Liv, Commandant, please cover us from the rooftop.

Name: Lucia
Text: Stay put, Lee. I'll take a detour and help you.

Name: Lucia
Text: According to Liv's scan, I can reach Lee via this route.

Name: Lucia
Text: This prototype... I'm still unfamiliar with it, but it shouldn't impact my movement. I'll meet up with Lee first.

Name: Lucia
Text: Sorry, I'm late.

Name: Lee
Text: That's alright. What's important is that I've managed to crack the encryption.

Name: Lee
Text: ...What's this...?

Name: Lucia
Text: What?

Name: Lee
Text: Let's fall back after getting rid of these enemies. I've got something to show Commandant.

Name: Lucia
Text: Yeah.

Name: Liv
Text: Is that the factory over there? Looks the same as where we've just been through.

Name: Lee
Text: That's why I said the city planning here was horrible.

Name: Lucia
Text: Lee seems to still be bitter about getting los—

Name: Lee
Text: Ahem. Let's hurry up and clear a way to the factory.

Name: Lee
Text: This is...

Name: Lucia
Text: What's wrong?

Name: Lee
Text: We should be able to use it with some adjustment.

Name: Lee
Text: Just like my calculation suggests.

Name: Liv
Text: That was very powerful. Are you alright, Lee?

Name: Lee
Text: Not a big deal, don't worry.

Name: Liv
Text: Please don't move. I'll give you some treatment.

Name: Lee
Text: Like I thought, this could be useful.

Name: Lee
Text: Commandant, I'll leave it to you to make the call.

Name: Lucia
Text: Road clear. Continue moving forward.

Name: Lee
Text: Sure.

Name: Liv
Text: Sure.

Name: Gear
Text: Run, run away. Show me what other tricks you've got.

Name: Wanshi
Text: Troy!

Name: Gear
Text: What a trivial attempt. I'll get rid of you first, annoying bird.

Name: Wanshi
Text: Direct hit.

Name: Gear
Text: Tsk, die!

Name: Gear
Text: Not even a scratch.

Name: Gear
Text: It's over.

Name: Wanshi
Text: Um... Very well. I'm getting sleepy.

Name: Gear
Text: You will sleep forever.

Name: Wanshi
Text: But looks like you're the one to fall asleep first.

Name: Gear
Text: Looks like?

Name: Gear
Text: I-I can't move. What have you done?!

Name: Wanshi
Text: Just some trivial work.

Name: Gear
Text: Impossible.

Name: Wanshi
Text: Good night, big fella.

Name: Wanshi
Text: I'm coming right now, Troy. I will heal you.

Name: Troy
Text: Sorry to trouble you again...

Name: Gear
Text: Wait, did I say it's over?

Name: Wanshi
Text: What?

Name: Gear
Text: Buona notte, bloody humans.

Name: Gear
Text: Oh? You are nimble one. But what can you possible do with those futile attacks?

Name: Gear
Text: Is that all you have got?

Name: Wanshi
Text: Um... I need to move away from it first.

Name: Wanshi
Text: From this distance...

Name: Wanshi
Text: Use joystick to adjust the direction, then take aim and shoot.

Name: Gear
Text: Is that all? I'm getting bored.

Name: Gear
Text: Enough time wasted. I shall finish you off right here!

Name: Gear
Text: Tsk, dammit.

Name: Kamui
Text: Hey, are you running already? Who was the one barking "don't run" earlier on?

Name: Chrome
Text: Kamui, don't go.

Name: Kamui
Text: Sure.

Name: Wanshi
Text: ...It's over.

Name: Liv
Text: All refugees have been evacuated inside the residence.

Name: Lee
Text: All the Hetero-Creatures are in. They are scattered all around the camp.

Name: Lee
Text: But they aren't paying attention to us yet.

Name: Lucia
Text: We must eliminate them right away. Can't let them attack the citizens.

Name: Lee
Text: This is an electromagnetic device made by the Science Council. It can emit waves of a certain length to attract the enemy.

Name: Lee
Text: It is designed as a bait to attract the enemy's attention while we protect the node.

Name: Electromagnetic Device
Text: Bzzzz—

Name: Liv
Text: The Hetero-Creatures are coming.

Name: Lucia
Text: Stay calm. Let's finish them off once and for all.

Name: Lucia
Text: All Hetero-Creatures in the camp are destroyed.

Name: Lee
Text: Don't let your guard down. More are coming.

Name: Lee
Text: These creatures just won't stop...

Name: Liv
Text: Wait, that sound has stopped...

Name: Lucia
Text: The Hetero-Creatures have retreated.

Name: Asimov
Text: The virtual link has been set up successfully.

Name: Asimov
Text: The operating environment is stable.

Name: Asimov
Text: Let's carry on with the test.

Name: Guide AI
Text: Regular battle testing complete.

Name: Guide AI
Text: Now conducting overload testing.

Name: Guide AI
Text: The System will give you a lot of Signal Orbs.

Name: Guide AI
Text: Using 3-Ping costs Shield, but makes the DMG dealt by enemies invalidated while you cast skills.

Name: Guide AI
Text: Make proper use of the Signal Orbs and eliminate the enemies ASAP.

Name: Asimov
Text: Blue Orb means dash, while Yellow Orb can attract enemies.

Name: Asimov
Text: Red Orbs can deal large area damage.

Name: Asimov
Text: But remember, using Signal Orbs will reduce your Shield effect, making you frail.

Name: Chrome
Text: Understood.

Name: Guide AI
Text: Proceeding to the next step of the test.

Name: Guide AI
Text: Press and hold the Attack button to enter "Frost Spirit" mode.

Name: Guide AI
Text: All Shields will be consumed, but all attacks can invalidate the DMG dealt by the enemies.

Name: Guide AI
Text: And grants you DEF Judgment for Basic Attack.

Name: Guide AI
Text: All attacks that are successfully blocked are converted to Shields after the Burst is over.

Name: Asimov
Text: No matter, just test it out in battle.

Name: Guide AI
Text: Warning, importing difficult enemy data.

Name: Guide AI
Text: This will be the last step of the test.

Name: Asimov
Text: I'm looking forward to gathering some nice data from you.

Name: Asimov
Text: Well done, you can disconnect the test system from the data gate.

Name: Asimov
Text: If you want more exercise, you can call up the data of the Corrupted next to it.

Name: Chrome
Text: Got it.

Name: Guide AI
Text: Common Corrupted data.

Name: Guide AI
Text: The scattered Corrupted data with ranged attacks needs to be destroyed in a quick manner by using Signal Orbs.

Name: Guide AI
Text: Corrupted data with persistent attacks. Please make good use of the defense to fight against it.

Name: Guide AI
Text: Caution, high risk Corrupted data.

Name: Guide AI
Text: You can leave the virtual training program from here.

Name: Asimov
Text: Are you familiar with the operation? Are you sure you want to leave the virtual training?

Name: Kamui
Text: A new Hetero-Creature will pop up!

Name: Chrome
Text: She calls it the "Greenhouse".

Name: Chrome
Text: But it's more like a culturing module.

Name: Kamui
Text: Capt, there's another one over here!

Name: Chrome
Text: The light orb is controlling the culturing module.

Name: Chrome
Text: If we can overload it...

Name: Chrome
Text: Perhaps, we can destroy the Hetero-Creatures in it.

Name: Chrome
Text: We have to overload it before the light orb is fully lit up.

Name: Chrome
Text: Otherwise, new Hetero-Creatures will be created.

Name: Chrome
Text: Next time, be sure to hurry.

Name: Kamui
Text: Didn't expect them to be hiding in places like this.

Name: Kamui
Text: Are these tanks used for culturing those Hetero-Creatures too?

Name: Wanshi
Text: Yeah, maybe there aren't many Red Tide left now...

Name: Wanshi
Text: So they create Hetero-Creatures this way.

Name: Kamui
Text: The light orb is almost lit!

Name: Chrome
Text: Hetero-Creatures! Try to destroy these facilities when attacking them!

Name: Kamui
Text: Is this really an underground waterway?

Name: Chrome
Text: I've noticed signs of temporary modifications everywhere.

Name: Chrome
Text: These plants are unlike normal ones, they're covered by a high concentration of Punishing Virus.

Name: Kamui
Text: Is Cinderelik there?

Name: Cinderelik
Text: This is where you'll stop proceeding.

Name: Cinderelik
Text: My friends, let's shower our guests with red petals.

Name: Chrome
Text: Watch out for those timers! Hetero-Creatures here are strong!

Name: Kamui
Text: Wait, what's that shiny ball?

Name: Chrome
Text: The light inside is growing over time. Maybe it's a timer.

Name: Kamui
Text: What happens if it's full?

Name: Wanshi
Text: I can't believe there are plants here...

Name: Kamui
Text: How many secrets does this underground waterway have anyway?

Name: α
Text: Is this... forced deep diving?

Name: Vonnegut
Text: Be careful where you stand, Alpha.

Name: Vonnegut
Text: Did you really get over it?

Name: Vonnegut
Text: Maybe you should tell Lucia what happened.

Name: α
Text: She's not ready to step into the abyss.

Name: Vonnegut
Text: It's not wise to resist the favor given by the Ascnet.

Name: α
Text: For the favor is not only a favor.

Name: Vonnegut
Text: Let me conduct a hands-on experiment.

Name: Vonnegut
Text: Stay here.

Name: α
Text: You do not have the right to order me.

Name: Vonnegut
Text: Are you sure? But before you make a right decision―

Name: Vonnegut
Text: I can guarantee that you will not be able to escape the tangle of noises.

Name: α
Text: If I can't escape...

Name: α
Text: I'll cut my way out.

Name: Vonnegut
Text: If you destroy all the noise of the Memories―

Name: Vonnegut
Text: All that awaits you will just be an endless hollow of eternity.

Name: Vonnegut
Text: Oh? Are you trying to leave here even at the expense of destroying your M.I.N.D.?

Name: Vonnegut
Text: I respect that.

Name: α
Text: I said I don't care.

Name: Channel Noise
Text: They were killed once more.

Name: Channel Noise
Text: Enemies. Never-ending fights.

Name: Channel Noise
Text: You need to accept the power of an Agent.

Name: Vonnegut
Text: Give up and accept it. There is no escaping.

Name: α
Text: I make my own decisions!

Name: α
Text: What's wrong? Out of minions?

Name: Vonnegut
Text: Your resolve is unexpected, but you can't get through here. You'll give in eventually.

Name: α
Text: On the contrary, I've only just warmed up.

Name: Vonnegut
Text: You broke through the M.I.N.D. blockade just with your will to fight? Your strength...

Name: α
Text: Now it's your turn in the real world!

Name: Von
Text: I have banished you to the edge of the M.I.N.D. There is no one left to help you.

Name: Vera
Text: Oh, so this is Atlantis.

Name: Vera
Text: It looks quite different from when I looked from the sky.

Name: Vera
Text: Hey, don't go wandering off.

Name: Vera
Text: I'm not taking responsibility if you carelessly get hurt while you're busy being mesmerized by the view.

Name: Vera
Text: The water and fortress over there...

Name: Vera
Text: Move, I don't have time to waste on you.

Name: Vera
Text: Let's investigate after we get rid of the trash.

Name: Vera
Text: This unusual behavior and abnormal corruption level...

Name: Vera
Text: I was right to say they are newly corrupted.

Name: Vera
Text: We should hurry up.

Name: Vera
Text: It's still sinking...

Name: Vera
Text: Let's get rid of them quickly.

Name: Vera
Text: Looks like these isolation devices are still working.

Name: Vera
Text: Hmph, you guys too.

Name: Vera
Text: The outer coating of this building...

Name: Vera
Text: Tsk, prepare for the next wave of enemies.

Name: Vera
Text: I guess we have no choice but to disable the electric barrier.

Name: Vera
Text: An A-rank transport vehicle of the logistics department...

Name: Vera
Text: Good, it doesn't look damaged. We can use it after we charge it.

Name: Vera
Text: This would've probably counted as a "member" here.

Name: System voice
Text: Logistics department A-rank certification detected. Access permission granted.

Name: Vera
Text: We're here. Let's take care of these lowlifes before we go in.

Name: System voice
Text: Unregistered signal detected. Access denied.

Name: System voice
Text: Please complete a visitation request with the administrative director or proceed accompanied by a member of Atlantis.

Name: Vera
Text: Visitation request? I'd love to bash that administrative director's head into this panel right now.

Name: Vera
Text: Tsk, looks see if we can find another way to get through this.

Name: Vera
Text: I was correct.

Name: Vera
Text: There's not much time left... We need to get them out of the way.

Name: Vera
Text: Looks like we won't be bored on this journey.

Name: Vera
Text: Oh, my apologies. Idiots and Corrupted are not allowed to board this boat.

Name: Vera
Text: Oho, is that it?

Name: Wanshi
Text: That kid should be nearby.

Name: Wanshi
Text: Hmm... Time to wake up and observe the environment.

Name: Wanshi
Text: The Red Tide will rise when this sound starts. Don't go in.

Name: Wanshi
Text: Find somewhere to land in advance. Then keep moving once the sound stops, and the Red Tide will fall.

Name: Wanshi
Text: Those traces ahead... should be footprints.

Name: Wanshi
Text: Still fairly new. Must be from that kid.

Name: Wanshi
Text: ...Watch out, Hetero-creature nearby.

Name: Wanshi
Text: The sound has come back. Retreat to the high ground.

Name: Wanshi
Text: Get over there and wait for the tide to fall.

Name: Wanshi
Text: It's gone. Continue with the operation.

Name: Wanshi
Text: Luckily, the wind and tide haven't erased the footprints yet.

Name: Wanshi
Text: This way.

Name: Wanshi
Text: The traces are gone... Let's search around.

Name: Wanshi
Text: Hmm... That kid must have also stopped here.

Name: Wanshi
Text: Hope he didn't encounter any Hetero-Creature or jumped into the Red Tide himself.

Name: Wanshi
Text: Something's not right. The rise and fall of Red Tide have no pattern.

Name: Wanshi
Text: How did a kid manage to avoid all the danger to get here?

Name: Wanshi
Text: The Red Tide is right ahead. It's unlikely that he jumped in.

Name: Wanshi
Text: I can see scratching marks on the ground.

Name: Wanshi
Text: Hmm... Why would he stand here for so long? Did he see anything?

Name: Wanshi
Text: The traces are heading back to where they begin.

Name: Wanshi
Text: Hmm... He took a different route though, across a region where the Red Tide wasn't so prevalent.

Name: Wanshi
Text: ...As if someone was guiding him.

Name: Wanshi
Text: Hmm... Whatever. It's not something we can worry.

Name: System
Text: Avoid the Red Tide once again.

Name: Wanshi
Text: The Red Tide is falling. Continue the search.

Name: Wanshi
Text: Hmm... The Hetero-Creatures nearby are eliminated. I can focus on the search now.

Name: Wanshi
Text: There are three spots we can use to hide from the tide.

Name: Lee
Text: The dust storm is too heavy. I can't see where we are going.

Name: Lee
Text: Hm?!

Name: Lee
Text: We received a comms request of an unknown signal. It is identified as a Babylonia Construct.

Name: Lucia
Text: Put it through, Lee.
Gray Raven?

Name: Liv
Text: And you are?
Wanshi of Strike Hawk. I've been scouting this area.
You are at the heart of the Red Tide. You must leave immediately.
I left a beacon in the area nearby. Move toward its direction.
Tap the button to sense the beacon's location.

Name: Liv
Text: Corruption level rapidly rising! Avoid direct contact with the Red Tide.

Name: Lucia
Text: Watch out, Hetero-creature nearby!

Name: Lee
Text: Let's keep moving. The beacon isn't far away.

Name: Liv
Text: We should be safe here... right?

Name: Liv
Text: Why are there human clothes...?

Name: Lee
Text: It's too wide open here. People can easily lose the sense of distance.

Name: Lee
Text: They probably thought they could cross the desert...

Name: Liv
Text: Wait a sec, there's something in the jacket.

Name: Liv
Text: It's a piece of... paper?

Name: Lucia
Text: What's on it?

Name: Paper
Text: The remaining food and serum can't last us through this winter.

Name: Paper
Text: We must move. We need to find enough food, so Ray and others can—

Name: Liv
Text: It looks like a torn diary. I can see the date at the bottom.

Name: Lucia
Text: There's only this page left. The edge of this paper looks like it's been burned.

Name: Lee
Text: The temperature difference between morning and night can be huge in this environment.

Name: Liv
Text: If they had to burn their diary to keep themselves warm... They probably are already...

Name: Lee
Text: ...Let's keep moving.

Name: Paper
Text: The compass is probably broken.

Name: Paper
Text: Before we realized, we had walked to a totally unknown area.

Name: Paper
Text: We'll die in this desert if we don't hurry.

Name: Paper
Text: But walking fast will increase our water consumption.

Name: Paper
Text: What should we do? Where should we go?

Name: Paper
Text: When can we arrive at our destination?

Name: Paper
Text: We have finished all our food.

Name: Paper
Text: I don't know how long we can last.

Name: Paper
Text: But I can't die here.

Name: Paper
Text: I still want to see him, for one last time.

Name: Paper
Text: If my death has its value, I wouldn't complain at all.

Name: Paper
Text: But I haven't brought anything back.

Name: Paper
Text: Ray, you must—

Name: Wanshi
Text: Um... What exactly are you doing?

Name: Wanshi
Text: Still have no idea where to go?

Name: Wanshi
Text: Fine, follow my instructions from now on.

Name: Wanshi
Text: Punishing Virus is forming its body. Is that a new Hetero-creature?

Name: Wanshi
Text: The Red Tide is rising.

Name: Wanshi
Text: The Inver-Device won't last too long. We better finish this off soon.

Name: Wanshi
Text: Is it over?

Name: Wanshi
Text: Why did it act like a human...? Whatever, there's no time to think. I must stop it.

Name: Wanshi
Text: How can that Hetero-creature act like a human...?

Name: Wanshi
Text: There's no time to think. I must stop it right here.

Name: Wanshi
Text: I have no plan to end it here.

Name: Wanshi
Text: Just a little more. Time to say goodbye.

Name: Wanshi
Text: ...Is this the heteromization process? The Red Tide is repairing its shell.

Name: Gabriel
Text: Since you've come this far...

Name: Gabriel
Text: Don't think that you can retreat.

Name: Kamui
Text: That goes for you too!

Name: Wanshi
Text: Be careful! It's a defense cannon!

Name: Kamui
Text: How did you bring this big guy here?

Name: Gabriel
Text: I need to conserve some strength, since she's still around.

Name: Chrome
Text: She? Are you talking about the guy who broke in here?

Name: Kamui
Text: Whoa! The floor is so hot!

Name: Chrome
Text: Caution, the floor is burnt by the cannon!

Name: Kamui
Text: There are so many defense cannons here.

Name: Wanshi
Text: The drawbridge is too narrow to dodge attacks.

Name: Chrome
Text: I have a plan. Kamui, you're on defense, Wanshi and I will take the heat and destroy the cannons.

Name: Kamui
Text: You're not going anywhere!

Name: Gabriel
Text: The wolf rushes into the lion's jaws...

Name: Gabriel
Text: Cinderelik, they're all yours.

Name: Chrome
Text: Copy Writing 4

Name: Chrome
Text: Copy Writing 5

Name: Chrome
Text: Copy Writing 6

Name: Chrome
Text: Copy Writing 7

Name: Chrome
Text: Copy Writing 8

Name: Kamui
Text: Capt, leave it to me!

Name: Kamui
Text: I'll stop it!

Name: Chrome
Text: Let me take some damage.

Name: Kamui
Text: Capt, I'll block its fire!

Name: Chrome
Text: Kamui, switch with us after you block it. We'll take the damage from the scorching ground!

Name: Kamui
Text: He's over there!

Name: Chrome
Text: The damages are getting severe... We must leave here soon!

Name: Kamui
Text: The platform lift is descending!

Name: Wanshi
Text: Looks like it wants to send us to the bottom.

Name: Chrome
Text: Is that his destination?

Name: Chrome
Text: Ready to engage!

Name: Wanshi
Text: Capt, your frame...

Name: Chrome
Text: It's not a problem, I can hold it out.

Name: Gabriel
Text: Let me show you the power he gave me!

Name: α
Text: Final Struggle.

Name: No. 21
Text: Captain, we are near the mission location.

Name: No. 21
Text: All clear.

Name: No. 21
Text: Road... blocked.

Name: Noctis
Text: Blast away!

Name: Vera
Text: No, Noctis, not too much troubles. Find another road.

Name: No. 21
Text: Listen, someone is there.

Name: Noctis
Text: I'll go check.

Name: Unknow Voice
Text: Go back... It's impossible... to get there...

Name: Unknow Voice
Text: Only... for... you.

Name: No. 21
Text: That car is moving, but no one's in it...

Name: Vera
Text: Tut, someone's up to something.

Name: Noctis
Text: Who's there?!

Name: Noctis
Text: Where these damn ghost cars come from?!

Name: Noctis
Text: The hospital gate is locked.

Name: Commandant
Text: Go this way, Sure... Ahead is... is... (Interrupted)

Name: Vera
Text: The corrupted signal source is coming from this direction.

Name: Vera
Text: ...it's gone.

Name: Vera
Text: Follow it!

Name: Noctis
Text: It has been abandoned for a long time.

Name: No. 21
Text: That sound, it's from there.

Name: No. 21
Text: All clear.

Name: No. 21
Text: I sensed "gaze"...

Name: No. 21
Text: It's gone...

Name: No. 21
Text: Maybe I think too much. Look for other clues.

Name: Eerie Doll
Text: Hehehe... Hehe...

Name: No. 21
Text: It's... the doll that was following me...

Name: No. 21
Text: I feel it.

Name: No. 21
Text: Rgh—!

Name: No. 21
Text: What's that—

Name: No. 21
Text: ...It's there.

Name: Roland
Text: Hm?

Name: Roland
Text: ...After all, they are monsters without heart.

Name: Roland
Text: Tch... More?

Name: Roland
Text: ...Phew.

Name: Roland
Text: Even more. How annoying... If that's the case, let me leave some obstacles behind.

Name: Roland
Text: All right, as long as the contact fuse is set...

Name: Roland
Text: Wait, that's...

Name: Roland
Text: Uh, I knew it.

Name: Roland
Text: It works... probably.

Name: Roland
Text: Go back, you can't get what you want.

Name: Roland
Text: All of this, may be just a tease from your superior.

Name: Roland
Text: If that's the case...

Name: Roland
Text: I guess no more comes.

Name: Judge
Text: I'll ask you 3 questions. When you have an answer, interact with the corresponding Construct, understood?

Name: Judge
Text: Your answer is...

Name: Judge
Text: You're correct! Moving on.

Name: Judge
Text: LAME! Think it through!

Name: Judge
Text: I can't bear it. Next question.

Name: Judge
Text: Aargh! I'll let you pass.

Name: Judge
Text: Damn... Not bad. Next question.

Name: Judge
Text: Do you know who "loves humans"? Answer now!

Name: Judge
Text: Who do you think of when you hear " The Tempest"? Answer now!

Name: Judge
Text: Do you know who has "faith"? Answer now!

Name: Judge
Text: Do you know who's "competitive"? Answer now!

Name: Judge
Text: Do you know who's the "Gray Raven's Blade"? Answer now!

Name: Judge
Text: Do you know who's the "humanoid hybrid leader"? Answer now!

Name: Judge
Text: I'll ask you 3 questions. When you have an answer, interact with the corresponding Construct, or you can do nothing, I guess.

Name: Judge
Text: Your answer is...

Name: Judge
Text: Wow, you're a genius! Next question.

Name: Judge
Text: That was just luck! Next question.

Name: Judge
Text: Keep trying and you'll get it one day.

Name: Judge
Text: How did you even graduate? Who was your Instructor?

Name: Judge
Text: Well, aren't you lucky? I'll let you pass!

Name: Judge
Text: Do you know who is the "foolish-looking wise man"? It's ok if you don't know.

Name: Judge
Text: Do you know who is an "F.O.S. graduate"? It's ok if you don't know.

Name: Judge
Text: Do you know who is "worth remembering"? It's ok if you don't know.

Name: Judge
Text: Do you know who is considered "holy"? It's ok if you don't know.

Name: Judge
Text: Do you know who is connected to "Valkyrie"? It's ok if you don't know.

Name: Judge
Text: Do you know who is called "bike master"? It's ok if you don't know.

Name: Judge
Text: Do you know who is good at "expression and posture"? It's ok if you don't know.

Name: Judge
Text: I'll ask you 3 questions. When you have an answer, interact with the corresponding Construct.

Name: Judge
Text: Your answer is...

Name: Judge
Text: I knew you'd make the right choice. Next question.

Name: Judge
Text: Huh, you really are quite clever. Next question.

Name: Judge
Text: Hey, be careful.

Name: Judge
Text: Don't give up, you will get it right next time.

Name: Judge
Text: Congratulations! You got them all right!

Name: Judge
Text: Answer me this—who has a "great appetite"?

Name: Judge
Text: Answer me this—who is "worth remembering"?

Name: Judge
Text: Answer me this—who is familiar with "precise calculation"?

Name: Judge
Text: Answer me this—who "desires to win"?

Name: Judge
Text: Answer me this—who is the "Gray Raven's blade"?

Name: Judge
Text: Answer me this—who is an "F.O.S. graduate"?

Name: Judge
Text: Answer me this—who is a "rich painter"?

Name: Judge
Text: Here we go.

Name: Judge
Text: Your answer is...

Name: Judge
Text: Not bad.

Name: Judge
Text: Hmm, alright.

Name: Judge
Text: (Patient...)

Name: Judge
Text: (Must be patient...)

Name: Judge
Text: (Nods)

Name: Judge
Text: Who is "holy"?

Name: Judge
Text: Who is a "Kowloong domestic breed cat"?

Name: Judge
Text: Who is always "sleepy"?

Name: Judge
Text: Who is an "Agent"?

Name: Judge
Text: Who is the representative of the "Will of Kowloong"?

Name: Judge
Text: Who "likes humans"?

Name: Judge
Text: Who is the "foolish-looking wise man"?

Name: Pulao
Text: Looks like you could use some help, Commandant. (Takes out Shield Generator Mk.I)

Name: Pulao
Text: Huh? Still not done? Looks like you could use something with a lil' more oomph! (Takes out Shield Generator Mk.II)

Name: Pulao
Text: Looks like you could use more training. Let this to me!

Name: Pulao
Text: You can do it, Commandant!

Name: Pulao
Text: You look a little exhausted. Why don't I give you a hand?

Name: Karenina
Text: Hey, Gray Raven Commandant! The Preparation Challenge for you this time is to protect the Iso-Devices on site. Are we clear?

Name: Karenina
Text: Come on, move it! The simulated enemies I've chosen aren't to be trifled with!

Name: Karenina
Text: The durability of the Iso-Devices is below 70%. Take them down quickly! You're making me very impatient!

Name: Karenina
Text: What's going on? How come the durability of the Iso-Devices is below 50%? That's made by our Engineering Force...

Name: Karenina
Text: Oh, for ****'s sake! Even the last Iso-Device is about to be scrapped. How do I explain this to the Engineering Force?!

Name: Karenina
Text: Enough! If you waste one more Iso-Device, I'll blow you away with my rocket launcher!

Name: Karenina
Text: Not bad. Some of these devices still works, so take your rewards.

Name: Nanami
Text: Ding-ding-ding! Hello, dearest Commandant! Welcome to Nanami's Guard Challenge!

Name: Nanami
Text: I "borrowed" three Iso-Devices from Karen just now. Keep them safe, Commandant!

Name: Nanami
Text: By the way, I've invited some "friends" as lovely as me to the challenge. Good luck, Commandant!

Name: Nanami
Text: Commandant! The durability of the Iso-Device is at 70%. Pay attention!

Name: Nanami
Text: Com—man—dant! The durability of the Iso-Device is at 50%! You need to get rid of those "friends"!

Name: Nanami
Text: COMMANDANT! There's only one Iso-Device left! If Karen finds out they're all broken, I'll be in big trouble!

Name: Nanami
Text: Noooooo! They're all gone...

Name: Nanami
Text: Good job! I knew that our wise, brave, and resourceful Commandant would pass my test! Take the reward!

Name: Bianca
Text: Hello, Commandant! Today, I'll quiz you on your guard tactics.

Name: Bianca
Text: Iso-Devices have already been deployed. Your objective: protect all Iso-Devices and clear up all enemy units.

Name: Bianca
Text: The durability of the Iso-Devices is at 70%. Please pay attention to how you adjust your overall tactics.

Name: Bianca
Text: The durability of the Iso-Devices has been reduced to 50%. I recommend clearing the range targets that pose the highest threat first.

Name: Bianca
Text: The durability of the Iso-Devices is at 20%. This is not looking good, Commandant. Please clear out the remaining threats immediately!

Name: Bianca
Text: All Iso-Devices have been destroyed—I'm ending the test now. I hope you will perform better next time, Commandant.

Name: Bianca
Text: All enemy units have been cleared. The Iso-Devices are confirmed to be functional, and you've completed your objective. You can claim your reward now, Commandant!

Name: Pulao
Text: It's transportation challenge time! If the Transport Kuroro gets hit before it arrives at the gate, you'll have to start all over again!

Name: Pulao
Text: Understand the rules, Commandant? Then let's start the challenge!

Name: Pulao
Text: クロロ……

Name: Pulao
Text: Err... Need a hand?

Name: Pulao
Text: You did it! Woo-hoo! Here's a reward, Commandant!

Name: Nanami
Text: Hello there, Commandant! Welcome to my Transport Challenge! Your mission today is to transport the super cute Kuroro!

Name: Nanami
Text: Try your best to complete it in one go! Oh, aren't you the sweetest thing, Commandant? Good luck!

Name: Nanami
Text: Just a teeny-tiny mistake from Commandant, I think...

Name: Nanami
Text: Ah... I have to come up with a way to help Commandant.

Name: Nanami
Text: Hey! Commandant, take this Shield Generator. I borrowed it from Karen just now!

Name: Nanami
Text: It doesn't seem to be enough. Let Nanami make some modifications!

Name: Nanami
Text: Sigh... It's still not good enough?!

Name: Nanami
Text: If you... Hmph...

Name: Nanami
Text: If you fail again, I'll have to bring out the big guns!

Name: Nanami
Text: From the hate-scorched sky, with righteous anger in our hearts!

Name: Nanami
Text: Thank you, Commandant! Thank you for helping our lovely Kuroro! Hehe!

Name: Haicma
Text: Hi, Commandant. I'll be helping you with the transport challenge today.

Name: Haicma
Text: Same as before, your target is to transport Kuroro to the destination.

Name: Haicma
Text: Failure is also part of the challenge. Don't give up, Commandant!

Name: Haicma
Text: Keep your cool, Commandant. Face the challenge level-headed.

Name: Haicma
Text: Considering the possibilities, I've activated the shield generator. Keep forging ahead, Commandant!

Name: Haicma
Text: Seems like I need to increase the shield's energy. High output mode activated. Keep forging ahead, Commandant!

Name: Haicma
Text: I didn't anticipate these results. Seems I need to re-evaluate your abilities and adjust the difficulty.

Name: Haicma
Text: You don't look well, Commandant. Maybe you should take a break.

Name: Haicma
Text: You look worse for wear. You really need to take a break.

Name: Haicma
Text: According to my calculations, your body is already overloaded and is no longer suitable for challenges. I'll help you achieve your goal!

Name: Haicma
Text: You've met the transportation goal! Here's your reward, Commandant.

Name: Vera
Text: I didn't expect to see you here, Commandant!

Name: Vera
Text: I've increased the difficulty of your little challenge of transporting Kuroro. You'll have to do better if you want your rewards.

Name: Vera
Text: Nothing unexpected. Work harder, Commandant.

Name: Vera
Text: Do you want me to give you a hand? Though support from Cerberus is expensive.

Name: Vera
Text: But you are the commandant of Gray Raven... Call it a favor. We'll say you owe me one.

Name: Vera
Text: Twice you've owed me, now. I can't wait to see how you pay me back.

Name: Vera
Text: Are you so desperate to please me?

Name: Vera
Text: You mean you want me to do it myself?

Name: Vera
Text: Maybe next time I will do it myself!

Name: Vera
Text: Let me feel more pain!

Name: Vera
Text: So this is what the commandant of Gray Raven is capable of. Alright, here are your rewards.

Name: Cathy
Text: Commandant... We are... responsible for... preparing... Cathy... I am... on the... way.

Name: Cathy
Text: There is... danger on the road. We need... your help! We thank you, Commandant!

Name: Cathy
Text: Cathy... under attack! But... we can still hold out!

Name: Cathy
Text: Cathy... injured! Requesting assistance! Requesting assistance!

Name: Cathy
Text: Cathy... severely injured! Help! Help!

Name: Cathy
Text: Cathy... have failed... the mission. S-s-sorry*^&%&*...

Name: Cathy
Text: Thank you... Commandant! The Festival will be... more exciting... with your participation!

Name: Roland
Text: Good morning! Gray Raven Commandant, your challenge is to escort Kuroro through the haunted house. I'm sure it won't be difficult for you.

Name: Roland
Text: I know this place like the back of my hand. You might just benefit greatly by listening to my suggestions.

Name: Roland
Text: See the trajectory of those obstacles? They're quite fixed, aren't they? You wouldn't have hit them, would you?

Name: Roland
Text: Hmm... It appears you need some assistance. Is that correct?

Name: Roland
Text: Give it a try. I prepared this gadget myself. It should be of quite some "use" to you.

Name: Roland
Text: Uh-oh. Doesn't seem like the Kuroro can take much more.

Name: Roland
Text: Time to clear the area. You can head back now. Gray Raven Commandant, be sure to give it your all next time.

Name: Roland
