Text: Not bad. Seems you're more capable than I thought. Here's a reward as a token of my approval.

Name: Karenina
Text: Hey! Gray Raven Commandant, the challenge I've prepared for you is the same as before. Avoid the light wall and hold out until the end!

Name: Karenina
Text: You will be deducted 20 points each time you touch the light wall. encounter a light curtain. If your points fall to 0, I'm sending you out into space!

Name: Karenina
Text: I'll reward you with more points for every few seconds you hold out. The laser wall will last for about one minute. Get ready! Go!

Name: Karenina
Text: The first light wall is approaching. Get ready. This one is just a warm-up.

Name: Karenina
Text: The 2nd light wall is approaching. This one's a little harder. Think you can take it?

Name: Karenina
Text: The last light wall is approaching! Almost there!

Name: Karenina
Text: Dammit... Ugh... You completely dodged all the light walls... Where'd you learn to be so strong?!

Name: Karenina
Text: Very well... Here's your reward! I'll have even harder light walls in the future. You better be ready!

Name: Karenina
Text: Eh, I guess you pass. I could've dodged all of them...

Name: Karenina
Text: By the way, I keep my words regarding rewards. Here you go!

Name: Karenina
Text: And the results are... You pass. Too bad you touched the light walls...

Name: Karenina
Text: Forget it—I shouldn't have expected so much of you. Go and get your rewards. Work harder next time.

Name: Karenina
Text: Oof... That was hard to watch. I guess I'll go easy on you this time. You won't be so lucky next time!

Name: Karenina
Text: Stop! Stop! Stop! Is this really all you got, Gray Raven Commandant?

Name: Karenina
Text: You better practice more first! Quit trying my patience! I'm not Lucia!

Name: Nanami
Text: Whew! Commandant, welcome to my Dodge Challenge! Your objective today is to dodge! Dodge the laser walls!

Name: Nanami
Text: Every time you hit the laser wall, I will deduct 20 points! If your score is at 0...

Name: Nanami
Text: I'm gonna make Power capture you, Commandant! Of course, I'll give you points for every second you hold out!

Name: Nanami
Text: The challenge will last for about one minute in total! Commandant, do your best! I'll be waiting for you here!

Name: Nanami
Text: Ding! The first wave of laser wall strikes! It's quite simple!

Name: Nanami
Text: Ding! Ding! The second wave of laser wall strikes! I've made it harder! I believe you can dodge it all!

Name: Nanami
Text: Ding! Ding! Ding! The third wave of massive laser wall strikes! Difficulty UP! But—I'll always believe in you!

Name: Nanami
Text: Perfect!!! You dodged all the light walls! Absolutely amazing! Here's your reward!

Name: Nanami
Text: Plus an extra one just for you! Hehe!

Name: Nanami
Text: Awesome! You've dodged most of the laser wall! These rewards are yours. I believe you will be able to dodge them all next time!

Name: Nanami
Text: Although you broke some laser walls, it's alright! You can still have these rewards. Try harder next time!

Name: Nanami
Text: You broke a lot of laser walls, but you've still successfully completed the challenge! Claim the rewards! You just need more practice!

Name: Nanami
Text: You're toast, Commandant! 0 points! Attack, Power! Better luck next time!

Name: Karenina
Text: Hmph. I'm back, Gray Raven Commandant. This time, you won't be able to dodge the light walls so easily!

Name: Karenina
Text: In this challenge, the points you get every second is linked to the score. Hitting the wall will deduct 20 points and your score will be reset.

Name: Karenina
Text: Same rules as before. If you fall to 0 points, I'm sending you out into space! Ready? The light walls won't stop this time!

Name: Karenina
Text: I admit defeat, Gray Raven Commandant... Take your damn reward. Next time will be even harder. Just you wait!

Name: Karenina
Text: You performed very well. Although you hit the laser wall, you've exceeded my expectations. Now, claim these rewards!

Name: Karenina
Text: Hmph, I knew this one would be difficult for you, but your overall performance wasn't too bad! Take your rewards!

Name: Karenina
Text: Is that all you got? Forget it. Just take your reward. I hope you surprise me next time.

Name: Karenina
Text: Hahaha! I knew that no one could dodge the laser wall I designed this time.

Name: Karenina
Text: You'd better come prepared next time... How about you get out of here before I finish warming up?

Name: Selena
Text: Ready, Commandant? The performance is about to start! Focus!

Name: Selena
Text: This time, you won't lose points for touching the lasers. But you'll lose HP! So be careful!

Name: Selena
Text: It's showtime! Follow the rhythm, Commandant!

Name: Selena
Text: Perfect! I'm glad we can have such an amazing performance together!

Name: Selena
Text: It wasn't a perfect performance, but I'm glad you tried.

Name: Selena
Text: That's all folks... Commandant, you must be tired. Get some rest.

Name: Selena
Text: You can do it, Commandant!

Name: Selena
Text: You don't look so good today. Maybe you should get some rest and come back later.

Name: Selena
Text: You want to continue? Okay! That's the spirit, Commandant. Never give up! Let's keep going.

Name: Cathy
Text: Please pay attention... to the flame... around you.

Name: Cathy
Text: Getting attacked... by the flame... will deduct the score.

Name: Cathy
Text: More... flames have appeared.

Name: Cathy
Text: Perfect-performance

Name: Cathy
Text: Qualified-performance

Name: Cathy
Text: Wholehearted-performance

Name: Cathy
Text: Unwilling-performance

Name: Cathy
Text: It's a pity...

Name: Cathy
Text: Performance begins...

Name: No. 21
Text: Hey! Gray Raven Commandant, the test is about to begin. Are you ready?

Name: No. 21
Text: Ready? Then let's begin.

Name: No. 21
Text: Device durability below 70%.

Name: No. 21
Text: Device durability below 50%. Danger!

Name: No. 21
Text: Device durability below 20%. The test is about to fail!

Name: No. 21
Text: That concludes the test. The results are... you failed. Want to try again, Gray Raven Commandant?

Name: No. 21
Text: Test complete. Here is your reward, Commandant.

Name: Grizzly Member
Text: We need support! Grizzly is surrounded by the Corrupted! Please cover us to retreat!

Name: Celica - Lieutenant
Text: Warning: Level 12 infection waveform detected! Shark-speare is back!

Name: Shark-speare (Severely Corrupted)
Text: Shark-speare... will never... let off... a single enemy...

Name: Grizzly Member
Text: We can't leave our comrades... "Overload Core, set up the support field!"

Name: Shark-speare (Severely Corrupted)
Text: Don't think... Shark-speare... doesn't have... any comrades...

Name: Shark-speare (Severely Corrupted)
Text: Shark-speare... has a surprise... for you...

Name: Lucia
Text: Tap on the correct action when the halo is full!

Name: Lucia
Text: Take action when the halo is full! Got it? Now it's show time!

Name: Laro
Text: Detected increasing Punishing Virus Concentration on a lone island. It has already reached a level where interference is required.

Name: Laro
Text: First mission is to clear the corrupted zones. Not bad for a newly formed team like us.

Name: Laro
Text: As you can see, you and all other members are only newbies.

Name: Rock
Text: Zzzzzz—

Name: Rock
Text: No... Captain... I don't want that...

Name: Rock
Text: I'm not... ready for... a mission yet...

Name: Fredrik
Text: The wind's pretty strong. I should've brought a cloak—

Name: Fredrik
Text: Hey! I didn't see you in training before!

Name: Fredrik
Text: Don't drag us down, okay?

Name: Faye
Text: I ask of you. Are you our Commandant?

Name: Excited Member
Text: I don't want to stay in the training facilities for another day!

Name: Laro
Text: Hey, Commandant. You're finally awake.

Name: Laro
Text: I bet you had a bumpy ride getting here, didn't you?

Name: Laro
Text: Please meet up with your teammates first. They've been looking forward to your arrival.

Name: Laro
Text: We're almost arriving at the mission location. Please get ready, Commandant.

Name: Laro
Text: This is the marked corrupted zone.

Name: Laro
Text: Other members have already set off, and I'll be following your lead, Commandant.

Name: Laro
Text: I'll do my best to not slow you down.

Name: Laro
Text: Commandant, I'm here.

Name: Support Force
Text: Warning: Detected a sudden surge in the Punishing Virus Concentration along with signals of the Corrupted.

Name: Laro
Text: Let's split up here. Please be careful, Commandant.

Name: Rock
Text: That's why I don't want to act alone—

Name: Fredrik
Text: —And it's so hot today.

Name: Faye
Text: I guess Commandant wouldn't mind me slowing things down...

Name: Faye
Text: Ah, what a coincidence! Please don't mind me slowing things down, Commandant.
These watermelon rinds... Don't tell me you ate all the watermelons...

Name: Faye
Text: I didn't eat them! But this is quite suspicious. Let's do some investigation after cleaning up this mess.
It's way too obvious... A trap?
(Someone is staring at us...)
It's getting dark. Let's call it a day for now.
I should check that out.

Name: Faye
Text: It really is a trap!
It's already dark. We better head back to the supply shuttle.
I've wasted too much time on this... They must've already spotted us.
Let's go to the pier.
Playing that many tricks... You're the mastermind behind it all. What do you want?

Name: Mysterious Mechanoid
Text: Mastermind? No! I ask you, have you ever heard of my name King Wrench XIV?
...Who's that?

Name: Support Force
Text: Combat support dispatched.
Here—

Name: Laro
Text: The details of "King Wrench XIV" could not be found.

Name: Laro
Text: While there are some eyewitness reports, but...

Name: Laro
Text: At least we can say the mechanoid standing before us doesn't match the model.

Name: Rock
Text: He called himself King Wrench XIV?

Name: Rock
Text: But their models don't even match up, do they?

Name: Rock
Text: The legendary mechanoid is just a Repairer. Seriously?

Name: Fredrik
Text: We shouldn't let a suspicious mechanoid join us.

Name: Fredrik
Text: But this guy—I feel like we share the same vibes!

Name: Fredrik
Text: This isn't a human cosplaying as a Repairer, right?

Name: Faye
Text: Wrench? Can he tighten the screw on my butt? It's coming loose.

Name: Excited Member
Text: XIV? Perhaps there's some connection to that lord. Hoo hoo...

Name: Laro
Text: The mechanoid you brought back has been inspected.

Name: Laro
Text: No Punishing Virus detected from the mechanoid...

Name: Laro
Text: But it's better to keep an eye on him.

Name: Fredrik
Text: If you ask me, Commandant, I'll say he could be our extra help.

Name: Fredrik
Text: And we can bring him along to fight the Corrupted.

Name: Fredrik
Text: If he's truly on our side, we'll fight alongside him. Otherwise, we'll take him down as well.

Name: King Wrench XIV (???)
Text: The world has really changed! I'd never imagined there would come a day when my name means nothing at all!

Name: King Wrench XIV (???)
Text: Never mind, you've passed the trial, kid! (Finally found a living human!)

Name: King Wrench XIV (???)
Text: I saw it clearly from the beach! Your talent shouldn't be used merely for fighting the Corrupted!

Name: King Wrench XIV (???)
Text: Why not join me, and together we can achieve something big like restoring the glory of this wrench! No time to waste, let's go!

Name: King Wrench XIV (???)
Text: Come to think of it, it's hard to believe that I, King Wrench XIV, have been reduced to this!

Name: King Wrench XIV (???)
Text: But crossing your path on this island must be the choice of Steins Gate!

Name: King Wrench XIV (???)
Text: Even though you've never heard of my legend, you'll surely be awed after seeing my fighting skills!

Name: Rock
Text: Whether or not this guy can be trusted, I never imagined that King Wrench XIV would be anything more than a fanciful legend.

Name: Rock
Text: The legendary yet mysterious mechanoid, the savior of new recruits...

Name: Rock
Text: When was the last time I heard about his story?

Name: King Wrench XIV (???)
Text: Your fighting techniques are really something! Seems like I'm the one left behind the times!

Name: King Wrench XIV (???)
Text: My body is falling apart but you've shown that I can now entrust this battered body to you!
Wait... I'm afraid—

Name: Support Force
Text: Corrupted signals detected upstairs.

Name: Support Force
Text: Warning: Corrupted signals detected.

Name: Faye
Text: I've heard that those who like King Wrench XIV aren't bad. A little help couldn't hurt—

Name: Faye
Text: Don't get me wrong! It'll only happen after we clear all the Corrupted! (Besides, no way it's real...)

Name: Faye
Text: Commandant... Watch out!
If we don't have other missions... And he doesn't seem dangerous, so let's leave it as it is for now.

Name: King Wrench XIV (???)
Text: Just as expected, you and I really are a perfect partner!

Name: King Wrench XIV (???)
Text: Our top priority right now is to fix my lower body.

Name: King Wrench XIV (???)
Text: I used to be a fighter like you...

Name: King Wrench XIV (???)
Text: Then I took a shot in the knee... Anyway!

Name: King Wrench XIV (???)
Text: We have to find the parts to fix my lower body. Follow me!

Name: King Wrench XIV (???)
Text: The exit is over there.

Name: King Wrench XIV (???)
Text: I've already scouted this island. Only if there weren't so many Corrupted...

Name: King Wrench XIV (???)
Text: Only if I had my lower body!

Name: King Wrench XIV (???)
Text: This would be an amazing place for retirement—

Name: King Wrench XIV (???)
Text: Let's get moving before the sun goes set.

Name: King Wrench XIV (???)
Text: There's a door inside the aquarium ahead, and behind it is the last corrupted zone on this island.

Name: King Wrench XIV (???)
Text: I've also spotted a pale-skinned mechanoid with long legs going in and out the door!

Name: King Wrench XIV (???)
Text: I'm not certain what's happening behind that door, but I have a feeling it's something extremely dangerous. Be ready for anything!

Name: Faye
Text: So all you wanted to say is you can't defeat it by yourself?

Name: King Wrench XIV (???)
Text: ...Fine, you're right! If I wasn't afraid to die, I wouldn't have waited for you all! Let's just go open the door!

Name: King Wrench XIV (???)
Text: The aquarium is right ahead.

Name: Faye
Text: Its interior is bigger than I expected... My 20 years of gaming experience are telling me this doesn't seem good at all!

Name: King Wrench XIV (???)
Text: Anyway, help me find the parts first! And I know you like it, but you need to watch out for the long-legged mechanoid!

Name: King Wrench XIV (???)
Text: Well, though I don't hate it either...

Name: Faye
Text: ...Hmm?
That is...?

Name: King Wrench XIV (???)
Text: Give me spotlights! Hen—Shin!

Name: King Wrench XIV (??)
Text: King Wrench XIV—has—arrived!

Name: King Wrench XIV (??)
Text: How is this?

Name: Faye
Text: Whew! That killing aura is pretty impressive! But you can stop acting like a grandpa.

Name: King Wrench XIV (??)
Text: Uh... It's not that... The screws are just too tight... I can't move the joints...

Name: Faye
Text: I'm already worn out. Let's head back and sort it out—

Name: Laro
Text: If you ask me...

Name: Laro
Text: If we don't have other missions at the time being...

Name: Laro
Text: Then we can't simply leave him be. But before we proceed, I'll report back on the mission status.

Name: Rock
Text: Well... Judging from his appearance...

Name: Rock
Text: He's definitely a Repairer, and that's the virus' favorite model!

Name: Rock
Text: On top of that, his mobility is way too low! Should we take him apart and take a look inside?

Name: Fredrik
Text: You remodeled it? So you're a real cosplayer!

Name: Fredrik
Text: But—your tastes are quite strange.

Name: Fredrik
Text: Let me help you refine your tastes! Are you interested in cross-dressing?

Name: Faye
Text: Well, as long as his mechanical circuits are intact, I don't mind coming along...

Name: Excited Member
Text: Who said cross-dressing?!

Name: Laro
Text: Perhaps you should talk to everyone about what to do with that mechanoid, Commandant

Name: Laro
Text: Although he hasn't shown any signs of hostility so far...

Name: Laro
Text: It may still cause misunderstandings if we bring him along with us.

Name: Fredrik
Text: I say we've got to help him out to the end. What if he has a shapeshifting ability and he wants to repay us!

Name: Fredrik
Text: And this can bring us closer together as a team. It hits two birds with one stone...

Name: Fredrik
Text: Oh, he can help us eliminate more Corrupted as well! We're gonna hit three birds instead! Though, I'll be going back with Laro.

Name: King Wrench XIV (??)
Text: Do you find this body as charming as I do? Though it could still use a bit of maintenance...

Name: King Wrench XIV (??)
Text: If I can lubricate my new parts and ind my "Godly Wrench"...

Name: King Wrench XIV (??)
Text: The legendary King Wrench XIV will be fully revived!

Name: King Wrench XIV (??)
Text: Oh, just to be clear, I only accept lubricants from the Golden Age that were made in '82. Let's get going before my body gives out again!

Name: Faye
Text: It's so hot... You know, I didn't really mean it, so you don't have to actually bring me along...

Name: King Wrench XIV (??)
Text: We'll have to continue on foot from here on out. This brings back so many memories... I have a brother named Riot..

Name: King Wrench XIV (??)
Text: We used to come here after sparring to grab two barrels of oil for lubrication and refreshment... Something is coming—

Name: Faye
Text: So, how did you lose your legs?

Name: King Wrench XIV (??)
Text: Ow! M-my head! It hurts! Maybe it's the explosion! I can't remember anything!

Name: Faye
Text: You look awfully suspicious. Should we take your head off and take a look inside?

Name: King Wrench XIV (??)
Text: Those Corrupted are no match for us! Still as weak as ever!
...I didn't see you hit a Corrupted once.

Name: Faye
Text: It isn't the time for this. The real danger is coming at us!

Name: King Wrench XIV (??)
Text: Let's act now!

Name: King Wrench XIV (??)
Text: I feel like my head is hot enough to be used for frying an egg...
Speaking of which, I haven't had lunch yet. Hold your head still (taking out an egg from somewhere).

Name: King Wrench XIV (??)
Text: ...Knock it off! The Corrupted didn't eat anything, either!

Name: Faye
Text: ...I think I'm going to get overheated...

Name: King Wrench XIV (??)
Text: Weakling! I, King Wrench XIV, was born in fire!

Name: King Wrench XIV (??)
Text: ...How about I go find a Nozzle and take a cooling module out of it!

Name: King Wrench XIV (??)
Text: Guys! If my brain hasn't gone completely rusty, I think there's a temperature controller behind the door!
...By the way, I'm also curious about your leg, and your wrench...

Name: Faye
Text: Let's get inside first... Com... man... dant...

Name: King Wrench XIV (??)
Text: Just hang in! We're almost there!

Name: Laro
Text: Detected a rapid increase in this area's Punishing Virus Concentration. Please be careful.
Well... I suppose it will never be easy...

Name: Faye
Text: ****! Enough already!

Name: Faye
Text: Hurry up! There must be a cooler inside!
Once inside, we should do some maintenance as well...

Name: Support Force
Text: The maintenance of support members has been completed.

Name: Laro
Text: Despite the complexity of this facility's structure, it seems our progress is still on track so far.

Name: Laro
Text: We'll continue to analyze this facility to support your further advance.

Name: Laro
Text: Furthermore, I've reported back about this mission, and they've given us permission to continue.

Name: Rock
Text: Commandant, he hasn't cause any trouble, has he?

Name: Rock
Text: If he has, we can simply dismantle him and return home.

Name: Rock
Text: You know everyone's still waiting for the feast celebrating our completed mission!

Name: Faye
Text: Hah... My armor coating is almost completely worn off. Why wasn't I put in charge of the projection?

Name: Faye
Text: And where's the temperature control mentioned before? The cooler?

Name: Faye
Text: I request a substitution!

Name: Fredrik
Text: I'm glad you're still doing fine in this heat, Faye! Hahahaha!

Name: Laro
Text: Commandant, the tactical map has been successfully projected.

Name: Laro
Text: It appears that the facility you're in has been abandoned for quite some time.

Name: Laro
Text: Please watch out for the invading Corrupted.

Name: Faye
Text: Phew... Maintenance is completed...

Name: Faye
Text: If Commandant is ready as well...

Name: Faye
Text: Lets go and finish this business!

Name: King Wrench XIV (??)
Text: Hey, don't look at me like that! There was a temperature controller here two years ago!

Name: King Wrench XIV (??)
Text: It must have broken as it was left for such a long time!

Name: King Wrench XIV (??)
Text: Now, I'm just hoping the elevator still works...

Name: Faye
Text: It's time to reveal the secrets you've been hiding. Or I'm gonna leave right now.

Name: King Wrench XIV (??)
Text: There's something in this world that's better left unknown. Once you know it, you can never go back!

Name: King Wrench XIV (??)
Text: But if you insist anyway, I need you to keep it secret... and take down all the enemies first!

Name: King Wrench XIV (??)
Text: It wasn't really a big deal. Just an ordinary day hanging out with my friends Riot and Yazi. And when I had to go home, Riot offered me a ride.

Name: King Wrench XIV (??)
Text: Soon after we took off into the sky, two missiles came right at us! I knew my brother looked like a Corrupted, but could they give us a warning first?

Name: Faye
Text: ...And after that?

Name: King Wrench XIV (??)
Text: And after that, I streaked through the sky like a shooting star! I swear I'm gonna...

Name: Faye
Text: Hold up, the bridge is broken. What should we do?

Name: King Wrench XIV (??)
Text: Looks like we've got other gossipmongers coming.

Name: King Wrench XIV (??)
Text: ...write a King Wrench XIV Crusoe! Huh? Oh, see the platform below? We jump!

Name: King Wrench XIV (??)
Text: Hurry up!

Name: King Wrench XIV (??)
Text: Hey, I'm here. Where are you?

Name: King Wrench XIV (??)
Text: Don't tell me you busted yourself up falling.

Name: King Wrench XIV (??)
Text: Just come! Enemies are coming at me!

Name: King Wrench XIV (??)
Text: This corridor will lead us to the elevator.

Name: Faye
Text: ...The bridge won't collapse when we cross it, right?

Name: King Wrench XIV (??)
Text: You've watched to much Lara Croft. Just believe me!

Name: Faye
Text: All of us are depending on this elevator now...

Name: King Wrench XIV (??)
Text: Come to think of it, I used to kill time riding a drop tower at an amusement park...
...After you.

Name: Faye
Text: Go, I-I'll bring up the rear!

Name: King Wrench XIV (??)
Text: Oh, it's the scent of oil—

Name: King Wrench XIV (??)
Text: Wait... Where's all my oil gone?! Where's my treasure gone?!

Name: Faye
Text: Are you sure this is the place?

Name: King Wrench XIV (??)
Text: M-maybe my data's messed up. Let's search around!

Name: King Wrench XIV (??)
Text: Hey! Intruders!

Name: King Wrench XIV (??)
Text: Give my oil back!

Name: King Wrench XIV (??)
Text: Let's check the hall first.

Name: King Wrench XIV (??)
Text: Now, time to count up your Cogs!

Name: King Wrench XIV (??)
Text: Behold! 3x Speed King Wrench XIV!

Name: King Wrench XIV (??)
Text: Let's go... for a ride!

Name: Faye
Text: The cyclonic movement and the scarf! You're—it's amazing!

Name: Faye
Text: King Wrench XIV—No, Master! Please forgive my earlier rashness!
...What's going on here...

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: Hey, I'm not worthy of being called master—not until I get my own wrench back!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: But the place where I lost my wrench is still far away from here. We need to find a way... That's right, the transport craft! Follow me!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: Riot and I were hit by missiles right above the forest outside the city Yazi lived. My wrench must have dropped around there!

Name: Faye
Text: We've requested air support! Before it gets here...

Name: Faye
Text: Is this salty smell from a sea breeze or the Punishing Virus?

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: Hey, I've seen the enemies coming!

Name: Laro
Text: I can see you've just survived a fierce battle. The transport craft is on its way. Please take a break before it arrives.

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: By the way, I've heard a rumor that there's an omniscient "witch" living in that forest.

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: She must be able to help us find my wrench!

Name: Laro
Text: We've detected comms interference in the forest.

Name: Laro
Text: It might affect our communication as you proceed.

Name: Laro
Text: Please be careful.

Name: Rock
Text: Zzzzzz... Captain...

Name: Rock
Text: Commandant... not here...

Name: Rock
Text: Let's... meet... Hehe...

Name: Faye
Text: I've never thought it was real! That was incredible!

Name: Faye
Text: A mysterious mechanoid with a scarf shouting out super iconic lines!

Name: Faye
Text: It's so cool! Do you get me, Commandant?

Name: Fredrik
Text: Why did Faye get so worked up?

Name: Laro
Text: We can't find a suitable landing spot in the forest, Commandant.

Name: Laro
Text: We'll have to drop you here, and...

Name: Laro
Text: The visibility in the forest is low. It feels unusual.

Name: Faye
Text: Master! Have you rested up already? Do you need more oil?

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: No need. Now I'm able to accelerate to my full speed!

Name: Faye
Text: Then let's get going!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: All we need to do is move forward!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: If that witch knows my name, King Wrench XIV—

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: I'm sure she'll welcome us with open arms! Hahahaha!

Name: Faye
Text: Is that a boar howling? Are there still boars around these days?

Name: Home
Text: Boar—

Name: Home
Text: Rush—

Name: Faye
Text: I don't think this is a good place for bulls, right?

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: C'mon, you've been overreacting!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: I bet you grew up like a flower in the greenhouse, didn't you?

Name: Faye
Text: Please forgive my ignorance... Just as Master said, it was the first time I'd seen such things...

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: This way. Follow me.

Name: Faye
Text: There are more and more bugs!

Name: Faye
Text: Is it possible that... by any chance... we're already lost?

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: I hate bugs! You can handle them for me!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: The big one is coming!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: Calm down, fellas! It's no way we're lost!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: It must be that witch's trick! Let's change to another route!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: By the way... Keep your hands away from the plants here.

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: They've consumed more Corrupted than you guys have defeated!

Name: Faye
Text: What? Good thing this flower doesn't have tentacles yet!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: So you see it now?

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: I must get my wrench back quickly!

Name: Faye
Text: I think something is off this way, too.

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: It was just a small setback! I'm gonna feed you to those flowers if I hear you whining one more time!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: So many mosquitoes! Help me swat them! I can't reach—

Name: Faye
Text: This mosquito has a bigger head than mine... I'm glad it isn't a roach...

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: Shh—Something is flying toward us!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: Gosh! That's a hell big moth!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: Phew... It's been a long while. The creatures here are still as diverse as ever.
...Whatever, having fun is what matters.

Name: Faye
Text: But that looks nothing like a moth... Hm? That is—

Name: Faye
Text: Whoa! This is really...

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: Every cloud has a silver lining, like they say!
R-r-r-robbery! Don't move! Our liquor bottles are coated with deadly poison!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: Hmph, you should've learned how to fight first!

Name: Bandit
Text: You're all gonna regret it!

Name: Bandit
Text: The Devilish Duo won't let you off!

Name: "Devilish Duo"
Text: It's you guys who messed with my little brother! Prepare yourselves!

Name: "Devilish Duo"
Text: You'd wish you'd never done such a thing!

Name: "Devilish Duo"
Text: My Big Bro, the River Severer, won't let you off!

Name: Faye
Text: What in the world is wrong with them?

Name: Faye
Text: Let's go up and take a look, Commandant.

Name: Faye
Text: Master, is it true that people can only discover unspoiled, beautiful landscapes when they are lost?

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: I've told you we aren't lost! It must be right ahead...

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: I'm gonna mark this as my ideal place to retire! Look at the cute rabbits—
This mountain—I built it! This tree—I planted it!

Name: Home
Text: And it was you disturbing the peace at my place!

Name: "Big Bro, the River Severer"
Text: It seems you all haven't taken me, the River Severer, seriously at all!

Name: "Big Bro, the River Severer"
Text: I'll let you off this time, but you won't be this lucky next time!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: How come a peaceful land like this has a bunch of idiots living on it...

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: If there's a bridge, there's crossers! The witch must be up ahead!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: —There's a bridge ahead!

Name: Faye
Text: Hmm... I think I saw a girl at the fork in the road earlier...
Hahaha! You must be the thieves Big Bro told me about!

Name: "The Sea Severer"
Text: Dare to mess with me, the Sea Severer, on my turf! You're already dead! Get them!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: We're no thieves, but you sure are! Prepare yourselves!

Name: "The Sea Severer"
Text: Not bad! I'm gonna take you on myself!

Name: "Big Bro, the River Severer"
Text: Please leave this to me!

Name: "The Sea Severer"
Text: I'm sorry, masters! We didn't mean to offend you. Please spare our lives!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: I can spare you, but you have to answer my questions first. Is there a suspicious "witch" in these woods?

Name: "The Sea Severer"
Text: Witch? You didn't see her on your way here? But she's even more—I'm not finished yet!

Name: Witch
Text: Hey, you're back!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: You're the witch, aren't you? We've been looking for you for a long time!

Name: Witch
Text: Witch? Oh, yap, I am! I was about to call out to you guys earlier.

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: Cut the nonsense. You should've known why we're here!

Name: Faye
Text: It's not good to be so mean to a girl! And she doesn't seem to have ill intent!

Name: Faye
Text: I'm sorry. My brother has just recovered from an illness. That's why he's way too enthusiastic than usual.

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: You should rest up. It's been an exhausting day for you, right? (thump)

Name: "God of River"
Text: Relax! I'm actually—the "God of River"! You're here for this, aren't you?

Name: "God of River"
Text: I have a golden wrench, silver wrench, and... a wrench that fell from the sky! Which one is yours?

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: All of them are—Cut out the tricks! Hand it back to me now, or I'll make you regret it.

Name: "God of River"
Text: Calm down! Here, I came all the way with it just to return it to you.

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: This feeling! It really is my precious wrench! Who are you actually?

Name: "God of River"
Text: Who I am doesn't matter. You should get going. We'll meet again.

Name: Faye
Text: There really was someone I caught a glimpse of earlier around here—over there!

Name: Faye
Text: ...Hey, what time is it now? Where's the girl?

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: That girl is way beyond our capability! We should be glad that we can still get up after that!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: Yazi's place is just up ahead. We've got to ask her if she has any leads on Riot's location.

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: I'm enough by myself from here on! Until I we meet again, Take care!

Name: Faye
Text: Wait up! Do you really think we're gonna let you go alone after hearing such cliche lines?
Looks like I'd never be able to shake you guys off...

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: ...Fine! Join me for my last joyride!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: Now then, what's been going on in the city when I was gone... How's Yazi doing?

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: And don't get too aggressive if the guards don't recognize me!
Who are you? Get them!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: Resent your boss for not knowing this wrench!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: Oh no, attacking the guards will cause us big trouble. Even if I could meet Yazi...

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: She would never forgive me! You guys need to help me clear my name!

Name: Faye
Text: Don't worry, I've already had it all recorded!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: The outer wall isn't heavily protected, but we better not let our guard down.

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: The sky is turning dark. I want dinner!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: We're almost at the inner city, and I have a buddy who can get us in!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: Let's hurry up!

Name: Faye
Text: The lights and the aromas of food... How about we find a place and call it a day, and tomorrow we'll—

Name: City Patrol Members
Text: They're there! Don't let them run away!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: Can we talk this out? I'm your captain's old friend!

Name: City Patrol Members
Text: Please forgive us! We're just a bunch of good citizens doing our jobs!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: Then you must be so fulfilled when you were beating us up! Get your captain here!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: I, King Wrench XIV, want to see him!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: We need someone to send the message.

Name: Patrol Force
Text: Huh? You think our captain is willing to see someone like you?
Who got the guts to come see me, Tien the Wicked?

Name: "Tian the Wicked"
Text: Y-you're... I'm the captain you want to see, King Wrench... Never mind, it's my honor to meet you!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: What? I'm looking for Di the Gracious, not you!

Name: Former Captain "Tian the Wicked"
Text: H-he's already hung up his spurs! What about I give you three bows as a token of my apology?

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: So many things have changed... Well, it can't be helped.

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: Behind this courtyard is where Yazi lives, but it's guarded by the elite members she chose from the Twelve Palaces. We must be careful with every step!
We've been waiting for you! Now embrace your death, thieves!

Name: "Twelve Palaces"
Text: For Yazi! For... love and justice!

Name: "Twelve Palaces"
Text: I've used up all my... powers—

Name: Faye
Text: Isn't it kind of like we're the villains?
Speaking of which, why do the Twelve Palaces have so many members?

Name: Gatekeeper
Text: Who are you? If you're here for Yazi, please go back... If you want death, I'll give it to you!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: No need to het heated. If Yazi isn't around, we're happy to wait inside until she's back!

Name: Gatekeeper
Text: No one shall enter without permission!

Name: Gatekeeper
Text: Yazi... Guha...

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: This could've been avoided. If Yazi's back, tell her we came!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: We promise our hands won't touch anything inside. Hahaha!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: ...As elegant as usual. Look at the flowers—
The thieves have got inside! Seize them at once!

Name: Guards
Text: You've got some nerve breaking into Yazi's house! Now you're trapped like rats!

Name: Yazi
Text: —Who has broken into my house?

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: Yazi! You're finally back! It's me, Wrench! Can you talk your men down?

Name: Yazi
Text: Wrench—King Wrench XIV has gone missing for two years now. How can you prove you're King Wrench XIV?

Name: Yazi
Text: Words mean nothing here. I'll see it with my own eyes. Come with me.

Name: Yazi
Text: But if you value your life, turn back and go home. Though the answer you and I have been seeking will remain buried here forever.

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: Yazi, you know me more than anyone else. I'll prove it to you!

Name: Yazi
Text: ...I have to say your attitude is just like his. Then show me what you got!
Wait—!

Name: Riot
Text: Riot, taking off!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: Riot, you're alive! I've been looking for you!

Name: Riot
Text: Your movement is still as sharp as ever, Wrench! I've missed you so much! Where have you been the last two years?

Name: Yazi
Text: ...Looks like you're really him. Well then, let's talk about the mess in my house, shall we? (No one dares make a single sound.)

Name: Yazi
Text: It'd be impossible not to notice something as big as Riot. I had my men retrieve him once I received a report that an accident had happened in the forest.

Name: Yazi
Text: But Wrench's whereabouts still remained a mystery, and two years passed... Worry? Hum, it's Wrench we're talking about.

Name: Yazi
Text: As for the weird girl you brought up, I'm clueless as well. The rumors are already untraceable, but to have this under my nose...

Name: Riot
Text: Anyone who dares disturb the peace in the forest will face Riot's formidable power!

Name: Riot
Text: Until then, thank you so much for bringing Wrench back!

Name: Riot
Text: Be careful on your way back! Don't let your guard down like I did!

Name: Faye
Text: Let's go, Commandant. I have to do some maintenance—

Name: Faye
Text: And everyone is going to be worried about us, not to mention the feast—

Name: Faye
Text: What? I-I'm not crying! It was just a mission to me—Wahhhhhhh!

Name: Yazi
Text: Anyway, that's it. I apologize for my men's rudeness once again.

Name: Yazi
Text: And thank you for taking care of Wrench. Without your help, he wouldn't have made it this far.

Name: Yazi
Text: But I can't let a hotheaded guy like him continue to stay by your side and put you in danger. That's why your journey with him has to end here.

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: It seems there's no time for you to return the favor, hahaha!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: I admit you were faster than me this time, but my legend is just getting started!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: You have to get faster and faster, otherwise I won't admit you've saved King Wrench XIV!

Name: King Wrench XIV
Text: Time to go? Come on, a fist pump to my wrench! Next time will be my turn to save you!
Next time... make sure you're not mistaken for a Corrupted again. And...
On behalf of all the other commandants you saved...
Thank you, and goodbye!

Name: Celica
Text: First, familiarize yourself with the basic moves of team members.

Name: Celica
Text: Go to the control panel and select a character.

Name: Celica
Text: Whose combat style would you like to learn?

Name: Celica
Text: It seems you're already quite familiar with this member's controls.

Name: Celica
Text: It seems you're already quite familiar with this member's controls.

Name: Celica
Text: It seems you're already quite familiar with this member's controls.

Name: Celica
Text: Haven't you decided which member's controls you want to familiarize yourself with yet?

Name: Celica
Text: Key technique to master: Output Cycle - <color=#ffda58>Ultima Slash</color>

Name: Celica
Text: Solacetune only has Red and Yellow Orbs in ordinary mode and consumes White Orbs above when performing pings.

Name: Celica
Text: Ping any <color=#ffda58>6</color> orbs to obtain a special <color=#ffda58>Harmonic Orb</color>. Ping the Harmonic Orb to quickly gain Signature Energy and cast <color=#ffda58>Phase 1 Signature</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Cast <color=#ffda58>Phase 1 Signature</color> to enter the <color=#ffda58>Attacker Mode</color>, turn all Signal Orbs into <color=#ffda58>Blue Orbs</color>, and increase <color=#ffda58>Sharp Reserve acquisition efficiency</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Sharp Reserve</color> is displayed here. The number in the bottom right corner indicates the <color=#ffda58>Ultima Slashes available</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: When <color=#ffda58>Ultima Slash</color> is available to trigger, tapping <color=#ffda58>Signature</color> will cast <color=#ffda58>Jade Bloom</color> and unleash <color=#ffda58>Ultima Slash</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Jade Bloom</color> consumes 30 <color=#ffda58>Sonority</color> Energy. Musical Note Energy can be acquired from pings and Basic Attacks.

Name: Celica
Text: Cast <color=#ffda58>Jade Bloom</color> with full <color=#ffda58>Musical Note</color> Energy. And then, your Basic Attacks will trigger an Ultima Slash and restore Signal Orbs. Do this repetitively to quickly trigger <color=#ffda58>Ultima Slashes</color> in a row.

Name: Celica
Text: All the <color=#ffda58>Ultima Slashes</color> you cast will be recorded <color=#ffda58>for collaboration</color> with other members' skills.

Name: Celica
Text: Key technique to master: Core Passive - <color=#ffda58>Imprisoning Co-Strike</color>

Name: Celica
Text: Press and hold Basic Attack: Echo enters <color=#ffda58>Tactical Cipher</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Upon entering <color=#ffda58>Tactical Cipher</color>, Echo starts charging, during which Signal Orbs are temporarily replaced by <color=#ffda58>Cipher Orbs</color>. When a <color=#ffda58>Cipher Orb</color> is pinged, <color=#ffda58>Cecily</color> will unleash a swordwave to damage the enemy.

Name: Celica
Text: When <color=#ffda58>fully charged</color>, Echo will <color=#ffda58>activate Judgment Zone</color>. Allies within <color=#ffda58>Judgment Zone</color> will be healed.

Name: Celica
Text: When Echo is within Judgment Zone, she gains <color=#ffda58>Splendor Points</color> from each ping.

Name: Celica
Text: At max <color=#ffda58>Splendor Points</color>, pinging a Signal Orb that matches the color of <color=#ffda58>Cipher Orb</color> inside <color=#ffda58>Judgment Zone</color> will trigger <color=#ffda58>Imprisoning Co-Strike</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Next, I will show you Echo's complete damage output cycle.

Name: Celica
Text: Press and hold Basic Attack to enter <color=#ffda58>Tactical Cipher</color>. Ping <color=#ffda58>Cipher Orbs</color> consecutively to continue charging and <color=#ffda58>activate Judgment Zone</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Make 3 consecutive 3-Pings <color=#ffda58>in Judgment Zone</color> to accumulate <color=#ffda58>maximum Splendor Points</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>At max Splendor Points, consume <color=#ffda58>Soul Shatter Mark</color></color> to cast <color=#ffda58>Soulbreaking Co-Strike</color>, then cast <color=#ffda58>Signature - Celestial Edge</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Key technique to master: Output Cycle - <color=#ffda58>Sword Dance</color>

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Press and hold Dodge</color> to trigger Luminous Realm, during which pinging orbs will generate Afterglow Points.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>When Stigmata's Signature Move is active</color>, all Afterglow Points accumulated via her Core Passive will be consumed for the Afterglow Enhancement effect, and her Basic Attack will inflict the <color=#ffda58>Afterglow Shadow</color> effect.

Name: Celica
Text: <size=25><color=#ffda58>Tap Signature</color> to activate <color=#ffda58>Sword Form</color>, during which all attacks stack up <color=#ffda58>Stigmata Will</color> and Stigmata has <color=#ffda58>Super Armor</color>. While Afterglow Enhancement is active, Basic Attacks inflict the <color=#ffda58>Afterglow Shadow</color> effect and deal additional Physical DMG.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: <size=27><color=#ffda58>In Sword Form</color>, Resolution will be triggered with the <color=#ffda58>4th hit of the Basic Attack</color>. <color=#ffda58>Press and hold Basic Attack</color> to launch an upward thrust attack. Keep pressing and holding Basic Attack to follow up with a 3-hit <color=#ffda58>Sword Dance</color>.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: In <color=#ffda58>Sword Form</color>, <color=#ffda58>a successful dodge</color> will also trigger Resolution.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Dodge</color> the enemy's attack first.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Press and hold Basic Attack</color> to launch an upward thrust attack. And then keep pressing and holding Basic Attack to follow up with a 3-hit <color=#ffda58>Sword Dance</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: In <color=#ffda58>Sword Form</color>, at full Signature Energy, <color=#ffda58>tap Signature</color> to spend all Stigmata Will and cast Illuminated Abyss, during which Time Lag Calculation will also be triggered.

Name: Celica
Text: Let's move on to the main changes in this mode and team output techniques.

Name: Celica
Text: In this mode, Echo has gained an additional <color=#ffda58>Support ability</color> for <color=#ffda58>Ultima Slash</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Both Echo's <color=#ffda58>3-Pings</color> and Cecily's <color=#ffda58>Cipher Orbs</color> can fill up the Sharp Reserve.

Name: Celica
Text: The <color=#ffda58>Sharp Reserve</color> is displayed here. Specific skills of Solacetune and Stigmata will consume the Sharp Reserve to trigger <color=#ffda58>Ultima Slash</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Pressing and holding Basic Attack activates <color=#ffda58>Tactical Cipher</color>, during which <color=#ffda58>Cipher Orbs</color> can be pinged. When <color=#ffda58>fully charged</color>, <color=#ffda58>Judgment Zone</color> will be activated.

Name: Celica
Text: When Echo is within Judgment Zone, she gains <color=#ffda58>Splendor Points</color> from each ping.

Name: Celica
Text: At max <color=#ffda58>Splendor Points</color>, pinging a Signal Orb that matches the color of <color=#ffda58>Cipher Orb</color> inside <color=#ffda58>Judgment Zone</color> will trigger <color=#ffda58>Imprisoning Co-Strike</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: After clearing the subsequent stages and obtaining buffs, Echo casting <color=#ffda58>Imprisoning Co-Strike</color> will permanently increase <color=#ffda58>CRIT DMG of Ultima Slash</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: In this mode, Solacetune's <color=#ffda58>Ultima Slash trigger rate</color> has been greatly enhanced, making it useful for situations that require a quick release of Ultima Slash.

Name: Celica
Text: Energy can be accumulated quickly by pinging Orbs.

Name: Celica
Text: Casting <color=#ffda58>Signature</color> activates <color=#ffda58>Attacker</color> mode, during which the Sharp Reserve fills up faster, and stage buffs are further enhanced.

Name: Celica
Text: When <color=#ffda58>Ultima Slash</color> is available to trigger, tapping <color=#ffda58>Signature</color> will cast <color=#ffda58>Jade Bloom</color> and unleash <color=#ffda58>Ultima Slash</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: After clearing the subsequent stages and obtaining buffs, Solacetune casting <color=#ffda58>Ultima Slash</color> will trigger an additional slash.

Name: Celica
Text: In this mode, Stigmata can deal <color=#ffda58>high Burst DMG</color> with <color=#ffda58>Truewill</color> accumulated from casting <color=#ffda58>Ultima Slash</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: In this mode, both Stigmata's Basic Attack and 3-Pings can fill up the Sharp Reserve.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Casting Signature</color> will activate <color=#ffda58>Sword Form</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: In <color=#ffda58>Sword Form</color>, <color=#ffda58>Pressing and holding Basic Attack</color> releases an upward strike with <color=#ffda58>Sword Dance</color>, upon which <color=#ffda58>Ultima Slash</color> can be triggered by consuming the <color=#ffda58>Sharp Reserve</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Triggering <color=#ffda58>Ultima Slash</color> will accumulate <color=#ffda58>Truewill</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: After clearing the subsequent stages and obtaining buffs, Stigmata casting <color=#ffda58>Phase 2 Signature</color> can deal high Burst DMG with <color=#ffda58>Truewill</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: The tutorial is complete. Please defeat the remaining enemies to clear the stage.

Name: Celica
Text: Key points to master: Output Cycle - <color=#ffda58>Glaciation Effect</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <size=36>Lucid Dreamer has two additional combat resources. <color=#ffda58>Condensation Projectile</color>: bullets in the revolver cylinder that replenish each time Lucid Dreamer switches in. <color=#ffda58>Calibration</color>: the V-shaped marker below the cylinder.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: Normally, Lucid Dreamer only has Yellow and Blue Orbs to ping. Pinging them grants <color=#ffda58>Calibration</color> and <color=#ffda58>Glaciation</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Glaciation Value</color> will be shown here. When Glaciation Gauge is full, unleash <color=#ffda58>Arctic Ice</color> to deal Glaciation DMG and accumulate <color=#ffda58>Arctic Ice Layer</color> up to a max of 10 stacks.

Name: Celica
Text: When you <size=26>have <color=#ffda58>Condensation Projectile</color> and <color=#ffda58>Calibration</color>, <color=#ffda58>press and hold Dodge</color> to enter Frigid Calibration mode and <color=#ffda58>Continuously Tap Red Orb</color> to cast Flurry Blitz, deal Glaciation DMG and quickly accumulate Glaciation Value</size>.

Name: Celica
Text: <size=26>Casting <color=#ffda58>Signature</color> consumes all <color=#ffda58>Arctic Ice Layers</color> to generate <color=#ffda58>Ice Spikes</color>. Its duration increases based on the number of Arctic Ice Layers. Ice Spikes can briefly <color=#ffda58>slow</color> enemies. With <color=#ffda58>10</color> Arctic Ice Layers, Ice Spikes <color=#ffda58>freeze</color> enemies instead.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: <size=36>While Ice Spikes are active, dealing Glaciation DMG will trigger <color=#ffda58>Ice Accumulation</color>, which will deal further Glaciation DMG and accumulate Congelation. Congelation can be used <color=#ffda58>in coordination</color> with the skills of other members</size>.

Name: Celica
Text: During <size=24>Frigid Calibration Mode<color=#ffda58>, you can also </color>press and hold Basic Attack<color=#ffda58> to cast Frosty Barrage to deal Glaciation DMG and quickly accumulate Glaciation Value. You can tap Red Orb later to switch to your Backup Revolver to cast Shattered Light to fully reload your Cylinder and </color>open fire again</size>.

Name: Celica
Text: Shooting can continue after throwing out the Backup Revolver with <color=#ffda58>Dodge</color> and catching it back.

Name: Celica
Text: Key technique to master: Core Passive - <color=#ffda58>Wolfish Twilight</color>

Name: Celica
Text: After a 3-Ping, ping orbs to activate <color=#ffda58>Deceleration Field</color> and increase Follow-Up DMG. Cast Basic Attacks while the <color=#ffda58>purple mark</color> is active to trigger <color=#ffda58>Dead-on Pounce</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: No.21 gains Wolfspirit Points from <color=#ffda58>Forceful Pounce</color>. <color=#ffda58>Dead-on Pounce</color> generates even more Wolfspirit Points.

Name: Celica
Text: At max Wolfspirit Points, press and hold Basic Attack to cast <color=#ffda58>Growling Wolfspirit</color> to gain Energy and heal ally's HP.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Signature</color> can deal high DMG and trigger Time Lag Calculation.

Name: Celica
Text: During the action of 3-Ping, Qu can ping any Signal Orb to activate <color=#ffda58>Into the Fray</color>, granting 1 <color=#ffda58>Inscription</color> and 1 Signal Orb.

Name: Celica
Text: While Qu activates <color=#ffda58>Into the Fray</color>, ping 3-Ping Orbs consecutively to gain max Inscription.

Name: Celica
Text: Any 3-Ping made during <color=#ffda58>Into the Fray</color> can grant <color=#ffda58>Inscription</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: While Qu activates <color=#ffda58>Into the Fray</color>, if <color=#ffda58>Inscription is full</color>, press and hold Basic Attack to exit Into the Fray and <color=#ffda58>convert Inscription into Glyphs</color>, pulling in enemy units while dealing DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: Next, I will show you Shukra's complete damage output cycle.

Name: Celica
Text: Ping Orbs to activate <color=#ffda58>Into the Fray</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: While Qu activates <color=#ffda58>Into the Fray</color>, make 3-Pings to gain max <color=#ffda58>Inscription</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>At max Inscription</color>, press and hold Basic Attack to <color=#ffda58>exit Into the Fray and convert Inscription into Glyphs</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Cast Signature to start <color=#ffda58>Enthronement</color>. 3-Pings made during <color=#ffda58>Enthronement</color> will grant <color=#ffda58>Soul Ripple</color> that increases the DMG of <color=#ffda58>Sovereign's Presence</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: First, familiarize yourself with the basic moves of team members.

Name: Celica
Text: Go to the control panel and select a character.

Name: Celica
Text: Whose combat style would you like to learn?

Name: Celica
Text: It seems you're already quite familiar with this member's controls.

Name: Celica
Text: It seems you're already quite familiar with this member's controls.

Name: Celica
Text: It seems you're already quite familiar with this member's controls.

Name: Celica
Text: Haven't you decided which member's controls you want to familiarize yourself with yet?

Name: Celica
Text: Let's move on to the main changes in this mode and team output techniques.

Name: Celica
Text: In this mode, Lucid Dreamer has gained the ability to <color=#ffda58>amplify</color> the <color=#ffda58>Glaciation</color> effect.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Pinging</color> Lucid Dreamer will grant <color=#ffda58>Glaciation Value</color>. Receive 1 stack of <color=#ffda58>Arctic Ice</color> and deal Glaciation DMG every time Glaciation is full.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Arctic Ice Layer</color> is displayed here. It can accumulate up to <color=#ffda58>10</color> layers.

Name: Celica
Text: After long pressing Dodge to activate <color=#ffda58>Frigid Calibration mode</color>, <color=#ffda58>pressing Basic Attack</color> will eliminate Condensation Projectiles to quickly generate Energy.

Name: Celica
Text: Casting <color=#ffda58>Signature</color> when Energy is full consumes all <color=#ffda58>Arctic Ice Layers</color> to activate <color=#ffda58>Ice Spikes</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Creates <color=#ffda58>Ice Spikes that will temporarily freeze the enemy. </color>For the next 10s<color=#ffda58>, it will also trigger </color>Ice Accumulation<color=#ffda58> when characters with Glaciation Effect cast specific skills and deal Glaciation DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: After receiving the buff by clearing the subsequent stages, using Lucid Dreamer to activate <color=#ffda58>Ice Spikes</color> will extend <color=#ffda58>their duration</color> and further increase <color=#ffda58>Glaciation DMG</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: In this mode, Shukra will deal massive Glaciation DMG while <color=#ffda58>Ice Spikes</color> are active.

Name: Celica
Text: While <color=#ffda58>Ice Spikes</color> are active, Shukra's <color=#ffda58>3-Ping</color> will trigger an extra <color=#ffda58>Ice Accumulation</color> and deal Glaciation DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: After receiving the buff by clearing the subsequent stages, activate <color=#ffda58>Feral's</color> QTE will grant <color=#ffda58>Glaciation DMG Bonus</color> and <color=#ffda58>recover Signal Orbs</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Pinging Orbs will grant Shukra Inscription. <color=#ffda58>At max Inscription</color>, press and hold Basic Attack to <color=#ffda58>exit Into the Fray and convert Inscription into Glyphs</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: While Ice Spikes are active, dealing Glaciation DMG by triggering <color=#ffda58>Ice Accumulation</color> will fill Congelation, which can be used later.

Name: Celica
Text: When Shukra casts Signature, 3-Ping during <color=#ffda58>Enthronement</color> will also trigger Ice Accumulation, dealing Glaciation DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: After receiving the buff by clearing the subsequent stages, when Shukra deals <color=#ffda58>Signature DMG</color>, deal massive Glaciation DMG based on her <color=#ffda58>Congelation</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ffda58>Casting Signature</color> will activate <color=#ffda58>Sword Form</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: In <color=#ffda58>Sword Form</color>, <color=#ffda58>Pressing and holding Basic Attack</color> releases an upward strike with <color=#ffda58>Sword Dance</color>, upon which <color=#ffda58>Ultima Slash</color> can be triggered by consuming the <color=#ffda58>Sharp Reserve</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Triggering <color=#ffda58>Ultima Slash</color> will accumulate <color=#ffda58>Truewill</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: After clearing the subsequent stages and obtaining buffs, Stigmata casting <color=#ffda58>Phase 2 Signature</color> can deal high Burst DMG with <color=#ffda58>Truewill</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: The tutorial is complete. Please defeat the remaining enemies to clear the stage.

Name: Kuroro
Text: Ku?

Name: Kuroro
Text: There's a fork in the road.

Name: Kuroro
Text: So...

Name: Kuroro
Text: Go forward first. Ku!

Name: Kuroro
Text: Ku—!

Name: Kuroro
Text: Don't forget the rewards on the side. Ku!

Name: Kuroro
Text: Don't keep going down a dead end! Ku!

Name: Kuroro
Text: Call your friends to help overcome adversity! Ku!

Name: Kuroro
Text: Ku—!

Name: Kuroro
Text: No obstacles ahead! Ku!

Name: Kuroro
Text: Don't get careless! Be prepared for anything! Ku!

Name: Kuroro
Text: I'll be supporting you from here! Ku!

Name: Kuroro
Text: Ku!

Name: Kuroro
Text: Up ahead...

Name: Kuroro
Text: Sure looks like trouble! Ku!

Name: Kuroro
Text: Don't overexert yourself!

Name: Kuroro
Text: Looks like there's even more crazy martyrs! Ku!

Name: Kuroro
Text: That oil tank doesn't look so good... Maybe they should call the fire department! Ku!

Name: Kuroro
Text: Attack!

Name: Kuroro
Text: Ku! Ku! It's Lady Qu!

Name: Kuroro
Text: Watch your step! Don't get your feet dirty! Ku!

Name: Kuroro
Text: Today's gonna be different! Ku! I'm gonna unleash my rage!

Name: Kuroro
Text: Hurry and destroy the two iron thorns! Or else we're gonna fall! Ku!

Name: No. 21
Text: Get in?

Name: No. 21
Text: Explosion somewhere...

Name: No. 21
Text: This place, I feel like I've been here before...

Name: No. 21
Text: I should look around first.

Name: No. 21
Text: The door, can't be open.

Name: No. 21
Text: The wall, cracked. Because the explosion?

Name: No. 21
Text: Entrance found...

Name: No. 21
Text: What's this...? I don't understand.

Name: No. 21
Text: I see some special colors in the yard.

Name: Eerie Doll?
Text: Hehe—hehe—

Name: Eerie Doll?
Text: Late child can't get in-in the house... Don't worry, Anna will-will -tell you-what-to-do.

Name: No. 21
Text: The door opened!

Name: Eerie Doll?
Text: The snowy night of the old gods flows into the sea like <color=#ff0000>stream</color>

Name: Eerie Doll?
Text: A Red Moon rises beside the rebellious <color=#ff0000>fate</color>

Name: Eerie Doll?
Text: Hell, <color=#ff0000>Oppressors</color> have sunk to hell

Name: Eerie Doll?
Text: The <color=#ff0000>Libators</color> are reciting a new chapter

Name: Eerie Doll?
Text: Good baby, what can I do for you?<color=#ff0000> (The answer to the riddle has nothing to do with the order of choices. Please do not skip the relevant dialogue)</color>

Name: No. 21
Text: The board is painted with strange symbols.

Name: No. 21
Text: Why is only the second light shining?

Name: No. 21
Text: There's a red pattern on the fountain...

Name: No. 21
Text: Why does this fountain have several sections? Is that the answer?

Name: No. 21
Text: Does that mean the fourth F?

Name: No. 21
Text: What does this symbol mean?

Name: No. 21
Text: It looks like the symbol is different from different angles...

Name: No. 21
Text: The pattern has changed... Is that "1"?

Name: Eerie Doll?
Text: You've solved the puzzle!

Name: No. 21
Text: Why does this fountain have a pattern?

Name: No. 21
Text: There are four lights near this board. One is particularly bright.

Name: Roland
Text: Is this it?

Name: Roland
Text: Locked. I can open it violently, but it might alarm the Cerberus.

Name: Roland
Text: Hmph, pointless harassment.

Name: Roland
Text: Hm? That Corrupted looks... a little strange. Looks like it's carrying something.

Name: Roland
Text: A strange lock. Who left it here? Where was it supposed to be used?

Name: Roland
Text: It should be able to open a modest entrance from here.

Name: Roland
Text: ...I'm in.

Name: Roland
Text: Better search with caution.

Name: Roland
Text: Are these...

Name: Roland
Text: Symbols? Guide for me?

Name: Roland
Text: Only one lamp on, and there's a similar symbol near the lamp...

Name: Roland
Text: Two parts, but they seem as one.

Name: Roland
Text: These symbols... and this lock, I see. Was it someone who was going to lock here, but for some reason failed...

Name: Roland
Text: So, let me use this lock to buy me more time.

Name: Roland
Text: Well, since I'm here, I'll just hide and see how you solve the puzzle.

Name: Roland
Text: It's also a chance for them to show their hanky-panky tactics.

Name: No. 21
Text: Corrupted are here!

Name: No. 21
Text: No. 21, get ready.

Name: No. 21
Text: All clear.

Name: No. 21
Text: Moving on.

Name: No. 21
Text: Let's take a look around and figure out why these Corrupted are here

Name: No. 21
Text: A photo...

Name: No. 21
Text: He's the human I saw just now...

Name: No. 21
Text: Same handprint as the one on the car window...

Name: No. 21
Text: Is this used to take pictures as well?

Name: No. 21
Text: Hmm, looks like we're back to where we started.

Name: No. 21
Text: My body... I can't control my body...

Name: No. 21
Text: Is this where Luna used to live?

Name: No. 21
Text: But... Looks like Luna's house hasn't been attacked by Corrupted yet!

Name: No. 21
Text: Maybe I can find out something.

Name: Lucia
Text: Luna! Mom and Dad are coming back soon. Has the living room been cleaned? (Sounds from the stairwell)

Name: Lucia
Text: Don't be lazy. Or Mom and Dad will be angry when they come back. (Sounds from the stairwell)

Name: Lucia
Text: Clean the floor, be quick! (Sounds from the stairwell)

Name: Lucia
Text: Luna—I forgot to put the cake on the table. It's in the kitchen, get it out.

Name: Lucia
Text: Luna, you can't open the gift early. Wait until mom and dad get home.

Name: No. 21
Text: What's going on... Why am I back here?

Name: No. 21
Text: It seems the chair blocks my way. If the path between reality and memory is different, it will be interrupted.

Name: No. 21
Text: Lucia said the cake... Let me move the chair and see what's inside

Name: No. 21
Text: I remember...

Name: No. 21
Text: As I recall, Lucia told me to take the cake out from kitchen, let me see if I could find the cake remains

Name: No. 21
Text: Sure enough, back again!

Name: No. 21
Text: Get the cake, put it on the table, then go to find Lucia, see what else I can find.

Name: No. 21
Text: Great! Everything is ready.

Name: No. 21
Text: Go upstairs to find Lucia!

Name: No. 21
Text: It should be the cake that Lucia mentioned.

Name: No. 21
Text: Luna, the living room is filthy, stay away from the kitchen!

Name: Lucia
Text: Luna, hurry up! Corrupteds are in the yard!

Name: No. 21
Text: (Cry) Lucia, I'll see if there's anything I can use to defend myself.

Name: No. 21
Text: The frog... Can you take the beating for me?

Name: No. 21
Text: Look around, make sure this is Luna's room.

Name: No. 21
Text: I want to take the photo with me, but it won't protect me.

Name: No. 21
Text: (Crying—)

Name: Lucia
Text: Bangbangbang! Bangbangbang! (Someone is banging the door)

Name: Lucia
Text: Oh, no. The Corrupted are in the house.

Name: Lucia
Text: Luna, hide!

Name: Lucia
Text: Don't get caught by them.

Name: Lucia
Text: Luna!

Name: No. 21
Text: Hmm! Footsteps coming from downstairs, is that Lucia?

Name: No. 21
Text: Lucia!

Name: No. 21
Text: The last time when I played hide-and seek with Luna, I hid in the study through a secret door and almost made her cry.

Name: No. 21
Text: Hahaha, I had discovered the secret of the piano.

Name: No. 21
Text: It looks nothing special.

Name: No. 21
Text: Wait, these keys sound a little strange.

Name: No. 21
Text: What's that noise coming from the bathroom

Name: No. 21
Text: Seems something is triggered

Name: No. 21
Text: I'm surrounded! What should I do?

Name: No. 21
Text: Gotta find a place to hide.

Name: No. 21
Text: He won't come back, right?

Name: No. 21
Text: He's probably already ahead

Name: No. 21
Text: Follow him, I don't think he will return.

Name: No. 21
Text: The front... the front is blocked.

Name: No. 21
Text: Alright, I gonna have to take another route to the front.

Name: No. 21
Text: I think I'm at the right place, maybe there's something can jog my memory

Name: No. 21
Text: These toys? They are unable to withstand an corrupted's attack.

Name: No. 21
Text: They are closing in!

Name: No. 21
Text: Hide in the room.

Name: No. 21
Text: It's too narrow here.

Name: No. 21
Text: Behind the curtain? Impossible either.

Name: No. 21
Text: It's too narrow here.

Name: No. 21
Text: The piano, I remembered he always played it

Name: No. 21
Text: I'm in the memory again?

Name: No. 21
Text: What happened later

Name: No. 21
Text: Hallway is occupied. I need to find another way out

Name: No. 21
Text: The room in front

Name: No. 21
Text: Go have a look.

Name: No. 21
Text: Corrupteds at the end of the Hallway, I can't get close.

Name: No. 21
Text: The room is surrounded by Corrupteds, I think I should find somewhere to hide

Name: No. 21
Text: We can't go there.

Name: No. 21
Text: Who's she? She looks dead, but why she's still moving

Name: Roland
Text: No. 21 must be in the building

Name: Roland
Text: Find her first

Name: Roland
Text: She left in a hurry

Name: Roland
Text: She came out from that room

Name: Roland
Text: Let me see what happened in that room.

Name: Roland
Text: Some kids stuff

Name: Roland
Text: Is this Luna's room?

Name: Roland
Text: What is it?

Name: Roland
Text: Seems something is triggered!

Name: Roland
Text: Anyway, continue to follow No. 21

Name: Roland
Text: No. 21 left along that way

Name: Roland
Text: Follow her, see what she wants to do

Name: Roland
Text: No. 21 must in this room

Name: Roland
Text: Hm?! The door is open

Name: Roland
Text: Take a shortcut and follow

Name: No. 21
Text: Test text

Name: No. 21
Text: Test text

Name: No. 21
Text: Test text

Name: Voodoo?
Text: Don't you realize that? Those echoes in your head are not my spell...

Name: Voodoo?
Text: They are the whispers of your own heart.

Name: Voodoo?
Text: I am helping you to listen to yourself!

Name: No. 21
Text: ...No, you are talking nonsense.

Name: No. 21
Text: ……I am whole.

Name: No. 21
Text: —I'm not alone either.

Name: No. 21
Text: I'm going to... keep fighting!

Name: Voodoo?
Text: Win, and Mister will meet you; lose, and "Loki" will tear you apart.

Name: Roland
Text: Is that so?

Name: Roland
Text: Show me your tricks.

Name: Voodoo?
Text: ...Don't go back on it!

Name: Roland
Text: ...Not the right hour.

Name: No. 21
Text: Now. What should I do?

Name: No. 21
Text: Understood. Follow the clues and investigate.

Name: No. 21
Text: Corrupted are here.

Name: No. 21
Text: No. 21, get ready.

Name: No. 21
Text: All clear.

Name: No. 21
Text: Moving on.

Name: No. 21
Text: Is this used to take pictures as well?

Name: No. 21
Text: But no one inside...

Name: No. 21
Text: Same handprint as the one on the car window...

Name: No. 21
Text: Is "she" the one who left it?

Name: No. 21
Text: A photo...

Name: No. 21
Text: This is...

Name: No. 21
Text: "They" are laughing, so happy.

Name: No. 21
Text: He's the human I saw just now...

Name: No. 21
Text: Hmm, looks like we're back to where we started.

Name: No. 21
Text: My brain... I can't control my brain...

Name: Lucia
Text: Luna! Mom and Dad will be back soon. We said we were going to clean up the living room.

Name: Lucia
Text: Don't be lazy. Or Mom and Dad will be angry when they come back.

Name: No. 21 (???)
Text: Understood.

Name: Lucia
Text: Luna, don't sneak to eat before the living room is cleaned up.

Name: Lucia
Text: Luna, remember to set the table and the cake in the kitchen.

Name: Lucia
Text: Don't sneak to eat the dinner.

Name: No. 21 (???)
Text: I won't.

Name: No. 21
Text: ...I'm back to reality.

Name: No. 21
Text: Chairs block the way to the dining room.

Name: No. 21
Text: Should I get rid of all the chairs?

Name: No. 21
Text: That human...

Name: No. 21
Text: Let me put the cake on the dining table.

Name: No. 21
Text: Is it "cake"?

Name: No. 21
Text: ...Smells bad.

Name: No. 21
Text: (Sniff) Much better...

Name: No. 21 (???)
Text: Lucia asked me to get the cake from the kitchen.

Name: No. 21
Text: Decoration complete!

Name: No. 21 (???)
Text: Lucia! Shall we start the party?

Name: Roland
Text: Footsteps come from the other side of the hallway...

Name: Roland
Text: Looks like she's already inside the house. Follow her.

Name: Roland
Text: Hm?

Name: Roland
Text: Found it.

Name: Roland
Text: Left in a hurry...

Name: Roland
Text: From that room?

Name: Roland
Text: She must see something...

Name: Roland
Text: Here is the... children's room?

Name: Roland
Text: Room for Luna... and Alpha?

Name: Roland
Text: Nothing special... Hm?

Name: Roland
Text: What's happening there?!

Name: Roland
Text: Went there?...

Name: Roland
Text: From the footsteps, she ran here... But what's this...

Name: Roland
Text: Someone is opening the door! From the other side!

Name: Roland
Text: I have to stop her...

Name: Roland
Text: ...What a clingy child.

Name: Roland
Text: Why don't you play with your peers?

Name: Roland
Text: Sure, I can help you find "someone" to play with.

Name: Roland
Text: These are... building blocks...

Name: Roland
Text: Nothing special... Just normal toys for kids…

Name: Roland
Text: Group photo...?

Name: Roland
Text: Luna... and Alpha, is it?

Name: Roland
Text: I seem to remember Luna mentioning this...

Name: Lucia
Text: Luna, go hide in the basement!

Name: Lucia
Text: Wait a moment... We can't just go out without defense. Look for anything we can use to defend ourselves.

Name: No. 21 (???)
Text: These building blocks... I often pestered my sister to play with me, but I never beat her...

Name: No. 21 (???)
Text: One day, I won her by sheer dumb luck.

Name: No. 21 (???)
Text: Mom always said, "Lucia, you keep letting Luna win"... But I don't think so!

Name: No. 21 (???)
Text: ...Toys are unable to defend me.

Name: No. 21 (???)
Text: A photo of my sister and me. I think it was taken in my birthday party of last year...

Name: No. 21 (???)
Text: Last year we had a picnic on the lawn. I accidentally dropped the cake on the lawn. Lucia even comforted me for a while.

Name: No. 21 (???)
Text: ...I can't run away with a photo.

Name: No. 21 (???)
Text: The frog doll...

Name: No. 21 (???)
Text: For a while, my sister had to sleep with it and even ignored me.

Name: No. 21 (???)
Text: But when she found out I got upset, she gave me the frog.

Name: No. 21 (???)
Text: But I'm just jealous... My silly sister.

Name: No. 21 (???)
Text: Can I beat the monsters with this?
(Bang—)

Name: Lucia
Text: I must do something... Those monsters are closing in...

Name: Lucia
Text: Nothing here to defend myself...

Name: Lucia
Text: Luna, run to the basement, Don't let them see you!

Name: Lucia
Text: Run, run!

Name: No. 21 (???)
Text: What's that noise... It's like a fork scratching a plate...

Name: No. 21 (???)
Text: L-Lucia...

Name: Lucia
Text: Oh, no... Luna, hide in the room beside you!

Name: No. 21 (???)
Text: What about you?

Name: Lucia
Text: Hurry up!

Name: No. 21 (???)
Text: I can't go back to the hallway... What should I do next...

Name: No. 21 (???)
Text: My sister and I used to hide and seek at home, I would hide in the small room behind the study every time.

Name: No. 21 (???)
Text: I think... the switch to move the bookcase is around here...

Name: No. 21 (???)
Text: My mom's piano.

Name: No. 21 (???)
Text: Sometimes Mom would play us a lullaby and she would say...

Name: No. 21 (???)
Text: When I grow up, teach me to play the piano.

Name: No. 21 (???)
Text: When am I going to grow up? Will Mom teach me how to play?

Name: No. 21 (???)
Text: ...Huh? These keys sound a little strange.

Name: No. 21 (???)
Text: Noises from the bathroom.

Name: No. 21 (???)
Text: I'm surrounded!

Name: No. 21 (???)
Text: I need to find a place to hide.

Name: No. 21 (???)
Text: These are Dad's books.

Name: No. 21 (???)
Text: Daddy...

Name: No. 21 (???)
Text: ...The place is too narrow to hide.

Name: No. 21 (???)
Text: When we played hide and seek, my sister liked to hide here when it's my turn to find her.

Name: No. 21 (???)
Text: But I could see her feet…

Name: No. 21 (???)
Text: Every time I found her behind the curtains, I was happy.

Name: No. 21 (???)
Text: So she did this to make me "happy"?

Name: No. 21 (???)
Text: ...I can't hide here.

Name: No. 21 (???)
Text: ...That monster, I don't think it's ever coming back.

Name: No. 21 (???)
Text: It's probably already ahead.

Name: No. 21 (???)
Text: Is it looking for my sister...

Name: No. 21 (???)
Text: No, I must follow it.

Name: No. 21 (???)
Text: But I promised my sister I would stay here.

Name: No. 21
Text: Ah!

Name: No. 21
Text: The road is cut off... I think... the front is blocked.

Name: No. 21
Text: Changing the course of advance.

Name: No. 21
Text: She should be inside.

Name: No. 21
Text: Go have a look.

Name: No. 21
Text: That, is "piano"...

Name: No. 21
Text: Different keys can make different sound...

Name: No. 21
Text: I saw a human. She was sitting there, with many flowers on her dress. Her fingers were long...

Name: No. 21
Text: She was playing the piano, giving a pleasant sound... like sunlight...

Name: No. 21
Text: Um—

Name: No. 21 (???)
Text: ...I have to go to the basement!

Name: No. 21
Text: The road, is cut off again...

Name: No. 21
Text: Is that...? The doll in the window... Who put it here?

Name: Vera
Text: Tsk, as expected, some of the watertight compartments don't work anymore.

Name: Vera
Text: The water keeps flowing in from the left side.

Name: Vera
Text: The right side isn't flooding, so something must be blocking it.

Name: Vera
Text: We need to get out ASAP.

Name: Vera
Text: The exit's over there.

Name: Vera
Text: Let's go to the other side.

Name: Vera
Text: Tsk, good thing there's still a platform we can stand on here.

Name: Vera
Text: We'll need to figure out another way to get across.

Name: Guide
Text: The route back up has been blocked by the isolation door.

Name: Guide
Text: Power source found, isolation door unlocked.

Name: Guide
Text: The water level of the laboratory is increasing. Return to the upper floors through the isolation door.

Name: Vera
Text: Tsk, useless crap.

Name: Vera
Text: That looks like it can still be used.

Name: Guide
Text: These are platforms that float on water but the water level is not high enough yet.

Name: Guide
Text: More water is needed for the platforms to rise.

Name: Guide
Text: Water level is rising. Return to the upper floors through the path on the side.

Name: Vera
Text: The floating platforms have been connected. We can get to the other side now.

Name: Vera
Text: That's the exit, let's go.

Name: Guide
Text: The isolation door is shut tight due to the lack of power. Find the power source.

Name: Guide
Text: The power converter is deactivated. Find the power source.

Name: Vera
Text: The water level's high enough now, let's go up.

Name: Vera
Text: Move!

Name: Guide
Text: Beware of the enemy's attack.

Name: Vera
Text: Get! Out! Of! My! Way!

Name: Vera
Text: Tsk, those blasted Corrupted are here already...

Name: Vera
Text: Incoming attack!

Name: Vera
Text: Looks like they're just scums that are too afraid to attack head-on.

Name: Vera
Text: We need to find a way up to take care of them.

Name: Vera
Text: This should be able to take us up if it's activated.

Name: Guide
Text: The device stopped running after the waterflow stopped.

Name: Guide
Text: Find a way to resume waterflow to keep the device running.

Name: Guide
Text: Waterflow is resumed, device is running.

Name: Vera
Text: Follow me, let's go up.

Name: Guide
Text: This is a drain. Find the water inlet first.

Name: Vera
Text: How many more identical labs do we still need to bust through?! Tsk.

Name: Guide
Text: Dodge the enemy's attacks.

Name: Guide
Text: The route has been blocked by the isolation door.

Name: Vera
Text: Let me hear your screams, scums!

Name: Vera
Text: The player can only move within a set radius for 10s.

Name: Vera
Text: Lamia is defeated and paralyzed.

Name: Roland
Text: It's been a while.

Name: Roland
Text: Gabriel, what a human name. Where did you learn it from?

Name: Roland
Text: Either way, it's time for our angel to meet God.

Name: Roland
Text: I actually quite like you. You endured a lot and gave a lot of effort for your goal. That's very good.

Name: Roland
Text: Too bad that you will never find an answer.

Name: Roland
Text: Ha, who am I to make such a comment? Just take it as a joke. You never understand jokes anyway.

Name: Roland
Text: Haha, the trial is over. Want some music?

Name: Roland
Text: Seraphim, the God is summoning you!

Name: Roland
Text: Oh c'mon, I don't like this thing at all.

Name: Roland
Text: Boys and girls, remember not to keep bugs like this at home. Your daddy and mommy may mistake it for you and raise it instead!

Name: Roland
Text: —Just joking.

Name: Roland
Text: It is quite beautiful when bugs break out of their cocoons.

Name: Roland
Text: Don't get me wrong, it has nothing to do with you. I'm talking about real bugs.

Name: Roland
Text: It's over.

Name: Roland
Text: Imitating the real thing to become better... Maybe you will end up becoming the real stuff if your acting is good enough.

Name: Roland
Text: But half-hearted effort has no place in this world.

Name: Roland
Text: You know, I'm something of a professional myself when it comes to mimicking.

Name: Liv
Text: There's wind in front! Calm down and stop going, Liv!

Name: Hans
Text: Support Constructs, scan the route forward. Everyone else, stay together. Don't get separated.

Name: Support Construct
Text: Scanning complete. The switch circuit here is connected to the filtration fan.

Name: Liv
Text: Ha, gotcha!

Name: Liv
Text: Circuit repaired. Turn off the fan and we can keep moving forward.

Name: Liv
Text: Watch out, everyone. It's difficult to come back if you fall from here.

Name: Lucia
Text: The same applies to the enemies.

Name: Lee
Text: Correct. We can ease a lot of pressure if we can make good use of the fan.

Name: Support Construct
Text: Scanning complete. We can head upwards and leave now.

Name: Liv
Text: I have also finished scanning. The switch circuit connecting to the lift is just next to it.

Name: Liv
Text: The filtration fan is blocked... Maybe we can use it to turn on the switch once we get rid of the obstacle.

Name: Support Construct
Text: Chief Commander, all nearby areas have been scanned. The results have been sent to all commandants.

Name: Hans
Text: Good. Stick to the plan and finish your tasks.

Name: Liv
Text: The box has blocked the wind. Use the switch you just used to stop the wind behind you.

Name: Lucia
Text: Gray Raven mission log No.5568.

Name: Lucia
Text: This is Gray Raven. We're here to assist you.

Name: Liv
Text: I have vision of the conservation area defense force!

Name: Armed Scavenger
Text: R-reinforcement has arrived.

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Look, it's Gray Raven! They have finally come back.

Name: Construct Captain
Text: Gray Raven is here! Time for a counterattack.
