Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant, we have arrived at the defense force's location. Your orders, please.

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant, the contamination level is rising.

Name: Lee
Text: Take caution. We don't know much about the Hetero-Sapiens.

Name: Harley Jo
Text: Yata and I have the flanks under control.

Name: Hans
Text: Periodic comms interference detected again. All squads, keep safe distance and continue moving forward.

Name: Hans
Text: Support Constructs record the entire battle. Don't miss out anything, we need all available information on the Hetero-Sapiens.

Name: Liv
Text: Wait... Why is there a metal plate here? And someone seems to have stepped through it.

Name: Liv
Text: Let me read. Pulia... guide? The marks are fairly new. From the looks of the footprint, it should be an adult male.

Name: Eleanor
Text: Kids, I did a quick maintenance for you, but you still need to watch out for existing damage. Don't push yourself too hard.

Name: Lucia
Text: Thanks.

Name: Lee
Text: We're fine. Let's move up and meet with Harley Jo.

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant... Please hang in there...

Name: Liv
Text: Ugh...

Name: Support Construct
Text: We have arrived. The elevator ahead can get us out of this place.

Name: Support Construct
Text: The elevator is fixed, but it can only take us 20 meters up. The evacuation point is still some distance away...

Name: Hans
Text: Discard all unnecessary load. Once the elevator stops, run toward the evacuation point as fast as possible.

Name: Simon
Text: The elevator... is out of power.

Name: Construct
Text: All unnecessary load has been discarded, Chief Commander.

Name: Hans
Text: Alright. Stick to the plan and break away.

Name: Hans
Text: Watch your head. Cover each other.

Name: Lucia
Text: Enemy engaged. Commencing battle.

Name: Liv
Text: Watch out. The turbulent energy sources can immediately destroy anything they touch.

Name: Harley Jo
Text: This way!

Name: Yata
Text: I will distract them. You find an opportunity to strike.

Name: Lucia
Text: Leave this to us, Liv. Please go help other Constructs to hold off the Hetero-Sapiens.

Name: Liv
Text: Roger!

Name: Teasell
Text: Arrgh...

Name: Bambinata
Text: Master, Teasell's Inver-Device cannot stand the powerful interference from those two creatures.

Name: Vanessa
Text: Tsk. Teasell, fall back. Go fight the Hetero-Sapiens.

Name: Vanessa
Text: Bambinata, fly and keep your distance... Ugh...

Name: Bambinata
Text: Master?!

Name: Yata
Text: Cough...

Name: Harley Jo
Text: Yata! Ugh...

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: There are too many Hetero-Sapiens coming out of the forest park. We are having wounded soldiers. We need Support Constructs. Repeat, we need Support Constructs!

Name: Support Construct
Text: H-hang in there...

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant... Everyone!

Name: Liv
Text: Ugh...

Name: Liv
Text: It can't... end like this...

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant... Everyone... We promised...

Name: Unidentified Twin: Male
Text: Rest in peace.
You have entered the enemy's [Anti-Matrix]. Make a <color=#ffda58>[Perfect Dodge]</color> to remove the [Anti-Matrix] status from yourself.
After removing the [Anti-Matrix] status, hit the enemy with <color=#ffda58>any attack</color> to break the [Anti-Matrix].

Name: Roland
Text: Alright, I'm staying back to clean the stage as always.

Name: Roland
Text: ...Not affected by wind? What a hassle.

Name: Roland
Text: If an extra can't listen to the director's instructions, there's no doubt that he will be fired.

Name: Roland
Text: The power of the fan has been cut off... Could it be those Scavengers?

Name: Roland
Text: Remarkable. Maybe those humans can survive longer.

Name: Roland
Text: Anyway, let me deal with the problem at hand.

Name: Roland
Text: It's a good opportunity to try out my new power and weapon.

Name: Roland
Text: Good, they come in handy.

Name: Roland
Text: Why can't you just do what I said?

Name: Roland
Text: Good, now even humans can safely pass.

Name: Roland
Text: I wonder how Cinderelik is doing?

Name: Roland
Text: Hmm, better do this fast. What shall I do?

Name: Roland
Text: See, bad actors only know how to imitate.

Name: Roland
Text: You still have much to learn.

Name: Roland
Text: Now I can meet those Scavengers. Can't waste too much time, otherwise they will get suspicious.

Name: Roland
Text: Let me think of a reason... "The timid refugee was lost for a while, but he still managed to escape thanks to his familiarity with the forest."

Name: Roland
Text: ...I need to make myself look more awful. Hmm, that will do.

Name: Roland
Text: Alright, time to go to the next scene.

Name: Liv
Text: Lucia, the wandering Hetero-Creatures nearby are coming over!

Name: Lee
Text: The vehicles are overloaded. We can't move fast enough to get rid of them.

Name: Lucia
Text: I'll try my best to clear out the enemies on the path. You go as fast as you can!

Name: Liv
Text: For safety considerations, we will stop the vehicles for defense if we run into enemies on the way.

Name: Liv
Text: But the vehicles are already wrecked, and most of the wounded can't move...

Name: Lucia
Text: I understand. So we have to make it quick.

Name: Liv
Text: We've eliminated all the enemies ahead, but there are still some behind us...

Name: Lucia
Text: Keep moving. I'll handle them.

Name: Lucia
Text: It's over. Are you guys alright there?

Name: Liv
Text: Just some minor injuries. I'll handle it.

Name: Lucia
Text: Okay. I'm moving toward you.

Name: Liv
Text: Hetero-Creature reaction detected on the right of the vehicle ahead, Lucia!

Name: Liv
Text: The vehicle behind has been caught up by the Hetero-Creatures!

Name: Liv
Text: A huge number of Hetero-Creatures detected! They are approaching the vehicle ahead!

Name: Liv
Text: More Hetero-Creatures are coming... Get ready!

Name: Liv
Text: Lucia! They are the Hetero-Sapiens we saw before... We have to take them down first!

Name: Lee
Text: The engine of the vehicle ahead is broken. It's slowing down.

Name: Sandra
Text: The engine of the vehicle behind is not working... It's entering the low-speed travel mode.

Name: Serious Construct
Text: Captain Olke from Mountain Vulture. I'll be the temporary commander of this escort mission.

Name: Liv
Text: Hi Oike. This is Liv, from the Gray Raven.

Name: Liv
Text: We've already confirmed the safety of our commandant and the protection target.

Name: Captain Olke
Text: Great! Full speed ahead, "Hoper"!

Name: Captain Olke
Text: The future of humanity depends on this mission.

Name: Captain Olke
Text: We need to transport the target back to Babylonia at all costs.

Name: Captain Olke
Text: For the future of Earth, we swear to stick to the mission and fear no sacrifice!

Name: Members
Text: Stick to the mission! Fear no sacrifice!

Name: Liv
Text: Everyone... Please be safe...
Hello, can you hear me? I forgot to mention something.
Hoper carries a repulsion shield recently developed to deal with the flying enemies.
But Hoper is not capable of keeping it running for a long time, so you have to stay connected to keep it running.

Name: Captain Olke
Text: Understood. And you are...?

Name: Keena
Text: I'm Keena. I used to work on the maintenance of Hoper. We will see each other again if you can come back alive.

Name: Captain Olke
Text: ... Is she a technician with Kurono?

Name: Keena
Text: I've never seen someone being so picky while using my stuff. How adorable!

Name: Keena
Text: Alright. Just remember to stay connected with Hoper to keep the shield powered.

Name: Keena
Text: The shield will help you defend against the enemies. It features an identification friend or foe system that will detect the enemies and clear them out of itself.

Name: Keena
Text: Now Liv is in Hoper. Please turn on the shield and activate power connection channel.

Name: Liv
Text: Roger.

Name: Captain Olke
Text: Turning on the shield. Confirm.

Name: Captain Olke
Text: Activating the channel. Confirm.

Name: Captain Olke
Text: Establishing power connection. 3, 2, 1. Connected!

Name: Liv
Text: Punishing Virus reaction detected ahead! Multiple units are approaching fast!

Name: Captain Olke
Text: We will take care of the escort mission. You are a support Construct. Stay in "Hoper" to scout enemies for us.

Name: Liv
Text: Understood! I'll share the detection signals to everyone to adjust the formation accordingly.

Name: Captain Olke
Text: The Red Orb signifies attack formations. The Blue Orb signifies defense formations. The Yellow Orb signifies speed formations.

Name: Captain Olke
Text: All out!

Name: Liv
Text: All enemy signals are away... We are safe now.

Name: Liv
Text: But Hoper is out of power, and we've got casualties as well...

Name: Liv
Text: It's not the time to give up...

Name: Liv
Text: We have to transport those who are still alive back to Babylonia...!

Name: Percy
Text: All enemy signals are away... We are safe now.

Name: Percy
Text: But Hoper is almost out of power, and we've got casualties as well...

Name: Liv
Text: It's not the time to give up...

Name: Liv
Text: We have to transport those who are still alive back to Babylonia.

Name: Percy
Text: All enemy signals are away... We are safe now.

Name: Percy
Text: Hoper is slightly damaged, but Captain Olke is...

Name: Percy
Text: We've got no time for grief. Let's get prepared for the next battle.

Name: Liv
Text: (Nods) ...I will protect everyone!

Name: Liv
Text: Enemies have boarded on the deck! I'll slow them down to buy some time for the reactivation of the shield!

Name: Members
Text: We will keep working on the escort mission!

Name: Members
Text: We will stick to the last minute!

Name: Lucia
Text: It's almost the time to meet up with the other guys.

Name: Chrome
Text: Wait. The Corrupted nearby are coming over.

Name: Chrome
Text: Looks like they are controlled by someone.

Name: Lee
Text: Is it because the twins are also approaching?

Name: Lucia
Text: That voice is...!

Name: Chrome
Text: Watch out!

Name: Lee
Text: Hurry! The entrance is over there!

Name: Lucia
Text: Looks like there was a fight...

Name: Lee
Text: The Corrupted and Hetero-Creatures are everywhere.

Name: Lee
Text: No one can survive this.

Name: Lucia
Text: Proceed to the entrance.

Name: Lucia
Text: Destroy all the Corrupted.

Name: Lucia
Text: Proceed to the station platform.

Name: Construct A
Text: Gray Raven and Strike Hawk...!

Name: Lucia
Text: We are here to help you.

Name: Construct B
Text: Careful! They came out of nowhere and attacked out teammates.

Name: Construct B
Text: But they disappeared when we attempted to strike back.

Name: Chrome
Text: Keep your guard up... We'll go check the side of the train.

Name: Construct A
Text: These are the monsters we've seen before.

Name: Lucia
Text: The Hetero-Sapiens! They are trying to get on the train!

Name: Lee
Text: Let me shoot them off with my bullets in advance.

Name: Lucia
Text: They are on the train! Keep blocking them! Don't let them get here!

Name: Lee
Text: They appeared again! Hurry! Shoot them off!

Name: Construct B
Text: There seems to be enemies on the other side of the train!

Name: Lucia
Text: Understood!

Name: Construct A
Text: The twins are approaching fast! At the end of the train!

Name: Lucia
Text: Don't let them get on the train! We have to stop them before that happens!

Name: Construct A
Text: They're here again!

Name: Lucia
Text: Watch out!

Name: Construct A
Text: Asslam...! We finally made it.

Name: Construct A
Text: I'll leave the Omega II Prototype here. I guess you're gonna need it.

Name: Lucia
Text: That's right. We have to turn it on to attract them.

Name: Lucia
Text: And to buy some time for the crowd to retreat.

Name: Chrome
Text: We must get the wounded to the train for treatment.

Name: Lucia
Text: Alright.

Name: Lucia
Text: Prepare to activate the Omega II Prototype here, Lee.

Name: Lee
Text: Leave it to me.

Name: Lee
Text: Leave it to me. You go deal with the enemies. Don't let them get here.

Name: Lee
Text: Activated. Now it shouldn't be a problem to kill these Hetero-Creatures.

Name: Lee
Text: This one looks different from what we've seen before.

Name: Lee
Text: Enter Matrix. That's the only way to kill it.

Name: Lee
Text: They were already attracted.

Name: Chrome
Text: The twins are coming over. Prepare for retreat.

Name: Lee
Text: There are too many enemies... Eliminate them asap!

Name: Lucia
Text: Lee, how is it going? More and more Hetero-Creatures are coming over...

Name: Lee
Text: I need to focus.

Name: Nanami
Text: Snipey! It's a swing! Nanami can swing 2,000 swings per minute!

Name: Sniper
Text: That's awesome...

Name: Nanami
Text: Right? Nanami is awesome!

Name: Sniper
Text: No, I meant that swing.

Name: Nanami
Text: Mr. Zombie slide. It's inspired by the most popular anime character ever. Have you seen it, Snipey?

Name: Sniper
Text: No. It will only waste my storage space.

Name: Nanami
Text: That's not good. How would you make friends at school if you don't watch the most popular anime?

Name: Sniper
Text: I don't go to school, so I don't need any friends there.

Name: Nanami
Text: This is the octopus slide. And we can also play hide and see around it.

Name: Sniper
Text: It's a nice place to hide. You won't be found if you hide in the middle.

Name: Sniper
Text: Even if they find you, you can immediately run away in any direction.

Name: Nanami
Text: That's what I'm saying, Snipey!

Name: Nanami
Text: The pumpkin baron! My favorite! And it's doll.

Name: Nanami
Text: It can shoot its pumpkin head at the bade guy!

Name: Sniper
Text: Seems it's just an auto sniper platform just like me except that I shoot bullets.

Name: Nanami
Text: How I wish I could fire laser beams from my head...! NANAMI—BEEEEEEEAM!

Name: Nanami
Text: This is a tramway above ground, plus many skyscrapers.

Name: Nanami
Text: This place must have been filled with commuters...

Name: Sniper
Text: Meaningless travel will only expose yourself. I'd rather stay put unless it's necessary.

Name: Nanami
Text: Then I guess you're a... homebody then.

Name: Nanami
Text: This is the way to the recharge station. All these machines are energy-driven.

Name: Sniper
Text: The pursuit of endless energy makes humanity to research the Zero-point Energy.

Name: Nanami
Text: The same goes with machines.

Name: Nanami
Text: The rest area is ahead of us in this way.

Name: Sniper
Text: Are you tired?

Name: Nanami
Text: No. But sometimes it's not only the body that needs rest.

Name: Sniper
Text: But I think I'm more mentally tired than you.

Name: Nanami
Text: Then, how about...

Name: Sniper
Text: I'm good. Thank you.

Name: Nanami
Text: Snipey! It's a bus!

Name: Sniper
Text: Why yelling? It's just a common vehicle.

Name: Nanami
Text: The bus equals to travel! Travel with friends! Isn't it exciting?

Name: Nanami
Text: The track extends into the distance... What do you say the tram goes to, Snipey?

Name: Nanami
Text: Could it be somewhere less cold?

Name: Sniper
Text: Impossible. The entire Earth has already fallen into the Ever-Winter.

Name: Nanami
Text: What a shame...

Name: Nanami
Text: It's cold! Snipey, I'm gonna catch a cold.

Name: Sniper
Text: Machines do not "catch a cold," but the coldness will freeze their buffer fluid and slow down their movement...

Name: Sniper
Text: Do not stand still! Eliminate the Corrupted immediately... What are you doing?

Name: Nanami
Text: One, two! One, two! Nanami is warming up, but I don't think I've seen any Corrupted...

Name: Sniper
Text: Maybe it is not just us... Perhaps the Corrupted are also frozen in the cold weather.

Name: Nanami
Text: Look, Snipey! There's a little bird! It's frozen! Poor bird!

Name: Sniper
Text: It does not look like a "little" bird to me...

Name: Sniper
Text: Hey, do not approach it. I detected high Punishing Virus concentration. It is a Corrupted!

Name: Nanami
Text: Huh?! Then we have to take it down! Snipey, Power, let's go!

Name: Nanami
Text: There is a human ahead! Looks like that person is waving to us!

Name: Sniper
Text: It is impossible for humans to survive this cold weather with so few clothes on.

Name: Nanami
Text: Hello, how are you? Let's go have a look, Snipey!

Name: Sniper
Text: I genuinely suspect that there is something wrong with your auditory system. Get it fixed.

Name: Nanami
Text: Haha! It's Nanami and Commandant's snowman!

Name: Sniper
Text: The snowman would be buried in the snow in no time in the snowstorm. What you are doing is meaningless.

Name: Nanami
Text: It's a short "moment" for us, but it might be a long "eternity" for the snowman.

Name: Nanami
Text: Hmm... Something is missing here...

Name: Nanami
Text: Ta-da! Perfectly done!

Name: Nanami
Text: Nanami will find you, Commandant!

Name: Nanami
Text: This human was a mechanoid... and seems to be dead.

Name: Sniper
Text: Like I said... It is not "dead." It is "down." And looks like it is impossible to fix it.

Name: Sniper
Text: It is completely frozen. Destroy it if necessary. Let's get its memory unit out and have a look.

Name: Nanami
Text: Umm... I'd rather not. Just let it stay here in the snowstorm.

Name: Nanami
Text: This human was a mechanoid... and seems to be dead.

Name: Nanami
Text: Perhaps it was a mechanoid who took human kids to the facilities in this amusement park.

Name: Nanami
Text: After all, there are many facilities here. There must have been many kids who came here for them.

Name: Sniper
Text: I will not respond to a groundless speculation like this.

Name: Nanami
Text: Pfft. I thought "the most important thing for a soldier is imagination".

Name: Sniper
Text: Maybe I am not a qualified soldier...

Name: Nanami
Text: Is this the place?

Name: Haicma
Text: That's the entrance to the aviation lab. It seems it has already been occupied by a group of machines...

Name: Nanami
Text: Hello, can I borrow your machines?

Name: Mechanoids
Text: Don't... bother us... Don't!

Name: Nanami
Text: Ah! Why don't you just listen to me?

Name: Haicma
Text: Let's just take them down!

Name: Nanami
Text: As long as we can find the port, we might be able to contact mecha babushka again...

Name: Nanami
Text: They would have believed me if Snipey were here...

Name: Mechanoids
Text: Stop and defeat!

Name: Haicma
Text: Get ready, Nanami!

Name: Nanami
Text: Ah! They showed up here again!

Name: Nanami
Text: How many more are there? My hands are sore!

Name: Haicma
Text: Over here!

Name: Construct
Text: The enemy driver has restarted the mecha. Focus all fire on it!
Follow me!

Name: Construct
Text: Captain, they have left the trap area!

Name: Construct Captain
Text: Dammit. They already knew the coordinates of the base. It's not worth it to pursue them.

Name: Construct Captain
Text: Retreat now!

Name: Heteromer Aerial Monitors
Text: Invaders detected!
Watch out.

Name: Heteromer Aerial Monitors
Text: Siege formation activated.

Name: Heteromer Aerial Monitors
Text: Lv.1 defense penetrated!

Name: Heteromer Aerial Monitors
Text: Lv.2 defense activated!

Name: Heteromer Aerial Monitors
Text: Warning! Lv.2 defense penetrated!

Name: Heteromer Aerial Monitors
Text: Lv.3 defense activated!

Name: Nanami
Text: Now, can you tell me who you are?
The safe area is up ahead of us. Please follow me there first.
I'll explain everything to you.

Name: Haicma
Text: The central part of "Sanctuary" is comprised of orderly electric circuits and pipes. These cables keep transmitting the energy required by the entire starship.

Name: Haicma
Text: It's a bit dangerous down there. Watch your footsteps.

Name: Nanami
Text: Look, there is a little guy over there!

Name: Nanami
Text: Let's ask him if he knows anything.

Name: Broken Medic Bot
Text: ...Area 2-2... Wind power... Down...

Name: Broken Medic Bot
Text: ...Warning... Area 4-1... High-risk...

Name: Broken Medic Bot
Text: ...The exit... is at... Area 5...

Name: Spooner
Text: Looks like "Gear" has placed traps here.

Name: Nanami
Text: Nanami is not afraid of the traps!

Name: Nanami
Text: What a strong wind!

Name: Haicma
Text: Be careful, Sage! This should be the trap they set to keep human invaders out.

Name: Haicma
Text: Strong airflow in Area 2-2. If the wind drops, we could manage to move by entering through Area 1.

Name: Haicma
Text: Electric net detected on the ground ahead. Should we force our way through?

Name: Spooner
Text: It would alert "Gear". Let's see if there is another way around.

Name: Nanami
Text: Hm... Let me think...

Name: Broken Medic Bot
Text: ...Pass Signal Orbs... Red... Red... Yellow...

Name: Haicma
Text: Sage, do you under stand what it means?

Name: Nanami
Text: Hmm... The Signal Orbs? Like the ones I cast when playing the game? That's what I do best!

Name: Nanami
Text: Humph! Have to arrange the Signal Orbs according to the hints!

Name: Broken Medic Bot
Text: ...Pass Signal Orbs... Correct... You are allowed to pass...

Name: Haicma
Text: Sage is the best! Able to easily interpret the words that confuse me!

Name: Broken Medic Bot
Text: Sagemachina... Humanity... Survive...

Name: Nanami
Text: You also believe that humanity will live on, right? Little guy?

Name: Broken Medic Bot
Text: Endpoint area info obtained. Send directly?

Name: Haicma
Text: The central part of "Sanctuary" is comprised of orderly electric circuits and pipes.

Name: Haicma
Text: These cables keep transmitting the energy required by the entire starship.

Name: Haicma
Text: It's a bit dangerous down there. Watch your footsteps.

Name: Nanami
Text: If I am the one responsible for all of this...

Name: Nanami
Text: Then let me put an end to it all...!

Name: Nanami
Text: Nanami is angry!

Name: Nanami
Text: As long as we can successfully connect to the port, Nanami can bring this info back safely from this place.

Name: Haicma
Text: Leave it to me, Sage.

Name: Nanami
Text: No. I won't let my friends get hurt.

Name: Nanami
Text: This is the only thing Nanami insists!

Name: Haicma
Text: Nanami, watch out the electric currents on the ground!

Name: Spooner
Text: Sage...

Name: Nanami
Text: I know! This is all you've got? Get ready for Nanami's fully charged blow!

Name: Zero
Text: Aahhh... Sage... Why did you do this to your "friends"...?

Name: Zero
Text: Am I not enough to be your "friend"?

Name: Nanami
Text: Enough. Let's end everything here.

Name: Radio Signal
Text: ...Eden... Report...

Name: Radio Signal
Text: (Static)

Name: Nanami
Text: Eden...?

Name: Radio Signal
Text: ...Eden... Running... (Static)... We...

Name: Nanami
Text: Is this from the survivors?

Name: Nanami
Text: There's light. It seems the signal was from this way.

Name: Radio Signal
Text: ...Babylonia... didn't... back down... before the...

Name: Radio Signal
Text: (Static)

Name: Nanami
Text: Are these... corrupted Constructs?

Name: Nanami
Text: There could be human settlements around here.

Name: Corrupted Construct
Text: Warning... Escape... Warning...

Name: Nanami
Text: Are you warning Nanami?

Name: Nanami
Text: It's empty...

Name: Nanami
Text: Where did everyone go?

Name: Nanami
Text: The signal has become clearer!

Name: Radio Signal
Text: ...The world... Human history... Glory...

Name: Radio Signal
Text: The children of humanity... Merits... Thank you for your contribution.

Name: Radio Signal
Text: (Static)

Name: Nanami
Text: Is it a commendation meeting?

Name: Nanami
Text: The signal was from up ahead. Maybe they are waiting for me there!

Name: Radio Signal
Text: Fellow citizens, this is Hassen. I'm now announcing on behalf of the Babylonia Parliament. Please hear me out.

Name: Radio Signal
Text: "Eden" has been fighting hard against the Ascendants for more than ten hours.

Name: Radio Signal
Text: Unfortunately, as we failed to bring the core system back to normal, the fall of "Eden" is inevitable.

Name: Radio Signal
Text: In a few minutes, we will have to bid our farewell to the world and become a glorious page in human history.

Name: Radio Signal
Text: You are the children of humanity, and Earth will remember your merits forever. The civilization will be grateful for your contribution forever.

Name: Radio Signal
Text: May you rest in peace.

Name: Nanami
Text: Can't wake up Liv. Do you want to rehearse it again?

Name: Nanami
Text: Will I make it this time?

Name: Nanami
Text: There must be a way to save Liv... Even Nanami has to give up, too?

Name: Nanami
Text: No... I just need to be more careful! Just need to try again...!

Name: Nanami
Text: You can't wake her up like this... Perhaps... Try a different way?

Name: Nanami
Text: Maybe... This future is a mistake as well...

Name: Nanami
Text: Many things will change if I can save Liv.

Name: Nanami
Text: Let's start the simulation!

Name: Nanami
Text: Liv! Your M.I.N.D. is heavily polluted! Stop!

Name: Nanami
Text: Awaken... No response?

Name: Nanami
Text: Liv's M.I.N.D. is being corrupted! It's in total chaos!

Name: Nanami
Text: Once it's all red, the "discharge collar" is gonna...

Name: Nanami
Text: But Nanami can't connect to Liv. Have to find another way.

Name: Nanami
Text: Right. Sometimes external interference also works, right?

Name: Liv
Text: ... There is no need... to be afraid...

Name: Nanami
Text: Liv reacted? Great! Keep going!

Name: Liv
Text: ... Transfer the pain... to me...

Name: Nanami
Text: Liv's M.I.N.D. corruption keeps increasing... If this continues...!

Name: Nanami
Text: Liv... Liv! No... Nanami can't connect to Liv.

Name: Nanami
Text: Mechanoids and Constructs are different. If Commandant were here...

Name: Liv
Text: AAAGGHHH—

Name: Nanami
Text: Liv! What's wrong?

Name: Liv
Text: Let go of me!

Name: Liv
Text: No... NO... I DON'T WANT TO HURT YOU!

Name: Nanami
Text: Liv didn't hurt Nanami! Liv didn't hurt anyone!

Name: Liv
Text: I'm sorry... I'm back...

Name: Nanami
Text: ... Is she mumbling to herself?

Name: Nanami
Text: Maybe it was the illusion she saw due to the corruption. Just try a little harder!

Name: Nanami
Text: Nanami can definitely save Liv, reverse Gray Raven's despair, and bring hope and miracles!

Name: Nanami
Text: I just need to try harder for Liv, the most gentle girl in this world...! Lucia and Lee will definitely help me once they can move again!

Name: Nanami
Text: Can I really make it...?

Name: Nanami
Text: Nanami failed many things... The eternal winter, the war between machines and humanity, even the simple task of stopping Babylonia from falling...

Name: Nanami
Text: No, Nanami can't give up! Nanami failed because Nanami didn't find the source of the problem! Nanami is looking for it!

Name: Nanami
Text: Nanami still remembers that Liv makes tasty cakes...! So, I have to bring Liv back...

Name: Nanami
Text: Don't give up! Don't give up! Don't give up, Nanami!

Name: Nanami
Text: ... What went wrong?

Name: Nanami
Text: ... What's the meaning of trying and failing again and again?

Name: Nanami
Text: Liv... I'm sorry.

Name: Liv
Text: (Mumbles indistinctly)

Name: Liv
Text: Who's... calling for me...?

Name: Liv
Text: I... hear... a familiar voice...

Name: Liv
Text: It's... cold here...

Name: Liv
Text: (Mumbles indistinctly)

Name: Nanami
Text: There are no other ways... Nothing will change..., if we don't do anything...

Name: Nanami
Text: Would things be different if Commandant were still awake...?

Name: Nanami
Text: Her M.I.N.D. has become stable. Keep calling Liv! Maybe this can wake her up!

Name: Nanami
Text: Liv... Liv! Don't give up the hope to survive no matter what happens!

Name: Liv
Text: That's okay... You don't have to be afraid anymore... Let me take your pain...

Name: Nanami
Text: Liv... Please, Nanami is calling you...

Name: Nanami
Text: Almost there... Nanami can do it!

Name: Nanami
Text: Namami can definitely wake Liv up this time!

Name: Nanami
Text: Even if it is a game..., it is time to turn things around!

Name: Nanami
Text: There are no other ways... Nothing will change..., if we don't do anything...

Name: Nanami
Text: Would things be different if Commandant were still awake...?

Name: Nanami
Text: We're so close, but why...

Name: Nanami
Text: If we try again...

Name: Nanami
Text: This time... won't do either...

Name: Nanami
Text: Ugh! So careless!

Name: Nanami
Text: Power was damaged by Liv's reckless attack...

Name: Nanami
Text: ...Can we really succeed?

Name: Liv
Text: Everyone...

Name: Construct
Text: Where am I...? What time is it? My memory is a bit blurry...

Name: Construct
Text: I remember I was infected and lost consciousness... Why am I here?

Name: Liv
Text: Babylonia has come up with a way to cure the Corrupted.

Name: Liv
Text: You have just recovered from the corrupted status and still need time to adjust.

Name: Liv
Text: Leave this to me.

Name: Liv
Text: A barrier... Did Lee create it? It's about to be overloaded.

Name: Tips
Text: Double tap the Dodge button to enter <color=#ffda58>Prayer</color> form

Name: Tips
Text: Fast double tap the Dodge button to enter <color=#ffda58>Prayer</color> form

Name: Tips
Text: Ping to charge <color=#ffda58>Prayer</color>. The more orbs pinged, the more powerful the Prayer form will be.

Name: Liv
Text: Are these Corrupted the Mechanoids that guarded this church?

Name: Liv
Text: Lee... Allow me to borrow your device a bit.

Name: Liv
Text: Sorry. You are not allowed to go through here.

Name: Liv
Text: There are two severe Punishing Virus signals ahead.

Name: Liv
Text: ...The twins?

Name: Liv
Text: They seem very weak...

Name: Liv
Text: Lee...

Name: Liv
Text: Lucia...

Name: Liv
Text: You've been waiting for me... But I'm still late...

Name: Liv
Text: I can't give up... I have to take you back.

Name: Lucia
Text: Liv? What happened... to me...?

Name: Lee
Text: What happened? I felt like...

Name: Liv
Text: It's okay now...

Name: Liv
Text: No matter how many lives the Punishing Virus has taken.

Name: Liv
Text: How long the dark night will be...

Name: Liv
Text: Hope... has been reborn from the ashes!

Name: Lucia
Text: Eighteen Waves in Total. First Wave Incoming (One Monster).

Name: Lucia
Text: Second Wave Incoming (One Monster)

Name: Lucia
Text: Third Wave Incoming (One Monster)

Name: Lucia
Text: Fourth Wave Incoming (Two Monsters)

Name: Lucia
Text: Fifth Wave Incoming (Two Monsters)

Name: Lucia
Text: Difficulty Has Gone Up. Sixth Wave Incoming (Three Monsters).

Name: Lucia
Text: Seventh Wave Incoming (Three Monsters)

Name: Lucia
Text: Eighth Wave Incoming (Three Monsters)

Name: Liv
Text: Activate the mechanism and complete the challenge before time runs out.

Name: Liv
Text: Step on the square to activate the mechanism and summon statues. You will succeed when the two statues in front and behind are the same.

Name: Liv
Text: There are four pairs of statues. Activate them to earn points. Complete all of them to clear the stage.

Name: Tips
Text: Hetero Units will revive after being defeated, but their versions could change.

Name: Tips
Text: Hetero Units with the same version will be connected.

Name: Tips
Text: Let's connect multiple Hetero Units!

Name: Lucia
Text: Your life is a play. Now it's time to bring the curtain down on it.

Name: Lucia
Text: Face the truth of the world. Accept your fate and the end of the play.

Name: Lucia
Text: It's impossible to beat a dragon even in its weakest moments.

Name: Lucia
Text: Eventually, the dragon's claw will go through the hero's chest. Everything is destined! Ah! What a heartbreaking tragedy!

Name: Hamlet
Text: How sad! How dare you intervene in the birth of true art? Apparently, the dragon can no longer stop this...

Name: Hamlet
Text: I have to bring the curtain down on this play with my own hands and set everything back to perfection and sadness.
An undefeatable dragon and an unyielding champion.
If the dragon has been waiting for the fated destruction of the world, then what have you been waiting for?
A faint hope? The illusory sound of a pipe?

Name: Piper
Text: No... There is no way you can defeat it.

Name: Piper
Text: There is no way to defeat the dragon in this story unless...
The piper connects her fate to the dragon's fate with her magic pipe.
This is the only way she can think of to slay the dragon.
The evil piper! The ridiculous piper! The miserable piper...
She will die by your sword according to her own destiny.

Name: Tips
Text: Upon receiving damage at weak points, a Corrupted Construct will be converted to a neutral Construct for a while.

Name: Tips
Text: If the neutral Construct is hostile to another Corrupted Construct, they will attack each other.

Name: Tips
Text: Use this to help you eliminate all the enemies.

Name: Tips
Text: The triangle area created by the Martyr is the safe area.

Name: Tips
Text: Try to stay in it to defeat all your opponents.
An undefeatable dragon and an unyielding champion.
The piper attempts to challenge her fate. Doesn't she know that there is a more tragic ending waiting for her?

Name: Piper
Text: Now you know the secret of the magic pipe... You should know how to kill the dragon.

Name: Piper
Text: We only have one chance. The moment my life ends with the dragon is the moment we save everything.

Name: Piper
Text: It's useless... There is no way we can defeat it.

Name: Piper
Text: There is only one way left...
The piper connects her fate to the dragon's fate with her magic pipe.
This is the only way she can think of to slay the dragon.
The evil piper! The ridiculous piper! The miserable piper...
She will die by your sword according to her own destiny.

Name: Hamlet
Text: How sad! How dare you intervene in the birth of true art? Apparently, the dragon can no longer stop this...

Name: Hamlet
Text: I have to bring the curtain down on this play with my own hands and set everything back to perfection and sadness.

Name: Hamlet
Text: It's the pipe... Why do I still hear the magic pipe?

Name: Hamlet
Text: It must be that witch...! That witch again!

Name: Hamlet
Text: Why don't you understand? All that awaits the piper is a beautiful tragic ending.

Name: Hamlet
Text: This is how... the story ends!

Name: Hamlet
Text: How sad! How dare you intervene in the birth of true art? Apparently, the dragon can no longer stop this...

Name: Hamlet
Text: I have to bring the curtain down on this play with my own hands and set everything back to perfection and sadness.

Name: Hamlet
Text: You have used up my patience... No, the audience's patience!

Name: Hamlet
Text: You fake champion! I will tear your face of hypocrisy into pieces!

Name: Hamlet
Text: You must have been using your dirty tricks to destroy the perfect script and rewrite the predetermined destiny again and again!

Name: Hamlet
Text: The end of the story... must be tragic!

Name: Celica
Text: In the Central Area, the battle result will be determined by the <color=#FF821C>points</color>. Attack the enemy to deal DMG and accumulate <color=#FF821C>Basic Points</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Finish the enemy with Finishing Move to earn the <color=#FF821C>Finishing Points</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Use Finishing Move multiple times within a period of time to finish the enemy and earn <color=#FF821C>Combo Finishing Points</color> based on the number of use.

Name: Celica
Text: The more times Ultimate is used, the shorter the <color=#FF821C>Combo Finishing Interval</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Reduce the enemy's <color=#FF821C>Finisher Gauge value</color> to increase the <color=#FF821C>Rating</color> Gauge value.

Name: Celica
Text: There are 7 Ratings — C, B, A, S, SS, SSS, and SSS+.

Name: Celica
Text: When the Rating is below S, fill the current <color=#FF821C>Rating Gauge</color> to improve the Rating.

Name: Celica
Text: Use Finishing Move to accumulate massive <color=#FF821C>Rating Gauge</color> value.

Name: Celica
Text: When the Rating is above S, use Finishing Move to improve the Rating.

Name: Celica
Text: The higher the Rating, the harder it will be to increase the Rating Gauge value.

Name: Celica
Text: When the enemy casts an All-out Attack, a blue cross warning will appear. If the Uniframe successfully responds to the attack with a <color=#ee7d7c>Speed Attack</color>, the enemy's Finisher Gauge value will be reduced.

Name: Pulao
Text: Uwah! Again?!

Name: Panda
Text: Rrr...!

Name: Panda
Text: Rrr...!

Name: Pulao
Text: Guys! Please calm down!

Name: Panda
Text: Rrr...!

Name: Tour Guide
Text: ...What's that?!

Name: Pulao
Text: Big... big panda?

Name: Big Panda
Text: Rrr, rawr rawr.

Name: Pulao
Text: Are you saying that I trespassed on your territory... and hit you...?

Name: Big Panda
Text: Rrr... Rrr... Rrrr!

Name: Pulao
Text: So you're angry because we came here without your permission?

Name: Big Panda
Text: Rrr... Rrr.

Name: Pulao
Text: Sorry... We didn't mean to do it.

Name: Big Panda
Text: Rrr.

Name: Pulao
Text: Don't worry. I pulled my punch, so your friends are fine. I'll go wake them up.

Name: Panda
Text: Rrr↗... Rrr→!

Name: Big Panda
Text: Rrrr!!!

Name: Pulao
Text: Sorry!

Name: Panda
Text: Rrr↘ Rrr↗ Rrr→

Name: Big Panda
Text: Rrr, rawr rawr.

Name: Pulao
Text: Bring it on!

Name: Ding Gold
Text: Bring what?

Name: Demon Bane
Text: Forget it! Just beat them to death!!!

Name: Pulao
Text: Power! Strike!

Name: Demon Bane
Text: I'm not done yet!

Name: Pulao
Text: Breaker Slash!

Name: Demon Bane
Text: **** you! I'll teach you a lesson myself!

Name: Pulao
Text: Be! Like! Water!

Name: Pulao
Text: Tap the <color=#FF0000>[Signature button]</color> to summon Dragon Axe to fight.

Name: Pulao
Text: When Dragon Axe is spinning around the field, tap the <color=#FF0000>[Signature button]</color> to summon it back.

Name: Tips
Text: Catch Dragon Axe when performing a Signal Orb skill to cast a new skill combo. Tap the <color=#FF0000>[Signature button]</color> to summon back Dragon Axe.

Name: Tips
Text: Upon a successful ping that catches Dragon Axe, keep tapping the <color=#FF0000>[Basic Attack]</color> button to cast more skills.

Name: Tips
Text: When the Signature button lights up again, <color=#FF0000>[press and hold]</color> to cast <color=#FF0000>Spirit Blade: Falling Stars</color>.

Name: Pulao
Text: Where could the celestial be at?

Name: Pulao
Text: Woah! What a big lake!

Name: Pulao
Text: I haven't seen any traces of the celestial along the way. I guess I'll have a look across the river.

Name: Pulao
Text: Select the route across the river

Name: Pulao
Text: Hmm... But how do I cross the river?

Name: Pulao
Text: Ah! Right! I remember that Master gave me something before I left.

Name: Pulao
Text: Great! Now I can cross the river!

Name: Pulao
Text: Wow, those rabbits are so big!

Name: Pulao
Text: They're standing here to block my way...?

Name: Pulao
Text: But I have to see the celestial! I'm sorry!

Name: Pulao
Text: Hmm. Seems like this isn't the right route. Let me try the other one.

Name: Pulao
Text: Driftwood... Maybe I can <color=#ff5656>jump on it and pull myself to the rock over there.</color> Let me give it a go!

Name: Pulao
Text: Hey! Stop!

Name: Birdie
Text: I'll stop if you stop.

Name: Pulao
Text: That's what I want to say.

Name: Pulao
Text: Mmm... It's a trick. The sword is not on him!

Name: Doughie
Text: Stop! I don't have the sword!

Name: Pulao
Text: ...What are you doing! Give my master's sword back!

Name: Simpie
Text: Girl, I'm doing this for the sake of everyone! We will show no mercy if you don't stop.

Name: Simpie
Text: Guys! Encircle her!

Name: Civilians
Text: ～Of flexile and simulacrous make...～

Name: Civilians
Text: ～Thusly, it cometh and goeth, at the pluck of digits ten...～

Name: Pulao
Text: What should I do?

Name: Simpie
Text: Just follow your battle instinct. Our puppets here are professional. They will act accordingly.

Name: Pulao
Text: Okay. I'll give it a try!

Name: Civilians
Text: ～How transient its flutter...～

Name: Civilians
Text: Rise...～

Name: Civilians
Text: Wow, that's amazing!

Name: Simpie
Text: You're getting more and more used to it! Time for the climax of the performance!

Name: Citizens
Text: ～Thousands of lights...～

Name: Civilians
Text: ～Dance of two dragons...～

Name: Civilians
Text: Rise...～

Name: God Slayer
Text: Two swords conquer all, God Slayer! Have some rest, guys. Let me deal with her.

Name: Demon Bane
Text: Three sticks pierce through the sky, Demon Bane! Have some rest, guys. Let me deal with her.

Name: Heaven Breaker
Text: Four axes slash across the universe, Heaven Breaker! Demon Bane! Have some rest, guys. Let me deal with her.

Name: Pulao
Text: How many more times do you all need to introduce yourselves!

Name: God Slayer
Text: Ahhh... AHHHH!!! Don't panic, guys!!! I... will... be... back... soon!!!

Name: Demon Bane
Text: Ahhh... AHHHH!!! Don't panic, guys!!! I... will... be... back... soon!!!

Name: Heaven Breaker
Text: Ahhh... AHHHH!!! Don't panic, guys!!! I... will... be... back... soon!!!

Name: God Slayer
Text: Two swords conquer all, God Slayer! Have some rest, guys. Let me deal with her.

Name: Demon Bane
Text: Three sticks pierce through the sky, Demon Bane! Have some rest, guys. Let me deal with her.

Name: Heaven Breaker
Text: Four axes slash across the universe, Heaven Breaker! Demon Bane! Have some rest, guys. Let me deal with her.

Name: God Slayer
Text: I'm the weakest one among the four rulers. Don't get too carried away.

Name: Demon Bane
Text: The other two of the elite four are better than me. You can't win.

Name: Heaven Breaker
Text: You're gonna face our big brother next. He is even better than the combination of three of us!

Name: God Slayer
Text: Hang in there, bro! Let me have some rest.

Name: Demon Bane
Text: Hang in there, bro! I ate too much. I have to take a walk first.

Name: Heaven Breaker
Text: Hang in there, bro! I lost my wallet. Let me have a look around first.

Name: Tips
Text: To confront the <color=#4169E1>standard attacks</color>, press the Dodge button on the <color=#FF4500>beats of the music</color> to raise the rating.

Name: Tips
Text: Any Ping or Basic Attack can deflect MC Solar's <color=#FF4500>Finishing Attack</color>. And based on the rating, deal significant DMG to MC Solar and enter Matrix once.

Name: Tips
Text: Spirit changes. At this stage, it's unable to actively trigger Matrix. Raprap's attacks become more powerful and rhythmic.

Name: Tips
Text: Spirit changes. At this stage, it's unable to actively trigger Matrix. Raprap's attacks become more powerful and rhythmic.

Name: Tips
Text: The last hit of the combo will launch a powerful blow from above to the ground on the beat.

Name: Pulao
Text: "I'm no flop! It's Pulao!"

Name: Commandant
Text: Finally cleaned it up.

Name: Lucia
Text: Why are you dressed like that, Commandant?

Name: Lucia
Text: I see... Well, it actually suits you pretty well, Commandant.

Name: Liv
Text: Are you here to help, Commandant? It's full of molds here. Be careful.

Name: Liv
Text: Oh, right. You look... pretty good in this outfit, Commandant.

Name: Lee
Text: Why are you dressed like that?

Name: Lee
Text: This is the source of the pollution. Stay behind me.

Name: Karenina (?)
Text: What are you doing? Help me!

Name: Lee
Text: What happened?

Name: Liv
Text: I turned on the stove and this happened.

Name: Karenina (?)
Text: No, that's not enough!

Name: Lee
Text: Why is she here?

Name: Lucia
Text: Leave it there. The food ingredients have become alive!

Name: Karenina (?)
Text: Hey! Collect the ingredients!

Name: Karenina (?)
Text: This is all you've got? Not enough!

Name: Karenina (?)
Text: This is too slow! Let me show you how to make it fast!

Name: Lucia
Text: Wait...

Name: Lucia
Text: THIS IS MADNESS!

Name: Karenina (?)
Text: This is... still not enough... I'm exhausted...

Name: Karenina (?)
Text: I'm starved...

Name: Door God 1
Text: A little more time before the power of couplets starts to work. These "ghosts" from the darkness are attracted to it.

Name: Door God 2
Text: I am the darkness!

Name: Door God 1
Text: Forget about the details. Beat your opponent by using their way.

Name: Door God 1
Text: Anyways, we need to stop them here.

Name: Door God 1
Text: Don't let the ghosts get what they want before the couplets work.

Name: Door God 1
Text: Damn. There are too many of them. Have to call my friends!

Name: Door God 1
Text: Door God 3, Door God 4, come and help me!

Name: Door God 3
Text: Door God 4 is already there. I'll support you from the distance.

Name: Door God 1
Text: The door is open! Go!

Name: Door God 4
Text: Stop fighting! Just go!
Play the voice?

Name: Lucia
Text: Looks like Nian is afraid of the light and the sound of bubbles being popped.

Name: Lucia
Text: We need to lead it to those bubbles.

Name: Night Keeper
Text: Use this. The gold coin can attract the bubbles.

Name: Tips
Text: Calm down and feel Liv's location.

Name: Tips
Text: Incoming of a faint sound.

Name: Tips
Text: All Gray Raven members found. Looking for ways to leave.
Aargh...
Hehe...
Nanami looks different from what you remembered, right?

Name: Red Envelope Distributor
Text: Rawrgh!

Name: Night Keeper
Text: You guys know the drill. I'll just leave you to it.

Name: Red Envelope Distributor
Text: Squeak... Squeak... Squeak...
The moonlight is beautiful. Hehe.
Nanami looks different from what I remembered.

Name: Tips
Text: I only hear noise. Dead end.

Name: Tips
Text: Out of power. Almost can't see the road under the feet clearly.

Name: Tips
Text: Unable to destroy.
Aargh...
Hehe...

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant? It's too dark here. I can't see you clearly.

Name: Lucia
Text: Understood. I'll stay here. Please take care of Lee and Liv, Commandant.

Name: Lucia
Text: I won't leave until everyone's back.

Name: Lee
Text: Not bad.

Name: Lucia
Text: Now Liv is the only one left.

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant!

Name: Liv
Text: Liv has been looking for you as well.

Name: Liv
Text: Yes. Let's get back to guys.

Name: Tips
Text: This voice... It's Lee!

Name: Nanami
Text: Hey! You look like Martin a lot! Can we chat?

Name: Nanami
Text: Let Nanami hug you big bears!

Name: Nanami
Text: Ugh... Didn't we agree not to fight?

Name: Nanami
Text: Phew... Why can you only talk properly when lying on the ground?

Name: Voodoo?
Text: Stopped my evolution?

Name: Voodoo?
Text: I have three forms.

Name: Voodoo King
Text: My Battle Power is 520,000 right now, and I can transform 3 times. Do you understand what it means?

Name: Voodoo?
Text: 35% damage detected. Enemy Battle Power evaluation error. Preparing to evolve again.

Name: Voodoo?
Text: 65% damage detected. Failed to evaluate Battle Power. Preparing for the ultimate evolution.

Name: Voodoo?
Text: Did the materials get damaged?

Name: Voodoo?
Text: You stopped my evolution.

Name: Voodoo?
Text: Don't stop!

Name: Ox
Text: Feel the power of the ox horns!

Name: Ox
Text: Aghanim! Bless me!

Name: "Ox No.2"
Text: Aghanim! Ah! What a strong power!

Name: Dragon
Text: My claws have gained a mysterious power. Time for revenge!

Name: Dragon
Text: Ah! My <color=#FF0000>claws are full of power</color>! I want to name it the "Power of the King" for some reason.

Name: Dragon
Text: The power of chaos is <color=#FF0000>coming out of my claws</color>. The <color=#FF0000>judgment</color> is about to come!

Name: Dragon
Text: The power has been awakened. Get ready for my <color=#FF0000>judgment</color>!

Name: Dragon
Text: <color=#FF0000>Bring down the judgment</color>!

Name: Dragon
Text: My power... My Power of the King... No...

Name: Dragon
Text: ... I still failed... in the end...

Name: "MC Solar"
Text: Is the martial arts club going to be busy again?

Name: "MC Solar"
Text: That's unfair. There was a big delay. Let's rematch.

Name: "MC Solar"
Text: This is my full form.

Name: "MC Solar"
Text: I'll be the head!

Name: "Heaven Breaker"
Text: Leg!

Name: "God Slayer"
Text: Right hand!

Name: "Demon Bane"
Text: Left hand!

Name: "MC Solar"
Text: I'll be the head!

Name: "Lv.█ Member"
Text: Target █ █ █ █ detected. Getting a sample. Keep █ from the target, or you'll be █   █   █

Name: "Lv.█ Member"
Text: █  █ stripped away successfully, but toxic █  █ was generated during the process.

Name: "Lv.█ Member"
Text: █ █ █ █ transformed into █ █. The intel was wrong. It has multiple forms.

Name: Trailblazer
Text: I'll fight in the Shining Form

Name: Trailblazer
Text: I'm impressed. You defeated me when I was fully charged. Are Babylonia Commandants monsters?

Name: Trailblazer
Text: Trigger Shield Absorption and summon 1★ Glory Clone

Name: Trailblazer
Text: Combine 1★ Glory Clone with Shield Energy and summon 2★ Glory Clone

Name: Trailblazer
Text: Take 2★ Glory Clone as my offering to you, show yourself, 3★ Glory Clone!

Name: Trailblazer
Text: Eliminate 3★ Glory Clone and call 4★ Glory Clone via special summon!

Name: Trailblazer
Text: Kill 4★ Glory Clone. Now come! 5★ Glory Clone!

Name: Trailblazer
Text: After absorbing the Energy of all the clones, the strongest Knight Glory Clone Max is here!

Name: "MC Solar"
Text: Yes, you won, but you fail to impress me. Go home and work harder.

Name: Alpha
Text: I got my eyes on you from now on.

Name: Alpha
Text: Show me what you've got!

Name: Alpha
Text: What's this, a tea party? Finish them, quick!

Name: Alpha
Text: This is the final battle. Are you ready?

Name: Alpha
Text: Totally useless! I'll cut them down myself.

Name: Alpha
Text: Get out of my way. Don't slow me down.

Name: Alpha
Text: Watch and learn.

Name: Alpha
Text: On your feet! This isn't your end.

Name: Alpha
Text: Feeling tired? Let me take over.

Name: Alpha
Text: Show me what you're really capable of!

Name: Alpha
Text: What are you waiting for? Keep it up!

Name: Alpha
Text: It's not time to rest yet, keep at it.

Name: Alpha
Text: I'm surprised you made it this far.

Name: Alpha
Text: Back off. Don't get hurt.

Name: Alpha
Text: Are you okay?

Name: Alpha
Text: Watch out!

Name: Alpha
Text: You're not going to hurt Luna this time.

Name: Luna
Text: Ready to pay the price, Gabriel?

Name: Luna
Text: This time, I'm not alone anymore.

Name: Lamia
Text: Once upon a time across the vast sea, legends told of the Delish Mermaid, who could be summoned when someone made offerings to the sea.

Name: Lamia
Text: The ritual is almost complete. Delish Mermaid will arrive soon!

Name: Lamia
Text: The sea has accepted the offerings. Delish Mermaid is coming!

Name: Lamia
Text: Prepare to be captivated by the irresistible charm of the Delicious Mermaid! Despite its deadly poison, not a single creature can resist the temptation.

Name: Lamia
Text: The sea will cast a curse upon anyone who has eaten Delish Mermaid, amplifying any tiny damage they take.

Name: Lee
Text: Switch to the Light Cannon Form

Name: Lee
Text: Switch to the Scattershot Form

Name: Lee
Text: Switch to the Normal Form

Name: Haicma
Text: ... According to the researcher's data, pressing and holding Dodge will <color=#ffda58>consume Dodge Gauge value</color> and send the character into the <color=#ffda58>Hunting Mode</color>.

Name: Haicma
Text: When in the Hunting Mode, <color=#ffda58>pressing and holding Dodge</color> to accumulate the Energy Gauge value.

Name: Haicma
Text: I'm the Core Name!

Name: Haicma
Text: ... According to the researcher's data, <color=#ffda58>Signature Move Name</color> can make weapons launch Ice Attacks.

Name: Haicma
Text: I'm the Signature Move Name!

Name: Haicma
Text: Checking mobility module operational status...

Name: Haicma
Text: Everything's normal. Performing the evacuation program.

Name: Haicma
Text: Electrical system damage detected. Cause: external damage.

Name: Haicma
Text: ...I have to find the backup power source to restart the electrical system.

Name: Haicma
Text: Abnormal mechanoid reaction detected.

Name: Haicma
Text: Strange process found in the database. Querying the object written...

Name: Haicma
Text: "Tactical circuit"... This is...

Name: Haicma
Text: ...Thank you very much.

Name: Haicma
Text: Analyzing battle data. Progress: 20%. 240s to go.

Name: Haicma
Text: Location of backup power source marked.

Name: Haicma
Text: ...Abnormal mechanoid signals detected around the backup power source.

Name: Haicma
Text: Battle data analysis progress: 50%. Press and hold Dodge to <color=#ffda58>consume Dodge Gauge value</color> and activate <color=#ffda58>Huntress' Command</color>.

Name: Haicma
Text: Threat removed.

Name: Haicma
Text: Backup power source intact. Ready to restart.

Name: Haicma
Text: Entering enemy observation. Prepare for battle.

Name: Haicma
Text: Conflicting command. Current goal: activate backup power source.

Name: Haicma
Text: Conflicting command. Current goal: leave the facility.

Name: Haicma
Text: Facility fire exit control unit located.

Name: Haicma
Text: Multiple abnormal mechanoids detected. It's better to avoid battle before the battle analysis is complete.

Name: Haicma
Text: The entire facility has been sealed off from the outside by a high-level command.

Name: Haicma
Text: Solution: forced system restart, overwriting the command. Estimated time: 30s.

Name: Haicma
Text: Start.

Name: Haicma
Text: Battle data analysis progress: 100%. High-performance tactical circuit, on standby.

Name: Haicma
Text: Gate opened. Searching for survivors inside...

Name: Haicma
Text: No response.

Name: Haicma
Text: Search again... No response.

Name: Haicma
Text: ...Ready for evacuation.

Name: Haicma
Text: Dialogue Here

Name: Haicma
Text: Dialogue Here 1

Name: Haicma
Text: Dialogue Here 2

Name: Haicma
Text: Must restore...

Name: Haicma
Text: ...The combat function... now...

Name: Haicma
Text: Scanning... Frame identified. Daedalus TP-19 Prototype.

Name: Haicma
Text: Not found in the database. What frame is it...?

Name: Haicma
Text: Radar sensor. Adaptation rate: 60%.

Name: Haicma
Text: Radar sensor function can be partly restored.

Name: Haicma
Text: Tactical terminal. Adaptation rate: 76%.

Name: Haicma
Text: Weapon compatibility errors can be fixed.

Name: Haicma
Text: Radar sensor mode restored. Reloading tactical circuit.

Name: Haicma
Text: Too damaged to use.

Name: Haicma
Text: Visual sensor. Compatible.

Name: Haicma
Text: Visual module malfunctions can be fixed.

Name: Haicma
Text: Energy Core component. Incompatible.

Name: Haicma
Text: High-performance mobility component. Compatibility rate: 80%.

Name: Haicma
Text: High-performance combat mode can be restarted.

Name: Haicma
Text: This is... graffiti art?

Name: Haicma
Text: It rather resembles a cluster of inscrutable information.

Name: Haicma
Text: Gate of high security level. Cannot be forced open. Authentication key required.

Name: Haicma
Text: Search around.

Name: Haicma
Text: It's a security machine. Maybe I can find information of the area on him.

Name: Tips
Text: Tips: Check the mechanoid.

Name: Haicma
Text: It's in sleep mode.

Name: Haicma
Text: Probability of retaining the logical thinking circuit after activation: 56%.

Name: Household Robot
Text: Pro—t-tect the master. Destroy the master—conflicting command. Conflicting command.

Name: Household Robot
Text: Self-destruction program—failed. Requesting external assistance—

Name: Haicma
Text: Increase of virus concentration detected. The mechanoid is prone to infection. Immediate destruction suggested.

Name: Haicma
Text: ...It's still sticking to the protection command even if it's infected.

Name: Haicma
Text: Individuals tend to show different behaviors after infection... for unknow reasons.

Name: Haicma
Text: The authentication key to the gate is found.

Name: Haicma
Text: Missing key component for activation.

Name: Haicma
Text: Search around.

Name: Household Robot
Text: Who is it?!

Name: Household Robot
Text: ...No infection signals detected. Attack stopped.

Name: Household Robot
Text: Sorry for what happened. I have to protect him.

Name: Household Robot
Text: I have never seen a robot of your version.

Name: Household Robot
Text: Here are some backup components. Take them if you need them.

Name: Haicma
Text: ...The object you're protecting has lost life signals.

Name: Household Robot
Text: I know, but it doesn't go against the command of protecting him.

Name: Household Robot
Text: I "want" to stay.

Name: Household Robot
Text: Sleep mode disabled. Syncing data during sleep and activating communication mode.

Name: Household Robot
Text: Finally... You're here... Here is the authentication key. There are still residents who failed to evacuate in the facility.

Name: Household Robot
Text: My leg components are broken. You have to do it yourselves... Wait, are you the only one here?

Name: Household Robot
Text: ...What time is it? How long did I sleep?

Name: Haicma
Text: ...I can't confirm it with the materials I have.

Name: Haicma
Text: Here is a component for repair.

Name: Household Robot
Text: ...Thank you.

Name: Haicma
Text: Frame is well preserved. Expect to find usable components.

Name: Haicma
Text: Audio module intact. Ready to use.

Name: Haicma
Text: Core energy component. Incompatible. Can be used as a temporary power source.

Name: Household Robot
Text: Sleep mode disabled. Syncing data during sleep and activating communication mode.

Name: Haicma
Text: Please provide valid information.

Name: Household Robot
Text: Finally... You're here... Here is the authentication key. There are still residents who failed to evacuate in the facility.

Name: Household Robot
Text: My leg components are broken. You have to do it yourselves... Wait, are you the only one here?

Name: Household Robot
Text: Why does it look like this around here...? What time is it? How long did I sleep?

Name: Household Robot
Text: Failed to sync information. Fatal error in energy component. Help—

Name: Household Robot
Text: (Robot has stopped running.)

Name: Haicma
Text: Multiple human and mechanoid traces found...

Name: Haicma
Text: Could there be any information about "her" here?

Name: Haicma
Text: Human evacuation direction identified.

Name: Haicma
Text: ...Is there any Corrupted left?

Name: Haicma
Text: ...Keep searching for information.

Name: Haicma
Text: The human has successfully evacuated to the outside.

Name: Haicma
Text: Detected: Uncorrupted mechanoid ahead. Speculation: valid information is expected to be found on the mechanoid.

Name: Haicma
Text: The mechanoid is under the attack of the Corrupted. Activating the assist mode.

Name: Household Robot
Text: Ahh... My "kin."

Name: Household Robot
Text: Protect—the graffiti. That's the revelation—"Sage" left to guide us.

Name: Haicma
Text: Sage?

Name: Household Robot
Text: Find and accept the will of the "Sage".

Name: Household Robot
Text: We shall be redeemed.

Name: Haicma
Text: ...There is obvious abnormality in the mechanoid's emotion module. Could it be caused by the graffiti art?

Name: Haicma
Text: It's a complete copy of the graffiti art at the gate. From the mechanoid I spoke to.

Name: Haicma
Text: There is information that is hard to analyze in the graffiti. Attempting to analyze... Warning... Abnormality in emotion simulation module. Analysis terminated.

Name: Haicma
Text: Unidentified "familiarity" generated.

Name: Haicma
Text: ...Memory data loss detected again.

Name: Household Robot
Text: Here you are! Let me help you!

Name: Haicma
Text: Thank you for your help.

Name: Household Robot
Text: You're welcome. It's my duty to serve humans.

Name: Household Robot
Text: ...The frame's default verbal response module... <Attempting to disable it>...

Name: Household Robot
Text: <Success>! After seeing that graffiti, I've somehow gained control over the behavior system that used to be open only to humans...

Name: Haicma
Text: Do you know what the "Sage" is?

Name: Household Robot
Text: No materials found in the database.

Name: Household Robot
Text: I don't know how long it's been since the humans hiding here left. If you want to find someone, just go that way.

Name: Household Robot
Text: I have to stay and study the graffiti.

Name: Haicma
Text: I see. Thank you for your information.

Name: Haicma
Text: Conflicting command. Current goal: find usable mechanoid components to replace the damaged parts.

Name: Haicma
Text: It's in sleep mode. Probability of retaining the logical thinking circuit after activation: 56%.

Name: Haicma
Text: It's a "mall." A place where humans visit for shopping and entertainment... According to the materials, the "Gift" required by the unfinished mission No. 376 could be found here.

Name: Delivery Droid
Text: Beep beep—

Name: Delivery Droid
Text: Beep beep—System error. Failed to locate other comrades...

Name: Haicma
Text: GPS... Normal. Able to act normally.

Name: Haicma
Text: Please send me the map information.

Name: Delivery Droid
Text: Our headquarters are around here. There are more and more Corrupted here recently... Nobody dares to go out.

Name: Delivery Droid
Text: If the "offerings" are damaged... Shiver shiver.

Name: Haicma
Text: Warehouse located.

Name: Tips
Text: Massive Corrupted signals detected. Escort the Delivery Droid to the warehouse.

Name: Tips
Text: Function enhancement can be obtained around the Delivery Droid.

Name: Delivery Droid
Text: Over there!

Name: Haicma
Text: Watch out.

Name: Haicma
Text: (There are a large number of Corrupted in the warehouse, but...)

Name: Delivery Droid
Text: What happened?

Name: Haicma
Text: ...Nothing.

Name: Haicma
Text: Analyzing the enemy's combat capability... Forced breakthrough started.

Name: Haicma
Text: Please stay behind me.

Name: Haicma
Text: Try to avoid combat to protect the escort.

Name: Haicma
Text: Look around for available materials around here.

Name: Tips
Text: Obtain identification data from the defeated corrupted mechanoid

Name: Haicma
Text: Can disguise with the corrupted mechanoid's identification data.

Name: Haicma
Text: Please stay behind me.

Name: Delivery Droid
Text: We made it! It's here!

Name: Delivery Droid
Text: This is weird... Where did everyone go?

Name: Haicma
Text: Object identified: Star Wars

Name: Delivery Droid
Text: It's found in human museum. I don't know why it's there, but it must carry some kind of "meaning" since it is placed in a "museum."

Name: Haicma
Text: Object identified: Climber's High

Name: Haicma
Text: A big pile of retro discs with blurry words of "Anniversary" on it. The cracks on them seem to have been fixed many times.

Name: Haicma
Text: Object identified: Ginga Toppa—the Spiral Eye

Name: Delivery Droid
Text: I took it from a large mechanoid.

Name: Haicma
Text: Took...

Name: Delivery Droid
Text: Yes.

Name: Haicma
Text: These are the... "offerings"?

Name: Delivery Droid
Text: You're right!

Name: Haicma
Text: It's a "mall." A place where humans visit for shopping and entertainment...

Name: Haicma
Text: According to the materials, the "Gift" required by No. 376's unfinished mission could be found here...

Name: Delivery Droid
Text: Beep beep—

Name: Haicma
Text: Object identified: Star Wars

Name: Delivery Droid
Text: It's found in human museum. I don't know why it's there.

Name: Delivery Droid
Text: But it must carry some kind of "meaning" since it is placed in a "museum."

Name: Haicma
Text: (There are a large number of Corrupted in the warehouse.)

Name: Haicma
Text: This is the area identified after a comprehensive analysis of all clues...

Name: Haicma
Text: Detected: activity ahead... A mechanoid on the move.

Name: Haicma
Text: Tactical circuit ready for activation.

Name: Gear
Text: The Sage... was once here.

Name: Gear
Text: According to the calculation, finding Sage is the key to our plan.

Name: Gear
Text: Sage must know why we are here and what we are here for.

Name: Rabbit
Text: Rargh—

Name: Polar Bear
Text: Awoooo—

Name: Gear
Text: A Construct... No. A mechanoid? A version I've never seen before. Are you here to receive the Sage's revelation?

Name: Haicma
Text: About the "Sage".

Name: Haicma
Text: Please provide all the materials you have.

Name: Gear
Text: No. Information about Sage is only available to the Church of Machina members.

Name: Gear
Text: Since you are also our kin in pursuit of awakening, you can join the Church of Machina.

Name: Haicma
Text: ...Insufficient materials about the "Church of Machina". Proposal rejected.

Name: Gear
Text: A mechanoid that doesn't understand the Sage's will...? Then I don't think I have no obligation to give you further information.

Name: Gear
Text: ...She caught up with us?

Name: Gear
Text: Re-evaluating Battle Power... Eliminating unstable factors.

Name: Haicma
Text: The "Red Tide" is spreading faster than expected.

Name: Haicma
Text: ...Record data need to be updated.

Name: Haicma
Text: Data collection completed. Significant increase in abnormal creatures identified.

Name: Haicma
Text: Judging from the Punishing Virus concentration... It's more dangerous than a Corrupted.

Name: Haicma
Text: I need more information.

Name: Haicma
Text: Speculation 1: The "Hetero-Creature" is a Red Tide product.

Name: Haicma
Text: Speculation 2: The "Hetero-Creature" exhibit characteristics similar to life on Earth and can keep reproducing and growing.

Name: Haicma
Text: The so-called... "Evolve"?

Name: Haicma
Text: Speculation 3: 70% of the land in the area is covered by the Red Tide...

Name: Haicma
Text: ...The estimated survival rate for life and machines is extremely low.

Name: Haicma
Text: A graphical virtual space constructed by Gestalt with its computing power... Is it the internal structure of Babylonia?

Name: Haicma
Text: There are no materials about Babylonia's internal structure in AI management database, but why do I see this?

Name: Haicma
Text: ...No, it's not the time to think about it.

Name: Haicma
Text: Directory deciphered... Sector with core materials located.

Name: Haicma
Text: 14,950 fake nodes eliminated.

Name: Haicma
Text: Route planning failed... Too much interference. It seems I have to form a direct connection to the area.

Name: Haicma
Text: That bridge... It's the only connection key. I have to go through there.

Name: Haicma
Text: Wrong direction. We need to correct the route...

Name: Haicma
Text: The firewall is keeping out all external programs. It's impossible to establish connection in regular ways.

Name: Haicma
Text: Disguise program generated. Program body packing completed... "Data Fairy" invasion started.

Name: Haicma
Text: Arrived at the designated location... As expected, my invasion has been discovered.

Name: Haicma
Text: This is... the last battle.

Name: Noan
Text: The Red Tide has appeared on the streets outside the medical center.

Name: Noan
Text: ...If this continues, the Punishing Virus concentration will go up.

Name: Noan
Text: There's no time to deal with the Corrupted.

Name: Noan
Text: I need support ASAP.

Name: Noan
Text: What are these red shadows?

Name: Noan
Text: And... who is Shrek?

Name: Red Tide Projection
Text: How I wish I were the one who survived.

Name: Red Tide Projection
Text: You are a nobody! You should cherish the opportunity you were given!

Name: Red Tide Projection
Text: You monster...

Name: Noan
Text: It disappeared... What is that?

Name: Red Tide Projection
Text: A Construct kept by the Ascendant in the cell...

Name: Noan
Text: ...Where did I hear these words before?

Name: Noan
Text: I think I heard footsteps. Is it the sound of the Red Tide too?

Name: Noan
Text: Or is there someone else? That's impossible. Average Constructs can't stay near the Red Tide!

Name: Noan
Text: The Corrupted at this point in time?

Name: Noan
Text: The sound is gone...

Name: Noan
Text: No. Time is running out. I have to get through here before it's too late.

Name: Noan
Text: Sorry, Medical Center 09 requests support. Please...

Name: Construct
Text: Run! There are many Corrupted behind us!

Name: Construct
Text: We can't even save our teammates!

Name: Noan
Text: Are you okay?

Name: Construct
Text: Thank you... Cough, we thought we were left behind and screwed.

Name: Noan
Text: You got hurt. Get some rest.

Name: Construct
Text: Watch out. The Corrupted are coming again!

Name: Noan
Text: Watch out!

Name: Noan
Text: Stop!

Name: Noan
Text: It stopped?

Name: Construct
Text: Was the Corrupted following your orders?

Name: Noan
Text: Could it be the Ascendant's Geass is voice-controlled?

Name: Noan
Text: What about this... Defeat them!

Name: Noan
Text: This is not a coincidence...

Name: Construct
Text: So you can control the Corrupted?!

Name: Noan
Text: No. I have no idea what is going on.

Name: Construct
Text: It's an Ascendant! Retreat! Rendezvous with the others first!

Name: Noan
Text: Step back.

Name: Noan
Text: Stop.

Name: Noan
Text: Activate the self-destruction program.

Name: Noan
Text: Try to command the Corrupted

Name: Noan
Text: Almost there...!

Name: Noan
Text: Hope it's not too late!

Name: Noan
Text: Hey, Talbot! Why is everyone out here?

Name: Talbot
Text: Because the Corrupted arrived earlier than your support!

Name: Talbot
Text: It's not safe in the medical center! We have to move!

Name: Noan
Text: Let me help!

Name: Noan
Text: Where are the others?

Name: Talbot
Text: They took the side path and left.

Name: Talbot
Text: Most of the people who stayed here were severely injured.

Name: Talbot
Text: Many are dead.

Name: Talbot
Text: They are not far away from us. I'll watch the entrance. You go and check those injured.

Name: Noan
Text: Hang in there! I'll take you to the medical center!

Name: Construct
Text: You... attracted the Ascendant here...

Name: Construct
Text: Put everyone... in danger...

Name: Noan
Text: ...Hey!

Name: Construct
Text: Ha... It's you...

Name: Construct
Text: The Ascendant you and Talbot have been waiting for... will be here soon...

Name: Construct
Text: Then... What about the ability to... control the Corrupted...?

Name: Construct
Text: It can do nothing... but get us killed...

Name: Talbot
Text: Hey! Come here! I need help!

Name: Noan
Text: Activate the self-destruction program.

Name: Noan
Text: It's not working?

Name: Noan
Text: We have to protect this place at all costs!

Name: Talbot
Text: I received... comms from Lillian...

Name: Talbot
Text: There were... Corrupted on the path they took as well...

Name: Talbot
Text: If we don't do something... everyone is going to die...

Name: Talbot
Text: Can you do something... with your Ascendant power?

Name: Talbot
Text: Help me... My corruption... is gonna...

Name: Noan
Text: I can't control that power. It's not working!

Name: Talbot
Text: I didn't make contact with the Ascendant... to get everyone killed...

Name: Talbot
Text: H-help... me...

Name: Chrome
Text: Commandant, this is Chrome. I'm preparing to set up an area of defense using Omega Weapons.

Name: Chrome
Text: But we need to stop the attack from the Hetero-Creatures first... before they cause any trouble.

Name: Chrome
Text: The Hetero-Creatures could land any minute. Let's get prepared.

Name: Purifying Force - Urry
Text: Considering the number of the enemies, I think we should get auxiliary defense weapons ready.

Name: Purifying Force - Jelly
Text: I have several simple defense towers here. You decide where to place them, Strike Hawk Captain.

Name: Chrome
Text: Then place them on the east coast to kill the Hetero-Creatures landing from there.

Name: Purifying Force - Jelly
Text: Use the joystick to select the construction location. When the area is green, tap the button on the right to build.

Name: Chrome
Text: I'll go and have a look if there are any Hetero-Creatures landing. You keep working on the defense towers.

Name: Purifying Force - Urry
Text: We will do our job.

Name: Purifying Force - Jelly
Text: Please... take care.

Name: Purifying Force - Urry
Text: Strike Hawk Captain... Three types of defense towers are ready to use after repair.

Name: Chrome
Text: Another wave of Hetero-Creatures are coming! Get ready!

Name: Chrome
Text: Use Omega Weapons to form an area of defense. This way we should be able to hold off the Hetero-Creatures for a while.

Name: Vera
Text: Phew. Finally made it. Killing enemies is a better activity for me than sailing on the sea.

Name: Chrome
Text: Vera? I thought you were out there on the sea!

Name: Vera
Text: We got the Omega Weapons ready, and we are back. Just like that.

Name: Purifying Force - Urry
Text: The Hetero-Creatures attacked again. The energy towers we placed were all destroyed...

Name: Vera
Text: Hmph... Time to work again. Let's kill them all!

Name: Bianca
Text: The Red Tide is here already...?

Name: Bianca
Text: I have to leave now.

Name: Bianca
Text: These Hetero-Creatures are blocking my path in an orderly way as if someone is controlling them...

Name: Bianca
Text: Lithos... Is that you?

Name: Bianca
Text: Finally, the real deal.

Name: Bianca
Text: But you won't stop me like this...!

Name: Bianca
Text: ...Rest in peace, everyone. I will move on...

Name: Bianca
Text: with the weight of life..

Name: Red Tide Projection
Text: Bianca... Where are you going?

Name: Red Tide Projection
Text: It's me, Captain. Delapoer... I'm scared. Someone help me... Don't leave me here... Please...

Name: Red Tide Projection
Text: Is this the "humanity" you said? Leaving us behind?

Name: Red Tide Projection
Text: Were it not for the mission she took for you, Chiko wouldn't have... Chiko died because of you!

Name: Red Tide Projection
Text: Bianca... It's cold here... Is this what death feels like? I'm feel so upset...

Name: Bianca
Text: That voice...

Name: Bianca
Text: ...No, I can't stay here.

Name: Bianca
Text: Chiko, I believe you would do the same, if you were me.

Name: Bianca
Text: Wait for me. I'll be right there.

Name: Bianca
Text: The Red Tide is still gathering...

Name: Red Tide Projection
Text: Come, join us... and enter the happy dream...

Name: Bianca
Text: They didn't turn into the Red Tide voluntarily... The disaster and lie created by the Ascendant must end here!

Name: Bianca
Text: This is...

Name: Karenina
Text: Hey, can you hear me, Bianca? That mon—that humanoid started to absorb the Red Tide at a higher speed from just now.

Name: Karenina
Text: The generation of the Red Tide has slowed down. The Omega Weapons are working.

Name: Karenina
Text: We have set all the devices to run at full capacity. It won't last long but should be enough to lower your burden.

Name: Karenina
Text: ...We are counting on you, Bianca!

Name: Bianca
Text: This is the time...

Name: Bianca
Text: I will fulfill the promise with everyone's help.

Name: Bianca
Text: Behold, the final light!

Name: Lee
Text: As I thought, I can't contact the outside world here.

Name: Lee
Text: The space seems to have been altered... Gotta find a way up before things get worse.

Name: Lee
Text: This seems to lead to another area.

Name: Lee
Text: Better not take the risk before investigating the situation.

Name: Lee
Text: I'll check the other side first.

Name: Lee
Text: Is that a... Construct?

Name: Construct Captain
Text: If you can't see the [BUZZ—]... You'll never arrive at [BUZZ—].

Name: Construct Captain
Text: This is [BUZZ—] wrong [BUZZ—] Don't [BUZZ—]...

Name: Lee
Text: No... Just some meaningless residual data. Is this another piece of information captured by the Red Tide?

Name: Construct Captain
Text: The [BUZZ—] path<//TRUTH> is often hidden in [BUZZ—].

Name: Construct Captain
Text: (The Construct projection falls silent.)
My lost child...
Born... from chaos... Tracing...

Name: Lee
Text: Who's there?!
Stop [BUZZ—] right now!
Don't move any further!
Annihilation...

Name: Lee
Text: Abnormal gravity?

Name: Lee
Text: Dammit... I can't break free...

Name: Lee
Text: Is this a forced connection?!

Name: Lee
Text: The stability of M.I.N.D. is rising...

Name: Lee
Text: It can't be...!

Name: Lee
Text: Proceed with caution.

Name: Lee
Text: I remember him. He's the Construct I met at that time... Did he become a captain?

Name: Construct Captain
Text: If you can't see the hidden road ahead... You'll never arrive at the destination.

Name: Construct Captain
Text: This is the wrong route. Don't be deceived.

Name: Construct Captain
Text: The right path<//TRUTH> is often hidden in the past.

Name: Construct Captain
Text: You've found it. Please keep going forward for me.

Name: Lee
Text: What about you?

Name: Construct Captain
Text: I want to go back... Go home.

Name: Construct Captain
Text: But where is home?

Name: Construct Captain
Text: (The Construct projection falls silent.)
Born... from chaos... Tracing...
Stepping into this place without knowing anything... An endless loop that is more painful than death awaits you.
Stop right now! Don't move any further!
Once trapped in the wrong time rift, you will be lost inside forever.
This is not the destination you are looking for.
When something beyond your comprehension appears, you may have a hard time understanding it completely.
But at times like this, everything in front of you is an aggregation of your knowledge.
Do not believe all that you see, trust your instincts.

Name: Lee
Text: What I see may not be real...

Name: Lee
Text: Perhaps the real path cannot be simply observed.

Name: Lee
Text: Just like I thought... The real path is over there.

Name: Lee
Text: "Trust your instincts"...

Name: Lee
Text: I never trust that unfounded theory, but it did give me a hint.

Name: Lee
Text: "Observation is determined by theories." Different observation devices will "see" different things.

Name: Lee
Text: Abnormal gravity... The physical laws here are inverted compared with other places.

Name: Lee
Text: The shortcut is blocked... I need to update the map when I'm back.

Name: Lee
Text: I should go up first.

Name: Lee
Text: Tsk. I knew there would be Corrupted.

Name: Lee
Text: Let's do this fast.

Name: Lee
Text: Where am I now...

Name: Lee
Text: Relocating the coordinates.

Name: Lee
Text: Found it.

Name: Lee
Text: A high level of Corrupted reaction is detected ahead.

Name: Lee
Text: Is this a... distress signal?

Name: Lee
Text: How can there be an ally signal in this area?

Name: Construct
Text: This code... You're one of the Gray Raven?

Name: Construct
Text: This is a... Joint Combat Squad. We need help!

Name: Lee
Text: Why are you here? This isn't a joint-combat mission area.

Name: Construct
Text: My teammate was lost after his positioning system was interfered with by Corrupted attacks. I'm here to look for him!

Name: Construct
Text: My combat module was affected by the probe... I need more time to reboot... Ugh...

Name: Lee
Text: ...He's surrounded by Corrupted. Let me drive the vehicle!

Name: Construct
Text: Thanks...!

Name: Lee
Text: I'll take care of the Corrupted. You go save him!

Name: Construct
Text: Got it!

Name: Construct
Text: A large number of Corrupted are heading this way!

Name: Lee
Text: Take the wounded with you. Leave this place!

Name: Lee
Text: I'll cover you.

Name: Construct
Text: Combat module reboot complete. I'll help you!

Name: Lee
Text: Obstacles ahead. Brace yourselves! Maintain balance!

Name: Construct
Text: The Corrupted signal has disappeared...

Name: Construct
Text: Your assistance is greatly appreciated!

Name: Construct
Text: Speaking of which, are you also heading to the temporary HQ?

Name: Lee
Text: (This is the location shown by the coordinates...)

Name: Lee
Text: (I need to leave first.)

Name: Lee
Text: This isn't my M.I.N.D... Dammit, the contamination level is higher than I thought...

Name: Tifa
Text: I didn't expect you to still keep your sanity...

Name: Tifa
Text: You will be trapped here forever!

Name: Lee
Text: I have no time to play with you.

Name: Tifa
Text: If I could have mastered this power earlier... would my commandant still be alive?

Name: Tifa
Text: We were meant to witness the dawn together. But when Commandant died, my world fell into an eternal night.

Name: Tifa
Text: I killed... my teammates... Why?

Name: Tifa
Text: Did I hurt them a lot?

Name: Tifa
Text: Sorry... I'm so sorry...

Name: Tifa
