Text: Now it's your turn to feel it... Getting your heart pierced by the thorns...!

Name: Lee
Text: Her consciousness is getting messed up...

Name: Tifa
Text: Why struggle? You have your commandant too, don't you?

Name: Tifa
Text: Instead of watching your commandant die, why don't you accept the gift of Ascension-Network like me...

Name: Lee
Text: ...I'll never let that happen!

Name: Tifa
Text: How... naive.

Name: Tifa
Text: I will wait... to witness the day when you fall into despair.

Name: Tifa
Text: Commandant... Commandant...

Name: Lee
Text: ...The tower's environment has changed again.

Name: Lee
Text: The barrier is just a false illusion created by my own perception... Guess I won't be able to go past it in regular ways.

Name: Lee
Text: This structure... looks somewhat familiar.

Name: Lee
Text: Ever since I came here, I seem to be able to understand the "language" of crystals.

Name: Lee
Text: But I still need the corresponding "codes" to decipher this language.

Name: Lee
Text: Did I see something similar elsewhere?

Name: Lee
Text: This isn't ending any time soon...

Name: Lee
Text: The information available isn't going to deactivate the barrier... Seems I won't find the answer here.

Name: Lee
Text: ...I know what to do now.

Name: Lee
Text: ...I created a hidden command that allowed me to reverse hack into Tifa's control plugs.

Name: Lee
Text: They are all based on the same theory. If I use a similar method, I can reverse the laws of this "barrier" to make it a path instead.

Name: Lee
Text: The decryption program has a physical form in this space... Impressive.

Name: Lee
Text: It's quite rough, but more than enough.

Name: Lee
Text: This abnormal gravity feels just like the last time. This must be the real exit that leads to the area above.

Name: Vera
Text: You take care of this side, No. 21. Leave the other side to me.

Name: Vera
Text: Be thorough.

Name: No. 21
Text: Copy that.

Name: Vera
Text: No. 21, keep your eyes on your area.

Name: No. 21
Text: Okay.

Name: No. 21
Text: Did anything strange happen here?

Name: Construct
Text: Someone said they saw a monster near this tent.

Name: Construct
Text: But I can't seem to find anything.

Name: No. 21
Text: I see.

Name: Construct
Text: It could also be a false alarm.

Name: Construct
Text: Better keep looking.

Name: No. 21
Text: Evacuate. This place, not safe.

Name: Refugee
Text: We just need a little more time.

Name: Refugee
Text: Our friend is sick. We left in a rush and forgot to take the medicine just now.

Name: Refugee
Text: Don't worry! We will be right there once we find it!

Name: Refugee
Text: ...Here! Found it!

Name: Refugee
Text: Two bottles? Just take both.

Name: No. 21
Text: Sniff.

Name: No. 21
Text: Here it is.

Name: No. 21
Text: It's the same trace as before.

Name: No. 21
Text: But it seems new.

Name: No. 21
Text: ...It's heading that way.

Name: No. 21
Text: Why are you still here? Run!

Name: Child
Text: Aaargh—

Name: No. 21
Text: New enemies?

Name: No. 21
Text: Did I miss them just now?

Name: No. 21
Text: ...I will go back and double check. Be thorough, Captain said.

Name: Child
Text: I-I forgot to say this... Thank you!

Name: Construct
Text: Back-backup!

Name: Construct
Text: I can't believe we left out some enemies just now.

Name: Construct
Text: They suddenly jumped out from behind the tent. I was freaking out.

Name: Construct
Text: Fortunately... Um, thanks... I'll just continue investigating.

Name: No. 21
Text: Oh.

Name: No. 21
Text: No. 21, thoroughly investigated the scene.

Name: No. 21
Text: Next, report to Captain.

Name: No. 21
Text: Captain, No. 21, task complete.

Name: Vera
Text: Found anything?

Name: No. 21
Text: No. 21 found—

Name: Refugee
Text: M-monster! Help!

Name: Refugee
Text: There are still monsters in the base!

Name: Vera
Text: ...Save the report for later, No. 21. Stop them first!

Name: No. 21
Text: Okay!

Name: Vera
Text: It's worse than I thought.

Name: Vera
Text: You two, go back and bring the transport craft here, along with the medical supplies inside.

Name: Construct
Text: Roger!

Name: Construct
Text: Roger!

Name: Vera
Text: Have you finished, No. 21? How was it?

Name: No. 21
Text: Not yet.

Name: Child
Text: Ugh... (Weeping)

Name: No. 21
Text: A kid? Still here?

Name: No. 21
Text: You are safe. Leave this place. Go to Salans.

Name: Child
Text: Wah—that was so scary—sob—

Name: Lilin
Text: Look here!

Name: Vera
Text: I said stay close to us... Will you?

Name: Lilin
Text: But I saw something... Fine.

Name: No. 21
Text: ...These footprints are new.

Name: Vera
Text: Alright, shorty. Tell me what you think.

Name: Lilin
Text: Look at the heel of this footprint. It's missing a piece. It looks like Auntie Vane's.

Name: Vera
Text: What do you mean?

Name: Lilin
Text: She lives close to me, so we talk every day.

Name: Lilin
Text: Yesterday, she complained about the cracked sole of her shoe. She didn't have time to get it fixed.

Name: Vera
Text: Weird... Why only footprints from one foot?

Name: No. 21
Text: The footprints are getting messy from here.

Name: Vera
Text: Did she bump into Hetero-Creatures here?

Name: Vera
Text: But why would she run so far all by herself?

Name: Vera
Text: Let's keep going.

Name: Vera
Text: Salans was right. You know your conservation area very well.

Name: Lilin
Text: O-of course! I'm not like that cold-blooded one.

Name: Lilin
Text: Everybody is nice to me. Of course I should help them back!

Name: Lilin
Text: I just don't understand her. She took all the help for granted and still remained so distant...

Name: Lilin
Text: That's why I want to find everybody. I don't want to see their tears.

Name: Vera
Text: ...Just a reminder that I can't promise you will find them.

Name: No. 21
Text: Captain! There's something in front!

Name: Vera
Text: A... flower? Never seen this kind before. Have you, shorty?

Name: Lilin
Text: No. Never.

Name: Lilin
Text: Wait a sec... This is not right. We didn't walk that far, but these trees... They look nothing like what I remember!

Name: Vera
Text: Stay calm!

Name: No. 21
Text: Eww... The smell makes me uncomfortable.

Name: Vera
Text: Something's coming, No. 21! Hide yourself, shorty!

Name: Vera
Text: ...An earthquake?

Name: Lilin
Text: Whoa! The ground is shaking! What's going on?!

Name: No. 21
Text: Um... Ugh!

Name: No. 21
Text: Um... I don't know what's going on. My head hurts. A lot.

Name: Vera
Text: (Is it because of the restraint? Or...)

Name: Vera
Text: Here we are again... Won't you just go home to your mommy?

Name: Vera
Text: Can you still fight, No. 21? Take caution!

Name: No. 21
Text: Understood...

Name: Lilin
Text: I-I'll just hide myself!

Name: No. 21
Text: Phew... It doesn't hurt anymore.

Name: Lilin
Text: Are you alright?

Name: Lilin
Text: Gargh! Leave me alone!

Name: Vera
Text: Tsk. Don't just stand there, shorty! Run!

Name: Vera
Text: Protect him, No. 21! Get away!

Name: No. 21
Text: Okay!

Name: Lilin
Text: W-wait... I'm gassing out...

Name: Vera
Text: Keep up!

Name: No. 21
Text: Enemies ahead!

Name: No. 21
Text: All clear around here.

Name: Vera
Text: Let's rest up for now.

Name: Vera
Text: What happened to your face, shorty? You alright?

Name: Lilin
Text: I think so... The weird leaves scratched my face when I was on the run.

Name: Lilin
Text: Gargh! Leave me alone!

Name: Lilin
Text: Ouch!

Name: Vera
Text: Let me take a look.

Name: Vera
Text: ...Take this. Use it to clean your wound first.

Name: Vera
Text: I'll send you back just to be safe.

Name: Lilin
Text: No, don't! We already found the clue. I only need to...

Name: Vera
Text: The injury is too risky for you.

Name: Lilin
Text: But it's just a tiny scratch!

Name: Vera
Text: ...And you must listen to me.

Name: Lilin
Text: Hmph.

Name: Vera
Text: Do you know the forest here?

Name: Lilin
Text: From there onward, it's nothing like what I remember.

Name: No. 21
Text: ...I can hear footsteps. The enemies are coming.

Name: Vera
Text: Tsk. Can't they just give us a break?

Name: No. 21
Text: They are getting tougher. I can't tear them apart easily.

Name: Vera
Text: Indeed. I feel that too.

Name: Vera
Text: Better get someone to pick us up.

Name: System
Text: Initiating comms.

Name: System
Text: Bzzzz—bzzzz—

Name: Vera
Text: Hello? Vera here. Base, do you copy?

Name: Vera
Text: Can anyone hear me? I need someone to pick us up.

Name: System
Text: Bzzzz—bzzzz—

Name: Vera
Text: Tsk. What's going on?

Name: No. 21
Text: ...Hey, you.

Name: Lilin
Text: Hehe... I-I think I just saw them!

Name: Lilin
Text: Don't go! Come back! Saran, wait for me!

Name: Vera
Text: Hey!

Name: No. 21
Text: His smell is getting strange.

Name: Vera
Text: ...Follow him!

Name: No. 21
Text: Got it!

Name: Lilin
Text: Hehe... I-I think I just saw them!

Name: Lilin
Text: Here! Someone's here!

Name: No. 21
Text: I can't see his face.

Name: Vera
Text: Come back, shorty. Don't touch him.

Name: Vera
Text: It's badly damaged... Can you tell who this is?

Name: Lilin
Text: It might be... No... I-I'm not sure...

Name: Lilin
Text: If only I can go closer and check...

Name: Vera
Text: It's too dangerous. Let's get away from those things first.

Name: Vera
Text: Wait. Shorty is getting strange all of a sudden...

Name: Vera
Text: That corpse might be able to tell us something.

Name: Vera
Text: Let's split up! You go check it and come back to me!

Name: No. 21
Text: Hmm? The body, disappeared.

Name: No. 21
Text: ...The traces.

Name: No. 21
Text: You? Did you eat the body? Or...

Name: Hanying
Text: Yoyo... And the Nighter. Is this another dream?

Name: Hanying
Text: No, she isn't the real Yoyo. This isn't the real Nighter either.

Name: Hanying
Text: But why were there two strange butterflies around Yoyo...?

Name: Hanying
Text: The butterfly... has appeared again.

Name: Hanying
Text: If the butterfly is related to Yoyo... It could also be the key to leaving this place.

Name: Hanying
Text: Another butterfly...

Name: Hanying
Text: It seems the "butterfly" in this dream is related to Yoyo indeed.

Name: Hanying
Text: But even the Yoyo here is nothing but an illusion.

Name: Hanying
Text: Is this the world behind the Gate? The environment feels completely different from just now.

Name: Hanying
Text: Just like I thought, this place isn't real either.

Name: Hanying
Text: But why do I see another gate here?

Name: Hanying
Text: And it just happens to be the same gate I saw in the mountain...

Name: Hanying
Text: Maybe the answer is just behind it.
You chose to push the gate open in the end.
You seem to be ready.

Name: Hanying
Text: It's a tree...

Name: Hanying
Text: There seems to be someone under the tree, but the fog is too thick.

Name: Hanying
Text: Yoyo!

Name: Hanying
Text: Was she brought here by the hackers?! Yoyo! Can you hear me?

Name: Hanying
Text: Hmm? Is she asleep?

Name: Hanying
Text: Good... At least she is okay.

Name: Hanying
Text: Wait for me, Yoyo. I'll take you out of here.

Name: Lee
Text: Current location... Market. It's full of people. And the roads are...

Name: Commandant
Text: Lee, do you copy? The roads are complicated. I'll send you a general route. Let's stay connected.

Name: Lee
Text: Copy.

Name: Commandant
Text: Lee, I'll guide you from here. Let's find them together.

Name: Commandant
Text: Move to the road on your right. That's right. At 3 o'clock.

Name: Commandant
Text: Lee. It's the opposite direction. You need to go into the market.

Name: Commandant
Text: Direction correct.

Name: Commandant
Text: Now the general direction is on your left.

Name: Commandant
Text: You are very close to it!

Name: Commandant
Text: Signal activity at the stall on your left.

Name: Commandant
Text: Lee! Move to your right!

Name: Commandant
Text: Direction correct! Keep moving!

Name: Commandant
Text: You're moving further away from the target area, Lee. You have to turn around.

Name: Commandant
Text: Wrong direction. You are reaching the exit of the camp!

Name: Commandant
Text: Keep going and you'll go back to where you were earlier!

Name: Commandant
Text: That's the way out of the camp! Lee, go back into the camp!

Name: Commandant
Text: That's right. Keep going!

Name: Commandant
Text: Now you're at a relatively broad area. You can take over from here and find your way with your scanner.

Name: Commandant
Text: It's the remnant data from the bolts we are tracking.

Name: Lee
Text: Activity area found. Immediately perform data simulation.

Name: Staff Robot - A01
Text: Sorry. We are replenishing items in the shop. Please come back later!

Name: Lee
Text: The next step is to track the signal.

Name: Commandant
Text: This is where one of the bolts is hidden.

Name: Lee
Text: Now we have two left.

Name: Commandant
Text: Keep scanning for new clues!

Name: Lee
Text: Target is in the shop. We can't get it directly.

Name: Commandant
Text: Looks like it's the prize for a quiz in the shop... It's gonna take some effort.

Name: Lee
Text: You've got one of my parts in your prize box. Can I have it back?

Name: Event Quiz Robot - B01
Text: No, no. Only the winner gets the prize!

Name: Commandant
Text: Looks like we have to beat the quiz. I believe you can nail it!

Name: Event Quiz Robot - B01
Text: Select the item(s) that can represent the Valentine's Day for me!

Name: Lee
Text: Many festivals involve fireworks, including today.

Name: Lee
Text: I saw many couples giving each other chocolate on my way here. It should be right.

Name: Event Quiz Robot - B01
Text: Actually, we don't necessarily set off fireworks on Valentine's Day, but your answer makes sense, so I'll let you have the prize!

Name: Event Quiz Robot - B01
Text: Correct! It's chocolate! Here is your prize!

Name: Lee
Text: Now we just need to find the last one.

Name: Lee
Text: Commandant, target locked!

Name: Commandant
Text: Dead end.

Name: Popcorn Robot - C04
Text: Please note that only dry materials can be put into the popcorn cooker.

Name: Lucia
Text: Understood.

Name: Lucia
Text: A machine out of control! It seems it's the security robot of the broken-down warehouse.

Name: Lucia
Text: My spices?! Stop!!!

Name: Lucia
Text: Excuse me, do you have ingredients to cook popcorn?

Name: Staff Robot - D434
Text: We have a fixed spice set. Not sure if it can be used to make popcorn.

Name: Lucia
Text: I'll have one if it's dry.

Name: Staff Robot - D434
Text: Pepper, cumin powder, curry powder... All packed! Thank you for your purchase!

Name: Lucia
Text: Let's go and get the other ingredients!

Name: Lucia
Text: Done! Now it's time to go back and make popcorn!

Name: Lucia
Text: Excuse me, do you have any ingredients left?

Name: Staff Robot - A01
Text: We have some in the warehouse, but we can't transport them here due to the system error of the security robot there. The repairer is still on the way.

Name: Lucia
Text: I don't have time. Let me handle it for you. It'll be faster.

Name: Staff Robot - A01
Text: Great! I'll let you pick one of the ingredients after the replenishment as a reward.

Name: Staff Robot - A01
Text: You helped us eliminate the malfunctioning security robot! Thank you so much!

Name: Staff Robot - A01
Text: Please take these dried tomatoes. They are precious goods from the Conservation Area. Just add a bit to your food and the flavor will be doubled!

Name: Staff Robot - T65
Text: Welcome!

Name: Lucia
Text: Please give me some sugar!

Name: Staff Robot - T65
Text: Thank you for your purchase!

Name: Lucia
Text: I've got the ingredients.

Name: Popcorn Robot - C04
Text: Now you can use the cooker!

Name: Commandant
Text: Let's get started!

Name: Pulao
Text: Activate the mechanism and complete the challenge before time runs out.

Name: Pulao
Text: Step on the square to activate the mechanism and summon statues. You will succeed when the two statues in front and behind are the same.

Name: Pulao
Text: There are four pairs of statues. Activate them to earn points. Complete all of them to clear the stage.

Name: Tips
Text: The original blue walls will go down after each block is surrounded by rising walls for a while.

Name: Tips
Text: The red walls will not go down after the blocks are surrounded.

Name: Tips
Text: The red floors will not rise after the character passes.

Name: Kurono Construct
Text: Damn Ascendant... What's he doing here?!

Name: Roland
Text: Hmph... What a boring cliche.

Name: Roland
Text: Ascendants come to unleash destruction. What are you expecting? A birthday card?

Name: Roland
Text: Unfortunately... this is not the climax. At best, it's merely the prologue to the prologue!

Name: Roland
Text: Huh? Someone's down already? I didn't even open fire.

Name: Roland
Text: Is the theater crew out of funds?

Name: Roland
Text: Looks like a party up ahead. Why didn't I get invited?

Name: Roland
Text: Looks like I underestimated you.

Name: Roland
Text: It's hard for an actor to get excited about such a boring play.

Name: Roland
Text: Maybe I should meet this "cohort."

Name: Construct Captain
Text: Halt! Don't come any closer, Ascendant!

Name: Roland
Text: Hmph. Taking your dog for a walk I see.

Name: Construct Captain
Text: Tsk... It feels like we've been surrounded... Everyone, take care of the man in front first!

Name: Roland
Text: Think I can be so easily trifled with...? That won't do. How can a "knight" tolerate being understimated?

Name: Roland
Text: Looks like all the "performers" are finally here.

Name: Roland
Text: In this case, I need to break a sweat as well.

Name: Guard Captain
Text: He's an Ascendant all right. This power... Quit playing dead, and help me!

Name: α
Text: ...Quit playing around, Roland.

Name: Roland
Text: Ugh... I'm merely respecting my basic role as an actor.

Name: Roland
Text: But there's no gold to be found in this sort of foreplay. Perhaps, it's best left to "Deus Ex Machina".

Name: Roland
Text: Wave after wave...

Name: Construct
Text: Don't let the Ascendant get to the ship! We need to stop him at all costs!

Name: Roland
Text: Such pedestrian battles... Only serving to put the audience to sleep in their seats!

Name: Guard Captain
Text: Launch site is under invasion... I leave you all to your duties.

Name: Guard Captain
Text: Design Dialog

Name: Guard Captain
Text: Design Dialog

Name: Roland
Text: Phew... I think I broke a little sweat.

Name: Roland
Text: It's just the prologue... But it feels too long-winded.

Name: Roland
Text: Hah... What a truly unexpected guest.

Name: Roland
Text: What brought you here, Alpha?

Name: α
Text: Looks like you are getting along with your new comrade, Roland.

Name: Voodoo
Text: About time you showed up, Roland!

Name: Voodoo
Text: Our plan's up. That woman's been following.

Name: α
Text: I advise you not to act rashly, Roland... Once she's taken care of, you're next.

Name: α
Text: Whoever betrays Luna... is not long for this world.

Name: Roland
Text: Wow. The "Gods" sure are gracious.

Name: Roland
Text: This saves unnecessary trouble.

Name: Karenina
Text: Testing... Testing. Check 1, 2 ,3... Okay. Looks like everything is in working order. Should I start the recording?

Name: Karenina
Text: Voice command input...Ahem—start video recording and searching for an appropriate location.

Name: Karenina
Text: Wait! That's too far! Come a little closer!

Name: Karenina
Text: Stop! That's good enough. Ugh... Why is this AI so stupid...?

Name: Karenina
Text: Activate battle simulation. Select difficulty... Level 1. I need to warm up first.

Name: Yarha
Text: Um... Karenina, we need to test the frame under different pressure conditions in stages here.

Name: Yarha
Text: I'll assist you with remote debugging. If you are ready, just give me a shout.

Name: Karenina
Text: Okay, then. Frame energy set to... stage 1.

Name: Karenina
Text: Food should be eaten one bite at a time. Pesky fishies should be taken care of one wave at a time.

Name: Karenina
Text: Let's start with basic performance.

Name: Karenina
Text: Not bad! Not bad! Frame energy set to... stage 2!

Name: Karenina
Text: Now we're gettin' the ball rolling. Unlocking stage 3!

Name: Karenina
Text: Phew... Not bad for a warm-up.

Name: Karenina
Text: I knew there were going to be some hiccups during the design phase...

Name: Karenina
Text: But I wasn't expecting debugging to go so well the first time.

Name: Karenina
Text: Looks like we need to strike while the iron's hot... Come here, drone.

Name: Karenina
Text: (Whistles) Time to try out this frame's new powers.

Name: Karenina
Text: Hmm... The manual debugging interface is in...

Name: Karenina
Text: Found it! Test system upgraded. Overclocking Mode enabled. Combat intensity... Maximum!

Name: Karenina
Text: Setting frame energy to... stage 4!

Name: Karenina
Text: Time to give you guys a show! Stage restriction lifted! FULL POWER STRIKE!

Name: Yarha
Text: Karenina! WAIT! Using such a powerful move in an area like this will—!

Name: Karenina
Text: What? I can't hear you. Y'know, the wind is blowing too strong here!

Name: Karenina
Text: Oh... I kind of went overboard...

Name: Karenina
Text: At least the test was completed, and the recording should've been uploaded as well.

Name: Karenina
Text: All right, all right, I promise I'll fix you once I've got time.

Name: Karenina
Text: I wanna get back ASAP...

Name: Karenina
Text: But this place is way more lively than I expected.

Name: Karenina
Text: Anyone able to tell me how to counter these things? If not, I'll just do whatever.

Name: Karenina
Text: I can't go on like this. I need to find a way to take them down at once...

Name: Karenina
Text: Oh, right! Almost forgot! Drone, authorize access to the facility's gravitation system. Execute immediately.

Name: Karenina
Text: Just a little more! Drone! Hurry!

Name: Karenina
Text: Sorry to keep you waiting. I'm in a hurry. Let's all go together!

Name: Karenina
Text: Phew... Problems solved.

Name: Karenina
Text: Now straight to the Construct research lab!

Name: Roland
Text: I don't even have time to enjoy the monologue. Such an inconsiderate group of visitors...

Name: Roland
Text: Don't you know that one who dares defile the stage will be dragged out of the auditorium?

Name: Roland
Text: Red Tide bubbles generated in a vacuum... Interesting, but for the cleaners, this would be a terrible problem.

Name: Roland
Text: What a mess! How am I supposed to clean up like this.

Name: Roland
Text: However, perhaps this is an opportunity to try out Vonnegut's "gift."

Name: Roland
Text: It seems to be reacting to those corrupted with the Punishing Virus now.

Name: Roland
Text: Come one! Come all! A "surprise" adventure awaits!

Name: Roland
Text: You can do it, buddy. I hope your appetite is big enough to eat all this "junk."

Name: Roland
Text: Hmm... Looks the same even after absorbing so much!

Name: Roland
Text: I'm surprised Vonnegut could part with such a "precious gift."

Name: Roland
Text: Time for this secret weapon to take to the stage.

Name: Roland
Text: Feasting on one's kin... This such be an interesting show.

Name: Roland
Text: Next up! I can finally welcome our "little princess" with peace of mind.

Name: Karenina
Text: Find the source of the corruption ASAP.

Name: Karenina
Text: ****! I'm just an engineer. What else do you want from me?

Name: Karenina
Text: ****! It's going to take more than just blunt force to break it!

Name: Karenina
Text: Hmph... Improved security measures? Damn those Kurono!

Name: Karenina
Text: No time for an operation demo!

Name: Karenina
Text: Better give me a brief...

Name: System Tip
Text: Current <color=#FF9900>indicator</color> represents artificial gravity enabled.

Name: System Tip
Text: <color=#FF9900>Light</color> indicates <color=#FF9900>direction</color> of artificial gravity upon activation.

Name: System Tip
Text: Each cabin has a unique <color=#00FFFF>movement indicator</color>

Name: System Tip
Text: The main operating compartment of this system is the <color=#00FFFF>cabin</color>

Name: System Tip
Text: This system can be operated to adjust the cabin position.

Name: System Tip
Text: When the cabin's <color=#00FFFF>movement indicator</color> is consistent with the <color=#FF9900>artificial gravity direction</color>,

Name: System Tip
Text: the <color=#FF0000>movement indicator</color> will illuminate. At which point, the cabin can be used.

Name: System Tip
Text: Once complete, you can enter the cabin.

Name: System Tip
Text: If you wish to use the <color=#FF0000>aisle cabin</color> to leave this area,

Name: System Tip
Text: You must activate authentication for the remaining four cabins.

Name: Karenina
Text: Activate the four cabins and begin startup authorization in sequence...

Name: Karenina
Text: Why does the gravitation system still need to be manually restored? What a pain...

Name: Karenina
Text: Tch... Whistle if there's anyone else still alive!

Name: Karenina
Text: What's going on? Another malfunction?

Name: Karenina
Text: Is the gravity module misaligned? Then I'll just brute force it!

Name: Karenina
Text: Damn Kurono... They've hidden heavy weapons here, too?

Name: Karenina
Text: Hat trick. Hmph, piece of cake.

Name: Karenina
Text: Warm-up's over. Time to deal with the real hassle.

Name: Kurono Construct
Text: Stop! Don't arbitrarily change the parameters of the device without approval!

Name: Karenina
Text: Get out of my way!

Name: Kurono Construct
Text: According to the schedule, you no longer have permission to access the reactor. If you know what's best for you, leave here as soon as possible.

Name: Karenina
Text: There's a power issue with the zero-point reactor. If I don't fix it in time, are you willing to accept responsibility if something goes wrong? Huh, genius?

Name: Karenina
Text: The most important thing now is to restore power to the reactor. If you have any objections, go find Yarha.

Name: Kurono Construct
Text: Hmph... Engineering Force grunt. Don't get all high-and-mighty on me.

Name: Karenina
Text: Tch... You Kurono just make things worse.

Name: Kurono Construct
Text: Weapons down and hands up! Step away from the control panel!

Name: Kurono Construct
Text: You aren't authorized to be here. You don't want to violate our agreement, do you?!

Name: Karenina
Text: Who has time for authorization at a time like this?!

Name: Karenina
Text: Our agreement clearly states that in an emergency, I have the right to conduct temporary inspections of the zero-point reactor.

Name: Karenina
Text: If you're looking for a fight, I'm not one to be messed with! But at least it gives me a chance to test out my frame! Get a load of this!

Name: Karenina
Text: Psh... Something's wrong with the data. It's deviated too far from the presets...

Name: Karenina
Text: We'll be in a load of trouble if there's a critical issue... No, I need to check the reactor core again.

Name: Kurono Construct Captain
Text: Karenina! Stop what you're doing immediately! Keep resisting, and we'll shoot you on the spot!

Name: Karenina
Text: Dammit! Enough with the Kurono scare tactics!

Name: Karenina
Text: The zero-point reactor is humanity's hope... I won't let it be destroyed!

Name: Karenina
Text: Just try and stop me!

Name: Karenina
Text: Corrupted Construct?! What's going on?! Why are there signs of the Punishing Virus here?!

Name: Karenina
Text: No response...?! Was it Kurono?! I need to check...

Name: Karenina
Text: Dammit! This isn't good... The Punishing Virus concentration is on the rise... The mechanoids are already starting to be corrupted.

Name: Karenina
Text: Spare Jitterbombs? I remember there being a bunch in storage. It can't be...

Name: Karenina
Text: I can stay longer in the air with each jump thanks to the Moon's low gravity.

Name: Karenina
Text: I can jump up and slam down on the enemies.

Name: Karenina
Text: Down below is a dead end... I need to go from up top.
Luna... Luna...
Luna... Is that my name?

Name: Lucia
Text: Stay close. Don't leave my side.

Name: Luna
Text: Sister... Yes... You're my sister.

Name: Lucia
Text: I'll... protect you, Luna! I promise!

Name: Lucia
Text: Hide! Hurry!

Name: Lucia
Text: I won't let those monsters hurt you!

Name: Luna
Text: Lucia...

Name: Lucia
Text: Luna... Are you okay...?

Name: Lucia
Text: Don't worry. It's okay... We just... need to rest a bit...

Name: Lucia
Text: I just need to become a Construct... Then we can go to Babylonia together...

Name: Lucia
Text: You'll be just like before... Always... Always...

Name: Luna
Text: Enough... That's enough! You don't need to keep fighting like this...

Name: Luna
Text: Lucia... Sis...

Name: Luna
Text: Can I do anything to help you...?

Name: Luna
Text: Was it a success? I can... protect you now, Sis.

Name: Nikola
Text: Sorry. This is our only choice.

Name: Collins
Text: Hurry! Eliminate the Corrupted and potential threats!

Name: Noise
Text: Humans... Accept filtering... Cannot escape... Cannot survive...

Name: Noise
Text: Despicable... Humans... Betray all... Sacrifice all...

Name: Noise
Text: Luna... You've already... Lucia... You'll... never... see her again.

Name: Noise
Text: Destroy... Humans... Destroy... Humanity...

Name: Noise
Text: Ascendants... Evolve... Pinnacle... Reborn...

Name: Roland
Text: Luna, allow me to accompany you.

Name: Gabriel
Text: Miss Luna, you are the chosen agent of the Ascension-Network. For that, I will give everything.

Name: Lucia (?)
Text: Luna...

Name: Lucia (?)
Text: What do you need me to do?

Name: Luna
Text: Lucia... You...

Name: Gabriel
Text: Miss Luna, please leave for the sake of the Ascension-Network!

Name: Luna
Text: We're done?

Name: Luna
Text: Let's end it here. All of this... is meaningless.

Name: Luna
Text: There's quite the commotion outside...

Name: Luna
Text: I... will stay here...

Name: System
Text: WARNING! Experiment error.

Name: System
Text: WARNING! Structural integrity compromised. Please seal the following areas...

Name: System
Text: WARNING! Experiment functionality has fallen to 80%...

Name: System
Text: WARNING! No vital signs detected. Please restart...

Name: System
Text: WARNING! Experiment vitals...

Name: System
Text: WARNING! Bzzzz...

Name: System
Text: Bzzzz—

Name: System
Text: Bzzzz—
Luna...

Name: Luna
Text: Your voice, Sis... Is this my last memory?

Name: Luna
Text: Heh... Is this really all that's left of my memory?

Name: Luna
Text: Lucia!

Name: Lucia
Text: Lee, like usual, I attack, and you cover me.

Name: Lee
Text: Understood. Liv will support us from behind.

Name: Liv
Text: Leave this to me... It has been a long time since we fought together last time.

Name: Lucia
Text: Yeah. Although it's not something worth celebrating... it's nice to fight with you and the commandant.

Name: Lee
Text: You two still remember the collaboration tactics, right? Then, let's go!

Name: Purifying Force - Jha
Text: Gray Raven... No wonder you are the elite squad.

Name: Lee
Text: Hmph... You Purifying Force don't even know how to say "thank you"?

Name: Liv
Text: Lee!

Name: Lucia
Text: Never mind... Let's fight together.

Name: Lee
Text: So this is their boss...? Typically disgusting.

Name: Liv
Text: Watch out!

Name: Purifying Force - Jha
Text: Um... Don't worry. It's just a scratch.

Name: Lucia
Text: Defeat him, and then we can split up and take care of the other enemies.

Name: Liv
Text: Don't worry. I'm Liv, from Gray Raven. I'll escort you to the eastern positions.

Name: Refugee Man
Text: Thank you, girl. We will make ourselves useful!

Name: Liv
Text: There may be battles on the way, but I'll protect you!

Name: Refugee Man
Text: Don't worry. Our belief is that everyone should protect themselves.

Name: Refugee Boy
Text: I can fight as well!

Name: Liv
Text: Okay, but don't force yourself. Make sure to let me know if you get hurt.

Name: Liv
Text: It's getting foggy. This way, everyone!

Name: Liv
Text: ...Where's everyone gone?

Name: Liv
Text: (These illusions... Are the Hetero-Creatures using the Punishing Virus to affect my frame's sense modules?)

Name: Liv
Text: But the problem should be solved if I can defeat all these Hetero-Creatures.

Name: Refugee Boy
Text: Wahhhhhhh!

Name: Liv
Text: Is everyone okay?

Name: Refugee Woman
Text: Yeah. Everyone's fine. Nobody's hurt.

Name: Liv
Text: Great... Please stick close to me!

Name: Refugee Man
Text: The dock is ahead of us! There is a ship waiting for us!

Name: Rosetta
Text: Liv, get everyone on the ship! We are about to set off!

Name: Liv
Text: Got it—Watch out!

Name: Tips
Text: Swipe up/down or press the arrow buttons to switch tracks!

Name: Tips
Text: Do this to avoid obstacles!

Name: Tips
Text: Give it a try!

Name: Tips
Text: Press Leap to jump over obstacles!

Name: Tips
Text: Try to leap over the wood post!

Name: Tips
Text: Press Slide to avoid some obstacles!

Name: Tips
Text: Try to slide under the fence!

Name: Tips
Text: Collect rewards to gain points!

Name: Tips
Text: The race is full of various obstacles and rewards!

Name: Tips
Text: Collect as many points and run as far as possible!

Name: Tips
Text: This is a tip in the top left corner

Name: Tips
Text: This is a tip in the bottom middle 1

Name: Tips
Text: This is a tip in the bottom middle 2

Name: Tips
Text: This is a tip in the top left corner for 3s

Name: Tips
Text: This is a tip in the bottom middle for 3s

Name: Tips
Text: This is a simple choice.

Name: Tips
Text: This is a 3-second chat box

Name: Tips
Text: This is a chat box that lasts a long time

Name: Celica
Text: Use the <color=#ff5656>joystick</color> to move around and head to the destination.

Name: Celica
Text: Here comes an enemy. Tap <color=#ffda58>Basic Attack</color> to attack.

Name: Celica
Text: Great! Enemy defeated! Now let's move on to the <color=#ff5656>[Skill Orb]</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap the <color=#ff5656>[Skill Orb]</color> to cast the exclusive skill.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#ff5656>[Skill Orbs]</color> of different colors grant different exclusive skill effects.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap adjacent <color=#ff5656>[Skill Orbs]</color> of the same color to trigger a [2-Ping] or a [3-Ping], which will then enhance the skill effect.

Name: Celica
Text: You have completed the basic tutorial. Now try out what you have learned. Move to the mark to exit the tutorial.

Name: Celica
Text: In this tutorial, we're going to talk about dodge.

Name: Celica
Text: You can dodge to avoid attacks from the enemy.

Name: Celica
Text: Upon a successful dodge, the character will enter Matrix.

Name: Celica
Text: Let's give it a go.

Name: Celica
Text: Now! Tap the <color=#ffda58>[Dodge]</color> button!

Name: Celica
Text: You did it! The enemies are practically frozen to the player in the Matrix.

Name: Celica
Text: But remember that Matrix has a cooldown and can only be triggered once within a certain period of time.

Name: Celica
Text: Keep practicing with the enemy or move to the mark to exit the tutorial.

Name: Celica
Text: In this tutorial, we're going to talk about how to organize the <color=#ff5656>[Skill Orbs]</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: The <color=#ff5656>[Skill Orbs]</color> do not always appear in the desirable order.

Name: Celica
Text: In this case, we can ping orbs to form the <color=#ff5656>[Skill Orb]</color> combo we want.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap to ping the <color=#ff5656>Yellow</color> <color=#ff5656>[Skill Orb]</color> to form a Red [3-Ping] combo.

Name: Celica
Text: Good job! Let's continue.

Name: Celica
Text: Perform three [3-Pings] in the designated order.

Name: Celica
Text: See? You can maximize the effect of <color=#ff5656>[Skill Orbs]</color> via specific pings.

Name: Celica
Text: Next, I'll give you a series of <color=#ff5656>[Skill Orbs]</color> for you to practice.

Name: Celica
Text: Keep practicing or move to the mark to exit the tutorial.

Name: Celica
Text: The Core Passive is the special skill of each Construct.

Name: Celica
Text: Each Construct's Core Passive is triggered differently.

Name: Celica
Text: Try triggering it according to the Core Passive triggering method.

Name: Celica
Text: When you are done with practicing, move to the mark to exit the tutorial.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap to perform a <color=#33CCFF>Blue [Skill Orb]</color> 3-Ping.

Name: Celica
Text: After a character on the battlefield performs a [Skill Orb 3-Ping], their teammates of the same color can perform <color=#33CCFF>QTE Assistance</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#33CCFF>QTE Assistances</color> by teammates of different frame types provide different effects.

Name: Celica
Text: It's inevitable for characters to be injured in battle. Let's <color=#33CCFF>restore HP to them</color> via a <color=#33CCFF>QTE Assistance</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Perform a <color=##33CCFF>Blue [Skill Orb]</color> 3-Ping.

Name: Celica
Text: The <color=##33CCFF>Blue [Skill Orb]</color> 3-Ping triggers the <color=##33CCFF>QTE Assistance</color> of the character in the <color=##33CCFF>blue position</color>. Tap to cast!

Name: Celica
Text: Look, <color=##33CCFF>the characters' HP has been restored. A Support frame's QTE</color> can restore the <color=##33CCFF>HP</color> of all allied characters on the battlefield.

Name: Celica
Text: Now let's give it a go with another frame. But before that, try your hand by attacking this enemy first.

Name: Celica
Text: Attack the enemy before you.

Name: Celica
Text: Perfect. Now let's do a <color=#ef9a12>Yellow [Skill Orb]</color> 3-Ping.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap the <color=#ef9a12>Tank</color> ally frame's portrait.

Name: Celica
Text: Defeat the enemy before you.

Name: Celica
Text: See? <color=#ef9a12>A Tank frame's QTE</color> can <color=#ef9a12>reduce the enemy's DMG Resistance on hit</color> and enhance the team's attack efficiency.

Name: Celica
Text: But remember, <color=#ef9a12>all QTE Assistances have a cooldown</color>, so it's crucial to <color=#ff0000>trigger QTEs at the right time</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: You can learn more details in real combat.

Name: Celica
Text: The characters in your team can take turns to enter the battlefield.

Name: Celica
Text: Switching characters wisely is an important way to <color=#ff0000>maintain the team's DMG output efficiency</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Attack the enemy who will appear later and cast all the Skill Orbs as soon as possible.

Name: Celica
Text: Cast all the Skill Orbs of the character on the battlefield to maximize the damage output.

Name: Celica
Text: Switch to another character and keep fighting.

Name: Celica
Text: Keep casting Storm's Skill Orbs until they are used up and then focus on dealing DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: Now switch to Liv.

Name: Celica
Text: Keep it up. Don't stop.

Name: Celica
Text: Characters on standby have restores some Skill Orbs and can be deployed again.

Name: Celica
Text: Get familiar with the output cycle to improve the combat efficiency.

Name: Celica
Text: Move to the mark to exit the tutorial.

Name: Celica
Text: Move to the mark to exit the tutorial.

Name: Celica
Text: Congratulations! You now have the permissions to dispatch Uniframes!

Name: Celica
Text: Now let me explain the characteristics of the Uniframes to you.

Name: Celica
Text: See the Repairer before you? Try attacking it!

Name: Celica
Text: Attack the enemy before you.

Name: Celica
Text: Some enemies will have a red Finisher Gauge. Attack them to reduce the Finisher Gauge.

Name: Celica
Text: When the enemy's Finisher Gauge is 0, launch a Basic Attack to ignore their HP and execute the enemy directly.

Name: Celica
Text: Nice! But to perform the Finishing Move, you need to <color=#ff0000>unlock it</color> first. Otherwise, it will not be triggered.

Name: Celica
Text: After the tutorial, I will send you upgrade materials to help you activate the corresponding skill.

Name: Celica
Text: In addition to this, Uniframes also have their unique <color=#33CCFF>Speed Attack</color> and <color=#ee7d7c>Parry</color> abilities.

Name: Celica
Text: Now let's give it a try.

Name: Celica
Text: Launch any attack to <color=#ee7d7c>parry</color> the enemy's attack when applicable to interrupt them and reduce their Finisher Gauge.

Name: Celica
Text: Nice! Launch a <color=#33CCFF>Speed Attack</color> to greatly reduce the enemy's Finisher Gauge and make it easier to finish them.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#33CCFF>Speed Attack</color> needs to be unlocked through character upgrade. I'll send you some upgrade materials to help you unlock the feature.

Name: Celica
Text: Let's do a <color=#ef9a12>Yellow [Skill Orb]</color> 3-Ping first.

Name: Celica
Text: Then perform a <color=#33CCFF>Blue [Skill Orb]</color> 3-Ping.

Name: Celica
Text: From here we can see that Musashi didn't take too much DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: Now let's see how much DMG we can deal when we have a QTE Bonus.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap the <color=#33CCFF>Support</color> ally frame's portrait.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap the <color=#ef9a12>Tank</color> ally frame's portrait.

Name: Celica
Text: Let's do a <color=#ef9a12>Yellow [Skill Orb]</color> 3-Ping first.

Name: Celica
Text: Then perform a <color=#33CCFF>Blue [Skill Orb]</color> 3-Ping.

Name: Celica
Text: From here we can see, when we have the shared QTE Bonus with the standby characters, characters on the battlefield will deal significantly more DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: Let the standby teammates activate a QTE Bonus together to make the characters on the battlefield deal greatly more DMG and alleviate the combat stress.

Name: Celica
Text: The tutorial is over.

Name: Celica
Text: When used with Common Memory Set of 2 (Einsteina/Catherine),

Name: Celica
Text: Tank characters will be able to deal more element of the corresponding element/Physical DMG upon casting a QTE.

Name: Celica
Text: When used with Common Memory Set of 2 (Guinevere/Philip II),

Name: Celica
Text: Support characters will make the characters healed deal more DMG of the corresponding element/Physical DMG upon casting a QTE.

Name: Celica
Text: You're suggested to have Attack, Tank, and Support Constructs of the same element in your team to maximize the bonus effect.

Name: Celica
Text: Let's give it a try.

Name: Celica
Text: When a character on the battlefield is controlled by the enemy, switch to another character to lift the control effect.

Name: Celica
Text: Let's give it a go.

Name: Celica
Text: Our character is <color=#ff0000>controlled by the Polar Soldier</color>! <color=#33CCFF>Switch character</color> to lift the control effect!

Name: Celica
Text: Control effect lifted! Good job! Now focus on attacking and take all enemies down!

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#33CCFF>Switch character wisely to avoid lethal control/damage effects</color>. This is very important to <color=#ff0000>beat a high difficulty stage</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Now let's deploy Lux to the battlefield first in this battle.

Name: Celica
Text: Get close to the enemy and switch to Bianca.

Name: Celica
Text: We can see that switching character around an enemy will trigger the designated Signal Orb Skill.

Name: Celica
Text: Veritas cast a <color=#ff0000>Red Orb</color> upon entering the battlefield. Now we just need to cast a <color=#33CCFF>Blue Orb</color> to trigger the Core Passive.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap to perform a <color=#33CCFF>Blue Orb</color> 3-Ping.

Name: Celica
Text: The Blue Orb 3-Ping also triggered Vera's QTE. When a Tank frame's QTE is triggered, it will reduce the enemy's Resistance.

Name: Celica
Text: The enemy has been greatly weakened. Keep tapping Basic Attack to deal massive DMG with the bonus provided by the Core Passive.

Name: Celica
Text: Arrange the deployment order of the characters and the activation positions of QTEs wisely

Name: Celica
Text: to make the battle easier.

Name: Celica
Text: Congratulations, Commandant! You have unlocked the <color=#33CCFF>CUBs</color>. Let's look at how to use the <color=#33CCFF>CUBs</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: After a <color=#33CCFF>CUB</color> is equipped, a <color=#33CCFF>CUB</color> Skill button will appear on the battle interface.

Name: Celica
Text: The <color=#33CCFF>CUB</color> Skill cannot be cast at any time. It requires the character to charge by performing a 3-Ping. Let's try.

Name: Celica
Text: Normally, the <color=#33CCFF>CUB</color> Skill requires the corresponding character to spend 6 Skill Orbs to charge once.

Name: Celica
Text: <color=#33CCFF>CUB</color> Skill charged! Try to cast it!

Name: Celica
Text: Perfect! Casting the <color=#33CCFF>CUB</color> Skill at the correct time will increase the combat efficiency. Now let's move on to the <color=#33CCFF>CUB</color> Skills.

Name: Celica
Text: Control skills. These <color=#33CCFF>CUB</color> Skills will control the enemy and buy you time to deal DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: Cast Skill Orbs to charge the skill. Control the enemy, And attack!

Name: Celica
Text: Nice! The enemy was controlled and eliminated. Now let's talk about the passive effects of the <color=#33CCFF>CUBs</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Some <color=#33CCFF>CUBs</color> will enhance the character's original skills when deployed with the designated Construct.

Name: Celica
Text: Now let's switch to Construct Scire.

Name: Celica
Text: The Passive effect will be active without charging. Follow the tutorial and give it a try.

Name: Celica
Text: See? When the Core Passive and the Signature were triggered, the <color=#33CCFF>CUB</color> entered the battlefield to assist.

Name: Celica
Text: Use the <color=#33CCFF>CUBs</color> wisely to help you fight more efficiently in battle.

Name: Celica
Text: Our tutorial has come to an end. To learn more about the <color=#33CCFF>CUBs</color>, please exit the tutorial and check at the upgrade interface.

Name: Shark-speare
Text: Ah... I feel dizzy. Did I hit something?

Name: Shark-speare
Text: Don't hit me again! I was just playing with the commandant!

Name: Shark-speare
Text: Dammit! I'm stunned again?

Name: Noan
Text: ...It seems part of the frame has been repaired.

Name: Noan
Text: What is this place?

Name: Noan
Text: This place... looks so familiar...

Name: Noan
Text: Lithos always brought me here... before I lost memory.

Name: Noan
Text: It should be one of Lithos' strongholds. I think was some kind of lighthouse.

Name: Noan
Text: Wait. I didn't lose memory this time.

Name: Noan
Text: Maybe Lithos didn't get the chance to do it. Or was there something else going on?

Name: Noan
Text: Now. Get out of here asap...

Name: Noan
Text: Who's there...?

Name: Noan
Text: The frame... has finally recovered.

Name: Lithos
Text: You should not wake up at this moment.

Name: Noan
Text: Lithos?

Name: Lithos
Text: Mister needs me to take care of that squad. I have no time for you.

Name: Noan
Text: The squad? What are you going to do?

Name: Lithos
Text: Don't worry. Just stay here.

Name: Noan
Text: No. I can make my own choice.

Name: Lithos
Text: It seems you still don't get it! Wake up!

Name: Noan
Text: It's full of the Corrupted down there. I can only go up.

Name: Lithos
Text: I won't let you get away!

Name: Lithos
Text: Accept it and become one of us!

Name: Noan
Text: It's different this time. The Corrupted will affect M.I.N.D.

Name: Noan
Text: And they stopped?!

Name: Lithos
Text: I ask you to stay here!

Name: Lithos
Text: Since you refuse to listen anyway,

Name: Lithos
Text: I'll completely crush your M.I.N.D. this time.

Name: Noan
Text: But I won't let you get what you want every time...!

Name: Noan
Text: The memory I retrieved is not only about the past but also about the experience of fighting against you!

Name: Lithos
Text: Is that so? Let's give it a go.

Name: Noan
Text: We're done?

Name: Lillian
Text: No. I can still detect signals of the Corrupted.

Name: Lillian
Text: The scout drone also stopped working... What is going on?

Name: Noan
Text: Let me see if I can restart it.

Name: Noan
Text: This way... it will be fine.

Name: Noan
Text: Looks like it was just turned off, not broken.

Name: Talbot
Text: The Corrupted, of course. Why are they all gathering here?

Name: Talbot
Text: They're coming!

Name: Construct
Text: So many?! We can't handle them! Have to activate the defensive devices!

Name: Noan
Text: Let me help.

Name: Talbot
Text: Then I'll leave it to you! I'll go and stop them with the others!

Name: Tip
Text: Insufficient authorization. Please enter the emergency boot passcode.

Name: Tip
Text: Booting successful. Locking on nearby Corrupted targets and initializing attacks.

Name: Noan
Text: The defensive devices have been successfully activated. You can go back.

Name: Construct
Text: That helped a lot. Now, let's retreat to where the defensive devices are at!

Name: Construct
Text: Now, let's retreat to where the defensive device is at.

Name: Talbot
Text: We should be safe for now.

Name: Construct
Text: It seems to be an earthquake. I can feel the ground shaking.

Name: Noan
Text: It is an earthquake. We have to go back and check on the others asap!

Name: Noan
Text: Should be a date or that sort of thing. Keep looking!

Name: Construct
Text: Still not activated? Let me have a look. If we still can't activate it, we'll have to do this ourselves.

Name: Construct
Text: It's too late. Try 1031! If it doesn't work, we'll have to do this ourselves!

Name: Construct
Text: That was close!

Name: Talbot
Text: Roger that. We'll be back.

Name: Talbot
Text: We're safe for now.

Name: Construct
Text: Wait. How can this guy stay uncorrupted in an environment of this high Punishing concentration?

Name: Talbot
Text: Is that an earthquake?

Name: Lillian
Text: No. It's the Red Tide coming out from underground!

Name: Construct
Text: It's the Red Tide! The Punishing concentration is increasing rapidly!

Name: Lillian
Text: Hurry back to the medical center!

Name: Lillian
Text: Hey! The quality of this thing is outrageous!

Name: Lillian
Text: Watch out!

Name: Young Man A
Text: He shouldn't be too far ahead.

Name: Young Man A
Text: I've got to finish it up here and hurry to the rescue.

Name: Young Man A
Text: I can use these two weapons... Is this a muscle memory?

Name: Young Man A
Text: Does that mean that... I used to fight like this?

Name: Talbot
Text: Thank you! We have more injured coming!

Name: Lillian
Text: I know. Leave it to me!

Name: Lillian
Text: How could this be...

Name: Lillian
Text: Only one survived... The others are...

Name: Lillian
Text: Ahhh!

Name: Talbot
Text: Lillian! What's wrong?!

Name: Talbot
Text: I've got to help her. Can you handle it here?

Name: Young Man A
Text: No problem. Go.

Name: Young Man A
Text: I should be able to recall more memories about fighting techniques.

Name: Lillian
Text: John, the injured are not looking good. We should go.

Name: Young Man A
Text: I'll be right there.

Name: Young Man A
Text: I've got to finish it up here quickly.

Name: Lucia
Text: A monster waiting at the destination? I see...

Name: Mountain God
Text: Who told you I'm a monster? I'm the mountain god here!

Name: Mountain God
Text: You want to collect bamboo leaves? Be my guest. Take as many as you can carry.

Name: Mountain God
Text: It's just that my grumpy 'neighbors' might not welcome you.

Name: Liv
Text: These seem to be the bamboo leaves the wizard mentioned.

Name: Lucia
Text: Be careful when picking the leaves. Don't break them.

Name: Lee
Text: Still less than the required quantity. Go and find more bamboo leaves.

Name: Lucia
Text: There seems to be more over the bridge.

Name: Mountain God
Text: It's those guys' territory across that bridge. I warned you.

Name: Mountain God
Text: Don't look at me! I'm no match for them.

Name: Mountain God
Text: Fine. I'll help you a bit since you look so vulnerable.

Name: Lee
Text: Almost.

Name: Lucia
Text: Liv, you could break the case if you keep cramming the leaves in.

Name: Liv
Text: Sorry, I just want to pack up more leaves.

Name: Lucia
Text: I'll help. Let's get a full case of them back.

Name: Monster
Text: Woo—! Woo—!

Name: Liv
Text: The case is full. We did it.

Name: Mountain God
Text: Not bad. You chased them away...

Name: Lucia
Text: It seems we've picked up all the leaves here.

Name: Lee
Text: Let's get across the river.

Name: Lee
Text: Did you hear any weird sound?

Name: Monster
Text: Woo—! Woo—!

Name: Chrome
Text: We have to break through them before we get sieged.

Name: Camu
Text: Or solve the problem once and for all! Let me finish them all!

Name: Camu
Text: Soldiers ahead. Engineering Force members, get behind me!

Name: Captain
Text: Everyone, get over here! Stop them!

Name: Camu
Text: It's done here.

Name: Chrome
Text: Press on before they get fully recuperated.

Name: Wanshi
Text: I have recovered a bit. Start to provide sniper support.

Name: Soldier
Text: Do it now! We can handle it here!

Name: Wanshi
Text: Tsk. The road is blocked.

Name: Wanshi
Text: We've got some smart enemies out there.

Name: Kamui
Text: What's this...? Ahhhhh!

Name: Kamui
Text: Dammit. It's the flash magic.

Name: Kamui
Text: Watch out. They're still around here.

Name: Karenina
Text: The enemies behind are catching up.

Name: Teddy
Text: Do something with your blast hammer.

Name: Chrome
Text: We made it. Where to go next?

Name: Teddy
Text: Hurry up! Into the alley!

Name: Chrome
Text: They're about to catch us... Let's try to break through them within 5 minutes.

Name: Chrome
Text: We are running out of time. Split up and crush them one by one.

Name: Chrome
Text: Let's break through them and then meet up.

Name: Ayla
Text: Well, then... Let me give you a hint to make up for your lack of manpower.

Name: Ayla
Text: There are useful tools on your way.

Name: Ayla
Text: "Talisman of Vision". That's its name.

Name: Karenina
Text: This is... the artifact chamber? Teddy, are you sure it's not a sewer?

Name: Teddy
Text: Unless the guards of the capital love to stay in a sewer.

Name: Ayla
Text: Karenina, the terrain here is complicated. Kamui and his team have been here before, so it'd be better to leave it to them.

Name: Karenina
Text: No. We can handle this. By the way, is it really a good place to store things...?

Name: Tip
Text: It seems you can knock the enemy away from this angle.

Name: Soldier
Text: Outsider—!

Name: Teddy
Text: This height... You can't climb back up if you fall.

Name: Tip
Text: Seize the opportunity to launch a successful surprise attack. The enemy won't just stand there.

Name: Karenina
Text: Is the mission objective in the box?

Name: Teddy
Text: Whatever. Just take all of them.

Name: Karenina
Text: Creation of a weird shape... Is it some sort of a machine part?

Name: Teddy
Text: It's a talisman... But it might be a machine part as well.

Name: Celica
Text: Guards of the sky, follow my will.

Name: Celica
Text: Bring the intruders down.

Name: Celica
Text: Let the tide of oblivion echo across the sea of clouds.

Name: Celica
Text: I'm impressed. Gray Raven and Strike Hawk are indeed hard to deal with.

Name: Celica
Text: Now, warm-up is over. Let's level up the difficulty.

Name: Celica
Text: Chariots of the sea god, unleash the waves of retribution upon the world.

Name: Celica
Text: What's the move that I wanted to use...? No... That's not cool enough.

Name: Lee
Text: Commandant, we have to do something. Seize the chance and stall for as much time as possible.

Name: Lee
Text: We're fully prepared here.

Name: Liv
Text: Someone just passed by over there.

Name: Lucia
Text: Let's go and have a look.

Name: Liv
Text: It should be here... Did I see it wrong?

Name: Lucia
Text: Liv, move back!

Name: Realm Guardian
Text: Get out of here!

Name: Liv
Text: Watch out, everyone!

Name: Lucia
Text: He disappeared? ...No, he's up there!

Name: Realm Guardian
Text: Forget and leave, or everything will end here!

Name: Lucia
Text: I won't let it end here.

Name: Lucia
Text: Gray Raven will move forward with Commandant!

Name: Roseblade
Text: Duel... Glory... Death... Before the wave arrives...

Name: Cradle
Text: It seems there's no way we could save him... Let him rest in peace.

Name: Nun
Text: Indulge yourself in the ascension and give me your body that is full of sins

Name: Nun
Text: Let's go back together to the tide

Name: Cradle
Text: I should really thank you for that.

Name: Al Grey Von the Executioner
Text: Invader detected. Prepare to fight.

Name: Cradle
Text: No no no, listen to me! We are adventurers...

Name: Al Grey Von the Executioner
Text: Invaders! Eliminate!

Name: Cradle
Text: Why don't you just listen! You're gonna regret it!

Name: Al Grey Von the Executioner
Text: Attention, attention, Z-0-117 detected. Contacting...

Name: Cradle
Text: The combat bot just moved...

Name: Al Grey Von the Executioner
Text: Contacting failed. Identification modified. Targets determined as invaders. Eliminate all targets.

Name: Beelzebub the Ludicrous
Text: Which record should I put you in...?

Name: Cradle
Text: Even though you'll forget everything in the end?

Name: Beelzebub the Ludicrous
Text: Is it... the thing I thought it would be? Hmm, the source of the insanity...

Name: Beelzebub the Ludicrous
Text: (Hold his right hand) Don't... remind me... Don't...

Name: Beelzebub the Ludicrous
Text: That is... Ah, I've been searching for it...

Name: Beelzebub the Ludicrous
Text: It is so tempting, so dangerous...

Name: Grey the Lost
Text: I'll make you look like this too... Mom... mom!

Name: Cradle
Text: Aaargh! Run!

Name: Grey the Lost
Text: Smells familiar... No! I can't make the same mistake...

Name: Grey the Lost
Text: Be careful... Be patient... And find that person...

Name: Grey the Lost
Text: There's a strange smell... Yes... That's it!

Name: Grey the Lost
Text: This is it! I found it... I found it!

Name: Ocean Guardian
Text: Die, you arrogant idiot.

Name: Cradle
Text: Avoid the enemy's attacks.

Name: Ocean Guardian
Text: Failure is not an option... This is more important... than anything else.

Name: Ocean Guardian
Text: I have to stop you... Even if... I have to count on fate...

Name: Tide Caller
Text: Tide... Tide... Take me home. I wanna go back. I don't wanna be stuck here...

Name: Cradle
Text: This is the last fight.

Name: Cradle?
Text: Why do we have to make such a tough decision at the very end...?

Name: Cradle?
Text: Move back and forth among the cages, forcing yourself to drink up the infinite bitterness as if you're drinking nectar...

Name: Dawn Swallower
Text: Argh— Squeak—!

Name: Dawn Swallower
Text: (The soul trembles. Although it looks like an unconscious beast, you can still read something weird from its behavior.)

Name: Cradle
Text: You have made your choice... Now you must bear the consequences.

Name: Cradle
Text: You will face eternal Crimson Tides...

Name: Cradle
Text: Still... I will stay with you till the very last moment.

Name: Cradle
Text: Wave 5 Line 1

Name: Cradle
Text: Wave 5 Line 2

Name: Cradle
Text: Wave 5 Line 3

Name: Cradle
Text: Wave 10 Line 1

Name: Cradle
Text: Wave 10 Line 2

Name: Cradle
Text: s

Name: Cradle
Text: Wave 15 Line 1

Name: Cradle
Text: Wave 15 Line 2

Name: Cradle
Text: Wave 15 Line 3

Name: Cradle
Text: The power is growing... Is this the true power of Crimson?

Name: Cradle
Text: Wave 20 Line 2

Name: Cradle
Text: Wave 20 Line 3

Name: Cradle
Text: Wave 25 Line 1

Name: Cradle
Text: Wave 25 Line 2

Name: Cradle
Text: Wave 25 Line 3

Name: Cradle
Text: Wave 30 Line 1

Name: Cradle
Text: Wave 30 Line 2

Name: Cradle
Text: Wave 30 Line 3

Name: Cradle
Text: Clear All Line 1

Name: Cradle
Text: Clear All Line 2

Name: Cradle
Text: Clear All Line 3

Name: Cradle
Text: Is this the ending you desire...?

Name: Cradle
Text: So this is what you have chosen in the end...

Name: Cradle
Text: Why...?

Name: Cradle
Text: I cannot believe... You have chosen to help humans.

Name: Cradle
Text: Line 2 Before Resistance Stage 1st Battle

Name: Cradle
Text: Line 3 Before Resistance Stage 1st Battle

Name: Cradle
Text: Something went wrong...?

Name: Cradle
Text: Resistance Stage 1st Battle Wave 1 Line 2

Name: Cradle
Text: Why did it end up like this...

Name: Cradle
Text: Resistance Stage 1st Battle Wave 2 Line 2

Name: Cradle
Text: Why do you refuse to listen to Crimson's guide...

Name: Cradle
Text: Line 2 After Resistance Stage 1st Battle

Name: Cradle
Text: Line 3 After Resistance Stage 1st Battle

Name: Cradle
Text: Are you really going to hold on until the end...?

Name: Cradle
Text: Line 2 Before Resistance Stage 2nd Battle

Name: Cradle
Text: Line 3 Before Resistance Stage 2nd Battle

Name: Cradle
Text: Don't... You will never defeat Crimson...

Name: Cradle
Text: Resistance Stage 2nd Battle Wave 1 Line 2

Name: Cradle
Text: You have no chance against the never-ending Crimson Tide...

Name: Cradle
Text: Resistance Stage 2nd Battle Wave 2 Line 2

Name: Cradle
Text: I can feel the roaring of Crimson Tide. It's a warning...

Name: Cradle
Text: Line 2 After Resistance Stage 2nd Battle

Name: Cradle
Text: Line 3 After Resistance Stage 2nd Battle

Name: Cradle
Text: Despite that... Are you still going to choose this?

Name: Cradle
Text: Line 2 Before Resistance Stage 3rd Battle

Name: Cradle
Text: Line 3 Before Resistance Stage 3rd Battle

Name: Cradle
Text: I may have understood you now...

Name: Cradle
Text: Resistance Stage 3rd Battle Wave 1 Line 2

Name: Cradle
Text: As promised, I will stay with you till the very last moment.

Name: Cradle
Text: Resistance Stage 3rd Battle Wave 2 Line 2

Name: Cradle
Text: The next one is your final choice... Please carefully consider it.

Name: Cradle
Text: Line 2 After Resistance Stage 3rd Battle

Name: Cradle
Text: Line 3 After Resistance Stage 3rd Battle

Name: Cradle
Text: Beat her, and you'll get everything you've ever wanted.

Name: Cradle
Text: Line 2 Before Mother Battle

Name: Cradle
Text: Line 3 Before Mother Battle

Name: Cradle
Text: Congratulations, you've reached the gateway to a new world.

Name: Cradle
Text: Line 2 Before New Tifa Battle

Name: Cradle
Text: Line 3 Before New Tifa Battle

Name: Cradle
Text: Defeat the will's phantom and complete the trial.

Name: Cradle
Text: Line 2 Before Destruction Stage 1st Battle

Name: Cradle
Text: Line 3 Before Destruction Stage 1st Battle

Name: Cradle
Text: Supreme wisdom will unify everything.

Name: Cradle
Text: Destruction Stage 1st Battle Wave 1 Line 2

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Retreat! Retreat!

Name: Cradle
Text: Destruction Stage 1st Battle Wave 2 Line 2

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Abandon this place! Move to the next position!

Name: Cradle
Text: Line 2 After Destruction Stage 1st Battle

Name: Cradle
Text: Line 3 After Destruction Stage 1st Battle

Name: Cradle
Text: Bring new life to the remnants of the old world.

Name: Cradle
Text: Line 2 Before Destruction Stage 2nd Battle

Name: Cradle
Text: Line 3 Before Destruction Stage 2nd Battle

Name: Cradle
Text: Nice, you're getting the hang of it.

Name: Cradle
Text: Destruction Stage 2nd Battle Wave 1 Line 2

Name: Surviving Human
Text: Has the □□ spread here already...?

Name: Cradle
Text: Destruction Stage 2nd Battle Wave 2 Line 2

Name: Surviving Human
Text: Humans... will never give up...

Name: Cradle
Text: Line 2 After Destruction Stage 2nd Battle

Name: Cradle
Text: Line 3 After Destruction Stage 2nd Battle

Name: Cradle
Text: Embrace the Crimson. The reborn world needs the adornment of red blossoms.

Name: Cradle
Text: Line 2 Before Destruction Stage 3rd Battle

Name: Cradle
Text: Line 3 Before Destruction Stage 3rd Battle

Name: Cradle
Text: This is the final trial.

Name: Cradle
Text: Destruction Stage 3rd Battle Wave 1 Line 2

Name: The Messiah
Text: Analyzing... unable...

Name: Cradle
Text: Destruction Stage 3rd Battle Wave 2 Line 2

Name: The Messiah
Text: Final mission... failed...

Name: Cradle
Text: Line 2 After Destruction Stage 3rd Battle

Name: Cradle
Text: Line 3 After Destruction Stage 3rd Battle

Name: Cradle
Text: Be careful, it seems the demons have been attracted here.

Name: Cradle
Text: Is this… its sibling?

Name: Legendary Twin Demons
Text: Ugh!

Name: Cradle
Text: They seem to have something to say to you. Let's call a truce for now.

Name: Cradle
Text: So this is the legendary demon...?

Name: Cradle
Text: Line 2 Before Destruction Stage 3rd Battle

Name: Cradle
Text: Line 3 Before Destruction Stage 3rd Battle

Name: Legendary Demon
Text: Rawr...

Name: Cradle
Text: Got away?

Name: Cradle
Text: Line 3 After Destruction Stage 3rd Battle

Name: Cradle
Text: Is this what you have chosen... Traveler?

Name: Bianca
Text: Not just the entrance, every facility in the aquarium is working properly.

Name: Bianca
Text: There is still a small amount of Punishing Virus lingering here. We can use the Phantom Tracer to look into it later.

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant, I'll go and search for the path to the west wing with the others. Please take care.

Name: Member A
Text: They even have a bio fish...

Name: Member A
Text: Who restarted the aquarium?

Name: Member A
Text: They even have a bio fish...

Name: Member A
Text: Who restarted the aquarium?

Name: Member B
Text: Is this a candle? It seems someone has replaced the old one.

Name: Bianca
Text: The writing is fresh. Should be left by thous Scavengers.

Name: Member C
Text: The statue has been specially cleaned... Who would do this?

Name: Tip
Text: A metal sign with the layout of the aquarium. The lower third floor is a large pool for sea creature performance.

Name: Tip
Text: The other two floors are just ordinary bio water tanks.

Name: Tip
Text: Next to the bottom floor is a long line that appears to have been drawn with a metal object with two small lines of text beside it.

Name: Tip
Text: The first line goes, "To latecomer, the bottom floor has a passage leading to the nearest town."

Name: Tip
Text: The second line goes, "To latecomer, don't go into the passage. It has been sealed after the collapse. It's full of water there."

Name: Bianca
Text: It's badly corroded. It seems the text was carved a long time ago.

Name: Bianca
Text: "To my beloved daughter." It seems the text was left by the owner of the aquarium.

Name: Bianca
Text: The candles won't last so long. Someone has been replacing them. Is it the refugees or the Ascendants?

Name: Bianca
Text: This is not from the aquarium. There are battle marks on it.

Name: Bianca
Text: The current is too strong to pass through. Let's see if we can find another way around.

Name: Bianca
Text: The Phantom Tracer is reacting!

Name: Bianca
Text: This is...

Name: Enemy's Phantom
Text: Rawrgh!

Name: Bianca
Text: I didn't expect them to come at me. Was it an adaptability issue of the Phantom Tracer?

Name: Bianca
Text: He wasn't asking me for help...

Name: Bianca
Text: He was looking at someone standing in my direction.

Name: Scavenger's Phantom
Text: A-are you Constructs from Babylonia?

Name: Bianca
Text: Was it Chiko and her people that he met?

Name: Scavenger's Phantom
Text: Y-yes... Lady Revelationist and other Revelationists are still down there. Please save them!

Name: Bianca
Text: Lady Revelationist... I think this is how "Scarlet Revelation" calls Grace.

Name: Scavenger's Phantom
Text: We were fooled! We were fooled by the Ascendants! There is nothing except the Red Tide on the lower third floor!

Name: Bianca
Text: This is all the information we can get...

Name: Bianca
Text: Hmm... That was...

Name: Bianca
Text: The Phantom Tracer is reacting again!

Name: Bianca
Text: Just like last time.

Name: Bianca
Text: You are not our enemy. You are... You want me to follow you?

Name: Bianca
Text: This place...

Name: Bianca
Text: A four-digit password is required...

Name: Bianca
Text: This is the switch of the water gate.

Name: Bianca
Text: What was that thing that gave me the tips...?

Name: Member B
Text: What's the situation on your side? We are still in the west wing, but we found traces of survivors as a byproduct.

Name: Bianca
Text: It was sealed from the other side.

Name: Bianca
Text: The Punishing Virus concentration here is very low.
Who's out there?

Name: Bianca
Text: I'm with Babylonia. Are you with "Scarlet Revelation"?
Really? Lady Revelationist was correct! Was she born again?

Name: Bianca
Text: ...Sorry, we are here to investigate on her and those who disappeared with her.
Disappeared?
I remember they went down to clear the passage that collapsed to get to the Red Tide at the pool.
Right behind that water curtain.

Name: Bianca
Text: But it's closed.
...We closed it. Lady Revelationist asked us to wait here for her...
But she is still not back...

Name: Bianca
Text: I'll find her and ask the others to evacuate you.
Really? Then I'll give you the password.

Name: Bianca
Text: It should be... 9451.

Name: Bianca
Text: This way we can move downstairs.

Name: Member A
Text: Anything else you want to say?

Name: Member C
Text: Captain—?

Name: Bianca
Text: Did you hear that...? Sorry, let's move.

Name: Lucia
Text: I'll stay here with the others. Please take care.

Name: Bianca
Text: Contact us if anything happens.

Name: Bianca
Text: Let's go, Commandant.

Name: Construct
Text: Message from the west wing squad. No Hetero-Creatures found there.

Name: Construct
Text: Why are we taking care of these self-abandoned guys...?

Name: Construct
Text: I never thought we could work with the Task Force one day, not to mention Gray Raven. It's the number one Task Force on the list...

Name: Bianca
Text: Careful, enemy approaching!

Name: Bianca
Text: Check with the Phantom Tracer.

Name: Bianca
Text: This is... a memory?

Name: Refugee
Text: Yes, I do... Please allow me to do this!

Name: Refugee
Text: Lady Revelationist, there's no time to hesitate.

Name: Refugee
Text: So what? I won't last long anyway...

Name: Refugee
Text: Hmm, I never regret following you...

Name: Refugee
Text: Then I'll go first.

Name: Bianca
Text: Are we... still in the aquarium?

Name: Bianca
Text: We are back again?

Name: Bianca
Text: ...Let's keep moving.

Name: Bianca
Text: Enemy!

Name: Chela Host
Text: Welcome...

Name: Scavenger A
Text: It's a monster!

Name: Scavenger A
Text: Stop! You call this monster a Reborn?

Name: Scavenger A
Text: Damn. We were fooled by them.

Name: Scavenger A
Text: I won't stay here any minute longer.

Name: Scavenger B
Text: No, this is a Reborn.

Name: Scavenger C
Text: He is still Marvin. He is not attacking us.

Name: Scavenger C
Text: Look, he is waving to us.

Name: Scavenger C
Text: Hey, let him go. What about you guys?

Name: Scavenger B
Text: At least... There is no need to worry about food.

Name: Scavenger D
Text: Hey, where are you going?

Name: Scavenger D
Text: Let's keep going then.

Name: Bianca
Text: It looks like... those Hetero-Creatures out there were turned from these Scavengers.

Name: Bianca
Text: But it seems this is not where it took place.

Name: Bianca
Text: Is this an illusion... or the reality?

Name: Member A
Text: Just go back if you don't feel well.

Name: Member A
Text: We don't have the time to wait for you, "Sleeping Beauty".

Name: Bianca
Text: (Are those enemies part of the illusion?)

Name: Bianca
Text: ...Looks like my M.I.N.D. is starting to deviate.

Name: Bianca
Text: Have to establish a Deep M.I.N.D. connection now.

Name: Bianca
Text: Request to establish a Deep M.I.N.D. connection.

Name: Chela Host
Text: Ga... Ku... Wa...

Name: Member B
Text: Hetero-Creature! When did it come?

Name: Tip
Text: M.I.N.D. is fluctuating!

Name: Bianca
Text: This place...

Name: Bianca
Text: The others are still fighting. I must go back as soon as possible.

Name: Bianca
Text: The Phantom Tracer might help.

Name: Tip
Text: The Phantom Tracer is not responding.

Name: Bianca
Text: It's not working?

Name: Bianca
Text: And here comes another phantom.

Name: Scavenger (?)
Text: I'm Marvin... No... I'm Miller.

Name: Scavenger (?)
Text: No no no, you are Lacey... But then who are you?

Name: Scavenger (?)
Text: I am you... No, we are rabbits!

Name: Bianca
Text: His... No, their memories are completely messed up.

Name: Scavenger (?)
Text: It's coral!

Name: Scavenger (?)
Text: It's a new employee, idiot!

Name: Scavenger (?)
Text: Which way is it...? Forward? No, right...?

Name: Scavenger (?)
Text: No, backward... Damn... Are you guys trying to get yourselves eaten? It should be above!

Name: Member A
Text: It came before we noticed but didn't attack us. The behavioral patterns of the Hetero-Creatures is getting weird.

Name: Member C
Text: But thanks to this, we can take care of it with just one shot.

Name: Bianca
Text: (Looks like what happened in the illusion was real. And it wasn't long ago.)

Name: Member B
Text: We've lost contact with Heathrow.

Name: Bianca
Text: Initiate rescue operation... Wait, we have another way to do it.

Name: Bianca
Text: Commandant, I want to use the Phantom Tracer again.

Name: Bianca
Text: Please establish a deep connection for me if my M.I.N.D. deviates again, Commandant.

Name: Member A
Text: Get ready, everyone!

Name: Bianca
Text: I think Heathrow went this way.

Name: Bianca
Text: The Phantom Tracer is reacting.

Name: Bianca
Text: It feels the same when I had the illusion!

Name: Bianca
Text: I'm back again...

Name: Bianca
Text: Wait, that is...

Name: Bianca
Text: Why are they attacking each other?

Name: Scavenger (?)
Text: That was close. I almost got eaten by them...

Name: Bianca
Text: Them?

Name: Scavenger (?)
Text: Run... Or it's good to be their food?

Name: Scavenger (?)
Text: Bloody hell... Let's go to the dolphin show hall!

Name: Scavenger (?)
Text: Let's welcome our new member! Crush his bones... His made of iron, idiot!

Name: Bianca
Text: Are they talking about Heathrow?

Name: Scavenger (?)
Text: It's closed... I can't get in.

Name: Scavenger (?)
Text: Identification failed...

Name: Bianca
Text: Does this mean I have to use the Phantom Tracer on the body?

Name: Bianca
Text: He seems to be afraid of something.

Name: Bianca
Text: This is... Heathrow!

Name: Scavenger (?)
Text: Those on duty have left... No one is watching the door.

Name: Scavenger (?)
Text: You'll be punished if you don't find someone to do it for you.

Name: Chela Host
Text: Join us.

Name: Bianca
Text: Hmm... Are we done here?

Name: Bianca
Text: Not yet!

Name: Tip
Text: Heathrow stands up again.

Name: Heathrow
Text: Eliminate... Execute!

Name: Redcoral Host
Text: Anomaly... should be eliminated... should be corrected...

Name: Heathrow
Text: Bloody hell... Let's go to the dolphin show hall!

Name: Bianca
Text: I'm back...

Name: Bianca
Text: The deep connection was established just in time, Commandant.

Name: Redcoral Host
Text: It hurts... I'm hungry...

Name: Member A
Text: How is he doing?

Name: Bianca
Text: I think we've lost him.

Name: Member A
Text: ...Where should we go?

Name: Bianca
Text: Let's collect his body at the dolphin show hall.

Name: Bianca
Text: The Construct is on the missing member list...

Name: Bianca
Text: I think there should be others based on what I saw in the backtrack.

Name: Bianca
Text: There are bite marks...

Name: Bianca
Text: Who exactly are you...?

Name: Bianca
Text: Why is it red?

Name: Bianca
Text: Someone is approaching! Stay alert!

Name: Construct
Text: Wait! One of us is missing!

Name: Construct
Text: Another new Hetero-Creature!

Name: Bianca
Text: (I've seen this Hetero-Creature before in the backtrack... Does that mean...?)

Name: Bianca
Text: Traces left by the Red Tide...

Name: Bianca
Text: The pipe!

Name: Construct
Text: Ah—

Name: Bianca
Text: This is how the team disappeared...

Name: Bianca
Text: Rest in peace...

Name: Bianca
Text: We will get to the lower third floor as long as we pass through here.

Name: Bianca
Text: And we are probably going to fight some Ascendants, Commandant.

Name: Bianca
Text: So please help me establish a deep connection to stabilize my M.I.N.D. I want to fight in my full form.

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant, I'll go and search for the path to the west wing with the others. Please take care.

Name: Lucia
Text: The elevator can only take us here, but the number is stuck at minus three. Is it broken or...?

Name: Bianca
Text: (Am I seeing this because of the Phantom Tracer?)

Name: Bianca
Text: (Was it an illusion or...?)

Name: Bianca
Text: (No, they were calling someone who was not here...)
Come and join us.
Come and join us.

Name: Bianca
Text: I don't know how that person answered you...

Name: Bianca
Text: But I refuse!
You refuse to become a real Revelationist?
Grace...

Name: Hetero-Consciousness Host
Text: Then be one of us!

Name: Bianca
Text: You are...?

Name: Bianca
Text: ...Is this a data space created by the Phantom Tracer? I didn't even activate the device.

Name: Bianca
Text: I have to get out of here before it's too late.

Name: Bianca
Text: And the Phantom Tracer is reacting now?

Name: Bianca
Text: There is still something missing...

Name: Blue Phantom
Text: Help! Help! Let me out!

Name: Blue Phantom
Text: I'm starved...

Name: Red Phantom
Text: Go! Back to where you came!

Name: Bianca
Text: Are they talking about the same place? The Phantom Tracer seems to be absorbing something.

Name: Bianca
Text: It stopped. It seems I can restart it again.

Name: Bianca
Text: Has M.I.N.D. reached its limit?

Name: Tip
Text: Deep connection establishment request received. Connecting to the Mind Beacon.

Name: Bianca
Text: I'll take care of the enemy once and for all.

Name: Bianca
Text: My body... I can't move!

Name: Bianca
Text: The aquarium starts to collapse.

Name: Bianca
Text: I have to meet up with Lucia and the others asap.

Name: Refugee Child
Text: Help me!

Name: Bianca
Text: A child was left behind?

Name: Refugee Child
Text: Why is it collapsing?

Name: Refugee Child
Text: Please take me out of here!

Name: Bianca
Text: Don't be afraid. I'll save you.

Name: Bianca
Text: It's collapsing faster! I have to be fast!

Name: Bianca
Text: The Phantom Tracer is starting to act up. Have I been using it for too long?

Name: Bianca
Text: The illusion is gone...

Name: Bianca
Text: Time to meet up with the others.

Name: Bianca
Text: Hmm...

Name: Bianca
Text: The Phantom Tracer is... going backward.

Name: Bianca
Text: I have to finish this fast!

Name: Refugee Child
Text: Is everything okay?

Name: Bianca
Text: This is... the top of the passage?

Name: Bianca
Text: No, the world is reversed.

Name: Bianca
Text: It's collapsing even faster.

Name: Tip
Text: A weird noise comes from somewhere.

Name: Bianca
Text: The Phantom Tracer is reacting!

Name: Bianca
Text: Back again.

Name: Refugee Child
Text: Big sister!

Name: Construct
Text: There are Hetero-Creatures in other passages to the hall. They went to eliminate them.

Name: Bianca
Text: Okay. Now let's protect this place together.

Name: Refugee Child
Text: I'll help you!

Name: Bianca
Text: The enemy is here again! Let's protect this place together!

Name: Scavenger
Text: Dammit... The penetrating wound... Cough.

Name: Scavenger
Text: Help! Help me!

Name: Construct
Text: The refugees are now at the safe area! Captain! Time to retreat.

Name: Bianca
Text: It's over. Let's get out of here, kid.

Name: Construct
Text: The teammates working on eliminating the Hetero-Creatures are back. But who are you talking to, Captain...?

Name: Bianca
Text: What...!

Name: Bianca
Text: He was looking at someone standing in my direction.

Name: Scavenger's Phantom
Text: A-are you Constructs from Babylonia?

Name: Bianca
Text: Was it Chiko and her people that he met?

Name: Scavenger's Phantom
Text: Y-yes... Lady Revelationist and other Revelationists are still down there. Would you like to join us?

Name: Bianca
Text: Lady Revelationist... I think this is how "Scarlet Revelation" calls Grace.

Name: Scavenger's Phantom
Text: No... You are the ones who need to be saved...

Name: Scavenger's Phantom
Text: Hahahahahahahahahahahahahaha...

Name: Scavenger's Phantom
