Text: ...The lower third floor... is filled with the Red Tide! This way we will be reborn... God, thank you!

Name: Tip
Text: This stage is an extension of the main story and takes longer time to complete. Please make sure you have enough time.

Name: Tip
Text: Please note that this stage features a longer story and will take more time to complete.

Name: Asimov
Text: Simulation system loaded... How do you feel? Anything strange?

Name: Lee
Text: Not at all. Everything is good. The adaptation is better than I expected.

Name: Asimov
Text: Good. Seems the M.I.N.D. and frame are going well together.

Name: Asimov
Text: Let's start the first test then. Use the basic abilities of your frame to defeat the enemy.

Name: Asimov
Text: The mobility of this frame has been significantly improved based on your habits and requirements. It also comes with excellent firepower.

Name: Asimov
Text: However, that will also increase your burden in combat. When facing a large number of enemies, you'll need to make use of all available weapons to quickly finish them off.

Name: Asimov
Text: I'll give you plenty of Signal Orbs in the second test. Use your Composite Armaments to deal with the vast number of enemies.

Name: Lee
Text: Okay. I think I've pretty much mastered this frame.

Name: Asimov
Text: The basic abilities are enough for you to handle regular combat. But on top of that, we still plan to add a special power to this frame.

Name: Lee
Text: Plan to...?

Name: Asimov
Text: Right. For now, this feature only exists in theory...

Name: Asimov
Text: With its incredible instant computing power, when this frame is running at maximum output, it can even "transcend beyond time and dimensions."

Name: Asimov
Text: Let's just call it "Hypermatrix" for now. You can try using this feature in the simulated battle first.

Name: Lee
Text: I'm ready.

Name: Lee
Text: Is this the Hypermatrix you mentioned?

Name: Asimov
Text: Just like Matrix, it will forecast all possible enemy actions. They must be near stationary in your eyes.

Name: Asimov
Text: But Hypermatrix is more than that.

Name: Asimov
Text: The attack data from certain skills you used earlier will be stored within the core of your weapon.

Name: Asimov
Text: In this space, you can access and reuse this information by attacking enemies.

Name: Asimov
Text: Given its extremely high power consumption, the duration of Hypermatrix will likely be very limited.

Name: Asimov
Text: Given its extremely high power consumption, the duration of Hypermatrix will likely be very limited.

Name: Asimov
Text: Great. You can consume the skill data to generate new "Sight Points", and unleash them all onto the enemy when Hypermatrix ends.

Name: Asimov
Text: When Hypermatrix is closed, all the "Sight Points" across all the dimensions will be unleashed onto the enemy.

Name: Asimov
Text: Now try using the Signature Move to leave Hypermatrix.

Name: Asimov
Text: From now on, I'm going to load the data of some formidable enemies.

Name: Asimov
Text: The system will no longer help you maintain Hypermatrix. You'll need to control it yourself.

Name: Lee
Text: I see.

Name: Asimov
Text: Let's call it a day.

Name: Asimov
Text: Your computing power is all drained... Let's call it a day before you put yourself in danger.

Name: Lee
Text: Alright. I think we just need a few more tweaks before officially deploying the frame in combat.

Name: Asimov
Text: The attack data from certain skills you used earlier will be stored within your weapon.

Name: Asimov
Text: In this space, you can access and reuse this information by attacking enemies.

Name: Asimov
Text: Press and hold the Basic Attack button to enter Hypermatrix.

Name: Lee
Text: Why is the simulation combat system still on?

Name: Lee
Text: ...Asimov? What's going on?

Name: Lee
Text: System, execute the logout command... No response...?

Name: Asimov
Text: Lee... No... Logout error... Danger...

Name: Asimov
Text: Do you copy? Overload... Lee... Lee!

Name: Construct A
Text: Thanks. These things are so annoying.

Name: Construct A
Text: We have more mechanoids to get rid of over there... Have we locked down the hangar?

Name: Construct B
Text: All done. Nobody can get in that route now!

Name: Lee
Text: Did you lock down the route to the hangar? What's going on there?

Name: Construct A
Text: Did you not receive the notice? The HQ has ordered us to lock down all places like the armory and hangar.

Name: Construct A
Text: Given the situation, they are concerned that someone may take weapons or aircraft with force.

Name: Construct A
Text: Wait, what are you going to the hanger for?

Name: Lee
Text: I need to go to the surface. There's an urgent mission.

Name: Construct A
Text: At this point of time?

Name: Construct A
Text: Gosh, Gray Raven sure works hard.

Name: Lee
Text: Aaargh!

Name: Lee
Text: What... is... that?

Name: Construct A
Text: At this point of time?

Name: Construct A
Text: Gray Raven... Hey, anything wrong? Are you alright?

Name: Lee
Text: —Watch out!

Name: Lee
Text: Dammit. How can they let this thing out...
Stay on your guard!
I'm coming!
Lee... from Gray Raven? I'm from Praying Mantis. The name's Crowe.

Name: Crowe
Text: What are you doing here? All Constructs that are still normal are already on standby.

Name: Crowe
Text: ...You are not out of your mind, are you?

Name: Lee
Text: No. I'm on an urgent mission.

Name: Crowe
Text: The HQ just ordered all normal Constructs to be on standby for combat. There shouldn't be any urgent mission.

Name: Lee
Text: I'm as normal as can be, but I don't have time to explain my mission in more detail.

Name: Crowe
Text: ...Alright, I trust you. Haywire Constructs won't have such good logic.

Name: Crowe
Text: Babylonia is a mess now. There are two routes to the hangar, but both have been locked down.

Name: Crowe
Text: The only possible way is to jump down from Dominik Memorial Park.

Name: Crowe
Text: According to the map, you can enter the hangar from there. You should be able to find some transport crafts with sufficient energy left.

Name: Lee
Text: Thanks.

Name: Crowe
Text: You're welcome. My mission is to clear up an area nearby, so I'll go with you.

Name: Crowe
Text: This place is too...

Name: Lee
Text: The emergency mode can be activated by simply pressing a button. One affected person is more than enough to let these things out.

Name: Crowe
Text: I wonder how much they need to spend on rebuilding after this mess...

Name: Lee
Text: Time's running out. Let's keep going.

Name: Lee
Text: Time's running out. Let's keep going.

Name: Lee
Text: Watch out! The gravity is...

Name: Crowe
Text: Out of control! You okay?

Name: Lee
Text: The gravity system was shut down? What happened in the control center...?

Name: Crowe
Text: Lucky I had a gravity field generator installed for Moon missions... At least the mechanoids won't be able to reach us...

Name: Crowe
Text: Wait, look up...!

Name: Lee
Text: Deporter-R... Looks like the drone hangar is also compromised.

Name: Crowe
Text: I'm not even surprised. But there are just too many of them...

Name: Crowe
Text: As I keep the gravity field activated, I won't be able to deal with them.

Name: Lee
Text: Leave them to me. We must get rid of them as soon as possible.

Name: Crowe
Text: Commandant, the gravity system in front of Dominik Memorial Park was shut down. A lot of Constructs are caught up in zero gravity. We require assistance.

Name: Praying Mantis Commandant
Text: Uh... (Noise) Crowe... (Noise)

Name: Crowe
Text: Commandant? I can't hear you?!

Name: Lee
Text: Having trouble contacting your commandant?

Name: Crowe
Text: I've no idea. Maybe he hung up, or something else happened. I could only hear noises.

Name: Crowe
Text: This is weird... Is there any interference?

Name: Crowe
Text: The Constructs here are also contaminated by the Mind Beacon... Argh...

Name: Lee
Text: Are you alright?

Name: Crowe
Text: Lack of hibernation, I guess. The mission takes priority. Let's keep moving...

Name: Lee
Text: The hangar is just down below.

Name: Lee
Text: Time's running out. I've got to go. Thanks for your help, Crowe.

Name: Lee
Text: ...Crowe?

Name: Crowe
Text: Ugh... You are also... contaminated... Others... Watch out!

Name: Lee
Text: Use Hypermatrix to forecast the opponents' actions—press and hold Basic Attack to enter Hypermatrix.

Name: Lee
Text: All the simulations and practices just for this moment... Now, unleash the attack!

Name: Tips
Text: Would you like to play the new content?

Name: Bambinata
Text: Designed Dialogue 1

Name: Bambinata
Text: Designed Dialogue 2

Name: Bambinata
Text: Designed Dialogue 3
You don't know how to pinky promise? How stupid.
Cross my heart and hope to die, stick a needle in my eye!
Alright, you've made a promise now, so you can't say anything. You hear me, Bambinata?
Since you were busy helping Father with his research today, I'll show you the moves you missed just this once...
Don't you laugh at me if I look terrible. I'm warning you!

Name: Dottie
Text: That's it.

Name: Dottie
Text: Never say no.

Name: Dottie
Text: Never do unnecessary things.

Name: Dottie
Text: You only have to listen to Mother's words...

Name: Dottie
Text: How simple it is, right?

Name: Madorea
Text: Doris—Go—Punish—Intruders.

Name: Bambinata?
Text: Yes, Mother.

Name: Vanessa
Text: Bambinata! What are you doing?!

Name: Vera
Text: Can't even control your own doll, can you? Then, I won't hold back, either!

Name: Vera
Text: ...I've heard some rumors about you before, dollface, that you lose your memory on occasion?

Name: Bambinata
Text: Even if Bambinata's memory data is lost in battle, Bambinata can still access the data required for combat from the external memory module.

Name: Vera
Text: Then what's the plan B if you're incapacitated on the battlefield?

Name: Bambinata
Text: Mistress will have Bambinata act as a decoy to create an opening for the others.

Name: Vera
Text: So the rumors are true. No wonder the Egret only has you left now.

Name: Vanessa
Text: Bambinata, what did the Science Council check on you before you set off for the mission?

Name: Bambinata
Text: They tried to measure the latency by having Bambinata reassess data from the external module, but it was soon interrupted because of the mission.

Name: Vanessa
Text: Just in case, access the data here one more time.

Name: Bambinata
Text: Understood.

Name: Vanessa
Text: This time, we'll do it slowly. Access the data section by section, avoid data conflicts, and start with the simplest.

Name: Bambinata
Text: Reloading usual combat move data.

Name: Vera
Text: Hey, Egrety, we have guests ahead.

Name: Vanessa
Text: Don't call me like I'm your friend. Call me commandant.

Name: Vanessa
Text: And don't waste time reporting something I've already seen.

Name: Vera
Text: Oops, I thought your eye was still recovering.

Name: Vera
Text: I'm sure that Chief has thanked you in person for all your contribution despite the fact that you were a former rival, right?

Name: Vanessa
Text: For that person? What a terrible joke... Enough of this nonsense. Ready to engage!

Name: Bambinata
Text: Yes, temporary basic combat mode enabled.

Name: Bambinata
Text: ...Synchronizing kinetic module parameters...

Name: Bambinata
Text: Synchronizing resimulated special attack moves...

Name: Bambinata
Text: Allocating combat module linkage...

Name: Bambinata
Text: Resimulating Signature Move...

Name: Bambinata
Text: Combat data loading completed. No data conflicts detected. Switch to combat mode.

Name: Vanessa
Text: Great, let's keep this going.

Name: Vera
Text: Are your chores all finished now?

Name: Vera
Text: By the way, I'm usually highly efficient when I'm on my own.

Name: Vera
Text: So you two can continue playing your little mistress-and-servant game.

Name: Vera
Text: Don't worry, I'll be giving the Egret five-star reviews in my mission report.

Name: Vanessa
Text: How nice of you. With a captain who is used to saying one thing but doing another...

Name: Vanessa
Text: I'm starting to feel sorry for Cerberus' commandant.

Name: Vera
Text: Cerberus' commandant has absolute trust in me and will never treat me like a monitored subject. What do you say, dollface?

Name: Vanessa
Text: I'd rather say Cerberus' commandant is also struggling to discipline a vicious dog. We should exchange thoughts on this.

Name: Vera
Text: Oh, unfortunately, my commandant has many more important jobs to do than listening to your constructive insights.

Name: Vanessa
Text: I don't think the things between higher-ups are for you to worry about.

Name: Vanessa
Text: Toys should only do what toys are supposed to do. Now move in the 30-degree direction!

Name: Bambinata
Text: Yes, Mistress.

Name: Vera
Text: Hmph.

Name: Vanessa
Text: Bambinata, check one more time if the ones on the tree are the same type of experimental Constructs that attacked us.

Name: Bambinata
Text: Negative. The ones that attacked Mistress were the Corrupted.

Name: Bambinata
Text: However, the remains on the tree are not simply experimental Constructs. Some of them also show faint Punishing Virus readings.

Name: Vanessa
Text: Given that our target location is about 500 meters ahead, it's possible that it's already been invaded by the Corrupted.

Name: Vanessa
Text: We'll be moving forward stealthily from here on.

Name: Vera
Text: Hmph, a welcome party like this...

Name: Vera
Text: Trying to stall for time?

Name: Vanessa
Text: That Construct! Don't let him run away!

Name: Vera
Text: I know—

Name: Vera
Text: ...Infighting?

Name: Vanessa
Text: Shh! Don't alert them yet.

Name: Vanessa
Text: That Construct seems to be getting punished.

Name: Vera
Text: Because he ran away?

Name: Vera
Text: If he retains such a strong will to survive, he may not have lost his mind completely.

Name: Vanessa
Text: What are you trying to say?

Name: Vera
Text: If he's still somehow sane, we can simply make him spit out where dollface is exactly.

Name: Vanessa
Text: Your strategy's really...

Name: Vera
Text: Let's capture him alive.

Name: Vanessa
Text: Hey, it should be the commandant to give orders!

Name: Vanessa
Text: ...Can you understand my words?

Name: Vera
Text: Excellent. I won't hurt you if you can answer a few questions.

Name: Vera
Text: Where is the little blue-and-white-dressed doll now?

Name: Naughty
Text: ...Group...

Name: Naughty
Text: ...Game... Time...

Name: Vera
Text: ...You've got some nerve!

Name: Vanessa
Text: Hold on, let's split up here.

Name: Vanessa
Text: You go after him. I'll head back to the security room and see if there are any more clues about those Constructs' intentions.

Name: Vera
Text: Suit yourself, if you're so confident that you can protect yourself on your own.

Name: Vanessa
Text: Ha, keep this to yourself.

Name: Vera
Text: If you need help, just yell for me. I can't miss this scene.

Name: Vera
Text: I'll give you one last chance.

Name: Vera
Text: Game rules? What do they have to do with my question?

Name: Vera
Text: Too bad you've wasted your last chance.

Name: Vera
Text: Begging for your life? Or…

Name: Vera
Text: Leading the way? I'd better follow him.

Name: Vera
Text: The game he mentioned before? Is it some kind of procedural behavior among those Constructs?

Name: Vera
Text: Footsteps...

Name: Vera
Text: Footsteps... As expected, it was stalling for time.

Name: Vera
Text: ...Fair enough, but it's time to play my game. The ones lose the moment they get cut down—

Name: Vera
Text: Let's have fun, shall we?

Name: Vera
Text: Have you found any clues?

Name: Vanessa
Text: Almost all the cameras were shut off.

Name: Vanessa
Text: But I managed to find a clip from about fifteen minutes ago. I'm syncing it to your terminal now.

Name: Vera
Text: ...Your face looks like you've failed the mission and our transport craft was blown up.

Name: Vera
Text: What? Something even worse?

Name: Vanessa
Text: ...No, I just saw something dull.

Name: Vera
Text: A pair of old ballet shoes... in a box?

Name: Vanessa
Text: ...It's none of your business.

Name: Vera
Text: Sync completed.

Name: Vanessa
Text: Those Constructs were heading in the same direction before they disappeared.

Name: Vera
Text: That's the direction toward the end of the living room.

Name: Vera
Text: This is where they disappeared.

Name: Vanessa
Text: Under the carpet must be a hidden door.

Name: Vera
Text: I've got this.

Name: Vanessa
Text: If your blade had gone just a bit more to the right, you'd be facing a court martial afterward.

Name: Vera
Text: Accidents won't exist if they don't happen.

Name: Vera
Text: Let's go.

Name: Vanessa
Text: Wait, before that, we should investigate all the unchecked rooms.

Name: Vanessa
Text: It's possible that Bambinata didn't act as we deduced.

Name: Vanessa
Text: If all those Constructs were really down here like the cameras showed, they could've overwhelmed us...

Name: Vanessa
Text: And our situation will be even more dire if Bambinata isn't there. Not to mention circling back to find her will require more time and effort.

Name: Vera
Text: Fine, let's get going.

Name: Female Captain
Text: The Corrupted have appeared. Prepare to engage!

Name: Female Construct
Text: Roger!

Name: Female Construct
Text: The defense force has been informed! Reinforcements are on their way!

Name: Female Captain
Text: Are you the reinforcements? But you don't seem to be on the drill roster...

Name: Nanami
Text: Drill? Oh, let's pretend you were saved by a masked superhero who happened to be passing by.

Name: Female Captain
Text: Wait, where are you going?

Name: Female Captain
Text: The area over there is conducting a security drill for the Mid-Autumn Festival celebrations. I can't let you through.

Name: Nanami
Text: Ehhh?!

Name: Nanami
Text: Plan B, Power! Let's go the other way!

Name: Nanami
Text: The first floor is blocked off because of the drill... But the second floor is still accessible.

Name: Construct
Text: Are you... the Tank Construct of the Support Force?

Name: Nanami
Text: Um... Nanami's just passing by...

Name: Construct
Text: Whatever, it's good to have reinforcements here.

Name: Construct
Text: The drill-specific robots over there have lost control. They need your help!

Name: Nanami
Text: Just listen to Nanami!

Name: Female Construct
Text: Why are they suddenly going into a rage?!

Name: Female Construct
Text: Please go help them!

Name: Nanami
Text: Seriously...

Name: Female Construct
Text: The robots are blocking the road there. No one can get through!

Name: Nanami
Text: Nanami will take care of it. Nanami, Power, taking off!

Name: Nanami
Text: Mission accomplished! Nanami will be returning now!

Name: Nanami
Text: Oh, not returning. Nanami should head to the landing pad.

Name: Nanami
Text: Excuse me, do you know how to get down to the first floor? We really need to go to the landing pad.

Name: Female Construct
Text: First floor? It's locked down now. No one can enter under normal circumstances.

Name: Nanami
Text: Then Nanami has no choice but to make the circumstances abnormal...

Name: Nanami
Text: Fly! Power!

Name: Female Captain
Text: Waaait! W-what are you doing?

Name: Nanami
Text: Nanami has to go to the first floor. There's something important at the landing pad!

Name: Female Captain
Text: The drill robots are everywhere down there! You'll get hurt going there alone!

Name: Female Captain
Text: Give me a minute. I'll contact your instructor...

Name: Nanami
Text: A minute? Sorry, but every minute counts now... Power, speed max!

Name: Nanami
Text: The robots are gathering around... Alright, Nanami and Power will take you down at once!

Name: Nanami
Text: I have to watch the time, too. The drone is taking off soon.

Name: Nanami
Text: Hmm... This is the only way left.

Name: Nanami
Text: Direct smash!

Name: Rabbit Robot
Text: ...Adjusting... Adjusting...

Name: Rabbit Robot
Text: ...Come catch me... Come catch me... Come catch me...

Name: Rabbit King
Text: ...Rabbit... Taking off...

Name: Rabbit King
Text: ...Expel... Intruders...

Name: Rabbit King
Text: Hide and seek... Guess... Which one...

Name: Construct Soldier Jack
Text: I await your order, Boss.

Name: Construct Soldier Jerry
Text: We will do anything you say!

Name: Jerry and Jack
Text: Roger!

Name: Demolitionist Suma
Text: This is Suma from the demotion team. The amount of explosives has been confirmed. Awaiting orders.

Name: Demolitionist Suma
Text: Three more left, Boss.

Name: Demolitionist Suma
Text: Only the last one left, Boss!

Name: Patrolling Refugee
Text: Well done!

Name: Patrolling Refugee
Text: Hooray! Blow it up!

Name: Patrolling Refugee
Text: You missed!

Name: Patrolling Refugee
Text: The Corrupted's here!

Name: Construct Soldier Jack
Text: Those monsters have come to us, Boss.

Name: Construct Soldier Jack
Text: They came earlier than expected... I knew we couldn't rely on the forecast from those nerds.

Name: Construct Soldier Jerry
Text: Some people have yet to evacuate. What do we do, Boss?

Name: Construct Soldier Jerry
Text: We should leave too!

Name: Watanabe
Text: No. The target is moving way too fast. The Corrupted are going to hunt us down. We can't risk it.

Name: Watanabe
Text: We hold off the Corrupted right here. Everyone else, evacuate immediately!

Name: Construct Soldier Jack
Text: Got it! At your command!

Name: Patrolling Refugee
Text: Boss! The Corrupted are coming from other directions!

Name: Demolitionist Suma
Text: This is Suma from the demolition team. The remote detonation device is ready.

Name: Demolitionist Suma
Text: All the explosives in the camp are ready to be detonated.

Name: Patrolling Refugee
Text: Boss! The Corrupted are coming from the south!

Name: Patrolling Refugee
Text: Boss! The Corrupted are coming from the east!

Name: Patrolling Refugee
Text: Boss! The Corrupted are coming from the north!

Name: Construct Soldier Jack
Text: The place has been vacated, Boss!

Name: Watanabe
Text: Copy. Everybody, listen up! Keep your weapons and energy. I want everyone to start evacuation and merge with the main force.

Name: Construct Soldier Jerry
Text: Hold on... ****! What's this earthquake about?

Name: Patrolling Refugee
Text: Boss! That thing has changed direction... It's coming!

Name: Watanabe
Text: We can't let the Corrupted Colossus catch up with the evacuating crew. I'll hold it off!

Name: Watanabe
Text: Zachery was right. This is a tough opponent to deal with.

Name: Watanabe
Text: I remember the shield could be neutralized...
Initiating communication...

Name: Demolitionist Suma
Text: Suma here. I have talked to Zachery about how to break the shield.

Name: Demolitionist Suma
Text: Explosives have been set up on the evacuation route. If I detonate them from underground, they should be able to break its shield!

Name: Watanabe
Text: Well done. Let's go with Plan B. I will guide the target to the route, and you will decide when to blow it up.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Its shield may regenerate multiple times. Keep monitoring!

Name: Demolitionist Suma
Text: Roger!

Name: Demolitionist Suma
Text: Now!

Name: Demolitionist Suma
Text: Detonation successful. The shield has disappeared!

Name: Demolitionist Suma
Text: The shield has regenerated. Let's keep going.

Name: Demolitionist Suma
Text: It's the second time now!

Name: Demolitionist Suma
Text: The shield is gone! Attack now!

Name: Watanabe
Text: One more time and it's dead!

Name: Demolitionist Suma
Text: We're at the final detonation point!

Name: Watanabe
Text: Copy! Neutralize the Corrupted Colossus now!

Name: Watanabe
Text: Target is highly damaged and close to ceasing activity.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Seems it still has some energy left...

Name: Demolitionist Suma
Text: Shall we keep attacking?

Name: Watanabe
Text: No, the Corrupted's actions are out of control. There's a higher risk if we approach it.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Just let its energy run out. The majority of us have already evacuated to a safe area. Tell the distraction team to continue with their mission.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Alright, we're about to wrap up the mission. Good work, everyone! Let's evacuate.

Name: Lucia
Text: Now of all times...

Name: Lucia
Text: No, I can't reboot yet...

Name: Lamia
Text: Eek—Stay away from me!

Name: Clarence
Text: Na-ah. He will keep his promise as long as we pull you apart, little girl.

Name: Lamia
Text: Get away! Stay away from me!

Name: Chad
Text: Shut up, Clarence! Let's do this fast.

Name: Clarence
Text: Wow, who is this heroine? What a rare sight in the era of Punishing.

Name: Chad
Text: I see a Babylonia uniform. Another deserter? She looks somewhat familiar...

Name: Chad
Text: Something's not right! Knock her out first!

Name: Luna
Text: Finally... You have come to this stage.

Name: Luna
Text: I'm late... But I can still make it. Take this power now...

Name: Lucia
Text: (I must not fall here...!)

Name: Chad
Text: Nobody's protecting you now. Time to die.

Name: Lamia
Text: I just want to go home...

Name: Lucia
Text: Stop!

Name: Clarence
Text: She's too powerful... We are no match!

Name: Chad
Text: Run! Run!

Name: Lucia
Text: Get lost before I change my mind.

Name: Lamia
Text: Thank you... But I don't even have the strength to run...

Name: Lamia
Text: Ah! Behind you!

Name: Walker
Text: Finally, got you!

Name: Lucia
Text: (Is this my limit...? Luna...)

Name: Chad
Text: Her frame's barely holding it together. How reckless.

Name: Clarence
Text: You're the next, Miss Grasshopper.

Name: Chad
Text: Let's help Walker first. The grasshopper hit him hard.

Name: Luna
Text: You are too weak. You must accept the power of Ascension-Network.

Name: Luna
Text: Do not resist the power. We will make you stronger.

Name: Will
Text: Hey you there! You're from Babylonia, aren't you? Please help me!

Name: Lucia
Text: (Is it because my uniform...?)

Name: Unknown Voice
Text: Power... to control... those insects...

Name: Lucia
Text: (Ugh... This voice again...)

Name: Unknown Voice
Text: Betrayal... Powerless... The end...

Name: Will
Text: Thanks for your help. Still, without the Inver-Device, I'm probably not going to... Wait, what's this symbol? You're that Lucia from Gray Raven!

Name: Will
Text: But aren't you supposed to be on standby in Babylonia?

Name: Will
Text: Are you on a secret mission that you can't talk about...? Ugh...

Name: Will
Text: I don't have much time left... We were only reserves and were already abandoned.

Name: Will
Text: But we met a guy who claimed to be an "Ascendant". Everyone else was deceived!

Name: Will
Text: Please let Babylonia know, so they can stop them... This is my very last wish... They are right in D11.

Name: Lucia
Text: Hang on there. I'll find you some medical resources.

Name: Lucia
Text: I knew I could find medic bots here... Maybe there are some parts he can use.

Name: Lucia
Text: Changing access... Success.

Name: Lucia
Text: These should be enough...

Name: Lucia
Text: I must go back now.

Name: Lucia
Text: (His power core was shot... That's his gun on the ground.)

Name: Lucia
Text: Ended your own life before turning into a Corrupted... Then, let me fulfill your last wish. It's the least I can do.

Name: Lucia
Text: The key is guiding me to... Over there. A closed medical center... Maybe I can find some supplies behind the door.

Name: Lucia
Text: It should give me access to that door...

Name: Lucia
Text: This nurse bot was obsolete long ago... There's an access card in its hand.

Name: Lucia
Text: The alarm is triggered!

Name: Dust-covered Shelf
Text: The shelf is covered in dust. Even the steel frames were taken away.

Name: Lucia
Text: Access denied...

Name: Old Notice Board
Text: [Announcement] All members are to evacuate this area from today onward. Please dispose of all intelligent machine products in the scrapping center.

Name: Lucia
Text: This medic bot is completely dismantled. All the useful parts are long gone.

Name: Old Poster
Text: —Babylonian Conscription Advertisement— Become a Construct and fight to take back Earth! Your effort will make your family never have to worry about the Corrupted!

Name: Notice
Text: [Announcement] The medical services offered in this association are for our members only. Should you require assistance, please sign up at a nurse bot to gain the access.

Name: Lee
Text: Reinforcements? As expected!

Name: Lee
Text: I'll finish you off right here.

Name: Lee
Text: Can I really reach the top this way...?

Name: Lee?
Text: Back to this place again...

Name: Lee?
Text: Whatever. No need to tell me.

Name: Lee?
Text: This won't work...

Name: Lee?
Text: The space here is getting unstable...

Name: Lee
Text: I guess it's the only option I have now.

Name: Lee?
Text: There's no turning back from now on.

Name: Lee?
Text: Are you ready?

Name: Lee?
Text: Let's begin.

Name: Lee?
Text: I found a way to the top of the tower. I'll leave the rest to you.

Name: Lee?
Text: I'm trying to open a path to the top of the tower, but they are already here.

Name: Lee?
Text: Done. The path to the top is open now!

Name: Lee?
Text: What happened?!

Name: Lee
Text: I knew it wouldn't be that easy... How's the situation over there?

Name: Lee?
Text: So far so good. This wall should be part of the self-protection system of this tower.

Name: Lee
Text: Can you break it from within?

Name: Lee?
Text: I tried. Didn't work.

Name: Lee?
Text: Looks like I'm trapped here for now.

Name: Lee?
Text: But if the spacetime here is all chaotic, there is no point to stall us.

Name: Lee?
Text: Be careful. This wall isn't just here to separate us.

Name: Lee?
Text: I'll continue looking for a solution. Don't let down your guard.

Name: Lee?
Text: Watch your flank!

Name: Lee
Text: Leave it to me.

Name: Lee?
Text: Good news. I found a vulnerability in this barrier.

Name: Lee?
Text: If only I had enough firepower... My current weapon isn't capable of doing that much damage.

Name: Lee?
Text: But you can.

Name: Lee?
Text: Great. I know I'm the best.

Name: Lee?
Text: Let's continue onward.

Name: Lee?
Text: This should be the top of the tower.

Name: Lee
Text: What's that device over there...

Name: Lee?
Text: ...It's the core contained within the barrier.

Name: Lee
Text: It's emitting strong electro-magnetic interference... Looks like this is the key to stopping the disaster.

Name: Lee?
Text: We need to break the barrier with heavy fire.

Name: Lee
Text: I don't think it will be that easy, but let's give it a try anyway.

Name: Lee
Text: That's what I thought... The attack didn't even reach the core.

Name: Lee?
Text: If only we could get a little closer...

Name: Lee?
Text: Stop wasting energy. It won't work.

Name: Lee?
Text: The barrier is part of the tower itself.

Name: Lee?
Text: To deactivate it, we need to find the energy cores that are hidden in different locations.

Name: Lee?
Text: But before that... Let's deal with them first.

Name: Lee
Text: No more signs of Hetero-Creature activities.

Name: Lee?
Text: He... I mean, the other me, might have progressed further than I have.

Name: Lee?
Text: But we still failed to find the solution...

Name: Lee?
Text: I'll keep this short. I've been here before, but could not break through this barrier.

Name: Lee?
Text: I hate to admit this, but my frame is at its limit.

Name: Lee?
Text: But your frame... I have never seen it before.

Name: Lee?
Text: Maybe this can be our chance.

Name: Lee
Text: What's this vibration...

Name: Lee?
Text: Quick! Brace yourself for impact!

Name: Lee?
Text: I failed again... Dammit!

Name: Lee?
Text: (Tries to stand up)

Name: Lee?
Text: This isn't the first time...

Name: Lee?
Text: (Takes a deep breath)

Name: Lee?
Text: We are missing some key information... Wait, could it be...?

Name: Lee?
Text: We have to try something else.

Name: Lee?
Text: It's okay. As long as we are still here, we have endless chances to keep trying.

Name: Lee?
Text: We will open the paths to other key locations for you.

Name: Lee?
Text: You must find the answer yourself.

Name: Lee
Text: Where will the answer be this time...?

Name: Lee
Text: Whatever awaits, I must keep going...!

Name: Lee
Text: Is this the core supplying energy to the barrier?

Name: Lee
Text: Shall I break it? Or...

Name: Lee
Text: I knew it... Part of this energy can be extracted.

Name: Lee
Text: Now...

Name: Tips
Text: The platform below begins to tremble...

Name: Lee
Text: Done.

Name: Lee
Text: Is this a message... from "me"?

Name: Lee?
Text: The time... and space... cross... Counting on... you...

Name: Lee?
Text: The other me...

Name: Lee
Text: Is this the core...?

Name: Lee
Text: Something isn't quite right...

Name: Lee?
Text: The time and space will cross... Keep going...

Name: Lee?
Text: I'm counting on you... The other me...

Name: Lee
Text: I'll rewind the time!

Name: Lee
Text: Now is the time... I'll stop the electromagnetic radiation eruption!

Name: Lee
Text: Did it work...?

Name: Chat Bot
Text: You look a bit anxious.

Name: Chat Bot
Text: Staying with your family may help you to calm down.

Name: Music Bot
Text: You look a little upset. Is there anything I can help you with?

Name: Music Bot
Text: You mean that phonograph? We just recycled it. Nobody came to collect it.

Name: Phonograph
Text: Squeak... Clang...

Name: Phonograph
Text: (Music playing on and off)

Name: Tips
Text: Just an old phonograph.

Name: Guard
Text: Repair work is underway on the bridge ahead. Non-Engineering Force members are temporarily prohibited.

Name: Guard
Text: Lee of Gray Raven? Sorry, but I can't let you pass...

Name: Lee
Text: This isn't part of the plan.

Name: Lee
Text: Better stick to the plan...

Name: Lee
Text: I might need to adjust the route...

Name: Guard
Text: Thank goodness you are here, Lee. I came across a kid during my patrol. He and his brother were separated.

Name: Guard
Text: Could you please take care of him? I still need to get back to my patrol. I really appreciate your help.

Name: Lee
Text: Where did you last see your brother...?

Name: Lost Child
Text: Near that chat bot...

Name: Lost Child
Text: Brother... Brother...

Name: Lost Child
Text: Where is my brother...?

Name: Chat Bot
Text: The information cannot be found in this machine.

Name: Chat Bot
Text: Also, you seem to be experiencing some anxiety. For your mental health, I suggest you contact...

Name: Music Bot
Text: No relevant records have been found.

Name: Music Bot
Text: I have detected that you are feeling a little upset. Would you like me to sing a song?

Name: Lee
Text: Have you and your brother been to any other places?

Name: Lost Child
Text: I think... we also went to the music bot...

Name: Lost Child
Text: That one!

Name: Lost Child
Text: That's Brother's phonograph!

Name: Lost Child
Text: Hello...

Name: Lost Child
Text: The guard on the broken bridge is looking for you!

Name: Lost Child
Text: This is Brother's phonograph indeed...

Name: Lost Child
Text: But where did he go...?

Name: Lee
Text: It has a hollow base. I should probably flip it.

Name: Lee
Text: Is that a... level one alert?

Name: Lee
Text: I must get there as soon as possible...

Name: Guard
Text: Lee? There are Corrupted nearby.

Name: Guard
Text: We have non-combatants that need to be rescued. Could you please help them?

Name: Lee
Text: Of course. I'll get going now. Please take care of that kid for me.

Name: Lee
Text: Time and location... confirmed.

Name: Lee
Text: Alright, let's begin...

Name: Lee
Text: Is he that child's brother?

Name: Lee
Text: Excuse me, can I borrow the phonograph...?

Name: Lee
Text: The message and coordinates...

Name: Lee
Text: The key to the future.

Name: Lee
Text: Sending them out.

Name: Lee
Text: What's going on...

Name: Lee
Text: This area is getting unstable.

Name: Lee
Text: Message delivered. There's nothing I can do here.

Name: Lee
Text: Better leave before I interfere with this world's original track.

Name: Lee
Text: I did some quick treatments. Still, I suggest you let a doctor look at your wounds ASAP.

Name: Injured Young Man
Text: No worries. Thanks, Lee. I'm just a little curious... How did you find me?

Name: Lee
Text: I was tracking the signal launcher in the phonograph's base. But I didn't know it was you.

Name: Injured Young Man
Text: Phonograph? Launcher? What are you talking about...?

Name: Lost Child
Text: Brother... Brother!

Name: Injured Young Man
Text: Sorry for being late. I had a little accident...

Name: Injured Young Man
Text: But look, I found your gift.

Name: Injured Young Man
Text: Come, let's go home. I'll carry you.

Name: Lost Child
Text: Brother... You have so many wounds...

Name: Injured Young Man
Text: Don't worry. They don't hurt anymore.

Name: Lost Child
Text: You're lying! They must hurt a lot. I'll help you change the dressing when we get home.

Name: Lost Child
Text: I can take care of you too, Brother. I'm not a child anymore.

Name: Injured Young Man
Text: Haha, I see. My brother's grown up.

Name: Injured Young Man
Text: Alright, we'll see you then, Lee.

Name: Injured Young Man
Text: Oh, did you see my phonograph? I forgot where I put it...

Name: Lost Child
Text: Phonograph? Yeah. It was with the music bot.

Name: Injured Young Man
Text: Music bot? How weird. How did it end up there?

Name: Lost Child
Text: The bot probably found it somewhere and picked it up...

Name: Lee
Text: They remind me of the days with Murray...

Name: Lee
Text: "Family is irreplaceable..."

Name: Lee
Text: I've been caught up in all the missions and haven't talked with Murray much recently.

Name: Lee
Text: Murray? Yeah, I'm still on the surface...

Name: Lost Child
Text: This is Brother's phonograph!

Name: Lee
Text: This abnormal space... Feels like a mixture of many different M.I.N.D.s of unknown origins.

Name: Lee
Text: I must break through this barrier while the space is still stable.

Name: Lee
Text: These barriers look a little similar to the one inside the tower.

Name: Lee
Text: If they are based on the same theory, maybe I can...

Name: Lee
Text: I knew it wouldn't be that easy.

Name: Lee
Text: What if I try to reverse the "time" of this barrier?

Name: Lee
Text: Right here... I just need to adjust the power output...

Name: Lee
Text: That's what I thought...

Name: Lee
Text: It's a memory fragment, but some of its content is missing.

Name: Lee
Text: Another memory fragment. It seems to be linked to the last one.

Name: Lee
Text: Another memory fragment. I cannot seem to recognize its content.

Name: Lee
Text: The memory fragments have formed a new piece of data. Would it be related to the "whirlpool" over there?

Name: Lee
Text: Let me see what secret lies behind it...

Name: Lee
Text: Dammit. Where am I now?

Name: Lee
Text: What are those things ahead...?

Name: Lee
Text: Is this... my frame? No. Something isn't right...

Name: Lee
Text: Looks like the frame was killed by someone.

Name: Lee
Text: I don't have any memories about it.

Name: Lee
Text: Another frame of "me."

Name: Lee
Text: What's with that posture? What went down?

Name: Lee
Text: Why do I suddenly think of Murray...?

Name: Lee
Text: I see... These are all different projections of "me" at different times.

Name: Lee
Text: All of them... faced an inevitable death in the end.

Name: Lee
Text: Who would go out of their way to put this here? What a weirdo.

Name: Lee
Text: If all of their destinies were pre-determined, does the ending I'm trying to find really exist?

Name: Lee
Text: Another projection... But it can move by itself?

Name: Lee
Text: Do I still have to fight here...?

Name: Lee
Text: No. This isn't an enemy...

Name: Lee
Text: It feels a little strange. It shouldn't be like this.

Name: Lee
Text: I see... This is "myself" too.

Name: Lee
Text: Exactly like the projection earlier.

Name: Lee
Text: So it was me...

Name: Lee
Text: Why are there Hetero-Creatures here?

Name: Lee
Text: I have no time to waste. I must find a node that takes me back to the tower ASAP.

Name: Lee
Text: Over there!

Name: Lee
Text: Done.

Name: Lee
Text: I wonder what is happening to the rest of "me"...

Name: Lee
Text: This M.I.N.D. is getting unstable. If they are also here...

Name: Lee
Text: What's this vibration...

Name: Lee
Text: Another chaotic space... I need to get out of here quickly.

Name: Lee
Text: What's this?!

Name: Lee
Text: It's a familiar voice. Who can it be...?

Name: Lee
Text: Do you have a message for me? From myself in the past...

Name: Lee
Text: No... It's probably me from another "world."

Name: Lee
Text: We have always been looking for the "right path," and eliminating every me that has gone on a wrong way.

Name: Lee
Text: The legacy we have left is enough to change a lot of things, isn't it?

Name: Lee
Text: Tell me the answer you have seen.

Name: Lee
Text: At the root of all the disasters, who is stopping us from reaching the future?

Name: Lee
Text: Different enemies, different disasters and endings, bringing similar tragedies.

Name: Lee
Text: No matter how many times I must do this, I will not hesitate to point my gun at anyone who stands in my way!

Name: Lee
Text: How annoying. Let's finish them off first.

Name: Lee?
Text: We have been through numerous "possibilities."

Name: Lee?
Text: Just to find the path that can lead us to the future.

Name: Lee?
Text: Changing everything, then repeating over and over again...

Name: Lee?
Text: Even if "I" am no longer "myself," more new "Lees" will appear and carry on doing what we have been doing.

Name: Lee
Text: Honestly, I don't care if my efforts are going to be wasted at all.

Name: Lee
Text: I'm just not ready to accept the fact... that the past cannot be changed.

Name: Lee
Text: We arrived at this place because we had the same determination.

Name: Lee
Text: This isn't part of the plan.

Name: Lee
Text: This isn't part of the plan.
The answer is not here. You failed. We all failed...
Attempt 231... I saw... the broken wings... and the feathers fell into the snow and mud...
...Waiting for the moment... to reach the unopened door... after the death of humans.
...Tell me your answer.

Name: Tips
Text: Continue with this arrangement?
...Start... evolving... Need... data

Name: Jaspers
Text: ...Evolution... incomplete... Need... continue... experiment

Name: Jaspers
Text: ...Evolution... completed... Eliminate... abnormality
...Commencing... experiment... Collect... data

Name: Ayla
Text: Wait a sec... Did I just see the trees in the background moving?

Name: Ayla
Text: "Fully indulged in the play," huh? Alright, I'm up for the challenge!

Name: Ayla
Text: Now I need to eliminate these "monsters"—

Name: Ayla
Text: Hmm... It's all back to normal now.

Name: Ayla
Text: Hello? Are you alright?

Name: Ayla
Text: Not responding? Guess I'll need to help my comrade in the story next!

Name: Ayla
Text: As I thought, once the "enemy" is defeated, the background will return to normal.

Name: Don Quixote
Text: Thank you... My comrade.

Name: Don Quixote
Text: But I cannot stop yet, for more await me to bring them justice.

Name: Don Quixote
Text: I'll keep going.

Name: Unknown Projection - Female
Text: Is he such a "knight" in your eyes?

Name: Unknown Projection - Female
Text: Challenging the absurd world alone, charging against the cruel reality.

Name: Unknown Projection - Male
Text: He has always been doing so.

Name: Don Quixote
Text: Fly not, cowards and vile beings, for a single knight attacks you!

Name: Don Quixote
Text: Though ye flourish more arms than the giant, ye have to reckon with me.

Name: Ayla
Text: O brave knight, you won't be alone forever. From now on I shall fight by your side!

Name: Ayla
Text: Just help him so we can get out of this illusion

Name: The Knight of the Mirrors
Text: The sun has risen. I am ready, my lord.

Name: The Knight of the Mirrors
Text: But the end of this duel is already destined, that I shall vanquish you just like that knight who claimed to be Don Quixote.

Name: Don Quixote
Text: Before our swords clash, you can at least tell me if I am that Don Quixote whom you said you vanquished.

Name: The Knight of the Mirrors
Text: To that I answer you, that I cannot be certain. Still, just as I mentioned, the outcome of this duel has already been decided.

Name: The Knight of the Mirrors
Text: Whether you are him or not, what's there to chase after the title of a loser?

Name: Don Quixote
Text: Bring it on.

Name: Don Quixote
Text: I see. Pain may be the only means to wake you up from this delusion.

Name: The Knight of the Mirrors
Text: Defeat my minions to prove your strength.

Name: The Knight of the Mirrors
Text: Then you shall be entitled to challenge me.

Name: The Knight of the Mirrors
Text: Useless fools.

Name: The Knight of the Mirrors
Text: Those weaklings you defeated cannot prove that you are a great knight yet.

Name: The Knight of the Mirrors
Text: I will show you what a true knight is about.

Name: Don Quixote
Text: I hope your weapon is as sharp as your mouth.

Name: The Knight of the Mirrors
Text: To make it less boring, I'll take both of you on.

Name: The Knight of the Mirrors
Text: You are... victorious...

Name: Don Quixote
Text: I will now take your helmet off. Look me in the eye, and tell me if I am that Don Quixote whom you said you vanquished.

Name: The Knight of the Mirrors
Text: ...Do you really wish to lift the helmet of "truth"?

Name: The Knight of the Mirrors
Text: Here's a bunch of words said by the Knight of the Mirrors and Don Quixote after the Knight of the Mirrors is defeated

Name: The Knight of the Mirrors
Text: Here's a bunch of words said by the Knight of the Mirrors and Don Quixote after the Knight of the Mirrors is defeated

Name: The Knight of the Mirrors
Text: Here's a bunch of words said by the Knight of the Mirrors and Don Quixote after the Knight of the Mirrors is defeated

Name: Unknown Projection - Female
Text: What "truth" did he see in your eyes?

Name: Unknown Projection - Female
Text: Would that be the final straw to end his tragedy?

Name: Don Quixote
Text: Nothing can stop a knight from going his way, not even the wall of a castle.

Name: Don Quixote
Text: Let my armor and thee compete. Only one shall prevail!

Name: Ayla
Text: Need my help, my lord?

Name: Don Quixote
Text: A knight shall rely on his own strength.

Name: Ayla
Text: For a matter so trivial... You should let your comrade clear the way for you!

Name: Ayla
Text: You have a more important enemy to fight, I mean.

Name: Don Quixote
Text: Has my bravery become so well-known that they must kneel to greet me?

Name: Ayla
Text: Um, maybe.

Name: Ayla
Text: Someone's here!

Name: Don Quixote
Text: ...That knight in full armor they must be kneeling to.

Name: Don Quixote
Text: Behold, his gleaming shield and sturdy armor.

Name: Don Quixote
Text: None shall bar my way to the contest.

Name: Don Quixote
Text: I have a feeling... Perhaps he shall be my challenge ordained by fate.

Name: The Knight of the White Moon
Text: Illustrious knight, and never sufficiently extolled Don Quixote, I am the Knight of the White Moon.

Name: The Knight of the White Moon
Text: My heroic deeds transcend thine own.

Name: The Knight of the White Moon
Text: I come to do battle with thee and prove the might of thy arm.

Name: The Knight of the White Moon
Text: If thou dost vanquish me, my arms and horse thy spoils, and the renown of my deeds transferred and added to thine.

Name: The Knight of the White Moon
Text: If thou fightest and I vanquish thee—

Name: The Knight of the White Moon
Text: I demand thou withdraw and betake thyself to thine own village, and live there in peace and quiet and beneficial repose, the same being needful for the increase of thy substance and the salvation of thy soul.

Name: The Knight of the White Moon
Text: As I expected, you have lost.

Name: The Knight of the White Moon
Text: You are vanquished, sir knight.

Name: The Knight of the White Moon
Text: Nay dead unless you admit the conditions of our defiance.

Name: Unknown Projection - Female
Text: Such is the ending of the original story.

Name: Unknown Projection - Female
Text: He lost to his enemy and the reality...

Name: Unknown Projection - Female
Text: No longer addressing himself a knight, he lived the rest of his life without putting his hand to armor and sword.

Name: Unknown Projection - Female
Text: But will you give him such an ending?

Name: Smart Projection
Text: Welcome. The next performance is Kowloong war dance—

Name: Smart Projection
Text: Introduction

Name: Smart Projection
Text: Exit Navigation

Name: Smart Projection
Text: Smart Service

Name: Smart Projection
Text: Pat

Name: Smart Projection
Text: Welcome to the Kowloong Hall. Here you will find the essence of the art and culture of Kowloong.

Name: Smart Projection
Text: This hall showcases a variety of unique Kowloong artifacts, including traditional calligraphy, ancient mythological relics and traditional musical and dance instruments.

Name: Smart Projection
Text: You can also interact with me to watch traditional Kowloong musical and dance performance.

Name: Smart Projection
Text: I wish you a pleasant experience in this hall.

Name: Smart Projection
Text: The exit is just in front of the entrance. Simply follow the designed route. Once you have finished viewing all the exhibits, you will arrive at the exit.

Name: Smart Projection
Text: At the exit is a replica of dial lock that is often found in Kowloong history. Visitors may attempt to open the lock by finding clues from the exhibits.

Name: Smart Projection
Text: To leave here, simply rotate the elements on the dial lock to the correct positions. You can check the information of the relics for clues.

Name: Smart Projection
Text: Just some random instructions telling the player how to open the lock.

Name: Smart Projection
Text: Greetings, visitor No.1. What can I do for you!

Name: Smart Projection
Text: Unfortunately, I am unable to perform this due to damaged voice components!

Name: Smart Projection
Text: You are about to watch umbrella dance, a martial art dance known for its graceful moves. Enjoy.

Name: Smart Projection
Text: Chip damaged. Unable to read dance program!

Name: Smart Projection
Text: Guqin is a unique, classical Kowloong musical instrument. Enjoy.

Name: Smart Projection
Text: Scanning your traits and generating a description of you in ancient Kowloong language. Please stay still.

Name: Smart Projection
Text: Thy form ascends, a swan's swift flight, like dragons soaring in celestial light. Thy splendor rivals autumn's golden hue, thy grace outshines spring's blossoms anew.

Name: Smart Projection
Text: Thy fingers, young white-grass' graceful sway; skin, fair and pure as day. Thy neck, a tree-grub's elegance displayed; thy teeth, melon seeds, in beauty arrayed.

Name: Smart Projection
Text: Brow squared, a graceful arch; smile adorned with dimples' spark; eyes, beauty's realm, leave hearts in hark.

Name: Ayla
Text: This dance is truly a perfect blend of aesthetic and practical aspects!

Name: Ayla
Text: I had some prior knowledge of Kowloong's traditional arts, but this is a way more exhilarating experience.

Name: Trojan
Text: Exhilarating...? More like nerve-racking to me...

Name: Trojan
Text: We should be safe now. Where shall we start?

Name: Ayla
Text: Let's check out the projection. Maybe we'll find something new.

Name: Trojan
Text: The description of Azure Dragon Scroll mentioned that Azure Dragon was the protector of the east in Kowloong culture...

Name: Trojan
Text: Does that mean we should just align the position of East to the Azure Dragon?

Name: Trojan
Text: This mirror looks quite similar to that lock, Ayla.

Name: Trojan
Text: Should we align the directions on the disc lock with the trigrams of this mirror?

Name: Ayla
Text: Makes sense. I'll give it a try.

Name: Trojan
Text: Trojan: I have an idea. Can I give it a try?

Name: Tips
Text: In this hall you will find Kowloong cultural relics and demonstrations, some of which may include puzzles. You can choose whether to skip them or not based on your own preference.

Name: Ayla
Text: "Qu" has got back up again.

Name: Ayla
Text: I don't think we can defeat them one by one?

Name: Sica
Text: If the two halls are related...

Name: Sica
Text: Does that mean we must defeat "Huaxu" and "Qu" at the same time?

Name: Ayla
Text: Alright! Let's test the synergy of Iris Warbler!

Name: Sica
Text: Lena will be our primary combatant here. I will sync our battle status to your terminal, Ayla!

Name: Sica
Text: Please adjust your tempo based on the live status of our side.

Name: Ayla
Text: No problem!

Name: Celica
Text: I found another unconscious Construct!

Name: Celica
Text: I can't detect any signal activities from him...

Name: Celica
Text: Let's take his belongs back to his squad. This is the only thing we can do for him now...

Name: Celica
Text: Name tag, squad badge, and... A portable recorder?

Name: Celica
Text: Found it! I knew it was here!

Name: Celica
Text: ...Alright, camera ID confirmed. This is the one that can capture the enemy's movement.

Name: Celica
Text: I hope the video files of yesterday's assault aren't damaged...

Name: Celica
Text: Thanks, please make your way back now. The technical analysis team is already on standby.

Name: Celica
Text: And stay safe, of course.

Name: Celica
Text: Is the integrated terminal still running?!

Name: Celica
Text: Wait a sec. Let's stop it first.

Name: Celica
Text: ...Alright, now I should be able to enter the admin mode.

Name: Celica
Text: What's that on the ground...

Name: Celica
Text: A note?
You picked up... You finally picked up!
Haha, ahahahaha!
What aren't you talking...?
Hmm... I get it. Let's play hide and seek like before...

Name: Celica
Text: ...Vehicle ID detected. This is the vehicle used by the lost squad!

Name: Celica
Text: Why is it here?

Name: Celica
Text: Check the vehicle's information. It should contain some useful clues.

Name: Trojan
Text: Trojan: Watch out, she's coming for us!

Name: α?
Text: Hmph. Even as a puppet...

Name: α?
Text: You still know who's the strong one.

Name: α?
Text: Let's end *\o*■d^...

Name: Trojan
Text: Watch out, she's coming for us!

Name: Sica
Text: Take this! Special electromagnetic shell!

Name: Sica
Text: This is also the true measure of a Chief!

Name: Sica
Text: Ayla: We did it! She seems to be slowing down!

Name: Ayla
Text: Hello—world—

Name: Guide
Text: Analysis failed—! Analysis failed—!

Name: Guide
Text: Data recorded—Comparing data—Battle Power is 24.36% above the expected value.

Name: Guide
Text: Speculated reason: The leading Construct's performance was further enhanced in the Arctic Hall's environment.

Name: Guide
Text: Preparing phase two of the test— Starting now.

Name: Bionic PB-03
Text: Rrrr—!

Name: Trojan
Text: A military mechanoid this time, huh.

Name: Ayla
Text: Now I can call this a challenge!

Name: Guide
Text: Data recorded—Comparing data—Calculation error. Induction failed. A total of 28 mismatches with the previous simulation result have been found.

Name: Sica
Text: Has the Arctic Route Union been fighting these bionics all along...?

Name: Sica
Text: It doesn't seem quite right! Did the failed analysis trigger the highest level of the Battle Power test system?

Name: Ayla
Text: The highest level, huh... Guess we can't hold back then!

Name: Guide
Text: Speculated reason: Analysis declined—

Name: Guide
Text: Test over... Granting access to the hall...

Name: Guide
Text: Restoring the exhibits for test purpose—

Name: Guide
Text: Dear visitor, I sincerely invite you to explore this hall. Once you have finished, you can come to me anytime so I can take you to the second section of this hall.

Name: Ayla
Text: Finally, it's over. Let's check out this hall before entering the next stage!

Name: Guide
Text: Data recorded—You have defeated more than 7 waves of bionics. Your performance is better than 100% of mechanoid visitors.

Name: Guide
Text: Data recorded—You have defeated 7 waves of bionics. Your performance is better than 95.6% of mechanoid visitors.

Name: Guide
Text: Data recorded—You have defeated 6 waves of bionics. Your performance is better than 89.1% of mechanoid visitors.

Name: Guide
Text: Data recorded—You have defeated 5 waves of bionics. Your performance is better than 73.9% of mechanoid visitors.

Name: Guide
Text: Data recorded—You have defeated 4 waves of bionics. Your performance is better than 69.2% of mechanoid visitors.

Name: Guide
Text: Data recorded—You have defeated 3 waves of bionics. Your performance is better than 63.1% of mechanoid visitors.

Name: Guide
Text: Data recorded—You have defeated 2 waves of bionics. Your performance is better than 51.5% of mechanoid visitors.

Name: Guide
Text: Data recorded—You have defeated 1 wave of bionics. Your performance is better than 39.3% of mechanoid visitors.

Name: Guide
Text: Data recorded—You have defeated 0 waves of bionics. Your performance is better than 21.2% of mechanoid visitors.

Name: Muffled Recording
Text: This is Fleming speaking. This will be Naval's final voyage.

Name: Muffled Recording
Text: The Corrupted had destroyed almost half of the engine room. We did everything we could, but it is still leaking.

Name: Muffled Recording
Text: In three days, Naval will be lost forever... Hah. Fortunately, all those who are in love with her will go down together.

Name: Muffled Recording
Text: The first mate said there would be aurora tonight. I hear whale songs around.

Name: Muffled Recording
Text: I'll get everyone on the deck to witness our ending.

Name: Muffled Recording
Text: May the Arctic Route Union live forever.

Name: Guide
Text: What would you like to see?

Name: Guide
Text: Guide: Understood. Please get ready.

Name: Guide
Text: Guide: Understood. May you have a delightful time.

Name: Guide
Text: Guide: What would you like to do?

Name: Lucia: Plume
Text: Alpha, your days of tossing sword waves around are over.

Name: Lucia: Plume
Text: Give Sakura back to Commandant now

Name: Unknown Construct α
Text: Do you want it? Let Commandant come and get it in person.

Name: Unknown Construct α
Text: Time to put an end to all this.

Name: Unknown Construct α
Text: I will cut through everything!

Name: Unknown Construct α
Text: Not bad...

Name: Unknown Construct α
Text: Now... Feel the true power of mine!

Name: Unknown Construct α
Text: Kneel before me!

Name: Lucia: Lotus
Text: Alpha, your days of tossing sword waves around are over.

Name: Lucia: Lotus
Text: Give Sakura back to Commandant now

Name: Madorea
Text: Soft puppet, dancing puppet

Name: Madorea
Text: I'll impale you under the eaves

Name: Madorea
Text: Peeling off your thoughts, tasting your soul

Name: Celica
Text: Energy level rapidly rising. We must evade

Name: Madorea
Text: Puppets... Should not move... Or run...

Name: Madorea
Text: Dancing puppet, its soul will perish

Name: Primal Projection
Text: How many times have we met?

Name: Primal Projection
Text: Let's begin. You can start again as many times as you want.

Name: Primal Projection
Text: Tell me <//US> your answer then.

Name: Celica
Text: Time Phantom seems unstable. Prepare to <color=#33FFFF>activate Matrix</color> to transform the phantom!

Name: Primal Projection
Text: I <//WE> shall put an end to this cycle.

Name: Primal Projection
Text: The past and future will cross at this moment.

Text: Sage$... $%##... High%$... Contribution#%$#...

Text: Welcome to the Mutual Society Hall.

Text: Here you will@@$@%@

Text: I am!@!#! I will@#@$@

Text: The demonstration has ended. Visitors, please move to the final hall.

Name: Statue Guardian
Text: Welcome, visitors.

Name: Statue Guardian
Text: Allow me to take you through the exhibition.

Name: Statue Guardian
Text: This way, please.

Name: Statue Guardian
Text: Please bear with me for one moment.

Name: Statue Guardian
Text: Here is an overview of the art museum.

Name: Statue Guardian
Text: Please follow this order and start your tour.

Name: Statue Guardian
Text: Please return to the display panel—

Name: Statue Guardian
Text: Please stay on the designated route—

Name: Statue Guardian
Text: "An emergency—has—occurred. Please—do not—panic."

Name: Statue Guardian
Text: "Please—return—to the display panel. A journey—back in time—is about to commence."

Name: Sica
Text: Given this is our first official battle, I need to adjust and sync the M.I.N.D. Connection with all of you.

Name: Sica
Text: Just bear with me for one moment, Ayla... I need to get used to the sync rate with you...

Name: Sica
Text: Confirming wavelength of consciousness... Connection efficiency enhanced...

Name: Sica
Text: Alright... Done!

Name: Sica
Text: Impressive... You look like you are creating art.

Name: Sica
Text: Amazing colors... What a unique fighting style.

Name: Sica
Text: <size=25>Sorry, I should have made your Core Skill ready... My bad.</size>\n<size=20>[Press and hold Basic Attack to activate the Core Passive]</size>

Name: Sica
Text: Frame energy has reached the threshold!

Name: Sica
Text: Never thought coolant could be used in this way...

Name: Sica
Text: Maximum output reached!

Name: Sica
Text: All combat functions of the Kaleido frame are now available! Let's go, Ayla!

Name: Stone Lion
Text: It's so big

Name: Haicma
Text: Now we have a clear path.

Name: Haicma
Text: ...Allow us to bid farewell here. Spooner and I have something else to do.

Name: Ayla
Text: I see. You take care too!

Name: Haicma
Text: Calculating space model... Signal location confirmed. This should be it.

Name: Spooner
Text: What are these Constructs doing here...?

Name: Haicma
Text: The priority now is to rescue our kin.

Name: Haicma
Text: We need to finish everything before they hack in.

Name: Haicma
Text: They are hacking into the museum's security system. This is in line with our information.

Name: Technician
Text: Who are you...? Warning! Two battle mechanoids sighted!

Name: Spooner
Text: Tsk. If we can't dodge them, better finish this fast!

Name: Spooner
Text: Phew... Is there something we can use on him?

Name: Haicma
Text: If the reinforcements were summoned by them, we should be able to find some ID cards...

Name: Haicma
Text: Search complete. All available information has been retrieved.

Name: Haicma
Text: This ID card should get us the permission to access the platform.

Name: Haicma
Text: Door unlocked. The control platform is also linked to the power source of the hall...

Name: Spooner
Text: Maybe we can use this remote control. But I'm not sure if it will also affect us...

Name: Spooner
Text: I'll leave it to you to come up with a plan, Haicma.

Name: Spooner
Text: Let's end this fast, Haicma!

Name: Haicma
Text: Hostile targets eliminated. We should be able to find some useful information from them.

Name: Spooner
Text: This is madness...! The remote-controlled bombs killed their own people, along with the data...

Name: Haicma
Text: The priority is to confirm the status of our own kind. I'm checking their locations right now.

Name: Haicma
Text: The level of virus contamination is not too high. A cleansing program has been injected.

Name: Haicma
Text: Let's go, to the next destination.

Name: Haicma
Text: From what we know, there is an entire squad inside trying to hack into the system. If we confront them directly, they may summon more reinforcements.

Name: Haicma
Text: This control platform is also connected to the power source of the hall. We can use it to block Kurono's signals.

Name: Haicma
Text: Perhaps we can control their cracking device remotely to unleash a pulse, but one of us must operate the device continuously. There is also a risk of failure.

Name: Spooner
Text: No problem. I'll stay here to use the remote while you wait for me in the hall. But you'll need to face them alone if my hacking fails.

Name: Spooner
Text: Hack progress 98%... 99%...

Name: Spooner
Text: Success. I'll leave it to you!

Name: Haicma
Text: High-performance combat mode activated. Objective: eliminate all enemies before the signal shielding ends.

Name: Haicma
Text: The battle is over.

Name: Spooner
Text: Can you investigate this place to see if there's more useful information? I'll go check our fellow mechanoids.

Name: Haicma
Text: That's all I can find. How are the mechanoids, Spooner?

Name: Spooner
Text: The level of virus contamination is not too high. I have injected a cleansing program, and they should be fine after a while.

Name: Haicma
Text: Placeholder

Name: Spooner
Text: ROAR!!!

Name: Kurono Soldier B
Text: Hostile mechanoids sighted! Everybody, get ready for combat!

Name: Kurono Soldier C
Text: This is Sword Alpha. We need backup!

Name: Kurono Soldier A
Text: What's going on? A blackout? Argh!

Name: Kurono Soldier B
Text: Someone's attacking us... Calling for reinforcements... Failed? The signals are blocked!

Name: Kurono Soldier C
Text: We've been set up—!

Name: Ayla
Text: I didn't expect them to make it look so real with hologram and bionic materials alone.

Name: Sica
Text: More electromagnetic signals at the corridor near the entrance?

Name: Sica
Text: These light dots... Are they fireflies?

Name: Ayla
Text: Is this your first time seeing them, Sica? I heard that fireflies usually lived near clean water. Perhaps that's why the ground here looks like the surface of water.

Name: Trojan
Text: Is this a... plant seed? Why is it here?

Name: Ayla
Text: This tree seems like the core exhibit.

Name: Lena
Text: It doesn't look like any species in the world. Is this some sort of embellishment?

Name: Ayla
Text: A power outage? No... The other facilities are still running normally.

Name: Sica
Text: Seems like this is also part of the designed content. I have a bad feeling about it.

Name: Ayla
Text: Is this how Punishing Hetero-Creatures are hatched...?

Name: Sica
Text: Does Cervantes know the whole story of the Pulia Forest Park incident?

Name: Ayla
Text: Is it mimicking some flower, or grass? Or both?
The direction of their evolution may not be necessarily right, but they have enough samples for reference.

Name: Ayla
Text: It's showing us the evolution of Hetero-Creatures.
But none of them seems to be the best solution...

Name: Ayla
Text: As I thought, this is a demonstration of how Hetero-Creatures have evolved. Which means the next will be...
After imitation, it will attempt to surpass &...%&...%*...$*
I hope this message can help whoever comes here later.
Please follow me.

Name: Ayla
Text: Wait!
Fear should not be the only thing that is remembered. I made a personal decision to leave courage and perseverance here, in the hope that those who passed away would not have to die again.
Select the projection to play
Please move to the left for the courage to venture forward.
Please move to the right for the perseverance to never give up.

Name: Ayla
Text: Let's go.

Name: Sica
Text: Electromagnetic signals seem to be emitting continuously from over there. Let's investigate.

Name: Sica
Text: Pulia Forest Park... Is this what it looked like before it turned into a Hetero-Creature hive?

Name: Sica
Text: Electromagnetic signals seem to be emitting continuously from over there. Let's investigate.

Name: Ayla
Text: Better stick to the plan...

Name: Sica
Text: These light dots... Are they fireflies?

Name: Ayla
Text: Is this your first time seeing them, Sica? I heard fireflies usually lived near clean water...

Name: Ayla
Text: ...Perhaps that's why the ground here looks like the surface of water.

Name: Tips
Text: Continue with this arrangement?

Name: Jacqued
Text: We are going to cross this forest to protect the flank of another elite squad.

Name: Jacqued
Text: Stay alerted as you move forward.

Name: Lena
Text: The peaceful scene was but an illusion. This is where the real challenge starts.

Name: Sica
Text: This is the beginning of the Battle of Pulia Forest Park...

Name: Ayla
Text: ...Sica, there's something that only you can do now.

Name: Sica
Text: Only I can do?

Name: Sica
Text: Alright... I'll analyze the landscape first.

Name: Ayla
Text: Here's a good spot for observation! I'll leave the rest to you, Sica.

Name: Lena
Text: I hope you weren't bragging.

Name: Sica
Text: I-I know!

Name: Sica
Text: Activating holographic goggles.

Name: Sica
Text: There aren't many things that can be used as cover here...

Name: Trojan
Text: That means the enemies won't come this way, right?

Name: Sica
Text: No, Hetero-Creatures only act on instinct. Which means...

Name: Sica
Text: The battle will likely take place here.

Name: Sica
Text: Maybe we can take advantage of the height difference...

Name: Ayla
Text: I know this tactic. Take the high ground!

Name: Sica
Text: Um... That's one way to fight, but if we set up a feint attack to lure the enemy here...

Name: Sica
Text: Maybe we can establish an even greater advantage.

Name: Sica
Text: That's enough information. I'm creating a tactic model now.

Name: Sica
Text: To protect our flanks, we must split into two groups... But if that's the case...

Name: Ayla
Text: No need to worry too much, Sica. Just pick the plan that you think is the best. Leave the rest to us!

Name: Trojan
Text: I hate trouble...

Name: Sica
Text: Okay, got it. We need to secure both the left and right flanks, so we can help each other.

Name: Sica
Text: Considering the right side would be facing a greater pressure, we should allocate our forces like this...

Name: Sica
Text: Alternatively, we can set up an ambush at the central highland. But this is somehow passive...

Name: Ayla
Text: I like it when everybody stays together to overcome the obstacle!

Name: Lena
Text: My bow will work better in this position.

Name: Tips
Text: Which tactic would you choose?

Name: Sica
Text: Let's split up just to be safe.

Name: Jacqued
Text: Check your equipment. Get in position!

Name: Sica
Text: Let's set up an ambush just to be safe.

Name: Jacqued
Text: Check your equipment. Get in position!

Name: Sica
Text: I have already investigated the landscape here.

Name: Morris
Text: Hey, don't run around. That's not our area to defend.

Name: Jacqued
Text: Get yourself ready. According to the recon team, the Punishing creatures may come from any direction.

Name: Ayla
Text: The position I need to take is...

Name: Sica
Text: Wait a sec, Ayla. Something isn't right over there.

Name: Sica
Text: Not good... Constructs may not be able to exploit this position, but Hetero-Creatures can easily break through from here!

Name: Ayla
Text: How did you find out about this position, Sica?

Name: Sica
Text: Because... I ran many simulations in the past, and some of them are quite similar to this one...

Name: Lena
Text: Your nerdiness ends up helping us after all.

Name: Sica
Text: Just as I thought, if enemies ever show up here, we will be caught in a dangerously passive situation.

Name: Ayla
Text: Wouldn't that be a big problem to us?

Name: Sica
Text: There's a risk that we will face enemies from three directions.

Name: Sica
Text: We should gather our forces in a favorable position and wait for the enemies to come to us.

Name: Sica
Text: Let's split into 3 groups!

Name: Sica
Text: Lena stays in the middle, so she can support us from afar at any time...

Name: Sica
Text: Trojan, please defend the left flank with Captain Jacqued because you will be facing the most enemies. Ayla, I need you to be ready to support them.

Name: Ayla
Text: Yes, Commandant!

Name: Sica
Text: The left flank will face many times the risk.

Name: Sica
Text: If the left is breached, the right side will be completely exposed.

Name: Sica
Text: That leaves us no time to help each other or retreat.

Name: Sica
Text: The risk of total failure is too high.

Name: Trojan
Text: The enemies can literally come out from anywhere.

Name: Ayla
Text: A failure on paper is not a real one. Let's rethink our strategy!

Name: Sica
Text: That's it!

Name: Ayla
Text: Yes, Commandant!

Name: Sica
Text: Gather our forces in a favorable position.

Name: Sica
Text: Let them come to us!

Name: Sica
Text: Please get in position, Ayla.

Name: Ayla
Text: Leave it to us now!

Name: Morris
Text: Morris in position.

Name: Jacqued
Text: Jacqued in position.

Name: Dreiser
Text: Dreiser ready.

Name: Morris
Text: Enemy signals sighted ahead. They are approaching us!

Name: Lena
Text: Targets have reached the kill zone.

Name: Ayla
Text: Copy. Let's go!

Name: Jacqued
Text: Approaching enemy soon!

Name: Jacqued
Text: Attack!

Name: Jacqued
Text: All enemies eliminated!

Name: Ayla
Text: Keep it up, Sica!

Name: Jacqued
Text: Ready to attack!

Name: Jacqued
Text: Take this!

Name: Jacqued
Text: Watch out! Grenade!

Name: Morris
Text: We need backup on the left!

Name: Ayla
Text: On my way! Be right there!

Name: Dreiser
Text: We need backup on the right!

Name: Sica
Text: We should gather our forces in a favorable position.

Name: Ayla
Text: Now's not the time to go this way.

Name: Ayla
Text: These people... Their names are all on the list of casualties.

Name: Ayla
Text: A data port... Are we supposed to go through this in first-person perspective?

Name: Tips
Text: Select the data to load

Name: Ayla
Text: Sorry, Garcia. I have to step in.

Name: Sica
Text: Their names are all on the list of casualties...

Name: Ayla
Text: Sorry, Cook. I have to step in.

Name: Lena
Text: They gave their limbs to those who were still fighting... Even if that wouldn't change anything...

Name: Trojan
Text: Sometimes people do things just for the sake of doing it.

Name: Ayla
Text: Morris...

Name: Ayla
Text: I see. He wants us to experience this battle in their perspective.

Name: Lena
Text: If all goes according to the real event in history... Does Cervantes want us to "die" once?

Name: Ayla
Text: Is he pointing us the way?

Name: Trojan
Text: I don't know your name, but thanks.

Name: Sica
Text: Jacqued... Dreiser...

Name: Sica
Text: In that withdrawal... Many didn't make it till the launch of Longinus Arsenal.

Name: Lena
Text: They were staying behind to ensure Gray Raven could deliver the sample. Even without the incident, it was hardly possible for them to return unscathed.

Name: Jacqued
Text: What are you doing there?! Go to your defense position! The next wave of enemy is coming!

Name: Ayla
Text: We have been sent back to the moment before the withdrawal started.

Name: Ayla
Text: We need to know more about this timepoint...

Name: Jacqued
Text: Get in your position!

Name: Morris
Text: Have you got any spare weapons? Mine has snapped.

Name: Dasle
Text: I hope Gray Raven can get out alright...

Name: Leonard
Text: Someone told me humans would either go to heaven or hell after they die. I wonder where will Constructs go?

Name: Charles
Text: How long can we hold them for...? 5 minutes?

Name: Sica
Text: Ayla, Trojan, Lena... I want to do what I can.

Name: Tips
Text: Start the simulation?

Name: Ayla
Text: ...I need to collect more information.

Name: Sica
Text: The objective is to cover those Constructs as they evacuate!

Name: Sica
Text: We need to stall the enemies as much as possible.

Name: Lena
Text: It's easy to say that... But no matter what plan you can come up with, we can't change what has already happened.

Name: Sica
Text: The majority of the enemies come from the Central Purification Filter.

Name: Sica
Text: With the ruins nearby, we can set up a temporary defense point here.

Name: Sica
Text: We can deploy our forces here and take advantage of the covers to hold the enemies off.

Name: Lena
Text: We are almost out of ammunition. Even if we gather all our forces here, it won't work.

Name: Ayla
Text: C'mon Lena. Miracles won't happen if you give up before you start!

Name: Sica
Text: No, there's another way!

Name: Sica
Text: The strength of Hetero-Creatures lies in their numbers. If we can cut them off in the middle and send some people this way...

Name: Sica
Text: Trojan is great at assault, so she can lead this team while Lena snipes from behind.

Name: Sica
Text: If the frontline forces can work with us, the Hetero-Creatures won't be able to focus on both ends. This should buy us some more time.

Name: Lena
Text: Wait... Maybe it actually will work?

Name: Ayla
Text: The rest of the battle is straight forward. Let's go, Iris Warbler.

Name: Ayla
Text: Let's explain to Captain Jacqued.

Name: Sica
Text: I think we should send a team to flank the enemy from behind.

Name: Jacqued
Text: Very bold idea... But it may work. I'll send someone to help you, so go for it.

Name: Trojan
Text: Lena, you ready? Be careful not to shoot me.

Name: Lena
Text: You better be careful not to let any Hetero-Creature through.

Name: Sica
Text: Ayla, I need you to defend this position... I'll stay with you too. Will this really work?

Name: Ayla
Text: Their destiny may already be determined, but Iris Warbler never gives up!

Name: Sica
Text: Over there.

Name: Jacqued
Text: The frontline troops have engaged the enemies!

Name: Jacqued
Text: Hold your ground until the main force has evacuated!

Name: Ayla
Text: We await your order, Sica.

Name: Lena
Text: The decision is yours to make.

Name: Trojan
Text: I'm counting on you, so better do a good job.

Name: Sica
Text: Attack! Now!

Name: Jacqued
Text: Move the injured from position 1 to position 2. Where's the commando team?

Name: Jacqued
Text: Enter the position! Hurry!

Name: Jacqued
Text: Great job, commando team! Now focus fire on these Hetero-Creatures.

Name: Charles
Text: ...Holding position! I can still fight!

Name: Morris
Text: Almost there. Just a little longer, and we can go...

Name: Garcia
Text: I must survive. We are all going to survive this...

Name: Jacqued
Text: Babylonia, do you copy? I am the last survivor on my team. We have stalled the enemy for 1246 seconds...

Name: Jacqued
Text: We won't be able to provide any further cover for the evacuation. Please launch the Longinus Arsenal immediately...

Name: Jacqued
Text: I repeat, launch the Longinus Arsenal immediately...

Name: Lena
Text: They were staying behind to ensure Gray Raven could deliver the sample...

Name: Lena
Text: ...Even without the incident, it was hardly possible for them to return unscathed.

Name: Ayla
Text: Where are we...? This is the tree we saw in the center of the hall!

Name: Tips
Text: Reading memories...

Name: Trojan
Text: Did we really "die" just now? I hate to go through it again.

Name: Sica
Text: I still couldn't change it in the end...

Name: Lena
Text: It's foolish to try to change what had already happened. Well, I guess I don't get to say that, since I agreed to your plan in the first place.

Name: Sica
Text: What do they mean by Longinus Arsenal? No way... The strike came after all forces were fully evacuated!

Name: Lena
Text: Still so naive, huh?

Name: Lena
Text: Don't forget that they already lost contact with the HQ. It wouldn't take much effort to log them as killed in action.

Name: Joyce
Text: We detected a large number of Hetero-Creatures nearby again. You there, come help us!

Name: Joyce
Text: My infection level is already high. I'll bait them.

Name: Ayla
Text: ...Alright. Iris Warbler will protect you!

Name: Joyce
Text: Are you also survivors of the evacuation battle?

Name: Joyce
Text: Our position was overrun by Hetero-Creatures. We lost contact with the main forces.

Name: Joyce
Text: We are still within the impact range of Longinus Arsenal. Let's get out of here first.

Name: Kirk
Text: The Mother's fragment should have been already retrieved. It's Gray Raven after all.

Name: Kirk
Text: Just hold on a little longer. Maybe someone will come rescue us.

Name: Kirk
Text: My infection level is way overboard. Stay away from me for your own sake.

Name: Joyce
Text: (Sorry...)

Name: Carter
Text: Dammit, they just keep coming... Argh!

Name: Joyce
Text: (Coughs) Run... when you still can...

Name: Joyce
Text: I'm done for, but you still have hope.
