Name: Joyce
Text: Sorry, Kirk, Carter... I'm coming too.

Name: Joyce
Text: Sorry, Kirk, Carter... I'm coming too.

Name: Lena
Text: Target locked!

Name: Kirk
Text: Get lost, you filthy monster!

Name: Kirk
Text: Dammit, they just keep coming...

Name: Sica
Text: Perhaps... We should investigate over there?

Name: System
Text: Welcome to Constellia, the Capital of Arts. We aim to bring you a fantastic tour.

Name: System
Text: Please follow the instructions and explore the hall in the designated order.

Name: Ayla
Text: Check out the hall ahead before exploring this place.

Name: Haicma
Text: Greetings. Are you ready to explore?

Name: Haicma
Text: I'm ready when you are.

Name: Haicma
Text: I must admit that you are an outstanding Construct.

Name: Haicma
Text: Unfortunately, I still cannot answer your question.

Name: Sica
Text: This screen will take us to the Arctic Route Union Hall. Nothing to explore here.

Name: Sica
Text: This screen will take us to the Kowloong Hall. Nothing to explore here.

Name: Ayla
Text: What does this say...?

Name: Sica
Text: Something along the lines of "No entry," probably...

Name: Sica
Text: Where shall we go next...

Name: Ayla
Text: What a wonderful play! I must write down this inspiration.

Name: Ayla
Text: Hmm? The error codes disappeared...

Name: Sica
Text: Looks like we can go this way now.

Name: System
Text: Error codes disappeared. The Forest Hall is now available for exploration. Would you like to proceed?

Name: System
Text: Heading to the Forest Park Hall.

Name: Ayla
Text: One day, the Forest Park will become beautiful and peaceful again...

Name: Ayla
Text: That's what we have been fighting for, right?

Name: System
Text: You have already visited the Forest Park Hall. Would you like to explore again?

Name: Ayla
Text: Huh? Why are the error codes so complicated here?

Name: Ayla
Text: They seem to have more black borders around themselves... Why?

Name: Lena
Text: You're thinking too much. It's probably just to tell you that you can't go this way yet.

Name: Lena
Text: Let's check out the other side first.

Name: Ayla
Text: The artistic atmosphere is something I have never witnessed before.

Name: Ayla
Text: I can't wait to see this!

Name: System
Text: Error codes disappeared. The ■■■■ Hall is now available for exploration. Would you like to proceed?

Name: System
Text: Heading to the ■■■■ Hall.

Name: Ayla
Text: We've been here already!

Name: Ayla
Text: A civilization established by mechanoids... I have already thought of a new theme for my next work!

Name: System
Text: You have already visited the Church of Machina Hall. Would you like to explore again?

Name: System
Text: Heading to the Church of Machina Hall.

Name: Sica
Text: It seems like just an ordinary theater...

Name: Trojan
Text: Commandant, you should never let your guard down.

Name: System
Text: You can explore the Theater Hall now. Would you like to proceed?

Name: System
Text: Heading to the Theater Hall.

Name: Ayla
Text: The story of a knight and windmills... How nostalgic.

Name: Ayla
Text: The last time I read about it, I was still in Babylonia...

Name: Ayla
Text: Shall we watch it again?

Name: System
Text: You have already visited the Theater Hall. Would you like to explore again?

Name: Ayla
Text: Huh? New patterns just appear on this display panel!

Name: Ayla
Text: Is this... the lunar base?! Never thought it could recreate such a scene...

Name: System
Text: Would you like to go to the Moon Hall that just appeared?

Name: System
Text: Heading to the Moon Hall.

Name: Ayla
Text: We have already visited these two halls. Would you like to explore again?

Name: System
Text: You have already visited these two halls. Would you like to explore again?

Name: Ayla
Text: Hmm? This is a good background for photos.

Name: Ayla
Text: I knew my taste was good!

Name: Sica
Text: Huh, you want me to take the photo? But I'm not good at this...

Name: Ayla
Text: That was a good one, Sica. You should be more confident.

Name: Haicma
Text: Video data recorded.

Name: Haicma
Text: The structure of this video is in line with the basic logic. It should meet the standard of "good-looking."

Name: Ayla
Text: Hmm... Is this the taste of mechanoids?

Name: Ayla
Text: What about this angle? Not bad, isn't it?

Name: Sica
Text: An amazing angle indeed, Ayla.

Name: Ayla
Text: This place is full of memories. I must record everything properly.

Name: Ayla
Text: The photos, as well as my memories and emotions... I must not forget them.

Name: Ally
Text: Take this!

Name: Ally
Text: Take this!

Name: Ally
Text: Watch out! Grenade!

Name: α
Text: Is this... me during my time with Gray Raven?

Name: α
Text: Afterimage of the past... but what's the point now...

Name: α
Text: Hmph... I have no time to dwell on these.

Name: α
Text: Memories, so entangled... no matter whose they are...

Name: α
Text: If they stand in my way, I'll destroy them!

Name: Corrupted
Text: (Squeaking noises)

Name: Weak Construct
Text: Dammit! Where's Lucia?! She should be here with reinforcements!

Name: α
Text: This is... heh, for Hiro, those must be memories etched deep in his soul.

Name: α
Text: During that mission, Hiro got separated and encountered multiple Corrupted. Murol and Xun were also overwhelmed by the Corrupted horde.

Name: α
Text: By the time I reached Hiro, there wasn't a single piece of his cybernetic limbs left intact... He never lets me forget it—keeps playing the sympathy card over and over.

Name: α
Text: Ugh, dredging up these memories serves no purpose.

Name: α
Text: So you want to relive those glory days with me, huh? Alright then, I'm game.

Name: Gun-Wielding Construct A
Text: Murol, time to tighten our formation!

Name: Gun-Wielding Construct B
Text: Just the words I've been waiting to hear!

Name: Gun-Wielding Construct A
Text: Alright, 3, 2, 1! Lucia, let's do this!

Name: α
Text: Murol and Xun...

Name: α
Text: I'd almost forgotten what it felt like to fight alongside them.

Name: α
Text: Even if it's just a memory replay...

Name: α
Text: My team, Gray Raven... Is this our final mission?

Name: α
Text: After this, Murol, Xun, Hiro...

Name: α
Text: Enough with these pointless memories...

Name: α
Text: They... They shouldn't be here like this.

Name: α
Text: —It's over.

Name: α
Text: Xun, Hiro... you guys...

Name: Hiro
Text: Lucia... you actually...

Name: Hiro
Text: You've betrayed Babylonia! Struck a deal with the Ascendants!

Name: Murol
Text: After all the trust Ravenge placed in you!

Name: α
Text: Dammit... What the hell...

Name: Xun
Text: Let's take down this traitor of Gray Raven!

Name: α
Text: Dammit!
Farewell, Lucia.

Name: Lucia
Text: According to the elevator's floor plan, this floor seems to be their lab. Might find some useful info here.

Name: Lucia
Text: The first door leads to the decontamination path, and it's still functional.

Name: α
Text: The identity verification lock has been disengaged.

Name: α
Text: A lot of the data here is corrupted. Only a few logs remain.

Name: α
Text: Project Cthylla...?

Name: Lucia
Text: I remember this project started before the Punishing Virus.

Name: Lucia
Text: The first time I heard of it... was when Dad was watching the news.

Name: α
Text: Right, back then it was touted as a project that could grant humans immortality, intended to be used first on scientists and great minds.

Name: α
Text: Finding the project's name here means it's not entirely unrelated to Project Winter.

Name: Lucia
Text: Look, there's an experimental log here.

Name: Lucia
Text: From cloning embryos, to dissecting human bodies, to interfacing M.I.N.D. with mechanical frames...

Name: α
Text: Aside from the cloning, most of this is standard procedure for early Constructs. Nothing out of the ordinary.

Name: Lucia
Text: These frames, left in their culture vessels... they're part of the experiment...

Name: α
Text: Waking them up should give us the answers we need.

Name: System Voice
Text: Awakening specimen...

Name: System Voice
Text: Specimen vitality insufficient. Please proceed to the laboratory to inspect the procedure and replace the specimen!

Name: α
Text: The entrance ahead is unlocked. Let's go.

Name: α
Text: What are you looking at?

Name: Lucia
Text: Rest in peace...

Name: α
Text: No need to say that out loud. They can't hear you anymore.

Name: Lucia
Text: The dead may not hear, but those words are for the living's comfort.

Name: Lucia
Text: At least, that's what Liv would have said.

Name: Autonomous Defense Machine
Text: Alert! Intruders detected!

Name: Lucia
Text: There's another Construct here. Was he part of the experiments too?

Name: α
Text: Could be another intruder. Check him for anything useful.

Name: Lucia
Text: This terminal still works.

Name: α
Text: Let's see if there's any data left.

Name: Lucia
Text: Let me try.

Name: Lucia
Text: Is this... some kind of CUB?

Name: Lucia
Text: Was it originally yours?

Name: α
Text: Nah, just something similar.

Name: Lucia
Text: We could access through this vent, but it's likely crawling with hazards.

Name: α
Text: And it's too cramped. Combat would be clumsy for us both.

Name: Lucia
Text: What if we send the CUB in for a peek?

Name: α
Text: Worth a shot.

Name: α
Text: I felt something... watching us here earlier.

Name: α
Text: Or maybe it's just me?
Gender: Male\nStatus: Aberrant Test Subject

Name: Item Obtained
Text: Obtained [Admin's Key]
An admin's ID key—why would a test subject have it?
A standard-issue pistol, a common weapon from the Golden Age.
It's out of ammo.
Standard Chestplate, Rating: A
Undamaged. No signs of being attacked.

Name: System
Text: Mission target identified, condition intact.

Name: System
Text: Commencing recycle process.

Name: Lee
Text: ...Ugh, not again!

Name: Liv
Text: Plus, they're not just attacking randomly—they're focused!

Name: Lee
Text: Focused... Does that mean...

Name: Liv
Text: Cough... Commandant's down to half a mag. How're you holding up, Lee?

Name: Lee
Text: Don't worry. I can take care of myself.

Name: Lee
Text: How long until the transport craft arrives?

Name: Liv
Text: Roughly... 5 minutes!

Name: Lee
Text: Five minutes... Commandant, leave the mid-range enemies to me! You just handle those in your immediate vicinity!

Name: Liv
Text: I can help too!

Name: Liv
Text: The Levi-Gun's got charge left—I'll cover our flanks!

Name: Ayla
Text: I'm great at painting!

Name: Ayla
Text: I'm great at painting!

Name: System
Text: Are you sure you want to exit the game?

Name: System
Text: Please select a visual style you prefer.

Name: Tips
Text: You have the option to start from the middle or before a boss, but there will be no tutorial.

Name: Tips
Text: If you're not well-acquainted with the controls, it's best to start over.

Name: System
Text: Choose your starting point.

Name: Tips
Text: Are you sure you want to exit the game?

Name: Girl On Her Own
Text: Yoo-hoo! Time to wipe out the enemies!

Name: Girl On Her Own
Text: Let me check the tip... "Lasers that kill on contact"?! Gotta get out of here!

Name: Girl On Her Own
Text: So this is the big boss? Looks cute!

Name: Girl On Her Own
Text: But why does the name sound like it will enter a second phase when below 50% HP...?

Name: World-Devouring Shark (Phase 1 only)
Text: Watch out! I'm evolving into Phase 2!

Name: Girl On Her Own
Text: I knew there'd be a second phase!

Name: Girl On Her Own
Text: But if we beat it, your world will be saved!

Name: Girl On Her Own
Text: It's time to say goodbye, then. Our world-saving journey ends here.

Name: Girl On Her Own
Text: Don't be sad, though. It's just a game, after all. Who knows, we might bump into each other in another world!

Name: Girl On Her Own
Text: Thank you! It's because of your participation that a game can truly be a game, a challenge can truly be a challenge.

Name: Girl On Her Own
Text: And life... can truly be life!

Name: Girl On Her Own
Text: Wow, you're like an official cheat code!

Name: Arcana
Text: Sage, I'll guide Power to charge up. You just focus on the battle.

Name: Arcana
Text: It seems we've cleared the scattered Corrupted, but the Punishing reaction hasn't stopped.

Name: Nanami
Text: So you're their boss, huh? Time for Nanami and Power to send you flying!

Name: Arcana
Text: Checking server... all good. Sage, we've done it.

Name: Bianca
Text: This figure looks familiar...

Name: Bianca
Text: Gone? Who sabotaged the information here?

Name: Bianca
Text: (Only the Ascendants can interfere with Punishing Virus, but how did they know where to look with the Phantom Tracer?)

Name: Bianca
Text: (Such precise sabotage of the Phantom Tracer's required info... Could it be...)

Name: Bianca
Text: The information here was sabotaged.

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Was it? Uh, I have no idea what happened.

Name: Bianca
Text: Your team has been overseeing this area.

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Perhaps it was an... accidental mishap.

Name: Bianca
Text: With the Spear of F.O.S., accidental damage could happen, but not with the Phantom Tracer.

Name: Bianca
Text: Have you met... the Ascendants?

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: We've been compromised. She can't be allowed to leave alive!

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: As long as the Purifying Force captain dies during the investigation, this will be covered up.

Name: Bianca
Text: Why help the Ascendants? Who's pulling the strings?

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Ask Chiko in hell. She got her hands on some clues but never got the chance to follow through.

Name: Bianca
Text: So her sudden reassignment was because of this? Her death is related to this?!

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Like I said, ask her in hell!

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Now!

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Impressive... as expected of a captain...

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: It wasn't even your full power, was it?

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: You will go to hell... witch...

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: To arms!

Name: Renee
Text: What do you think you're doing?!

Name: Renee
Text: Captain! Let me help you!

Name: Renee
Text: Ugh... Can't move...

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: You two-faced hypocrite...!

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: You talk about bringing deserters back for questioning, but you don't hesitate to strike down your own?

Name: Bianca
Text: If you showed signs of surrendering, I would have stopped.

Name: Construct Soldier
Text: Alright, alright! We surrender!

Name: Bianca
Text: Drop your weapons and wear the collars. I know you carry them.

Name: Rosetta
Text: The road ahead is fraught with challenges. Are you sure you want to continue?

Name: Rosetta
Text: You'll also have to defeat your inner demons.
Are you ready to face your inner demons?
Let's dance!!!
You've survived the harshest winter. It's time to leave.

Name: Lee
Text: These wandering enemies are our final challenge.

Name: Lee
Text: We're approaching the program's core. These monsters are revealing their feature codes.

Name: Lee
Text: From this point on... we can analyze these codes.

Name: Liv
Text: Lee! We've finished the battle on our end too.

Name: Liv
Text: By the way, we haven't taken a group photo this year...

Name: Liv
Text: Since we're all here, how about a keepsake photo?

Name: Lee
Text: I guess we'll need the commandant for that.

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant, we're all set.

Name: Karenina
Text: These Hetero-Creatures shouldn't be at the lunar base!

Name: Karenina
Text: Does this mean there's another anomaly coming up?

Name: Lee
Text: Even though it's just a data recreation, we must always be on our guard inside the Hetero Tower.

Name: Lee
Text: This tower is full of things that defy explanation...

Name: Conductor
Text: No need to worry. I'll keep you all safe.

Name: Conductor
Text: Everyone, please proceed through here in the manner you're most familiar with. Of course, all of this is within the simulation calculations.

Name: Lee
Text: It seems... we have to pass through here first. Be careful, Commandant.

Name: Test Bot
Text: 1st Row

Name: Test Bot
Text: 2nd Row

Name: Test Bot
Text: 3rd Row

Name: Test Bot
Text: 4th Row

Name: Qu (?)
Text: Poor soul shackled by your homeland... Is this the ending you desire?

Name: Qu (?)
Text: It is a dream, so all your obsessions can be materialized.

Name: Qu (?)
Text: The dream can show you all the endings you desire.

Name: Qu (?)
Text: You have already made your choice. Why go the opposite way?

Name: Qu (?)
Text: Dreams will never stop. They just cycle endlessly.

Name: Qu (?)
Text: Are you guided by the homeland's call, dreamer...?

Name: Lee
Text: The door's open. Thanks.

Name: Lee
Text: I see. So this is how it works... The door's open. No danger sighted ahead.

Name: Lee
Text: Commandant, the door is about to open. Watch your surroundings.

Name: Lee
Text: How is it going over there?

Name: Lee
Text: Maybe the switch is on your side, Commandant?

Name: Lee
Text: You might need to upgrade the vision module on your exoskeleton. The switch should be just around you. Keep searching.

Name: Lee
Text: Commandant, the starting point is right behind me.

Name: Lee
Text: Commandant? I can only blow this wall up if you want me to move back further.

Name: Lee
Text: Are you caught in a trap? The signal connection is all good. Stop pretending that you can't hear me.

Name: Lee
Text: This is quite a new model of hydraulic lifting service...

Name: Lee
Text: Are you zoning out? We won't leave this maze if you keep doing that.

Name: Lee
Text: Our Rapport has dropped to zero. I'm afraid we have failed. Let's try again. This time, I won't be too far away.

Name: Lee
Text: Stay closer, you are out of range... Stop walking away! Are you trying to make us stay in this maze forever?

Name: Lee
Text: A hydraulic lifting device? I wonder where the repeater is... Could it be inside the wall?

Name: Lee
Text: But if that's the case, where do the signals come from?

Name: Lee
Text: I see. They are from the decorations... A very sophisticated design indeed.

Name: Lee
Text: Commandant, I believe we can draw reference from this device and prepare a proposal to reinforce the outer defense walls of conservation areas.

Name: Lee
Text: Commandant? Are you feeling alright?

Name: Lee
Text: The design of this hall is also well thought out. It can broadcast music to...

Name: Lee
Text: ...Wait, what's this music?

Name: Lee
Text: ...I would rather you take this time to have more rest.

Name: Lee
Text: ...Forget about it. What's next? A photo together?

Name: Tips
Text: Which path would you like to choose? The left one, or the right one?

Name: Sign
Text: In front of you are two paths. Please choose one to enter. Your partner will enter the other one.

Name: Lucia
Text: The door on my side is open, Commandant.

Name: Lucia
Text: The door is open, Commandant. Thanks.

Name: Lucia
Text: Is the door open, Commandant?

Name: Lucia
Text: I have pressed the switch. Is the door open already?

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant, this door is still locked.

Name: Lucia
Text: The door in front is still closed... What's going on?

Name: Lucia
Text: The wall is right behind me, Commandant.

Name: Lucia
Text: I'm unable to move back, Commandant. Should I break through the wall?

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant? Hello? Is there a connection problem?

Name: Lucia
Text: ...Commandant?

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant, we are running out of time. Time to move on.

Name: Lucia
Text: Have we failed? Don't worry, Commandant, I have already remembered the routes. We will make it work the next time.

Name: Lucia
Text: Watch out, Commandant. You seem to be out of range. Stay closer to me.

Name: Liv
Text: The door is open, Commandant. Thank you.

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant, the door here is open.

Name: Liv
Text: Leave it to me, Commandant.

Name: Liv
Text: Is the door open on your side, Commandant?

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant? Is everything alright? The door seems to be still closed.

Name: Liv
Text: The door is still locked. Can you find any switch on your side, Commandant?

Name: Liv
Text: There is no other path behind me, Commandant.

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant? Are we going back to the starting point?

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant...? Are you tired?

Name: Liv
Text: ...You don't sound very well. Commandant, please don't push yourself too hard.

Name: Liv
Text: We can rest once we are out of the maze. Please keep going, Commandant.

Name: Liv
Text: I think we have failed... But don't worry, Commandant. I will always be by your side.

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant, you are out of the circle. Stay closer to me.

Name: Bianca
Text: The door's open for me to pass. Thanks, Commandant.

Name: Bianca
Text: Thank you, Commandant.

Name: Bianca
Text: Is the door open on your side, Commandant?

Name: Bianca
Text: You can move forward now, Commandant.

Name: Bianca
Text: The door is still locked, Commandant.

Name: Bianca
Text: Is there any other mechanism nearby, Commandant?

Name: Bianca
Text: There's no way behind me, Commandant.

Name: Bianca
Text: Go back? Um... There is no way behind me, Commandant.

Name: Bianca
Text: I await your instructions, Commandant.

Name: Bianca
Text: Commandant? Is there an emergency?

Name: Bianca
Text: We need to keep going, Commandant.

Name: Bianca
Text: There's no need to worry, Commandant. We still have lots of time.

Name: Bianca
Text: Stay closer to me, Commandant. You are almost out of range.

Name: Nanami
Text: Beep—! The door's open!

Name: Nanami
Text: Open sesame! Hehe, thanks, Commandant!

Name: Nanami
Text: Commandant! The door's open!

Name: Nanami
Text: Beep! I just opened the door!

Name: Nanami
Text: The door's still locked— Keep working, Commandant!

Name: Nanami
Text: Huh? Commandant, can you hear me? The door on my side is still locked!

Name: Nanami
Text: Eh? There's no way behind me!

Name: Nanami
Text: There's no way behind... Shall I deploy Power to break the wall? I'm ready!

Name: Nanami
Text: Commandant? Is there another order? I'm about to go in!

Name: Nanami
Text: Commandant? Hmm? Did I just lose connection with you? C-o-m-m-a-n-d-a-n-t!

Name: Nanami
Text: Knock knock, Commandant, are you there? Time to go!

Name: Nanami
Text: What, did we fail? Cheer up, Commandant! We still have plenty of time. I'll always be with you!

Name: Nanami
Text: Stay closer to Nanami, Commandant! You're going out of the circle!

Name: Kamui
Text: Wow, the door's open! Thanks, Commandant!

Name: Kamui
Text: The door just opened! Thanks!

Name: Kamui
Text: Is the door open on your side, Commandant?

Name: Kamui
Text: Hah, found it! Here's the switch!

Name: Kamui
Text: Commandant, this door is still locked.

Name: Kamui
Text: Hmm... I can't seem to shake it open. Perhaps you still need to press some switch, Commandant.

Name: Kamui
Text: There seems to be no other way behind... Do we have another option?

Name: Kamui
Text: I'm already back to the starting point, Commandant.

Name: Kamui
Text: Oh, I can see Commandant when I jump up! Hey! I'm still here!

Name: Kamui
Text: Commandant— Where are you?

Name: Kamui
Text: Why am I not hearing from you, Commandant? Commandant! We need to go!

Name: Kamui
Text: Don't give up, Commandant! Let's do it again!

Name: Kamui
Text: Whoa, Commandant, you are almost out of the circle! Stay closer!

Name: Karenina
Text: The door's open, Commandant.

Name: Karenina
Text: Hmm... The door's open, but the cables seem to be quite aged and loose. They need some maintenance.

Name: Karenina
Text: Is the door open? I have already pressed the switch here.

Name: Karenina
Text: ...I have pressed the switch. Is the door open? ...Never mind, just checking because the switch was a little rusty.

Name: Karenina
Text: ...It doesn't seem to be a connection problem. Is there any switch you haven't pressed over there?

Name: Karenina
Text: The door ahead is still locked. If there is nothing you can do, I'm going to break through with force—

Name: Karenina
Text: Go back? There's no way back!

Name: Karenina
Text: ...I'm already at the starting point! Where else do you want me to go?!

Name: Karenina
Text: Hello? Commandant? You better not be slacking off!

Name: Karenina
Text: Why is this lifting device so noisy...?

Name: Karenina
Text: Commandant? You aren't spacing out, are you? There's a fair bit of walk before the end point. Wake up!

Name: Karenina
Text: It must be the aged circuit's problem! No way I would fail... Let's do it again! I will find out what's going on with this maze!

Name: Karenina
Text: Hey, stay closer to me. You are walking out of the circle!

Name: Watanabe
Text: The door is open. Thanks.

Name: Watanabe
Text: The door is open.

Name: Watanabe
Text: How is it going on your side? Is the door open?

Name: Watanabe
Text: Hmm... Here's a switch. Alright, is the door open over there?

Name: Watanabe
Text: I can't move any further. The door is still locked. Can you check the surroundings?

Name: Watanabe
Text: The door is still locked... Can you find any switch over there?

Name: Watanabe
Text: ...I'm already back to the starting point.

Name: Watanabe
Text: There's no way behind. Do you have any other clue?

Name: Watanabe
Text: Hmm? I can't hear anything. Are you too tired?

Name: Watanabe
Text: Keep resting. You don't often get to rest like this.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Shall we keep walking? We can take a good break after clearing this maze.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Did we fail? That's okay. We still have plenty of time.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Stay closer to me. You are about to move out of the circle.

Name: α
Text: The door is open.

Name: α
Text: It's open.

Name: α
Text: Tch. Is it open yet?

Name: α
Text: ...So much trouble. Is the door open?

Name: α
Text: Should I break this locked door apart?

Name: α
Text: The door is locked. I assume you don't want me to rush to the maze's end yet.

Name: α
Text: Back? There is no way back. What do you want me to do?

Name: α
Text: I'm already at the starting point.

Name: α
Text: Are you sure you want to leave an Ascendant here alone?

Name: α
Text: You shouldn't be able to see what I'm doing here. If that's the case...

Name: α
Text: Have you had enough rest already? I have no time to waste with you here. What's next?

Name: α
Text: ...Failed? Just do it again then.

Name: α
Text: Stay closer to me, otherwise you will fail.

Name: Ayla
Text: Commandant, the door is open.

Name: Ayla
Text: The door's open! Just as I thought, there's always something new behind it.

Name: Ayla
Text: Here's a switch... Commandant? Is the door open?

Name: Ayla
Text: They put the switch in such a place... Watch out, Commandant. The door's about to open.

Name: Ayla
Text: The door is still locked, Commandant.

Name: Ayla
Text: I like the pattern on the door, but it's still locked, Commandant.

Name: Ayla
Text: ...Do I still have to move back? I'm already at the starting point.

Name: Ayla
Text: There's no way behind me, Commandant.

Name: Ayla
Text: Tired? Shall we take a break together?

Name: Ayla
Text: A very special color... I wonder how they mixed it? Like this?

Name: Ayla
Text: Commandant? We need to keep going. There are more scenes to be seen in the maze.

Name: Ayla
Text: Failed? That's okay, I will stay here with you. Let me know anytime if you'd like to enter the maze again!

Name: Ayla
Text: Hey, stay closer to me, Commandant. You're almost out of the circle.

Name: Sophia
Text: Door, open.

Name: Sophia
Text: Commandant, the door here is open.

Name: Sophia
Text: Is the door open on your side, Commandant?

Name: Sophia
Text: I have pressed the switch. Commandant, you should be able to move forward now.

Name: Sophia
Text: The door is still locked. Any other instructions, Commandant?

Name: Sophia
Text: The switch may be at your side, Commandant. Would you like to look around?

Name: Sophia
Text: There's no other way behind. Should I go from the ventilation pipe?

Name: Sophia
Text: I'm already at the starting point.

Name: Sophia
Text: Hmm... This place... is different from the train.

Name: Sophia
Text: Commandant... Commandant? Hello?

Name: Sophia
Text: It's time to keep moving, Commandant.

Name: Sophia
Text: It's okay, Commandant. I can come back with you many times.

Name: Sophia
Text: Commandant, you seem to be walking out of the connection range... Please stay closer to me.

Name: Chrome
Text: The door's already open. Thanks, Commandant.

Name: Chrome
Text: Here's a door... Oh, the switch is on your side. Thanks, Commandant.

Name: Chrome
Text: I just turned on the switch. Is the door open, Commandant?

Name: Chrome
Text: Commandant, the door should be open by now. You can move forward.

Name: Chrome
Text: Hmm... The door seems to be still locked. Maybe the switch is on your side, Commandant?

Name: Chrome
Text: The door is still locked. Take a look at your surroundings, Commandant.

Name: Chrome
Text: There's no other way behind, Commandant.

Name: Chrome
Text: I'm back to where I started, Commandant.

Name: Chrome
Text: Hmm... This operation has given me ideas for a new way of training...

Name: Chrome
Text: Looking at this route... What if I modify the design and put in some traps? Oh, Commandant, I thought you weren't listening.

Name: Chrome
Text: Commandant? Checking connection... All good. Shall we keep going? We haven't reached the end of the maze yet.

Name: Chrome
Text: Failure means we are one step closer to success. Don't give up, Commandant. Shall we explore the maze again?

Name: Chrome
Text: Commandant, I think you are leaving the circle. Please come closer.

Name: Vera
Text: The door's open, what's next? Why is there still a long way ahead...

Name: Vera
Text: Yeah, the door's open.

Name: Vera
Text: The door should be open. Can you see it?

Name: Vera
Text: What do I do with this thing... Okay, I pressed. Now what? Is the door open?

Name: Vera
Text: Keep going? Do you want me to cut this locked door open?

Name: Vera
Text: You're right, the door is still locked. Keep trying, C-o-m-m-a-n-d-a-n-t.

Name: Vera
Text: ...I'm already at the starting point. Do you want me to go out and leave you behind?

Name: Vera
Text: There is no, way, behind.

Name: Vera
Text: What a childish game... I don't mind playing it occasionally though.

Name: Vera
Text: Hello...? How can you space out at such a time? What are you, a kid?

Name: Vera
Text: If you keep zoning out, I'm going to cut this place apart and find you.

Name: Vera
Text: Failed? I didn't expect that. But it's okay, I promised to finish this maze with you, and I will stay until we do.

Name: Vera
Text: Hey, you are out of range. Are you trying to run away? Don't make me lock you up with a collar.

Name: Luna
Text: The door's already open.

Name: Luna
Text: The door just opened... So the switch was on your side.

Name: Luna
Text: I think I should press this switch... The door should be open now.

Name: Luna
Text: The door on your side should be open now.

Name: Luna
Text: I can't move forward. The door's still locked.

Name: Luna
Text: The door is still locked.

Name: Luna
Text: There is no other way back.

Name: Luna
Text: What are you doing? There's no way behind.

Name: Luna
Text: Is this what a maze is like...?

Name: Luna
Text: Where are you...?

Name: Luna
Text: There is a long way ahead. We must keep going.

Name: Luna
Text: Failed? That's okay. I will continue on this journey with you in the limited time we have.

Name: Luna
Text: Stay closer before the connection breaks.

Name: Camu
Text: Let's keep going. The door on my side is open.

Name: Camu
Text: The door's already open... Should I keep going?

Name: Camu
Text: It really pisses me off that I can't see what's going on at your side... Is the door open yet?

Name: Camu
Text: Here's a switch... Tch, what a boring little trick. Is the door open on your side?

Name: Camu
Text: The door's still locked. Should I climb over?

Name: Camu
Text: The door is quite strong... How about you keep looking for the switch?

Name: Camu
Text: There's no way behind.

Name: Camu
Text: Hey, I'm already at the starting point. There's no way back!

Name: Camu
Text: Hmm... So it's really just a maze?

Name: Camu
Text: You aren't daydreaming, are you? Why do you look so disoriented?

Name: Camu
Text: Hey, can you hear me? There's still a long way in front. Wake up!

Name: Camu
Text: Tch, that must be an accident. Let's do it again! I refuse to believe that we can't get past a small maze like this!

Name: Camu
Text: Hey, don't go too far from me!

Name: Rosetta
Text: Thanks, Commandant. The door here is already open.

Name: Rosetta
Text: So the door needs to be open from the other side... It's open now. Thanks, Commandant.

Name: Rosetta
Text: There's nothing unusual nearby. Is the door open, Commandant?

Name: Rosetta
Text: ...The door should be open now. The switch seems to be... still functioning?

Name: Rosetta
Text: Is the door jammed...? Hmm, don't think so. Commandant, can you look around a bit more?

Name: Rosetta
Text: The door's still locked, Commandant.

Name: Rosetta
Text: Um... There seems to be no way behind.

Name: Rosetta
Text: Commandant? There's no other way behind me. Any other instructions?

Name: Rosetta
Text: There are no broken buttons, or suddenly collapsed walls... I'm surprised.

Name: Rosetta
Text: Are you trying to take a break, Commandant?

Name: Rosetta
Text: Commandant? The end point should be right ahead. I need your instruction.

Name: Rosetta
Text: Um... Maybe my bad luck was haunting us. Can we try again, Commandant?

Name: Rosetta
Text: Ah, Commandant, please stay closer. You are about to move out of range.

Name: Qu
Text: Good job. The door's open.

Name: Qu
Text: The door's open. Very good.

Name: Qu
Text: Are you asking me to... press this switch?

Name: Qu
Text: ...Nobody dared to make me open the door for them, except you.

Name: Qu
Text: Let me activate Lord of Kowloong's access... It didn't work? The door is still locked.

Name: Qu
Text: Who would have thought that I, the Lord of Kowloong, couldn't open this simple door...? What, the switch is on your side? Hmph...

Name: Qu
Text: I'm already at the starting point of this maze. Do you want me to go back to Kowloong instead?

Name: Qu
Text: I repeat, there is no way behind.

Name: Qu
Text: The design of this maze... is quite sophisticated.

Name: Qu
Text: Are you making me wait here for nothing? Only you have the guts to do this.

Name: Qu
Text: You invited me here, and left me here waiting? Get up. We haven't cleared the maze yet.

Name: Qu
Text: "Failure" is a word that will never be found in my dictionary. Keep going. I will conquer this place with you.

Name: Qu
Text: Stay closer. You are about to move out of the circle.

Name: Changyu
Text: Wow! The door's open. How interesting.

Name: Changyu
Text: The switch to the door here... How can it be at your side?

Name: Changyu
Text: Hey! Is the door open?

Name: Changyu
Text: Easy-peasy! Let's keep going!

Name: Changyu
Text: I'll move forward... Oh, the door's still locked. Maybe you should keep looking around?

Name: Changyu
Text: The door didn't open, nor did I find any switch nearby... Could it be at your side?

Name: Changyu
Text: Huh? But I'm already at the starting point.

Name: Changyu
Text: Go back...? I can only take a small step, because I'm already at the starting point.

Name: Changyu
Text: What if we give this place a Kowloong theme...? Right, that theater play would fit just right!

Name: Changyu
Text: Are there any other fun things to do...?

Name: Changyu
Text: Hello? The connection seems to be working fine... Wake up, we still have more to go.

Name: Changyu
Text: Oops, we failed... But that's okay. Let's do it again! There is still plenty of time!

Name: Changyu
Text: Stay closer. The connection is about to break!

Name: Wanshi
Text: Hmm... The door has opened.

Name: Wanshi
Text: Um... Should I just keep going forward?

Name: Wanshi
Text: I think I need to do this... Is the door open, Commandant?

Name: Wanshi
Text: The door should have opened... What else should I do?

Name: Wanshi
Text: The door... is still locked.

Name: Wanshi
Text: I can't keep going. The door is still locked... Is the switch on your side, Commandant?

Name: Wanshi
Text: I'm already back to the starting point...

Name: Wanshi
Text: There seems to be no other way behind...

Name: Wanshi
Text: Phew... Is it break time yet?

Name: Wanshi
Text: Zzzzzzz...

Name: Wanshi
Text: Are we still going ahead? Or shall we find a maintenance chamber to take a nap?

Name: Wanshi
Text: Failed...? Hmm... No worries, I can still do it one more time with you... Sleep? I can do that later. You are more important after all.

Name: Wanshi
Text: Stay close to me, Commandant. Once you are out of that circle, the connection will be lost.

Name: Selena
Text: The door is open, Conductor.

Name: Selena
Text: A very sophisticated design... Is it trying to tell us our heart is connected to the other person's hand?

Name: Selena
Text: Is the door open, Conductor?

Name: Selena
Text: When the door of my heart swings wide, dusk and evening stars collide... Is the door open, Conductor?

Name: Selena
Text: Conductor... Are you trying to tell me our hearts can connect to each other even without a passage?

Name: Selena
Text: The door has not opened yet. Check your surroundings, Conductor.

Name: Selena
Text: My journey has returned to its starting point, but the finale to our melody is yet to be found...

Name: Selena
Text: Ah, Conductor, what I wanted to say was... There's no way behind.

Name: Selena
Text: I like this place, but I guess I enjoy spending time with you more, Conductor...

Name: Selena
Text: Though we are apart in sight, our souls stand close together.

Name: Selena
Text: Conductor? I yearn to pass time with you like this... But I still long to see your face.

Name: Selena
Text: Worry not, Conductor, for I will stay by your side even amidst a storm. Let's embark on this journey again, and together we will prevail.

Name: Selena
Text: Conductor? Please stay closer... Don't let our connection break.

Name: No. 21
Text: Okay, the door is open.

Name: No. 21
Text: Commandant, the door is open.

Name: No. 21
Text: Is this the switch that controls the door on your side, Commandant?

Name: No. 21
Text: No danger sighted... I have turned on the switch. Is the door open, Commandant?

Name: No. 21
Text: Sniff... The door didn't open. Is there any other way?

Name: No. 21
Text: There's no way ahead... The door didn't open either.

Name: No. 21
Text: I'm going to leave the maze if I keep going back.

Name: No. 21
Text: There's no way behind, Commandant.

Name: No. 21
Text: Sniff... It's Commandant's smell. Commandant is right there.

Name: No. 21
Text: If I climb to the top of the pillar... I'll be able to see Commandant.

Name: No. 21
Text: Hmm... Hello? Hello? Did the connection drop out? I can't hear Commandant...

Name: No. 21
Text: Failed...? That's okay. Commandant, I can play this with you once again, or many times more.

Name: No. 21
Text: Commandant... Commandant? Stay closer... The connection is about to break.

Name: Roland
Text: The door is open... What an amazing feeling.

Name: Roland
Text: Hmm... Is this how the door is controlled? The switch on your side will operate my door?

Name: Roland
Text: Here's a switch... Hey, is the door open over there?

Name: Roland
Text: Will you stay in this maze forever if I don't open this door? Aha, I was just kidding, of course.

Name: Roland
Text: Should I talk to this door to make it open by itself?

Name: Roland
Text: The door didn't open. Should I do something else to it?

Name: Roland
Text: "O dear Commandant, I have no way back..." I really mean it.

Name: Roland
Text: Should I greet you while standing on a pillar at the starting point?

Name: Roland
Text: Entrusting my path to someone else... is surprisingly fun.

Name: Roland
Text: What a special "maze"... Now I'm looking forward to the moment we meet.

Name: Roland
Text: Um-hum? Are you actually spacing out? Aren't you worried that I might do something to this maze? Keep going. I look forward to seeing your face.

Name: Roland
Text: Failed? Isn't it normal? Of course, I will stay with you until you successfully clear the maze.

Name: Roland
Text: The connection is about to break. Do you hate to stay near me that much?

Name: Pulao
Text: Wow! It actually opened!

Name: Pulao
Text: The door's already open, Commandant!

Name: Pulao
Text: Should I press this switch...? Hey! Is the door open on your side, Commandant?

Name: Pulao
Text: Hmm... Found it! Here's the switch!

Name: Pulao
Text: Huh? The door hasn't opened yet. Can you keep looking around, Commandant?

Name: Pulao
Text: The switch isn't here... Keep looking around, Commandant!

Name: Pulao
Text: Back... There is no way back. Commandant, can you find any other ways?

Name: Pulao
Text: There's no way behind me. There should be another path... Right, Commandant?

Name: Pulao
Text: Left, right, left, right... Gargh! I can't remember the route at all!

Name: Pulao
Text: I wonder what the end point will look like...

Name: Pulao
Text: Commandant—? Are you still there? Hello? There's still a long way to go!

Name: Pulao
Text: Failed... But that's okay! As long as I'm with Commandant, I can be braver than ever! Let's do it again, Commandant!

Name: Pulao
Text: Hey, Commandant, come closer! You are walking out of the circle!

Name: Haicma
Text: The door here is open, Commandant.

Name: Haicma
Text: The door is open. Thanks, Commandant.

Name: Haicma
Text: Commandant, I have pressed the switch. You can go.

Name: Haicma
Text: The switch has been activated. Commandant, please move forward as soon as possible.

Name: Haicma
Text: Commandant, the switch to this door should be on your side.

Name: Haicma
Text: Please turn on the switch on your side so I can move forward.

Name: Haicma
Text: There is no other way behind. Should I leave the maze and enter again?

Name: Haicma
Text: No route detected behind.

Name: Haicma
Text: Reading maze instructions... Unable to interpret certain phrases outlined in the procedures.

Name: Haicma
Text: I "want" to see Commandant... Unable to analyze the cause of this data fragment.

Name: Haicma
Text: Commandant, the break time is over. According to the maze procedures, we must continue moving forward.

Name: Haicma
Text: Commandant, my calculation indicates our chance to clear this maze in the next attempt is 99.89%. I'm ready when you are.

Name: Haicma
Text: Commandant, please stay close to me. You have walked out of the circle.

Name: Noan
Text: This door is open. Thanks, Commandant.

Name: Noan
Text: The door is open on my side. I'll be there soon.

Name: Noan
Text: For a switch like this, I only need to punch it like what we always do in the Inspection Team... Just kidding. Is the door open, Commandant?

Name: Noan
Text: The door is open. Come, I'm waiting for you.

Name: Noan
Text: Commandant? The door ahead is still locked. Do you need help?

Name: Noan
Text: The switch to open this door should be near you. Can you look around?

Name: Noan
Text: There's no way behind. Let's look for a solution together.

Name: Noan
Text: The fun of exploration comes from discovering other different routes. Let's try again.

Name: Noan
Text: A place like this means warm spring is just around the corner. Is that something you look forward to?

Name: Noan
Text: Commandant— Hmm... Commandant? I'm okay, don't worry. I just realized sometimes you would give me interesting responses when I called you in a different tone.

Name: Noan
Text: Tired? Just take a break if you need to. I don't have any plans, so I can stay here till you feel better.

Name: Noan
Text: We didn't reach the end, but the information collected will help us in the next attempt. Let's do it again.

Name: Noan
Text: Don't go too far from me, Commandant. Stay within the circle.

Name: Bambinata
Text: Commandant, the door is open.

Name: Bambinata
Text: Roger that. Moving through the door.

Name: Bambinata
Text: The switch has been activated. Your command is executed.

Name: Bambinata
Text: Roger. Should I just press the switch like this?

Name: Bambinata
Text: Moving forward... Ouch. I-I just hit the door.

Name: Bambinata
Text: The door is still locked. I request permission for the weapon system to open this door.

Name: Bambinata
Text: Moving back... Ouch! I'm already leaning on a pillar...

Name: Bambinata
Text: Bambinata is already at the starting point. Should I return from the maze?

Name: Bambinata
Text: Hmm, no new order received...

Name: Bambinata
Text: Hmm? Why am I doing this... There is no related memory data in my M.I.N.D...

Name: Bambinata
Text: Commandant... Are you resting? Do you need anything from Bambinata? Um... What should Bambinata do...?

Name: Bambinata
Text: Failed... Did Bambinata fail to execute Commandant's order? No? Then... Shall we try again? I must clear the maze this time...

Name: Bambinata
Text: Please stay closer to Bambinata. Um... The connection is about to drop out...

Name: Hanying
Text: The door here is open.

Name: Hanying
Text: The door is open. What a delicate design.

Name: Hanying
Text: Hmm... Is this how I should do it?

Name: Hanying
Text: The door should be open. Can you see it? I think I just heard the spinning and turning sound of some machinery.

Name: Hanying
Text: Keep going? But there is no way in front, Commandant.

Name: Hanying
Text: Is there another switch on your side? The door is still locked.

Name: Hanying
Text: Hmm... I can't see any path behind me. Should I look for other ways?

Name: Hanying
Text: Should I keep moving backward? There is no way behind me.

Name: Hanying
Text: "A deep gloom broods over Heaven and Earth. In the rank grass crickets are chirping, and parasol-trees, startled, let fall their leaves." Oh, Commandant, I didn't know you were listening.

Name: Hanying
Text: I feel a little lonely sometimes...

Name: Hanying
Text: Commandant? Do you need a break? Or... Shall we clear this maze first?

Name: Hanying
Text: It's okay, Commandant, we still have plenty of time. Let's do it again. I will always be here.

Name: Hanying
Text: Hmm... Come closer, Commandant. You are leaving the circle.

Name: Tips
Text: Tap this button to switch to <color=#33CCFF>Top-down Mode</color> and observe the structure of the entire maze from above.

Name: Tips
Text: In Top-down Mode, <color=#33CCFF>move the joystick</color> left and right to view the maze.\nTap the button again to leave Top-down Mode.

Name: Tips
Text: Tap the <color=#33CCFF>Forward/Stop/Back</color> button to make your Construct teammate move <color=#33CCFF>forward/stop/backward</color>. Tapping the button again will stop their action.

Name: Tips
Text: Tap the Stop button to make the Construct stop moving.

Name: Tips
Text: Quick Clear will teleport Commandant and teammate directly to the end of the maze. Would you like to use <color=#33CCFF>Quick Clear</color>?

Name: Tips
Text: Always watch out for your <color=#33CCFF>Rapport</color> on the top.\nOnce your Rapport drops to 0, the challenge will fail.

Name: Tips
Text: Please note that Rapport will drop when Commandant is <color=#33CCFF>too far away</color> from the teammate (outside the large circle displayed on the ground).

Name: Tips
Text: Try to maintain Rapport and clear the maze!

Name: Tips
Text: Commandant or teammate must step on the <color=#33CCFF>switch</color> on the ground to open the corresponding <color=#33CCFF>door</color> located on the other side of the maze.

Name: Tips
Text: The door on my side is open.

Name: Tips
Text: Commandant, the door on your side is open.

Name: Tips
Text: I can't move forward. Please look for a switch, Commandant.

Name: Tips
Text: I can't go back any further.

Name: Tips
Text: Commandant, please look for a switch or give me an order.

Name: Tips
Text: Zero Rapport left. Challenge failed.

Name: Tips
Text: Commandant, you are out of the safe range.

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant, we have both successfully cleared the maze.

Name: Lucia
Text: I don't often see a maze like this.

Name: Lucia
Text: Still, I think its design is flawed. I cannot protect your when we are separated.

Name: Lucia
Text: I want to stay with you as much as possible if the situation permits.

Name: Lucia
Text: So I can be there immediately when you are in danger.

Name: Lucia
Text: It's not only my duty... But also my wish.

Name: Lucia
Text: I'm always at your orders, Commandant.

Name: Lucia
Text: The ending point is right in front. No danger detected. We are clear to go.

Name: Liv
Text: We made it, Commandant.

Name: Liv
Text: Does it mean we have great synergy?

Name: Liv
Text: It feels good to strive together...

Name: Liv
Text: Hmm? The building above looks like a ceremony hall.

Name: Liv
Text: In the Golden Age, people would go to such a hall for their wedding ceremonies.

Name: Liv
Text: Maybe this maze was designed this way...

Name: Liv
Text: To let partners feel that experience in advance...

Name: Liv
Text: Um, it just came to my mind all of a sudden, probably because we are in such an environment.

Name: Liv
Text: The stage is just in front.

Name: Bianca
Text: The design of this maze is very interesting.

Name: Bianca
Text: If I must compare it with something else, I prefer the view of the snowfield.

Name: Bianca
Text: But there's something different about this place.

Name: Bianca
Text: And I like it too.

Name: Bianca
Text: This feels more like a vacation rather than the "explore mission" mentioned in the brief.

Name: Bianca
Text: A vacation like this feels quite special.

Name: Bianca
Text: ...As long as you feel relaxed.

Name: Bianca
Text: I have heard of the consecutive battles you previously fought. You deserve a good rest.

Name: Bianca
Text: I didn't expect a stage like this...

Name: Bianca
Text: I wonder what it is used for?

Name: Nanami
Text: Wow! I can see you, Commandant!

Name: Nanami
Text: It felt so interesting to "fight" together with you, Commandant!

Name: Nanami
Text: I want to do it again!

Name: Nanami
Text: I knew you would feel the same, Commandant!

Name: Nanami
Text: Would you like to explore it again with me?

Name: Nanami
Text: I didn't get to see the routes clearly.

Name: Nanami
Text: Let me check... Hmm, this should be right.

Name: Nanami
Text: Let's play again later, shall we?

Name: Nanami
Text: Let's just pretend we are actually dating in the Golden Age!

Name: Kamui
Text: We surely had great synergy back there! That's my pal!

Name: Kamui
Text: I think we could finish it a little faster—like a racing game!

Name: Kamui
Text: They should record how much time everybody took to complete the maze!

Name: Kamui
Text: And I'm sure we can make it to the top of the leaderboard!

Name: Kamui
Text: Hehe, of course!

Name: Kamui
Text: I feel so happy!

Name: Kamui
Text: It's been a long time since we last fought side by side like this!

Name: Kamui
Text: Hmm... Technically, we didn't even see each other during the maze.

Name: Kamui
Text: But I guess that could still be counted as "side by side," right?

Name: Kamui
Text: Wow! I didn't know there would be such a large stage!

Name: Karenina
Text: I don't like the door's lifting device.

Name: Karenina
Text: It was so noisy when it moved. It probably has not been maintained for a long time.

Name: Karenina
Text: But... I have to say, the decorations here are quite lovely.

Name: Karenina
Text: Hey! Stop looking at me with so much caution!

Name: Karenina
Text: I'm not going to blow up the decorations here.

Name: Karenina
Text: Hmph... You better not.

Name: Karenina
Text: What's that thing in front? A stage?

Name: Karenina
Text: Does everyone take part in such an event in spring?

Name: Karenina
Text: Whatever. Let's check it out together.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Hmm... I like this place.

Name: Watanabe
Text: I will help enhance the rapport between combat squad members.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Maybe it's because we are very similar.

Name: Watanabe
Text: No, not just that. Perhaps...

Name: Watanabe
Text: There is something else we have in common.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Where does this road lead?

Name: Watanabe
Text: It's been a long time since I last saw something like this.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Scenes like this always remind me of the past...

Name: Watanabe
Text: Yeah... A very long time.

Name: Watanabe
Text: Is that the stage you mentioned? Let's check it out together.

Name: α
Text: Luna will probably like this kind of place.

Name: α
Text: But I prefer the vast, wild nature.

Name: α
Text: True. In a way, it was quite a special "entertainment" experience.

Name: α
Text: It's not a matter of whether I like it or not.

Name: α
Text: I just have no intention of engaging in such "entertainment."

Name: α
Text: I would probably never enter a place like this if you didn't reach out to me.

Name: α
Text: Still... We worked together pretty well.

Name: α
Text: Hmph, understanding your opponent is a crucial part of preparation for battle.

Name: α
Text: Don't expect me to go easy on you on a real battlefield just because of that.

Name: Ayla
Text: This maze is so fun! Don't you think, Commandant?

Name: Ayla
Text: I love its design! The beach, the sea, and the maze!

Name: Ayla
Text: Even though it's a virtual hall, I still feel like I can smell the sea breeze.

Name: Ayla
Text: I know, right? It wasn't my delusion!

Name: Ayla
Text: Also, look at that design over there...

Name: Ayla
Text: Pink corals! I have never seen corals like those!

Name: Ayla
Text: This maze is just like what I have imagined!

Name: Ayla
Text: Hmm... I just thought of an idea for the design of a new coating! Would you like to hear it, Commandant?

Name: Sophia
Text: Oh, sorry. I was just thinking of some things on the train.

Name: Sophia
Text: This set of corridors with the name of "maze" feels similar to the place where I once lived.

Name: Sophia
Text: But it gives me... a completely different feeling.

Name: Sophia
Text: Back there, it was always dark. I heard mice squeaking every day.

Name: Sophia
Text: But here is just... different.

Name: Sophia
Text: Hmm... I don't really know how to describe this feeling.

Name: Sophia
Text: Is that so...

Name: Sophia
Text: This place makes me happy indeed.

Name: Sophia
Text: I like it very much.

Name: Sophia
Text: What shall we do next?

Name: Chrome
Text: I never thought we would go through a maze like this...

Name: Chrome
Text: It was a form of entertainment, but I still learned a lot from the process.

Name: Chrome
Text: Thanks for your instructions, Commandant.

Name: Chrome
Text: I think I can draw some insights that can be used in the training of teamwork.

Name: Chrome
Text: Maintaining the same distance from teammates is also a crucial skill needed in battles.

Name: Chrome
Text: I'm sure it will benefit us.

Name: Chrome
Text: I always knew I would learn a lot from you, Commandant.

Name: Chrome
Text: After I go back, I will review the notes I took and discuss with you again, Commandant.

Name: Vera
Text: Tch. Your instructions were not too bad.

Name: Vera
Text: I'll give you a pass.

Name: Vera
Text: Are you seriously complimenting me?

Name: Vera
Text: ...What a fool.

Name: Vera
Text: Is there anything else I can expect?

Name: Vera
Text: I thought we would see a minotaur or something like that after entering the maze.

Name: Vera
Text: But there was nothing!

Name: Vera
Text: I was expecting a decent fight.

Name: Vera
Text: Turns out it was just a game to "test our synergy"?

Name: Vera
Text: ...I can hardly imagine such a boring life.

Name: Vera
Text: What's that? A stage?

Name: Luna
Text: ...So this maze has a beach theme.

Name: Luna
Text: Some things from the past.

Name: Luna
Text: ...Maybe.

Name: Luna
Text: But who can define what's happy, and what's not?

Name: Luna
Text: Are you feeling sorry for me?

Name: Luna
Text: What's at the end of this road?

Name: Luna
Text: All that effort to pass the maze just to reach the final stage?

Name: Luna
Text: ...You humans always enjoy doing such meaningless things.

Name: Luna
Text: ...Let's go. The stage is just in front.

Name: Camu
Text: ...Is that all?

Name: Camu
Text: Humans of the Golden Age really had no better way of celebrating.

Name: Camu
Text: Shouldn't there be some delicious food at the end of the maze?

Name: Camu
Text: ...Whatever you say.

Name: Camu
Text: Anyway, I think we worked together pretty well just now.

Name: Camu
Text: It's been a long time since we last connected, but the synergy's still there.

Name: Camu
Text: ...Hmph.

Name: Camu
Text: What's on the platform behind? Can I open those boxes?

Name: Rosetta
Text: It went surprisingly smoothly...

Name: Rosetta
Text: I feel like I'm always lucky when I'm with you, Commandant.

Name: Rosetta
Text: Do you have a special power?

Name: Rosetta
Text: ...Pff.

Name: Rosetta
Text: I didn't expect that joke from you, Commandant.

Name: Rosetta
Text: But this maze is different from what we had in ARU...

Name: Rosetta
Text: We usually refer to forests with complex terrain as mazes.

Name: Rosetta
Text: The atmosphere is very different from this place, but still quite fun...

Name: Rosetta
Text: What's that in front... A stage?

Name: Rosetta
Text: We don't have such a thing in our maze...

Name: Rosetta
Text: Let's check it out together, Commandant.

Name: Qu
Text: Quite an interesting design.

Name: Qu
Text: You are my "partner" now. Of course I will adjust my pace for you.

Name: Qu
Text: Spring... Kowloong also used to have some customs for this season.

Name: Qu
Text: In Kowloong, we would go for a spring outing and make seasonal dishes instead of navigating through a maze like this one.

Name: Qu
Text: Perhaps Tabula Akasha should also take in this different custom.

Name: Qu
Text: A stage? Will there be any performance?

Name: Qu
Text: Feelings... Hah, let's check it out.

Name: Changyu
Text: Hey! This place is great.

Name: Changyu
Text: Have you ever thought about selling tickets and inviting people from other places?

Name: Changyu
Text: I'm sure a lot of people will be interested!

Name: Changyu
Text: Let me think. We can also change it to other themes...

Name: Changyu
Text: Would you like to do this business with me? I'll give you 70% of the income!

Name: Changyu
Text: Guess I'll need to talk to Babylonia then...

Name: Changyu
Text: Hmm? I just like new stuff.

Name: Changyu
Text: What's that in front? A stage?

Name: Changyu
Text: Are we going to the souvenir shop already?

Name: Wanshi
Text: Hmm... This place is perfect for sniping.

Name: Wanshi
Text: If I can nap, I mean, ambush at the corner earlier...

Name: Wanshi
Text: Hm...

Name: Wanshi
Text: No, but I just feel this entire atmosphere...

Name: Wanshi
Text: Is perfect for taking a rest...

Name: Wanshi
Text: It will be great if we can put a maintenance chamber here.

Name: Wanshi
Text: That will give me excellent sleep quality. Only that training room can beat it...

Name: Wanshi
Text: Yawn...

Name: Wanshi
Text: Okay... I won't. I can see the stage ahead.

Name: Wanshi
Text: There's got to be some other activities...

Name: Wanshi
Text: I'll stay awake till the end...

Name: Selena
Text: ~I do hear the morning lark...~

Name: Selena
Text: ~Trip we after the night's shade...~

Name: Selena
Text: "A Midsummer Night's Dream", a beautiful opera.

Name: Selena
Text: It's a story about a beautiful forest, dusk and nightfall, and lovers finally live happily ever after.

Name: Selena
Text: Some couples fall in love with each other, while some are left in vain and despair.

Name: Selena
Text: It starts with mischievous fairies and concludes with a happy ending, in which the lovers rejoice and unite.

Name: Selena
Text: Like a torch in the dark night...

Name: Selena
Text: Oh... My apologies, I'm rambling on and on about my interests again.

Name: Selena
Text: That's excellent news. I will make sure to invite you to watch this opera if there is a chance, Conductor.

Name: Selena
Text: I'll make sure to perform on that day...

Name: No. 21
Text: ...Sniff, sniff.

Name: No. 21
Text: It's the real Gray Raven Commandant. Alarm disengaged.

Name: No. 21
Text: I must take caution in places that I have never been before.

Name: No. 21
Text: ...Sniff, sniff.

Name: No. 21
Text: It's rare for me to see these colors.

Name: No. 21
Text: I neither "like" nor "dislike" them.

Name: No. 21
Text: Do you "like" this place, Commandant?

Name: No. 21
Text: Noted. Gray Raven Commandant likes pink and blue.

Name: No. 21
Text: What do we do next?

Name: No. 21
Text: Hmm... I don't understand.

Name: Roland
Text: Hah, who would have thought I had great synergy with a commandant?

Name: Roland
Text: How interesting. It just reminds me of some things...

Name: Roland
Text: That took place a long time ago.

Name: Roland
Text: I like the form of this game... Very interesting.

Name: Roland
Text: Are we playing puppets? Or marionettes?

Name: Roland
Text: Controlling each other over a string of words...

Name: Roland
Text: Should I thank you for inviting me to this excellent show?

Name: Roland
Text: Hahahahaha, that's the Gray Raven Commandant I know.

Name: Roland
Text: What's next? Any more interesting activities?

Name: Roland
Text: Or... Is it time to say goodbye already?

Name: Roland
Text: That would be a shame though.

Name: Roland
Text: After all...

Name: Pulao
Text: What a fun maze!

Name: Pulao
Text: It reminds me of the bagua maze recorded in Kowloong documents!

Name: Pulao
Text: But the bagua maze should be a little larger though?

Name: Pulao
Text: I feel like I'm always so happy when I'm with you, Commandant!

Name: Pulao
Text: Hehe. We had great coordination too!

Name: Pulao
Text: Turn left, turn right, then move ahead! Hehe!

Name: Pulao
Text: Whoa! I see a beach over there!

Name: Pulao
Text: I have always been living on the Nighter, but rarely saw a beach like this!

Name: Pulao
Text: Can we check it out after this, Commandant?

Name: Pulao
Text: Hooray!

Name: Haicma
Text: Is this what you meant by "explore"?

Name: Haicma
Text: Adding a new definition of "explore" to the database... Done.

Name: Haicma
Text: Before we entered, I scanned the structure's interior and detected the optimal route.

Name: Haicma
Text: Still, there was some data I was unable to confirm when I went through the structure with you.

Name: Haicma
Text: Just now, my database was occupied by the thought that I "wanted" to see you.

Name: Haicma
Text: But the reason behind this idea remains unclear to me.

Name: Haicma
Text: I have examined all my actions after entering the maze. Yet, I could not reach an answer.

Name: Haicma
Text: I will save this maze run in my memory.

Name: Haicma
Text: It will be stored along with all the data related to you for further analysis.

Name: Noan
Text: We have reached the end point.

Name: Noan
Text: True. It was our first time working together...

Name: Noan
Text: Have you been deliberately trying to work with me, or do we just happen to have good synergy?

Name: Noan
Text: True. I couldn't advance on my own if you weren't there.

Name: Noan
Text: This maze was intended for the two participants to reach the end together.

Name: Noan
Text: Sure. There's a stage ahead. I wonder what we will see there. Perhaps a ball or some other performance?

Name: Noan
Text: Let's check it out together, Commandant.

Name: Bambinata
Text: Commandant! Is there a new order?

Name: Bambinata
Text: New order accepted. Following Commandant.

Name: Bambinata
Text: It was very complicated.

Name: Bambinata
Text: Without Commandant's instructions or radar scanning...

Name: Bambinata
Text: Bambinata would never be able to clear this maze alone.

Name: Bambinata
Text: Bambinata will remember it.

Name: Bambinata
Text: Please give me an order with no time limit.

Name: Bambinata
Text: So Bambinata can read it again from the external module if it is ever forgotten.

Name: Bambinata
Text: The maze could not be cleared without the joint effort of Commandant and Bambinata. Bambinata will remember it.

Name: Hanying
Text: It was a fantastic journey indeed.

Name: Hanying
Text: Did you enjoy yourself, Commandant?

Name: Hanying
Text: It feels like a spring outing that I read in the stories.

Name: Hanying
Text: The maze is quite sophisticated too. Kowloong also has a similar design... I think the name is "bagua maze."

Name: Hanying
Text: Hmm... Would you like to come to Kowloong after this, Commandant?

Name: Hanying
Text: It's a completely different vibe compared to this place. I'm sure you would like it.

Name: Hanying
Text: I can be your guide to take you through the beautiful sceneries of Kowloong.

Name: Hanying
Text: You will find ancient trees so tall that they can almost reach the sky, meandering streams, towering temples located on mountain peaks, as well as elevated paths built along cliffs.

Name: Hanying
Text: Shall we make that a promise?

Name: Hanying
Text: Is that a... stage in front?

Name: Dottie
Text: Do you want Mother's love? Very good.

Name: Dottie
Text: Mother expects more than that.

Name: Dottie
Text: That's right. Don't move...

Name: Dottie
Text: Listen to Mother!

Name: Dottie
Text: Looks like I need to teach your Mother's manners again!

Name: Dottie
Text: Come, bring the new family member here.

Name: Dottie
Text: How useless...

Name: Dottie
Text: No! I don't want to be a failure...

Name: Dottie
Text: Mother...

Name: Bambinata
Text: Bambinata will never listen to others!

Name: Tifa
Text: The swamp of pain has no place for you filthy insects!

Name: Tifa
Text: The spikes of pain shall become my strength...

Name: Tifa
Text: Come to me, the power of suffering!

Name: Tifa
Text: All my thorns have vanished...

Name: Celica
Text: Why is there no damage?

Name: Fu Shen
Text: You can't hurt me.

Name: Fu Shen
Text: Get a taste of Kowloong technology, brat!

Name: Celica
Text: Try to dodge his attacks first.

Name: Fu Shen
Text: Not bad. Now you're qualified to challenge me!

Name: Fu Shen
Text: How!

Name: Fu Shen
Text: Hmph!

Name: Scavenger A
Text: You are... different from them...

Name: Hanying
Text: Can you tell me what happened here?

Name: Scavenger A
Text: I don't know. The performer mechanoids were functioning normally. But the moment I turned around, they turned mad and began to attack us.

Name: Scavenger A
Text: Wait... My friends are in danger! I need to go!

Name: Hanying
Text: The damage on these mechanoids... seems to be left by some blunt weapon.

Name: Hanying
Text: Could it be a heavy weapon?

Name: Hanying
Text: Guess I will meet them soon if I keep going up.

Name: System
Text: Prosthetic eye command processed.

Name: System
Text: Activating digital vision.

Name: System
Text: Closing digital vision.

Name: System
Text: Communication...

Name: System
Text: Warning. Warning. M.I.N.D. waveform disorder detected.

Name: System
Text: <color=#FF0000>Warning. Warning. M.I.N.D. stability is about to fall below the threshold!</color>

Name: System
Text: M.I.N.D. will soon be overloaded. Activating the auxiliary protocol!

Name: System
Text: Initializing the emotion module. Combat support module loaded.

Name: System
Text: Regenerating combat arithmetic circuits!

Name: System
Text: Preparing to activate: Predator Stance.

Name: System
Text: Preparing for pursuit.

Name: System
Text: Pursuit type: <color=#FF6600>Dead-on Pounce.</color>

Name: System
Text: Pursuit type: <color=#0099FF>Forceful Pounce.</color>

Name: System
Text: Preparing to cast: Wolfspirit Release.\n(Press and hold Basic Attack)

Name: System
Text: Growling Wolfspirit.\n(Tap Basic Attack consecutively)

Name: System
Text: Signature module: Charging up...

Name: System
Text: Preparing to cast: Sky-ripping Arcflash

Name: System
Text: M.I.N.D. stability rising. Auxiliary protocol offline. Restoring frame control.

Name: Connecting...
Text: What have you been doing? I couldn't reach you at all! Come help us at the northern outer ring ASAP!

Name: System
Text: <color=#FF0000>Corruption warning!</color>

Name: System
Text: <color=#FF0000>Corruption level reaching peak value!</color>

Name: System
Text: Consciousness restarted!

Name: Instructor
Text: Good. Next, you need to replace the correct unit in order to repair the defense device.

Name: Tips
Text: This device is unable to detect the exact location of enemy combat units and is hence unable to launch precise attacks.

Name: Instructor
Text: Correct. Well done. Next, you need to hold off enemy units while ensuring the defense device can be booted successfully.

Name: Instructor
Text: Even Engineering Force Constructs still need to possess a certain level of combat abilities.

Name: Instructor
Text: Very good. You are an outstanding fighter. That will earn you bonus points.

Name: Instructor
Text: Here comes the final session, in which you will need to demonstrate your ability to use the device.

Name: Instructor
Text: To pass the test, you need to use the device correctly and incorporate your own combat techniques to eliminate all the enemy units.

Name: Instructor
Text: Incorrect. The next phase will start. You need to hold off the enemy units and ensure the remaining two defense devices can start properly.

Name: Instructor
Text: With only two devices running, their overall capability will be limited, which means the difficulty of this session will significantly increase.

Name: Instructor
Text: Unfortunately, you have exceeded the boot time limit.

Name: Instructor
Text: In the last session, you will be tested on your familiarity with the device and ability to use it.

Name: Instructor
Text: You need to use the device correctly and incorporate your own combat techniques to eliminate all the enemy units. This is your last chance to pass the test.

Name: Instructor
Text: You are facing multiple small combat units. Carefully choose between the device's combat modes!

Name: Instructor
Text: Congratulations, Karenina. You have successfully passed the Engineering Force's new member test.

Name: Instructor
Text: I look forward to your performance in the Engineering Force.

Name: Karenina
Text: It's finally over. Not that difficult at all.

Name: Noctis
Text: Activate the mechanism and complete the challenge before time runs out.

Name: Noctis
Text: Step on the square to activate the mechanism and summon statues. You will succeed when the two statues in front and behind are the same.

Name: Noctis
Text: There are four pairs of statues. Activate them to earn points. Complete all of them to clear the stage.

Name: Vera
Text: What's with this Hetero-Creature now? Has it become herbivores?

Name: Vera
Text: I wonder what's under that pile of wheat...

Name: Vera
Text: Is it just gonna leave after eating?

Name: Vera
Text: Hey newbie, go clear the place and set up the trap. I hope that isn't too hard for you.

Name: Vera
Text: If you can't do it, you will clean the toilet.

Name: Noctis
Text: Hah? These enemies aren't even a starter for me!

Name: Vera
Text: Too bad I won't get to see you cleaning toilets with an apron. No. 21, report your situation.

Name: No. 21
Text: No. 21 here. I'm guiding the large Corrupted toward Captain and the dumb newcomer. Arriving in 15 minutes.

Name: Vera
Text: Set up your mine, newbie. Blow that steel thing to pieces when it comes.

Name: Noctis
Text: No need for all that hassle. I can smash it with my fist!

Name: Vera
Text: You're pretty good as a newbie, but puppies should listen to their master.

Name: Noctis
Text: Stop calling me a bloody newbie! The name's Noctis. If you want me to call you Captain, you have to beat me first!

Name: Vera
Text: Hah, still can't accept it? Fine. There's still some time. I'll make you admit your inferiority.

Name: Vera
Text: What's taking so long? I almost fell asleep.

Name: Vera
Text: Is that all you've got? You probably need a babysitter, not a captain.

Name: Vera
Text: Use your brain. Do you have all that muscles just for looking good?

Name: Noctis
Text: Let me have a good fight!\n[Cast Signature to activate the Burst Form]

Name: Noctis
Text: <size=25>I'll break your shell!\n[After pinging a Blast Orb or making a 3-Ping, press and hold Basic Attack to cast Core Passive and break the Corrupted's Armor.]</size>

Name: Noctis
Text: <size=25>I'll finish you off!\n[Phase 2 Signature will be cast when Energy goes to 0 in Signature form. You can also tap the Phase 2 Signature button to cast it.]</size>

Name: Vera
Text: Cool, seems like you were holding back just now. No. 21, let's go!

Name: Liv
Text: Select the route (No. 21 & Noctis or Vera)

Name: Liv
Text: Select the route

Name: Noctis
Text: What do you say, partner? Should we explore together, or should I go alone?

Name: Resident A
Text: We are not giving up this place.

Name: Resident B
Text: Right! We're not going to cower like Dylan!

Name: Resident B
Text: He has more houses than all of us, but ran faster than anyone.

Name: Vera
Text: Just don't freak out later.

Name: Vera
Text: No. 21, check the casualties.

Name: Vera
Text: I'll remain on guard.

Name: Vera
Text: Something's not right.

Name: Vera
Text: No. 21, go check the casualties.

Name: Vera
Text: Then ask that Dylan guy about the mammoth.

Name: Vera
Text: I'll stay on guard in case anything happens again.

Name: No. 21
Text: Understood.

Name: Dylan
Text: Thanks for saving my life.

Name: Vera
Text: Is that so? I thought you promised to give the house to me?

Name: Dylan
Text: Ahem... Of course I want to give it to you. But as you can see, the best one is already burned to the ground.

Name: Resident
Text: ****! This is just one of the many houses you have!

Name: Dylan
Text: Um...

Name: No. 21
Text: So many houses. I can play hide-and-seek for ages in them...

Name: Vera
Text: Tch, as if I really care about your house. Back to the point, what's with these stupid monstrosities?

Name: Dylan
Text: The moment I stepped out of the town... I saw several mammoths... About three, maybe?

Name: Dylan
Text: They started to chase after me before I could figure out what was happening.

Name: Dylan
Text: I had no choice but to run back. Fortunately, you were here...

Name: Vera
Text: We only have one here. So there's another two more coming.

Name: Vera
Text: But this place can't withstand any more battles.

Name: Resident
Text: I can set up explosives in front of the mayor's home. We just need to get the mammoths to go there.

Name: Vera
Text: Alright. I'll get them here.

Name: Vera
Text: No. 21, you take these people with you. Leave this place to me.

Name: No. 21
Text: Understood. Good luck, Captain.

Name: Noctis
Text: Hey, are you okay?

Name: Fann
Text: I'm fine. Thanks for saving me.

Name: Noctis
Text: Easy-peasy.

Name: Noctis
Text: Tsk... But these assassins are so annoying.

Name: Noctis
Text: They just keep coming.

Name: Fann
Text: I can help you. Let's finish them off.

Name: Noctis
Text: What? I don't need you. Just take care of your dad.

Name: Fann
Text: I'll leave it to you then...

Name: Noctis
Text: Sure. Don't forget to call me if you are in trouble.

Name: Commandant
Text: I have confirmed their location and number with the drone's help.

Name: Noctis
Text: Oh? Not bad, Commandant.

Name: Commandant
Text: Cough... The tactics, along with the routes, are ready.

Name: Commandant
Text: I have sent you everything, Noctis.

Name: Commandant
Text: Destroy them all. Don't let them hurt the residents.

Name: Noctis
Text: Hah? What is that?

Name: Enemy
Text: Don't kill me... Please...

Name: Noctis
Text: Okay? But it depends on what you can offer me in exchange.

Name: Enemy
Text: I will tell you everything I know!

Name: Noctis
Text: Then say it out! Stop wasting time!

Name: Enemy
Text: More reinforcements... are on their way.

Name: Enemy
Text: They will land on the empty space to the front left of the mayor's home.

Name: Noctis
Text: Max's house... You better be telling the truth. Do you know what I mean?

Name: Noctis
Text: If I ever find you lying, the bombs on you will explode right away. They won't kill you but will hurt you so much that you wish you were dead.

Name: Enemy
Text: No... I'm telling the truth, I swear.

Name: Town Guard
Text: Greetings, Mr. Noctis.

Name: Town Guard
Text: On behalf of our town, I'm honored to present this "New Oakley" Medal to you.

Name: Town Guard
Text: To thank you for... what you did for us recently.

Name: Town Guard
Text: Greetings, Mr. Noctis.

Name: Town Guard
Text: To thank and commend you for your contribution toward the town's peace...

Name: Town Guard
Text: On behalf of our town, I'm honored to present this "New Oakley" Honor Medal to you. You deserve it.

Name: Town Guard
Text: Greetings, Mr. Noctis.

Name: Town Guard
Text: To thank you for your outstanding contribution toward the town's peace...

Name: Town Guard
Text: On behalf of our town, I'm honored to present this "New Oakley" Legendary Honor Medal to you.

Name: Town Guard
Text: You will always be welcome in New Oakley.

Name: Noctis
Text: Equip the medal?

Name: Noctis
Text: These bottles... Is it gas?

Name: Noctis
Text: There's oil on the packaging. It's for food. They must have been here for a while.

Name: Noctis
Text: The remaining gas and the detonator... Better watch out.

Name: Noctis
Text: This looks like some sort of sign... Is the message hidden over there?

Name: Noctis
Text: This feels like... braille! It's him!

Name: Noctis
Text: The switch is here!

Name: Hero
Text: ... (Agitated, restless.)

Name: Sophia
Text: Why are there so many guards? Is he a hero or a criminal?

Name: Sophia
Text: Shall I investigate them? There are quite a few guards on the street, but I can still find some space.

Name: Changyu
Text: It wouldn't be a problem if we are in the real world... Speaking of which, since Gray Ravens have all been shrunk, will they get bonuses sneaking in?

Name: Changyu
Text: Still... It seems quite risky. What do you think, guys?

Name: Changyu
Text: Okay. I know we can count on you, Commandant.

Name: Sophia
Text: My character has not learned any skill related to [Stealth]. I think we have to leave the task to Commandant.

Name: Changyu
Text: Alright, deal. I also have something to investigate.

Name: Lee
Text: They caught us.

Name: Lucia
Text: Run to me, everyone.

Name: Hero
Text: ... (Anxiously looking around.)

Name: Sophia
Text: Let's come back here again after finishing our investigations.

Name: Lucia
Text: We should get going too.

Name: Hero
Text: ... (Keep the movement unnoticeable.)

Name: Hero
Text: (Tch, did they find it out?)

Name: Lee
Text: Two guards left. We must find a way to get around them.

Name: Liv
Text: But this is the only way taking us upstairs.

Name: Lucia
Text: I think I have a pretty good plan.

Name: Lee
Text: Oh? Are we going to confront them directly?

Name: Lucia
Text: Of course not. I'll take care of the guards at the gate.

Name: Liv
Text: Be careful, Lucia.

Name: Guard
Text: Who's there? Stop!

Name: Guard
Text: You can't run around here, kid. This is a restricted area.

Name: Guard
Text: Just go away if you have nothing better to do.

Name: Guard
Text: Stop fooling around, otherwise I'll teach you a lesson.

Name: Guard
Text: Hmm? What can I do for you, kid?

Name: Guard
Text: Stupid brat. Quit fooling around here!

Name: Guard
Text: Hmm? How can I help you, kid?

Name: Guard
Text: Kids nowadays are just so full of energy.

Name: Guard
Text: (Speaking of which, I don't think I have ever seen her.)

Name: Guard
Text: (Wait a second, I don't think she's from nearby...)

Name: Guard
Text: Huh? Did I just hear a sound?

Name: Guard
Text: Huh? What's that sound?

Name: Lucia
Text: The plan went well. I better leave now.

Name: Ayla (GM)
Text: Congrats to Kamui for leveling up. The number of remaining monsters in the current area is... 5.

Name: Kamui
Text: Hehe, easy-peasy.

Name: Chrome
Text: Let's keep up the good work and finish off all the remaining enemies.

Name: Ayla (GM)
