Text: Alright, time to roll a die to determine the monsters' remaining combat capabilities.

Name: Kamui
Text: I'll do it! I'm in luck today!

Name: Ayla (GM)
Text: Nice, that was a great roll. Let me take a look...

Name: Kamui
Text: Ta-da! Just as planned!

Name: Ayla (GM)
Text: This roll will determine the monsters' remaining combat capabilities. The larger the number, the tougher they are.

Name: Kamui
Text: No! I want a reroll...

Name: Kamui
Text: Um... That must be an accident.

Name: Kamui
Text: Not too bad... I guess?

Name: Kamui
Text: Not bad.

Name: Kamui
Text: See? Told you.

Name: Chrome
Text: I guess that's quite lucky in a way.

Name: Chrome
Text: Hmm... That's not very difficult. Let's finish them off quick.

Name: Chrome
Text: At least it's not a 6...

Name: Chrome
Text: Well... It's a rare experience, isn't it?

Name: Kamui
Text: That's the last one! Don't let it get away!

Name: Chrome
Text: Stop it, Kamui.

Name: Kamui
Text: Leave it to me!

Name: Kamui
Text: Haha, you can't run from me!

Name: Kamui
Text: Your life is coming to an end! Stop running and turn into my EXP!

Name: Ayla (GM)
Text: Is that so? Let me do an evolution roll... Success!

Name: Kamui
Text: What?! Seriously?

Name: Kamui
Text: Wait, why did the evolution even change the species?

Name: Chrome
Text: This is going to be bad... Kamui!

Name: Kamui
Text: Alright, just leave it to me.

Name: Kamui
Text: Oh no! We lost it!

Name: Kamui
Text: Finally, it's all over. Let's go meet up with Commandant, Captain.

Name: Chrome
Text: Sure. Anyway, that opponent was pretty tough. What did you get?

Name: Kamui
Text: A lot, of course! I just went up many levels. Just wait and see me fight.

Name: Liv
Text: Try again, Commandant. I'm sure you can do it.

Name: Tips
Text: Would you like to recall a memory of a specific time?

Name: Cathy
Text: Red Kuroro: Red Kuroro didn't do it, kuku. Yellow Kuroro: It must be White Kuroro. He's the only one without a color, kuku. Blue Kuroro: Yellow Kuroro did this, kuku! White Kuroro: Yellow Kuroro lied! Yellow Kuroro framed me!

Name: Tips
Text: Keep holding the <color=#ffda58>[Dodge]</color> button to confront.

Name: Tips
Text: Release the <color=#ffda58>[Dodge]</color> button to counterattack.

Name: Lucia
Text: The lead dancer on the stage will <color=#FFFF00>continuously perform moves after the yellow circle</color>.

Name: Lucia
Text: Command your team to <color=#FFFF00>perform the same moves in order as the circle shrinks</color>.

Name: Lucia
Text: Let's give it a go!

Name: Lucia
Text: Aim to repeat the lead dancer's moves perfectly! Good luck!

Name: Lucia
Text: Now, we have to <color=#FFFF00>repeat those moves</color> <color=#FFFF00>in order</color>. The <color=#FF0000>1st position</color> needs to complete the <color=#FF0000>1st</color> move, the <color=#FF0000>2nd position</color> needs to complete the <color=#FF0000>2nd</color> move, and so on.

Name: Lucia
Text: There are 4 possible moves:

Name: Lucia
Text: <color=#FFFF00>Squat</color>. The Skill Orb is <color=#FFFF00>Yellow</color>.

Name: Lucia
Text: <color=#FFFF00>Jump</color>. The Skill Orb is <color=#FFFF00>Red</color>.

Name: Lucia
Text: <color=#FFFF00>Spin</color>. The Skill Orb is <color=#FFFF00>Blue</color>.

Name: Lucia
Text: <color=#F8F8FF>Stand</color> has a special button on the left of the screen. The Skill Orb is <color=#F8F8FF>White</color>.

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant's <color=#FF0000>Score</color> is displayed on the top. The progress bar represents your <color=#FF0000>progress</color> in this challenge.

Name: Lucia
Text: When the music starts, the lead dancer on the stage will <color=#FFFF00>continuously perform moves after the yellow circle</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Commandant, Liv: Empyrea's Leap is completed. Let's learn about her new abilities.

Name: Celica
Text: Empyrea can immediately perform another ping during any ping but can't cast this continuously.

Name: Celica
Text: Good job!

Name: Celica
Text: Casting the Signature Move will summon Rain of Incineration, healing allies and dealing Fire DMG to enemies in a large area.

Name: Celica
Text: Awesome!

Name: Celica
Text: That's all for the introduction to the Leap system. You can practice as you wish now, Commandant.

Name: Bridget
Text: The gate has not moved at all

Name: Gambler
Text: Sorry, I couldn't make you enjoy this to the fullest...

Name: Celica
Text: The enemy has appeared. Defeat them!

Name: Celica
Text: Switching characters increases the progress of <color=#FFA500>Loop of Fire</color> and triggers the <color=#FFA500>Loop of Fire</color> skill in the corresponding slot.

Name: Celica
Text: Normal attacks are not working very well against this enemy. Try <color=#FFA500>Loop of Fire</color> now!

Name: Celica
Text: Loop of Fire inflicts <color=#FFA500>Combustible</color>. Once <color=#FFA500>Combustible</color> reaches 20 stacks, Loop of Fire can convert it into <color=#FFA500>Ignition</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Make another switch to put the enemy under <color=#FFA500>Ignition</color>!

Name: Celica
Text: The enemy is now <color=#FFA500>Ignited</color>. While Ignition is active, they will take damage continuously.

Name: Celica
Text: Head to the Terminal to select your desired tutorial.

Name: Celica
Text: What would you like to learn?

Name: Celica
Text: Exit the tutorial?

Name: Celica
Text: Use Loop of Fire and <color=#FFA500>Ignition</color> to defeat the enemy!

Name: Celica
Text: Switching characters into battle will automatically trigger a <color=#FF0000>3-Ping</color>. Afterward, every switch will also <color=#FF0000>generate 4 Signal Orbs</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Next up is the basic tutorial on switching characters.

Name: Celica
Text: <size=34>Switching in No. 21 again will automatically trigger her 3-Ping Skill once and <color=#FF0000>restore 4 Signal Orbs</color>.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: <size=34>When Crimson Weave is switched in, she will automatically perform her 3-Ping Skill.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: <size=34>Nanami's 3-Ping Skill will be triggered once she is switched in.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: Store up Energy and Blade Aura with 3-Pings.

Name: Celica
Text: When Energy is sufficient, cast [Weave: Splashing Thunder].

Name: Celica
Text: Convert Blade Aura into Energy and Aphotic Points with [Resolute Blow].

Name: Celica
Text: Keep on pinging Signal Orbs to build up Energy and Aphotic Points.

Name: Celica
Text: Cast [Unquenchable Flare] to deal massive DMG by consuming all Aphotic Points.

Name: Celica
Text: When Energy is sufficient, cast [Weave: Karmic Inferno] to deal significant DMG.

Name: Celica
Text: Accumulate Starlight Points with two <color=#FF0000>Red 3-Pings</color> in a row.

Name: Celica
Text: When Starlight Points are sufficient, tap <color=#FFFF1A>Yellow Orb</color> to cast [Aetherstrike].

Name: Celica
Text: After casting [Aetherstrike], hitting enemies with Basic Attack using Shield Axe 4 times will convert Starlight Points into Overload.

Name: Celica
Text: Press and hold Basic Attack to cast [Meteoric Doom] and deal massive DMG by consuming all Overload and Starlight Points.

Name: Celica
Text: When Energy is sufficient, cast [Decisive Detonation!].

Name: Celica
Text: Activate Predator Stance with a 3-Ping. When a purple mark appears, tap Basic Attack to trigger Dead-on Pounce and gain Wolfspirit Points.

Name: Celica
Text: Press and hold Basic Attack to enter Wolfspirit Form by consuming Wolfspirit Points, then cast Signature.

Name: Bridget
Text: Swap me in! I'm good at setting fire!

Name: Bridget
Text: When there are at least 8 <color=#00BFFF>Blue Orbs</color> available, press and hold <color=#00BFFF>Blue Orb</color> to inflict <color=#FFA500>Combustible</color>.

Name: Bridget
Text: The Signature Move can convert any stacks of <color=#FFA500>Combustible</color> into <color=#FFA500>Ignition</color>.

Name: Celica
Text: Go and find the enemy.

Name: Celica
Text: Upon entering a <color=#7FFF00>Swamp block</color>, the Signal Orbs will be <color=#7FFF00>contaminated</color>. Contaminated Signal Orbs cannot be pinged.

Name: Celica
Text: Switch to another character to remove the <color=#7FFF00>contamination</color>. The Searing Missile triggered can remove <color=#7FFF00>Swamp blocks</color> in a cross.

Name: Celica
Text: Tap or press and hold Basic Attack to attack the enemy continuously with the Gun Skill.

Name: Celica
Text: A dyed enemy will drop the corresponding Gun Skill upon death. Approach to pick it up automatically.

Name: Celica
Text: After that, tap the area to switch to the Gun Skill. Then, your Basic Attacks will consume ammo of the Gun Skill instead.

Name: Celica
Text: After that, tap the area to switch to the Gun Skill. Then, your Basic Attacks will consume ammo of the Gun Skill instead.

Name: Celica
Text: When the Orb Bar is full, approaching the Gun Skill dropped will trigger a switch. Tap to pick it up, and it will replace the Gun Skill selected.

Name: Celica
Text: Attacks will charge the Core. You'll be able to use skills when the charging is complete.

Name: Celica
Text: Now you can practice freely. Move to the mark to exit the tutorial.

Name: Celica
Text: Welcome to the Training Field.

Name: Celica
Text: Kill the enemies to complete the training.

Name: Celica
Text: The remaining ammo of the Gun Skill will be displayed in the Energy Bar below. You will not be able to use the Gun Skill when its ammo is used up.

Name: Kuroro
Text: Liv gains bonuses. 3-Ping grants Energy Points.

Name: Kuroro
Text: When Liv has Energy Points, press and hold Dodge to unleash Levi-Gun on your enemies.
